Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and that Lurking Hive Soldier. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 12 or higher, ignore those wounds.
ability_2_desc: A Lurking Hive Soldier is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Madriks Warriors
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Human Champion. That chosen champion is in play. MadrIk Warriors get one additional +1 power marker on the chosen Non... There can only one chosen Human Champion for all the MadrIk Warriors on one battlefield.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the MacDirk Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Human Champion you control.

name: Major Q10
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 2. Major Q10 may use this special attack 4 times in the same turn. Q10 may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Major Q10 may use this special attack 2 times in the same turn. Q10 may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.

name: Major Q9
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2 or 3. Major Q9 starts each turn with 9 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2 or 3 attack dice. Major Q9 may keep making special attacks with 1, 2 or 3 attack dice until he has rolled all 9 attack dice. Major Q9 may target the same or different figures with each attack.

name: Major X17
ability_1_desc: All small, medium or large opponents figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major X17 suffer -1 to their attack rolls and are affected by the Cyberclaw. No move by any special power on an Army Card or organ.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, Major X17 gains +4 to the result against an adjacent figure.

name: Aquilla Marachott, Mind Whisperer
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Marachott, Mind Whisperer, before taking Marachott's turn, you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Marachott always adds 2 automatic skulls to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card and taking a turn with Marachott, you may choose a Unique Hero within 2 spaces of Marachott. Roll the 20-sided die, adding 3 to the roll if you control that Hero. If you roll a 16 or higher, take temporary control of that Hero and immediately take a turn with that Hero. After taking that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to its previous owner. Any Order Markers that were on the chosen figure's Army Card stay on that card.

name: Marcu Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Each time Marcu Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove one of your Order Markers from any Card. Marcu Esenwein cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, choose any one figure. You now control Marcu Esenwein for the remainder of your turn, but you will not be able to view any unrevealed order markers on his card. At the end of your turn, you lose control of you. All order markers and figures that were on Marcu's Army Card will stay on his Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Marcu Esenwein's movement, ignore elevation changes. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins, walls, and blocking terrain. Figures in his Army Card adjacent to fly. If he is engaged he will take any leaving engagment attacks.

name: Marcus Decimus Gallus
ability_1_desc: All Soldiers you control move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Soldiers adjacent to Marcus Decimus Gallus receive an additional attack die.

name: Marrden Hounds
ability_1_desc: Marrden Hounds can move diagonally. When you order this card, if you roll a 1-3, add 1 to the move value of this card. If you roll a 4-6, add 3 to the move value of this card. If you roll a 7-8, the move value of this card is 7.
ability_2_desc: After dealing damage by attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die for any Marrden Hounds you control. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Soulborgs and figures controlled by a general are unaffected by this marro plague.

name: Marrden Nagrubs
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Marrden Nagrubs, you may first take a turn with a Hivelord you control. Before moving the chosen Hivelord, you may destroy one adjacent Marrden Nagrub you control. If you destroy a Marrden Nagrub with Life Bonding, place a wound marker from the chosen Hivelord's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Marrden Nagrubs may double their Height.

name: Marro Dividers
ability_1_desc: When a Marro Divider you control receives one or more wounds from a Normal or Special Attack by an opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die before removing that figure. If you roll a 17 or higher, ignore any wounds that figure just received and, if possible, place one of your previously destroyed Marro Dividers on a same-level space adjacent to the defending Marro Divider.
ability_2_desc: Marro Hive cannot rebirth Marro Dividers with its Marro Rebirth special power.

name: Marro Drones
ability_1_desc: Before moving Marro Drones, roll the 20-sided die. On a result of 6 or higher, Marro Drones may move and attack with up to 3 Marro Drones you control.

name: Marro Drudge
ability_1_desc: When a Marro Drudge is on a swamp water space, add 1 to its attack and defense.
ability_2_desc: If a Marro Drudge ends its normal movement on a swamp water space, you may immediately place it on any empty same-level swamp water space within 5 spaces. If a Marro Drudge is engaged when it starts to tunnel, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Marro Hive
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, you may take a turn with any small or medium common Marro Squad you control placed before hitting Marro Hive. Any figure not a part of your army must be within 12 clear sight spaces of Marro Hive prior to its movement.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Marro Hive, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may place any previously destroyed common Marro Squad figure from your army on an empty space adjacent to Marro Hive.

name: Marro Stingers
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-4, you must destroy a Stinger you control and you cannot attack this turn. If you roll a 5-9, add 0 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 10 or higher, add 1 to the attack value of this card.

name: Marro Warriors
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with all of the Marro Warriors, one at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each Marro Warrior in play. If you roll a 15 or higher, place a previously destroyed Marro Warrior on a same-level space adjacent to that Marro Warrior. Any Marro Warrior on a water space needs a 10 or higher to Water Clone. You may only Water Clone after you move.

name: Master of the Hunt
ability_1_desc: After attacking an opponent's Unique Hero with this Master of the Hunt's normal attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound inflicted in that attack. For each additional skull rolled, place 1 additional wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Master of the Hunt, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 3 to this Master of the Hunt's Range value for the duration of its turn.

name: Master of the Hunt
ability_1_desc: After attacking an opponent's Unique Hero with this Master of the Hunt's normal attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound inflicted in that attack. For each additional skull rolled; place 1 additional wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Master of the Hunt, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 3 to this Master of the Hunt's Range value for the duration of its turn.

name: Master Win Chiu Woo
ability_1_desc: All Monk Squad figures you control may leap an additional 13 levels up or down when using their Stealth Leap special power. All Monks you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Master Woo add 1 to their attack dice and 1 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Master Woo may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Master Woo may use Stealth Leap 25. Stealth Leap 25 has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap 25, ignore elevations. Master Woo may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Master Woo may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Master Woo is engaged when he starts his Stealth Leap 25, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Me-Buro-Sa
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any small or medium figure within 6 clear site spaces of Me-Buro-Sa. Roll a 20-sided die. If you roll 16 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if it attacked by Me-Buro-Sa this turn.

name: Mezzodemon Warmongers
ability_1_desc: When a Mezzodemon Warmonger attacks a Common figure, add 1 to its Attack value.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, place 1 copper Exoskeleton marker on a Mezzodemon Warmongers Army Card for each Mezzodemon Warmonger figure in your Army. After a Mezzodemon Warmonger rolls defense dice against a normal attack, you may remove 1 Exoskeleton marker from its Army Card to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.

name: Microcorp Agents
ability_1_desc: When a Microcorp Agent receives one or more wounds, roll one die. That agent, roll the 20-sided die. If the result is 15 or higher, ignore the wounds.
ability_2_desc: Microcorp Agents do not have to stop their move- ment when entering a water hex. Add 2 to a Microcorp Agent's defense while in a water hex.
ability_3_desc: When a Microcorp Agent is attacking with a height advantage, he rolls an additional attack die.

name: Mielki the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, after attacking with Mielki the Kyrie Warrior, she may make one additional normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When Mielki destroys a figure with a normal attack, you may choose a Small or Medium friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Mielki. Remove a Wound Marker from the chosen figure. Mielki cannot heal herself with Spear of Sankari, and it cannot be used when destroying a destructible object.

name: Migol Ironwill
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Migol Ironwill, each skull rolled counts as one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Migol Ironwill rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Migol Ironwill can take for this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Migol Ironwill may double his Height.

name: Mika Connour
ability_1_desc: If Mika Connour starts her turn unengaged and on a shadow space, add 3 dice to her attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: If Mika Connour starts her turn on a shadow space, instead of moving normally, you may place her on any other empty shadow space within 8 spaces of her current location. If Mika Connour is engaged when she starts her Shadow Dance, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Mika Connour starts each game with up to 2 shadow tiles on her Army Card. If Mika Connour ends her turn on an empty land space, you may place a shadow tile from her Army Card onto the space she occupies if the shadow tile fits normally onto that space.

name: Mimring
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Target must be in line of sight. 5 spaces in a straight line from Mimring. All figures in the line take 1 hit but are affected by Mimring's Fire Line Special instead of normal damage. In addition, the terrain is destroyed for all affected squares.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for movement and line of sight, Mimring may fly over water without stopping. Mimring does not stop due to terrain, and by flying over water and allies.
ability_3_desc: When Mimring starts to fly out if engaged with an enemy engagement zone.

name: Mind Flayer Mastermind
ability_1_desc: Range 3, Attack 3. This Mind Flayer Mastermind does not need clear line of sight to attack with Psionic Blast Special Attack. If a figure receives 1 or more wounds from Psionic Blast Special Attack, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: When revealing an order marker on this Mind Flayer Mastermind, after taking this Mind Flayer Mastermind's turn, you may choose any Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of this Mind Flayer Mastermind. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take temporary control of the chosen Hero and immediately take a turn with that Hero. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to its previous owner. All order markers that were on the figure's Army Card will stay on the Army Card. Enslave does not affect Mind Flayers.

name: Minions of Utgar
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with the Minions of Utgar you may have each Minion you control who believes Utgar.
ability_2_desc: This hero may move to spaces for elevation changes. Minions of Utgar may fly over the battlefield
ability_3_desc: Each figure without becoming engaged and for their destructions. All Utgar starts to fly, if it is engaged he will lose any distance.

name: Misaerx the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Each time this figure destroys a figure, you may remove a Wound Marker from this Army Card. This figure cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When Misaerx the Kyrie Warrior is destroyed, place this figure on the Army Card of a Unique Warrior Hero that follows Revna. That Hero now has Life Drain.

name: Mohican River Tribe
ability_1_desc: If a Mohican River Tribesman is engaged, add 1 to his attack dice and 2 to his defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Mohican River Tribe, if at least two Mohican River Tribesmen you control are engaged, you may immediately take a turn with one Unique Tribesman Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: If a Mohican River Tribesman you control is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and the Mohican River Tribesman. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 19 or higher, ignore any wounds the Mohican River Tribesman just received.

name: Aquilla Molten Crustaceans
ability_1_desc: Begin the game with three 1-hex lava field tiles and one 1-hex molten lava tile for each Molten Crustaceans in your Army. After a Molten Crustacean you control is destroyed by a normal attack or leaving engagement attack, you must roll the 20-sided die and place one of these tiles onto the space the figure occupied, if the tile fits normally on that space. If you roll a 19 or higher place a molten lava tile, if able. Otherwise place a lava field tile.
ability_2_desc: Molten Crustaceans are not affected by lava field or molten lava spaces, and do not have to stop their movement on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Molten Crustaceans may double their Height.

name: Moltenclaw
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose 4 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces that are within line of sight of Moltenclaw are affected by Burning Breath Special Attack. If Moltenclaw does not attack once per affected figures, each figure rolls defense dice separately. Moltenclaw is not affected by Burning Breath Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Moltenclaw never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Moltenclaw's movement, ignore elevations. Moltenclaw may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Moltenclaw is engaged when he starts to fly, he will have to stop on leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mogrimm Forgehammer
ability_1_desc: If at least one order marker is on Mogrimm Forgehammer, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Mogrimm Forgehammer, you may choose any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces that is engaged with any other figure you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Mogrimm Forgehammer always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Morsbane
ability_1_desc: When an opponent plays a Special Power card or reveals a power on his card turn, if there at least 1 Negation Marker on the Morsbane card, that opponent must move that card or power. To add Negation Markers: The chosen figure's Army card must be within 5 clear spaces. If you roll a 20-sided die, if you roll 15 or higher, you can place a Negation Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. This has a maximum of 3 Negation Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card. These powers are ignored for the game. If you roll a 20 sided die, if you roll 15 or higher, the chosen figure is destroyed.

name: NAKITA AGENTS
ability_1_desc: When a Nakita Agent is attacked and is able to make a defense roll, it may make a smoke cloud. If any figure you control that is adjacent to any figure you control that is adjacent to any figure you control that is adjacent to any figure you control that is adjacent to the Nakita Agent can make a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, you may move the smoke cloud 1 space in any direction. If the figure cannot attack, the longest effect of the smoke cloud lasts the duration of the following figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: Agents can form squads with any combination of all other Agents. Agents can move 3 spaces instead of 2 when moving as 7 or 2 figures total.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Nakita Agents, you may move 3 Gorillinators you control up to 7 spaces each.

name: NE-GOK-SA
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose one enemy Army Card adjacent to Ne-gok-sa. Roll the 20 die. If you roll a 90, take control of the chosen figure and that figure takes a turn. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on this card if you retain control of previously Mind Shackled Army Cards.

name: Necrotech Wraithriders
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with the Necrotech Wraithriders, one at a time, each Wraithrider may choose an enemy Small or Medium figure within 3 clear sight spaces whose level is no more than 11 levels above that Wraithrider's level or 6 levels below that Wraithrider's level. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to that Wraithrider. Figures moved by Chain Grab do not take leaving engagement attacks. A figure can only be moved by Chain Grab once each turn.
ability_2_desc: A Necrotech Wraithrider cannot move onto a space more than 2 levels above its level.

name: Vydar Necrotech Reavers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Necrotech Reavers, you may first take a turn with an Eisenekt Hero you control. If that Hero is Unique, you may only activate 1 Necrotech Reaver.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the round, before placing Order Markers, you may replace 1 Necrotech Reaver you control with 1 of your destroyed Common Medium Eisenekt Heroes.

name: Necrotech Wraithriders
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with the Necrotech Wraithriders, one at a time, each Wraithrider may choose an enemy Small or Medium figure within 3 clear sight spaces whose level is no more than 11 levels above that Wraithrider's level or 6 levels below that Wraithrider's level. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to that Wraithrider. Figures moved by Chain Grab do not take leaving engagement attacks. A figure can only be moved by Chain Grab once each turn.
ability_2_desc: A Necrotech Wraithrider cannot move onto a space more than 2 levels above its level.

name: Nerak the Glacian Swog Rider
ability_1_desc: Nerak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: All orc figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Nerak add 1 to their defense dice. Nerak's Orc Defensive Aura does not affect Nerak.
ability_3_desc: Add 1 to Nerak's attack and defense while on a snow space.

name: Nilfheim
ability_1_desc: Special Attack. Range 5. Attack 4. When Nilfheim attacks with his Ice Shard Breath Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Nilfheim's movement, ignore elevations. Nilfheim may move over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nilfheim starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ninjas of the Northern Wind
ability_1_desc: If a Ninja of the Northern Wind makes an attack and it doesn't get a kill, it may immediately be placed 20 added due to disappear. If you roll 1-1 : just defense to 5 the attack and, damage is divided by 2 (before modifiers). The ninjas become can't be damaged. If they move more adjacent to ally enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: Ninjas of the Northern Wind can move through all figures.
ability_3_desc: Ninjas of the Northern Wind may move after an engagement.

name: Revna Nuckelavee
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 2 + Special. Choose 3 spaces in a straight line from this Nuckelavee. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Withering Breath Special Attack. Roll 1 additional attack die for each wound on the attacking Nuckelavee. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice seperately.
ability_2_desc: The first time a Nuckelavee destroys a figure each turn, you may remove a Wound Marker from that Nuckelavee. Subsume Soul cannot be used on destructible objects.

name: Revna Oathbound Legionnaires
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, if you have the Oathbound Phalanx in your Army, then you may place any or all Oathbound Legionnaire figures on your Oathbound Phalanx Army Card instead of placing them normally. Instead of attacking with an Oathbound Legionnaire, if you control the Oathbound Phalanx and it is adjacent to that Legionnaire, you may place that Oathbound Legionnaire onto the Oathbound Phalanx's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Oathbound Legionnaires are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Oathbound Legionnaires may double their Height.

name: Revna Oathbound Phalanx
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Oathbound Phalanx, you may place any Oathbound Legionnaire figures you control from this Army Card onto any empty spaces adjacent to the Oathbound Phalanx. After revealing an Order Marker on the Oathbound Phalanx and after taking a turn with it, you may take a turn with any Oathbound Legionnaires you control.
ability_2_desc: When the Oathbound Phalanx would receive one or more wounds, you may remove an Oathbound Legionnaire figure from this Army Card and destroy it. If you do, ignore all wounds the Oathbound Phalanx would have received.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. You may attack once for each Oathbound Legionnaire figure on this Army Card. When attacking a Small or Medium figure with All As One Special Attack, if you roll a skull on every die the defending figure cannot roll any defense dice and is immediately destroyed.

name: Obsidian Guards
ability_1_desc: Obsidian Guards never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_2_desc: When an Obsidian Guard is on a molten lava space it may add 2 to its range.
ability_3_desc: A Obsidian Guard on a water space rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: Ogre Pulverizer
ability_1_desc: When this Ogre Pulverizer attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with this Ogre Pulverizer, all excess shields rolled by the defending figure count as unblockable hits inflicted by the defending figure on this Ogre Pulverizer.

name: Ogre Warhulk
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Ogre Warhulk, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–10, it may attack normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, instead of attacking normally, it must attack each figure adjacent to it, if possible. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap this Ogre Warhulk, you must subtract 4 from your die roll.

name: Omnicron Repulsors
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each Soulborg figure adjacent to any Omnicron Repulsors you control. If the figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 13 or higher, destroy that figure. If the figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 16 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Omnicron Repulsors are not affected by Circuitry Overload.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, all Soulborg figures you control who follow Jandar add 1 die to their attack if at least one Omnicron Repulsor you control is adjacent to the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: If an Omnicron Repulsor you control successfully defends against an attack by a Soulborg figure, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the attacking figure must immediately end its turn and all order markers must be removed from its Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure).

name: Omnicron Snipers
ability_1_desc: When attacking a target with 3 or fewer figures, skills rolled count for one additional hit

name: Onshu the Welkineye
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. You may attack one additional time with Sonic Blast Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Flying

name: Jandar Ordo Borealis
ability_1_desc: If an Ordo Borealis does not move on its turn, it may add 6 to its Range Value for the rest of that turn.

name: Ornak
ability_1_desc: If Order Marker 3 is placed on Ornak, then instead of taking that turn with Ornak, you may take a turn with up to 2 Unique Heroes you control who follow Utgar. Ornak cannot be one of the 2 Unique Heroes. Any Unique Hero that is taking a turn instead of Ornak must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Ornak prior to its movement.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with any Orc Warrior figures you control adjacent to Ornak, you may roll Utgar Valkyrie dice. Each Utgar symbol rolled counts for an additional skull.

name: Ornak
ability_1_desc: If Order Marker 1 is placed on Ornak, then instead of taking that turn with Ornak, you may take a turn with up to 2 Unique Heroes you control who follow Ulgar. Ornak cannot be one of the 2 Unique Heroes. Any Unique Hero that is taking a turn instead of Ornak must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Ornak prior to its movement.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with any Orc Warrior figures you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Ornak, you may roll Ultar Valkyrie dice. Each Ultar symbol rolled counts for an additional skull.

name: Othkurik the Black Dragon
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to two other figures adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Acid Spray Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: If Othkurik starts his turn unengaged and on at least one shadow or swamp water space, for this turn add 1 to Othkurik's movement and add 3 to his Attack value.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Othkurik's movement, ignore elevations. Othkurik may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Othkurik is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Otonashi
ability_1_desc: If Otonashi starts her turn adjacent to any figure you control who has a tricky personality, she may move 4 additional spaces.
ability_2_desc: Otonashi can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a figure who has a wild personality, you may roll 2 additional dice.

name: Parmenio
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any unique Army Card you can control. For this game the chosen Army Card is disciplined, regardless of what is listed on the card.
ability_2_desc: When an adjacent (joined) Band figure receives one or more wounds, you may discard this card before removing that figure. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore any wounds.

name: Pelloth
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose a Drow figure you control that is within 5 clear sight spaces of Pelloth and roll 3 attack dice. One at a time for each skull rolled, you may inflict 1 wound on any small or medium figure that is within 2 clear sight spaces of the chosen Drow figure. You may inflict more than 1 wound on a single figure using Lolth's Wrath Special Attack. Figures affected by Lolth's Wrath Special Attack cannot roll any defense dice. After attacking with Lolth's Wrath Special Attack, destroy the chosen Drow figure.
ability_2_desc: If Pelloth is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Phantom Knights Utgar
ability_1_desc: A Phantom Knight adds 3 additional defense dice when rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Phantom Knight's movement, ignore elevations. A Phantom Knight may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Phantom Knight is engaged when it starts to fly, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Protectors of Ullar
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Protector of Ullar, roll 1 additional attack die for every wound that has been inflicted on the defending figure this turn by Protectors of Ullar you control.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Protector of Ullar's movement, ignore elevations. A Protector of Ullar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Protector of Ullar starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Quasatch Hunters
ability_1_desc: When a Quasatch Hunter attacks, it may attack up to 2 additional times. A Quasatch Hunter cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Soulborg figure, Quasatch Hunters receive one additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: If a Quasatch Hunter begins its turn adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, it may move 2 additional spaces.

name: Queen Maladrix the Conqueror
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Queen Maladrix the Conqueror and before taking a turn with her, you may first take a turn with one of your Festering Honor Guard.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, after attacking with Queen Maladrix, she may make one additional normal attack.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Queen Maladrix, you may choose a Unique Hero adjacent to Queen Maladrix that does not have a Festering Honor Guard on its Army Card and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, you may place one of your destroyed Festering Honor Guard on that Hero's Army Card.

name: Queen Qhyrion
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with Queen Qhyrion, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, a figure attacked by Queen Qhyrion may roll no more than 1 die for defense.
ability_2_desc: Stealth Flying

name: Raakchott, Steward of Death
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Raakchott, Steward of Death, before taking Raakchott's turn, you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 red Consume Markers. When a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Raakchott is destroyed, place a Consume Marker on this Army Card. You cannot place more than one Consume Marker on this card each turn.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. All figures adjacent to Raakchott are affected by Soul Fury Special Attack. Add 1 to Raakchott's attack dice for each Consume Marker on this Army Card. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Do not place Consume Markers on this Army Card while using Soul Fury Special Attack. After using Soul Fury Special Attack, remove one Consume Marker from this Army Card for each figure you attacked this turn.

name: Raelin the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Other players cannot gain control of, move, or take turns with Raelin the Kyrie Warrior.
ability_2_desc: Raelin may attack any number of times during her turn. She cannot attack any figure more than once per turn.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, after another figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Raelin defends against a normal attack from an enemy figure, if they received 1 or more wounds, you may place Raelin on an unoccupied space adjacent to the attacking figure and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Raelin does not take leaving engagement attacks when moved by Vengeful Swoop.

name: Raelin the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Raelin may attack any or all figures adjacent to her. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: All figures you control within 1 clear sight spaces of Raelin add 1 to their defense dice. Raelin's Extended Defensive Aura does not affect Raelin.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Raelin's movement, ignore elevations. Raelin may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Raelin starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Raelin the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: While opponents' figures are within 4 clear sight spaces of Raelin the Kyrie Warrior, they lower their Defense Value by 1.
ability_2_desc: If Raelin inflicts at least 1 wound with a normal attack or leaving engagement attack, she inflicts 1 additional wound.

name: Ramosaur Rider
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Ramosaur Rider, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Ramosaur Rider at the start of the turn, that Ramosaur Rider rolls 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: After a Ramosaur Rider makes a normal attack, if there was an equal number of shields in the defense roll as skulls in the attack roll, Ramosaur Rider and the defender must each take 1 wound.

name: Ullar Ranoc Vipers
ability_1_desc: When a Ranoc Viper attacks an adjacent figure, the defender reduces its Defense Value by 1 for the attacking Viper's roll. Hypnosis does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Ranoc Vipers increase their Defense Value by 2 when defending against a non-adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: Ranoc Vipers do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.

name: Rechets of Bogdan
ability_1_desc: Rechets of Bogdan do not start the game on the battlefield. They must be summoned onto the battlefield by Iskra Esenweir.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium figure, if a Rechet of Bogdan rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure cannot roll any defense dice and is immediately destroyed.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Rechets of Bogdan's movement, ignore elevations. Rechets of Bogdan may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Rechet of Bogdan starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Red Skull
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Red Skull's card, instead of taking that turn with Red Skull, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero you control within clear sight of Red Skull.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may either: Roll the 20-sided die once for each figure in Red Skull's zone or spaces away. Roll the 20-sided die once for any one figure up to 3 clear gaps away. If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure is destroyed.

name: Red Wyrmling
ability_1_desc: Range 5, Attack 3. Common Squad figures roll 2 fewer defense dice against Fledgling Fires Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Red Wyrmling Army Card, before taking that Red Wyrmling's turn, you may take a turn with one other Wyrmling you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Red Wyrmling's movement, ignore elevations. A Red Wyrmling may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Red Wyrmling is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Retiarius
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a number equal to or greater than any target's medium figure adjacent to Retiarius this turn may roll no more than 1 die for defense.

name: Revenants of Revna
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Revenants of Revna, you may place a Blood Marker on a Warrior, Witch, or Scourge Hero you control who follows Revna. If you do, add 1 to the Attack Value of that Hero and all Revenants of Revna you control until the next time you reveal an Order Marker.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Revenants of Revna, with the you may take a turn with a Warrior, Witch, or Scourge Hero you control who follows Revna.

name: Revna Revnan Acolytes
ability_1_desc: While a Hero you control who follows Revna attacks with a normal attack or defends, if that Hero is adjacent to one or more Revnan Acolytes you control, you may re-roll 1 die.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, before placing Order Markers, you may place one of your destroyed Revnan Acolytes onto an empty space adjacent to a Hero you control who follows Revna.

name: Rhogar Dragonspine
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose 3 spaces in a straight line from Rhogar Dragonspine. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Dragon Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Rhogar Dragonspine, you may choose a wounded friendly Hero figure adjacent to Rhogar Dragonspine and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 wound marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Roadblock
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Roadblock may attack up to 3 times with Machine Gun Special Attack. He cannot attack the same target more than once each turn.

name: Roman Archers
ability_1_desc: Special Attack: Range 6. Attack 6. Three unengaged Roman Archers on the same level may roll their attack dice as one attack. Do not roll their attack dice as individual attacks. All Roman Archers involved in this attack must have a clear line of sight on the target.

name: Roman Legionnaires
ability_1_desc: Before a turn with Roman Legionnaires may not take a turn with any Warlord you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with 3 Roman Legionnaires in defense for the Shield Wall power, a Roman Legionnaire up to a maximum of +8 dice for the Shield Wall power.

name: Runa
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, Runa may use her Helm of Mitonsoul Aura. When using the Helm of Mitonsoul Aura, you must roll the 20-sided die for all figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Runa, one at a time. If you roll a 20, destroy the figure. Runa's Helm of Mitonsoul Aura does not affect Runa.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Runa's movement, ignore elevations. Runa may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Runa starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sacred Band
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Sacred Band, you may first take a turn with any Warlord you control who is with the Sacred Band.
ability_2_desc: Each Army Card you control containing one or more Disciplined soldiers adds 1 to the Sacred Band's defense die.

name: Sahuagin Raider
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Sahuagin Raider, it receives 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_2_desc: While a Sahuagin Raider is on a water space, add 2 to its Defense. If a Sahuagin Raider starts its turn on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. A Sahuagin Raider does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: Samuel Brown
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. If Samuel Brown begins his turn unengaged, instead of moving and attacking normally, he may use his Fire and Rush Special Attack. Choose a figure within 5 spaces of Samuel Brown to attack and roll 3 attack dice. If the defending figure receives one or more wounds from that attack, you may move Samuel Brown up to 5 spaces. If Samuel Brown ends that move engaged, he may attack again by rolling 4 attack dice.

name: Saylind the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: After moving but before attacking, choose any figure you control on the battlefield, then roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-9, nothing happens. If you roll a 9-20, move the chosen figure to any space adjacent to Saylind. If the summoned figure is engaged, the figure does not receive any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Saylind's movement, ignore elevations. Saylind may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as rules. When Saylind starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Scarlett
ability_1_desc: At the start of the round, after rolling Initiative, you may look at all unrevealed Order Markers on 1 enemy Army Card. Then you may move 1 Order Marker from a G.I. JOE or Soldier Army Card you control to another G.I. JOE or Soldier Army Card you control.
ability_2_desc: When Scarlett makes an attack, the target figure lowers its Defense Value by 1 for every revealed Order Marker on its Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, after attacking, you may move Scarlett up to 2 spaces and make 1 normal attack against an adjacent figure.

name: Scavorith, Lord of Ruin
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Scavorith, Lord of Ruin attacks with Double Burst Special Attack, he may attack 1 additional time, targeting the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Scavorith, you may reveal an "X" Order Marker on this Army Card to take 1 additional turn with Scavorith. You cannot use Double Burst Special Attack during this additional turn. If Scavorith does not attack a figure during the additional turn, Scavorith suffers 1 wound.

name: Utgar Scions of Icaria
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose an Archmage, Dragon, King, or Queen Unique Hero you control to be the Liege for all Scions of Icaria you control. Before taking a turn with the Scions of Icaria, you may take a turn with their chosen Liege.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. Only figures within 3 clear sight spaces of the Scions of Icaria's Liege can be targeted with Draconic Breath Special Attack.

name: Sentinels of Jandar
ability_1_desc: When a Sentinel of Jandar occupies the same space as a Sentinel of Jandar, each of them gets a +1 modifier to defense rolls for one attack block.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Sentinel of Jandar's move, ignore elevations. A Sentinel of Jandar may fly over figures and obstacles without stopping engaged, and may end its move figure without stopping.

name: Sgt. Drake Alexander
ability_1_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to Sgt. Drake Alexander to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Sgt. Drake Alexander may use his Grapple Arm. Grapple Arm has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Grapple Arm, ignore elevations. Drake may grapple over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles such as ruins. Drake may not grapple more than 45 levels up or down in a single Grapple Arm move. If Drake is engaged when he starts his Grapple Arm move, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Drake may not use Pistol Fire Special Attack to attack a figure who follows Jandar.

name: Sgt. Drake Alexander
ability_1_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to Sgt. Drake Alexander to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Drake, you may choose one enemy Small or Medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces whose level is no more than 6 levels above or below Drake's level. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 8 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to Drake. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Grapple Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shades of Bleakewoode
ability_1_desc: Before moving, each Shade of Bleakewoode you control may choose an adjacent unique Hero. Roll the 20-sided die once for each Shade. If you roll 19 or 20, destroy the Shade of Bleakewoode figure, then take control of the chosen unique hero and remove any Order Markers on its card. You now control that Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Shades of Bleakewoode's movement, ignore elevations. Shades of Bleakewoode may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Shade of Bleakewoode starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shaolin Monks
ability_1_desc: A Shaolin Monk may attack once per round in addition to a normal attack. This extra attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Any or all of Shaolin Monks may leave Stealth Leap tile and move any or all of Shaolin Monks may leave Stealth Leap tile and move without stopping, past other figures without becoming engaged. If blocked, no dice are rolled such as walls.

name: Sharwin Wildborn
ability_1_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 3. The first target of Arcane Bolt Special Attack must be within a Range of 5. After attacking with Arcane Bolt Special Attack, if the defending figure receives at least 1 wound, you may choose a figure that was adjacent to the defending figure at the beginning of that attack and attack that chosen figure with Arcane Bolt Special Attack. You may continue attacking with Arcane Bolt Special Attack in this manner until you fail to inflict a wound. A figure cannot be attacked more than once in a turn with Arcane Bolt Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Sharwin Wildborn rolls defense dice against a normal attack, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Sharwin Wildborn always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Einar Shiori
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 2 + Special. If Shiori did not move normally, she may attack with Ninjutsu Mastery Special Attack up to three times. Before each attack, you must choose an opponent's figure with 2 clear sight spaces of Shiori and place Shiori on an empty space adjacent to that figure that is not more than 6 spaces higher or lower than Shiori's base. When attacking with Ninjutsu Mastery Special Attack, Shiori rolls 2 attack dice, or 3 attack dice if Shiori has exactly one unrevealed Order Marker on her Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Shiori is attacked with a normal or special attack and receives 1 or more wounds, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may place Shiori on an empty space within 2 spaces of Shiori that is not more than 6 levels above or below Shiori's level. If you do, ignore all wounds just received.
ability_3_desc: Shiori can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Shurrak
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Shurrak and the chosen figure are also affected by Sweeping Sword Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by a normal or special attack from Shurrak, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may Knockback the figure by placing it on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Shurrak. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Knockback never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Knockback can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_3_desc: Shurrak never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Siege
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Siege's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Siege's Army Card to activate Crag of Steel for the duration of the round. While Crag of Steel is active, add 3 to Siege's Defense value and subtract 2 from Siege's Attack and Move values. When Siege attacks while Crag of Steel is active, he may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: Silver Surfer
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Silver Surfer's movement, ignore elevations. Silver Surfer may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Silver Surfer starts to fly, he is engaged as normal until any leaving engagement effect.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal attack, if an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least one wound from the Cosmic Force Blast Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may remove one unrevaled Order Marker at random from that Unique Hero's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Silver Surfer, Silver Surfer may move up to an additional 5 spaces. Silver Surfer cannot use Hyper Speed 5 if he is engaged in Melee Blast Special Attack during that turn.

name: Sir Derrick
ability_1_desc: Sir Derrick rolls one additional die against each figure leaving an engagement with him.
ability_2_desc: When Sir Derrick attacks huge figures, he gains +1 attack.

name: Sir Dupuis
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to Sir Dupuis' attack dice for every Knight you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Sir Dupuis up to a maximum of +3 dice.
ability_2_desc: When Sir Dupuis receives one or more wounds from a leaving engagement attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, ignore any wounds from that leaving engagement attack.
ability_3_desc: If Sir Dupuis has 4 or more wounds on his Army Card, add 1 to his defense dice.

name: Sir Gilbert
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Sir Gilbert, roll 1d2 Jandar Valkyrie dice. You may move up to 4 squad figures you control who follow Jandar up to X spaces. X equals the number of Jandar symbols rolled. Any squad figures moved with Jandar's Dispatch must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Sir Gilbert prior to moving.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Sir Gilbert with a range of 1 add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: Sir Gilbert
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Sir Gilbert, you may roll to Jandar Valkyre deck. Move one adjacent figure (including your own) up to 5 spaces on the battlefield. X equals the number of Jandar symbols rolled. You can play this ability with Jantar's Dispatch to slide eight 8 clear sight squares of Sir Gilbert prior to moving.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to this figure get +1 die to their normal attack.

name: Sir Gilbert
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Sir Gilbert, you may roll 12 Jandar Valkyrie dice. Move up to 4 squad figures you control who follow Jandar up to X spaces. X equals the number of Jandar symbols rolled. Any squad figures moved with Jandar's Dispatch must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Sir Gilbert prior to moving.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Sir Gilbert with a range of 1 add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: Sir Hawthorne
ability_1_desc: Special Attack. Range: 1 hex. Sir Hawthorne may make a Blind Rage attack instead of a normal attack. If Blind Rage connects, roll 2d6 for Blind Rage. If the roll is 2 or higher, the target's figures remove Sir Hawthorne's order markers on this card as normal. If you roll a 1 on this roll, Sir Hawthorne doesn't remove any markers on this card to the opponent.
ability_2_desc: After your order a figure behind Sir Hawthorne by exactly 20 spaces die. If you roll a 1 or stand an opposed figure, Sir Hawthorne becomes vulnerable and teleport and order markers on this card to the opponent.

name: Einar Skordyre Infantry
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Skordyre Infantry, you may take turns with up to 2 Skordyre or Insect Common Heroes you control with different names or 1 Skordyre or Insect Unique Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: After a Skordyre Infantry figure you control is destroyed by a normal attack from an enemy figure, you may move 1 unengaged Common Skordyre or Insect figure you control up to 5 spaces for free, even if all of your Skordyre Soldiers are destroyed.
ability_3_desc: When a Skordyre Infantry attacks a figure engaged with at least 2 other Skordyre or Insect figures you control, add 1 to its Attack Value.

name: Snake Eyes
ability_1_desc: Snake Eyes adds 2 to his Attack Value when attacking an enemy figure that is not adjacent to any other enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: Snake Eyes increases his Defense Value by 2 when defending against a non-adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: Snake Eyes can move through all figures and never takes leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sonlen
ability_1_desc: After moving normally with Sonlen, you may choose a figure with one or more wounds that is adjacent to Sonlen or that he passed over during his movement this turn and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove one Wound Marker from that figure.
ability_2_desc: When Sonlen attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time. If Sonlen used his Flying Special Power this turn, roll 1 additional Combat Die on the first attack.

name: Sonlen
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose a wounded Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Sonlen. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen Hero's Army Card loses one marker from the chosen Hero's Army Card. Sonlen's Dragon Healing on Sonlen.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Sonlen. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.

name: Sonya Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Each time Sonya Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Sonya Esenwein cannot drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for Oyrrien Esenwein's Chilling Touch, you may add 2 to your die roll.
ability_3_desc: If you control Oyrrien Esenwein and he is destroyed, Sonya Esenwein immediately receives 2 wounds.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Sonya Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations. Sonya Esenwein may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming blocked, and stop on top of terrain such as ruins. When Sonya Esenwein starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Spartacus
ability_1_desc: If all Order Markers for a squad are placed on Gladiate Army Cards, and at least one Order Marker is on a Gladiate, all other Gladiators you control (named Spartacus) gain Spartacus. Remove one Gladiators and one to the Order Marker on a Gladiate, add 1 extra attack discard (defense die for the rest of the turn).

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: If Spider-Man is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense die normally. If you roll 11-20, Spider-Man takes no damage and may immediately move using his Swing Line 4 Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Spider-Man may use his Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Spider-Man's Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Spider-Man may move through figures without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Spider-Man may not Swing Line more than 40 levels total distance in a turn. Swing Line is only engaged when he starts Swing Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4, Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Spider-Man's Web Special Attack.

name: Einar Spitting Hive Soldier
ability_1_desc: After a Spitting Hive Soldier attacks a figure or destructible object, that figure or destructible object reduces its Defense Value by 1 until the next time any player reveals an Order Marker.

name: Storm Shadow
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 shadow tiles on this Army Card. At the end of Storm Shadow's turn, you may place a shadow tile from this card onto the battlefield within 3 clear sight spaces of Storm Shadow if the tile fits normally there.
ability_2_desc: Storm Shadow may attack any number of times during his turn. He cannot attack any figure more than once per turn.
ability_3_desc: Storm Shadow can move through all figures and never takes leaving engagement attacks.

name: Su-Bak-Ha
ability_1_desc: Airjaxes you own or are on the same hex as a Marro or another Airjax figure you own may add 1 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Su-Bak-Ha's movement, you may ignore elevation. Su-Bak-Ha may move through other figures without becoming engaged. Su-Bak-Ha may fly. When Su-Bak-Ha ends its move or is engaged he will take any slaying engagement attacks.

name: Sudema
ability_1_desc: When attacking those any figure within 5 squares of Sudema and any figures blocking her line of sight to them, if the chosen figure is a squad, choose 1 figure from that squad to attack. Otherwise, destroy the chosen figure.

name: Sujoah
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 4. If Sujoah inflicts at least 1 wound with Poison Sting Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die for Poison Damage. If you roll 1-9, the defending figure receives no additional wounds for Poison Damage. If you roll 10-19, add 1 additional wound marker to the defending figure's card, and roll again for Poison Damage. If you roll a 20, destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Sujoah's movement, ignore elevations. Sujoah may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sujoah starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Swog Rider
ability_1_desc: Swog Rider is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Friendly Orc Archers within 6 spaces of this figure receive an additional +1 attack and an additional defense die.

name: Ullar Syvarris
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may reduce Syvarris' Range Value to 6 to make up to 2 normal attacks this turn. Or, you may reduce it to 3 to make up to 3 normal attacks this turn.

name: SYVARRIS
ability_1_desc: When Syvarris attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: Taelord the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: All figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Taelord gain +1 attack. Taelord's Attack Aura does not affect Taelord.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Taelord's movement, Taelord may fly over water without stopping, pass over obstacles such as ruins, and fly over obstacles such as 65 points.

name: Tagawa Samurai Archers
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Tagawa Samurai
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.
ability_2_desc: For every opponent's figure a Tagawa Samurai destroys, place a purple Experience Marker on this card. When attacking with Tagawa Samurai, roll one additional attack die for each Experience Marker on this card. A maximum of 2 Experience Markers can be placed on this card.

name: Tandros Kreel
ability_1_desc: If Tandros Kreel is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to Tandros Kreel's attack.
ability_2_desc: When Tandros Kreel attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to Tandros Kreel. If the defending figure receives any wounds from Tandros Kreel's attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Tandros Kreel attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack Tandros Kreel.

name: Tanuki Tricksters
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with a Tanuki Trickster, you may choose an adjacent enemy Small or Medium figure and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, you may move the chosen figure 1 space. Tanuki Tricksters never make leaving engagement attacks against figures moved by Nage-Waza.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card and taking a turn with the Tanuki Tricksters, you may move up to 2 Small or Medium Vorid or Ninja figures you control that did not move this turn up to 3 spaces each.
ability_3_desc: Tanuki Tricksters can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Tarn Viking Warriors
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If the result is higher you may move as Tarn Viking Warriors again.

name: Templar Cavalry
ability_1_desc: A Templar Cavalry Knight receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking an adjacent figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from that Knight at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against adjacent attacking small or medium Squad figures, Templar Cavalry Knights receive 1 additional defense die.
ability_3_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Utgar, Templar Cavalry Knights receive 1 additional attack die.

name: Thanos
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Thanos has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, immediately place Thanos on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Wound Markers on Thanos' card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Thanos' movement and ranged attacks, he may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Thanos starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Axegrinders of Burning Forge
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with The Axegrinders of Burning Forge, you may first take a turn with any Dwarf Hero you control. If you do not take a turn with any Dwarf Hero you control, add 2 to the Axegrinders' move number.
ability_2_desc: An Axegrinder of Burning Forge rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against large or huge figures.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, The Axegrinders of Burning Forge may double their height.

name: The Einar Imperium
ability_1_desc: Once each member of the Einar Imperium attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for the Einar Imperium's movement, the Einar Imperium may fly over spaces (without stopping adjacent) and fly over figures (without stopping adjacent).

name: Theracus
ability_1_desc: Before moving Theracus, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Theracus. After you move Theracus, place the chosen figure adjacent to Theracus.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Theracus's movement, ignore elevations. Theracus may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Theracus starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Thorgrim the Viking Champion
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Thorgrim add 1d6 to their defense.
ability_2_desc: When Thorgrim is destroyed, place this card on any unique Army where it adds 1 to the defense number on that card.

name: Thormun
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on and before taking a turn with Thormun, you may place a gold Command Marker on the Army Card of another Hero you control to immediately take a turn with that Hero. You may not place a Command Marker on the Army Card of a figure with the same Affiliation as a Hero you control that already has a Command Marker. At the end of the round, remove all of your Command Markers.
ability_2_desc: Thormun's Class is also Pirate, Captain, and King.
ability_3_desc: After attacking with Thormun, you may attack an adjacent figure 1 additional time. Thormun's Attack Value is increased by 2 for the second attack.

name: Thyraxis Dragoon
ability_1_desc: Once per round, before taking a turn with the Thyraxis Dragoon, you may choose an enemy figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Thyraxis and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may look at one unrevealed Order Marker on that figure's Army Card. You may then choose any other figure controlled by the same player and move the Order Marker to that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Thyraxis Dragoon, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack again with Thyraxis.

name: Tor-Kul-Na
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, Tor-Kul-Na may choose a small or medium figure that is adjacent on the same level and on a space where Tor-Kul-Na could move. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-7, the figure is safe and Tor-Kul-Na's movement ends. If you roll 8-20, the chosen figure receives one wound. If the wound destroys the figure, move Tor-Kul-Na onto the space that figure occupied, and you may continue Tor-Kul-Na's movement. If the chosen figure is not destroyed, Tor-Kul-Na's movement ends. Tor-Kul-Na must be on a space where he can end his movement each time he uses this power.

name: Torin
ability_1_desc: If Torin is attacking a small or medium figure, add 2 dice to Torin's attack.
ability_2_desc: When Torin, or any friendly small or medium Utgar figure adjacent to Torin, rolls a defend dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits inflicted by Torin on the attacking figure.

name: Tornak
ability_1_desc: Tornak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: All Tornak's Orc Warriors gain an additional attack die and defense die.

name: Wing Commander Tuck Harrigan
ability_1_desc: Tuck Harrigan does not start the game on the battlefield. If Harrigan has not been placed on the battlefield, before revealing a numbered Order Marker, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, place Harrigan on an empty space. You cannot place Harrigan adjacent to other figures. Then you may move any or all of your unrevealed Order Markers to this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Harrigan increases his Defense Value by 1 when defending against a non-adjacent figure.

name: Tul-Bak-Ra
ability_1_desc: Range 3, Attack 3. Tul-Bak-Ra does not need clear line of sight to attack with Mind Blast Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving Tul-Bak-Ra normally, you may choose any empty space that is on the same level and within 10 spaces of Tul-Bak-Ra. Place Tul-Bak-Ra on the chosen space. When Tul-Bak-Ra starts to Teleport, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When Tul-Bak-Ra receives one or more wounds from an opposing figure's Normal or Special Attack but is not destroyed, you may choose one friendly Marro Squad figure for every wound Tul-Bak-Ra just received. Place the chosen figure(s) on any empty space(s) adjacent to Tul-Bak-Ra. If the teleported figure(s) are engaged, they will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ulginesh
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Ulginesh, you may take a turn with up to 2 different Elf Wizards you control. Ulginesh cannot be one of the 2 Elf Wizards. Any Elf Wizard that is taking a turn instead of Ulginesh must be within 6 clear sight spaces of Ulginesh before moving.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Ulginesh's movement, ignore elevations. Ulginesh may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ulginesh starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: VALGUARD
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Valguard, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Valguard at the start of this turn, Valguard receives 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Berserker Charge power on any Army Card.

name: Venoc Vipers
ability_1_desc: Venoc Vipers do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with this figure, you may roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with this figure.

name: Venoc Warlord
ability_1_desc: All scouts you control can move an additional 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll the Frenzy Glyph on any Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Venoc Warlord does not have to stop his movement when entering water.

name: Venom
ability_1_desc: If Venom is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll 1 additional d20. Venom may use either result for defense normally. If you roll a 14-20, Venom takes no damage and instead may immediately move using his Swing Line 4 Special Power.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Venom may use his Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevation. Venom may swing over water without stopping and swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swinging over figures does not affect Venom. If Venom may use Swing Line more than 40 levels up or down in a single Swing Line move, he will take 1 damage. If Venom starts to Swing Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4, Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Web Special Attack.

name: Vorid Glide Strikers
ability_1_desc: World Glide Strikers do not start the game on the battlefield. Before revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, you may place one Glide Striker from this card that has not been destroyed onto an empty space. You cannot place that figure adjacent to other figures. The placed figure cannot move normally this turn.
ability_2_desc: World Glide Strikers increase their Defense Value by 1 when defending against a non-adjacent figure.

name: Vrono the Brambletooth
ability_1_desc: If an enemy Small or Medium figure moves onto a space adjacent to Vrono the Brambletooth where that figure could end its movement, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, the figure ends its movement and lowers its Attack Value by 1 until the end of the current turn. If you roll an 18 or higher, the figure also receives one wound.

name: Warden 816
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 5. The Eviscerace Special Attack cannot be used on small figures.
ability_2_desc: All Guards you control move one additional space.

name: Warforged Soldiers
ability_1_desc: When a Warforged Soldier you control attacks an opponent's small or medium figure, before rolling the attack dice, you may switch the Warforged Soldier with the defending figure. After switching spaces, the Warforged Soldier must continue that attack, if possible, and cannot attack any other figure this turn. Figures moved by Tactical Switch never take any leaving engagement attacks. An opponent's figure may be moved by Tactical Switch only once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, a Warforged Soldier always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Warriors of Ashra
ability_1_desc: When a Warrior of Ashra rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield counts as two shields.

name: Water Elemental
ability_1_desc: Water Tunnel ends its Water Tunnel Elemental ends its movement on water or a water space. If a Water Tunnel is on water, a water space or on an Elemental is on water, White while a Water Master element is on water while a Water Master attack and defense to its is
ability_2_desc: Water Master attack and defense to its is

name: Werewolf Lord Utgar
ability_1_desc:
This Werewolf Lord starts the game with 3 green Lycanthropy markers on its Army Card. If an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least 1 wound from this Werewolf Lord, you may place a Lycanthropy marker on that figure's Army Card. For the duration of the game, that figure loses its Species, Class, and Personality. Instead, it has the following characteristics:
• Species: Hybrid
• Class: Warrior
• Personality: Tormented

Lycanthropy never affects Constructs, Lycanthropes, Soulborgs, and destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Werewolf Lord, before taking this Werewolf Lord's turn, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may first take a turn with any Hybrid Hero in play. If you take a turn with an opponent's Hybrid Hero, you control that hero for the duration of its turn. At the end of its turn, control of the Hybrid Hero returns to its previous owner. All order markers that were on the figure's Army Card will stay on the Army Card.

name: Tempscour
ability_1_desc: Tempscour can see through blocking terrain when tracing line of sight. Tempscour does not block line of sight for other figures.
ability_2_desc: Tempscour gets +1 to Attack and to Defense when the temperature marker is not on the board.
ability_3_desc: Tempscour can move through walls and blocking terrain.
ability_4_desc: The temperature marker is placed at the starting position for either player. When Tempscour moves adjacent to the temperature marker, the marker must move to any adjacent space.

name: White Wyrmling Jandar
ability_1_desc: Range 5, Attack 2. When a White Wyrmling attacks with its Fledgling Ice Shards Special Attack, it may attack 1 additional time. It cannot attack the same figure more than once this turn.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a White Wyrmling Army Card, before taking that White Wyrmling's turn, you may take a turn with one other Wyrmling you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a White Wyrmling's movement, ignore elevations. A White Wyrmling may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a White Wyrmling is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wo-Sa-Ga
ability_1_desc: When attacking a small, medium or large figure, if Wo-Sa-Ga inflicts at least 2 wounds, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: Wo-Sa-Ga does not have to stop her movement when entering new spaces.

name: Wolves of Badru
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Wolves of Badru, you may first take a turn with any Darklord you control
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Wolves of Badru may double their height
ability_3_desc: Range 3, Attack 5. A Wolf of Badru that moved but did not attack normally may use Pounce Special Attack. To pounce, choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of the attacking Wolf. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place an attacking Wolf on the space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, destroy the attacking Wolf.

name: Wyvern Aquilla
ability_1_desc: While this Wyvern is flying, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure that it passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to this Wyvern at the end of its move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Talon Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Talon Grab.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice, if this Wyvern rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure cannot roll any defense dice. Venomous Sting does not affect destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Wyvern's movement, ignore elevations. A Wyvern may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Wyvern is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Xenithrax the Vineweaver
ability_1_desc: Xenithrax starts the game with three Xenithrax Vines Glyphs on this Army Card. Once per round, after moving and before attacking, Xenithrax may choose an empty space within 4 spaces of Xenithrax and place a Xenithrax Vines Glyph from this Army Card onto that space.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 4 - Special. The first target of Erupting Earth Special Attack must be within a range of 5. After attacking with Erupting Earth Special Attack, you may choose a figure that was adjacent to the defending figure at the beginning of that attack and attack that chosen figure with Erupting Earth Special Attack, rolling one fewer attack die. You may continue attacking with Erupting Earth Special Attack in this manner, rolling one fewer die than the previous attack, up to a total of four attacks. A figure cannot be attacked more than once in a turn with Erupting Earth Special Attack.

name: Xenithrax the Vineweaver
ability_1_desc: Xenithrax starts the game with three Xenithrax Vines Glyphs on this Army Card. Once per round, after moving and before attacking, Xenithrax may choose an empty space within 4 spaces of Xenithrax and place a Xenithrax Vines Glyph from this Army Card onto that space.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 4 - Special. The first target of Erupting Earth Special Attack must be within a range of 5. After attacking with Erupting Earth Special Attack, you may choose a figure that was adjacent to the defending figure at the beginning of that attack and attack that chosen figure with Erupting Earth Special Attack, rolling one fewer attack die. You may continue attacking with Erupting Earth Special Attack in this manner, rolling one fewer die than the previous attack, up to a total of four attacks. A figure cannot be attacked more than once in a turn with Erupting Earth Special Attack.

name: Xiamara the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When a Kyrie you control who follows Ullar within 6 clear sight spaces of Xiamara the Kyrie Warrior receives one or more wounds, you may roll the 20-sided die.
