After moving and before attacking, you have remove a Brew marker from Chen Stormstout's Army Card to remove 2 Wound Markers from his Army Card or to remove 1 Wound Marker from an adjacent Unique Hero. Care for a Pint never affects Constructs, Soulborgs, or Undead figures.

name: CRAG
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, Crag may choose a small or medium adjacent figure on a space Crag has enough movement to move onto. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. If the chosen figure is not destroyed, Crag's movement ends. If Crag continues his movement, he must begin by moving onto the space the destroyed figure occupied. Crag must be on a space where he can end movement each time he uses this power.
ability_2_desc: All Elementars you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Crag roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die. Elementar Inspiration does not affect Crag.

name: CH'MANA
ability_1_desc: If Ch'mana is only engaged to one figure, that figure is Constricted if it is small or medium. Constricted figures may not move, and cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph. Ch'mana adds 1 to her attack and defense against Constricted figures.
ability_2_desc: Opponent's figures can never take temporary or permanent control of Ch'mana.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ch'mana's movement, ignore elevations. Ch'mana may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ch'mana starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Santa Claus
ability_1_desc: If Santa Claus, or any friendly figure adjacent to Santa Claus, attacks a figure following Utgar or Valkrill, then you may add two to their attack.
ability_2_desc: At any point during the game, you may choose one figure you control that is adjacent to Santa Claus, and place a present glyph on that figures card. That figure now has +1 Move, +1 Attack, + Defense, and + 1 Life.
ability_3_desc: If Santa Claus attacks, and inflicts at least one wound, then Santa Claus may attack one additional time.

name: CHO'NAMMOTH
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose an Undead squad figure you control that is within 4 clear sight spaces of Cho'nammoth and roll 4 attack dice. One at a time for each skull rolled, you may inflict 1 wound on any small or medium figure that is within 2 clear sight spaces of the chosen Undead figure. You may inflict more than 1 wound on a single figure using Exploding Undead Special Attack. Attack cannot roll any defense dice. After attacking with Exploding Undead Special Attack, destroy the chosen Undead figure.
ability_2_desc: If a non-Soulborg, Construct, or Undead figure adjacent to Cho'nammoth is destroyed, remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card.

name: Clyde Forthstrider
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Clyde Forthstrider's Army Card, before taking his turn, you may take a turn with two other Wayfarers you control.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Wayfarers adjacent to Clyde Forthstrider roll one additional die when attacking or defending.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces that is engaged with any other figure you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.

name: COLOSSOR
ability_1_desc: Attack: 4, Range: 1. This attack affects any 2 small or medium figures that are adjacent to each other and also adjacent to Colossor. Place any figures damaged by Swat Special Attack 1 space in the opposite direction of the attack unless the space is occupied or is a higher level than the affected figure.
ability_2_desc: When attacking Colossor with EMP attacks, subtract 4 attack dice.

name: Commodore Beckburr
ability_1_desc: All Human Pirates you control, except Commodore Beckburr, roll one additional defense die when defending against normal adjacent attacks.
ability_2_desc: Whenever attacking an adjacent figure, Commodore Beckburr rolls 2 additional dice.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Pirates adjacent to Commodore Beckburr roll one additional die when attacking an adjacent figure.

name: Bug Headed Nurses
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Bug Headed Nurses, you can take a turn with any hero you control who follows Valkril.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 1. When attacking with Acid Spit Special Attack, the defending figure subtracts 1 from its defense dice.

name: Windhorn Warrior
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Windhorn Warrior, you may first take a turn with any one of the following you control: 1 Cervitaur Squad, or 2 Cervitaur Common Heroes, or 1 Cervitaur Unique Hero.
ability_2_desc: Once while moving normally, a Windhorn Warrior may choose a small or medium figure that he was not engaged to at the start of this turn. When the Windhorn Warrior leaves engagement with that figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. That Windhorn Warrior cannot attack the chosen figure on this turn.
ability_3_desc: A Windhorn Warrior can move through all small and medium figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with those figures.

name: Colossus
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When Colossus attacks with his Smash and Cleave Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Large and huge figures roll 1 fewer defense die against Colossus.
ability_3_desc: When an opponent's figure moves adjacent to Colossus, roll the 20-sided die. If at least one other figure you control is adjacent to the opponent's figure, add 6 to your roll. If you roll a 17 or higher, the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may be targeted only as they become engaged with Colossus.

name: Gorillinators
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack, Gorillinators always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Creeping Chaos
ability_1_desc: When this Creeping Chaos is targeted for a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the attacking figure may not target this Creeping Chaos and you may choose any figure on the battlefield other than the attacking figure. The attacking figure must attack the chosen figure with its normal attack if possible, even if the attacking figure is engaged with an enemy figure.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Creeping Chaos, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, you may place one of your previously destroyed Creeping Chaos figures on any adjacent empty space and remove all markers other than order markers on that card.

name: Crossbones
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack against an adjacent figure, Crossbones always adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Grenade Launcher Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Green Arrow
ability_1_desc: When Green Arrow attacks a nonadjacent figure with a normal attack, for each skull rolled, the defending figure subtracts 1 from its defense dice.

name: DUND
ability_1_desc: Before or after moving, you may choose a figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Dund. Roll the 20-sided die. - If you roll a 1-8, nothing happens. - If you roll a 9-13, remove 1 Order Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card. - If you roll a 14-17, remove 2 Order Markers from the chosen figure's Army Card. - If you roll an 18-20, remove all Order Markers from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Deathhreavers
ability_1_desc: After a Deathreaver you control rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 Deathhreavers you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Deathhreavers are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Deathhreavers may double their height.

name: Cronak
ability_1_desc: If Order Marker 1 is placed on Cronak, then before taking that turn with Cronak, you may move up to 8 Orc squad figures you control who follow Utgar up to 5 spaces each. Any squad figures moved must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Cronak prior to moving.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's figure targets Cronak with a normal attack, you may switch Cronak with an adjacent small or medium Orc squad figure you control who follows Utgar. After switching spaces, the attacking figure must attack the Orc squad figure if possible. Figures moved by Grut Shield never take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Grok Riders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Grok Riders, you can take a turn with any marro warlord you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure that is adjacent to any Marro Warlord you control, Grok Riders add 2 to their attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Marro Hive cannot rebirth Grok Riders with its Marro Rebirth special power.

name: Cunaxa Mercenaries
ability_1_desc: When drafting Cunaxa Mercenaries, you may change the personality on their card to anything for the duration of the game.
ability_2_desc: At the end of every round, roll the 20-sided die. If you have the same or fewer destroyed figures than your opponent, add 3 to your roll. If you roll a 4 or lower, that opponent now controls the Cunaxa Mercenaries. Give this card (or cards if you have more than one Common Army Card) to that opponent.

name: Hatamoto Taro
ability_1_desc: When defending with any Samurai or Ashigaru figures you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Hatamoto Taro, you may roll Einar Valkyrie dice. Each Einar symbol rolled counts as an additional shield. Heroic Defense Aura does not affect Hatamoto Taro.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for Hatamoto Taro, if Hatamoto Taro is adjacent to at least one figure you control who follows Einar, add one automatic shield to the defense roll.

name: Black Panther
ability_1_desc: While moving, Black Panther may move move through all figures and never takes damage from attacks, powers, or falling.
ability_2_desc: Black Panther may attack any enemy figure in your starting zone or any enemy figure within 2 spaces of any friendly figure who follows Wakanda as if the chosen figure were adjacent to Black Panther and on a same-level space.

name: Exterminata Squad Flamer
ability_1_desc: Range 4 Special. Attack 2 + Special. Choose 4 tiles in a straight line from this Space Marine. All figures in clear sight on those tiles are affected by this Space Marine's Heavy Flamer Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. If you roll at least one skull, add an additional skull to whatever is rolled and then count all skulls twice. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.

name: Clayface
ability_1_desc: You may choose for Clayface to not start the game on the battlefield. When an opponent's figure attacks a small or medium figure you control with a normal attack, if Clayface has not been placed on the battlefield, before the attacking figure rolls attack dice, you may place the figure you control on any empty space in your Start Zone and place Clayface on the space that figure occupied. After placing Clayface, the attacking figure must attack Clayface instead, if possible. Figures moved by Role of a Life Time never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with a Clay Marker on this card. After moving and before attacking, if that Clay Marker is on this card, you may choose one small or medium figure adjacent to Clayface. If the chosen figure is a Squad or Common figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Unique Hero figure, place that Clay Marker on the chosen Hero's Army Card. While that Clay Marker is on that Hero's Army Card, that Hero cannot move or be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph and subtracts 1 from its Attack and Defense values. You must remove that Clay Marker from that Hero's Army Card and place it on this card if Clayface receives 1 or more wounds or is no longer adjacent to that figure.
ability_3_desc: Clayface can move through all figures, is never attacked when leaving an engagement, and does not roll for falling damage. When Clayface is attacked with a normal attack, if the attacking figure did not roll more than 2 skulls, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Superman
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a figure without the Super Strength special power, if Superman rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Superman may take for this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Superman's movement, ignore elevations. Superman may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Superman starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Skeletal Cyclops
ability_1_desc: When moving, a Skeletal Cyclops may move one adjacent enemy figure 1 space.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure that is non-adjacent, count all excess skulls as additional hits.

name: MORIKO
ability_1_desc: Moriko can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 1, 2, or 3. Moriko starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2, or 3 attack dice. Moriko may keep making special attacks with 1, 2, or 3 attack dice until she has rolled all 6 attack dice. She may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_3_desc: If Moriko is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to disappear. If you roll a 1-11, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 12 or higher, Moriko takes no damage and instead may move up to 4 spaces. Moriko can disappear only if she end her disappearing move not adjacent to any enemy figures.

name: Vaelin the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may choose one unique wounded soulborg to transfer up to 3 wound markers to Vaelin's army card. Or you may transfer up to 3 wound markers to any or all Soulborg figures' army card who are adjacent to Vaelin. If that figure receives enough wounds to be destroyed, remove the chosen figure. You may only use this power once per round.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Vaelin's movement, ignore elevations. Vaelin may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Vaelin starts to fly, if he is enganged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ekul Sellsoul
ability_1_desc: Each time Ekul Sellsoul destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Ekul Sellsoul cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. If Ekul Sellsoul attacks a small, medium, or large Unique Hero with Hellfire Blast Special Attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, you may place up to 3 wound markers on this Army Card and inflict 1 additional wound for each wound marker placed on this card.

name: Ekin Soultrader
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker from this Army Card and before moving, place a wound marker on this card. Each time Ekin Soultrader destroys a figure, place a wound marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3 + Special Roll 3 attack dice. If the figure receives at least 1 wound from Soul Channel Special attack and is a small, medium, or large Unique Hero, you may remove up to 3 wound markers from this Army Card and inflict 1 additional wound for each wound marker removed from this card.

name: Majin Buu
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking choose a figure within 6 clear sight spaces. If it is a squad figure roll a 20 sided die. 6 or higher it is destroyed and eaten by you healing you for 1 health. If it is a hero then roll a 20 sided die. 18 or higher it is destroyed and fully heals you.
ability_2_desc: While MB has 2 or less health he gets +2 attack.
ability_3_desc: MB can only be destroyed by an attack if at least 2 skulls go unblocked.

name: Lily
ability_1_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die with Lily, you may double the result of your die roll.
ability_2_desc: After Lily moves, if she is not engaged, she may move again.
ability_3_desc: After Lily rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 figures you control that have the Scramble special power up to 4 spaces each. Figures that scramble never get attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: FILCH
ability_1_desc: After Filch attacks, he may attack one additional time for each Treasure Glyph on his Army Card up to a maximum of two additional times.
ability_2_desc: After Filch destroys a figure, you may place any Treasure Glyphs that were on that figure's Army Card on this card.
ability_3_desc: After Filch rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 figures you control that have the Scramble special power up to 3 spaces each. Figures that scramble never get attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: Spellscale Sorcerer
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures within 2 clear sight spaces of this Spellscale Sorcerer roll 1 additional defense die against special attacks. This Spellscale Sorcerer is not affected by his own Antimagic Aura.

name: Cutthroat Marauders
ability_1_desc: If three or more Cutthroat Marauders attack the same small or medium figure, the opponent can roll only one defense die for each attack.
ability_2_desc: If a Cutthroat Marauder destroys a Unique Hero with an unrevealed order marker on that figure's Army Card, you may immediately take a turn with any Common Pirate Squad you control.

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: Start the game with two Glyphs of Sticky Web on this card. Instead of attacking, you may choose a space within 4 clear sight spaces of Spider-Man and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 9 or higher, remove a Glyph of Sticky Web from this card and place it on the chosen space power side up. The chosen space doesn't have to be empty and may have a figure on it. If another glyph is on that space, it is negated until this Glyph of Sticky Web is removed. If you roll 20 or higher, you may also place on this card a Glyph of Sticky Web previously removed from play.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled and if you roll at least one shield, Spider-Man may immediately move up to 4 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Move 3. Lob 40. Spider-Man is never attacked for leaving an engagement or damaged for falling when moving with his Swing Line. After this move, he may move again.

name: Daedrik the Arbiter
ability_1_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for a Corsair Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, when Daedrik the Arbiter attacks, he may attack up to 4 times. Reduce the number of times Daedrik can attack by 1 for each revealed Order Marker on this Army Card.

name: Baelen the Wanderer
ability_1_desc: If Baelen is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to Baelen's attack.
ability_2_desc: If Baelen destroys an adjacent figure, he may immediately attack a nonadjacent figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Baelen.
ability_3_desc: When an opponent uses a special ability that does not affect Soulborgs on Baelen, they must subtract 3 from their 20-sided die roll.

name: Old Crow
ability_1_desc: If any friendly or enemy figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Old Crow moves 1 or fewer spaces, you must move Old Crow adjacent to that figure if possible. If you do, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Old Crow's movement, ignore elevations. Old Crow may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Old Crow starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dark Moon Ninja
ability_1_desc: Dark Moon Ninja can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Cosmic Cube
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, you must choose a figure (including this figure) within 3 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 10+, that figure receives one wound and if the wounded figure was not this figure, roll a second time. If you roll 10+ again, remove one Wound Marker from this figure's card. If you removed a Wound Marker, you must use Glyph of Cosmic Cube again.

name: Corsair Barbarians
ability_1_desc: Archers Of Umbar do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Corsairs Of Umbar, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with Corsairs Of Umbar.

name: Cyclops
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving Cyclops, move another Unique Mutant Hero you control within 8 clear sight spaces. Instead of attacking with Cyclops, attack with another Unique Mutant Hero you control within 8 clear sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose a triangle 4 spaces long on each side, with Cyclops as one corner. Each figure (other than Cyclops) within clear sight on any of the chosen spaces is affected by Wide Optic Blast. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures.
ability_3_desc: When defending against a non-adjacent normal attack, each excess shield rolled counts as an unblockable hit on the attacking figure.

name: Dagger
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may roll 3 attack dice. One at a time for each skull rolled, you may inflict one wound on any figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Dagger. Figures affected by Light Daggers cannot roll any defense dice and cannot be affected more than once per turn. If Cloak is one of the affected figures, instead of inflicting a wound you must remove one wound marker from his Army Card. Robots and destructible objects are never affected by Light Daggers.
ability_2_desc: When Dagger rolls defense dice against a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.

name: Cyclops
ability_1_desc: When Cyclops attacks a figure that is not adjacent, add 3 dice to his attack. If that figure is adjacent, he may cause knockback.
ability_2_desc: If the X Order Marker is on this Army Card, you may reveal it at the end of the round and take a turn with Cyclops, or with any other Mutant hero you control within 10 clear sight spaces of Cyclops, using this round's initiative order.
ability_3_desc: Range 4+Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure, and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Bank Shot Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Bank Shot Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.

name: Ny-Gi-Ra
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice from an attack from a nonadjacent figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: All Hunters you control add one defense die for each adjacent hunter that follows Utgar, to a maxium of +3 dice for the Hunting Pack Tactics.
ability_3_desc: Ny-Gi-Ra cannot be bonded with non-Utgar units and counts as a hunter.

name: Death Drudge
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving with a Common Orc you control, you may move a Death Drudge you control. A Death Drudge may only be moved by Horde Advance once per turn.
ability_2_desc: Opponent's Small and Medium Common Squad figures cannot leave engagement with a Death Drudge.

name: Darth Vader
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Darth Vader. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of Darth Vader. The chosen figure receives one wound. The thrown figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Darth Vader rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice.

name: Darter Clan Floramancer
ability_1_desc: Range 3 + Special. Attack 3 - Special. The first target of Erupting Thorns Special Attack must be within a Range of 3. After attacking with Erupting Thorns Special Attack, you may choose a figure that was adjacent to the defending figure at the beginning of that attack and attack that chosen figure, rolling one fewer attack die. You may continue in this manner up to a total of three attacks. A figure cannot be attacked more than once a turn with Erupting Thorns Special Attack.

name: Deadpool
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, you may remove up to 3 Wound Markers from this card.
ability_2_desc: All figures within 2 spaces of Deadpool subtract 1 die from their attack and defense values. Merc With a Mouth does not affect Robots or figures with the disciplined personality.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Deadpool may attack with his Ooh, Guns! Special Attack.

name: Damage
ability_1_desc: If Damage would receive one or more wounds from a special attack or special power other than Energy Absorption 3, instead you must ignore all wounds Damage would receive and place 1 Energy marker on this army card for each wound ignored. A maximum of 3 Energy Markers may be placed on this army card, Damage receives one wound for each Energy marker you are unable to place on this card.
ability_2_desc: Add one to Damage's Move, Attack, and Defense numbers for each Energy Marker on this card.
ability_3_desc:
Range 4. Attack. 5
You must remove an Energy Marker from this card to attack with this special attack.
ability_4_desc: At the end of each round, you must place an Energy Marker on this card, if possible. If you cannot, you must remove all Energy Markers from this card and roll 3 attack dice. For each skull rolled, each figure within 3 spaces of Damage receives one wound.

name: Deadlight
ability_1_desc: Deadlight rolls one additional attack die against Robots.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, you must roll the d20. If you roll 17+, choose an opponent to control Deadlight for the remainder of your turn. At the end of that turn, control of Deadlight returns to you.
ability_3_desc: When you roll the d20 for a Treasure Glyph trap with Deadlight, you must subtract 4 from your roll.

name: Deathlok
ability_1_desc: Order Markers on this card can never be viewed or removed by an opponent.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Deathlok may attack with Neon Laser Pistol Special Attack. When attacking with Neon Laser Pistol Special Attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.

name: Dead Mountain Ogres
ability_1_desc: When a Dead Mountain Ogre is standing on a rock space or adjacent to a rock outcrop, add 1 die to his attack and defense, and 2 to his range.
ability_2_desc: At any point while moving, a Dead Mountain Ogre may choose an opponent's small figure that is adjacent. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the figure takes one wound, and if it is not destroyed, you may place the figure on any empty space within two spaces of the Dead Mountain Ogre. After, the Ogre may continue its movement, if possible. He may roll for Dwarf Toss once per figure; and for any number of figures in one turn.

name: Demon Bloodletters
ability_1_desc: If the Bloodletters destroy at least one figure with their normal attacks, you may attack again with any two Bloodletters you control. You may continue attacking with two Bloodletters until they do not destroy a figure.
ability_2_desc: If no Bloodletters attacked this turn, you may move up to two Bloodletters who did not move this turn.

name: DEATHWALKER 9000
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Deathwalker 9000 only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Deathwalker 9000 can be affected by his own Explosion Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Any Soulborg Guards adjacent to Deathwalker 9000 add 2 spaces to their range.

name: Destiny
ability_1_desc: At any point in the game, if Destiny is within 6 clear sight spaces of a figure you control, you may view the order markers on any or all of your opponents' army cards.

name: Deathstalkers
ability_1_desc: SPECIAL ATTACK Range 1. Attack 1, 2, or 3. Each Deathstalker may use Maul Special Attack instead of a normal attack. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2 or 3 attack dice. When rolling attack dice for Maul Special Attack against a small or medium figure, if you roll a skull on every die, the defending figure recieves a wound for every skull, and cannot roll any defense dice.

name: Defenders of Oak
ability_1_desc: Defenders of Oak do not start the game on the battlefield. They must be summoned onto the battlefield by Wise Oak.
ability_2_desc: If any or all Defenders of Oak gets attack by any special attack, 1 shield will block all special attack damage.
ability_3_desc: Any or all large or huge figures can only use special attacks against the Defenders of Oak. Every large or huge figures are taunted to attack the Defender of Oak if they are within 6 clear sight spaces, but the opponent's large or huge figures can only use special attacks.

name: DIRE BEAR
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for this Dire Bear against a small or medium figure. If you roll a skull on every dice, the defending figure receives a wound for every skull, and cannot roll any defense dice.

name: Devil Dinosaur
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Devil Dinosaur may attack with Moon Boy Special Attack if the targeted figure is within 3 spaces of Devil Dinosaur and its base is no more than 6 levels above Devil Dinosaur's height or 6 levels below Devil Dinosaur's base. While engaged, Devil Dinosaur may target and attack a non-adjacent figure with Moon Boy Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Devil Dinosaur always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Dire Lion
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Dire Lion, if the defending figure was not adjacent to this Dire Lion at the start of this turn, this Dire Lion receives 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: This Dire Lion may never leave an engagement.

name: Dexter Morgan
ability_1_desc: If any figures were wounded last turn, instead of taking this turn normally with Dexter Morgan, you may take a turn with any Lawman hero or Lawmen squad you control, or with Dexter Morgan. If a figure was destroyed last turn, Dexter Morgan and Lawmen figures you control will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc:
* Dexter Morgan can move through all figures.
* Dexter Morgan can add 3 to his Attack value when attacking Utgar figures.
* Dexter Morgan can't attack if he is adjacent to more than one figure.

name: Dire Wolverine
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Dire Wolverine, he receives 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, this Dire Wolverine always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Dexter Morgan
ability_1_desc: If any figures were wounded last turn, instead of taking this turn normally with Dexter Morgan, you may take a turn with any Lawman hero or Lawmen squad you control, or with Dexter Morgan. If a figure was destroyed last turn, for the duration of this turn, Dexter Morgan and Lawmen figures you control will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc:
* Dexter Morgan can move through all figures.
* Dexter Morgan can add 3 to his Attack value when attacking Utgar figures.
* Dexter Morgan can't attack if he is adjacent to more than one figure.

name: Dexter Morgan
ability_1_desc: If any figures were wounded last turn, instead of taking this turn normally with Dexter Morgan, you may take a turn with any Lawman hero or Lawmen squad you control. If a figure was destroyed last turn, Dexter Morgan and Lawmen figures you control will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc:
* Dexter Morgan can move through all figures.
* Dexter Morgan can add 3 to his Attack value when attacking Utgar figures.
* Dexter Morgan can't attack if he is adjacent to more than one figure.

name: Dorrond Greatstone
ability_1_desc: All figures you control that follow Aquilla that are within 6 clear sight spaces of Dorrond Greatstone are never attacked when leaving an engagement. Tactical Freedom Aura does not affect Dorrond Greatstone.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Dorrond Greatstone add 1 die to their defense.

name: Drianari Guard
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Drianari Guard, you may first take a turn with any Elf Warden you control.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you may move any Drianari Guard figures up to 4 spaces. Ignore any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Drokkar
ability_1_desc: When Drokkar attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to Drokkar. If the defending figure receives any wounds from Drokkar's attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with any Orc Warrior figures you control adjacent to Ornak, you may roll Utgar Valkyrie dice. Each Utgar symbol rolled counts for an additional skull.

name: Doctor Mid-Nite
ability_1_desc: Before moving, choose an opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Doctor Mid-Nite. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, the chosen figure and each figure adjacent to that figure rolls 2 fewer defense dice this turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Doctor Mid-Nite. Roll the 20-sided die, adding 3 to the roll if the chosen figure is affected by Blackout Bomb. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: Figures on one or more shadow spaces do not roll any additional defense dice from shadow spaces when attacked by Doctor Mid-Nite.

name: Don Ramón
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative, if there are no Common cards in your army, you may move one single-space figure from each other card in your army up to 3 spaces. Figures moved this way must end their movement within 3 clear sight spaces of Don Ramón.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 orange Rejuvenation Markers on this card. Once per round, after Don Ramón attacks an opponent's figure, you may remove up to 3 Rejuvenation Markers from this card to choose the same number of different single-space figures (other than Don Ramón) within 3 clear sight spaces of Don Ramón. Remove 1 wound marker from each chosen figure.

name: Drow Blademasters
ability_1_desc: If a Drow Blademaster begins his turn on a dungeon space, he may add 2 to his move. The Drow Blademaster must end his move adjacent to an opponent's figure and attack that figure in order to use Dungeon Strike.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Drow.

name: Dread Warrior
ability_1_desc: A Dread Warrior does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, if a medium Squad figure is destroyed within 4 clear sight spaces of a Shaman or Sorcerer you control, you may replace that figure with a Dread Warrior in your army. Undead, Soulborg and Construct figures may not be replaced with Dread Rising.
ability_2_desc: Figures engaged with this Dread Warrior may not make normal attacks or leaving engagement attacks on a Shaman or Sorcerer you control.
ability_3_desc: When a figure moves normally out of engagement with this Dread Warrior, count that hex as 1 additional space. When an opponent's figure moves through this Dread Warrior, that figure takes one wound.

name: ZETCHR
ability_1_desc: Range 4+ Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose 4 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight of Zetchr are affected by Burning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice seperately.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure that was engaged to Zetchr during movement, or a figure Zetchr flew over that was not under an overhang. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: Zetchr never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and it do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Dryveer the Defector
ability_1_desc: When Dryveer the Defector is attacking a Marro figure, you may roll 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: If you control Dryveer the Defector, you may not have any Marro who follow Utgar in your army.
ability_3_desc: If Mind Shackle is successfully used on Dryveer the Defector by your opponent, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-5, your opponent proceeds as normal. If you roll 6-20, Dryveer the Defector is immediately destroyed.

name: Doctor Doom
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Doctor Doom, you may choose any Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Doctor Doom. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take temporary control of that hero and immediately take a turn with the chosen Hero. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to the player who controlled the Hero before the Mind Exchange. All Order Markers that were on the chosen Hero's card will stay on the card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Doom's movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Doom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Doctor Doom starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Feyd-Rautha
ability_1_desc: If Feyd-Rautha is engaged with only one figure, he receives an extra attack die and an extra defense die.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, Feyd may declare one non-Harkonnen faction his mortal enemy. For the remainder of the game, Feyd receives an additional attack die against members of that faction.
ability_3_desc: When Feyd attacks an adjacent hero who is wounded, he may attack one additional time.

name: Dwalin
ability_1_desc: If Dwalin is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 1 die to Dwalin's attack. If an adjacent figure is a Dwarf, add 2 dice to Dwalin's attack.

name: CAPTAIN COLD
ability_1_desc: When Captain Cold attacks a figure with his Cold Gun, if the defending figure takes at least 1 wound, place a Cold token on that figure. A figure with a Cold token on it must subtract 2 from its Move number. Remove all Cold tokens from a figure at the end of that figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a space within range. All figures within 1 space of the chosen space are affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each affected figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Bridge Support Pillar
ability_1_desc: Upon destruction of the pillar, the supported section of bridge will collapse. Remove bridge and support from the map. Figures underneath the bridge at time of collapse are destroyed. Figures on top of bridge at time of collapse receive 2 hits and are placed on lowest level equal to their bridge space.

name: Druzos, The Shadow Giant
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3 + Spacial. Select an adjacent figure to attack. If Druzos, The Shadow Giant is standing on a shadow space, then he may attack all other adjacent figures of the selected figure and can add 1 to his attack dices. Figures roll defense dices separately.
ability_2_desc: If Druzos, The Shadow Giant starts his turn unengaged and on a shadow space, add 3 to his attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: For each wound that Druzos, The Shadow Giant have, it will roll one fewer defense dice, up to three less defense dices.

name: DZU-TEH
ability_1_desc: If a Dzu-teh is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, the Dzu-teh may Glacier Traverse instead of moving normally. You may do this with any or all of the Dzu-teh each turn. To Glacier Traverse, move to any unoccupied space adjacent to that Glacier Mountain.
ability_2_desc: If a Dzu-teh is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, Rock Outcrop, Tree, Palm Tree or Brush, opponent's figures must be adjacent to the Dzu-teh to attack it with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Ealdreth
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3 + Special. Ealdreth may target up to 4 separate small or medium opponents. If a figure is destroyed by an Ilderthorn Arrow, add 1 attack die to the subsequent roll.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Frenzy power for any figures who follow Ullar.

name: Elendil, The Tall
ability_1_desc: Elendil rolls one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with him.
ability_2_desc: When Elendil attacks large or huge figures, add 1 attack die.

name: Easy Company Grunts
ability_1_desc: When any Easy Company Grunt you control, or any figure you control that is adjacent to any Easy Company Grunt you control, is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, all Easy Company Grunts you control, and all figures you control that are adjacent to those Easy Company Grunts, no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move all Easy Company Grunts again.

name: Drizzt Do'Urden
ability_1_desc: If, during the 1st round, your 1 and 2 order markers are on Drizzt Do'Urden, throughout the game you may add 5 to your initiative roll during any round that Drizzt Do'Urden has the 1 order marker on his card.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Drizzt Do'Urden, you may attempt to summon Guenhwyvar if she is in your army and she has not yet been on the battlefield. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, place Guenhwyvar on an empty space adjacent to Drizzt Do'Urden. When Guenhwyvar is summoned, you may immediately take a turn with her.
ability_3_desc: Range 1, Attack 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5. Drizzt Do'Urden starts each turn with 5 attack dice. Choose any adjacent figure and attack by rolling 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 attack dice. Drizzt Do'Urden may keep making special attacks against new targets with 1, 2, 3, or 4 attack dice until he has rolled all 5 attack dice. Drizzt Do'Urden may only attack each target once per turn.
ability_4_desc: If Drizzt Do'Urden has 3 wound markers on his card, add 1 to his Defense value. On an attack that would otherwise kill Drizzt, if Guenhwyvar's movement value allows her to move adjacent to Drizzt's attacker, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, Guenhwyvar may immediately attempt to move adjacent to Drizzt's attacker. If she survives the move, Drizzt will only have 3 wounds on his card.

name: Agent Carr
ability_1_desc: If Agent Carr is attacking an adjacent figure, add 3 dice to Agent Carr's attack.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Agent Carr, if he is unengaged, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Agent Carr can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Echelon
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Start the game with a spear marker on this card. Remove the spear marker and place it on a space adjacent to the figure you are attacking to use Thrown Spear. After Echelon has thrown his spear he must retrieve it by moving over the space with the spear marker on it, after moving over this space pick up the spear marker and place it back on Echelon's card. Echelon suffers a -2 attack until he has retrieved his spear.
ability_2_desc: In place of attacking choose one medium or small figure adjacent to Echelon, and roll the 20 sided die, if it lands on 13 or higher remove all turn markers from that figure.
ability_3_desc: If Echelon moves a full 7 spaces in a straight line before attacking, add 2 dice to his attack.

name: Eirdis the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: For any Agents or Soulborgs you control within 4 spaces, you may re-roll all defense dice once per engagement.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for defense against a normal attack, if 1 shield is rolled immediately move Eirdis 4 spaces, ignoring elevation. She will not take any wounds or leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Eirdis's movement, ignore elevations. Eirdis may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Eirdis starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Takara the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Takara may attack any or all figures adjacent to her with her Cyclone Slash Special Attack. Roll each attack separately. Takara can only use her Cyclone Slash Special Attack if she ended her move on a space that was at least 3 spaces away from her at the start of her turn.
ability_2_desc: If Takara does not move this turn, when Takara attacks with a normal attack, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Disciplined Stroke can be used only once for each attack roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Takara's movement, ignore elevations. Takara may fly over water with out stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Takara starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Elrond
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Elrond with two of the following squads that your control: • Imladris Archers or • Imladris Sentinels or • Imladris Warriors
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking choose a wounded hero adjacent to Elrond. Then roll the 20 sided die and remove Wound Marker's from the chosen figure' card: • If you roll 1-5, remove one Marker • If you roll 6-12, remove two Markers • If you roll 13-17, remove three Markers • If you roll 18-20, remove all Markers

name: ERKENBRAND
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Squad figure you control who follows Ullar is destroyed, you may choose a figure that is part of that Squad who is within 8 clear sight spaces of Erkenbrand and move that figure a number of spaces equal to its Move value. The chosen figure must remain within 8 clear sight spaces of Erkenbrand during this move and will receive any leaving engagement attacks. A single figure can only be moved by this power once per turn.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Knights adjacent to Erkenbrand receive an additional Defense die.

name: Elrgoick Oakbane
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. Select a figure to attack and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher you may attack another time.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this Hammer Smash Special Attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures.
ability_3_desc: For every wound on this army card, you may move an additional space, up to three more spaces.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Elrgoick Oakbane may double his height.

name: Evidus Rustgunners
ability_1_desc: Evidus Rustgunners may move through all figures who are engaged with a friendly figure and never take any leaving engagement attacks from figures engaged with a friendly figure. Rustgunners may not be used for other Rustgunners' Combat Prowess.

name: Eradicator
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative but before anyone takes a turn, you may choose an opponent. That opponent must show you their order markers.
ability_2_desc: When Eradicator attacks, he may attack one additional time. If he inflicted one or more wounds with his first attack, he rolls one additional die with his second attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Eradicator's movement, ignore elevations. Eradicator may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Eradicator starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: DEN-XA-GA
ability_1_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for any Wulsinu hunters you control, you may add 1 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: At the beginning of the game, place 1 Plague marker on Den-Xa-Ga's Army Card for each Marrden Hound figure in your Army. When any Unique Hero receives at least 1 wound from the Marro Plague special power, you may place a Plague marker on that figure's Army Card. For the duration of the game, that figure has the Marro Plague special power.
ability_3_desc: When moving up and down terrain, Den-Xa-Ga may double her height.

name: Sacel Baeggor
ability_1_desc: When Sacel attacks an opponent's figure, before rolling the attack dice, you may switch spaces with Sacel and that figure, if possible. After switching spaces, Sacel must continue that attack, if possible. Figures moved with Advanced Tactical Switch never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If Sacel would receive any wounds from a normal attack, he receives half that amount rounded up instead.

name: Emma Frost
ability_1_desc: For the rest of the game, before taking a turn with Emma Frost or Emma Frost (Diamond), you may replace her figure with that of another Emma Frost figure in your army. Move all order markers, wound markers and any other markers from the first card onto the other card and continue your turn using the other card.
ability_2_desc: Range 8. Attack 2. Figures cannot roll defense dice against Psi-Blast Special Attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Figures with the Mental Shielding special power, Robots and destructible objects cannot be attacked with Psi-Blast Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.
ability_4_desc: All figures you control always have clear sight to each other. They cannot attack each other using this power.

name: Eugene Tooms
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Eugene Tooms may squeeze. Squeeze has a move of 10. Eugene Tooms may not move more than 12 levels up when using squeeze. To use squeeze you must be adjacent to a castle or ruin. Immediately place Eugene Tooms on another available space adjacent to or on top of the castle or ruin. If Eugene is engaged when he starts to squeeze he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Each time Eugene Tooms destroys a figure you may remove a wound marker from this army card. Sustenance does not affect destructible objects.

name: Erthon
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Order Marker 1 is placed on Erthon, then Erthon may use Dawn Fang Special Attack that turn. When attacking with Dawn Fang Special Attack, you may roll Ullar Valkyrie dice. If Erthon rolls at least one Ullar symbol, the chosen figure receives one unblockable hit along with any hits received normally.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Order Marker 3 is placed on Erthon, then Erthon may use Dusk Fang Special Attack that turn. Choose a Unique Hero to attack. If Erthon's Dusk Fang Special Attack inflicts a wound, place a Frost Marker on the chosen figure's army card. Any figure with a frost marker on its card may no longer roll for passing swipe's or use any special powers on its army card. The next time that a figure with a frost marker on its card begins to take a turn, remove the frost marker and end the figure's turn immediately.

name: Easterling Soldiers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Easterling Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Easterling Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, an Easterling Spearman adds 1 to its defense dice.

name: Evar Scarcarver
ability_1_desc: When Evar Scarcarver attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Evar Scarcarver's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Evar Scarcarver's Army Card to active Frost Rage for the duration of the round. While Frost Rage is active, add 1 to Evar Scarcarver's Attack, Defense, and Move values for each wound marker on his Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Evar Scarcarver does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving. Evar Scarcarver can use Frost Movement only if he ends his move adjacent to at least one enemy figure.

name: Falconers of Amherst
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Before or after attacking normally, up to one Falconer of Amherst may also attack with Falcon Swoop Special Attack. When using Falcon Swoop Special Attack, that Falconer of Amherst may target and attack non-adjacent figures even while engaged. Figures defending against Falcon Swoop Special Attack never have height advantage.
ability_2_desc: If a Falconer of Amherst is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to that Falconer of Amherst's attack.

name: Experiment 274
ability_1_desc: Experiment 274 never needs line of sight to target a figure for an attack. When Experiment 274 makes a normal attack, neither it nor the defending figure gain any height advantage. The defending figure rolls a number of defense dice equal to the number of Order Markers on its Army Card, unless that figure is a Psychic, Overlord, or Construct.
ability_2_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any special power or glyph.
ability_3_desc: If a figure targets Experiment 274 for a normal or special attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 5 to your roll if the figure is Common. If you roll an 11 or higher, that figure may not attack this turn. Psychics, Overlords, and Constructs are not affected by Contest of Wills.

name: Atreides House Troop
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Atreides House Troops, you may first take a turn with any Atreides Unique Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If any Atreides Unique hero is wounded, add one defense die to Atreides House Troops. The wounded hero must be in the game to receive the Caladan Defense Bonus.

name: Fandral
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Fandral, you may move up to 2 other Asgardian heroes you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure with Fandral, always add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. Opponent's figures attacked by Fandral roll 2 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Fanya Silvershield
ability_1_desc: All friendly Resolute figures adjacent to Fanya Silvershield roll an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a friendly figure is destroyed by a normal or special attack, you may move Fanya Silvershield up to three spaces. Figures moved by Avenger Maneuver will take any leaving engagement attacks. Fanya may be moved by Avenger Maneuver only once per turn.
ability_3_desc: All figures you control, except Fanya Silvershield, move one additional space when moving with the Avenger Maneuver special power.

name: Fedaykin
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Fedaykin, you may first take a turn with any Fremen hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Fedaykin commando begins a turn unengaged, add one attack die.
ability_3_desc: Add one defense die when Fedaykin is on a sand space. Add one to Fedaykin's move when beginning a turn on a sand space.

name: Faramir
ability_1_desc: If all your Order Markers for a round are placed on Army Cards with the resolute personality, and at least one Order Marker is placed on Faramir, then all figures you control with the resolute personality (except Faramir) add one to their Move number and add one die to their defense for the rest of the round.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 1. If Faramir attacks a non-adjacent figure with Captain's Bow Special Attack, always add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Faith Lehane
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Faith Lehane, you must roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 1 if you control another Slayer. If you roll a 1, choose an opponent. That opponent now controls Faith Lehane. Remove any order markers on this Army Card, then give the card to that opponent.
ability_2_desc: Undead and Demon figures roll 2 fewer defense dice against Faith Lehane's normal attack. Faith Lehane may attack any or all figures adjacent to her with her normal attack. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3 + Special. When Faith Lehane attacks a figure that is exactly 2 spaces away with this special attack, roll 2 additional attack dice. After attacking with this special attack, Faith Lehane may attack with this special attack one additional time.

name: FELBRUTE
ability_1_desc: When this Felbrute attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to this Felbrute. If the defending figure receives any wounds from this Felbrute's attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: If this Felbrute does not inflict at least one wound during its turn, then it may not move until the next round.

name: FASFUS
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by Fasfus may not add extra shields or roll extra dice by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph. Destructible Objects are not affected by Runic Blade.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose up to three small or medium figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Fasfus. Roll the 20-sided die for each figure. If you roll a 12 or higher, then every small or medium opponent's figure adjacent to the chosen figure receives a wound. Figures cannot receive more than one wound from Sentience Bolt. Fasfus may attempt to use this power only once per game.

name: Electro-Magnetic Rings
ability_1_desc: Before moving, choose this figure or another figure within 5 clear sight spaces. If you chose another figure, roll the d20. If you chose this figure or rolled 15+, place the chosen figure on an empty space within 2 clear sight spaces of its current space. Figures moved this way will not take passing swipes or falling damage.

name: Feymire Crocodile
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to this Feymire Crocodile. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.
ability_2_desc: While this Feymire Crocodile is on a water space, add 2 to its Defense. If a Feymire Crocodile starts its turn on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. This Feymire Crocodile does not have to stop its movement when enter a water space.

name: FERRON
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack against a common figure, Ferron always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess sheilds count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ferron's movement, ignore elevations. Ferron may fly over water spaces without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ferron starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagements attacks.

name: Fire Archon
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Fire Archon's Army Card, you may first take a turn with any two fire elementals that you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Choose an opponent's small or medium figure to attack with Incinerate Special Attack. If this Fire Archon destroys the selected figures with Incinerate Special attack, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Fire Elemental.
ability_3_desc: This Fire Archon never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and it do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Ironhand
ability_1_desc: Add 2 to your die role when you role for the Berserker Charge power on any army card.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Ironhand you may first take a turn with any squad or hero with the Berserker Charge special.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking normally you may subtract up to three move and add that many points to your attack up to a maximum of 3 extra attack.

name: Fire Ant Swarm
ability_1_desc: If you win initiative, you may immediately place each Fire Ant Swarm you control on any unoccupied land space within 5 spaces of its current location. A Fire Ant Swarm cannot be placed on any space that is higher or lower than 5 levels from its original placement. Fire Ant Swarms moved with Swarm Tunneling will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, choose an adjacent figure. Roll the 20-sided die, adding 1 to the roll for each other Fire Ant Swarm you control adjacent to the chosen figure. If you roll 16 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. Continue rolling for Poison Sting until the chosen figure does not receive a wound. Destructible objects are not affected by Poison Sting.

name: Firebrand
ability_1_desc: Range 2 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose 3 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces are also affected by this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by this special attack. After attacking with this special attack, you may attack with this special attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Firebrand never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and does not have to stop in molten lava spaces.

name: FRODO
ability_1_desc: When Frodo rolls the 20-sided die after using the One Ring, subtract 4 from whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If Frodo is attacking an Uruk, Orc, Goblin, or Troll then you may roll 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Frodo is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Foulwind Pulverizers
ability_1_desc: Adjacent figures roll one less attack die against Foulwind Pulverizers. Stench does not affect Constructs, Soulborgs, Undead, or Troglodytes.
ability_2_desc: If a Foulwind Pulverizer destroys a common figure with a normal attack, he may attack another common figure one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When a Foulwind Pulverizer is on a swamp water space, add 1 to its attack and defense.

name: Flash Jay Garrick
ability_1_desc: Flash can move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Flash is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Flash does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Flash may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Flash attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Flash is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: When Flash rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage. Flash rolls one additional defense die for each revealed order marker on this card, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice for Speed Dodge.

name: General Northgate
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with General Northgate, you take a turn with one of the following that you control: * 1 Warlord who follows Einar or * 1 squad that follows Einar and has a Disciplined personality. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn instead of General Northgate must be within clear sight of General Northgate before moving.

name: Foulwind Shaman
ability_1_desc: Adjacent figures roll one less attack die against this Foulwind Shaman. Stench does not affect Constructs, Soulborgs, Undead, or Troglodytes.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Foulwind Shaman, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 3 to this Foulwind Shaman's Range value for the duration of its turn.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Troglodyte squad members within 5 clear sight spaces of this Troglodyte Shaman receive an additional attack die when attacking a Hero with at least one wound marker on its Army Card.

name: F.R.E.D. (Fragmentation Remote Explosive Device)
ability_1_desc: F.R.E.D. does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, it is placed by the Deploy F.R.E.D. special power.
ability_2_desc: When F.R.E.D. rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage. F.R.E.D. is never subject to leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: If F.R.E.D. is destroyed, you must immediately roll the 20-sided die. • If you roll a 1, nothing happens. • If you roll a 2-15, each adjacent figure receives 1 wound. • If you roll a 16-18, each adjacent figure receives 2 wounds. • If you roll a 19 or higher, each adjacent figure receives 3 wounds.

name: Gax Bolod'Ken
ability_1_desc: When a figure rolls at least one attack die for a leaving engagement attack against Gax Bolod'Ken and fails to inflict a wound, that figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack with Gax Bolod'Ken if you do not roll any skulls, he may attack one additional time.

name: Gandalf On Gwaihir
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Gandalf's movement, ignore elevations. Gandalf may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Gandalf starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Gandalf, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to him. After you move Gandalf, place the chosen figure within 4 clear sight spaces of him. After the figure is placed, roll the 20-sided die for talon damage. If you roll a 10 or higher, the chosen figure receives 2 wounds.

name: Gargoyle of Sehfren
ability_1_desc: If this Gargoyle of Sehfren start his turn unengaged and on at least one shadow space, for this turn add 1 to this Gargoyle of Sehfren's movement and add 3 to his Attack value.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Gargoyle of Sehfren's movement, ignore elevations. Gargoyle of Sehfren may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Gargoyle of Sehfren starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ghoul Hunters
ability_1_desc: If at least another friendly Ghoul figure is adjacent to a Ghoul Hunter, that Ghoul Hunter may roll one additional defense dice.

name: Gil-galad, High King
ability_1_desc: When Gil-galad attacks, he may attack up to two additional times. Gil-galad may not attack the same figure more than once per turn.

name: Ghost
ability_1_desc: When Ghost rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Ghost can move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Ghost is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: GAMMACRON
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 ammo markers on this card. You must remove an ammo marker from this card to use any of Gammacron's special attacks this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose 4 spaces in a straight line from Gammacron. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by this attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Gammacron may use this special attack 2 times in the same turn. You must target a different figure with each attack. When attacking with this attack, you may also choose one figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by this attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_4_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Gammacron may use this attack 4 times in the same turn. You may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.

name: Gerrincha Knights
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, Gerrincha Knights always add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, you may reveal an "X" order marker that is on Gerrincha Knights army card. If you do, you may move one or two unengaged Gerrincha Knights you control up to 4 spaces each. If a Gerrincha Knight's movement ends adjacent to an opponent's figure, inflict one wound to that figure.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking with a Gerrincha Knight, you may choose one friendly engaged human figure within 2 clear sight spaces and attack with them instead.

name: Ghaegon Icespike
ability_1_desc: Ghaegon adds 2 defense when a Dragon, Lizardfolk or Dragonborn figure is within 3 clear sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. If Ghaegon doesn't inflict a wound with this special attack, you may roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may remove one order marker from the defending figure's card.

name: General Kenobi
ability_1_desc: If this unit has not moved or used another special ability this turn, it may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: All soldiers in your control get +1 Move.
ability_3_desc: Unit starts with counters equal to the force rating. Counters are spent for the below abilities. Once counters are spent they are gone for the rest of the game. -Reroll: Reroll one failed dice roll. This includes evasive, attack, and defense. If reroll is taken, all dice must be rerolled. -Movement: A character can spend one force point to move 2 additional hexes. -Flight: May use a force point to fly per the flying rules for one turn. -Heal: Heal an adjacent character 1 life per force point spent.

name: GARTH
ability_1_desc: Before moving Garth, chose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Garth. After you move Garth, place the chosen figure adjacent to Garth.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking normally, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, attack normally. If you roll 13-20, you may attack up to 3 figures adjacent to Garth. Roll attack dices ones for all affected figures.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Garth's movement, ignore elevations. Garth may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Garth starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ghand the Man Eater
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Human figure, Ghand the Man Eater receives one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking normally, Ghand the Man Eater may add 4 to his Range value and attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mimring's movement, ignore elevations. Mimring may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mimring starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Gilden Stormstone
ability_1_desc: Friendly small or medium figures who follow Aquilla are never attacked when leaving an engagement with a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Gilden Stormstone.
ability_2_desc: When any friendly small or medium figures who follow Aquilla roll defense dice while adjacent to Gilden Stormstone, you may roll Aquilla Valkyrie dice. Each Aquilla symbol rolled counts for an additional shield.

name: Glass Golem
ability_1_desc: When this Glass Golem attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: This Glass Golem rolls 1 less defense die for each wound marker on this card to a maximum of 3 less defense dice.
ability_3_desc: If this Glass Golem receives enough wounds to be destroyed, before removing the figure from the battlefield, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, each figure adjacent to this Glass Golem receives one wound.

name: Gollum, Vile Creature
ability_1_desc: All Hobbits you control move 2 additional spaces.
ability_2_desc: When moving up and down levels of terrain, Gollum may double his height.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, choose an opponent. That opponent will now control Gollum for the remainder of your turn.

name: Gothmog, Foul Captain
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Gothmog, you may take a turn with one of the following that you control: 1 Mordor Orc Hero, or 1 Mordor Troll Hero, or 1 Mordor Orc Squad. Any figure that is taking a turn instead of Gothmog must be within clear sight of him before moving.

name: Goth Scourge
ability_1_desc: Goth Scourge rolls 2 additional dice when attacking or defending against a Dragon.
ability_2_desc: All Demons and Icarians you control who follow Valkrill and are within 4 clear sight spaces of Goth Scourge roll 1 additional die when attacking an adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: Goth Scourge is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Goblin Warmachine
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Lob 9. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Grenade Launcher Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. When this Goblin Warmachine attacks with its Grenade Launcher Special Attack, it may attack 1 additional time.
ability_2_desc: This Goblin Warmachine can move through all small and medium figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with those figures.

name: Green Arrow
ability_1_desc: When Green Arrow attacks a non-adjacent figure with a normal attack, any die result that is not a shield counts as a skull.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When Green Arrow attacks with his Trick Shot Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.

name: GOON
ability_1_desc: If all of your Order Markers on Army Cards are on Corsair Army Cards, after all players have revealed all of their numbered Order Markers and finished all turns, you may reveal the "X" Order Marker on a Corsair Army Card you control to take a turn with that Corsair.
ability_2_desc: Opponents' small, medium, and large figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Goon subtract 1 from their attack dice when attacking any other Corsair you control.
ability_3_desc: If Goon is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to Goon's Attack.

name: Green Arrow
ability_1_desc: When Green Arrow attacks a non-adjacent figure with a normal attack, any die result that is not a shield counts as a skull.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When Green Arrow attacks with his Trick Shot Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.

name: Godzilla
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 5. Choose 8 spaces in a straight line from Godzilla. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Godzilla's Atomic Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to and on the same level as Godzilla. If the chosen figure is a small figure or a medium squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a medium hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, destroy the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: After you take a turn with Godzilla roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 19 or higher, you may take another turn with Godzilla.

name: Glinerva the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When you reveal an Order Marker, you may also reveal the X Order Marker on Glinerva to activate Hanwi's Darkness. Until you next reveal an Order Marker, Glinerva and all small, medium, and large figures within 5 spaces of her cannot target or be targeted by non-adjacent figures with a normal or special attack.
ability_2_desc: If Glinerva is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Glinerva. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 17 or higher, ignore any wounds Glinerva just received.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Glinerva's move, ignore elevations. She may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When she starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Grandmaster Shogun
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Grandmaster Shogun you may first take turn with any samurai squad you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent small or medium attacking figure all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. If Grandmaster Shogun inflicts a wound in this way you may immediately move the attacking figure up to 1 space. The attacking figure cannot end his move adjacent to Grandmaster Shogun. This power does not work against other samurai.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Grandmaster Shogun add 1 die to their defense.

name: Gray Slaad Sorcerers
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, all Gray Slaad Sorcerers have a range of 4 this turn. If you roll a 11-15, all Gray Slaad Sorcerers have a range of 6 this turn. If you roll a 16-19, all Gray Slaad Sorcerers have a range of 8 this turn. If you roll a 20, all Gray Slaad Sorcerers have a range of 8 this turn and may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: If a Gray Slaad Sorcerer rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack and does not receive a wound, you may immediately place it on an unoccupied space within 3 clear sight spaces. Figures moved by Chaos Shift do not take disengagement attacks.

name: Green Goblin
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 3. Choose a space to attack. Any figures (including Green Goblin) on or adjacent to the chosen space are affected by Pumpkin Bomb. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures.
ability_2_desc: When Green Goblin is attacked by a non-adjacent figure without Flying, one shield will block all damage.

name: Gorilla Grodd
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any unique figure within 4 spaces of Gorilla Grodd. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 18 or higher, take control of the chosen figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card. If Gorilla Grodd is destroyed, control of all Army Cards gained with his Mind Control returns to the original controller(s). Robots, Psychics, and Overlords are not affected by Mind Control.
