She may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When she starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Agent 13
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any non-adjacent within 5 clear sight spaces of Agent 13. If you roll a 19 or higher, the chosen figure is destroyed. Agent 13 may not use this special power if she moved this turn.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, if she rolls at least one skull, Agent 13 may move up to 3 spaces without taking any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Insect Drone
ability_1_desc: Before moving an Insect Drone, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, you may move and attack with up to 3 Insect Drones you control. If you roll 13-16, you may move and attack with up to 6 Insect Drones you control. If you roll 17-20, you may move and attack with up to 9 Insect Drones you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with an Insect Drone you control, if the defending figure is engaged with at least 2 other Insect Drones you control, it subtracts 2 from its defense.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for an Insect Drone's movement, ignore elevations. An Insect Drone may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When an Insect Drone starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Black Isis
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal ranged attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, Black Isis may choose to add 3 to her move this turn. If she does so, subtract 1 from her attack for the remainder of the turn.
ability_3_desc: Black Isis is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Insectar Queen
ability_1_desc: When Insectar Queen attacks or defends, immediately move up to two Guards you control that are within 12 clear sight spaces. If attacking and either Guard ends its move adjacent to the targeted figure, roll 1 additional attack die for each of your Guards adjacent to the target. If defending and either Guard ends its move adjacent to the attacking figure, you may have the attacking figure switch its attack target to any of your Guards adjacent to it.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Insectar Queen's movement, ignore elevations. Insectar Queen may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Insectar Queen starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: James MacDirk
ability_1_desc: All Human Warriors you control roll one additional defense die when defending against normal adjacent attacks.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, if James MacDirk is engaged with at least 2 opponent's figures, he may attack one additional time.

name: Fortress Door
ability_1_desc: When defending against an attack from an adjacent figure the Fortress Door receives 1 automatic shield. When defending against an attack from a non-adjacent figure the Fortress Door receives 2 automatic shields.

name: Iron Man Hulkbuster
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice for Iron Man, any die result that is not a skull counts as a shield.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3 + Special. Choose a figure to attack. Add 1 to Iron Man's attack dice for each space between Iron Man and the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Iron Man's movement, ignore elevations. Iron Man may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Iron Man starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Jeanne d'Orléans
ability_1_desc: When a friendly figure that is within 4 clear sight spaces of Jeanne d'Orléans is destroyed by an opponent's figure, you may place a Memorial Marker on this card. When attacking with Jeanne, roll one additional attack die for each Memorial Marker on this card. A maximum of 4 Memorial Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: If there are 4 Memorial Markers on this card, all friendly figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Jeanne add 1 to their defense dice and 1 to their attack dice. Jeanne's Rally the Weary Aura does not affect Jeanne.

name: Jamie Madrox
ability_1_desc: You can have no more than 8 Jamie Madrox figures in your army. If Jamie Madrox is attacked by a normal attack from an opponent's figure and is not destroyed, you may immediately place one of your previously destroyed Jamie Madrox figures adjacent to the defending Jamie Madrox.
ability_2_desc: When you reveal an Order Marker on this card, you may move and attack with up to 6 Jamie Madrox figures you control. All the Jamie Madrox figures must end their movement before the first one can attack.

name: Infinity Gauntlet
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to this figure's Defense.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on this figure's card, if all six Infinity Gem glyphs are on this card, you win the game.

name: Irrych Greymire
ability_1_desc: When Irrych Greymire rolls defense dice against an attack from an opponent's figure and is not destroyed, you may choose a figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Irrych Greymire and place him on any unoccupied space adjacent to that figure. Irrych Greymire may not leap more than 7 levels up or down in a single leap.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with a figure you control adjacent to Irrych Greymire, you may destroy that figure and place it on this Army Card. At the end of the round, remove all destroyed figures from this card.
ability_3_desc: If there is a figure you control on this Army Card, when Squad figures with the same species as that figure who are within 3 clear sight spaces of Irrych Greymire roll attack dice for a normal attack, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Blood Fervor can only be used once per attack roll.

name: Iron Specter
ability_1_desc: For every figure Iron Specter destroys, place a Chain Marker on this card. Iron Specter subtracts 1 from his move value and rolls 1 additional die when attacking or defending for each Chain Marker on this card. A maximum of 4 Chain Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any small or medium figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Iron Specter. Roll the 20-sided die. Add 2 to your die roll for each Chain Marker on this Army Card. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound, and, if possible, you may place the chosen figure on any empty space adjacent to Iron Specter. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Chain Strike, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When Iron Specter is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 2 from your die roll for each Chain Marker on this Army Card. If you roll a 8 or higher, immediately place Iron Specter on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Markers on Iron Specter's card.

name: Jehlan
ability_1_desc: Range 2. Attack 3. After attacking normally Jehlan may attack with Combat Tail Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After revealing a numbered Order Marker on a Mutant Hero you may also reveal the "X" Order Marker on this Army Card to activate Hyper Mutation for the duration of the round. While Hyper Mutation is active, when attacking or defending Mutants may roll the Utgar Valkyrie dice. Each Utgar symbol rolled counts for an additional skull when attacking and an additional shield when defending.

name: IXINIPHONTH
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose an opponent's figure to attack. All adjacent same-level figures are also affected by Ice Ray Special Attack. In addition, the target's hex(es) and any adjacent same-level hexes become slippery ice until you take another turn with Ixiniphonth or until he dies.
ability_2_desc: Ixiniphonth and any other figures within 2 spaces of Ixiniphonth are immune to special attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this unit's movement, ignore up to 3 levels of elevation change per hex. This unit may fly over water without stopping.

name: JELDAREN
ability_1_desc: Range 5 Attack 4. Small and Medium figures roll one less die when defending against Plasma Cannon Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Jeldaren may add 2 to his Height, and every two levels moved up or down only count as one space.
ability_3_desc: If Jeldaren has 4 or more wound markers on his Army Card, he cannot use his Plasma Cannon Special Attack. If Jeldaren has 6 or more wound markers on his Army Card, he cannot use his Advanced Scaling Special Power, and subtracts 4 from his Move value.

name: Jack Bauer
ability_1_desc: After attacking a small or medium figure, if you rolled at least 1 skull, you may roll the 20-sided die to try and detain the defending figure. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove that figure from the battlefield and put it on Jack Bauer's Army Card. Jack Bauer may only detain 1 figure at a time. If either Jack Bauer or the detained figure is destroyed, immediately remove the detained figure from this card and place it onto an empty space adjacent to Jack Bauer if possible.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for initiative and you roll an 11 or higher, if Jack Bauer is adjacent to an enemy figure or if Jack Bauer is detaining a figure, you win initiative. Place any figures detained by Jack Bauer on any adjacent empty space if possible.
ability_3_desc: When rolling for defense against a nonadjacent normal attack, choose either an adjacent small or medium figure or a figure detained by Jack Bauer. If you do, 1 shield rolled will block all damage to Jack Bauer and all skulls rolled beyond the first by the attacking figure will inflict unblockable wounds to the chosen figure.

name: Jubilee
ability_1_desc: If Jubilee inflicts one or more wounds on an opponent's figure with a normal attack, you may remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Jubilee is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Jessica Jones
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, before placing order markers, control of Jessica Jones returns to her original controller.
ability_2_desc: When Jessica Jones attacks a figure with no unrevealed order markers on its army card, she rolls one additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Jessica Jones' movement, ignore elevations. Jessica Jones may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Jessica Jones is engaged when she starts to fly, she will take any leaving engagement attacks. You may only use this power once during a round.

name: Jim Whitecloud
ability_1_desc: While there is another Lawman or Outlaw figure on the battlefield, Jim Whitecloud gains the class of Lawman in addition to what is listed on the card.
ability_2_desc: If Jim Whitecloud is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to Jim Whitecloud's Attack.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking with Jim Whitecloud, you may choose a small or medium figure within 3 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 6 levels above Jim's height or 6 levels below Jim's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to Jim. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Lasso 11, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Johnny Quick
ability_1_desc: Johnny Quick can move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Johnny is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Johnny does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Johnny may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Johnny Quick attacks he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Johnny Quick is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: When Johnny Quick rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage. Johnny rolls one additional defense die for each revealed order marker on this card, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice for Speed Dodge.

name: KALNAK
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. When Kalnak attacks with his Quick Release Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Kalnak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Jondrot
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose 6 spaces in a straight line from Jondrot. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Jondrot's Hyper Sonic Blast Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dices once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dices separately.
ability_2_desc: Any friendly figure adjacent to Jondrot, will receive one additional defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Jondrot's movement, ignore elevations. Jondrot may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Jondrot starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Fastclaw
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to this Fastclaw and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, add one automatic wound to the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with this Fastclaw, it recieves 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_3_desc: This Fastclaw is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Spiketail
ability_1_desc: Range 2. Attack 3. All figures within two clear sight spaces of this Spiketail are affected by the Tailwhip Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against any attack, this Spiketail always adds two automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: LONGNECK
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Any figure adjacent to this Longneck (except figures with the Nurtured power) is affected by the Stomp Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack or defense dice, add the height of this Longneck to its base height when determining height advantage, including extreme height.

name: Kalnak
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. If Kalnak is not engaged with an opponent's figure, he may attack with Rapid Release Special Attack. When Kalnak attacks with his Rapid Release Special Attack, he may attack two additional times.
ability_2_desc: Kalnak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Kalliroth
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Kalliroth, you may move a guard hero that you control up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20 sided-die. If you roll 12 or higher, any small or medium figure attacked by Kalliroth this turn may roll no more than 1 defense die.
ability_3_desc: When Kalliroth attacks, she may attack one additional time.

name: Ichorgoloth
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Ichorgoloth inflicts at least one wound with his Dragon Drool Special Attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound. For each skull rolled, the defending figure receives 1 additional wound. When Ichorgoloth attacks with his Dragon Drool Special Attack, he may attack 1 addition time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Ichorgoloth always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ichorgoloth's movement, ignore elevations. Ichorgoloth may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ichorgoloth starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: JUBOKKO
ability_1_desc: This Jubokko does not start the game on the battlefield. At the end of any round, if at least ten figures have been destroyed this game and this Jubokko has not been placed on the battlefield, you may, if possible, replace any single-spaced Evergreen Tree or Jungle Brush on the battlefield with this Jubokko. Whenever a special power on an Army Card refers to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, it refers to this Jubokko as well.
ability_2_desc: This Jubokko may not be targeted for non-adjacent attacks by opponents' figures who don't have the Perceptive personality unless at least one figure that player controls is within 2 clear sight spaces of it. Immediately before revealing an Order Marker on and taking a turn with any other Army Card you control, you may immediately attack with any one Jubokko you control.
ability_3_desc: Each time this Jubokko destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. This Jubokko cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_4_desc: Whenever this Jubokko is destroyed, you must place a Glyph of Jubokko Branch on the space it previously occupied.

name: Jaimie Lannister
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Jaimie Lannister, roll 12 Jandar Valkyrie dice. You may move up to 4 squad figures you control who follow Jandar up to X spaces. X equals the number of Jandar symbols rolled. Any squad figures moved with Jandar's Dispatch must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Jaimie Lannister prior to moving.

name: Karina Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Each time Karina Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Karina Esenwein can't life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 1 + Special For each Undead figure within 2 clear spaces of Karina Esenwein, add one attack dice, up to 5 dices.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Karina Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations. Karina Esenwein may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Karina Esenwein starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: KAXXAR
ability_1_desc: When Kaxxar attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: After attacking if Kaxxar inflicts at least one wound, you may take a turn with a Drow Rogue that you control.

name: CERA
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to two large or huge Predator or Beast Unique Heroes you control to be the Nurturers for all units you control with the Nurtured power. This Cera rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when at least one of the chosen Nurturers is within 3 clear sight spaces. When revelaing an order marker on this Cera, you may first move a Nurturer 4 spaces. Instead of attacking with this Cera, you may attack with an adjacent Nuturer.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by a normal or special attack from this Cera, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 10 or higher, you may Ram the figure. The player who controls the Rammed figure must place that figure, if possible, on an empty space within 2 spaces of its current location, within clear sight of this Cera but not adjacent to it. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A Rammed figure never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Ramming can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Khut, the Skeletal Viking Champion
ability_1_desc: When Khut, the skeletal viking champion is destroyed, you may place this figure on any unique hero Army Card that the enemy controls. The chosen figure will roll 1 less defense dice.

name: Yellow Lantern Corp Soldier
ability_1_desc: The Parallax entity is a space parasite that is the embodiment of fear that was imprisoned within the Central Power Battery on Oa. After a long time, the entity became known as the yellow impurity, the cause for the Green Lantern's weakness to the color yellow. After Sinestro went rogue, he was banished by the Guardians of the Universe to Qward in the Anti-Matter Universe. When he returned, he wielded a power ring which used yellow energy. After various encounters with Earth's Green Lantern Hal Jordan, he was imprisoned within the Central Power Battery. There he was able to use his ring, which uses fear, as opposed to willpower, as a power source, to awaken Parallax from hibernation. From here, Parallax and Sinestro were able influence the fall of Hal Jordan and instigate the fall of the Green Lantern Corps, leaving one last Green Lantern: Kyle Rayner.
ability_2_desc: With the Green Lantern Corps restarted with the return of Hal Jordan, Sinestro has founded the Sinestro Corps and has been actively recruiting members, offering yellow power rings and a role in the Corps to those who can "instill great fear". Members of the Corps are immediately taken to Qward to "...be subjected to psychological and physical reconditioning". The Sinestro Corps works in sectors, much like the Green Lantern Corps. Qward now has a huge yellow "Central Battery" on it, like the one used on Oa. Arkillo, a large and muscular vicious alien is enslaving all the Weaponers of Qward and forcing them to continuously build new yellow rings, programmed to breach the barrier between anti-matter and matter universe and find and recruit new ring-wielders. Arkillo also serves as the Sinestro Corps' drill sergeant, similar to Kilowog's role in the Geen Lantern Corps. Enkafos serves as a strategist and advisor. Known members, other than the Corps' namesake and Arkillo, include Karu-Sil, raised by animals; Despotellis, a sentient virus capable of attacking Lanterns from the inside; Bedovian, the sniper of the Corps, capable of taking out a target from three sectors away while living off of the fungus growing on his "hermit crab" like shell. Recently, the Sinestro Corps attempted to recruit Batman, known even to some alien races for his great formidability and ability of instilling great fear in others. However, Batman's willpower combined with his previous brief exposure to a power ring allowed him to reject the yellow ring before it took him to be properly trained and molded into one of Sinestro's warriors. The yellow ring then sought a replacement and selected Amon Sur, the disgruntled son of Abin Sur, who was on Earth and attempting to steal Hal Jordan's ring.

name: K'CIN
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. After attacking normally, K'Cin may attack with his Scorpion Bow Special Attack. When attacking a figure that is not adjacent with Scorpion Bow Special Attack, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: K'Cin can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Kheris
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Kheris has been destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die if an Army Card for figures you control has the Collect Samples special power and at least one figure on that Army Card. If you roll a 17 or higher, immediately place Kheris on a space adjacent to a squad figure you control with the Collect Samples special power, remove one figure from an Army Card with the Collect Samples special power, and remove all Wound Markers on Kheris's card.

name: Katara
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may choose an adjacent Unique Hero. Remove one wound marker from that Unique Hero's card and roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 11 or higher you may remove an additional wound. On a roll of 19 or higher, you may remove all wounds from that figure's card.
ability_2_desc: While Katara is on a water, snow, or ice space, add 1 to her Attack and Defense. Katara does not need to stop her movement when entering a water space.
ability_3_desc: When Katara is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Katara can take from this attack is one.

name: Killian Vane III
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to the figure targeted by Blunderbuss Special Attack are also affected by Blunderbuss Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Killian Vane III cannot be affected by his own Blunderbuss Special Attack.

name: KHOPHAWET
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures with a Relentless personality within 4 clear sight spaces of Khophawet receive 1 additional attack die when attacking adjacent figures. Khophawet's Relentless Assault Aura does not affect Khophawet.
ability_2_desc: When you roll for the Unleashed Fury power on any Army Card, if you roll a 2-11, you may immediately take a turn with Khophawet.

name: Kanaspi Wendigo
ability_1_desc: Before moving this Kanaspi Wendigo, if it begins its move on a snow or ice space or adjacent to an evergreen tree, it may move up to 3 additional spaces. If this Kanaspi Wendigo ends this move adjacent to an opponent's figure, add 1 automatic skull to its attack this turn. This Kanaspi Wendigo counts heavy snow and slippery ice spaces as one space when moving.
ability_2_desc: At the end of any round, if this Kanaspi Wendigo has not destroyed a figure that is not a Soulborg or Destructible Object, roll one unblockable attack die against it and it may immediately move up to three spaces. Once per round, after taking a turn with this Kanaspi Wendigo, if it destroyed an adjacent opponent's figure, it may take one additional turn.
ability_3_desc: After destroying an adjacent figure that is not a Soulborg or Destructible Object, you may place one red Glutton Marker on this card, to a maximum of 3. For each Gluttony Marker on this card, add one to this Kanaspi Wendigo's Move, Attack, Defence and Height. In addition, if there are one or two Gluttony markers on this card, this Wendigo is Large; if there are three Gluttony Markers on this card, this Wendigo is Huge.

name: Khepri Beetle
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Khepri Beetle's card and after moving a Khepri Beetle, rather than attacking, you may attack with one undead queen you control who follows Vydar.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with a Khepri Beetle, you may reveal an "X" order marker that is on the Khepri Beetle's card to place one of your own previously destroyed Khepri Beetles adjacent to any Khepri Beetle that you control.
ability_3_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to a Kherpi Beetle may not move. Figures affected by Mandibles cannot be moved by any special power or glyph.

name: KEE-MO-SHI
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any unique figure adjacent to Kee-Mo-Shi. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or 20, take control of the chosen figure and that figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card. If Kee-Mo-Shi is destroyed, you retain control of any previously Mind Shackled Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Kee-Mo-Shi. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Soulborgs are not affected by Toxic Skin.

name: Kid Flash
ability_1_desc: Kid Flash may pass through all figures and through obstacles such as ruins. Kid Flash is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Kid Flash does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels, Kid Flash may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Kid Flash attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Kid Flash is on a space where he could end his movement.

name: Knights of Dol Amroth
ability_1_desc: Knights of Dol Amroth receive an additional die when attacking or defending against a figure whose Point Value is lower than theirs.
ability_2_desc: Knights of Dol Amroth cannot be moved by any special power on an opponent's Army Card.

name: Krendal
ability_1_desc: When Krendal attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: While moving, Krendal may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.

name: Kola Kongi
ability_1_desc: Before moving Kola Kongi, you may add 3 to his Move number this turn. If you do, subtract 2 from his Attack number this turn.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, you may add 4 to Kola Kongi's Range number and subtract 2 from his Attack number for the duration of this turn. When using Autocannons, if Kola Kongi did not move this turn he may attack one additional time.

name: King of the Dead
ability_1_desc: You cannot take a turn with the King of the Dead unless all figures you control follow Xenothea, or if you control Aragorn while he has the Andúril Treasure Glyph.
ability_2_desc: All opponent's Squad figures within 6 clear sight spaces of The King of the Dead subtract 1 from their Defense value and are always attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: The King of the Dead can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: The Katana of Thorian
ability_1_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to this figure to attack it with a normal attack.

name: Kheris Fehn
ability_1_desc: If Kheris Fehn receives one or more wounds from an attack or a special power, roll the 20-sided die. If the attacking figure is a Dragon, or if the power is from a Dragon Army Card, add 3 to your die roll. If you roll 17 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_2_desc: If Kheris Fehn defends against a normal attack from an adjacent figure and receives no wounds, you may roll as many attack dice as the number of skulls rolled by the attacking figure. Each skull rolled in this way counts for an unblockable hit on the attacking figure. Kheris Fehn may use Deflection after using Nhah Scirh Shield 17.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Choose a non-adjacent figure whose base is not higher or lower than 6 levels from the base of Kheris Fehn to attack. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place Kheris Fehn on any space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, place Kheris Fehn on any space adjacent to the chosen figure. If Kheris Fehn cannot be placed after using this special attack, destroy him.

name: Knossian Brute
ability_1_desc: When Knossian Brute attacks but does not destroy a small, medium, or large figure, you may Horn Toss the figure by placing it on any empty space adjacent to Knossian Brute. The space must be on the same level as or lower than Knossian Brute. A figure moved by Horn Toss never takes any disengagement attacks. Non-flying figures suffer any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Hunters with a Ferocious personality which are adjacent to any Knossian Brute receive an additional attack die.

name: Krendal
ability_1_desc: When Krendal attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: While moving, Krendal may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.
ability_3_title: Can Turn Head Around All The Way Because It's An Owlbear And The First Part Of Owlbear Is Owl
ability_3_desc: When determining line of sight, Krendal does not need to turn around.

name: Klast Vilrath
ability_1_desc: Whenever Klast Vilrath inflicts a wound on an opponent's figure with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. Add 2 to your roll if the affected figure is a Dragon. If you roll an 18 or higher, destroy that figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 4 Attack 4. If Klast Vilrath inflicts a wound with Shadow Orb Special Attack, you may choose a same-level space within 6 spaces of Klast. Place Klast on the chosen space. Klast will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Shadow Orb Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Klast Vilrath can move through all figures.

name: Kyntela Gwyn
ability_1_desc: All friendly Elves adjacent to this unit add 1 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When Kyntela Gwyn rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Kredo The Rigid
ability_1_desc: All figures you control may move one additional space as long as they end their movement adjacent to Kredo The Rigid
ability_2_desc: All figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Kredo The Rigid can only move or attack if they revealed an Order Marker on their Army Card this turn
ability_3_desc: Order Markers can never be removed from this Army Card by any special powers on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: King Bumi
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a figure within five clear sight spaces of King Bumi, instead of taking a turn with the figure or figures on that card, you may take a turn with King Bumi.
ability_2_desc: Once per game, before an opponent reveals an Order Marker you may reveal an X OM on this card and take an immediate turn with King Bumi. During this turn, King Bumi may attack any and all figures adjacent to him and adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: If King Bumi is on a land space add 1 to his Attack and Defense values. If King Bumi inflicts one or more wounds on a non-Flying figure on a land space, you may move that figure up to two spaces as long as it remains on a land space.
ability_4_desc: When King Bumi is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds King Bumi can take from this attack is one.

name: Lady Morwen
ability_1_desc: All figures you control that start their turn within 4 clear sight spaces of Lady Morwen may move 1 additional space. Lady Morwen's Speed Aura does not affect Lady Morwen.
ability_2_desc: When Lady Morwen rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 to her defense dice.

name: Kommandant Acht Beine
ability_1_desc: Kommandant Acht Beine starts the game with 3 white Web markers on this Army Card. After moving and before attacking, you may place a Web marker on a same level space adjacent to Kommandant Acht Beine. Whenever a non-Arachnid small or medium figure moves onto a space with a Web marker on it or onto a space adjacent to a space with a Web marker on it, they must end their movement there. Non-Arachnid figures cannot move through figures affected by a Web Trap. Figures standing on a space with a Web marker on it may roll the 20-sided die instead of attacking. If they roll a 9 or higher, they may remove that Web marker from the battlefield. When attacking a figure affected by Web Trap, all Arachnids you control roll one additional attack die.

name: Kusmok
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If Kusmok does not roll at least one skull for his Lightning Blast Special Attack, then he receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When you roll attack dice for any Ogre that you control and is within 5 clear sight spaces of Kusmok, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Bellow can be used only once for each attack roll. Kusmok's Bellow does not affect Kusmok.

name: Kraal Drone
ability_1_desc: Before moving a Kraal Drone, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-5, you may take a turn with up to 1 Kraal Drone you control. If you roll 6-11, you may take a turn with up to 3 Kraal Drones you control. If you roll 12-15, you may take a turn with up to 6 Kraal Drones you control. If you roll 16-19, you may take a turn with up to 9 Kraal Drones you control. If you roll a 20, you may take a turn with all Kraal Drones you control.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for the Kraal Drone's movement, ignore elevations. The Kraal Drone may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Kraal Drone starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Landarian Sky Guard
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Sky Guard, you may first take a turn with any Landarian Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: When a member of the Sky Guard attacks a figure that's base is 6 or more levels higher than theirs, add 2 dice to the attack.

name: Hawthorne Lancers
ability_1_title: Human Knight and Human Lord Bonding
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Hawthorne Lancers, you may first take a turn with any Human Knight or Human Lord you control.
ability_2_desc: A Hawthorne Lancer receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from that Hawthorne Lancer at the start of his turn.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Hawthorne Lancers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, Hawthorne Lancers cannot move or attack this turn.

name: Elentar the Cloud Champion
ability_1_desc: When Elentar starts to fly he may take with him one small or medium adjacent figure. That figure may be placed adjacent to Elentar at the end of his movement, or dropped onto any space Elentar moves over. Dropped figures must roll for falling damage as if they were dropped from a height of 7.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Landarians adjacent to Elentar roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Elentar's movement, ignore elevations. Elentar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins.

name: Lacex, The Great Blue Spider
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, place 5 black markers on this Army Card. Before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher place a black marker on that figure army card. Figures with the black marker will defend with one less dice.
ability_2_desc: When adjacent to an evergreen piece or a jungle piece, add 1 more dice to Lacex, The Great Blue Spider defense dices.

name: Lion Guards
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Lion Guards, you may first take a turn with a medium resolute Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, a Lion Guard adds 1 to his defense dice.

name: LENSONAR
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 1, 2, or 3. Lensonar starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2, or 3 attack dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. He may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: If Lensonar is engaged with a single opponent's figure, when Lensonar rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Link
ability_1_desc: On Link's turn, after moving, and before attacking, Link may roll the 20-Sided die. If Link rolls a 12 or higher, add 1 die to Link's attack that turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. If Link's Light Arrow Special Attack inflicts a wound, he may attack again with Light Arrow Special Attack. Link may continue to attack with Light Arrow Special Attack until he does not inflict a wound.

name: Laureena
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Laureena rolls 2 additional defense dice. When selected as targets for a special power that involves the 20-sided die Laureena may choose to reduce the number rolled on the 20-sided die by 2.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking with Laureena, you may choose a wounded friendly Hero figure adjacent to Laureena and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 Wound Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Lion Bannermen
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Finn with a range of 1 add 1 die to their normal attack.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with the Lion Bannermen, roll 12 Jandar Valkyrie dice. You may move up to 4 other Squad figures you control who follow Jandar up to X spaces. X equals the number of Jandar symbols rolled. Any Squad figures moved with Jandar's Dispatch must be within 8 clear sight spaces of the Lion Bannermen prior to moving.

name: Lórien Elf Guards
ability_1_desc: Any or all Lórien Elf Guards may add 3 to their move number as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. A Lórien Elf Guard must end its move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Leorio
ability_1_desc: Once per round, instead of attacking and after moving, choose any opponent within 6 clear sight spaces. Leorio's arm teleports and punches the opponent for 1 unblockable attack die. If a skull is rolled, that figure takes 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Leorio, you may choose 1 friendly adjacent figure. Roll the 20-sided die: 1–7: No effect 8–15: Remove 1 wound 16–20: Remove 2 wounds
ability_3_desc: All friendly H x H figures within 3 spaces of Leorio add +1 to defense dice while he is alive on the battlefield.

name: Lurtz, Uruk Captain
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Lurtz, you may place a wound marker on Lurtz and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once per round.

name: Leopold Van Nessing
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Leopold Van Nessing, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, you must either end his turn immediately, or place 1 wound marker on this card at the end of his turn. During that turn, add 1 to his Move and Attack.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure, Leopold Van Nessing rolls 2 additional attack dice. If that figure is a Demon, Horror, or Undead, it rolls 2 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When the 20-sided die is rolled for a special power on an opponent's Undead or Demon Army Card and at least one of the figures from that Army Card is within 3 clear sight spaces of Leopold Van Nessing, subtract 3 from the die roll.

name: Lord Revadac
ability_1_desc: When Lord Revadac receives one or more wounds from an adjacent figure's normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the attacking figure receives one wound. Curse of Pestilence does not affect Undead, Construct, or Soulborg figures.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Lord Revadac, you may choose an Undead Squad figure you control adjacent to Lord Revadac. Destroy the chosen figure and remove one wound marker from this card.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Undead figures adjacent to Lord Revadac roll an additional attack die when making a normal attack.

name: Longshot
ability_1_desc: When Longshot attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When you roll dice for Longshot or any friendly figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Longshot, you may re-roll all dice one time once for this turn.
ability_3_desc: Begin the game with this side of this army card facing up. When rolling attack or defense dice with Longshot, if you rolled no skulls for an attack or no shields when defending, flip this Army Card over and use that side. Do not reroll dice. Any Order Markers or Wound Markers on this Army Card are switched over to the new side.

name: Leopold Fitz
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Leopold Fitz, you may take a turn with Jemma Simmons, if you control her. If Simmons would receive any wounds from a normal attack and Fitz is adjacent to her, you may place all those wounds on this card instead.
ability_2_desc: If Fitz would inflict any wounds with a normal attack on an opponent's figure, you must instead lay that figure on its side. That figure may not move, attack, or make leaving engagement attacks. A figure is no longer affected by Night-Night Gun when an X Order Marker is revealed on its Army Card.
ability_3_desc: At the beginning of the round, before rolling for initiative, you may place a combat die on the Army Card of an adjacent Human, Cyborg, or Soulborg hero you control. If the die shows a skull, add 1 to its Attack. If it shows a shield, add 1 to its Defense. If it shows a blank, add 1 to its Move. Remove the die at the end of the round.

name: Lizard
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Lizard, remove one Wound Marker from Lizard's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any small or medium figure adjacent to Lizard. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Lizard may Leap. Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Lizard's Leap movement, ignore elevations. Lizard may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Lizard may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single Leap. If Lizard is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: M.O.D.O.K.
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to M.O.D.O.K.'s Defense for each unrevealed Order Marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, do the following once for each revealed Order Marker on this card. Choose an enemy figure within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 13+, the chosen figure receives one wound.

name: Macetail Behemoth
ability_1_desc: When attacking small or medium figures, this Macetail Behemoth rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, this Macetail Behemoth always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Loviatak the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When a Squad figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Loviatak the Kyrie Warrior attacks an adjacent figure with a normal attack, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Brutality Aura may only be used once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Loviatak, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: If you control Loviatak and aanother Unique Kyrie Hero who follows Utgar, figures you control who follow Utgar increase their Move Value by 1.

name: Lorwen
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Lorwen does not inflict a wound on a small or medium targeted figure, you may place it on any empty space within 2 clear sight spaces of its current location. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Crushing Wave never takes any leaving engagement attack. A non-flying figure moved lower by Crushing Wave can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: When taking a turn with another elf hero within 3 clear sight spaces, you may roll the 20-sided die. If it is a Wizard, add 2 to your roll, and if it is an Archmage add 4. If you roll a 17 or higher you may remove one wound marker from that figure.

name: Lysander Dread
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Lysander Dread has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, immediately place Lysander Dread on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Wound Markers on Lysander Dread's card.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. Choose an adjacent figure to attack. The chosen figure cannot roll defense dice when attacked by Lysander Dread's Cursed Sword Special Attack.

name: Loviatäk the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When a Squad figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Loviatäk the Kyrie Warrior attacks an adjacent figure with a normal attack, before defense dice are rolled you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Brutality Aura may only be used once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Loviatäk, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: If you control Loviatäk and another Unique Kyrie Hero who follows Utgar, figures you control who follow Utgar move one additional space.

name: MADORI
ability_1_desc: Madori starts the game with 3 brown Negation markers on her Army Card. Whenever Madori wounds a Unique figure, place a Negation marker on that figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated for the entire game.
ability_2_desc: Madori may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

ability_1_desc: Use 3 experience points to improve a base stat.
ability_2_desc: Use 3 experience points to learn a new talent. Talents can be learned in any order.
ability_3_desc: Use 3 experience points to learn a new skill or to level up a new skill. Skills must be learned in order. Skills lower on the tree can not be a higher level then any of the previous skills. The skill tree has two halves, so a player may progress one side of the tree before continuing onto the other.

name: Magis Sisters
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. Instead of attacking normally, both Magis Sisters may combine their attacks for Firewall Special Attack. Choose a target that both Magis Sisters have a clear line of sight to. Figures in a straight line between a Magis Sister and the choosen figure are also affected by Firewall Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice against the choosen figure and roll 2 attack dice against the other affected figues. Defending figures roll defense dice separately. Firewall Special Attack cannot be used if one Magis Sister is in a straight line between the choosen figure and the other Magis Sister.
ability_2_desc: When a Magis Sister rolls defense dice against a normal attack, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: M/AI M-R
ability_1_desc: When M/AI M-R attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Each time M/AI M-R destroys a small or medium figure on the same level as M/AI M-R, you may immediately place M/AI M-R on the space the figure occupied. If M/AI M-R is engaged when he uses Overrun, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: M/AI M-R rolls 2 less defense die when defending against a special attack.

name: Maredian Commando
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Maredian Commando card, before taking a turn with that Maredian Commando, you may take a turn with one other Maredian Commando you control.

name: Magma Guards
ability_1_desc: A Magma Guard always adds 1 skull to whatever is rolled when attacking an adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: If a Magma Guard occupies a molten lava or lava field space at the beginning of its turn, instead of moving normally, it may instantly move to any other molten lava or lava field hex within 10 spaces. A Magma Guard does not need clear sight to its destination hex when using Magma Tunnel to move. A Magma Guard moved with Magma Tunnel 10 still takes any disengagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Magma Guards never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Major X17
ability_1_desc: All small, medium, or large opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major X17 may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, Major X17 adds 2 defense dice.

name: Maltis Tez
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Maltis Tez, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Maltis Tez at the start of this turn, Maltis Tez receives 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Maltis Tez, if Maltis Tez attacked an opponent's figure this turn, you may move Maltis Tez up to 1 space. This space may be up to 5 levels higher or lower. Maltis Tez never takes leaving engagement attacks while using Strategic Repositioning.

name: Mariedian Guard
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. The Charged Strike Special Attack may only be used against soulborgs.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Mariedian Guard always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Magneto
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, change the class of one Unique Mutant Hero Army Card you control to Outcast.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose a figure or Destructible Object within 4 clear sight spaces. If you chose a figure, roll the d20. If you roll 11 or higher, you may place the chosen figure on an empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of its original space and 4 clear sight spaces of Magneto. After moving a figure that was not a Mutant Outcast you control or if you chose a Destructible Object, roll the d20 for crushing damage. If you roll 11 or higher, the chosen figure or Destructible Object receives 2 wounds. Add 2 to your rolls for Robots and Destructible Objects.
ability_3_desc: Opponents may never take temporary or permanent control of Magneto.

name: Major Q1
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 1 or 2. Major Q1 starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1 or 2 attack dice. Major Q1 may keep making special attacks with 1 or 2 attack dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. Major Q1 may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major Q1 may not move. Figures affected by Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or Glyph.

name: Marro Quills
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Marro Quills, all wounds inflicted count for one additional wound.
ability_2_desc: If a Marro Quill is attacked by an adjacent small or medium figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, the attacking figure receives one wound. If the figure was destroyed, the Marro Quill takes no damage from the figure's attack.

name: Marro Sentries
ability_1_desc: When taking a turn with Marro Sentries, if a friendly Marro Hive received at least one wound last turn, add 2 to the Move and Attack Value on this card this turn.
ability_2_desc: Figures adjacent to Marro Sentries cannot attack adjacent Marro Heroes with a Normal or Special attack.

name: Gollum
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, choose an opponent. That opponent will now control Gollum for the remainder of your turn, but will not be able to view any unrevealed order markers on this card. At the end of that turn, control of Gollum returns to you. All order markers and figures that were on Gollum's Army Card will stay on his Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Gollum can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an Engagement.
ability_3_desc: If Gollum attacks a figure that does not have any order markers on it's army card (revealed or unrevealed), before rolling attack dice roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher the targeted figure cannot roll any defense dice.

name: Marro Reaver
ability_1_desc: If there are 2 or more wounds on this Army Card, add 1 to this Marro Reaver's Move and Attack values.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with this Marro Reaver, if this Marro Reaver inflicted at least one wound during that turn, you may roll the 20-sided die. If this Marro Reaver is engaged, add 5 to your die roll. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may take another turn with any Marro Savage you control, during which the chosen figure may only attack.

name: Marro Bloodhound
ability_1_desc: Whenever a unique marro figure you control is wounded you may immediatly take a turn with Marro Bloodhound.
ability_2_desc: While engaged with Marro Bloodhound opposing figures roll 2 less defense dice than normal.
ability_3_desc: Marro Bloodhound rolls one additional die against figures leaving engagement with it.
ability_4_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack add one automatic sheild to whatever is rolled.

name: Major Alex Louis Armstrong
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with Major Armstrong, you may choose up to 3 single hex land terrain pieces within 4 spaces of Major Armstrong that do not have any other terrain pieces on top of them and that have at least one terrain piece beneath them. You may place these terrain pieces within 4 clear sight spaces of Major Armstrong as long as they may fit there. Any figures or obstacles that are on the chosen tiles or spaces must be placed on the same space on the battlefield as their original placement, if possible. If the figures or obstacles can not be placed, choose the nearest land space where that figure or obstacle may be legally placed and place the figure there. Roll an unblockable attack die against any figure placed with Strongarm Alchemy.
ability_2_desc: If Major Armstrong attacks an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to his attack.
ability_3_desc: Common figures roll one fewer attack die when attacking Major Armstrong with a normal attack and roll one fewer defense die when defending against an attack from Major Armstrong.

name: Mandarin
ability_1_desc: Mandarin never rolls for falling damage and may ignore all terrain effects.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, choose a figure within 5 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 8-19, that figure receives one wound. If you roll a 20, the chosen figure is destroyed.
ability_3_desc: Before attacking, choose an enemy Unique figure within 5 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll a 20, take control of that figure's Army Card and remove any Order Markers from its card.
ability_4_desc: Instead of attacking, choose another figure within 5 clear sight spaces. Place the chosen figure on an empty space within 5 clear sight spaces of its current space and of Mandarin. Figures moved this way will not take passing swipes or falling damage.

name: MANTICORE
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Lob 25. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. Line of sight isn't needed. If lobbing, the chosen figure cannot be under an overhang. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this Manticore's Quill Volley Special Attack. Roll attack dice once. Figures roll defense dice separately. A Manticore isn't affected by its own Quill Volley Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Manticore's movement, ignore elevations. Manticore may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Manticore starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: If a small or medium figure that is adjacent to a Manticore you control is destroyed, you may immediately remove it from the game.

name: Nakano Masako
ability_1_desc: If Nakano Masako inflicts at least wound with her normal attack or her counterstrike special power, you may move X Samurai figures you control up to 3 spaces each. X equals the number of wounds Nakano Masako just inflicted. You cannot use Inspiring Strike to move Nakano Masako.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Marrden Hydrons
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Marrden Hydrons, you may first take a turn with any Marro hero you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with the Marrden Hydrons, you may choose any Unique figure adjacent to a Marrden Hydron. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 20 or higher, take control of the chosen figure and that figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove all order markers on the chosen figure's Army Card. If the Marrden Hydrons are destroyed, you retain control of any previously Mind Shackled Army Cards.
ability_3_desc: Each time a figure you control Mind Shackles an opponent's figure that's adjacent to a Marrden Hydron you control, place one of your own previously destroyed Marrden Hydrons, if possible, on any empty space that's adjacent to the Mind Shackled figure. Newly placed Marrden Hydrons can't attack this turn.

name: Masha Shingai
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one revealed Order Marker on this Army Card, then all Squad figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Masha Shingai must subtract 1 from their attack. Samurai are not affected by Terror of the Honorless.
ability_2_desc: When Masha Shingai, or any Samurai or Yokai that you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Masha Shingai, receives one or more wounds from a normal attack by an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, deal one wound to the attacking figure.

name: Masha Shingai
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one revealed Order Marker on this Army Card, then all Common Squad figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Masha Shingai must subtract 1 from their attack.
ability_2_desc: When Masha Shingai, or any Samurai that you control adjacent to Masha Shingai, receives one or more wounds from a normal attack by an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, deal one wound to the attacking figure.

name: Master Ji Mui
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving Master Ji Mui normally, you may choose any empty space that is within 3 spaces of Master Ji Mui. Place Master Ji Mui on the chosen space. If Master Ji Mui is engaged when he uses Empty Step, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: All figures roll 1 less die when attacking or defending against Master Ji Mui.
ability_3_desc: When a Monk figure you control is destroyed, you may immediately move any or all unrevealed order markers on that figure's card (or cards if you have more than one common card for that figure) onto another Monk Army Card you control. You may use Empty Mind to move Order Markers from this card when Master Ji Mui is destroyed.

name: Meriadoc Brandybuck
ability_1_desc: If Meriadoc Brandybuck is attacking an adjacent opponent's figure that is engaged with at least one other figure you control, add one die to his attack. If the figure you control is a Hobbit or Halfling, add 2 dice to his attack.
ability_2_desc: Meriadoc Brandybuck is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Master Pakku
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. If an opponent receives one or more wounds but is not destroyed from Ice Spikes Special Attack you may remove an Order Marker from that figure's card. After attacking with Ice Spikes Special Attack, Master Pakku may attack one additional time with Ice Spikes Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: While Master Pakku is on a water, snow, or ice space, add 1 to his Attack and Defense. Master Pakku does not need to stop his movement when entering a water space.
ability_3_desc: When Master Pakku is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Master Pakku can take from this attack is one.

name: Mercalak
ability_1_desc: When choosing a Hero for the Death Chasers of Thesk's Taskmaster Bonding, you may change Mercalak's size to Large 5.
ability_2_desc: Before taking Mercalak's turn, you may reveal an "X" Order Marker on this Army Card to activate Glory of Gruumsh for the duration of the round. While Glory of Gruumsh is active, add 3 to Mercalak's Attack value, and all Orcs you control, except Mercalak, subtract 1 from their Defense value. You cannot activate Glory of Gruumsh if Mercalak is the only Orc you control.

name: Mercenaries of Hruggek
ability_1_desc: Mercenaries of Hruggek and all figures engaged with a Mercenary of Hruggek do not roll an extra combat die for Height Advantage or terrain bonuses such as Jungle Pieces or Shadow Spaces.
ability_2_desc: Any or all Mercenaries of Hruggek may add 3 to their Move number as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. Mercenaries of Hruggek must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.

name: Peacemaker
ability_1_desc: Before revealing an Order Marker on any Army Card you control and taking a turn with that figure or figures, you may move the Order Marker to this card and take a turn with Peacemaker. If there are any unrevealed Order Markers on an Army Card you control when the last figure on that card is destroyed, you may immediately move the unrevealed Order Markers to this card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Peacemaker, each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.

name: MITTENS
ability_1_desc: Mittens can never take more than one turn per round.
ability_2_desc: When Mittens rolls defense dice against a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: While moving up or down levels of terrain Mittens may double her Height.

name: Minotaur Mangler
ability_1_desc: When a Minotaur Mangler attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to the attacking Minotaur Mangler. If the defending figure receives any wounds from this Minotaur Mangler's attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: A Minotaur Mangler may add 3 to its Move number as long as it is unengaged prior to moving. A Minotaur Mangler must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.

name: Mezzodemon Baeljer
ability_1_desc: When a Mezzodemon Baeljer attacks a Common figure, add 1 to its Attack value.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, place 3 green Bog markers on this Army Card. After moving and before attacking, you may choose a Unique Hero within 5 Clear Sight spaces from this Mezzodemon Baeljer and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, you may place a Bog Marker on that Hero's Army Card. A Unique Hero subtracts one from his Move Value for each Bog Marker on its Army Card. Mezzodemon Baeljerss can never be affected by Bog Salvo.

name: MEINOS
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack Special. First choose a single-hex figure adjacent to Meinos to Toss, then choose as a target an opponent's figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Meinos with an unoccupied same-level or lower space adjacent to it. If the Tossed figure is small, roll 2 attack dice against the target; if medium, roll 3 attack dice; if large or huge, roll 4 attack dice. If the target is destroyed, immediately place the Tossed figure on a space previously occupied by the target; otherwise, place it on a same-level or lower space adjacent to the target. After placing the figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 11 or higher, the Tossed figure receives 1 wound. The Tossed figure does not take any disengagement attacks or falling damage.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Minotaurs which are adjacent to Meinos roll 1 additional Defense die.

name: Matter Manipulation Rings
ability_1_desc: This figure never rolls for falling damage and can ignore all terrain effects.

name: Mister Terrific
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. Mister Terrific starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose a figure to attack and roll up to 6 attack dice. Mister Terrific may keep attacking with T-Spheres Special Attack until he has rolled all 6 dice.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Mister Terrific add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: If Mister Terrific is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 13 or higher, Mister Terrific takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces.

name: Mordor Orc Archers
ability_1_desc: When a Mordor Orc Archer is attacking with a height advantage, he rolls an additional attack die.

name: Mister Fantastic
ability_1_desc: All opponent's figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Mr. Fantastic and no more than 8 levels higher than his height or 8 levels lower than his base are adjacent to and considered to be engaged with him. He never takes falling or major falling damage.
ability_2_desc: At any point before, during, or after movement, you may choose one opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Mr. Fantastic. All special powers on the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure) are negated until the end of his turn. Mr. Fantastic can only use Brilliant Gadgeteer once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mr. Fantastic's movement, ignore elevations. He may stride over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and stride over obstacles such as ruins. When Mr. Fantastic starts to stride, if he is engaged he will not take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Deathwalker 8000
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Deathwalker only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Deathwalker can be affected by his own Explosion Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Any Soulborg Guards adjacent to Deathwalker add 2 spaces to their range.

name: Spike
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with a Hero, if that Hero ends its turn adjacent to Spike, you may move any order markers between the army card of that Hero and the army card of one King, Queen, Prince, or Princess Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: For every opponent's figure engaged with Rarity, you may add 1 to Spike's Move number and 1 to his Attack up to a maximum of +3 each.
ability_3_desc: Spike never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Ditzy Doo
ability_1_desc: Before moving Ditzy, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Ditzy and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 5 or lower, the chosen figure receives one wound. If you roll a 6 or higher, after you move Ditzy, place the chosen figure adjacent to Ditzy. That figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Ditzy Doo or any figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Ditzy Doo rolls the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap, that figure must subtract 3 from the die roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ditzy Doo's movement, ignore elevations. Ditzy Doo may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ditzy Doo starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Morgan Cipher
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Soulborg adjacent to Morgan Cipher is destroyed, you may place 1 silver Metal Marker on this card, up to a maximum of 3. At the beginning of your turn, you may remove a Metal Marker from this card and remove 1 wound marker from this card or the card of any adjacent Soulborg.

name: Vinyl Scratch
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2 + Special. Roll the 20-sided die. If attacking an adjacent figure, you may add 3 to your roll. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may add 3 dice to this Base Cannon Special Attack this turn. Disciplined figures may not be attacked with Bass Cannon Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Once per game, Vinyl Scratch may use Wub Step. Before moving normally with Vinyl Scratch, you may place her on any empty space within 6 spaces of her current location. If Vinyl Scratch is engaged when she uses Wub Step, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Moloids
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Moloids, you may first take a turn with any Ruler you control.
ability_2_desc: You may move up to 4 Moloids that you control each turn. You may attack with any 2 Moloids you control, even Moloids that did not move this turn.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Moloids may add 2 to their height.

name: Princess Luna
ability_1_desc: If you won initiative this round, after revealing Order Marker 1 on this card, the following conditions apply until the start of the next round: • Treat land tiles as shadow tiles. • No one rolls leaving engagements attacks. • Wolves, Lycanthropes, and Hybrids receive an extra attack and defense die.
ability_2_desc: If Luna is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack her with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Luna's movement, ignore elevations. Luna may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Luna starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: MOKUMOKUREN
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to that Mokumokuren. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.
ability_2_desc: If there is at least one revealed Order Marker on any Mokumokuren Army Card you control, then all Mokumokuren that you control have no visible hitzones.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally with a Mokumokuren, you may switch it with any Construct or Yokai that you control within 8 spaces.

name: Silverback Alphas
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Silverback Alphas always add two automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium figure, if a Silverback Alpha rolls at least 1 skull, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the defending figure receives 1 unblockable wound along with any wounds received normally.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Silverback Alphas, you may attack with 3 Gorillinators you control.

name: Moria Goblin Captain
ability_1_desc: All friendly Goblin Archers adjacent to a Moria Goblin Captain receive an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: A Moria Goblin Captain is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Nissa's Chosen
ability_1_desc: If any Nissa's Chosen is destroyed, place it in reserve and it no longer is destroyed.

name: Modorlok Singedbeard
ability_1_desc: If Modorlok is unengaged and adjacent is a Mok you control, then instead of attacking with Modorlok you may remove him from the battlefield and place him on Mok's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range Special Attack 2 Choose 4 spaces in a straight line from Modorlok. All figures on those spaces that are within line of sight of Modorlok are affected by Gunner Mod Flame Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. If Modorlok is on the Army Card of Mok, you may use this Special Attack in place of one of Mok's Gunner Special Attacks. Choose spaces from Mok and use Mok's line of sight when attacking in this way.

name: Mento-Intensifier Ring
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with this figure, choose a Unique Hero within 3 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 16+, take temporary control of that Hero and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, return control of that Hero to the player who controlled it before Mento-Intensifier Ring.

name: Mr. "Sharky" Owler
ability_1_desc: Common squad figures roll one less die when attacking or defending against Mr. "Sharky" Owler.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Mr. "Sharky" Owler and roll the 20-sided die. If that figure is carrying a Treasure Glyph and you roll a 13 or higher, you may move that glyph onto this Army Card. If that figure is occupying a space with a Glyph on it and you roll a 13 or higher, you may move that figure up to 3 spaces. Figures moved by Fork It Over will not receive any leaving engagement attacks. Falling damage will apply for non-Flying figures.

name: Morlok
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. After moving, Morlok may choose up to 3 small or medium figures it passed over while flying this turn. Roll 1, 2, or 3 attack dice against each of those figures, until 3 total attack dice have been rolled. Each figure rolls defense separately, may not be targeted more than once with this special attack this turn, and does not receive any bonus for height advantage. After using Fell Swoop Special Attack, Morlok may make a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Morlok's movement, ignore elevations. Morlok may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Morlok starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Chandra's Phoenix
ability_1_desc: After revealing order marker 1, add 3 to this Chandra's Phoenix's Move.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Chandra's Phoenix's movement, ignore elevations. Chandra's Phoenix may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Chandra's Phoenix starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When any enemy figure is dealt damage by a special power that is not an attack, place a Chandra's Phoenix from reserve on any empty space adjacent to a figure you control. If you control no Chandra's Phoenixes in reserve, instead place a previously destroyed Chandra's Phoenix in reserve.

name: Necro-Mage Elbad
ability_1_desc: After activating Thralls for the Mindless Pack special power, you may take a turn with one additional Thrall within 3 clear sight spaces of Necro-Mage Elbad.
ability_2_desc: When placing an Undead figure with the special power of any Undead Army Card you control, you may place that figure adjacent to any Undead Unique Hero you control.

name: Nakano Takeko
ability_1_desc: Nakano Takeko may attack any or all figures adjacent to her. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. If Nakano Takeko inflicts at least one wound with Counter Cleave, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to Nakono Takeko to receive 1 wound. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: MYREKRAM RIDER
ability_1_title: TWO HEADS ARE BETTER THAN ONE
ability_1_desc: After attacking with this Myrekram Rider, if there are 3 or fewer wound markers on this Army Card, it may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: This Myrekram Rider rolls 2 additional dice when attacking a figure that was at least 4 spaces away from this Rider at the start of its turn. Lunge Assault 2 may be used only once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Myrekram Rider's movement, ignore elevations. This Rider may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Rider starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mr. Fantastic
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, this figure may ignore elevation up to 45 levels up or down while measuring spaces for Range. For each Strain taken, you may add 2 to this figure's range. This figure may not attack adjacent figures with this attack.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking a target, you may choose a special ability on the target's Army Card and roll a d20. If you roll an 11 or higher, cancel the target's ability for the rest of this turn. If you roll a 20, the target takes a wound.
ability_3_desc: Move 3 spaces and ignore elevations, water, and figures. This figure may not move more than 45 levels up or down in a single move. Additionaly, this figure may take a Strain at any time to avoid any type of Falling Damage.
ability_4_desc: Figures affected by Rubber Wrap cannot move and may not be moved by any special ability or glyph.
