ability_3_desc: Once per game, Erevan Sunshadow may use Fey Step. Before moving normally with Erevan Sunshadow, you may place him on any empty space within 5 spaces of his current location. If Erevan Sunshadow is engaged when he uses Fey Step, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Etor Deftfeet
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Etor Deftfeet's Army Card, before taking his turn, you may take a turn with one other Wayfarer you control.
ability_2_desc: All Wayfarers you control roll one additional die when attacking a figure within 7 clear sight spaces of Etor Deftfeet.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Etor Deftfeet may add 2 to his height.

name: EUPHRATES
ability_1_desc: If Euphrates begins his turn unengaged, add 2 to his Move value this turn. If he begins his turn engaged, add 2 to his Attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium figure, if Euphrates rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure receives a wound for every skull, and cannot roll any defense dice.

name: EVISTRO
ability_1_desc: An Evistro rolls an additional attack die for every adjacent friendly figure that is also adjacent to the defending figure.

name: NEPIN CONEBREAD
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving or attacking, choose a friendly Hero within 4 clear sight spaces of Nepin. Remove all wound markers from that figure's Army Card. Nepin can Complete Heal only after revealing Order Marker 3.

name: Energy Rings
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, choose a figure within 7 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 7-19, that figure receives one wound. If you roll a 20, that figure is destroyed.

name: ETRIGAN
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to two other figures adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Hellfire Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Etrigan may Leap. Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Etrigan's Leap movement, ignore elevations. Etrigan may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Etrigan may not leap more than 20 levels up or down in a single leap. If Etrigan is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Eragon Shadeslayer
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique large or huge Dragon Hero you control, to be Eragon's Steed. If Eragon was adjacent to the chosen Steed at the start of the turn or the chosen Steed passes over Eragon this turn. After you move the chosen Steed, you may place Eragon adjacent to the chosen Steed. Eragon will not take any leaving engagement attacks when being placed by this special power.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Eragon may choose up to 2 adjacent figures to attack with this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. If Eragon inflicts one or more wounds with this special attack, after placing those wounds. Roll 1 additional attack die for each wound inflicted. For each additional skull rolled, you may inflict 1 wound on the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Eragon, you may reveal an "X" order marker on this card to either: • take an additional turn with Eragon; or • remove one wound marker from this Army Card.

name: Executioner
ability_1_desc: If Executioner is attacked by a non-adjacent figure, he may roll 2 additional defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When a figure rolls the 20-sided die for any ability which could change the player controlling Executioner, you must add 2 to the figure's roll.

name: FASTCLAW
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to Fastclaw and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, add one automatic wound to the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack with Fastclaw, add 1 attack die for each adjacent ferocious figure, up to a maximum of +3 dice for the Ferocious Attack power.
ability_3_desc: Fastclaw is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Falcon
ability_1_desc: If Falcon is adjacent to an opponent's figure, other heroes you control may add 1 to their attack when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If there are one or more Order Markers on this card when you roll for initiative, you may add 3 to your result.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Falcon's movement, ignore elevations. Falcon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Falcon starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Fiefdom Men-At-Arms
ability_1_desc: Any Fiefdom Man-At-Arms who did not move this turn rolls one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When defending against a normal attack, if the attacking figure rolls exactly one skull, then that Fiefdom Man-At-Arms adds one automatic shield to his defense roll for that attack.

name: ETERNIA CRYSTAL
ability_1_desc: When an Eternia Crystal is attacked by a figure that is at least 5 spaces away, it rolls 2 additional defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When any figure adjacent to an Eternia Crystal rolls defense dice, subtract 1 die from that roll.

name: Eye Tyrant
ability_1_desc:
After moving and before attacking, Eye Tyrant may use Gaze Attack Aura. When using the Gaze Attack Aura, you must roll the 20-sided die for all opposing figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Eye Tyrant, one at a time. Gaze Attack Aura does not affect Eye Tyrant.
1-5 Searing: roll 4 attack dice
6-10 Withering: roll 5 attack dice
11-12 Telekenesis: move the figure up to 3 spaces ignoring height and the figure rolls 1 die of falling damage
13-14 Confusion: Roll 2 free disengagement strikes against the target.
15-16 Petrifying: Remove an order marker on the target's army card.
17-18 Death: Inflict 2 automatic wounds
19-20 Disintegrate: Roll 10 attack dice.

name: Feral Ogrins
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Feral Ogrins, you can take a turn with any medium or large Ferocious Hero you control. If you do not take a turn with a medium or large Ferocious Hero you control, add 2 to the Feral Ogrin's move number.
ability_2_desc: If a Feral Ogrin has a height advantage on an opponent's figure, he may add 2 to his range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Feral Ogrins may add 2 to their height.

name: Blak Reapers
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, a Blak Reaper always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Instead of Blak Reaper's normal move, he may move only one space. This space may be up to 15 levels higher. When using the Mechanical Jump, all engagement rules still aply.

name: Ewashia, Master of Tides
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Ewashia, Master of Tides, before taking Ewashia's turn, you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Ewashia may use Twister Special Attack if she is within 1 space of a water tile. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to 2 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces are also affected by Twister Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Ewashia is not affected by Twister Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Ewashia does not have to stop her movement when entering a water space. Add 1 to Ewashia's Defense Value while she is on a water space.
ability_4_desc: Ewashia starts each game with 3 water tiles on this Army Card. At the end of Ewashia's turn, you may place a water tile from this Army Card on Ewashia's space or within 1 space of Ewashia, if the water tile fits normally onto that space.

name: Feral Groks
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, you must roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 1 from your die roll for each Feral Grok you control that is not within 4 clear sight spaces of at least one Marro figure you control. If you roll a 1-2, choose an opponent. That opponent will now control all your Feral Groks for the remainder of your turn. At the end of that turn, control of your Feral Groks returns to you. All order markers and figures that were on this Army Card will stay on this Army Card. If you roll a 3-13, nothing happens. If you roll a 14 or higher, add 2 to the move and attack values of this card.

name: Dark Shadows
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, instead of attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. On a 17 or higher, all figures within 6 spaces of the Dark Shadows take 3 wounds.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for movement of any of the Dark Shadows, ignore elevations. The Dark Shadows may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Dark Shadows start to fly, if they are engaged they will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ewashia, Master of Tides
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Ewashia, before taking Ewashia's turn you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Ewashia may use Twister Special Attack if she is within 1 space of a water tile. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to 2 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces are also affected by Twister Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Ewashia is not affected by Twister Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Ewashia does not have to stop her movement when entering a water space. Add 1 to Ewashia's Defense Value while she is on a water space.
ability_4_desc: Ewashia starts each game with 3 water tiles on this card. At the end of her turn, place a water tile from this card on her space or within 1 space of her, if the water tile fits normally.

name: Flame Astronach
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to chosen figure are also affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure roll defense dice separately. A Flame Astronach is never affected by its own Double Fire-Ball Special Attack. A Flame Astronach can attack with Double Fire-Ball Special Attack twice per turn.
ability_2_desc: This Flame Astronach never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Fia Bonny the Void Siren
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 black Powder Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking, you may remove a Powder Marker from this card to add 4 to Fia Bonny the Void Siren's Range Value for the rest of this turn. You may only use this special power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: The first time each turn that Fia Bonny is targeted by a Squad figure with a normal or special attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, Fia Bonny cannot be targeted by that attack or any other attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: Fia Bonny is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Falthur Greybolt
ability_1_desc: If you revealed an Order Marker on this card this turn, you may add 4 to its Range and subtract 2 from its Attack. Once per turn, when making a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure, Falthur Greybolt may re-roll any attack dice that did not show a skull.
ability_2_desc: If Falthur Greybolt is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Falthur Greybolt. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll 10 or higher, ignore any wounds he just received.
ability_3_desc: After the last turn of the round has been taken, before resolving any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card and take an immediate turn with Falthur Greybolt. He may use Crossbow Precision on that turn.

name: FELDSPAR DRONE
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on an Insect Unique Hero's Army Card you control and after taking that turn, you may take a turn with up to 3 Feldspar Drones you control. Whenever an Insect Unique Hero you control is destroyed, for the rest of the round your Feldspar Drones may not move normally or attack.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Feldspar Drone, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Feldspar Drone at the start of this turn, that Feldspar Drone receives 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Feldspar Drone's movement, ignore elevations. A Feldspar Drone may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Feldspar Drone starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Firestorm
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any space, figure or destructible object within 4 clear sight spaces of Firestorm and either: Change the chosen space to any terrain type of your choice until the end of Firestorm's turn, or Destroy all glyphs on chosen figure's card or Give the chosen Robot or destructible object 2 wounds.
ability_2_desc: Firestorm can move through all figures, obstacles, and terrian and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. If Firestorm is attacked with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher, Firestorm takes no damage from that attack.

name: FO-TO-KI-RO
ability_1_desc: You may make up to 3 additional attacks with Fo-To-Ki-Ro. For each additional attack Fo-To-Ki-Ro makes place 1 wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Fo-to-ki-ro, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Army Card.

name: Flame Wraith
ability_1_desc: This Flame Wraith starts each game with up to 3 molten lava tiles on this card. If this Flame Wraith ends her turn on an empty land space, you may place a molten lava tile from this card onto the space she occupies if the tile fits normally onto that space.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, if this Flame Wraith is on a lava field or molten lava space, you may remove a wound marker from this card. A Flame Wraith takes one wound each time it moves onto a water, ice, or snow space.
ability_3_desc: A Flame Wraith never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: FFRANCIS
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for ffrancis's movement, ignore elevations. ffrancis counts as having the Flying special power, may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When ffrancis starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks. After moving ffrancis you may choose any Small or Medium figure ffrancis moved over this turn, place that figure on any water space within one space of ffrancis and roll the D20. On a roll of 1-4, the player controlling that figure may place it on the nearest empty land space. On a roll of 5, that figure is destroyed. On a roll of 6-14, that figure receives a wound. On a roll of 15+, that figure receives two wounds. Figures moved by Full Fathom Five never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Once per game, instead of moving and attacking with ffrancis, if ffrancis occupies a water space you may choose any opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of ffrancis and roll one unblockable attack die, one at a time, against that figure and each figure within 2 clear sight spaces of that figure.

name: Flame Familiar
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Wizard Hero you control to be Flame Familiar's Master. If Flame Familiar is adjacent to her Master, add 1 to her Attack Value.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Flame Familiar's Master's card, before taking that figure's turn, you may first take a turn with Flame Familiar.
ability_3_desc: After attacking with Flame Familiar's Master, if she is adjacent to her Master, you may destroy Flame Familiar. If you do, Flame Familiar's Master may attack one additional time.
ability_4_desc: Flame Familiar never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and she does not have to stop on molten lava spaces. Flame Familiar rolls 2 fewer defense die while she is on a water space.

name: Framed Tucker
ability_1_desc: If Framed Tucker did not move this turn, he adds 2 to his Range value. If he has not yet moved this round, he adds an additional 3 to his Range value.
ability_2_desc: When Framed Tucker is attacking or defending with a height advantage, he rolls one additional die.

name: Flying Lotus Monks
ability_1_desc: When defending with a Flying Lotus Monk, one shield rolled counts as 2 blocks. Each additional shield counts as one additional block.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Flying Lotus Monk's movement, ignore elevations. A Flying Lotus Monk cannot move to an adjacent space that is more than 5 elevations higher than that monk's base or over an obstacle that is more than 5 elevations taller than that monk's base. When using Wind Walk a Flying Lotus Monk can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Flinn Bruckett
ability_1_desc: Every time Flinn Bruckett destroys an opponent's figure, place a purple Experience Marker on this card. Flinn gains the following bonuses for every Experience Marker on his card: 1 or more: +1 Attack and Defense. 2 or more: +1 Move. 3 or more: +2 Attack and Defense. 4 or more: After attacking, Flinn may attack one additional time. 5 Markers: Immediately remove all wound markers from this card, and Flinn adds 2 to his Life. A maximum of 5 Experience Markers can be placed on this card.

name: Formian Warrior
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 2. Roll the 20-sided die to add range to this attack. If you roll 1-15, add 1 to your range. If you roll 16-19, add 2 to your range. If you roll 20, add 3 to your range.

name: Galadhrim Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before moving Galadhrim Warriors, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, you may move and attack with up to 3 Galadhrim Warriors you control. If you roll 13-16, you may move and attack with up to 6 Galadhrim Warriors you control. If you roll 17-20, you may move and attack with up to 9 Galadhrim Warriors you control.

name: Frostclaw Paladins
ability_1_desc: Before moving a Frostclaw Paladin, you may add 3 to that figure's Move Value this turn. If you do, subtract 2 from that figure's Attack Value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Frostclaw Paladins, you may take a turn with a Champion you control who follows Jandar.

name: Frank Jackson
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Frank Jackson, you may move him up to 4 spaces. Frank Jackson can attack up to 3 times with Run 'N Gun Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement. Frank Jackson cannot attack from the same space more than once.

name: Frodo Baggins
ability_1_desc: Whenever Frodo Baggins receives one or more wounds, roll the 20-sided die. If Frodo would receive enough wounds to be destroyed, add 5 to your roll. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore any wounds Frodo just received.
ability_2_desc: Frodo Baggins adds 4 to any 20-sided die roll for the special powers on a Glyph or Game Scenario.

name: Fyorlag Scorpion
ability_1_desc: A Fyorlag Scorpion rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against medium figures. It rolls 2 additional dice when attacking or defending against small figures.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Fyorlag Scorpion may triple its height.

name: Flash
ability_1_desc: Flash can move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Flash is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Flash does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Flash may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Flash attacks he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Flash is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: When Flash rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage. Flash rolls one additional defense die for each revealed order marker on this card, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice for Speed Dodge.

name: Frenzied Deathstalker
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for this Frenzied Deathstalker against a small or medium figure, if you roll a skull on every die, the defending figure recieves a wound for every skull, and cannot roll any defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After this Frenzied Deathstalker takes a turn, you must roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 12 or lower, choose an opponent. That player now has control of this Frenzied Deathstalker. Remove any order markers from this Army Card. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may take another turn with this Frenzied Deathstalker.

name: Gamling
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Gamling add 1 die to their defense.
ability_2_desc: When Gamling attacks an adjacent figure engaged to at least one other figure you control, add one automatic skull to whatever you roll.

name: Galadriel, Lady Of Light
ability_1_desc: All figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Galadriel add 2 to their defense dice. Galadriel's Defensive Aura does not affect Galadriel.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any small or medium opponent's figure that within 5 clear sight spaces of Galadriel. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, remove one unrevealed Order Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure).

name: Fyorlag Spiders
ability_1_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Fyorlag Spiders may triple their height.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any one small or medium opponent's figure that is engaged with at least three Fyorlag Spiders that you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure).
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Fyorlag Spiders, you may first take a turn with any Predator you control.

name: Fyorlag Matriarch
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. If the Fyorlag Matriarch inflicts at least 1 wound to a Hero using Paralytic Bite, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-9, nothing happens. If you roll a 10-15, remove all order markers from that figure's army card. If you roll a 16-19, remove all order markers and place a white Paralysis marker on the affected figure's army card. The Hero is Paralyzed and cannot move, attack, or defend until the white marker is removed by cancelling out a new order marker turn. If you roll a 20 or higher, the figure is Paralyzed permanently and remains on the battlefield until removed. This ability does not affect Soulborgs.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Paralyzed figure, for every wound inflicted remove 1 wound marker from the Fyorlag Matriarch.

name: GALFRIDUS
ability_1_desc: After you roll defense dices, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 17 or higher, re roll all of your defense dices. Add 1 to whatever is rolled for each valiant figure adjacent to Galfridus. You can only re roll dices once.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Galfridus' normal attack, each blank counts as a skull.

name: Ganondorf
ability_1_desc: Before Ganondorf attacks a small or medium figure, roll the 20-Sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, immediatly put 1 wound on the opponent's figure.
ability_2_desc: When Ganondorf recieves 1 or more wounds, roll the 20-Sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, ignore 1 of those wounds.

name: GAMMACRON
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. If Gammacrons Rapid Fire Special Attack inflicts a wound, he may attack again with his Rapid Fire Special Attack. Gammacron may continue attacking with his Rapid Fire Special Attack until he does not inflict a wound.
ability_2_desc: All Omnicron Snipers and Repulsors you control within four clear sight spaces gain 1 attack, defence and move.

name: Gandalf The White
ability_1_desc: Gandalf may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he must subtract 2 from his attack dice this turn.
ability_2_desc: Opponents figures must be adjacent to Gandalf to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure (except Gandalf) are also affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Gandalf may not use his Istari Light Special Attack if he used the Shadowfax ability this turn.

name: GCPD Cops
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Lawman figure you control is destroyed by an opponent's figure, all GCPD Cops you control add 1 die to their attack and 1 die to their defense for the rest of the round. GCPD Cops may not be affected by Thin Blue Line more than once per round.

name: GELOTZ'CHI
ability_1_desc: All opponent's figures within 3 spaces of Gelotz'chi are considered to be engaged with him. Gelotz'chi may only make one leaving engagement attack on a single figure per turn.

name: GALVANICLANK
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, before moving this Galvaniclank you may move up to 2 other Galvaniclanks you control.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. To use Lightning Field Special Attack, choose a straight line path between this Galvaniclank and another Galvaniclank within 4 clear sight spaces. All figures on that path are affected by Lightning Field Special Attack, and roll defense dice separately. Destructible objects, and figures with the Galvanic Shielding special power, are not affected by Lightning Field Special Attack.

name: Gargoyle
ability_1_desc: If there are no revealed order markers on any Gargoyle Army Card, each Gargoyle may add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled when rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Gargoyle's movement, ignore elevations. A Gargoyle may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Gargoyle starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Gentle Gegley
ability_1_desc: Whenever a friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Gentle Gegley receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack, you may instead place those wounds on this Army Card. If you do, that friendly figure may not attack or use any special powers, and will not take any leaving engagement attacks, until the end of your next turn.

name: Gelryie Vanguards
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, after placing Order Markers, you may move each Fierce and Unfathomable figure you control up to one space for each of your Order Markers on the Gelryie Vanguards.
ability_2_desc: A Gelryie Vanguard adds 2 to its Defense Value when it is on a water space or when it defends against an attack from a figure that has height advantage.
ability_3_desc: Gelryie Vanguards do not have to stop their movement when entering a water space.

name: GEM ARDIZAW
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Gem Ardizaw's Army Card, before taking his turn, you may take a turn with one other Wayfarer you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. Before rolling attack dice, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-3, do not roll attack dice, and Gem Ardizaw receives a wound. If you roll a 4-6, do not roll attack dice, and remove one wound marker from the defending figure's Army Card. If you roll a 7-16, roll attack dice normally. If you roll a 17 or higher, roll attack dice normally, and the defending figure cannot roll defense dice.

name: Gandalf
ability_1_desc: If the X Order Marker is on this card, you may reveal it at the end of the round and take a turn with Gandalf, or any hero you control with the fearless personality within 6 clear sight spaces of Gandalf, using this round's initiative order.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures within 6 spaces of Gandalf, including Gandalf, have the fearless personality in addition to their own personality.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. When Gandalf attacks with Flame of Anor Special Attack, he may attack with 6 attack dice once or with 3 attack dice twice.

name: Ghoul Cultists
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving, you may move the Ghoul Cultists to any available shadow space that is within 6 spaces of that figure. If a Ghoul Cultists is engaged when it start his Shadow Movement, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If at least another friendly Ghoul figure is adjacent to a Ghoul Cultists, that Ghoul Cultists may roll one additional defense dice.

name: General Zod
ability_1_desc: When General Zod is attacking with a height advantage against an adjacent figure, he rolls an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Sweeping Heat Vision Special Attack. All affected figures must be within 4 clear sight spaces of General Zod. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for General Zod's movement, ignore elevations. Zod may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Zod starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ghost Squadron
ability_1_desc: When a member of Ghost Squadron is targeted for an attack by a figure who is not adjacent, if part of its hit zone is not visible to the attacker, add 2 defense dice when defending against that attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Once per round before moving, choose an enemy figure that is within 5 spaces of any member of Ghost Squadron you control. Clear line of sight is not needed. Roll the d20. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure and any figure adjacent to that figure rolls 2 less defense dice for the remainder of your turn.
ability_3_desc: Members of Ghost Squadron may move through enemy figures and are never attacked when leaving engagement.

name: GHOUL SLASHER
ability_1_desc:
Move Special. Range 1. Attack 2. Instead of moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll:
• 1-5, don't move.
• 6-10, move 2 spaces.
• 11-18, move 4 spaces.
• 19-20, move 6 spaces.

All figures that this Ghoul Slasher passes are affected by this Furious Rage Charge. This Ghoul Slasher is not affected for leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: If at least another friendly Ghoul figure is adjacent to this Ghoul Slasher, then he may roll one additional defense dice.

name: Ghull Gravemore
ability_1_desc: If an Undead figure that you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Ghull Gravemore destroys an opponent's small or medium figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Undead squad figures. Newly placed Undead squad figure cannot attack this turn. Undead are not affected by Necromancy.
ability_2_desc: When Ghull Gravemore receives one or more wounds from an opponent's attack or special attack but is not destroyed, you may move 3 Undead squad figures that you control 4 spaces.

name: Gargoyles of Bogdan
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Gargoyles of Bogdan, you may take a turn with and undead hero you control.
ability_2_desc: The Gargoyles of Bogdan may start the game on any castle or road space within 8 spaces of your starting zone. If they do not, then they cannot take a turn during the first round. If they are on a castle or road space, or are adjacent to a wall, battlement, or ruin the gargoyles may roll an extra two dice for their defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Gargoyles of Bogdan's movement, ignore elevations. The Gargoyles of Bogdan may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Gargoyle starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_4_desc: If Sudema is within four clear sight spaces of a Gargoyle, you may increase her range of Stare of Stone to eight, and add two to the twenty-sided die roll.

name: Giant-Man
ability_1_desc: Giant-Man can attack figures within 2 clear sight spaces whose bases are no more than 4 levels above Giant-Man's height or 4 levels below his base.
ability_2_desc: After an enemy Small or Medium figure ends its move adjacent to Giant-Man, roll the d20. If you roll 13+, that figure receives one wound, then place it on an empty space within 2 clear sight spaces of Giant-Man. Figures moved this way will not take passing swipes, but falling damage may apply to non-flying figures.
ability_3_desc: Figures never receive height advantage against Giant-Man.

name: GK-235
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. GK-235 starts this turn with 10 attack dice. Choose 2-3 figures within 5 clear sight spaces to target. GK-235 must attack each targeted figure with at least 3 attack dice. GK-235 may only use Missile Barrage Special Attack once per round.
ability_2_desc: When GK-235 or a friendly figure adjacent to GK-235 rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack from a non-adjacent figure, add 1 to their defense dice.

name: Gimli
ability_1_desc: Range 4 Attack 3 – When Gimli attacks with Throwing Axe Special Attack, he may attack 1 additional time. Throwing Axe Special Attack may be used only once per Order Marker.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Gimli, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll 13 or higher you may take another turn with Gimli.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Gimli always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Giant Owl
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with this Giant Owl, choose an opponent's figure with 5 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, then remove an unrevealed Order Marker from that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Giant Owl's movement, ignore elevations. A Giant Owl may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Giant Owl starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Glauben Riflemen
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Glaubin Riflemen, you may first take a turn with any resolute Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, a Glauben Infantry receives an additional attack die.

name: Gimli the Great
ability_1_desc: When defending against or attacking an adjacent figure with a normal attack with any friendly figure who follows Aquilla and is within 6 sight spaces of Gimli the Great, you may roll Aquilla Valkyrie dice. Each Aquilla symbol rolled counts for an additional skull when attacking and additional shield when defending. Heroic Aura does not affect Gimli the Great.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Gimli the Great always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Gimli the Great may double his height.

name: Giant Stag Beetle
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose an adjacent small or medium figure to toss. You may switch this Giant Stag Beetle's position with the chosen figure. After the figure is placed, roll the 20-sided die for tossing damage. If you roll a 15 or higher, the tossed figure receives 1 wound. If the figure is tossed onto a level higher than the height of this Giant Stag Beetle or onto water, do not roll for tossing damage. The tossed figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Giant Stag Beetle's movement, ignore elevations. A Giant Stag Beetle may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Giant Stag Beetle starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Gloin
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Gloin attacks with Throwing Axe Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. Throwing Axe Special Attack may be used only once per Order Marker.
ability_2_desc: After attacking normally with Gloin, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack again with Gloin.

name: GLAIPHEN
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Glaiphen inflicts at least one wound with Poison Fang Special Attack roll the 20-sided die for Poison Damage. If you roll a 1-9, the defending figure recieves no additional wounds for Poison Damage. If you roll a 10-19, add 1 additional wound marker to the defending figure's Army Card, and roll again for Poison Damage. If you roll a 20 destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: Glaiphen does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.

name: Glacian Worg
ability_1_desc: This Glacian Worg is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: This Glacian Worg's movement is unaffected by Heavy Snow or Slippery Ice.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die once for each figure within 3 spaces of this Glacian Worg whose base is not higher or lower than 4 levels from the base of this Glacian Worg that has at least one wound. Choose the lowest roll and move this Glacian Worg adjacent to that figure if possible. This Glacian Worg must attack that figure this turn. Scent of Blood cannot be used if this Glacian Worg is engaged.

name: Ghost
ability_1_desc:
At the start of the game, and at the start of each of Ghost's turns, you may choose for Ghost to either be Invisible or Intangible until the next time you take a turn with Ghost.
• While Ghost is Invisible, Ghost has no visible Hit Zone and figures, other than Objects, attacked by Ghost subtract 1 from their defense dice.
• While Ghost is Intangible, Ghost can move through all figures, obstacles, and terrain. If Ghost is attacked with a normal attack while Ghost is Intangible, roll the 20-sided die, if you roll a 12 or higher, Ghost takes no damage from that attack. Ghost is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's figure within 4 spaces of Ghost begins a turn, if that opponent did not reveal an order marker on that figure's Army Card for that turn, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to your die roll if the opponent's figure is a Robot. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure's turn immediately ends.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, instead of attacking with Ghost, you may chose a space within 12 spaces of Ghost. Each figure on that space or within 1 space of that space are affected by the Remote Explosives. Roll two unblockable attack die once for all affected figures. An Object that receives 1 or more wounds from Remote Explosives receives 2 additional wounds.

name: Gnarled Grovetender
ability_1_desc: Figures adjacent to this Gnarled Grovetender are considered to be adjacent to a Jungle Bush.
ability_2_desc: All land spaces within 3 spaces of this Gnarled Grovetender are affected by Entangling Roots. Figures moving onto land spaces affected by Entangling Roots must count each space as 2 spaces. Figures may fly or leap over affected spaces normally. Plants are not affected by Entangling Roots.
ability_3_desc: This Gnarled Grovetender rolls 3 additional defense dice against normal attacks from non-adjacent figures.

name: Goblin Wolf Rider
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Goblin Wolf Rider, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Goblin Wolf Rider at the start of this turn, this Goblin Wolf Rider receives 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: If a Goblin Wolf Rider you control is destroyed by a normal or special attack, you may replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your previously destroyed small Goblin Squad figures.

name: Gnuk the Smasher
ability_1_desc: When Gnuk the Smasher targets a small or medium figure for a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If he targets a small figure, subtract 3 from your die roll. If you roll a 7 or lower you must attack a figure adjacent to both the targeted figure and Gnuk, if possible. If not, he missed and cannot attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a small or medium figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Gnoll Skullcleavers
ability_1_desc: If a Gnoll Skullcleaver is not engaged, add 3 to its Range and subtract 1 from its Attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for movement (including height limits for climbing and falling), ignore up to 1 level of elevation per hex. Any remaining levels are counted normally. This ability does not apply to movement on ladders.
ability_3_desc: This figure rolls 1 additional defense die against normal attacks from non-adjacent figures.

name: Gluttony
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to Gluttony. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 10. Once per game, choose 7 spaces in a straight line from Gluttony. All figures on those spaces in line of sight are affected by Gate of Truth Special Attack. Roll 10 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. Gluttony may not use Devour on any turn he uses Gate of Truth Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Start the game with 5 markers on this card. When Gluttony would receive one or more wounds, you may remove a marker to ignore all those wounds. If Gluttony would be destroyed by a power that does not inflict wounds, you may remove three markers and that figure is safe.

name: GORILLA-NADERS
ability_1_desc: When the Gorilla-Naders roll defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, add 3 automatic shields to whatever is rolled for each adjacent evergreen tree.
ability_2_desc: If the Gorilla-Naders are your last units on the board, they are now destroyed.
ability_3_desc: Every opponent's figure with a Left Wing personality starts the game with one wound marker.

name: Gorillatron
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to Gorillatron will be affected by this ground slam special attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures. Defending figures roll defense dices separately.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, you can attack a second time.
ability_3_desc: For every wound on this army card, Gorillatron can move one additional space.

name: Gnaw Demon
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Gnaw Demon, it recieves 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving a Gnaw Demon normally, you may choose any empty space that is on the same level and within 10 spaces of this Gnaw Demon. Place this Gnaw Demon on the chosen space. When a Gnaw Demon starts to Teleport, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Gnaw Demon's movement, ignore elevations. A Gnaw Demon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Gnaw Demon starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: GRA-VRO-SA
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking with Plasma Surge Special Attack, roll 1 attack die. If a skull is rolled, place 1 wound marker on Gra-Vro-Sa's Army Card. If a skull is not rolled, Gra-Vro-Sa may attack again with his Plasma Surge Special Attack. Gra-Vro-Sa may continue attacking with his Plasma Surge Special Attack until he receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Marro Hunters adjacent to Gra-Vro-Sa receive an additional attack die.

name: Gorilla Grodd
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any unique figure within 4 spaces of Gorilla Grodd. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 18 or higher, take control of the chosen figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card. If Gorilla Grodd is destroyed, control of all Army Cards gained with his Mind Control returns to the original controller(s). Robots are not affected by Mind Control.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. Figures roll 2 fewer defense dice against Telekinetic Bolt Special Attack.

name: GRAMLUNG
ability_1_desc: Range 12. Lob 25. Attack 5. Gramlung does not need clear line of sight to attack with Plasma Artillery Cannon Special Attack. If the targeted figure is more than 6 clear sight spaces away from Gramlung or Gramlung does not have clear line of sight to the targeted figure, the targeted figure must be within 6 clear sight spaces of at least 2 other Primadon figures you control. Plasma Artillery Cannon Special Attack may not be used on figures within 2 clear sight spaces.

name: Gráinne O'Hara
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on Gráinne O'Hara, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving normally and before attacking normally with Gráinne O'Hara, you may move Gráinne up to 6 spaces. Gráinne can attack with Point Blank at any point before, during, or after this move as long as Gráinne is on a space where she could end her movement. Opponents' figures roll one less defense die for each skull rolled with Point Blank.
ability_3_desc: Gráinne O'Hara is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Greater Water Elemental
ability_1_desc: When this Greater Water Elemental is on a water space and attacking an adjacent figure, you may 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When this Greater Water Elemental begins is its turn unengaged on a water space, you may add 3 to it move number.

name: Gorillinator Gunner
ability_1_desc: Range 8. Attack 3. This Gorillinator Gunner can only use this power once per game. Start the game with a Missile Marker on this card. Remove the Missile Marker to fire the missile. Choose a figure to attack. This Gorillinator Gunner does not need clear line of sight to attack the chosen figure as long as the chosen figure is within clear sight of at least one Primadon you control. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. This Gorillinator Gunner can be affected by his own Guided Missile Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, this Gorillinator Gunner always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Grand Master Traven
ability_1_desc: Traven starts the game with 6 magic counters on his card. At the beginning of each round you may place another counter on his card to a maximum of 6.
ability_2_desc: All opponent figures must be adjacent to attack Grand Master Traven.
ability_3_desc: Remove 2 magic counters from Traven. Instead of his normal movement Traven may move to any space on the board. Traven may not land on glyphs or spaces that fulfill scenario objectives.
ability_4_desc: After moving and before attacking, remove 6 magic counters from Traven's card. Destroy all squad figures adjacent to Traven. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher destroy all adjacent hero figures.

name: GRAX
ability_1_desc: When making a normal attack on an opponent's figure without an Order Marker on its card, Grax rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Once per attack, Grax may re-roll one attack die for each wound marker on the target's Army Card. Destructible objects are not affected by Delight In Cruelty.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, when Grax defends against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, if any excess shields are rolled the attacker takes one unblockable wound.

name: Glyph of Jubokko Branch
ability_1_desc: TEMPORARY TREASURE GLYPH - Instead of attacking with a figure equipped with this Glyph, you may remove a Wound Marker from its Army Card or the card of any adjacent Unique Hero.

name: Greater Bog Elemental
ability_1_desc: All small, medium, or large opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to this Greater Bog Elemental may not move. Figures affected by the Grasping Vines cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: When a small, medium, or large figure adjacent to this Greater Bog Elemental is defending against a non-adjacent attack, the defending figure receives one additional defense die.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Greater Bog Elemental, if it is on at least one swamp or swamp water space, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Greater Bog Elemental's Army Card.

name: GLYPH OF COMMANDO
ability_1_desc: This figure may add 3 to their Move number as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. This figure must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use this power. This figure never rolls for falling damage.

name: Green Knight
ability_1_desc: If the Green Knight is standing on a grass hex, or is adjacent to a tree or jungle piece, add 1 to his attack and 1 to his defense.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 19 or higher, remove one wound marker from the Green Knight's card. If the Green Knight is adjacent to at least one tree or jungle piece, add 1 to the roll. If he is standing on a grass space, add another 3 to the die roll. If he is standing on a swamp water space, add another 5 to the die roll.

name: Griffin Fusiliers
ability_1_desc: When a Griffin Fusilier is attacking with a height advantage, he rolls an additional attack die.

name: Griffin Spearmen
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of a Griffin Spearman, and its base is no more than 3 levels above a Griffin Spearman's height or 3 levels below a Griffin Spearman's base, a Griffin Spearman may add 1 to its Range when attacking that figure and roll one additonal attack die.

name: GREED
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Greed's card, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker that is on Greed's card to activate Ultimate Shield for the round. While Ultimate Shield is active, subtract 1 from Greed's Move value, add 1 to Greed's Attack value, and whenever Greed rolls defense dice, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 4 markers on this card. When Greed would receive one or more wounds, you may remove a marker to ignore all those wounds. If Greed would be destroyed by a power that does not inflict wounds, you may remove three markers and that figure is safe.

name: Griffin Chaplain
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a wounded small or medium Hero figure you control that is adjacent to this Griffin Chaplain, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 Wound Markers from that Hero's Army Card.

name: GRAZ'ZT
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any Unique figure with 3 clear sight spaces of Graz'zt. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 18, take control of the chosen figure and that figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on this card. If Graz'zt is destroyed, you retain control of any previously Demonic Charm Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Demon figures with a range of 4 or more and are within 4 clear sight spaces of Graz'zt add 2 spaces to their Range number.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving Graz'zt normally you may choose any empty space that is on the same level and within 10 spaces of Graz'zt. Place Graz'zt starts to Teleport, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mysterio
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. Instead of moving and attacking with Mysterio, you may use Vanishing Strike Special Attack. Defending figures may not roll defense dice when defending against Vanishing Strike Special Attack. Mysterio rolls one additional attack die against humans.
ability_2_title: Now You See Me, Now You Don't
ability_2_desc: If Mysterio is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-7 roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 8 or higher, Mysterio takes no damage from the attack, and you may place him on any empty space up to 2 spaces away that is no more than 5 levels higher or lower than his base.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's figure within 4 Clear LOS of Mysterio reveals an order marker you may roll the 20-sided die. If a 18 or higher is rolled Mysterio takes control of that figure till the end of the turn.

name: Griffin Cleric
ability_1_desc: When an adjacent Griffin Spearman figure you control receives one or more wounds, roll the 20-sided die before removing that figure. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of this Griffin Cleric, and its base is no more than 3 levels above this Griffin Cleric's height or 3 levels below this Griffin Cleric's base, this Griffin Cleric may add 1 to its Range when attacking that figure and roll one additonal attack die.

name: Grim Reaper
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Small and medium figures cannot roll defense dice against Reaper's Touch Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, Grim Reaper rolls 2 additional defense dice.

name: Green Lantern Hal Jordan
ability_1_desc: Any time another friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces of this Green Lantern rolls defense dice, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, that figure rolls 3 additional dice.
ability_2_desc: Before moving this Green Lantern, choose up to 2 unengaged, small or medium friendly figures adjacent to this Green Lantern. After you move this Green Lantern, place the chosen figure(s) adjacent to this Green Lantern.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Green Lantern's movement, ignore elevations. Green Lantern may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Green Lantern starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Griffin Exorist
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Mystic Purge Special Attack can be used to attack only Undead or Demon figures.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of this Griffin Exorist add 1 to their defense dice when rolling defense against an attack from a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill. This Griffin Exorist's Protection from Evil Aura does not affect this Griffin Exorist.

name: Greybolt Archers
ability_1_desc: If a Greybolt Archer did not move this turn, it may re-roll any attack dice that did not show a skull. Careful Aim can be used only once for each attack roll.
ability_2_desc: If one Greybolt Archer is destroyed within clear sight of the other, place the destroyed figure on this card. The remaining Archer may move up to 5 spaces. When that Archer starts to move with Go On Without Me, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: If there is a Greybolt Archer on this card, a Greybolt Archer making a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure may add 1 skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Greybolt Archer may double his Height.

name: Glyph of Zephyr
ability_1_desc: This glyph can be used at any time during any player's turn, before attacking. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-6, nothing happens. If you roll a 7 or higher, all small and medium figures adjacent to this figure must move 3 spaces away, ignoring elevations. Figures must not end their movement adjacent to this figure. Each figure is moved by the controlling player. Falling damage will apply for non-flying figures. Keep this card handy as a reference to the Glyph of Zephyr's power.

name: Grimslake
ability_1_desc: Before moving Grimslake, you may choose an unengaged friendly small or medium Marquis adjacent to Grimslake. After you move Grimslake, place the chosen figure adjacent to Grimslake. all friendly Marquis adjacent to Grimslake roll an additional defense die.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a small or medium figure, grimslake rolls one additional attack die. When Grimslake destroys a small or medium figure, remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Grimslake does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Griffon Cavalry
ability_1_desc: While this Griffon Cavalry is flying, you may choose one small or medium figure that it passed over this turn. The player who controlls the chosen figure must place that figure on a space adjacent to this Griffon Cavalry at the end of its move, if possible. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Talon Carry, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Talon Carry.
ability_2_desc: When this Griffon Cavalry attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Griffon Cavalry's movement, ignore elevations. A Griffon Cavalry may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Griffon Cavalry starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Grima Wormtounge
ability_1_desc: Humans who follow Ullar cannot attack or make leaving engagement attacks against Grima Wormtongue.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, choose an opponent. That opponent will now control Grima for the remainder of your turn, but will not be able to view any unrevealed Order Markers on his card. At the end of that turn, control of Grima returns to you. All Order Markers and figures on Grima's Army Card will stay on his Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Range 1 Attack 6. Small and Medium figures cannot roll defense dice against Backstab Special Attack. This attack can only be used on a turn where control of Grima changed players.

name: Grim
ability_1_desc: Spiral Slash 1 Special Attack
5 Hexes Total Length

name: Amazon Warriors
ability_1_desc: The Amazons of Themyscira are a race of powerful, immortal warrior women that live on the mystically hidden island of Themyscira. Possessing around nine to twelve times the strength of a normal human woman in top physical shape the Amazons also possess heightened speed and endurance well beyond that of any normal human. Certain members of the Amazonian nation also possess various limited mystical capabilities gleaned from study of the arcane arts.

name: Guy Gardner
ability_1_desc: Guy Gardner started out as the backup Green Lantern for Hal Jordan. He has since become one of the most prominent Green Lanterns of the Corps, despite possessing an egocentric personality. He has recently deserted his Green Power Ring in favor of the Red Ring of rage. Guy's will and rage are some of the most impressive in the entire Emotional Spectrum.

name: Deadpool
ability_1_desc: Wade Wilson received a healing factor that prevented his cancer from killing him. This also bestowed upon him the regenerative healing factor (like that of Wolverine), as well as an unstable compiling of other "Weapon X" experiments.
ability_2_desc: One side effect of his mental state is the belief that he, the "Merc with a Mouth", is not a real person but actually a character in a comic book.

name: Giant Mechanical Penguins
ability_1_desc: These huge, lumbering, mechanical monstrosities are created by the Penguin to terrorized many a Gotham City bank, store, or citizen into giving up their money, jewels, or lives. These robotic nightmares are not very technologically advanced. They are armed primarily with energy weapons that shoot dangerous beams of energy with ever increasing accuracy. If need be they can also attack in close quarters using their beaks and wings. They have no artificial intelligence and are completely mindless. Without the Penguin controlling them remotely they are reduced to large hunks of metal.

name: Doctor Octopus
ability_1_desc: It was hinted that he was a low-level telepathic mutant whose powers emerged at puberty; this mutation may have been responsible for giving his father an aneurysm as his father went to beat him.
ability_2_desc: He designed a set of highly advanced mechanical arms to assist him with his research into atomic physics. The tentacled arms were resistant to radiation and were capable of great strength and highly precise movement. They were attached to a harness that fit around his body.
ability_3_desc: The radiation (or possibly his own latent mutation) had mutated his brain so that he could control the movement of the arms using his thoughts alone.
ability_4_desc: Doctor Octopus has worked with other supervillains on several occasions, most notably as the leader of the original incarnation of the Sinister Six.

name: Aquaman
ability_1_desc: According to his first origin story, Aquaman aka Arthur Curry was the son of Atlanna, an Atlantean princess banished from Atlantis due to her interest in and frequent visits to the surface world; and Tom Curry, a surface man and lighthouse keeper. One night, amidst a terrible storm, Tom Curry found Atlanna thrown up on the shore by storm-tossed waves, and rescued her from harm. Both Curry and Atlanna made the lighthouse their home and developed a strong bond that would quickly lead to a sentimental relationship, which in turn, would lead to the birth of Arthur Curry.
ability_2_desc: Aquaman has a number of superhuman powers, most of which was inherited from his Atlantean origins. These powers give him the ability to live in the depths of the ocean floor. Although, most Atlanteans possess the same abilities as Arthur, his royal lineage and double heritage makes him superior to any other Atlantean (Aquaman is for all intents and purposes a super Atlantean), allowing him to breathe outside of the water longer than the normal Atlantean and possess great amount of superhuman powers.
ability_3_desc: Arthur inherited his mother Atlanna's ability to live and breathe underwater, as well as her power to communicate with and control all marine life.

name: Crossbones
ability_1_desc: Little has been revealed about the past of the man known as Crossbones. A mercenary and assassin, Crossbones can often be seen doing the dirty work of the Red Skull, but will work for anyone with a big enough wallet.
ability_2_desc: While not out on missions, Crossbones can be found teaching the latest generation of villains at Taskmaster's School for Criminals. As a mercenary, he enlisted with the communist Red Skull (Albert Malik) in Algeria, serving him as "Frag" until he was sent to invade Arnim Zola's Switzerland chateau. Ultimately the only team member to survive the assault, Rumlow there met and impressed the Nazi Red Skull (Johann Schmidt); this Red Skull accepted Brock's services, code-naming him "Crossbones."
ability_3_desc: Crossbones has extensive training in street-fighting, military combatives, and various forms of martial arts. Physically, Crossbones is tall and very heavily muscled, but moves with an athletic grace uncommon for a man of his bulk. He is a skilled pilot and driver, as well as an expert marksman. He also has some experience with torture and brainwashing.
ability_4_desc: He also has some experience with torture and brainwashing.

name: Lex Luthor
ability_1_desc: Lex Luthor is one of the most dangerously intelligent men on the planet. He is a super-villain, a brilliant scientist, a billionaire industrialist, and Superman's greatest enemy. This combination makes him an extremely powerful and formidable opponent; he is ruthless, efficient and extremely creative. In addition to his personal vendetta against the man who thwarts his every scheme, he despises the alien Man of Steel from an ideological standpoint for contradicting his human achievements. He has always been a controversial figure in the public eye due to LexCorp's corrupt business dealings, but he has also maintained political popularity. He has been a member of the Injustice Gang, the Injustice League, the Secret Six, the Secret Society of Super-Villains and Project 7734.

name: Frost Giant
ability_1_desc: The Frost Giants can exist comfortably at frigid temperatures but are highly vulnerable to heat. Although they can withstand the normal temperatures to be found in Asgard and in the temperate regions of Midgard, intense heat causes them to shrink in size rapidly, as if they were melting. Long exposure to cold will eventually cause them to grow back to their previous size.
ability_2_desc: At least some Frost Giants have the power to create magical illusions. Utgard-Loki is a master of the sorcery of the Frost Giants. His powers to create illusions are greater than those of other known Frost Giants.
ability_3_desc: Frost Giants are not highly skilled in the arts of combat, but their sheer size and strength make them formidable opponents even for the Asgardian gods. They possess superhuman strength and resistance to physical injury. (The flesh and bone of the giants of Jotunheim are about three times denser than similar human tissue, contributing to their superhuman strength and weight.) When exposed to extreme heat Frost Giants will start to shrink in size but if they return to the cold climate of Jotunheim they will eventually grow back to their normal size.

name: Doombots
ability_1_desc: Created by their infamous master Doctor Doom, the Doombots are exact replicas of the real Doctor Doom and are programed to behave just like him. Used many times over to deceive the world and the enemies of Doctor Doom, their foes will never truly know who they are fighting, the Master, or the Machine.
ability_2_desc: They are usually used when Doctor Doom is not confident that he can win in a given situation.
ability_3_desc: Doombots are made with an advanced A.I. program which causes them to believe each is the real Doctor Doom. Even so they are considered mindless robots and are thus resistant to mental attacks. All Doombots are programmed by Doctor Doom and include remote shut off in the case that one should rise against Doom himself.
ability_4_desc: Doombots are heavily armored and can shoot lightning from their gauntlets similar to Doctor Doom's attack. They also sport jetpacks which enable them to fly.

name: Invisible Woman
ability_1_desc: Her primary power deals with light waves, allowing her to render herself wholly or partially invisible at will. She achieves these feats by mentally bending all wavelengths of light in the vicinity around herself. She does this without causing any visible distortion effects and she somehow directs enough undistorted light to her eyes to retain her full range of vision while invisible.
ability_2_desc: Sue can also mentally generate a psionic field of invisible force apparently drawn from hyperspace, which she manipulates for a variety of effects. Most commonly, Sue generates near-indestructible invisible force fields around herself or other targets.
ability_3_desc: Sue can shape her psionic force fields into invisible constructs. By generating additional force behind her psionic constructs, Sue can turn them into offensive weapons, ranging from massive invisible battering rams to small projectiles such as spheres and darts.
ability_4_desc: She can also travel atop animated constructs such as ramps, stairs, slides, columns and stepping discs, enabling her to simulate a limited approximation of levitation or flight.

name: Joker
ability_1_desc: His most prominent weapon is his Joker venom, a poison that infects his victims with a ghoulish rictus grin and uncontrollable laughing fits that lead to paralysis, coma, or death. Joker venom has been his primary calling card from his first appearance. The Joker is immune to every known venom as well as to his own laughing toxin. Being an avid consumer of his products, the Joker's immunity to poisons has been built up over years of dedicated abuse.
ability_2_desc: The Joker has no inherent superhuman abilities. Instead, he commits crimes with a variety of weaponized comic props such as a deck of bladed playing cards, a flower in his lapel that alternately sprays acid, poisonous gas, or simply water, cyanide-stuffed pies, exploding cigars filled with nitroglycerin, harpoon guns which shoots a flag saying "BANG!", but then, with another pull of the trigger, retractable knives attached to his spats, the flag fires and impales its target, and a lethally electric joy buzzer.

name: Mantripod
ability_1_desc: The Mantripod can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: The main saucer of the Mantripod is always centered over a single space. When the Mantripod starts to move retract the legs together into the center space (even if there is a figure standing in that center space). Now, as the Mantripod moves, count spaces for movement from this center space. During movement the Mantripod is considered a 1 space figure for all purposes. (In actuality the three legs of the Mantripod are constantly moving around, keeping it balanced, and stepping over figures and obstacles.) After moving, the Mantripod's legs must be placed on three opposing, empty, same level spaces, centered on the middle space.
ability_3_desc: When attacking count range from the center space of the Mantripod. You may determine line of sight from any edge of the Mantripod's saucer.

name: Valkyrie
ability_1_desc: The Asgardian goddess Brunnhilde is one of Asgard's mightiest warriors and the leader of the Valkyrior, Odin's choosers of the slain. Known simply as 'Valkyrie' outside of Asgard, she is a long-time member of the Defenders and more recently also a member of the Avengers.

name: Punisher
ability_1_desc: Castle graduated from Basic Training, then went on to Infantry School. Immediately following that, he went through the USMC's Reconnaissance, Force Reconnaissance, and Sniper Schools. Attaining dockets, Castle was permitted to go through U.S. Army Airborne School, and U.S. Navy Underwater Demolition Team training, becoming qualified as a Navy Seal (Sea, Air and Land).
ability_2_desc: He decided that the only punishment criminals might receive is that of physical destruction. Shortly thereafter, he emblazoned his body armor with a symbol of a death's head, and exacted his revenge. Since then he has waged a one-man war upon crime, taking the name Punisher.
ability_3_desc: Adhering to his military philosophies, Punisher is constantly training whenever he is not out on actual maneuvers. He exercises fanatically to maintain his impressive physical conditioning and sticks to a balanced diet whenever possible.

name: Superman
ability_1_desc: While he is exposed to the yellow rays of our Sun, he is granted god-like powers such as flight, super strength, invulnerability, speed, enhanced lung capacity, and the ability to fire beams of intense heat from his eyes.
ability_2_desc: Very early on Clark started to display superhuman abilities. While he is exposed to the yellow rays of our Sun, he is granted god-like powers such as flight, super strength, invulnerability, speed, enhanced lung capacity, and the ability to fire beams of intense heat from his eyes. Upon reaching maturity Clark resolves himself to use his powers for the benefit of all of humanity.
ability_3_desc: As Clark Kent, Superman lives among humans as a "mild-mannered reporter" for the Metropolis newspaper Daily Planet. But to the rest of the world, we have come to simply call him SUPERMAN!

name: The Question
ability_1_desc: Sage wears a special mask made of an experimental material called pseudoderm that makes it appear that he has no face. The pseudoderm was modified to alter the color of Sage's hair and clothing as well.
ability_2_desc: As the Question, Sage investigates corruption in the face of all danger, leaving a blank 'calling card,' which, when touched, emits a smoky question mark.
ability_3_desc: The Question is a great martial artist and detective, and a well known, highly outspoken and aggressive investigative television journalist in his civilian identity. When Sage encounters stories he can't investigate by normal, legal means, he dons a special mask.

name: Lizard
ability_1_title: Superhuman Strength, Speed, Stamina, Agility, and Reflexes
ability_1_desc: When Connors is transformed into the Lizard, his strength is increased to superhuman levels. Likewise, his speed, stamina, agility, and reflexes are also raised to a level equivalent to that of Spider-Man.
ability_2_desc: He can scale walls using a combination of his sharp claws and micro-scales on his hands and feet that create molecular friction like those of a gecko lizard.
ability_3_desc: He is highly resistant to injury due to his thick, scaly hide, allowing him to resist punctures and lacerations from ordinary weapons and small caliber firearms.
ability_4_desc: The Lizard has highly enhanced healing abilities which allow him to quickly recover from grievous wounds, including regenerating lost limbs.

name: Jessica Jones
ability_1_desc: Jessica's radiation exposure granted her superhuman strength and limited invulnerability.
ability_2_desc: While she was able to fly quite well during her early years as a heroine, she has admitted that her flying ability has degenerated since she is no longer an active hero.
ability_3_desc: Jean Grey of the X-Men places a special mental command in Jones's subconscious to protect her from further mind control. With these mental defenses, Jones breaks Killgrave's control and subsequently beats him to death.
ability_4_desc: In addition to her superhuman powers, Jessica is a skilled detective and investigative journalist.

name: The Riddler
ability_1_desc: The Riddler's criminal modus operandi is so deeply ingrained into his personality that he is virtually powerless to stop himself from acting it out. He cannot simply kill his opponents when he has the upper hand; he has to put them in a deathtrap to see if he can devise a life and death intellectual challenge that the hero cannot solve and escape. However, unlike many of Batman's themed enemies, Riddler's compulsion is quite flexible, allowing him to commit any crime as long as he can describe it in a riddle or puzzle.
ability_2_desc: The Riddler often carries a question mark-shaped cane which has a wide variety of technological devices. It can also double as an automatic handgun. He is also know to use gimmick-based items such as exploding jigsaw puzzle pieces and crossword puzzle throwing nets.
ability_3_title: Legion of Doom / Secret Society of Super-Villains
ability_3_desc: He has been associated with the Legion of Doom and the Secret Society of Super-Villains.

name: Trench Monsters
ability_1_desc: Trench Monsters are various species of giant fish that live hundreds, or even thousands of meters down in the depths of the oceans, deep below the photic zone of the ocean in the total darkness below the sunlit surface waters. These creatures must survive in demanding and extremely harsh conditions, such as in the abyssal or hadal zones, which, being thousands of meters below the surface, are almost completely devoid of light. The water there is extremely cold, between 3 and 10 degrees Celsius, and has low oxygen levels. Due to the depth, the pressure is between 20 and 1,000 bars. Some of these creatures have adapted so well to these harsh conditions they have grown to monstrous size...

name: Poison Ivy
ability_1_desc:
Any figure temporarily controlled by another figure will act independently, any bonding the controlled figure might have with any other figure(s) is negated for the turn. If a squad figure is temporarily taken over only that one single figure, not the rest of the squad, is controlled.

Mindless figures and Machines cannot be mind controlled.

If a controlled figure is moved into a space, or takes an action, that would potentially cause that figure harm on that turn, it gets a chance to avoid taking the action. (This includes moving into Lava, jumping off of buildings, destroying an adjacent ITF that explodes, hitting a character with counter strike, etc.) To avoid completing the harmful move or action the player that originally owns the controlled figure rolls the 20-sided die. If a Hero figure rolls a 6 or higher it automatically breaks the control and the chosen figure returns to the player who controlled the figure before being controlled. A single squad figure, or a Dimwitted figure, needs to roll a 12 or higher to break the control.

name: The Question
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of a round, after order markers have been placed but before rolling initiative, The Question can attempt Deductive Reasoning. Choose an opponent and then attempt to guess the placement of all of their order markers. Afterwards, if The Question correctly guesses any order marker placement your opponent must show you those order marker(s), incorrect guesses remain hidden. For each correct guess The Question adds one to both his Attack and his Defense for the duration of that round.
ability_2_desc: When defending with The Question, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_3_desc: All opponents figures adjacent to The Question subtract 1 from their defense, down to a minimum of 1. Binary Gas Illusion does not work against Androids and Robots.

name: Mera
ability_1_desc: Mera possesses aquakinesis (water control) like all Xebelians, but her ability is greater than the others. She can manipulate water in any shape or form like shields or melee weapons. Her most known use of her power is solidifying water in what is called 'Hard Water'. She can use her Hard Water power to move around on solid water, form shields, weapons or concussive blasts.
ability_2_desc: Mera has enhanced durability especially against blunt damage, but is not invulnerable. Her characteristic green, full body armored suit further improves her durability.
ability_3_desc: Mera has shown the ability to see, hear or talk normally even at the bottom of the ocean. She can also sense water. She can function normally underwater and is able to withstand the high pressures and extreme temperatures of the deep, like all Xebelians. She can breath both on land and underwater.
ability_4_desc: Mera can swim much faster than normal Atlanteans or Xebelians. Her swimming is boosted by her advanced level of water manipulation. She is on Aquaman's category, which would make her one of the fastest swimmers in the DC universe.

name: Abomination
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a normal move Abomination may Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10 and ignores elevations.
