ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, Incredible Hulk can Leap up to 10 spaces and up to 50 levels up or down. When Leaping, ignore elevations, terrain effects, figures, and obstacles. Hulk will take passing swipes before Leaping and rolls 3 fewer Attack dice after Leaping.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to Hulk's Attack for each Wound Marker on this card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Hulk, roll the d20. Add 2 to your roll for each Wound Marker on this card. If you roll 18+, remove one Wound Marker from this card and roll again.

name: Invisible Woman
ability_1_desc: When Invisible Woman or another Teammate Hero you control within 2 clear sight spaces is attacked, you may roll the d20. If you roll 12 or higher, the defending figure ignores any skulls rolled.
ability_2_desc: Invisible Woman will not take passing swipes when she starts to fly.

name: ILLENDRUS
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Illendrus, if he did not attack this turn, you may reveal an unrevealed "X" Order Marker that is on Illendrus' Army Card to activate Meditative Defense Aura for the duration of the round. While Meditative Defense Aura is active, Illendrus cannot move or attack normally and subtracts 3 from his Defense value, and all friendly figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Illendrus roll one additional defense die. If Illendrus is moved by a special power on an Army Card or Glyph, Meditative Defense Aura will deactivate.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Illendrus, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 3 to Illendrus' Range value for the duration of the turn.

name: Iris
ability_1_desc: When Iris is engage with only one enemy figure and no other friendly figures are engaged with the enemy figure, then roll 2 additional attack dice and defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Iris may never move out of an engagement.

name: Incursion
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game place a Shield Amulet Treasure Glyph on a small or medium Unique Hero that you control. Incursion cannot have Order Markers placed on him or take turns by any power on any card except the Shield Amulet Treasure Glyph.
ability_2_desc: Friendly figures adjacent to Incursion add 1 die to their defense rolls.
ability_3_desc: When Incursion attacks a small or medium figure he adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Iron Monger
ability_1_desc: When Iron Monger attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If Iron Monger is attacking a non-adjacent figure all figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by the attack. If Iron Monger is attacking an adjacent figure add 2 dice to Iron Monger's attack.

name: Iron Man
ability_1_desc: When Iron Man attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Iron Man's movement, ignore elevations. Iron Man may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Iron Man starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Iron Defender
ability_1_desc: If a figure you control is attacked by an opponent's figure that is adjacent to one or more Iron Defenders you control, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, cancel the attack and the attacking figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: If a figure you control attacks a figure that is adjacent to one or more Iron Defenders you control, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, that figure rolls two fewer defense dice.

name: ICON OF CHAOS
ability_1_desc: When picking up this Glyph, you may choose either to destroy it or roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, destroy this figure. If you roll an 11 or higher, nothing happens. The figure carrying this glyph rolls 2 additional attack dice when attacking normally.

name: Iron Golem Juggernaut
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of this Iron Golem Juggernaut, and its base is no more than 3 levels above this Iron Golem Juggernaut's height or 3 levels below this Iron Golem Juggernaut's base, this Iron Golem Juggernaut may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: When this Iron Golem Juggernaut attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to Iron Golem Juggernaut. If the defending figure recieves any wounds from Iron Golem Juggernaut's attack, the chosen figure recieves 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: This Iron Golem Juggernaut never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Iron Judge
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose 1 small or medium figure adjacent to Iron Judge. Roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 1-10, nothhing happens. If you roll an 11-15, the figure recieves 1 wound. If you roll a 16-18, the figure recieves 2 wounds. If you roll a 19, the figure recieves 4 wounds. If you roll a 20, the figure recieves 6 wounds.
ability_2_desc: Whenever an opponent's small or medium figure becomes adjacent to Iron Judge, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll an 8-20 the figure may not move or be moved by any power on an Army Card or Glyph. This power may only affect one figure at a time.

name: IRONFUR BEAR
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Ironfur Bear, if the defending figure was not adjacent to this Ironfur Bear at the start of this turn, this Ironfur Bear receives 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, this Ironfur Bear always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Ingrid Von Betten
ability_1_desc: Any criminals within 5 spaces get +4 to 20D rolls on Back Stab 16 to join Von Betten's side.
ability_2_desc: At the end of her turn Shake the 20D. 16+ she deserts to the nearest enemy.

name: Isadoran Guard
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. If a unique hero receives 1 or more wounds from Electrical Blast Special Attack, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's Army Card. Soulborgs roll one fewer defense dice against Electrical Blast Special Attack.

name: Iron Man
ability_1_desc: Instead of starting the game with Iron Man on the battlefield, you may put this figure on Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, or Happy Hogan. Instead of moving Tony Stark, you may remove this Iron Man from an Army Card you control and replace Tony Stark with Iron Man.
ability_2_desc: When Iron Man attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Iron Man may Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Super Leap movement, ignore elevations. Iron Man may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Iron Man may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Iron Man is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Iron Man rolls 3 less attack dice on any turn that he used Super Leap.

name: Iron Wolf Talonators
ability_1_desc: All opponent's small or medium-sized figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to an Iron Wolf Talonator may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Iron Wolf Talonators, you may move up to 2 Mariedian Squad figures you control up to 3 spaces each or move 1 Mariedian Champion up to it's full move. Mariedians are never attacked when leaving engagements in this way.

name: Iron Patriot
ability_1_desc: While Iron Patriot is on the battlefield: • if you win initiative, you may move each other figure you control with at least one Order Marker on its card up to 4 spaces. Figures moved with Chaotic Leadership will take any leaving engagement attacks that may apply. • if you lose initiative, the player who won initiative may rearrange any Order Markers placed on Army Cards you control other than this card. That player may never reveal an Order Marker when using Chaotic Leadership.
ability_2_desc: When Iron Patriot attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Iron Patriot, if he inflicted one or more wounds with his normal attack this turn, you may take an immediate turn with any Unique Hero you control within clear sight of Iron Patriot without the Master Motivator special power.

name: ISAMU
ability_1_desc: If Isamu is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to vanish. If you roll a 9 or higher, Isamu takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Isamu can vanish only if he ends his vanishing move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: Isamu can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a figure who follows Jandar, Isamu rolls 2 additional attack dice.

name: Iron Wolf Power Armor
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Lob 12. Attack 5. Use this power once per game. Start the game with a grenade marker on this card. Remove the grenade marker to throw EMP grenades. One at a time do the following with each Iron Wolf Power Armor: Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the EMP Grenade Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Only Soulborg or Mariedian figures are affected by the EMP Grenade Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Iron Wolf Power Armor you may move up to 2 Mariedian Squad figures you control up to 3 spaces each or move 1 Mariedian Champion up to its full move. Mariedians are never attacked when leaving engagements in this way.

name: JAWA
ability_1_desc: Roll 2 additional attack dice when attacking a Droid unit.

name: JACK NICHOLSON
ability_1_desc: Destructible Objects cannot roll defense dice against Jack Nicholson.
ability_2_desc: An opponent can never reveal or remove any of your Order Markers.
ability_3_desc: Jack rolls 2 additional dice when attacking a figure adjacent to any female figure.
ability_4_desc: Jack is also The Joker.

name: Iron Wolves
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Iron Wolves, you may first take a turn with one Athlete Hero that you control who follows Vydar.
ability_2_desc: If an Iron Wolf is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other friendly figure, add 1 die to that Iron Wolf's attack.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, when an Athlete that you control receives one or more wounds from a normal attack by an opponent's figure, you may move up to 3 Iron Wolves that you control 2 spaces each. Iron Wolves never take leaving engagement attacks when moving with Reinforce the Line.

name: ISIS
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Thief Hero you control to be Isis's Master. Opponents' figures cannot target Isis for a normal or special attack while Isis is adjacent to her Master.
ability_2_desc: After moving Isis's Master normally, you may immediately move Isis up to 6 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When you choose an opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die for a special power on Isis's Master's Army Card, you may add 1 to the die roll if the chosen figure is adjacent to Isis.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Isis may double her Height and may ignore up to 1 level of elevation. Isis is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Jai Soloreef
ability_1_desc: While Order Marker 1 is revealed on this Army Card, all friendly figures that start their movement within 4 spaces of Jai move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: While Order Marker 2 is revealed on this Army Card, all friendly figures within 4 spaces of Jai roll an additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: While Order Marker 3 is revealed on this Army Card, when Jai attack he may attack one additional time.

name: Jack of Blades
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Jack of Blades, all skulls count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Each time Jack of Blades attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or with a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: When Jack of Blades attacks an adjacent figure, he may attack that figure up to two additional times.

name: Jakaw Razorbeak
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round of the game, after all Order Markers have been placed, if Jakaw Razorbeak is unengaged you may move him up to 3 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Jakaw Razorbeak attacks normally, if the defending figure received no wounds, he may attack the same figure one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When Jakaw Razorbeak rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 dice to his defense.

name: Jax Cohen
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. All figures adjacent to Jax Cohen are affected by this Spinning Axe Special attack. Roll once for all affected figures. Defending figures roll defense dices separately.
ability_2_desc: If Jax Cohen is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, opponents' figures must be adjacent to Jax Cohen to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Jack Bauer
ability_1_desc: When Jack Bauer rolls at least 1 skull when attacking or defending against an adjacent small or medium enemy figure, you may roll the 20-sided die to try and detain that figure. If you roll 1-12, wounds inflict normally. If you roll 13 or higher, ignore all wounds inflicted to all figures for the attack. The figure is detained and placed on this card. At any time, Jack Bauer can place a detained figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to him. If you do, the figure is no longer detained. Jack Bauer can only detain 1 figure at a time.
ability_2_desc: When Jack Bauer is attacked by a nonadjacent enemy figure, you may choose an adjacent small or medium figure or a detained figure and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally and if Jack Bauer is destroyed, replace his figure with the chosen figure if possible. If you roll 11 or higher, inflict all wounds to the chosen figure instead of Jack Bauer. Add 4 to whatever is rolled if you choose a detained figure.

name: Commissioner Gordon
ability_1_desc: All Lawmen you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Comissioner Gordon add 1 to their defense dice. Lawman Inspiration does not affect Comissioner Gordon.

name: Jaka Horemheb
ability_1_desc: Whenever Jaka Horemheb or any Apepian you control within 5 clear sight spaces of Jaka destroys a figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If Jaka destroyed the figure, add 5 to your roll. If you roll a 16 or higher, remove one wound marker from Jaka's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may choose a Unique Hero within 5 clear sight spaces of Jaka Horemheb and reveal an "X" order marker that is on Jaka's Army Card to activate Immobility Spell for the duration of the round. While Immobility Spell is Active, Jaka and the chosen Hero may not move or attack normally. If Jaka or the chosen Hero are moved by a special power on an Army Card or Glyph while Immobility Spell is active, Immobility Spell will no longer affect both figures.

name: Jeanne d'Arc
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Jeanne d'Arc, instead of taking that turn with Jeanne, you may take a turn with up to two Unique Human Knight or Fighter Army Cards you control. You may choose which one to activate first. Jeanne may be one of the chosen Army Cards. Any other figure that is taking a turn with Jeanne's Command must be within clear sight of Jeanne before moving.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Loyal figures adjacent to Jeanne d'Arc roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die.

name: JECKAK
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 3. If the defending figure is destroyed by Endless Ferocity Special Attack, you may attack again with Endless Ferocity Special Attack. Add 1 to the Attack value of Endless Ferocity Special Attack for each figure destroyed by Endless Ferocity Special Attack that turn.
ability_2_desc: If Jeckak is attacked with a normal attack and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll 3 attack dice. For every skull rolled, you may inflict 1 wound on any figure adjacent to Jeckak. Figures affected cannot roll any defense dice and can receive more than 1 wound each. After using Dying Swipe, Remove Jeckak from the battlefield.

name: Jehdin
ability_1_desc: When Jehdin is destroyed place the Self Destruct glyph on the space previously occupied by Jehdin.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Jehdin's movement, Jehdin may ignore up to 4 levels of elevation or pass over 2 water spaces. You may only use this power once during a turn.
ability_3_desc: Before rolling defense dice against a normal attack, roll a D20. If you roll an 8 or higher, Jehdin is not affected by that attack.

name: Jean Grey
ability_1_desc: Jean Grey may pick up destructible objects within 4 clear sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, you may choose either Jean Grey or a small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of her. Roll the 20-sided die, adding 10 to the roll if you control the chosen figure. If you roll 13 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of Jean Grey. Figures moved with Telekinetic Lift never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: All figures you control always have clear sight to each other. They cannot attack each other using this power.
ability_4_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.

name: JOTACRON
ability_1_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, all units you control add 1 die to their attack when attacking an opponent's figure adjacent to Jotacron.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, Jotacron adds 3 defense dice.

name: Jeong Jeong
ability_1_desc: Whenever an opponent's figure moves within 2 spaces of Jeong Jeong, roll an attack die. If you roll a skull, that figure takes a wound and must stop its movement.
ability_2_desc: If Jeong Jeong inflicts one or more wounds with his normal attack, you may roll an attack die for each wound received. The figure receives one additional wound for each skull rolled. Jeong Jeong rolls 3 fewer dice for his normal attack and may not inflict additional wounds when attacking a figure with the Lava Resistant Special Power.
ability_3_desc: When Jeong Jeong is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Jeong Jeong can take from this attack is one.

name: Judge Blacklock
ability_1_desc: Each time Judge Blacklock destroys an adjacent figure, you may remove a wound marker from this army card. Judge Blacklock may not Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When Judge Blacklock attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Judge Blacklock's movement, ignore elevations. Judge Blacklock may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and may pass over obstacles such as ruins. When Judge Blacklock starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Jesse Quick
ability_1_desc: Jesse Quick may move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Jesse Quick is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Jesse Quick does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Jesse Quick may ignore her height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Jesse Quick attacks, she may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after her move as long as Jesse Quick is on a space where she could end her movement.
ability_3_desc: When Jesse Quick rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage. Jesse Quick rolls one additional defense die for each revealed order marker on this card, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice for Speed Dodge.

name: Jirol Brenn
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on this card, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for each Order Marker placed on a Mariedian Army Card you control.
ability_2_desc: At the beginning of the round, if you rolled the highest initiative roll, before revealing the "1" Order Marker on any Army Card you may reveal the "X" Order Marker on this card and take a turn with Jirol Brenn.
ability_3_desc: If Jirol Brenn did not move this turn and is not engaged, he may either roll 1 additional attack die, or add 2 to his range.

name: Juggernaut
ability_1_desc: If Juggernaut has moved at least 1 space this turn, he cannot be prevented from moving by any power. If all of Juggernaut's movement is in a straight line, he can move through all figures and never takes passing swipes. After attacking, if Juggernaut moved in a straight line, he may move up to 2 spaces and attack again.
ability_2_desc: When the d20 is rolled for Juggernaut, you may add or subtract 1 from the result. When an attack die is rolled for Juggernaut for anything other than an attack, you may re-roll that attack die. Invulnerability can only be used once per roll.
ability_3_desc: Opponents can never take control of Juggernaut.

name: Ichorgoloth
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Ichorgoloth inflicts at least one wound with his Dragon Drool Special Attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound. For each skull rolled, the defending figure receives 1 additional wound. When Ichorgoloth attacks with his Dragon Drool Special Attack, he may attack 1 addition time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Ichorgoloth always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ichorgoloth's movement, ignore elevations. Ichorgoloth may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ichorgoloth starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: JOHANNISBORG
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose an opponent's Soulborg, Cyborg, or Clank figure within 4 clear sight spaces, and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may remove an unrevealed Order Marker at random from that figure's Army Card and place it on any Army Card you control. If it is a numbered Order Marker, when that opponent would have revealed it, you may reveal it instead and take a turn with that Army Card, if possible. Return the Order Marker to that opponent at the end of the round.
ability_2_desc: If Johannisborg is adjacent to an opponent's Soulborg, Cyborg, or Clank figure, that figure subtracts 1 from its Defense, and may not use any special power on its Army Card. Systems Exploit does not affect Clever figures.

name: Ichorgoloth
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Ichorgoloth inflicts at least one wound with his Dragon Drool Special Attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound. For each skull rolled, the defending figure receives 1 additional wound. When Ichorgoloth attacks with his Dragon Drool Special Attack, he may attack 1 addition time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Ichorgoloth always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ichorgoloth's movement, ignore elevations. Ichorgoloth may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ichorgoloth starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ichorgoloth
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Ichorgoloth inflicts at least one wound with his Dragon Drool Special Attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound. For each skull rolled, the defending figure receives 1 additional wound. When Ichorgoloth attacks with his Dragon Drool Special Attack, he may attack 1 addition time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Ichorgoloth always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ichorgoloth's movement, ignore elevations. Ichorgoloth may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ichorgoloth starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: K50 Class Iron Defenders
ability_1_desc: If two or more K50 Class Iron Defenders attack the same figure, then you may roll one additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, K50 Class Iron Defenders may double their Height.

name: June
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose one opponent's Unique Hero. That figure is June's Bounty. June rolls an additional die when attacking her Bounty. If June's Bounty dies, you may choose a new opponent's Unique Hero to be June's new Bounty.
ability_2_desc: While moving, June may add 2 to her move number. If she does, she cannot attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to June. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by June this turn.
ability_4_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of June, and its base is no more than 3 levels above June's height or 3 levels below June's base, June may add 1 to her Range when attacking that figure.

name: BIRDCREST
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn this Birdcrest, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with this Birdcrest.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Birdcrest and after this Birdcrest is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-9, you may move 1 PARASAUROLOPHUS that you control up to 4 spaces each. If you roll 10-15, you may move with up to 2 PARASAUROLOPHUS that you control up to 5 spaces each. If you roll 16-20, you may move with up to 3 PARASAUROLOPHUS that you control up to 6 spaces each.
ability_3_desc: This Birdcrest can move through all small and medium squad figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement with those figures.

name: JYWER
ability_1_desc: Whenever Jywer destroys an opponent's figure, place an indigo Galeforce marker on this Army Card. After Jywer attacks, if there are three or more Galeforce Markers on this card, remove all Galeforce markers and immediately take another turn with Jywer.
ability_2_desc: If Jywer destroys a figure who follows Utgar, place an additional Galeforce marker on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After attacking with Jywer, if there are 3 or more wound markers on this Army Card, he may attack one additional time.

name: K75 Class Iron Defenders
ability_1_desc: If two or more K75 Class Iron Defenders attack the same figure, then you may roll one additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for K75 Class Iron Defenders' movement, ignore elevations. K75 Class Iron Defenders may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When K75 Class Iron Defenders starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: ROVER
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to two large or huge Predator or Beast Unique Heroes you control to be the Nurturers for all units you control with the Nurtured power. This Rover rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when at least one of the chosen Nurturers is within 3 clear sight spaces. When revelaing an order marker on this Rover, you may first move a Nurturer 4 spaces. Instead of attacking with this Rover, you may attack with an adjacent Nuturer.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to this Rover and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, add one automatic wound to the chosen figure.

name: JUXUAZ
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, Juxuaz may attack two times. If you roll 11-15, Juxuaz may attack three times. If you roll 16-20, Juxuaz may attack four times.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure adjacent to Juxuaz. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 16 or higher that figure will receive a wound.
ability_3_desc: If at least another friendly Ghoul figure is adjacent to Juxuaz, he may roll one additional defense dice.

name: KALLIROTH
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Kalliroth, you may move a guard hero that you control up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20 sided-die. If you roll 12 or higher, any small or medium figure attacked by Kalliroth this turn may roll no more than 1 defense die.
ability_3_desc: When Kalliroth attacks, she may attack one additional time.

name: KANTON
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving, you may move Kanton to any available shadow space that is within 6 spaces of him. If Kanton is engaged when he start his Shadow Movement, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure adjacent to Kanton. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher that figure will receive a wound.
ability_3_desc: If at least another friendly Ghoul figure is adjacent to Kanton, he may roll one additional defense dice.

name: Deathreaver
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Deathreavers, you may move each friendly Deathreaver that did not take a turn this round up to 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When attacking, Deathreavers roll 1 additional attack die for each friendly Deathreaver adjacent to the figure being attacked.

name: Khamanu The Darklord
ability_1_desc: After attacking, Khamanu The Darklord may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: All opponent's small and medium Squad figures adjacent to Khamanu subtract 1 from their Defense. Disciplined figures are not affected by Intimidating Roar.

name: KAORI
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 5 Figures can never be destroyed by False Swipe Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When defending against a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Kaori can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Kato Katsuro
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Kato Katsuro, you may take a turn with up to two of the following that you control: • 1 Samurai Hero or 1 Samurai Squad, • 1 Ashigaru Harquebus Squad, • 1 Ashigaru Yari Squad. You may choose which Hero or Squad to activate first. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn instead of Kato Katsuro must be within clear sight of Kato Katsuro before moving.

name: KAIJURO
ability_1_desc: When Kaijuro destroys a large or smaller figure, you may remove one wound marker from Kaijuro's army card.
ability_2_desc: When Kaijuro attacks a large or smaller figure, add 2 attack dice.
ability_3_desc: All small, medium or large opponents that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Kaijuro may not move. Figures affected by the Predator's Clutch cannot be moved by any power on any army card or glyph.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Kaijuro's movement, ignore elevations. Kaijuro may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Kaijuro starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Khadlai
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Mind Flayer, Khadlai may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving Khadlai normally, you may choose any empty space that is on the same level and within 10 spaces of Khadlai. Place Khadlai on the chosen space. When Khadlai starts to Teleport, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Khadlai cannot be targetted by a non-adjacent attack while engaged with an opponent.

name: Killian Vane III
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Blunderbuss Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Killian Vane III cannot be affected by his own Blunderbuss Special Attack.

name: Kita the Springrunner
ability_1_desc: Figures must be within two spaces of Kita the Springrunner to target her with a normal or special attack.
ability_2_desc: Kita can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: PETRIE
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to two large or huge Predator or Beast Unique Heroes you control to be the Nurturers for all units you control with the Nurtured power. This Petrie rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when at least one of the chosen Nurturers is within 3 clear sight spaces. When revelaing an order marker on this Petrie, you may first move a Nurturer 4 spaces. Instead of attacking with this Petrie, you may attack with an adjacent Nuturer.
ability_2_desc: If this Petrie is attacked by an adjacent opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-9, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 10 or higher, this Petrie takes no damage and may immediately move up to 2 spaces. If this Petrie is engaged when it starts to flutter, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Petrie's movement, ignore elevations. A Petrie may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Petrie starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Karondark
ability_1_desc: When Karondark attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: All friendly unique heros, with a range of 1, who end their turn adjacent to Karondark may roll the 20 sided die. If that figure rolls a 16 or higher, it may take one additional turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Karondark's movement, ignore elevations. Karondark may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Karondark starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Kira Jax
ability_1_desc: At any point before, during, or after movement, you may choose one opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Kira Jax. All of the special powers on the chosen figure's card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure) are negated until the end of Kira Jax's turn. Kira Jax can only use Exploit Weakness once per turn.

name: Khanferuh, Pharaoh of Avoria
ability_1_desc: All Undead and Skeleton figures adjacent to Khanferuh, Pharaoh of Avoria will receive 1 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Choose an adjacent figure to attack. Add one attack dice for every enemy figures adjacent to that chosen figure. You can add up to 3 additional attack dices.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any small or medium figure within 4 spaces of Khanferuh, Pharaoh of Avoria. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a squad and you roll 10 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a hero and you roll 18 or higher, destroy the chosen figure.

name: Knights Sparier
ability_1_desc: Range 3 Attack 4. Only one Knights Sparier may use Wristgauge Special Attack in a single turn. Roll 2 less attack dice when attacking Large or Huge figures with Wristgauge Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: A Knights Sparier adds 2 to his Attack when adjacent to at least 2 other friendly Knights Sparier.

name: Koda
ability_1_desc: When Koda attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Koda, you may first take a turn with any predator you control.
ability_3_desc: When Koda rolls defense dice against a normal adjacent attack, one shield will block all damage.

name: Kordenian Royal Guards
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game choose a Unique Hero that follow Ullar. When adjacent to the chosen Hero, you may roll 1 additional attack dice if attacking an enemy figure that is adjacent to the chosen Hero.

name: Klaarak
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, when Klaarak defends against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, if any excess shields are rolled the attacker takes one unblockable wound.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Klaarak attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack a figure with the Combat Challenge special power.
ability_3_desc: After an Orc Squad you control attacks, if any figures in that Squad within 3 clear sight spaces of Klaraak made a normal attack on an adjacent figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, those figures may attack again. After those figures attack, you may roll again for Orc Battle Frenzy.

name: Kingpin
ability_1_desc: If an opponent controls a Unique Hero Army Card, Kingpin does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of the game, place Kingpin's figure on an enemy Unique Hero's card to choose it as the Target and choose two Unique Assassin and/or Criminal Army Cards in your army to take the Contract. After revealing an Order Marker on one of the Contracted cards, before taking a turn with that card, you may first take a turn with the other Contracted card. Unengaged Contracted figures must move into engagement with the Target if possible and Contracted figures must attack the Target if possible. When the Target or all of the Contracted figures are destroyed, immediately place Kingpin on an empty space not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: When Kingpin is wounded by a normal attack, you may choose a friendly figure adjacent to Kingpin to receive one of those wounds instead.

name: Korag
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Korag's Army Card and before taking a turn with Korag, you may move 3 small or medium Common Heroes you control who follow Utgar up to 3 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: After revaling an Order Marker on Korag's Army Card and taking a turn with Korag, if Korag inflicted at least one wound on an opponent's figure during his turn, you may take a turn with a small or medium Common Hero you control who follows Utgar.

name: Korlund Viking Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Korlund Viking Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Viking Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move again.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with a Korlund Viking Warrior, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Korlund Viking at the start of this turn, that Korlund Viking receives 1 additional attack die.

name: Krendal
ability_1_desc: When Krendal attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: While moving, Krendal may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.

name: Knaves of the Silver Scimitar
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Captain you control to be the Knaves of the Silver Scimitar's Captain for this game. Knaves of the Silver Scimitar roll one additional defense die against attacks from non-adjacent figures when their chosen Captain is within 4 clear sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Knaves of the Silver Scimitar, you may first take a turn with their chosen Captain or a Pirate Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with a Knave of the Silver Scimitar, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Knave of the Silver Scimitar at the start of this turn, that Knave of the Silver Scimitar receives 1 additional attack die.
ability_4_desc: Knaves of the Silver Scimitar are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: KON-TAR-NA
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Kon-Tar-Na moved less than 4 spaces, he may use Leaping Assault. Choose an opponent's figure within 3 clear sight spaces and place Kon-Tar-Na on any unoccupied space adjacent to the chosen figure. Kon-Tar-Na may not move more than 7 levels up or down using Leaping Assault. If Kon-Tar-Na is engaged when he starts his Leaping Assault, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, after attacking, if Kon-Tar-Na destroyed an opponent's figure, you may use his Leaping Assault special power and then may attack one additional time with Kon-Tar-Na.

name: Kree Imperium
ability_1_desc: When a Kree Imperium figure you control is destroyed by a normal attack, you may move a Kree Imperium figure you control up to 6 spaces. A Kree Imperium figure may only be moved by Imperial Kree Tactics once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, the Kree Imperium always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Kraal
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Kraal, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Kraal at the start of this turn, Kraal receives 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: All Drones you control can move an additional 2 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Kraal's movement, ignore elevations. Kraal may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Kraal starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Kokugura Ronin
ability_1_desc: The Kokugura Ronin do not begin the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before Order Marks are placed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, you must give this Army Card to an opponent. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may place all Kokugura Ronin on any empty spaces. You cannot place them adjacent to each other or other figures, or adjacent to Glyphs.
ability_2_desc: At the end of each round, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or lower remove all Kokugura Ronin from the battlefield. Ronin removed in this way may be placed by Payment Delivered again.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Kraul Grunt
ability_1_desc: If a Kraul Grunt Attacks a figure that began the turn adjacent to a friendly Common Insect Hero it may roll one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Kraul Grunt's movement, ignore elevations. A Kraul Grunt may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Kraul Grunt starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: KLAMMAK
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a wounded Hero adjacent to Klammak and roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen Hero has a Wild personality, add 3 to your roll. If you roll a 1-4, the chosen Hero receives 2 wounds. If you roll a 5-8, nothing happens. If you roll a 9-19, remove up to 2 wounds from the Hero's Army Card. If you roll a 20, remove up to 6 wounds from the Hero's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, if Klammak did not move this round, you may immediately move him 6 spaces. Klammak will take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Battle Advance.

name: Kraven
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Kraven may attack with his Poisoned Bolts Special Attack. If Kraven inflicts at least one wound with Poisoned Bolts Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die for Poison Damage. If you roll 1-9, nothing happens. If you roll 10-19, add one additional wound marker to the defending figure's card and roll again for Poison Damage. If you roll 20 or higher, destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Kraven always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: While moving, Kraven may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.

name: Kumona Kawakami
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When using Chain Sickle Special Attack, Kumona Kawakami can attack all adjacent figures. Roll attack dices for all affected figures. Defending figures roll defense separately.
ability_2_desc: Kumona Kawakami can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Krarag & Trozig
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3 + Special. Select a figure to attack, all figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this Ground Slam Special Attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dices separately.
ability_2_desc: If Krarag & Trozig have less than four wounds on their Army Card, then you can attack up to two times.
ability_3_desc: When a small or medium squad figure attacks Krarag & Trozig, then roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher ignore all wounds inflicted by that figure.

name: Kraal Predator
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both this Kraal Predator and the chosen figure are also affected by Sweeping Tail Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by a normal or special attack from this Kraal Predator, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may Knockback the figure by placing it on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of this Kraal Predator. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Knockback never takes leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Knockback can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_3_desc: If this Kraal Predator makes a normal attack on a small or medium figure that causes enough wounds to destroy that figure, you may remove one wound marker from this card.

name: KOJI-DANUKI
ability_1_desc:
Koji-Danuki does not start the game on the battlefield. After revealing an Order Marker on this card, if Koji-Danuki is not on the battlefield, you may replace any destructible object, terrain piece or friendly figure with Koji-Danuki, if possible. At the end of the round, if Koji-Danuki is not engaged, you may place him on this card. Before taking a turn with Koji-Danuki, you may choose one of the following:
- add 2 to his Attack this turn;
- add 2 to his Defence until you next reveal an Order Marker; or
- attack 2 additional times with Koji-Danuki this turn.
ability_2_desc: Immediately after placing Koji-Danuki on the battlefield with Shapeshifting Anatomy, if there is an unrevealed "X" Order Marker on any Army Card you control, you may choose an adjacent opponent's figure. The player controlling the chosen figure must choose one unrevealed Order Marker on any Army Card you control. If the opponent chose an "X" Order Marker, remove it, your turn immediately ends and Koji-Danuki receives a wound. If the opponent did not choose an "X" Order Marker, remove an unrevealed "X" Order Marker from an Army Card you control and you may either inflict a wound on the chosen figure or remove a random Order Marker from its card.
ability_3_desc: While drafting, if Koji-Danuki is in your army, you may subtract 5 from the Points Cost of up to eight other Unique Army Cards in your army. An Army Card's cost may never drop below 5 Points through this special power.

name: Krypto
ability_1_desc: If Krypto is adjacent to an opponent's figure, other heroes you control may add 1 to their attack when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Krypto may attack with Heat Vision Special Attack. When attacking with Heat Vision Special Attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Krypto's movement, ignore elevations. Krypto may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Krypto starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Kumo
ability_1_desc: If Kumo is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11-20, Kumo takes no damage and may immediately move up to 6 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Kumo can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Shuriken Special Attack. Kumo may use this special attack 2 times in the same turn. Kumo may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.

name: Legolas - Mounted
ability_1_desc: Range 6, Attack 3. Even if Legolas is engaged, he may use his Arrows Of Mirkwood Special Attack to attack a figure who is not adjacent.

name: Kunoichi Handmaidens
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against an adjacent figure, if all attacks are blocked, the attacking figure receives 1 unblockable hit. This power does not work against other Samurai.
ability_2_desc: If a Kyrie Warrior following Einar is targeted by an attack, a Kunoichi Handmaiden within 8 spaces may take all wounds instead.
ability_3_desc: Kunoichi Handmaidens may pass through all figures when moving and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Kyrien Mountain Roc
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if the Kyrien Mountain Roc begins the turn at an elevation at least 5 tiles higher than an opponent, add 2 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When attacking opponents with Flying abilities, add 1 attack die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Kyrien Mountain Roc's movement, ignore elevations. The Kyrien Mountain Roc may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Kyrien Mountain Roc starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Kriegspar
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. If an opponent's small or medium Unique Hero receives at least one wound from the Hammer Slam Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, nothing happens. If you roll 11-19, you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from the Unique Hero's Army Card. If you roll a 20 or higher, you may remove all order markers on the Unique Hero's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Kreigspar can not move and must attack Kreigspar if they attack with a normal attack. Figures affected by the Crushing Grip cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_3_desc: If Kriegspar has no wound markers on his Army Card, add 1 to attack dice and 1 to his defense dice.

name: Landarian Cloud Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Cloud Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Landarian Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. One at a time do the following with each Cloud Warrior: Choose a figure that is up to 3 spaces away and 10 levels high to attack. After rolling 3 attack dice place the Cloud Warrior adjacent to the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Cloud Warriors' movement, ignore elevations, up to a height of 5.

name: Kyuss The Worm
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Kyuss the Worm, roll the 20-sided die for every opponent's figure adjacent to him. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives a wound, and roll the 20-sided die again if that figure is not destroyed. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may also remove an unrevealed Order Marker at random from that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally with Kyuss The Worm, you may immediately place him on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of Kyuss and is no higher than 1 level above his height or 4 levels below his base. Kyuss will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Underground Tunneling.

name: LATROBORG
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, Latroborg may choose a small or medium squad figure that is adjacent, on the same level, and on a space where Latroborg may end his movement. Destroy the chosen figure, move Latroborg on the space that the figure occupied, and end Latroborg's movement.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent target with Latroborg, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: When Latroborg attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: Lady Galienne
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4 +Special. Choose a figure to attack, for each friendly human unique hero that is destroyed roll one additional attack dice to a maximum of 4 additional dices.
ability_2_desc: When this figure receives enough wounds to be destroyed, select an adjacent enemy figure. Roll 4 attack dices. For each skull rolled, that figure will receive 1 wound. Then remove this figure.
ability_3_desc: If you roll a skull on every dice on any small or medium figure, that figure can only defend with only one defense dice.

name: Marro Leech
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Leech Markers on this card. The Marro Leech receives an additional attack die and an additional defense die for each Leech Marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any Unique Hero adjacent to the Marro Leech. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, remove a Leech Marker from this card and place it on the chosen Hero's Army Card. Figures other than the Marro Leech roll one less attack die and one less defense die for each Leech Marker on their Army Card.
ability_3_desc: As long as there is at least one Leech Marker on this card, each time the Marro Leech destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. The Marro Leech cannot Leech Drain destructible objects.

name: Leslie "Coyote" Cane
ability_1_desc: When Leslie "Coyote" Cane attacks, he may attack one additional time for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure that does not have any revealed Order Markers on its Army Card (or Cards if there is more than one Common Army Card for that figure), Leslie "Coyote" Cane receives 1 additional attack die.

name: Lakaien of Clan Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Lakaien of Clan Esenwein, you may instead take a turn with any of the following you control: - Cyprien Esenwein or - Marcu Esenwein or - any two of the following: Iskra Esenwein, Sonya Esenwein, the Rechets of Bogdan (if they have been summoned).
ability_2_desc: All Lakaien of Clan Esenwein you control within 3 clear sight spaces of any Esenwein Vampire hero roll 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Lakaien of Clan Esenwein's movement, ignore elevation. This unit may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Lakai of Clan Esenwein starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any disengagement attacks.

name: Linebacker
ability_1_desc: All friendly Athletes adjacent to a Linebacker roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die. Linebackers are not affected by Athlete Enhancement.
ability_2_desc: This Linebacker rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against large or huge figures.

name: Leonard, Scotland Yard Consultant
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose one Unique Hero your opponent controls to be Leonard's Target. For the rest of the game, after your opponent takes a turn with the chosen Hero, you may move Leonard up to 6 spaces. Leonard must be unengaged throughout his move.
ability_2_desc: After moving Leonard, you may choose an opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces. Select an unrevealed Order Marker on that figure's Army Card and reveal it for the duration of the round. That Order Marker may still be activated.
ability_3_desc: All figures you control roll one additional die when attacking a figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Leonard with only revealed Order Markers on its card.

name: Lassriel
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Lassriel, you may first take a turn with any unique Kyrie you control. If you do not take a turn with any Kyrie you control, Lassriel may attack one additional time this turn.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Lassriel may not move normally.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Lassriel's movement, ignore elevations. Lassriel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Lassriel starts to fly, if it is engaged, it will take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Lienad
ability_1_desc: Lienad adds 1 to his attack and defense when attacking or defending against a non-adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: When Lienad attacks a non-adjacent figure who is engaged with at least one other figure you control, he rolls an additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking with Lienad, you may choose a wounded Hero figure within two clear sight spaces of Lienad and roll the twenty-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 wound markers from the chosen figure's army card. Lienad may use Nature's Blessing on himself.

name: Lizard
ability_1_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Lizard may double his Height.
ability_2_desc: At the start of every round (or at the end of any turn in which Lizard neither moves nor attacks), roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove one wound marker from this army card.
ability_3_desc: Before Taking a turn with Lizard, you may first take a turn with any Reptile or Viper, squad or hero, within 4 spaces of Lizard. When taking a turn with a figure using Reptilian Control, the figure may not use bonding.

name: Kai Adept
ability_1_desc: After attacking with this Kai Adept, if it rolled at least one skull, choose any Kai Lord you control within 10 spaces of any of your own Kai Acolytes or Kai Adepts and either move or attack with that Kai Lord.
ability_2_desc: If this Kai Adept begins its turn adjacent to a friendly Kai Lord, remove one wound marker from this Army Card.

name: Lord Gaar
ability_1_desc: If Lord Gaar destroys an opponent's small or medium figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Zombies of Morindan. Undead are not affected by Zombie Spawn.

name: LOK
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Lok, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Lok's height or 3 levels below Lok's base, Lok may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If Lok is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.
ability_3_desc: Lok is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Lord Bogal
ability_1_desc: After revealing Order Marker 3 on this army card and before taking a turn with Lord Bogal, if you have already revealed Order Marker 1 on this Army Card, you may reveal the 'X' Order Marker on any Undead, Goblin, or Hobgoblin army card you control, and take an extra turn with that Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Lord Bogal, you may choose an opponent's Large or Huge Hero and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may take a turn with that Hero. Lord Bogal may only attempt to use Monster Mash once per round.

name: Lothlórien Archers
ability_1_desc: When a Lothlórien Archer attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Lothlórien Archers are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Lord Richard of Weston
ability_1_desc: All friendly Knights and Men-at-Arms within 4 clear sight spaces of Lord Richard of Weston add 2 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: All non-Knight and non-Men-at-Arms figures that you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Lord Richard of Weston subtract 1 from their defense dice.
ability_3_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any unique Army Card you control. For this game the chosen card's class is knight regardless of what is listed on the card.

name: Lord Revadac
ability_1_desc: When Lord Revadac receives one or more wounds from an adjacent figure's normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the attacking figure receives one wound. Necrotic Infection does not affect Undead, Construct, or Soulborg figures.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Lord Revadac, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-2, Lord Revadac must either attack a friendly Squad figure this turn, or take one wound at the end of this turn.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Undead figures adjacent to Lord Revadac roll an additional attack die when making a normal attack.

name: Lothlorien Rangers
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Lothlorien Rangers, roll the 20-sdied die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with Lothlorien Rangers.
ability_2_desc: If a Lothlorien Ranger is adjacent to a Tree, opponent's figures must be adjacent to that Lothlorien Ranger to attack it with a normal attack.

name: LOUKIANOS
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Loukianos may attack up to 3 times with this Battle Axe Rage Special Attack but it can't be the same figure. Roll attack dices separately for each targeted figure.

name: Light of Decimation
ability_1_desc: The Hero carrying this glyph may activate it before rolling attack dice for a normal attack. The defending figure cannot roll defense dice for that attack.

name: Lothlórien Scout
ability_1_desc: After moving a Lothlórien Scout, if he is not engaged he may attack twice during this turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure, if a Lothlórien Scout inflicts one or more wounds, you may move one Elf figure you control within 8 clear sight spaces of him up to 4 spaces.

name: Lord Greysun
ability_1_desc: Friendly disciplined figures do not take leaving engagement attacks from opponent's figures that are engaged with Lord Greysun.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any small or medium figure adjacent to Lord Greysun. Roll the 20 sided die. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll an 8 or higher, that figure rolls 2 less defense dice when defending against Lord Greysun this turn. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 16 or higher, that Hero rolls 1 less defense die when defending against Lord Greysun this turn and you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that Hero's Army Card if it is unique.
ability_3_desc: When defending against a normal or special attack with Lord Greysun, if he is adjacent to at least one friendly disciplined figure, you may roll Einar Valkyrie dice. Each Einar symbol rolled counts as an additional shield.

name: Lórien Archers
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Lob 25 Attack 6 Three unengaged adjacent Lórien Archers on the same level may combine their attacks to use Arc Arrows Special Attack. Choose a nonadjacent figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Arc Arrows Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: If a Lórien Archer is engaged, add 1 to his Attack and Defense.
ability_3_desc: All land spaces only count as 1 space while moving. Lórien Archers add 6 to their Height when falling.

name: Lt. Bradley Furor
ability_1_desc: Before moving, Lt. Bradley Furor may subtract up to 4 from his Move value. Move one Knights Sparier you control up to 4 spaces for each Move point subtracted with Turtle Up. Knights Sparier moved by Turtle Up must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Lt. Bradley Furor prior to moving.
ability_2_desc: Range 3 Attack 5 Shrapnel Shotgun Special Attack may only be used once per round.

name: Lord Salun Dun
ability_1_desc: Lord Dun receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: Each time Lord Dun destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Lord Dun cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: After movement and before attacking, take a turn with any undead squad you already control.
ability_4_desc: Choose 1 Necromancy Spell. After the spell is chosen, roll 4 attack dice. For each skull rolled, the spell may be cast that many times. If no skulls are rolled, the spell may be cast only once.

name: Lt. Col. James Smith
ability_1_desc: If Lt. Col. James Smith moved at least 1 space this turn, he cannot attack.
ability_2_title: High Explosive Squash Head Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by High Explosive Squash Head Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Lt. Col. James Smith can be affected by his own High Explosive Squash Head Special Attack. High Explosive Squash Head Special Attack can only be used once per round.

name: Lufort Woldhorn
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Select two figures adjacent to Lufort Woldhorn to attack. Roll attack dices separately for each selected figure.
ability_2_desc: When Lufort Woldhorn attacks a small figure that doesn't follow Aquilla, that figure will roll one less defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When Lufort Woldhorn attacks, blanks counts as skulls.

name: Luke Cage
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Luke Cage rolls at least one shield, the most wounds he can take for this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: If a friendly figure adjacent to Luke Cage is targeted by a non-adjacent normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, the figure is attacked as normal. If you roll a 12 or higher, the attack targets Luke Cage instead.

name: Kor Hookmasters
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Kor Hookmasters, choose any figure adjacent to a Kor Hookmaster you control and remove the lowest numbered order marker from that figure's Army Card. Your Kor Hookmasters may detain only once per game.

name: Maelstriker S45
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Maelstriker S45 attacks a figure you control with a normal attack, after rolling defense dice, if Maelstriker S45 is not destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the attacking figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: Maelstriker S45 is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Lust
ability_1_desc: When Lust attacks a figure with a normal attack, she may choose one additional figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by her normal attack. Figures roll defense dice separately. Figures attacked by Lust subtract 1 from their defense dice for each skull rolled by Lust's normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 4 markers on this card. When Lust would receive one or more wounds, you may remove a marker to ignore all those wounds. If Lust would be destroyed by a power that does not inflict wounds, you may remove three markers and that figure is safe.

name: M/AI M-R
ability_1_desc: When M/AI M-R attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Each time M/AI M-R destroys a small or medium figure on the same level as or lower than M/AI M-R with a normal attack, you may immediately place M/AI M-R on the space the figure occupied. If M/AI M-R is engaged when it uses Overrun, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: M/AI M-R rolls 2 fewer defense dice when defending against a special attack.

name: Maidens of Fusuna
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Maiden of Fusuna is attacked with a normal attack and does not receive any wounds, that Maiden of Fusuna may immediately make a normal attack, if possible.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a friendly figure is destroyed by a normal or special attack, you may move one Maiden of Fusuna you control up to three spaces. Figures moved by Avenger Maneuver will take any leaving engagement attacks. A single Maiden of Fusuna may be moved by Avenger Maneuver only once per turn.

name: Major J15
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Major J15 may target and attack non-adjacent figures with his Guided Cannon Special Attack while engaged.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack against large or huge figures or destructible objects, Major J15 always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Major Tom
ability_1_desc: When Major Tom is attacking with a height advantage, he rolls an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When attacking, if Major Tom did not move this turn, he may either add 3 to his range or attack one additional time.

name: Major Q13
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Major Q13, you may move Major Q13 up to 4 spaces. Major Q13 can attack up to 2 times with Strafing Run Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move.

name: Lt. Col. Maes Hughes
ability_1_desc: After initiative is rolled, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, you may choose an opponent's Army Card. You may look at all Order Markers on that Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, Lt. Col. Hughes adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_title: Look! It's My Darling Daughter Elicia!
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with an Army Card you control, if there are no enemy figures within 8 clear sight spaces of Lt. Col. Hughes, choose a friendly figure within 2 clear sight spaces, if possible. Roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 11 or higher, you must move the figure up to 2 spaces. The figure may not be moved closer to or end its move adjacent to Lt. Col. Hughes.

name: Madwire
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving Madwire normally, choose any empty same-level space within 10 spaces and place Madwire on the chosen space. Madwire will not take passing swipes when teleporting.
ability_2_desc: When revealing a numbered Order Marker on this card, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker on this card to activate Titan's Rage for the duration of the round. While Titan's Rage is active, add 1 to Madwire's Attack and Defense for each Wound Marker on this card.

name: Magneto
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Magneto. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If you roll an 8 or higher, place that figure on any empty space up to 2 clear sight spaces away from its original space. If the chosen figure is an opponent's figure, it receives a wound. Figures moved with Magnetic Throw never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Magneto's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Major F19
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Major F19 does not need clear line of sight when attacking with Mag Rail Special Attack. If he has clear sight, the targeted figure rolls 1 less defense die.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an opponent's figure within 4 spaces of Major F19 and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, your opponent must remove any unrevealed Order Markers on that figure's Army Card and move them to a different Army Card, or Army Cards, if possible.

name: Major F19
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Major F19 does not need clear line of sight when attacking with Mag Rail Special Attack. If he has clear sight, the targeted figure rolls 1 less defense die.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an opponent's figure within 4 spaces of Major F19 and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8-13, your opponent removes one unrevealed Order Markers from that figure's Army Card; If you roll a 14-18, two unrevealed Order Markers are removed. If you roll a 19 or higher, all unrevealed Order Markers are removed. Each removed Order Marker must be placed by your opponent on a different card (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure) than it was removed from. Order Markers must be placed on cards with at least one figure on the battlefield.

name: Major Y11
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Major Y11 only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Major Y11 can be affected by his own Explosion Special Attack.

name: Lolth's Sting
ability_1_desc: If this Lolth's Sting starts her turn un-engaged and on a shadow space, add 3 dice to her attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: Once per game, this Lolth's Sting may use Ghost Step. Before moving normally with this Lolth's Sting, you may place her on any empty dungeon or shadow space within 6 spaces of her current location. While this Lolth's Sting remains on that space, she has no visible Hit Zone until the next time you reveal an order marker. If this Lolth's Sting is engaged when she uses Ghost Step, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: MANHUNTER
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Energy Markers on this card. When this Manhunter rolls defense dice against a normal attack, add 1 Energy Marker to this card for each excess shield that was rolled. When this Manhunter attacks, you may remove up to 3 Energy Markers from this card. For each Energy Marker you remove, add 1 die to the attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Manhunter's movement, ignore elevations. A Manhunter may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Manhunter starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: MAGIC SHIELD
ability_1_desc: After an opponent rolls skulls for an attack against one of your figures, you may activate this glyph and force that opponent to re-roll all skulls rolled for that attack.

name: Manshoon of Zhentil
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving, choose any opponent's common squad figure within 10 clearsight spaces. Both you and the player who controls the target figure roll the 20-sided die. If your roll is higher than the opposing player's roll, you may move the target up to 6 spaces. Figures moved by Voice of Bane do not suffer disengagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the target figure are also affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures.
ability_3_desc: All Zhent figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Manshoon receive 1 additional defense die and 1 additional movement.

name: Buble Finegrinder
ability_1_desc: If a figure summoned by this figure is within 2 clear sight spaces of this figure add +2 to this figures defense.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving this figure may change positions with any figure summoned by this one. Can not be used with double space figures if it can not be placed legally on the board.
ability_3_desc: This figure may destroy an adjacent summoned figure and regain life equal to the remaining life of the figure.
ability_4_desc: Start the game with X summoner markers.

name: Marcu Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Each time Marcu Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Marcu cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Marcu Esenwein, if he did not inflict at least one wound this turn, you must place a wound marker on Marcu's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Marcu Esenwein's card, if there are no more than two wound markers on this Army Card, then before taking Marcu's turn, you may move up to 3 Enforcer figures you control up to 6 spaces each.
ability_4_desc: When Marcu Esenwein attacks, if there were 3 or more wound markers on this Army Card at the start of this turn, he may attack one additional time.

name: Marro Dretch
ability_1_desc: When a Marro Dretch is on a water space, add 1 to it's attack and defense.
ability_2_desc: If a Marro Dretch ends its normal movement on a water space, you may immediately place it on any empty same-level water space within 5 spaces. If a Marro Dretch is engaged when it starts its Water Tunnel, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Maria Hill
ability_1_desc: Before revealing a numbered Order Marker on an Agent or Guard Army Card in your army, you may move it onto another Agent or Guard Army Card in your army and reveal it on that Army Card instead.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Maria Hill, you may move Maria Hill up to 5 spaces. Maria Hill can attack up to 3 times with Running Shot Special Attack at any point before, during or after this move as long as she is on a space where she could end her movement. Maria Hill cannot attack the same figure more than once.

name: Marrden Predator
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If an opponent's small or medium figure receives at least one wound from the Poison Barb Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die for Poison Damage. If you roll a 1-14, the defending figure received no additional wounds for Poison Damage. If you roll a 15 or higher, add 1 additional wound marker to the defending figures Army Card, and roll again for Poison Damage.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Marrden Predator may double its Height.

name: Quorik Marauder
ability_1_desc: Quorik Marauder may add 3 to his move number during his turn as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. Quorik Marauder must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: When Quorik Marauder attacks normally, if the defending figure received no wounds, he may attack the same figure one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When Quorik Marauder rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 dice to his defense.

name: Rieka the Wolf
ability_1_desc: When Rieka the Wolf attacks she may attack any or all figures adjacent to her, and she receives 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Go for the Throat. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Instead of her normal move, Rieka the Wolf may Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Rieka the Wolf's leaping movement, ignore elevations. Rieka the Wolf may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Rieka the Wolf may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. If Rieka the Wolf is engaged when she starts to leap, she does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: If Rieka Ravenwolf has only 1 Life remaining or is the last remaining figure in your army, add 1 to her Attack and Defense.

name: Marrden Shocker
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. If that figure is on a water space, any figures adjacent to the chosen figure that are on water spaces are also affected by the Bio Shock Gun Special Attack.
