Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against the Bio Shock Gun Special Attack and each figure rolls defense dice separately. A Marrden Shocker can be affected by its own Bio Shock Gun Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Marrden Shocker may double its Height.

name: Marcu Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Marcu Esenwein starts the game with one red Revenge Marker on his Army Card. If Marcu Esenwein receives one or more wounds from an opponent's figure, you may place the Revenge Marker on that figure's Army Card. Once all the figures on that Army Card have been destroyed return the Revenge Marker to this Army Card. If Marcu Esenwein is attacking a figure with a Revenge Marker on its Army Card, roll 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Each time Marcu Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Marcu Esenwein cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Marcu Esenwein's movement ignore elevations. Marcu Esenwein may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Marcu Esenwein starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Marcu Esenwein Uncursed
ability_1_desc: If you control Marcu Esenwein Uncursed, you must also have Marcu Esenwein in your Army. At the beginning of the game, do not place Marcu Esenwein on the battlefield. Instead, at the beginning of every round, after placing Order Markers, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-3, you must destroy this figure and replace him with Marcu Esenwein. Move all wound markers and Order Markers from this card to the Army Card of Marcu Esenwein.
ability_2_desc: Each time Marcu Esenwein Uncursed destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. He cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Marcu Esenwein Uncursed's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: GODZILLA
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 5. Choose 8 spaces in a straight line from Godzilla. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Godzilla's Atomic Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to and on the same level as Godzilla. If the chosen figure is a small figure or a medium squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a medium hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, destroy the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: After you take a turn with Godzilla roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 19 or higher, you may take another turn with Godzilla.

name: Mary Marvel
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Any figure adjacent to Mary Marvel is affected by Shazam! Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: After revealing Order Marker 1 on this card and taking a turn with Mary Marvel, you may take one additional turn, either with her or with another figure with the Shazam! Special Attack that you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mary Marvel's movement, ignore elevations. Mary Marvel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles. When Mary Marvel starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Brunnhilde, Valkyrie
ability_1_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure, the defending figure can't use special powers.
ability_2_desc: Each time a friendly figure that's adjacent to Valkyrie is destroyed, you may place that figure on this card and then destroy Valkyrie. At the beginning of each round, before placing order markers, if Valkyrie is destroyed with four or fewer wounds on her Army Card, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, remove all wounds from the Army Cards of all figures on this card and then place Valkyrie and all figures on this card onto empty spaces on the battlefield.
ability_3_desc: Each time Valkyrie is destroyed, you may place this figure on any friendly Unique Female Hero Army Card. Valkyrie's Spirit adds 2 to the Life and Attack value and 1 to the Move and Defense value of that Army Card. When placed, remove all order markers from the card. The hero's name is Valkyrie while this figure is on its card.

name: Master Grezth
ability_1_desc: After revealing Order Marker 1 on Master Grezth, before moving you may choose an opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Master Grezth. Place the Negation marker on that figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated until the marker is removed. (If the player has more than one common card for that figure, all of those cards are affected by the Negation marker.) Remove the Negation marker at the end of the round or when Master Grezth is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Master Grezth, you may choose a figure within 6 clear sight spaces that is not a destructible object. Roll the 20-sided die. If the figure is a friendly figure, add the Attack number of the chosen figure's Army Card. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may place one wound on any figure adjacent to the chosen figure.

name: Foot Soldier
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and before taking a turn with Foot Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Foot Clan Master or Assassin Unique Hero you control
ability_2_desc: You may attack with any 3 Foot Soldiers, even Foot Soldiers that you did not move this turn.

name: Meliador
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Attack 3. Figures attacked by Evicorating Winds Special Attack subtract 2 from their defense dice. Destructible objects are not affected by Evicorating Winds Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After rolling defense dice against an opponent's special attack if Meliador has 3 or less Wound Markers on his Army Card he may then immediately attack that opponent's figure with Evicorating Winds Special Attack if it is within 6 clear sight spaces.

name: MCU Detectives
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with MCU Detectives, you may move a Lawman hero you control or up to 3 other Lawman squad figures you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: MCU Detectives roll one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with them.

name: Merry
ability_1_desc: When Merry attacks an adjacent figure engaged to at least one other figure you control, add one automatic skull to whatever you roll.
ability_2_desc: Merry adds 1 to his Attack when attacking Medium or larger figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with Medium or larger figures.

name: Master Win Chiu Woo
ability_1_desc: All Monk Squad figures you control may leap an additional 13 levels up or down when using their Stealth Leap special power. All Monks you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Master Win Chiu Woo add 1 to their attack dice and 1 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Master Win Chiu Woo may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Master Win Chiu Woo may use Stealth Leap 25. Stealth Leap 25 has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap 25, ignore elevations. Master Win Chiu Woo may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Master Win Chiu Woo may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Master Win Chiu Woo is engaged when he starts his Stealth Leap 25, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: MAXIMA
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Figures cannot roll defense dice against Psi-Blast Special Attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Figures with the Mental Shielding special power, Robots and destructible objects cannot be attacked with Psi-Blast Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Maxima, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Maxima.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Maxima's movement, ignore elevations. Maxima may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Maxima starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Merfolk Shore Raiders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Merfolk Shore Raiders, you may first take a turn with a Merfolk hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When a Merfolk Shore Raider is adjacent to a figure with a wound marker on its Army Card, that Merfolk Shore Raider adds 1 to its Attack and subtracts 1 from its Defense.
ability_3_desc: Merfolk Shore Raiders do not have to stop their movement when entering a water space.

name: Hercules
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Hercules may use Standing Leap. Standing Leap has a move of 1. When counting spaces for Hercules' Standing Leap movement, ignore elevations. Hercules may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Hercules is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mazirek, Kraul Necromancer
ability_1_desc: When counting movement spaces for Mazirek, ignore elevations. Mazirek may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mazirek starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, you may destroy target squad creature adjacent to Mazirek to add a Skull marker to this army card. Black and Green creatures within 4 clear sight spaces of Mazirek get +1X, and +1🛡 for each Skull marker on this army card.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Mazirek, you may first take a turn with a Kraul hero or squad you control.

name: Storm
ability_1_desc: Figures that have the Flying or Stealth Flying special power subtract 1 from their defense dice when attacked by Storm.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. Choose up to two figures to be affected by Storm's Cyclone Wind Special Attack. Affected figures must be within 2 spaces of each other. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. After attacking, you may move any affected small and medium figures that did not roll any excess shields, up to 1 space for each skull rolled in the attack. Figures moved by Storm's Cyclone Wind Special Attack never take leaving engagement attacks and cannot ignore elevations.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Storm's movement, ignore elevations. Storm may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Storm starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mikhlo
ability_1_desc: When Mikhlo attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for Mikhlo, any die result that is not a skull counts as a shield.

name: Merian the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Merian may attack any or all figures adjacent to her. Roll for each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: All Undead figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Merian may add 1 to their attack dices.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Merian's movement, ignore elevations. Merian may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Merian starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Liz Sherman
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack within 4 clear sight spaces of Liz Sherman. Before rolling attack dice, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, all figures within the same number of spaces as the targeted figure and within clear sight of Liz Sherman are also affected by Overwhelming Flame Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each affected figure rolls defense separately. Liz Sherman, Demon figures and any figures on water spaces are not affected by Liz Sherman's Overwhelming Flame Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If there are any Order Markers on this card, Liz Sherman and all figures you control adjacent to Liz Sherman add 1 to their defense dice.

name: The M.O.A
ability_1_desc: The Microsoft Office Assistant can change its race anytime.
ability_2_desc: Any figure you control that gets to move two extra spaces if it moves adjacent to The Microsoft Office Assistant anytime before, during, and after its movement.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with The Microsoft Office Assistant, you may destroy it. Any adjacent soulborgs take three wounds.

name: Plastic Man
ability_1_desc: All figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Plastic Man are considered engaged with Plastic Man.
ability_2_desc: When Plastic Man is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, choose an opponent's figure engaged with Plastic Man. If Plastic Man is not destroyed by the attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Plastic Man's movement, ignore elevations. Plastic Man may Stretch over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged and over obstacles such as ruins. Plastic Man may not Stretch more than 40 levels up in a single Stretch. If Plastic Man is engaged when he starts to Stretch, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Melinda May
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's adjacent figure with a normal attack, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. When defending against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When Melinda May attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, when an Agent figure you control is destroyed, you may immediately move all Order Markers from any and all Army Cards in your army onto this one. For the rest of that round, Melinda May rolls one additional attack die when attacking an opponent's figure.

name: Major Q1
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Attack 1 or 2 Major Q1 starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1 or 2 attack dice. Major Q1 may keep making special attacks with 1 or 2 attack dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. Major Q1 may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major Q1 may not move. Figures affected by Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or Glyph.

name: Mirage
ability_1_desc: When any living creature attacks Mirage, she receives a +3 on her defense. When they attack a friendly figure within 4 clear line of sight hexes of Mirage, they receive a +2 on their defense.

name: Mielki the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When Mielki attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Mielki destroys a figure with a normal attack, you may choose a small or medium friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Mielki. Remove a wound marker from the chosen figure. Mielki cannot heal herself with Spear of Sankari, and it cannot be used when destroying a destructible object.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mielki's movement, ignore elevations. Mielki may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mielki starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Microcorp Strikers
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each round, after placing Order Markers, you may move any number of Microcorp Strikers you control up to 4 spaces each. For each Microcorp Striker moved with Stealth Tactics, subtract 2 from your initiative roll. When moving with Stealth Tactics, a Microcorp Striker does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When an Agent in the Microcorp Strikers receives one or more wounds, before removing that Agent, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_3_desc: Range 8. Attack 1. An unengaged Microcorp Striker that did not move or attack normally this turn may use HMD Targeting Special Attack. Small and medium figures targeted by HMD Targeting Special Attack reduce their base Defense to 0.

name: Mirana Silverflame
ability_1_desc: A friendly Human Knight adjacent to Mirana Silverflame adds 1 to its Defense number.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack on a Unique Hero, Mirana Silverflame rolls 2 additional attack dice if that Hero began the game with 4 or more Life.
ability_3_desc: Mirana Silverflame may not attack a figure that follows Jandar. If a player controls Mirana Silverflame and a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill, destroy Mirana Silverflame.

name: Minotaur Pit Fighter
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Before or after attacking normally, this Minotaur Pit Fighter may attack with Gore Special attack. When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by Gore Special Attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may place that figure on any empty space adjacent to this Minotaur Pit Fighter. A figure moved by Gore Special Attack never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Gore Special Attack can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Misan
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Misan's Army Card, choose an opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die. •If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. •If you roll 13-18, remove 1 unrevealed Order Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card. •If you roll 19-20, remove all unrevealed Order Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Heh Peim
ability_1_desc: All figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of this figure add 1 to their defense when defending an attack from a follower Utgar. This figure is not affected by Protection from Evil Auro.
ability_2_desc: Life +2.
ability_3_desc: Defense +2.
ability_4_desc: After moving and before attacking heal an adjacent wounded small or medium Hero figure. Roll the 20-sided die. Roll X or higher and remove up to 2 Wound Markers from that Hero. Can be used once per turn.

name: Faith Connors
ability_1_desc: Before and after moving, you may move a Treasure Glyph from any adjacent friendly figure's Army Card to this card and you may move any Treasure Glyphs from this card to that card. Faith Connors may move over and pickup Treasure Glyphs without stopping.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an adjacent normal attack, Faith counts all excess shields as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. If Faith rolls 1 or more excess shields, add 6 to her Range value until the end of your next turn.
ability_3_desc: When moving, Faith may leap over decreases in elevation. Faith is never attacked for leaving engagements when leaping or by figures on lower levels than her base. When moving up or down levels, Faith may add 6 to her height.

name: Mind Flayer Mastermind
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. This Mind Flayer Mastermind does not need clear line of sight to attack with Psionic Blast Special Attack. If a figure receives 1 or more wounds from Psionic Blast Special Attack, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's Army Card (or cards if you opponent has more than one Common card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: When revealing an order marker on this Mind Flayer Mastermind, after taking this Mind Flayer Mastermind's turn, you may choose any Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of this Mind Flayer Mastermind. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, take temporary control of the chosen Hero and immediately take a turn with that Hero. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen hero returns to its previous owner. All order markers that were on the figure's Army Card will stay on the Army Card. Enslave does not affect Mind Flayers.

name: MHADRA
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Mhadra, you may place any Chakra Marker of your choice on this card. If there is already a Chakra Marker on this card, remove it. Mhadra may only use the power connected with the Marker currently on her card: Crown Chakra (Violet): Mhadra may not attack or make leaving engagement attacks, you may add 7 to your initiative roll and she may not be affected by attacks or special powers unless she is the only figure you control. Third Eye Chakra (Indigo): Before taking a turn with Mhadra, you may choose any two unrevealed Order Markers belonging to opponents and immediately view them. Throat Chakra (Blue): Before taking a turn with Mhadra, you may move two unrevealed Order Markers on any Army Cards you control to any other Army Cards you control. Heart Chakra (Green): Mhadra may not attack or make leaving engagement attacks and all figures within 3 spaces of her roll one fewer attack die. Solar Plexus Chakra (Yellow): Add 2 to Mhadra's attack. Sacral Chakra (Orange): Mhadra may attack at any point before, during or after moving as long as she is on a space on which she could end her movement and never takes leaving engagement attacks. Base Chakra (Red): Add 3 to Mhadra's defence.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Mhadra's movement, ignore elevations. Mhadra may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mhadra starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mizuchi Serpent
ability_1_desc: While a Mizuchi Serpent is on a water space, add 1 to its Attack.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Mizuchi Serpent Army Card, before taking that Mizuchi Serpent's turn, you may take a turn with one other Hydra you control.
ability_3_desc: Mizuchi Serpents do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.

name: Mirthan Falcon
ability_1_desc: When a Mirthan Falcon rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. A Mirthan Falcon cannot attack figures under an overhang with Falcon Swoop Special Attack. After attacking with Falcon Swoop Special Attack, you may place that Mirthan Falcon adjacent to a Falconer you control within 6 spaces of that Mirthan Falcon. A Mirthan Falcon never takes leaving engagement attacks when moving with Falcon Swoop Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Mirthan Falcon's movement, ignore elevations. A Mirthan Falcon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Mirthan Falcon starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mirror Master
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose Mirror Master or any figure adjacent to him. Roll the 20-sided die. Place the chosen figure on an empty space exactly X spaces away from its original placement, if possible, where X equals the number rolled on the 20-sided die. Figures moved by this special power will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Mirror Master is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, you may immediately place 2 Mirror Markers face down on any empty spaces within 3 spaces of Mirror Master. The opponent that controls the attacking figure must choose one marker. If the chosen marker has Mirror Master's face on it, roll defense dice normally. Otherwise, place him on the space occupied by the chosen marker and ignore the attack. Mirror Master will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moved by Mirror Image. After using Mirror Image, remove all Mirror Markers from the battlefield.

name: MISAERX
ability_1_desc: Each time this figure destroys a figure, you may remove a Wound Marker from this Army Card. This figure cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When Misaerx is destroyed, place this figure on the Army Card of a Unique Warrior Hero that follows Revna. That Hero now has the Life Drain special power.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Misaerx's movement, ignore elevations. Misaerx may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Misaerx starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mister Fantastic
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, instead of taking that turn with Mister Fantastic you may move up to four Teammates you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on this card, you may add or subtract 4 from your initiative.
ability_3_desc: Enemy Small or Medium figures adjacent to Mister Fantastic cannot move and cannot be moved.
ability_4_desc: At any point before, during, or after his movement, Mister Fantastic may move 1 space up to 30 levels up or down. Mister Fantastic never rolls for falling damage except extreme falling damage. Mister Fantastic may attack figures within 2 clear sight spaces whose bases are no more than 6 levels above Mister Fantastic's height or 6 levels below Mister Fantastics base.

name: Mister Freeze
ability_1_desc: Any time Mister Freeze attacks a Unique Hero with a normal attack and causes at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove all Order Markers from that Unique Hero's Army Card and place a Freeze Marker on that card. Army Cards with a Freeze Marker may not take turns. Every round, before placing Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die for each card with a Freeze Marker on it. Add 4 to the result if the card has the Super Strength special power. If you roll an 8 or higher, remove all Freeze Markers from that card.
ability_2_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.
ability_3_desc: If Mister Freeze is placed on a lava field or molten lava space, he is instantly destroyed.

name: DJ PON-3
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2 + Special. Roll the 20-sided die. If attacking an adjacent figure, you may add 3 to your roll. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may add 3 dice to this Base Cannon Special Attack this turn. Disciplined figures may not be attacked with Bass Cannon Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Once per game, DJ PON-3 may use Wub Step. Before moving normally with DJ PON-3, you may place her on any empty space within 6 spaces of her current location. If DJ PON-3 is engaged when she uses Wub Step, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mister Miracle
ability_1_desc: Mr. Miracle's movement is never affected by any special power or glyph that prevents movement. Escape Artist supersedes all such powers.
ability_2_desc: Mr. Miracle can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When Mr. Miracle leaves engagement with small or medium figures, he may make a leaving engagement attack against them. He cannot make a leaving engagement attack against the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting for Mr. Miracle's move, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mole Man
ability_1_desc: All friendly Creatures within 4 clear sight spaces of Mole Man add one to their attack and defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Mole Man needs clear sight instead of line of sight when attacking non-adjacent figures.
ability_3_desc: If Mole Man is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and receives one or more wounds, you may destroy a Moloid you control that is adjacent to Mole Man to ignore any wounds that Mole Man just received.

name: Discord
ability_1_desc: If you won initiative this round, after revealing Order Marker 1 on this card, the following conditions apply until the start of the next round: • Treat land tiles as slippery ice tiles. • Treat water tiles as road tiles. • Treat road tiles as lava field tiles. • All figures must be adjacent to their target to attack with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: While within 3 clear sight spaces of Discord, enemy figures are considered to have the Tormented Personality.
ability_3_desc: If Discord is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 2 or higher, Discord takes no damage and may immediately be placed on any empty space within 4 spaces of his current location. Discord never takes leaving engagement attacks.

name: Moonlight
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 3. Select an opponent's unit to attack. You may attack it twice. For each attack, your opponent rolls half the defending unit's Defense die, rounding up.
ability_2_desc: When targeted for an attack, Moonlight may utilize any one unit's defensive Special Powers (but no auras) within 4 clear sight spaces.
ability_3_desc: Moonlight may move through all figures and terrain, and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Princess Celestia
ability_1_desc: If you won initiative this round, after revealing Order Marker 1 on this card, the following conditions apply until the start of the next round: • Treat slippery ice, heavy snow, and shadow tiles as normal land tiles. • You may reveal any unoccupied glyphs. • "X" order markers cannot be revealed.
ability_2_desc: If Celestia inflicts at least 2 wounds, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Celestia's movement, ignore elevations. Celestia may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Celestia starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Moria Goblin Captain
ability_1_desc: All friendly Goblins with a range of 1 adjacent to a Moria Goblin Captain receive an additional attack and defense die.
ability_2_desc: A Moria Goblin Captain is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Mordor Uruk-Hai
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Small or Medium Squad figure, a Mordor Uruk-Hai adds 1 to his Attack.
ability_2_desc: Mordor Uruk-Hai roll one additional die when defending against a normal attack from figures with an Attack Value of 3 or less.

name: MOONSHADOW
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking normally, you may choose 3 different small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces fo Moonshadow. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll an 8 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 17 or higher, inflict one wound to that figure and the targeted figure may not move from its current space until the start of the next round. If a targeted figure is adjacent to an evergreen tree, palm tree, or jungle bush then add 3 to whatever is rolled against that figure.

name: Mordor Orcs
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Mordor Orcs, you may first take a turn with any Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Mordor Orc you control attacks an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other Mordor Orc you control, the attacking Mordor Orc rolls one additional die.

name: Moonlight
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 3. Select an opponent's unit to attack. You may attack it twice. For each attack, the opponent rolls half the Defense dice (rounding up).
ability_2_desc: When Moonlight is targeted for an attack, Moonlight may take utilize any one unit's Special Powers (but no Auras), that is within 4 clear sight spaces.
ability_3_desc: Moonlight can move through all figures and terrain (including Destructible Objects, Evergreens, Ruins, etc., and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Morgan Cipher
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Soulborg adjacent to Morgan Cipher is destroyed, you may place 1 silver Metal Marker on this card, up to a maximum of 3. At the beginning of your turn, you may remove a Metal Marker from this card and remove 1 wound marker from this card or the card of any adjacent Soulborg.

name: Master Woo's Disciples
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice or defense dice, Master Woo's Disciples always add one automatic skull or shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Master Woo's Disciples, if at least one Disciple is within 4 clear sight spaces of Master Win Chiu Woo, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher you may take another turn with Master Woo's Disciples.
ability_3_desc: Instead of their normal move, one or both of Master Woo's Disciples may Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for a Disciples' leaping movement, ignore elevations. A Disciple may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. A Disciple may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. If a Disciple is engaged when he starts to leap, he does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Moog'lukt
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, Moog'lukt may use Horrid Croak. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each adjacent opponent's figure. If you roll a 17 or higher remove one unrevealed order marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: Instead of its normal move, Moog'lukt may use Slaad Leap 15. Slaad Leap 15 has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Slaad Leap 15, ignore elevations. Moog'lukt may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Moog'lukt may not leap more than 15 levels up or down in a single leap. If Moog'lukt is engaged when it starts its Slaad Leap 15, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mord-Sith
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If any Mord-Sith causes a wound with Agiel Pain Special Attack, you may remove 1 order marker from the targeted figure's Army Card. You may not remove more than 2 orders markers in a single round.
ability_2_desc: When a Mord-Sith is targeted for a special attack by an opposing Wizard, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take control of the attacking Wizard and that Wizard's Army Card. You now control that Army Card. Remove any Order Markers on this card. If all Mord-Sith are destroyed, you retain control of any previously Captured Wizards.

name: Awoken Land
ability_1_desc: This Awoken Land starts the game in reserve.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure, keep all excess skulls rolled. If the defending figure is destroyed, move this Awoken Land to the space that figure previously occupied and use all excess skulls as an attack against any adjacent figure. You may continue keeping and using excess skulls to attack until there are no figures adjacent to this Awoken Land or until you have no skulls.

name: Ms. Marvel (Kamala Khan)
ability_1_desc: For the rest of the game, before taking a turn with Ms. Marvel (Kamala Khan) or Ms. Marvel (Embiggened), you may replace her figure with that of another Ms. Marvel figure in your army. Move all order markers, wound markers and any other markers from the first card onto the other card and continue your turn using the other card.
ability_2_desc: Any time you place Ms. Marvel (Kamala Khan) on the battlefield, you may remove up to 2 wound markers from this card.
ability_3_desc: Ms. Marvel (Kamala Khan) is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: MORTANIS
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Mortanis, instead of taking Mortanis's turn, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, nothing happens. If you roll 2-6, choose an opponent. That opponent must choose another unit in your army. You must take a turn with that unit. If you roll a 7-19, choose any other unit in your army and take a turn with that unit. If you roll a 20, choose any unit on the battlefield and take a turn with that unit. If you take a turn with an opponent's unit, you control all of that unit's figures for the duration of the turn. At the end of that turn, control of the unit returns to its previous owner. All order markers that were on the unit's Army Card (or Cards if the opponent has more than one card for that unit) will stay on the Army Card.

name: Mister Sinister
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's Mutant that is within 8 clear sight spaces of Mister Sinister is destroyed, place that figure on Mister Sinister's Army Card. At the beginning of each round you may remove your X Order Marker on Mister Sinister and also remove one Mutant from his Army Card. You may choose to add either 1 to the attack, 2 to the defense, or 3 to the move value of each friendly Mutant figure in play for that round. Mister Sinister is affected by Mutant DNA Splicing X.
ability_2_desc: At the end of each round, remove 2 Wound Markers from Mister Sinister's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: If there is at least one Order Marker on Mr. Sinister, opponents may not remove Order Markers from any Army Card you control with any special attack or ability.

name: Multiple Man
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, you may take up to 3 additional consecutive turns with Multiple Man. Reduce the number of additional turns you may take with Multiple Man by one for each Wound Marker on this Army Card. Before taking an additional turn with Multiple Man, place his figure on the same space it began this turn on, or the next closest legal space if the original space is unavailable.
ability_2_desc: If Multiple Man is attacked but receives no wounds from that attack, remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card.

name: Myconid Guard
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different figures within 3 clear sight spaces of any Myconid Guards you control. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If the chosen figure is small or medium and you roll a 14 or higher, it receives 1 wound. If the chosen figure is large or huge and you roll a 17 or higher, it receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Myconid Guard, remove 1 wound marker from all other Myconid Guard Army Cards you control.

name: Mystique
ability_1_desc: When Mystique is adjacent to an opponent's small or medium figure, all opponents' figures must be adjacent to Mystique to attack her. Mystique may attack non-adjacent figures when she is engaged.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Mystique, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may only be targeted as they move into engagement with Mystique.
ability_3_desc: Mystique is never attacked when leaving engagements.

name: Nathalya Silvershield
ability_1_desc: Nathalya Silvershield begins the game with one Sigyn Warning Shot Treasure Glyph on her Army Card. After moving and instead of attacking with Nathalya, you may choose an empty space within 7 clear sight spaces of her and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 4 or higher, place the Sigyn Warning Shot Treasure Glyph power-side up on the chosen space. While that Glyph is power-side up on the field, all friendly figures who follow Sigyn roll one additional die when attacking figures who are within 4 spaces of that Glyph.

name: Necro-Mage Elbda
ability_1_desc: After activating Thralls for the Mindless Pack special power, you may take a turn with one additional Thrall within 5 clear sight spaces of Necro-Mage Elbda.
ability_2_desc: When placing an Undead figure with the special power of any Undead Army Card you control, you may place that figure on any space within 5 clear sight spaces of Necro-Mage Elbda.

name: The Pistons
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, a Piston adds 2 dice.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, each Piston may choose an adjacent figure. Roll the 20-sided die once for each Piston. If you roll: 1-4, that Piston receives a wound. 5-15, both figures may roll an unblockable attack die on each other. 16-19, the chosen figure receives one wound. 20, the chosen figure is destroyed.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move all Pistons again.

name: Nemesa
ability_1_desc: When Nemesa attacks, she receives one extra attack die for each Wound Marker she has. If possible Nemesa must attack a figure that inflicted any amounts of wounds to her.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Nemesa's movement, ignore elevations. Nemesa may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nemesa starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nathaniel Graves
ability_1_desc: Nathaniel Graves does not need clear line of sight to attack with his normal attack. Figures attacked by Nathaniel Graves subtract 2 from their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When Nathaniel Graves is destroyed, you may still reveal order markers on this card as normal. Once per round, after revealing a numbered order marker on this card, you may immediately place Nathaniel Graves on an empty space adjacent to any figure you control, or on an empty space within 4 spaces of a Lawman you control, and remove all Wound Markers on Nathaniel Graves' card. Take a turn with Nathaniel Graves. After taking this turn, destroy Nathaniel Graves.
ability_3_desc: Nathaniel Graves can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: NAZERUD
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 1 + Special. Add 1 additional attack dice for each friendly figure adjacent to Nazerud that have a Valiant personality.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, you may choose any wounded hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Nazerud. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove one wound marker from the chosen hero's army card. Nazerud can use his Draconian Healing Spell on him.
ability_3_desc: Before rolling defense dices, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, move Nazerud 2 spaces. Nazerud will not take any leaving engagement.

name: Nerull's Champion
ability_1_desc: Once per round, after taking a turn with Nerull's Champion, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may choose up to 3 opponent's figures within 3 spaces of Nerull's Champion. Move the chosen figures up to 3 spaces each. Figures moved by Terrible Visage cannot end that movement closer to Nerull's Champion. They do not take leaving engagement attacks, but non-Flying figures will take any falling damage that may apply. Fearless, Undead, and Demon figures are not affected by Terrible Visage.
ability_2_desc: If no other figures you control follow Utgar or Valkrill, destroy Nerull's Champion.

name: Nefereth
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose an opponent's unique hero without the Fearless or Mindless personality to be Stalked by Nefereth. As long as Nefereth is within 5 clear sight spaces of the Stalked figure, that figure subtracts 1 from its attack and defense dice and loses its Class and Personality. Instead, it has the class of Prey and the personality of Cowardly for as long as Nefereth remains within 5 clear sight spaces of it.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Nefereth, if there are any figures with a cowardly personality within 5 clear sight spaces of him, remove 1 wound marker from Nefereth's army card.

name: Nighthawk
ability_1_desc: Nighthawk only has Superstrength and Healing Factor at night.
ability_2_desc: At the start of every round, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, remove one wound from Nighthawk's Army Card.

name: Nhah Of The Inner Circle
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Nhah Of The Inner Circle and roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Dragon or Squad figure, add 2 to your roll. If you roll a 17 or higher, destroy the chosen figure and all Squad figures adjacent to the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: All figures you control who follow Ozirael are never attacked when leaving an engagement. If Nhah is destroyed, all figures you control who follow Ozirael automatically receive a wound when taking a leaving engagement attack.
ability_3_desc: Nhah Of The Inner Circle is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Nickelle
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Nickelle, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Each time Nickelle attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: When Nickelle attacks an adjacent figure, she may attack that figure up to two additional times.

name: Nicolas Cage
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, your opponent must place the Declaration of Independence Treasure Glyph somewhere on a land space. If Nicolas Cage steals the Declaration of Independence, add 1 to his Attack and Defense Values. If another figure possesses the Declaration of Independence, Nicolas Cage adds 2 dice to his attack when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: Small and Medium figures subtract 1 from their defense dice when defending against Nicolas Cage. Small and Medium figures cannot take leaving engagement attacks against Nicolas Cage.
ability_3_desc: Nicolas Cage cannot roll defense dice against bees.

name: Dark Shadows
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, instead of attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. On a 17 or higher, all figures within 6 spaces of the Dark Shadows take 3 wounds.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for movement of any of the Dark Shadows, ignore elevations. The Dark Shadows may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Dark Shadows start to fly, if they is engaged they will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Night Horror
ability_1_desc: Night Horror starts the game with 3 Shriek tokens on his card. After moving and instead of attacking with Night Horror, choose any small or medium squad figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Night Horror. Roll a twenty sided die. On a 14 or more, place a Shriek token on the figures card. The personality trait on that army card is changed to Cowardly as long as the Shriek token is on this card.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a figure is destroyed by an attack from Night Horror, roll the twenty sided die once for each Cowardly figure within 4 clear sight spaces of the destroyed figure. On an 18 or more remove that figure.

name: Nhah Scrih Dragon Slayer
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Nhah Scrih Dragon Slayer, he must attack a Dragon, if possible. This Nhah Scrih Dragon Slayer rolls an additional attack die when attacking a Dragon.
ability_2_desc: This Nhah Scrih Dragon Slayer cannot receive wounds or be destroyed except by normal attacks.
ability_3_desc: If this Nhah Scrih Dragon Slayer ends his normal movement adjacent to one or more small or medium squad figures that are adjacent to an opponent's hero figure that this Nhah Scrih Dragon Slayer is not adjacent to, you may choose one of those squad figures and roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to your die roll if the chosen figure is adjacent to a Dragon. If you roll an 8 or higher, destroy the chosen figure and place this Nhah Scrih Dragon Slayer on the space it occupied, if possible.

name: Nite Owl II
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: When Nite Owl II attacks a figure that is on a shadow tile, add 2 to Nite Owl II's attack.
ability_3_desc: When Nite Owl II rolls defense against a figure that is not adjacent, roll the 20-sided die. If Nite Owl II is on a shadow tile, add 10 to your roll. If you roll a 13 or higher, Nite Owl II has no visible hit zone for the rest of the round.

name: Nissa's Expedition
ability_1_desc: Choose any empty land space within 2 spaces of Nissa. Move Nissa to that space and she cannot be attacked for leaving or entering an engagement for this move. When choosing spaces, Nissa may add 1 space for each friendly figure adjacent to her prior to her move.

name: Nightwing
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Nightwing, you may choose another figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Nightwing and move up to 5 spaces with that figure.
ability_2_desc: When Nightwing attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Nightwing may use Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Nightwing may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. Nightwing may swing up to 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If he is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nure Onna
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one revealed Order Marker on this Army Card, then all adjacent small or medium opposing figures must subtract 2 from their defense.
ability_2_desc: Nure Onna does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces. If Nure Onna occupied a water space at any point during this turn, add 1 to her attack.

name: Nick Fury
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to 3 other Agent figures in your Army. The chosen figures and Nick Fury are the Helicarrier Drop Team. The Drop Team does not start the game on the battlefield. Once per game, before initiative is rolled, you may place the Drop Team on any empty spaces on the battlefield. You cannot place them adjacent to each other or other figures.
ability_2_desc: After revealing a numbered Order Marker on this card and instead of taking a turn normally with Nick Fury, you may immediately choose one Common or Unique Hero you control to take a turn. Nick Fury may be that chosen hero. If the chosen hero is an Agent, you may also take a turn with an Agent Squad you control. You may choose which unit to activate first.
ability_3_desc: For each defense die Nick Fury receives from height advantage or terrain when defending against a non-adjacent attack, he receives one additional defense die.

name: Norixius Kriv
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Norixius Kriv's movement, ignore elevations. Norixius Kriv may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Norixius Kriv starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Norixius Kriv attacks with his normal attack, you may choose one figure that is adjacent to both Norixius Kriv and the defending figure. If the defending figure recieves one or more wounds from Norixius Kriv's normal attack, the chosen figure recieves a wound.

name: Octoroks
ability_1_desc: After an Octorok you control rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 Octoroks you control up to 3 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Octoroks may triple their height.

name: Nordlüng
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. Soulborgs who do not follow Jandar roll one less defense die when attacked by Nordlüng's Shock Rifle Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Nordlüng attacks with his Hoarfrost Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nordlüng's movement, ignore elevations. Nordlüng may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles. When Nordlüng starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: OGRE BRUTE
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to that chosen figure are also affected by this Hammer Smash Special Attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures. Defending figures roll defense dices separately.

name: Ogre Castle Crasher
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may choose a destructible object adjacent to this Ogre Castle Crasher that does not have a Move value. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, nothing happens. If you roll 2-5, the chosen destructible object receives 2 wounds. If you roll 6-11, the chosen destructible object receives 3 wounds. If you roll 12 or higher, the chosen destructible object receives 4 wounds.
ability_2_desc: Once per game, before moving, you may add 5 to this Ogre Castle Crasher's Move number.
ability_3_desc: This Ogre Castle Crasher cannot make leaving engagement attacks against small or medium figures.

name: Ofc. Daniel Maverick
ability_1_desc: If Ofc. Daniel Maverick has height advantage when making a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure, the defending figure rolls 1 fewer defense die.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any non-adjacent figure within 10 clear sight spaces of this figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or 20, the chosen figure is destroyed. If you roll a 1-18, you missed. Ofc. Maverick may not use this special power if he moved this turn.

name: Nordlung
ability_1_desc: Range 8. Attack 4. After attacking a Soulborg or Robot figure with Omnicron Pulse Rifle Special Attack, you may reveal an X Order Marker on this card to remove an unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's card.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Nordlung attacks with his Princeling Ice Shards Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nordlung's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ogre Brutes
ability_1_desc: When any Ogre Brute attacks a small or medium figure, you may add 3 dice to your attack.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Ogre Brutes, you may first take a turn with any Giant hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Ogre Brutes always add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: NORDLUNG
ability_1_desc: Range 8. Attack 4. After attacking a Soulborg figure with Omnicron Pulse Rifle Special Attack, you may reveal an X Order Marker on this card to remove an unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's card (or cards if there is more than one army card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Nordlung attacks with his Princeling Ice Shards Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nordlung's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Obsidian Sentinel
ability_1_desc: Whenever an Obsidian Sentinel is on a land space, those spaces and all same-level adjacent land spaces are now considered lava field spaces. At the end of the round, all figures on lava field spaces must roll one attack die. If a skull is rolled, that figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: Obsidian Sentinels never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Common figures with the Lava Resistant special power that start their turn adjacent to an Obsidian Sentinel may move 2 additional spaces.

name: Ona Skyshot
ability_1_desc: If Ona Skyshot is attacking a non-adjacent figure that has a Flying or Stealth Flying special power, add 2 dice to Ona Skyshot's attack.
ability_2_desc: While moving, Ona Skyshot may add 2 to her move number. If she does, she cannot attack this turn.

name: Ocean Master
ability_1_desc: Ocean Master does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces and never takes leaving engagement attacks while on a water space. After moving, if Ocean Master's entire move was on water spaces this turn, including his starting space, he may move one additional space, as long as that space is a water space.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Ocean Master. Roll the 20-sided die. If Ocean Master is on a water space, add 3 to your roll. If you roll a 12 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. Ocean Master cannot use his Telepathy Special Attack in the same turn that he used Mystic Bolt 12.
ability_3_desc: Range 3. Attack 5. Ocean Master does not need clear line of sight to attack with Telepathy Special Attack.

name: OL' YARSFERD
ability_1_desc: Range 5 Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, Misfire Shot Special Attack does not affect the chosen figure and you must choose a figure adjacent to the chosen figure to be affected by Misfire Shot Special Attack, if possible. Ol' Yarsferd can be affected by his own Misfire Shot Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Ol' Yarsferd is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a figure whose Point Value is equal to or lower than his.

name: Ogumo
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one revealed Order Marker on this Army Card, then all opponents' unengaged figures that could move adjacent to Ogumo may not move unless they end their movement adjacent to Ogumo.
ability_2_desc: Before placing Order Markers each round, you may use Illusion Break. Roll the 20-sided die once for each adjacent opposing figure and then once for Ogumo. If you roll an 11 or higher, that figure receives one wound. After using Illusion Break, choose an opponent. That player must place Ogumo on any empty land space adjacent to a figure that you control, if possible. Ogumo will never take any leaving engagement attacks when using Illusion Break.

name: OIN
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking choose a wounded Hero adjacent to Oin. Roll the 20 sided die and remove Wound Marker's from the chosen figure's card: If you roll, 1-6 nothing happens. If you roll, 7-14 remove one Marker. If you roll, 15-18 remove two Markers. If you roll, 19-20 remove three Markers.
ability_2_desc: After Gloin destroys an opponent's figure, you may move Oin up to 4 spaces.

name: ONI
ability_1_desc: Human Samurai and Ninja roll two less defense dice when defending against a normal attack from this Oni.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Oni, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, while he remains on that space, this Oni has no visible Hit Zone until the next time you reveal an Order Marker.

name: Special Agent Cook
ability_1_desc: Special Agent Cook does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. Add 2 to Special Agent Cook's defense while he is on a water space.
ability_2_desc: Special Agent Cook cannot be targeted by a ranged attack if he is adjacent to any friendly Microcorp agent.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Special Agent Cook becomes engaged with an enemy figure he was previously not engaged with but who is already engaged with any friendly figure, roll 1 attack die. The attacked figure cannot roll defense.

name: Orgle Copperbeard
ability_1_desc: Orgle Copperbeard rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against large or huge figures.
ability_2_desc: Figures never have height advantage on Orgle Copperbeard.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Orgle Copperbeard may double his Height.

name: ORI
ability_1_desc: When Ori attacks a non-adjacent figure that is not engaged, roll one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Dwarf figures adjacent to Ori add 1 die to their defense. Nori and Dori add another die to their defense.

name: Omnicron Spotter
ability_1_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure within 8 clear sight spaces of this Omnicron Spotter with a normal attack, if a Sniper you control does not roll any skulls, you may re-roll all attack dice. This Omnicron Spotter may only use this power once per turn.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with this Omnicron Spotter, you may move 1 Sniper you control up to 5 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to this Omnicron Spotter to target him for a special attack.

name: Orc Archers of Nordin
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 1. Choose a figure to attack. If the chosen figure receives a wound, then place another wound for poison damage.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the first round of a game, after all order markers have been placed, you may move all Orc Archers of Nordin you control up to 5 spaces each. They must end their Orc Battle Rush movement on an empty space.

name: Omega Red
ability_1_desc: If Omega Red moves or attacks this turn but does not inflict at least 1 wound, place 1 wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack 4. When attacking with Coil Whip, Omega Red may attack one additional time. If Omega Red targets the same figure for this additional attack and deals at least 1 wound with each attack, you may choose to either: • place no wounds on the defending figure. Omega Red may remove 1 Wound Marker for each wound not placed in this manner. • roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 5 or higher, the defending figure receives an additional wound. Figures with the Super Strength special power, Androids, and destructible objects are not affected.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice, Omega Red always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Omega-13 Omnicron Crusader
ability_1_desc: All Omnicron Snipers you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Omega-13 add 2 to their range.
ability_2_desc: Attack: 3, Range: 1. This attack affects up to 3 adjacent figures that are also adjacent to each other.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Zeta-5 may perform a Jet-Assisted Leap. Jet-Assisted Leap has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Zeta-5's Jet-Assisted Leap ignore elevations. Zeta-5 may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Zeta-5 may not leap more than 30 levels up or down in a single leap. If Zeta-5 is engaged when he begins his Jet-Assisted Leap, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Otugrak
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Otugrak begin its turn unengaged and ended its turn engaged, then you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-8, nothing happens. If you roll 9-19, roll one additional attack dice. If you roll 20, Otugrak may attack two times.
ability_2_desc: Otugrak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: OWLBEAR
ability_1_desc: Either before moving or after attacking with this Owlbear, you may choose one small or medium figure adjacent to this Owlbear and move that figure one space. Figures moved by Strike Away will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Falling damage will apply for non-Flying figures.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, this Owlbear always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Orc Archers
ability_1_desc: When an Orc Archer attacks a nonadjacent figure, add 1 attack die for each other adjacent Orc Archer up to a maximum of +2 dice for the Volley Attack special power.
ability_2_desc: Orc Archers are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Orwantz
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, Orwantz may choose a small or medium figure that is adjacent, on the same level, and on a space where Orwantz may end his movement. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1–7, the figure is safe and Orwantz's movement ends. If you roll 8–20, the chosen figure receives on wound. If the wound destroys the figure, move Orwantz onto the space occupied, and you may continue Orwantz's movement. If the chosen figure is not destroyed, Orwantz's movement ends. Orwantz must be on a space where he can end movement each time he uses this power.
ability_2_desc: Orwantz ignores any special powers that give automatic shields to Destructible Objects.

name: OZUUL
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Before attacking, one at a time, each non-adjacent small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Ozuul must be placed by its owner on any empty space adjacent to Ozuul, if possible. Figures moved with Gravity Crush do not take any leaving engagement attacks, but non-flying figures will take any falling damage that may apply. All figures adjacent to Ozuul are affected by Crushing Vortex Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Pestilence of Karaloum
ability_1_desc: If the Pestilence of Karaloum ends its movement adjacent to any figures, roll the 20-sided die once for all affected. If you roll a 1-10, all adjacent figures are safe. If you roll 11-15, all adjacent figures receive 1 wound. If you roll 16-19, all adjacent figures receive 2 wounds. If you roll a 20 or higher, all adjacent figures receive 3 wounds. This ability does not affect Soulborgs or Undead.

name: Patcher Pumpkinheads
ability_1_desc: When a Patcher Pumpkinhead wounds a figure with a normal attack, that Pumpkinhead may attack again. Roll one less attack die for each Opportunistic Attack that Pumpkinhead makes in a single turn.
ability_2_desc: After a Patcher Pumpkinhead you control rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 Pumpkinheads you control up to 4 spaces each. Figures moved with Scatter will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: OWLOWISCIOUS
ability_1_desc: While Owlowiscious is flying, you may choose one unoccupied treasure glyph or small figure that he passed over this turn. Place the chosen glyph or figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to Owlowiscious at the end of his move. The chosen figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If Owlowiscious is adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, opponents' figures must be adjacent to him to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Owlowiscious's movement, ignore elevations. Owlowiscious may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Owlowiscious starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Paparazzi
ability_1_desc: Paparazzi can only be drafted by heroscapers.com site members with rep greater than -1
ability_2_desc: When attacking a unique hero controlled by another site member whose rep on heroscapers.com exceeds yours, add 1 to the attack value of this card for every extra green box your opponent has.
ability_3_desc: When a unique hero controlled by an opponent disengages from a paparazzo you control and ends his turn less than the move number of that paparazzo away you may at the end of that hero's turn take a free move with your papparazzo. Relentless pursuit may only be used if your paparazzo end his free move engaged to the same unique hero he was engaged to before.

name: PELAGOS
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Undead and Lycanthrope figures roll one less defense dice against Divine Bullets Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Pelagos attacks with his normal attack he may attack two additional times.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Pelagos's movement, ignore elevations. Pelagos may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Pelagos starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Philibert
ability_1_desc: When moving with Philibert, you may move 2 additional spaces. You most attack an enemy figure with Philibert to use this ability.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 defense dice to Philibert for each friendly Jandar figure adjacent to him.
ability_3_desc: At the end of the round, reveal the "X" order mark on Philibert. Immediately take a turn with Philibert.

name: Piledriver
ability_1_desc: Piledriver can attack normally up to two times per turn.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Piledriver, if Piledriver destroyed a figure or Destructible Object, take a turn with another figure with the Wrecking Crew power you control.

name: Ormathulak
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Ormathulak and before taking a turn with it, you may first take a turn with any other Beholder you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack special. Choose an opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die. •1-7: Searing Ray. Attack 4. •8-11: Terror Ray. Attack 3. The target rolls 2 fewer defense dice. •12-16: Panic Ray. You may move the target and all adjacent enemy figures up to 4 spaces. Panicked figures suffer no disengagement attacks. •17-20: Charm Ray. You may immediately move and attack normally with the target figure, then control returns to the opponent. Charmed figures suffer no disengagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Ormathulak and any other figures within 2 spaces of Ormathulak are immune to special attacks.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for this unit's movement, ignore up to 3 levels of elevation change per hex. This unit may fly over water without stopping.

name: OZIRAEL
ability_1_desc: All figures you control who follow Ozirael within 5 clear sight spaces of Ozirael add 1 to their Attack, Defense, and Move values. If Ozirael is destroyed, destroy all figures you control who follow Ozirael.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose up to three small or medium figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Ozirael and roll the 20-sided die for each figure. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ozirael's movement, ignore elevations. Ozirael can pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Ozirael is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: PEOTOR
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, choose up to 3 figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Peotor. Roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If you roll 13 or higher, inflict one wound on the affected figure. If the figure is a Robot or Soulborg, inflict one extra wound. You must place any Small or Medium affected figure on any empty space up to 2 clear sight spaces from its original space. Figures moved with Magnetic Throw never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Peotor may double his Height.

name: Peregrin Took
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. Pippin may not use his Stone Throw Special Attack against Large or Huge figures.
ability_2_desc: When moving up and down levels of terrain, Pippin may double his height.

name: Peri the Kyrie
ability_1_desc: After a friendly figure with a Range of 1 within 5 clear sight spaces of Peri attacks normally, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure may attack normally again. Battle Frenzy Aura does not affect figures with the Frenzy, Battle Frenzy, or Rabid Frenzy special power.
ability_2_desc: After an opponent's figure attacks Peri normally, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure may attack Peri again, if possible.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Peri's movement, ignore elevations. Peri may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Peri starts to fly, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Phoenix
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. After attacking normally, Phoenix may attack with Firebird Special Attack. Any figure adjacent to Phoenix is affected by Firebird Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures.
ability_2_desc: Phoenix may pick up a destructible object within 4 clear sight spaces.
ability_3_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Phoenix's movement, ignore elevations. She may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When she starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Precitus Walkers
ability_1_desc: Precitus Walkers cannot attack nonadjacent figures that are 2-4 spaces away from that Walker.
ability_2_desc: Precitus Walkers may move through small and medium figures and never take leaving engagement attacks from small and medium figures after moving at least one space.
ability_3_desc: When moving up terrain levels of 2 or less, Precitus Walkers may ignore elevations. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Precitus Walkers must subtract 5 from their height.

name: Predatron
ability_1_desc: When this Predatron rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Predatron's movement, Predatron may ignore up to 4 levels of elevation or pass over 2 water spaces. You may only use this power once during a turn.

name: Prince Al'Kahora
ability_1_desc: If Prince al'Kahora did not move this turn, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Prince al'Kahora, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Prince al'Kahora at the start of this turn, the defending figure rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: Team Rocket Jesse & James
ability_1_desc: Once per round, when Team Rocket is attacked, they may immediately attempt a counterattack. If both Jessie and James are adjacent to the attacking figure, roll an additional attack die for each of them.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, Team Rocket may choose one enemy figure within 4 spaces. Roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 14 or higher, that figure's defense is reduced by 1 until the end of the round.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, during Team Rocket's turn, you may declare "Blast Off!" as a free action. For the rest of the round, Team Rocket may move 5 additional spaces, and all attacks made by Team Rocket that turn gain +1 attack die. At the end of the turn, Team Rocket is placed back in their starting zone.

name: Practical Incarnation
ability_1_desc: Immediately after revealing a numbered Order Marker on any Army Card you control, you may remove a wound marker from this card. At the end of the round, you may reveal an 'X' Order Marker on this card to remove one wound marker.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Practical Incarnation would receive any wounds from an attack, you may instead choose to inflict those wounds on any friendly Tormented figure adjacent to Practical Incarnation.
ability_3_desc: When an Army Card you control has all of its figures destroyed, you may reveal an 'X' Order Marker on this card - if you do, you may immediately remove any unrevealed Order Markers from that card and place them on any other card you control.

name: Charmeleon
ability_1_desc: When this Charmeleon attacks an adjacent figure with a normal attack, add 1 die to this Charmeleon's Attack for each Wound Marker on its Army Card, up to a maximum of 3 dice for Rage.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves onto a space within 2 clear sight spaces of this Charmeleon, roll a 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Scary Face.

name: Pumpkinhead
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose small or medium Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of this Pumpkinhead. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, inflict as many wounds as half of the chosen Hero's remaining Life. Pumpkin Smash must always inflict at least one wound if a 11 or higher is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When a Pumpkinhead is destroyed, you may remove all wound markers from other Pumpkinheads you control within 3 clear sight spaces of the destroyed Pumpkinhead.

name: Poxi Vespimic
ability_1_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Poxi VesPimic. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Soulborgs are not affected by Toxic Skin.
ability_2_desc: After rolling the 20-sided die, for a special power on the card of an Insect or Arachnid you control, you may reveal the 'X' Order Marker on this card. If you do, ignore the result rolled and roll the 20-sided die again.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Poxi VesPimic's movement, ignore elevations. Poxi VesPimic may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Poxi VesPimic starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Psionic Monks
ability_1_desc: When revealing an order marker on a Psionic Monks Army Card, after taking a turn with the Psionic Monks, you may choose any Unique Hero figure you control within 3 clear sight spaces of both Psionic Monks that moved that turn. Immediately take a turn with that Hero. Psychic Link does not affect Soulborgs or Constructs.
ability_2_desc: When a Psionic Monk rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice to the defense roll.

name: Pidgey
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with a Pidgey, you may choose one small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 5 levels above or below that Pidgey's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, move the chosen figure up to 4 spaces. The targeted figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks during its movement.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Pidgey's movement, ignore elevations. Pidgey may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Pidgey starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Princess Feylunda
ability_1_desc: Feylunda starts the game with 5 magic counters on her card. At the beginning of each round you may place another magic counter on this card to a maximum of 5.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking you may remove 2 magic counters from this card. All flying figures lose their flight ability for 1 full round.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Remove 1 magic counter from this card. Lightning Strike can affect up to 3 figures at a time; affected figures must all be within range and line of sight. Roll 3 attack dice once, all affected figures roll defense dice separately.
