ability_4_desc: Instead of attacking you may remove 3 magic counters from this card, and cast Fog on any friendly figure with life. All the affected figures cannot be attacked by non-adjacent figures for 2 full rounds.

name: PIKACHU
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving and attacking normally, this Pikachu may use Agility. While using Agility, this Pikachu adds 3 to its movement and may make a normal attack once before, during, or after its movement. While using Agility, this Pikachu is never attacked while leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When this Pikachu attacks with its Thunderbolt Special Attack, it may attack one additional time. This Pikachu may target the same or a different figure with each attack.
ability_3_desc: When this Pikachu rolls defense dice against an opponent's attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 dice to this Pikachu's defense.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this Pikachu may double its height.

name: ABRA
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving this Abra normally, you may choose any empty space that is within 8 spaces of this Abra. Place this Abra on the chosen space. When this Abra starts to Teleport, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If this Abra is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 1-8, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 9 or higher, this Abra takes no damage and may immediately use Teleport. Abra can flee only if it ends its teleporting move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_3_desc: When one or more order marker is removed from this Abra from an opposing figure's special power, you may remove one unrevealed order marker at random from the opposing figure's Army Card. When this Abra receives a status effect marker, you may place one status marker of the same type on the opposing figure.

name: Power Infinity Gem
ability_1_desc: This figure gains Super Strength.
ability_2_desc: If this figure has the Infinity Gauntlet, place this glyph on the Infinity Gauntlet's card and add 1 to this figure's Attack.

name: SANDSHREW
ability_1_desc: If this Sandshrew does not attack this turn, you may add 1 die to its defense until the start of its next turn.
ability_2_desc: When this Sandshrew or any friendly figure that is adjacent to this Sandshrew is targeted by a normal attack from an opponent's figure within 2 clear sight spaces of this Sandshrew, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the targeting figure cannot attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: If this Sandshrew begins its turn on a rock, sand, or grass space, instead of moving normally, you may place it on any empty rock, sand, or grass space that is within 5 spaces of this Sandshrew and is no more than 4 levels above or 3 levels below this Sandshrew's base. If this Sandshrew is engaged when it starts Tunneling, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Scyther
ability_1_desc: You may add 3 dice to this Scyther's Attack and subtract 3 spaces from this Scyther's Move. This Scyther may not use Sword Dance if it used the Stealth Flying special power this turn.
ability_2_desc: Attack 1. Range 1. When this Scyther attacks with its Fury Cutter Special Attack, it may attack 3 additional times and each skull rolled counts for one additional hit. This Scyther may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Scyther's movement, ignore elevations. A Scyther may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Scyther starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Punisher
ability_1_desc: Punisher rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against Criminals.
ability_2_desc: When Punisher attacks with his normal attack, he may attack up to 2 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Hand Grenades Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Quinton Kask
ability_1_desc: When Quinton Kask attacks normally, he must attack two additional times, if possible.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure defends against an attack by Quinton Kask and does not receive any wounds, that opponent may immediately move Quinton up to 3 spaces. Falling damage will apply. Quinton will not take any leaving engagement attacks while moving with Stumble Swing.

name: Queen Qhyrion
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with Queen Qhyrion, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, a figure attacked by Queen Qhyrion may roll no more than one die for defense.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Queen Qhyrion's movement, ignore elevations. Queen Qhyrion may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Queen Qhyrion starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Quicksilver
ability_1_desc: Quicksilver may move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Quicksilver is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Quicksilver does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Quicksilver may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Quicksilver attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Quicksilver is on a space where he could end his movement.

name: Quetzal Coatl
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one unrevealed Order Marker on Quetzalcoatl, all Vipers you control add 1 to their normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When Quetzalcoatl rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 5 defense dice to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Quetzalcoatl's movement, ignore elevations. Quetzalcoatl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Quetzalcoatl starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Queen Bethesda
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, before taking a turn with Queen Bethesda you may either take a turn with a Squad of Human Knights you control, or take a turn with up to two Human Champions you control.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack on a Unique Hero that began the game with 5 or more Life, Queen Bethesda adds 1 skull to whatever is rolled. A King, Queen, Lord, or Lady rolls 2 fewer defense dice against a normal attack from Queen Bethesda.
ability_3_desc: After a figure you control is destroyed, if there are any Champions on that figure's Army Card, you may place them on this card.

name: Queen Odonata
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure within clear sight moves onto a space within 2 spaces of Queen Odonata, you may place one wound marker on this card. If you do, that figure must end its move there. Figures may never move through any figure affected by Wall of Thorns.
ability_2_desc: When an Insect you control moves, it may add 2 to its Move number as long as it is able to move adjacent to Queen Odonata. If it does, it must move adjacent to Queen Odonata if possible.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Queen Odonata's movement, ignore elevations. Queen Odonata may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Queen Odonata starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: QFP
ability_1_desc: QFPs do not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, they are placed when Hala Jax uses the QFP Cloaking Device. A QFP may not attack and has no visible hit zone. If a QFP would take a wound, it is not destroyed. Instead, place that figure on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When a QFP and another figure become engaged, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or less, place that QFP on this card. A QFP is only affected by Detected as it moves into engagement with a figure, or as another figure moves into engagement with that QFP.
ability_3_desc: If only one QFP figure remains on the battlefield, you must immediately place it on this card and replace it with Hala Jax. If that QFP would have received any wounds, Hala Jax will receive them instead. Transfer all Order Markers from this card to Hala Jax's Army Card.

name: Radagast The Brown
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose a wounded hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Radagast. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove one Wound Marker from the chosen Hero's Army Card. Radagast can use Herblore on himself.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Radagast. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.

name: RAM THRALLS
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Ram Thralls, you may first take a turn with any Skull you control. Before moving the chosen Skull, you may destroy one adjacent Ram Thralls you control. If you destroy a Ram Thrall with Skull Life Bonding, remove 1 Wound Marker from the chosen Skull's Army Card.

name: Quintus Valerius Arius
ability_1_desc: All Archers you control with a Range number of 4 or more add 1 space to their range.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Archers adjacent to Quintus Valerius Arius receive an additional defense die.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3 + Special. When Quintus attacks with Combined Volley Special Attack, add 1 to Quintus's attack dice for every unengaged Archer figure with a Range number of 6 or more you control within 6 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure that has a clear line of sight on the targeted figure, up to a maximum of +3 dice.

name: "Shush" Slickshiv
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on "Shush" Slickshiv's Army Card, before taking his turn, you may take a turn with one other Wayfarer you control.
ability_2_desc: If "Shush" Slickshiv is adjacent to 3 or more small or medium figures, he has no hit zone.
ability_3_desc: If "Shush" Slickshiv is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to "Shush"'s attack.

name: Raalchu
ability_1_desc: Raalchu can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: When attacking Raalchu may use the attack value of an adjacent freindly figure instead of his own. When defending Raalchu may use the defense value of an adjacent friendly figure instead of his own.
ability_3_desc: You may place a wound marker on Raalchu. If you do, choose an adjacent opposing figure. You may immediately take a turn with that figure. Do not use this ability if Raalchu has 3 life or less.

name: Toxic Skull
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. If this Toxic Skull inflicts at least 1 wound with Toxic Strike Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die for poison damage. If you roll 1-11, the defending figure receives no additional wound for Poison Damage. If you roll 11-20, add 1 additional Wound Marker to the defending figure's Army Card, and roll again for Poison Damage.

name: Undying Skull
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with this Undying Skull, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Undying Skull's Army Card and any adjacent Necromancer you control.
ability_2_desc: When this Undying Skull attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to this Undying Skull. If the defending figure receives any wounds from this Undying Skull's attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.

name: Rangers Of Ithilien
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Rangers Of Ithilien, you may first take a turn with any Champion you control who is from Gondor.
ability_2_desc: If a Ranger Of Ithilien you control is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and the Ranger Of Ithilien. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 19 or higher, ignore any wounds the Ranger Of Ithilien just received.

name: Rainbow Dash
ability_1_desc: Once per game, Rainbow Dash may use Sonic Rainboom. After moving normally with Rainbow Dash, you may place her on any empty space with 10 spaces of her current location. All friendly figures in clear sight of Rainbow Dash when she begins her Sonic Rainboom may add 2 to their Move, Attack, and Defense numbers for the rest of the round.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Rainbow Dash's movement, ignore elevations. Rainbow Dash may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Rainbow Dash starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: You may treat the space under Rainbow Dash as a water space.

name: Rastghoul the Abomination
ability_1_desc: All friendly undead warriors adjacent to Rastghoul gain +2 Attack dice.
ability_2_desc: All figures, excluding the undead, within 3 spaces of Rastghoul must roll the 20-sided die before their turn. If they roll a 1, they are destroyed. If they roll a 2-6, they may not move or attack this turn. If they roll a 7-11, they may not attack Rastghoul this turn. If they roll a 12-19, they may move and attack normally. If they roll a 20, they are no longer subject to the effects of Deadly Fear.

name: The Reaper King
ability_1_desc:
Instead of taking a turn with The Reaper King, you may take a turn with one of the following that you control:

• Any 1 Skeletal Minion.
• Any 1 Skeletal Thrall squad.
• Any 1 Skeletal Horde squad.

Any figure in the above list which takes a turn instead of Reaper King must be within clear sight of The Reaper King before moving.

name: Raptor
ability_1_desc: While Raptor is flying, choose one enemy Small or Medium figure that he passed over this turn. After moving, place that figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to Raptor. Figures moved by Talon Grab will not take passing swipes. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Talon Grab.
ability_2_desc: If Raptor is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the d20. If you roll 12+, Raptor takes no damage and may move up to 4 spaces. Raptor can vanish only if he ends this move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Raptor's movement, ignore elevations, terrain effects, figures, and obstacles. Raptor will take passing swipes when he starts to fly

name: Reapers
ability_1_desc: During his attack phase, a Reaper may attack all figures in range. If he chooses to attack all rather than a single figure, that would include friendly units that might be in range.
ability_2_desc: Any figure eliminated by the Reapers may not return to the board by means of any special ability or glyph.

name: Rayne Blackheart
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Rayne Blackheart, before taking a turn with Rayne, you may first take a turn with up to 2 Lesser Demons you control.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Rayne Blackheart, you may choose an adjacent same-level space. Roll the 20-sided die and add 1 to your die roll for every Cultist that is on the same level and is adjacent to the chosen space. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may place one of your previously destroyed Lesser Demons on the chosen space. You may then take a turn with that Demon.

name: Raugloth
ability_1_desc: After Raugloth rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure that is not adjacent and does not receive any wounds, you may move Raugloth up to 5 spaces. If Raugloth ends this movement adjacent to the attacking figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: Instead of Raugloth's normal move, he may move only one space. This space may be up to 15 levels higher or lower than his current space.
ability_3_desc: Raugloth is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Ravenous Ooze
ability_1_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to the Ravenous Ooze. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, if a small or medium figure on an adjacent same-level space as this Ravenous Ooze is destroyed, you may place it onto that space, if possible. Remove one wound from this card. If it s engaged before moving with Ravenous Devouring, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Ravenous Ooze's movement, elevation changes up to 3 levels count as one space. You may ignore its height of 4 when climbing. The Ravenous Ooze never takes falling damage or major falling damage.

name: RAY
ability_1_desc: When the Ray, or any friendly figure that is adjacent to the Ray, is targeted for a normal or special attack from a non-adjacent opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the Ray and all friendly figures adjacent to him no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: When the Ray rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Ray's movement, ignore elevations. The Ray may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Ray starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ninja of the Northern Wind
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a figure that is not adjacent to this Ninja, one shield will block all hits.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with this Ninja, if the defending figure is not adjacent to any of your figures other than the attacking Ninja, add 2 dice to your attack.

name: Reborn Knights
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with the Reborn Knights, you may take a turn with a squad of Phantom Knights you control.
ability_2_desc: When a Phantom Knight you control destroys an enemy figure, you may replace that Phantom Knight with one of your own previously destroyed Reborn Knights.

name: Red Chuchus
ability_1_desc: All Guards you control move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Red Chuchus may double their height.

name: REGORTAR
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Regortar always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When Regortar attacks, he receives one extra attack dice for each wound marker he has.

name: Reaper of Bleakwoode
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Soul Devour power on any Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If a Shade of Bleakwoode you control within clear sight is destroyed by Soul Devour, place it on this card. Before taking a turn with the Reaper of Bleakwoode, you may remove any number of Shades from this card. For each Shade removed, you may either remove 2 wound markers from this card, or add 2 to its Attack number for the rest of the turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Reaper of Bleakewoode's movement, ignore elevations. It may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Reaper of Bleakwoode starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Reaper of Bleakwoode
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Soul Devour power on any Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an adjacent opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 for each other Undead figure engaged with the chosen figure. If you roll 13-17, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. If you roll 18-19, the chosen figure receives 3 wounds. If you roll a 20 or higher, the chosen figure is destroyed. Deathly Touch does not effect Soulborgs or Constructs.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Reaper of Bleakewoode's movement, ignore elevations. It may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Reaper of Bleakewoode starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Red Lioness
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill, Red Lioness receive 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: All small, medium, or large figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Red Lioness add 1 to their defense dice when rolling defense against an attack from a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill. Red Lioness's Greater Protection from Evil Aura does not affect Red Lioness.

name: Retiarius
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, any small or medium figure attacked by Retiarius this turn may roll no more than 1 die for defense.

name: Reaper of Bleakwoode
ability_1_desc: After rolling the 20-sided die for any special power on a Devourer Army Card you control, if at least one figure on that Army Card is within 4 clear sight spaces of the Reaper of Bleakwoode you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card to either add 1 to or subtract 1 from the result.
ability_2_desc: Figures attacked by the Reaper of Bleakwoode roll 2 fewer defense dice. If that attack causes enough wounds to destroy a figure, you may remove one wound marker from this card. Destructible objects are not affected by Soul Reaper.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Reaper of Bleakewoode's movement, ignore elevations. It may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Reaper of Bleakwoode starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Rendar Fy
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if Rendar Fy did not move this turn, he may either add 3 to his Range or attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Rendar Fy is attacking with a height advantage, he rolls an additional attack die.

name: Red Guardian
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Red Guardian. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Red Guardian, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Red Guardian at the start of this turn, any die result that is not a shield counts as a skull. Red Guardian cannot use Rushing Assault if he used Belt Buckle Disc this turn.

name: Red Ghost
ability_1_desc:
When revealing an order marker on Red Ghost, you may take a turn with one of the following that you control:
- Red Ghost and an Ape Hero, or
- 2 Ape Heroes.
Any Ape Hero that is taking a turn with this power must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Red Ghost before moving.
ability_2_desc: When Red Ghost rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Red Ghost may use Ghost Tunnel. Choose any space within 3 spaces of Red Ghost and place him on that space. If Red Ghost is engaged when he starts to Ghost Tunnel, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: QUINJET
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If a figure picks up this Quinjet, place a wound marker on that figure's card. If this Quinjet is used to attack an adjacent figure, instead of destroying this Quinjet, place 4 wound markers on this Quinjet's card. When this Quinjet is used to attack a figure, roll one unblockable attack die against each figure adjacent to the targeted figure, except the attacking figure.

name: Raelin Statue
ability_1_title: Flight of the Valkyrie Special Attack
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 6. Instead of attacking with a superstrength Hero which is adjacent to the Raelin Statue, the Hero may perform the Flight of the Valkyrie Special Attack. If the attacked figure is destroyed, place the statue on the space the figure occupied. If the attacked figure is not destroyed, remove the Raelin Statue from the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: After moving a chosen large, huge, or superstrength Hero which was adjacent to the Raelin Statue, you may place the Statue next to the chosen Hero.

name: REILOR
ability_1_desc: Common figures roll one fewer attack dice when attacking Reilor with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Reilor starts each game with up to 4 water tiles on his Army Card. If Reilor ends his movement on an empty land space, you may place a water tile from his Army Card onto the space he occupies if the water tile fits normally onto that space.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Reilor's movement, ignore elevations. Reilor does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space. Reilor can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Rhaven Hellsing
ability_1_desc: Rhaven Hellsing rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against an Undead figure.
ability_2_desc: If Rhaven Hellsing is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 dice to his attack.
ability_3_desc: After attacking an adjacent figure, if Rhaven Hellsing is unengaged, he may attack one additional time.

name: Reptile Masters of Thesk
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Reptile Masters of Thesk, if Reptile Masters of Thesk destroyed at least one opponent's figure this turn, you may immediately take a turn with one Behemoth you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack Special. Each time you attack with a Reptile Master of Thesk's Hacking Blades Special Attack, you may choose to roll 1, 2, or 3 attack dice. If a skull is rolled on every die, you may attack again with that Reptile Master of Thesk's Hacking Blades Special Attack. You may continue attacking with this Reptile Master of Thesk's Hacking Blades Special Attack until you do not roll a skull on every die.

name: Rettug Gargoyles
ability_1_desc: When attacking or defending with a height advantage, a Rettug Gargoyle rolls one additional die.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Rettug Gargoyles always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Rettug Gargoyle's movement, ignore elevations. Rettug Gargoyles may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Rettug Gargoyle starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Riders Of Rohan - Bows
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Riders Of Rohan, you may first take a turn with any Champion you control from Rohan.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure that is adjacent to at least one Rohan Champion you control, Riders Of Rohan add 1 to their attack dice.

name: Cpl. Remington
ability_1_desc: If Cpl. Remington has 1 or more wounds on his Army Card, add 1 to his attack dice and 1 to his move number. If Cpl Remington has 3 or more wounds on his Army Card, his personality becomes Ferocious, and he must attack all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When defending against a non-adjacent Soldier figure you control, opponent's figures roll one less defense die if they are engaged to Cpl. Remington. Tactical Diversion is negated if Cpl Remington has 3 or more wounds on his Army Card.
ability_3_desc: If Cpl. Remington has 3 or more wounds on his Army Card, and a small or medium figure moves adjacent to Cpl. Remington, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the figure receives one wound.

name: Rime Hound
ability_1_desc: If this Rime Hound starts its turn unengaged and on at least one snow or ice space, for this turn add 1 to this Rime Hound's movement and add 3 to his attack value.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Rime Hound, if he is on at least one snow or ice space, remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card.

name: RICEL
ability_1_desc: Range 4 Attack 3. Choose up to three figures to attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. If all defending figures are on the same type of space, then those figures roll one less defense die against Transmute Terrain Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a Unique Hero your opponent controls within 6 clear sight spaces of Ricel. You may change either that figure's Species, Class, or Personality to whatever you like for the duration of the game. Transmute Enemy may only be used once per game.

name: Riddler
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one Order Marker on this Army Card, any time you are about to reveal a numbered Order Marker on any of your Army Cards, choose an opponent. The chosen opponent must guess which unrevealed Order Marker you are about to reveal. If your opponent guesses correctly, take your turn as normal. If your opponent guesses incorrectly, any figure you control within clear sight of Riddler, including Riddler, may re-roll one die for each normal attack it makes this turn.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, after taking your first turn, you may rearrange your remaining unrevealed Order Markers.

name: Lt. Riza Hawkeye
ability_1_desc: If Riza Hawkeye did not move this turn, you may add 3 to her range and add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled when she attacks a non-adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: If you do not use Sniper Targeting this turn, if Riza Hawkeye attacks a figure within 4 clear sight spaces, she may attack one additional time as long as she attacks a figure within 4 clear sight spaces.

name: Rhea of Brisis
ability_1_desc: If Rhea of Brisis is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and receives 1 or more wounds, you may destroy a small or medium Undead figure you control that is adjacent to Rhea of Brisis to ignore any wounds Rhea of Brisis just received.
ability_2_desc: When a large or huge unique figure is destroyed within 8 clear sight spaces of Rhea of Brisis, place that figure on this Army Card. If Order Marker 1 is placed on Rhea of Brisis, before taking a turn with her roll the 20-sided die for each figure on this Army Card. If you roll a 19 or higher, you may, if possible, place one of your previous destroyed Skull figure on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces. After placing a Skull figure, remove a figure from this Army Card.

name: Rocket & Groot
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Rocket & Groot may attack 2 additional times with Rocket Raccoon Special Attack. While engaged, Rocket & Groot may target and attack non-adjacent figures with their Rocket Raccoon Special Attack. Rocket & Groot cannot attack using their Rocket Raccoon Special Attack when there are 4 or more Wound Markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: If there are 4 or more Wound Markers on this card, Rocket & Groot may add 1 space to their range and attack 1 additional time with their normal attack.

name: Ronin
ability_1_desc: When attacking, add 1 attack die for every Ashigaru and Samurai that is adjacent to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Ashigaru adjacent to a Ronin receive an additional defense die.

name: Reven the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: After Reven the Kyrie Warrior moves with the Flying special power, instead of attacking, you may roll one unblockable attack die against each figure he passed over that does not have the Lava Resistant special power.
ability_2_desc: Range 2 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose 3 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces are also affected by this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by this special attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Reven's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When he starts to fly, if Reven is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ringwraith
ability_1_desc: After attacking with this Ringwraith, if it did not use its full movement this turn, it may move a number of spaces equal to its remaining move.
ability_2_desc: Whenever an opponent's figure leaves engagement with this Ringwraith, after that figure ends its movement you may immediately move this Ringwraith up to 8 spaces. This Ringwraith must be able to move adjacent to that figure in order to use Persistent Assault.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Ringwraith's movement, ignore elevations. This Ringwraith can fly over water, fly over figures, and pass over obstacles. When this Ringwraith starts to fly, it will not receive any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Royal Guard
ability_1_desc: If Emporer Palpatine is adjacent and is the target of a normal attack, this unit may roll defense and take the damage instead.

name: Roman Leget
ability_1_desc: All friendly archers squad figures within 3 sight spaces of this Roman Leget receive an additional defense die and may add 1 space to their Range number.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move Roman Leget again.

name: Rohan Elite Guards
ability_1_desc: When any Rohan Elite Guard you control, or any figure you control that is adjacent to any Rohan Elite Guard you control, is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, all Rohan Elite Guards you control, and all figures you control that are adjacent to those Guards, no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.

name: ROC
ability_1_desc: While this Roc is flying, you may choose one opponent's small, medium, or large figure that he passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to this Roc at the end of his move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Talon Grab, it will not take any leaving-engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Talon Grab.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Roc's movement, ignore elevations. This Roc may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Roc starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Riders Of Harad
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Riders Of Harad, you may first take a turn with any Warlord you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure that is adjacent to any Warlord you control, Riders Of Harad add 2 to their attack dice.

name: Card Soldiers
ability_1_desc: When a Card Soldier is destroyed, you may place one previously destroyed Card Soldier figure on any empty space within 3 spaces of the destroyed Card Soldier's space.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with a Card Soldier, if the defending figure receives at least 1 wound, you may move any number of Card Soldiers up to 2 spaces each.

name: Guenhwyvar
ability_1_desc: Guenhwyvar does not start the game on the battlefield. She must be summoned onto the battlefield by Drizzt Do'Urden.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an order marker on Drizzt Do'Urden's card, if 3 or more enemy figures are adjacent to Drizzt Do'Urden and Guenhwyvar is on the battlefield, you may immediately either move or attack with her.
ability_3_desc: Range 3, Attack 1, 2, 3, or 4. Instead of moving, Guenhwyvar may choose a non-adjacent figure within 3 clear site spaces whose base is not higher than 5 levels from the base of Guenhwyvar. Roll for falling damage when applicable. If she survives, roll the # of attack dice based on the opponent's size: 4 if small, 3 if medium, 2 if large, and 1 if huge. The opponent may not roll for Defense. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place Guenhwyvar on the space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, destroy Guenhwyvar.
ability_4_desc: If Guenhwyvar is killed, Drizzt Do'Urden's Scimitar Dance Special Attack Attack Value becomes 4, which may be used up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after that move.

name: Rune Warrior
ability_1_desc: All Wolf figures you control within 6 clear sight spaces of this Rune Warrior add 1 to their defense dice. This Rune Warrior's Extended Defensive Aura does not affect this Rune Warrior.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Wolf figures and start their turn adjacent to this Rune Warror may move 2 additional spaces.

name: Rutgar Van Blum
ability_1_desc: You may add 5 to your die roll when you roll for the Cut and Run special power on any Army Card.
ability_2_desc: All Warriors you control move one additional space.

name: Rory Williams
ability_1_desc: Rory Williams may be considered to be a Warlord in addition to his normal class. Rory Williams adds 1 to his defense for each adjacent figure you control with the Shield Wall special power on its Army Card, up to +2 for The Last Centurion.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose a friendly figure adjacent to Rory Williams and remove 1 Wound Marker from its Army Card. If that figure is Human, you may remove an additional Wound Marker.
ability_3_desc: When making a normal attack on a figure engaged with a friendly Time Lord or another friendly Companion you control, Rory Williams rolls 2 additional attack dice.

name: Col. Roy Mustang
ability_1_desc: All soldiers you control move one additional Space.
ability_2_desc: When Col. Mustang attacks a non adjacent figure and inflicts one or more wounds, that figure receives one additional wound. Col. Mustang rolls one fewer attack die when attacking a figure with the Lava Resistant Special Power and may not use Pinpoint Accuracy or inflict additional wounds with Flame Alchemy on that figure.
ability_3_desc: When Col. Mustang attacks a figure, you may reroll all attack dice which did not show skulls. Pinpoint Accuracy can be used only once for each attack roll.
ability_4_desc: While Col. Mustang is on a water space, he rolls 2 fewer attack dice and may not use any other special power on this Army Card.

name: Ameiko Kaijitsu
ability_1_desc: Opponent's figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Ameiko Kaijitsu subtract one defense when attacked by non-adjacent figures.
ability_2_desc: Ameiko Kaijitsu is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Rorschach
ability_1_desc: Instead of Rorschach's normal move, he may move only one space. This space may be up to 25 levels higher. When using the Grapple Gun, all engagement rules still apply.
ability_2_desc: Criminal figures roll 1 fewer defense die against Rorschach's normal attack.
ability_3_desc: After attacking an opponent's adjacent figure with a normal attack, if the defending figure is still engaged with Rorschach, your opponent may immediately reveal and remove one unrevealed Order Marker from any Army Card that opponent controls. If your opponent does not reveal and remove an Order Marker, Rorschach may attack one additional time, adding 1 die to his Attack number. Figures with the Super Strength special power are not affected by Shakedown.

name: Samwise Gamgee
ability_1_desc: Samwise is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_title: I Can't Carry It For You
ability_2_desc: When rolling for Corruption Damage for Frodo's One Ring ability, you may subtract 1 from whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When moving up and down levels of terrain, Sam may double his height.

name: Saint Anna
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a wounded figure adjacent to Saint Anna. Then roll the 20-sided die to add or remove wound markers from the chosen figure's card: * If you roll a 1, add 2 markers. * If you roll 2-5, remove 1 marker. * If you roll 6-17, remove up to 2 markers. * If you roll 18-20, remove all markers.

name: Baelon
ability_1_desc: After attacking, roll a 20-sided die. If you roll 10 or lower Baelon takes one wound.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Baelon's movement, ignore elevations. Baelon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Baelon starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sahuagin Baron
ability_1_desc: When Sahuagin Baron attacks it may attack up to three additional times. Sahuagin Baron may not attack the same figure more than twice.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Sahuagin Baron attacks an opposing figure and does not inflict a wound you may immediately take a turn with a Raider you control.
ability_3_desc: While Sahuagin Baron is on a water space add 2 to it's defense. If a Sahuagin Baron starts its turn on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. Sahuagin Baron does not have to stop it's movement when entering a water space.

name: Samurai of the Sun
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Samurai of the Sun attacks or blocks an adjacent enemy, add one automatic skull or sheild to their roll.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.
ability_3_desc: A Samurai of the Sun may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: Rupert Giles
ability_1_desc: When the 20-sided die is rolled for a special power on an opponent's Undead or Demon Army Card, and at least one of the figures from that Army Card is within 4 clear sight spaces of Giles, subtract 3 from the die roll.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with a Slayer you control, if there is at least one unrevealed Order Marker on this card, you may choose a different small or medium Hero you control who is not a Slayer and does not follow Utgar or Valkrill. Giles may be the chosen Hero. Immediately take a turn with the chosen Hero.
ability_3_desc: If Giles receives any number of wounds but is not destroyed, you may remove him from the battlefield and place him on this card. Remove all Order Markers from this card. At the end of a round in which Giles was Knocked Out, you must either place him on an empty same-level space adjacent to a figure you control, or destroy Giles.

name: Samwise Gamgee
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Samwise Gamgee's card, but before taking a turn with him, you may first take a turn with any other Hobbit or Halfling Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose another Unique Hero you control. If the chosen Hero has one or more Wound Markers on its card or is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die after taking a turn with Samwise Gamgee. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may take another turn with Samwise Gamgee.

name: Chiaki Yoshimitsu
ability_1_desc: If Chiaki Yoshimitsu is adjacent to at least one other Samurai you control, add 1 die to the attack of Chiaki Yoshimitsu and all Samurai you control adjacent to Chiaki Yoshimitsu.
ability_2_desc: If a friendly figure within 3 clear site spaces of Chiaki Yoshimitsu is destroyed by an attack from an adjacent figure, you may replace the destroyed figure with Chiaki Yoshimitsu. If you do, roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher the attacking figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a Normal Attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work on other Samurai.

name: Sanaris
ability_1_desc: When Sanaris rolls defense dice against an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: If Sanaris is attacked by a non-adjacent figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to blink. If you roll 1–8, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 9 or higher, Sanaris takes no damage and must immediately move, if possible, adjacent to the attacking figure. If Sanaris cannot move adjacent to the attacking figure, roll defense dice normally.

name: Samara the Kyrie Sentinel
ability_1_desc: At the end of an opponent's turn, if an opponent's figure is within 4 clear sight spaces of Samara the Kyrie Sentinel, you may move an unrevealed Order Marker from one Army Card you control to another Army Card you control.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your initiative roll for each opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Samara the Kyrie Sentinel.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Samara's movement, ignore elevations. She may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When she starts to fly, if Samara is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sano Hayato
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 3. When Sano Hayato attacks with Astra Special Attack, he may attack up to 4 additional times. Sano may attack the same or different figures. If Sano wounds a figure with Astra Special Attack, he may immediately move one space. Sano will take any leaving engagement attacks. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Sandman
ability_1_desc:
If Sandman is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, choose one of the following:
• Roll defense dice; one shield will block all damage.
• Add 4 to Sandman's defense.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Sandman, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Sandman's height or 3 levels below Sandman's base, Sandman may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: If Sandman is on a sand space at the end of a round, remove one wound marker from this card. If he is placed on a water space, place one wound marker on this card.
ability_4_desc: Sandman can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: RYUK
ability_1_desc: Ryuk may only be targeted if a figure has been affected by either Light Yagami or Ryuk's Death Notes, by other Shinigami, or are friendly figures adjacent to Light Yagami.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, Ryuk may choose any human figure within 12 clear sight spaces of Ryuk. Place a black marker on that figures card. That figure is destroyed automatically at the end of the next round. Whenever a unique hero is destroyed in this way, if possible, remove wound markers from Ryuk up to half of the destroyed hero's remaining life.
ability_3_desc: Ryuk can only be activated by Light Yagami's Owner of Death Note ability. If Ryuk does not end his movement adjacent to Light, Ryuk will be destroyed at the end of Ryuk's turn. When Light Yagami is destroyed, place a wound marker on Ryuk. Ryuk can now be activated and used without Light, and will not be destroyed when he doesn't end next to Light.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Ryuk's movement, ignore elevations. Ryuk may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ryuk starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Saruman The White
ability_1_desc: Saruman The White rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against Common figures.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Saruman is targeted by a normal attack from an opponent's figure, before attack dice are rolled you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 5 to your roll if the attacking figure is Common. If you roll a 16 or higher, Saruman cannot be targeted for that attack. If you roll a 20, you may also choose the new target for that attack, if possible.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking with Saruman, you may move with up to 2 Common Squads you control who follow Ozirael. All Common figures you control who follow Ragnar are considered figures who follow Ozirael.

name: Sauron, Lord Of The Rings
ability_1_desc: Sauron can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Any figure adjacent to Sauron is affected by the Black Mace Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.
ability_3_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Sauron has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 20, immediately place Sauron on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all wound markers.

name: Samurai
ability_1_desc: Before moving, Samurai may activate Tōmei Ningen! until the next time you reveal a numbered order marker. While Tōmei Ningen! is active, Samurai can move through all figures, is never attacked when leaving an engagement, has no visible Hit Zone, and cannot use his Kaze no Yō ni Hayaku! or Igo Moen! special powers.
ability_2_desc: While Samurai is flying, you may choose up to 2 small or medium figures that that he passed over this turn. Place the chosen figures on any empty spaces within 2 spaces of Samurai at the end of his move. Figures moved by Kaze no Yō ni Hayaku! never take any leaving engagement attacks. If Samurai uses Kaze no Yō ni Hayaku! this turn, he may not use his Igo Moen! special power this turn.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking with Samurai, you may roll one unblockable attack die against each figure adjacent to Samurai.

name: Saylind
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Saylind's movement, ignore elevations. Saylind may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Saylind starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any figure you control on the battlefield, then roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-8, nothing happens. If you roll a 9-20, move the chosen figure to any space adjacent to Saylind. If the summoned figure is engaged, the figure does not recieve any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Scarecrow
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Scarecrow. If the chosen figure is a Common figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Unique figure, roll the 20-sided die: If you roll 1-13, nothing happens. If you roll 14-19, place a Fear marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. Figures with a Fear Marker on their card cannot take turns. At the end of each round, remove all Fear Markers from all Army Cards. If you roll 20 or higher, destroy the chosen figure. Fear Gas cannot affect Robots or figures with the Fearless personality.

name: Scorpion Skorize
ability_1_desc: After attacking with a Scorpion Skorize, choose an adjacent opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 17 or higher inflict one wound to the choosen figure.
ability_2_desc: After destroying an opponent's adjacent figure, place that figure on this Army Card.

name: Scorpion Biopist
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with a Scorpion Biopist, you may reveal the "X" Order Marker on this Army Card to activate Suspicous Injection. While Sucpicous Injection is active Clone Soldiers add one to their Move number and roll one extra attack and defense die for the rest of the round.

name: Sassy Klaus
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Sassy, you may take a turn with any adjacent Hero you control with the Carry special power. If Sassy is chosen as the figure to be carried, add 1 to the figure's Move number.
ability_2_desc: All Elves you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Sassy roll one additional attack die when making a normal attack. After attacking with an Elf figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Sassy, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-2, that figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, after revealing an order marker on Sassy and before taking a turn with Sassy, you may take a turn with every Elf Hero and Squad you control. If you have more than one copy of a Common Hero or Squad, you may take a turn for each Army Card. No figure may take more than one turn.

name: Scott the Warhero
ability_1_desc: Scott is also considered to be a Human.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non adjacent figure, Scott may move adjacent to the targeted figure.
ability_3_desc: All skulls rolled for an attack on a figure Scott began his turn engaged to count for one additional hit.

name: High Dune Scorpions
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a High Dune Scorpion, if at least 1 skull is rolled, subtract 1 from the defense of the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an attack from a small or medium figure, High Dune Scorpions add 1 to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, High Dune Scorpions may triple their height.

name: Scout Troopers
ability_1_desc: Range 8, Target Enemy Figure, figure must be within 8 clear sight spaces, once figure is targeted, roll 20 sided dice, 1-10 move any 2 squads you control adjacent to targeted figure, 11-20 move any 2 Unique Heroes adjacent to targeted figure. Adjacent figures may now attack with normal attack. Scout Troopers may not attack when using Call in Reinforcements.

name: Scourge
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. If Scourge's Rapid Fire Special Attack inflicts a wound, he may attack again with his Rapid Fire Special Attack. Scourge may continue attacking with his Rapid Fire Special Attack until he does not inflict a wound.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Scourge, Scourge may move up to an additional 4 spaces. Scourge may not end his movement adjacent to any enemy figures when using Justice is Served. If Scourge is engaged when he starts to move using Justice Is Served he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Rod of Negation
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 brown Negation Markers on this card. At the end of the turn, if there is at least 1 Negation Marker on this card, you may choose any opponent's Unique figure within 6 clear sight spaces of this figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–15, nothing happens. If you roll a 16–19, place a Negation Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated for the entire game. If you roll a 20, destroy the chosen figure.

name: Sayyida Al Hurra
ability_1_desc: Before attacking a non-adjacent figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-2, Sayyida al Hurra may not attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: When Sayyida al Hurra makes a normal attack on an adjacent figure, she rolls 1 additional attack die. When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, if any excess shields are rolled, the attacking figure takes one unblockable wound.
ability_3_desc: If Sayyida al Hurra is attacked with a normal attack and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll 3 attack dice. One at a time for each skull rolled, you may inflict 1 wound on any figure that is adjacent to her. Figures affected cannot roll any defense die and can receive more than 1 wound each. After using And Laugh At Death, remove Sayyida al Hurra from the battlefield.

name: Scorpion
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2 + Special. When Scorpion attacks a small or medium figure with his Spear Special Attack, if he rolls a skull on every die, before the defending figure rolls any dice, immediately place the figure on any empty space adjacent to Scorpion and roll 2 extra attack dice. Figures moved by Scorpion's Spear Special Attack will not take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Scorpion attacks using his normal attack, he may attack with his normal attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving Scorpion normally, you may choose any empty space within 4 spaces of Scorpion and place Scorpion on the chosen space. When Scorpion starts to teleport, if he is engaged, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Scyther
ability_1_desc: You may add 3 dice to this Scyther's Attack and subtract 3 spaces from this Scyther's Move. This Scyther may not use Swords Dance if it used the Stealth Flying special power this turn.
ability_2_desc: Attack 1. Range 1. When this Scyther attacks with its Fury Cutter Special Attack, it may attack 3 additional times. Each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Scyther's movement, ignore elevations. A Scyther may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Scyther starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement

name: Severian
ability_1_desc: When rolling for War Fury, you may re-roll a second attack die that did not show a skull one time. Vigilante may be used only once per attack dice roll.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Severian rolls at least 2 skulls with his Blind Rage Special Attack, Severian may attack again with his Blind Rage Special Attack. Severian may continue attacking with his Blind Rage Special Attack until he rolls fewer than 2 skulls.

name: Sharku, Warg Captain
ability_1_desc: When Sharku attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent Sharku. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure receives one wound.

name: Semia the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: After revealing Order Marker 3 on Semia the Kyrie Warrior, before taking that turn with her, you must destroy an adjacent figure if possible.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Semia's movement, ignore elevations. Semia may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Semia starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shadow Moon
ability_1_desc: Shadow Moon may attack up to "X" times. "X" will be the number of wounds that the enemy figure has on their army card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Selendark
ability_1_desc: When Selendark attacks, she may attack one additional time, either or both attacks may be special attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 8. Attack 4. If target figure has been attacked by a Fire Line, Inferno, or Fire Ball Special Attack this round, you may add one attack on it. If the figure was wounded by one of these attacks, instead of rolling 4 attack dice, you may automatically cause one wound.
ability_3_desc: Range 8. Attack 3.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Selendark's movement, ignore elevations. Selendark may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins.

name: Shadow Stalker
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. A Shadow Stalker may attack 1 additional time with its Shadow Strikes Special Attack if at least 2 other Shadow figures are engaged with the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: After a Shadow Stalker rolls defense dice and is not destroyed, you may immediately place it on any empty space within 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: A Shadow Stalker can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Shi Gozan
ability_1_desc: If Shi Gozan triggers an engagement first, roll 2 additional attack dice before attacking normally. If a skull is rolled for Thunderous Strike, it cannot be blocked.
ability_2_desc: Any Monks or Guardians adjacent to Shi Gozan receive an additional defense die.

name: Shieldwall Warlord
ability_1_desc: All friendly archers squad figures adjacent to this Shieldwall Warlord receive an additional defense die and may add 1 space to their Range number.
ability_2_desc: Shieldwall Warlord is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Senthallass
ability_1_desc: Senthallass does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: At the beginning of your turn, instead of moving or attacking, and if there are no enemy figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Senthallass, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-3, nothing happens. If you roll 4-11, you may remove 1 Wound Marker from this card or 1 wound marker from the army card of a hero adjacent to Senthallass. If you roll 12-17, you may remove a maximum of 2 Wound Markers from this card, or from the army card of a hero that is adjacent to, or from a combination of heroes adjacent to Senthallass. If you roll 18-20, you may remove a total of 3 Wound Markers from this card, or the army card of a hero, or a combination of heroes adjacent to Senthallass. You may remove a combination of Wound Markers from multiple heroes as long as the hero is either Senthallass or a hero adjacent to Senthallass. The combination of Wound Markers removed may not exceed the number allowed by your 20-sided die result.

name: Selleadior
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces targets a friendly figure for a normal attack, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card you may roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 2 for each space between Selleadior and the attacker. If you roll a 9 or higher, the attacking figure may not attack this turn. Constructs are not affected by Celestial Song.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking a small or medium figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure rolls 2 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Selleadior's movement, ignore elevations. Selleadior may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When she starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shar Velene of House Brynn Mar
ability_1_desc: If you revealed the "1" Order Marker on this card this turn, you may add 2 to its Move number. If Shar Velene was not engaged at the beginning of that move, you may roll 2 additional attack dice when making a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Each time an opponent's figure is destroyed by an attack from Shar Velene, place a gold Glory marker on this card. A maximum of 3 Glory markers may be placed on this card. If you control Shar Velene, add X to your initiative roll, where X equals the number of Order Markers on this card plus the number of Glory markers on this card.

name: SHAWNSTAR
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Shawnstar's movement, ignore elevations. Shawnstar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Shawnstar starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, you may choose a wounded Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Shawnstar. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, remove one wound marker from the chosen Hero's Army Card.

name: Shadow Fiend
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, if a Shadow Fiend used its Stealth Flying special power this turn, you may choose a Squad figure it passed over this turn and roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to your roll for every other Shadow figure you control adjacent to the chosen figure. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Shadow Fiend's movement, ignore elevations. A Shadow Fiend may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Shadow Fiend starts to fly, if it is engaged, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shinda Samurai
ability_1_desc: Shinda Samurai do not start on the battlefield normally. For the entire game, when a Human Samurai that you control is destroyed, you may immediately replace that figure, if possible, with any Shinda Samurai that you control not currently on the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: When a Shinda Samurai receives enough wounds to be destroyed, it is not destroyed until the end of the round.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Shades of Bleakewoode
ability_1_desc: Before or after moving, each Shade of Bleakewood you control may choose a Unique Hero adjacent to the Shade of Bleakewood. Roll the 20-sided die once for each affected figure. If you roll 19 or 20, destroy the Shade of Bleakewood, then take control of the chosen Unique Hero and remove any Order Markers on its card. You now control that Army Card.
ability_2_desc: A Shade of Bleakewood adds 2 additional defense dice when rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Shade of Bleakewood's movement, ignore elevations. Shades of Bleakewoode may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Shade of Bleakewood starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shadowcat
ability_1_desc: Shadowcat may move through all figures, Destructible Objects and obstacles as long as she ends her movement on a legal space. Shadowcat is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Friendly figures may move through spaces adjacent to Shadowcat as though they had the Phasing ability.
ability_2_desc: Every time Shadowcat moves through a Soulborg, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher that figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Shadowcat. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_4_desc: Instead of attacking, normally, Shadowcat may Phase Stun one adjacent figure. Roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 14 or higher, that figure cannot attack or use any special abilities on it's army card this round.

name: Silvan Markswomen
ability_1_desc: Sivan Markswomen do not need a clear line of sight when selecting targets.
ability_2_desc: Sivan Markswomena are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Sighthounds
ability_1_desc: Any or all Sighthound may add 2 to their Move number as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. A Sighthound must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Pursuit.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Sighthound's movement, ignore elevations. A Sighthound may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Sighthound starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sir Gruger
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium figure, if Sir Gruger rolls a skull on every die, then each skull rolled counts as one additional hit.

name: Sinister Siblings
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Sinister Siblings, place one Sibling adjacent to the other Sibling. A Sinister Sibling moved with Location Linked will not take passing swipes.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Sinister Sibling, instead of rolling add a number of skulls equal to the number of skulls rolled by the other Sibling this turn. When defending with a Sibling, instead of rolling add shields equal to the number of shields rolled by the other Sibling this turn.

name: Shinoko
ability_1_desc: When Shinoko starts to fly, you may place an Airborne Marker on this card. While Shinoko is Airborne, she is considered non-adjacent to all figures, ignores all terrain effects, and has height advantage on all figures. Any figure may move through Shinoko while she is Airborne, but cannot end its movement on her occupied space. Shinoko cannot pick up or activate Glyphs while she is Airborne. You may remove the Airborne Marker from this card at any time during your turn that Shinoko is not flying. Shinoko cannot be Airborne while she is the only figure in your army on the battlefield. If Shinoko is the only figure in your army on the battlefield, you must immediately remove the Airborne Marker from this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Shinoko's movement, ignore elevations. Shinoko may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Shinoko is engaged when she starts to fly, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Skalmad
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 8. Before attacking, you may remove an unrevealed Order Marker from this Army Card to use Great Axe Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Skalmad, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Army Card.

name: Sir Preston
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with any Champion you control, except Sir Preston, you must immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you must take a turn with Sir Preston instead of taking a turn with that Champion.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Champion or Warlord, Sir Preston receives 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Sir Preston rolls one additional die against each figure leaving an engagement with him.

name: Skeletal Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Skeletal Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Undead Champion you control.

name: Sisters of the Sacred Oak
ability_1_desc: All friendly Elves adjacent to a Sister of the Sacred Oak add 1 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Sisters of the Sacred Oak, you may move 3 Elf Warrior squad members you control up to 5 spaces each.

name: Silver Samurai
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. If Silver Samurai is attacking a small or medium figure, roll 3 attack dice for Shuriken Special Attack. If Silver Samurai is attacking a figure of a different size, roll 2 attack dice for Shuriken Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurai.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving Silver Samurai normally, you may choose any empty space that is within 6 spaces of Silver Samurai. Place Silver Samurai on the chosen space. When Silver Samurai starts to Teleport, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Silver Samurai may not Teleport more than 6 levels up or down at once.

name: Sir Adair
ability_1_desc: Sir Adair receives 3 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 3 clear sight spaces away from Sir Adair and whose base was at least 3 levels below Sir Adair's base at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: All Knights you control move one additional space.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sir Adair's movement, ignore elevations. Sir Adair may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sir Adair starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sir Constans
ability_1_desc: After Sir Constans takes a turn, you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card and take an additional turn. During that turn, if Sir Constans makes a normal attack on a figure that follows either Utgar or Valkrill and is not Human, roll 2 additional attack dice. After that turn, if Sir Constans is unengaged and did not attack, remove up to 2 wound markers from this card.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. After using Shield Bash Special Attack, Sir Constans may make a normal attack on the same figure. If Shield Bash Special Attack caused any wounds, that figure rolls 1 fewer defense die against that normal attack.

name: SILIDUS
ability_1_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. You may choose 1 figure within 5 clear sight spaces of both Silidus and the defending figure to also be affected by Silver Stream Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Before rolling attack dice, you may choose one unrevealed Order Marker on the defending figure's Army Card. Guess which number (or "X") it is and reveal it. If you were correct, all skulls rolled for Silver Stream Special attack count as one additional hit. If not, do not roll attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Silidus's movement, ignore elevations. Silidus can pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Silidus starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Silver Surfer
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Silver Surfer's movement, ignore elevations. Silver Surfer may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Silver Surfer starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 6. If an opponent's Unique Hero recieves at least one wound from the Cosmic Force Blast Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed order marker from that Unique Hero's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Silver Surfer, Silver Surfer may move up to 5 spaces. Silver Surfer cannot use Hyper Speed 5 if he attacked with his Cosmic Force Blast Special Attack during that turn.

name: Sinestro
ability_1_desc: Sinestro rolls one less die when attacking or defending against figures with the fearless personality, Robots, or destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Sinestro, choose up to 2 unengaged, small or medium friendly figures adjacent to him. After you move Sinestro, place the chosen figure(s) adjacent to him.
ability_3_desc: When Sinestro attacks he may attack one additional time, but he rolls 2 fewer attack dice for both attacks.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Sinestro's movement, ignore elevations. Sinestro may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sinestro starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sir Robert
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose up to 2 spaces in a straight line from Sir Robert. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Sir Robert's Laser Lance Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Sir Robert rolls one additional die against each figure leaving an engagement with him and any figure that receives at least 1 wound from Sir Robert's leaving engagement attack must immediately end its move.
ability_3_desc: When defending with Sir Robert, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.

name: Skeletal Captain
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with this Skeletal Captain, you may take a turn with an Undead Guard Squad you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack from a figure with a Range number of 4 or more that is not a Cleric or a Wizard, a Skeletal Hunter adds 1 die.
ability_3_desc: All Guard figures you control adjacent to this Skeletal Captain add 1 die to their attack, to a maximum of +1 for Captain of the Guard.

name: Skeleton Slashers
ability_1_desc: If a Skeleton Slasher begins the turn engaged, add 1 to its attack dice.
ability_2_desc: This figure rolls 2 additional defense dice against normal attacks by non-adjacent figures.

name: SIGYN WARNING SHOT
ability_1_desc: This Glyph can only be carried by Nathalya Silvershield and cannot be picked up or moved by any other figures. At the end of the round, if this Glyph is on the field, return it to Nathalya Silvershield's Army Card.

name: Snaga, Cutthroat
ability_1_desc: When defending with Snaga, add as many defense dice as the number of Orcs you control adjacent to Snaga.

name: Skeleton Lancers
ability_1_desc: (Special Attack): Instead of moving and attacking, this attack may be made. The figure may move 8 hexes in a straight line, in any direction. Movement may be considered as flying, but the figure must end no more than 3 levels above or below where it started. During this movement it may pass through as many enemy figures as it can. Beginning with the first figure it passed through, roll 3 attack dice plus 1 attack die for every space it moved after that figure. The attacked figure may then defend, and, if it is still alive, may roll a die against the lancer as if it were leaving engagement. If the lancer survives, move on to the next figure passed through and repeat.

name: SNOWTROOPER
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if another unit in this squad attacks the same target, add one attack die to the 2nd unit's attack.

name: Skinshade Tickler
ability_1_desc: When this Skinshade Tickler attacks, it may attack up to 3 additional times. Reduce the number of times this Tickler can attack by 1 for every 2 spaces this Tickler moved this turn.
ability_2_desc: Opponent's small and medium Common Squad figures cannot leave engagement with this Tickler.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this Tickler may add 2 to its height.

name: Skeleton Pikemen
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of a Skeleton Pikeman and its base is no more than 3 levels above the Skeleton Pikeman's height or 3 levels below the Skeleton Pikeman's base, the Skeleton Pikeman may add 1 to his range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to a Skeleton Pikeman, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, the opponent's figure receives 1 wound. Bristling Pikes only affects figures as they move into engagement with a Skeleton Pikeman.
ability_3_desc: This figure rolls 2 additional defense dice against normal attacks by non-adjacent figures.

name: Skeletal Dwarf
ability_1_desc: A Skeletal Dwarf does not begin the game on the battlefield. Instead, whenever a Dwarf figure you control is destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 11 or higher, immediately replace the destroyed figure with a Skeletal Dwarf. You may move any unrevealed Order Markers from the destroyed figure's card to this card. A newly placed Skeletal Dwarf can not be attacked this turn.
ability_2_desc: All opponents' figures within 2 clear sight spaces of at least 1 Skeletal Dwarf you control subtract 1 from their Attack and Defense values. Figures with the Fearless personality are not affected by Terrifying Presence.
ability_3_desc: A Skeletal Dwarf rolls an additional attack die when attacking or defending against large or huge figures.

name: Skull
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 2. Each skull rolled counts as an additional attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Skull's movement. Skull may ignore up to 4 levels of elevation or pass over 2 water spaces. You may only use this power once during a turn.
ability_3_desc: Before rolling defense dice against a normal attack, roll a D20. If you roll an 8 or higher, Skull is not affected by that attack.

name: Skrull Warriors
