ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. Defending figures that were not adjacent to this Skrull Warrior at the start of its turn cannot roll defense dice against Disguised Attack.
ability_2_desc: When an enemy figure targets a Skrull Warrior for a non-adjacent normal attack, roll the d20. If you roll 11+, all Skrull Warriors you control no longer have visible hit zones this turn.

name: Soldiers of Gondor
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's figure moves adjacent to a previously unengaged Soldier of Gondor, if that Soldier is adjacent to at least one other Soldier of Gondor you control, roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to your roll for every other adjacent Soldier of Gondor. If you roll a 18 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When defending with a Soldier of Gondor, add 1 defense die for each other adjacent Soldier of Gondor up to a maximum of +2 dice for the Shield Wall power.

name: Skrit
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Skrit and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you may move that figure up to 3 spaces. Figures moved by Misdirection Serum never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After Skrit rolls defense dice against a normal attack, immediately choose any number of figures adjacent to her. One at a time, you may move each figure up to 3 spaces. Figures moved by Misdirection Cloud never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: If Skrit is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to Skrit's attack.

name: Sonlen
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose a wounded Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Sonlen. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove one wound marker from the chosen Hero's Army Card. Sonlen's Dragon can use its Dragon Healing on Sonlen.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Sonlen. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure recieves one wound.
ability_3_desc: When Sonlen rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: SOLAMITH
ability_1_desc: Range 8. Attack 3. After attacking with Soulfire Special Attack, roll 1 attack die. If a skull is rolled, place 1 wound marker on this Solamith's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Greater Soulfire Special Attack. This Solamith only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. After attacking with Greater Soulfire Special Attack, this Solamith place 1 wound marker on this Solamith's Army Card.

name: Space Marine Heavy Flamer
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Space Marine Heavy Flamer may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Line 5 Attack 4 Instead of Moving and Attacking, you may instead use Heavy Flamer Special Attack. Figures with Lava Resistance are unaffected by this attack.

name: Space Marine Heavy Bolter
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Space Marine Heavy Bolter may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. Instead of Moving and Attacking, you may instead use Heavy Bolter Special Attack. If Space Marine Heavy Bolter's Heavy Bolter Special Attack inflicts a wound, he may attack again with his Heavy Bolter Special Attack. Space Marine Heavy Bolter may continue attacking with his Heavy Bolter Special Attack until he does not inflict a wound.

name: Snow Wolves Space Marine Sergeant
ability_1_desc: This unit may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: Ignores water terrain effects and gas effects.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with the Snow Wolves Space Marine Sergeant you may first take a turn with up to two seperate Space Marine units. You may not activate another Sergeant with this ability.

name: Space Marine Devastator Sgt
ability_1_desc: Space Marine Devastator Sergeant begins the game with 4 Big Gun Markers. Before the first turn, place each Big Gun Marker on an Uncommon Space Marine Hero you control. Unused tokens are discarded.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on Space Marine Devastator Sergeant before taking a turn with him, you may move up to 4 figures you control with Big Gun Markers 4 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Space Marine Devastator Sergeant may take from this attack is one.

name: SORGWEN
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 blue Bubble Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking, if you have at least 1 Bubble Marker on this card, you may choose any unique hero within 6 clear sight spaces of SorGwen. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a figure you control and you roll an 8 or higher, place a blue Bubble Marker on the chosen figure's card. If the chosen figure is a figure someone else controls and you roll a 16 or higher, place a blue Bubble Marker on the chosen figure's card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with SorGwen, you may take a turn with one figure that you have placed a Bubble Marker on. Manipulated figures are considered under your control and are part of your army while taking this turn.

name: Sloth
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3 + Special. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Sloth, you may move Sloth up to 7 spaces in a straight line. Sloth may move through all figures and never takes leaving engagement attacks when using Charge Special Attack but must end his movement if he has to travel up more than one level of elevation, stopping on the nearest space where he could end his movement. Roll 3 + X attack dice for each figure Sloth moved through this special attack where X is the number of spaces between each figure and Sloth's placement before this special attack. After using Charge Special Attack, remove 3 Philosopher's Stone markers from this card.
ability_2_desc: Sloth never rolls for leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Start the game with 7 markers on this card. When Sloth would receive one or more wounds, you may remove a marker to ignore all those wounds. If Sloth would be destroyed by a power that does not inflict wounds, you may remove three markers and that figure is safe.

name: Specters of Aldorn
ability_1_desc: Specters of Aldorn can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Specters of Aldorn do not take falling damage and may ignore all effects from terrain tiles they move onto or occupy.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with the Specters of Aldorn, if at least one Specter of Aldorn moved through the defending figure this turn, subtract 1 from its Defense.

name: Space Marine Tactical Squad
ability_1_title: And They Shall Know No Fear (Fearless Hero Bonding)
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Space Marine Tactical Squad, you may first take a turn with a Fearless Hero you control within 5 Clear Sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds a Space Marine Tactical Squad member may take from this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: A Space Marine Tactical Squad member cannot attack unless he is within 2 Clear Sight spaces of another Astartes you control.

name: Spirit of the North
ability_1_desc: When defending against an attack by a non-adjacent figure with any Jandar figures you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Spirit of the North, you may roll Jandar Valkyrie dice. Each Jandar symbol rolled counts as an additional shield.
ability_2_desc: If Spirit of the North ends its normal movement at elevation 10 or above, you may immediately place it on any empty space at elevation 10 or above within 5 clear sight spaces.

name: SPS Agents
ability_1_desc: If an SPS Agent is attacked by a normal or special attack and does not receive any wounds, that SPS Agent ignores all wounds inflicted by normal or special attacks until the end of the attacking figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: A SPS Agent adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled when attacking a figure within 5 spaces of that SPS Agent.

name: Space Marine Terminator Squad
ability_1_desc: Space Marine Terminator Squad does not start the game on the battlefield. After revealing an order marker on this Space Marine Terminator Squad, if they have not already been placed on the battlefield, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may place all 3 Space Marine Terminator Squad figures on any empty spaces within 3 clear sight spaces of each other. You cannot place them adjacent to other figures or on Glyphs.
ability_2_desc: The most wounds a Space Marine Terminator Squad member can take from a normal attack is one.
ability_3_desc: Before Moving a Space Marine Terminator Squad member, you may add 3 to that figure's Move value this turn. If you do, that figure can't attack this turn.

name: Sonlen's Dragon
ability_1_desc: If Sonlen is in your army: Instead of placing Sonlen's Dragon on the battlefield, place 3 blue Vengeance Markers on this army card. Whenever the Sonlen you control is wounded or destroyed, you may transfer any number of your Vengeance Markers from any army card(s) to the responsible army card. If that Sonlen was destroyed, place Sonlen's Dragon within 6 clear sight spaces of his last position.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 1 + Special. Add 1 to Sonlen's Dragon's attack dice for each of your Vengeance Markers on the targeted figure's army card. The targeted figure cannot roll more than 1 defense die. After Swoop Special Attack, Sonlen's Dragon may continue moving if it has any Move spaces remaining.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sonlen's Dragon's movement, ignore elevations. Sonlen's Dragon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sonlen's Dragon starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Standard Bearer of the Vale
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to The Standard Bearer of The Vale with a range of 1 add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: SS Zehenglied
ability_1_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, the SS Zehenglied rolls an additional attack die if it did not move this turn or when attacking a fire that is more than 5 spaces away from it.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. When attacking with Protective Guns Special Attack, you may attack one additional time. You may not attack the same figure twice with Protective Guns Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When moving up terrain with a height of 2 or less, the SS Zehenglied may ignore elevations.

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: If Spider-Man is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 10 or higher, he takes no damage and may immediately move using Swing Line.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Spider-Man may attack with Web Special Attack. Figures roll one less defense die against Web Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Spider-Man may Swing Line with a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. He may swing over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles. He may swing up to 40 levels up or down in a single swing. If he is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Spirit of Autumn
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's figure destroys a friendly figure within 6 clear sight spaces of the Spirit of Autumn, you may place a Reaping Marker on that opponent's figure's Army Card. When the Spirit of Autumn attacks an opponent's figure, you may remove a Reaping Marker from that figure's Army Card. If you do, the Spirit of Autumn may attack a figure from that Army Card one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally with the Spirit of Autumn, you may remove a Reaping Marker from an opponent's Army Card. If you do, you may place the Spirit of Autumn on any empty space adjacent to a figure from that Army Card. The Spirit of Autumn does not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Winds of Vengance.
ability_3_desc: If a friendly figure within 6 clear sight spaces of the Spirit of Autumn is attacked with a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may remove a Reaping Marker from the attacking figure's Army Card. If you do, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: If Spider-Man is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11-20, Spider-Man takes no damage and may immediately move using his Swing Line 4 Special Power.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Spider-Man may use his Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Spider-Man may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Spider-Man may not Swing Line more than 40 levels up or down in a single Swing Line. If Spider-Man is engaged when he starts to Swing Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Spider-Man's Web Special Attack.

name: Stalwart The Forge
ability_1_desc: Attack: 5, Range: 1. This attack affects all Soulborg or Mariedian figures adjacent to Stalwart The Forge. Other figures are unaffected. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: All opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Stalwart The Forge may not move. Figures affected by the Powerclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.

name: Street Thugs
ability_1_desc: If a Street Thug attacks a figure that has already been attacked by a Street Thug this turn, he rolls one additional attack die.

name: Steel Ultimatus
ability_1_desc: All opponent's figures may not pass over spaces within 3 clear sight spaces of Steel Ultimatus.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose an empty space within 4 spaces of Steel Ultimatus that is not under an overhang. Place him on the chosen space. All figures adjacent to Steel Auxilius after this placement are affected by Antigravity Leap Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. If Steel Ultimatus is engaged when he starts to use Antigravity Leap Special Attack, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: ST. PATRICK
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose up to three Unique Army Cards you control. For this game the chosen cards follow Ullar, regardless of what is listed on the cards.
ability_2_desc: After revealing Order Marker 1 on St. Patrick, instead of taking a turn with St. Patrick, you may move all Unique figures you control who follow Ullar up to 5 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, St. Patrick always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled. When any other figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of St. Patrick rolls defense dice against a special attack, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Stephen Colbert
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Ignore all modifiers (Both yours and your opponent's) for Sweetness Pistol Special attack.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Stephen Colbert attacks a figure who follows Jandar, add 1 to his attack.
ability_3_desc: Stephen Colbert isn't affected by abilities from enemy figures, destructible objects, or glyphs.

name: Stormtroopers
ability_1_desc: When a Stormtrooper attacks a Squad figure, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Sticks 'N' Stones Boys
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Sticks 'n' Stones Boys, you may first take a turn with any Rogue Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If the Hero chosen for the Sticks 'n' Stones Boys' Rogue Bonding wounded a figure during its turn, all Sticks 'n' Stones Boys' you control roll one additional die for every wound marker on that figure's Army Card when attacking that same figure this turn, up to a maximum of +2 dice.

name: Stormrage Shambler
ability_1_title: Master of the Swamp Special Attack
ability_1_desc: Any time an opponent's figure moves adjacent to a jungle terrain piece and Stormrage Shambler is also adjacent to a jungle terrain piece, Stormrage Shambler may immediately attack that figure.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to Stormrage Shambler attack and defense while on a swamp or swamp water space.

name: Stone Golem
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first choose another Golem Hero you control and take a turn with it. If you do not, add 2 to the Move number of this card.
ability_2_desc: If this Stone Golem is on a stone or dungeon space, it may add 3 to its Range.
ability_3_desc: This Stone Golem rolls 3 additional defense dice when defending against a special attack.

name: STARFIRE
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Hero you control. If the X Order Marker is on this card, you may reveal it at the end of the round and take a turn with Starfire or the chosen Hero, using this round's initiative order. The chosen Hero must be within 6 clear sight spaces of Starfire before moving.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, if there are any Wound Markers on this card Starfire may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Starfire's movement, ignore elevations. Starfire may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Starfire starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Stingy Jack
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered order marker on Stingy Jack's Army Card, and after taking a turn with Stingy Jack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 17 or higher, you may choose one order marker on an opponent's Army Card. Without looking at the order marker, you may place it on any other Army Card of that opponent. The chosen Army Card must still have figures that are in play.
ability_2_desc: Stingy Jack can move through all figures.
ability_3_desc: Stingy Jack is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Stormcat
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, choose an enemy figure within 5 clear sight spaces, place Stormcat on an empty space adjacent to that figure, and add 1 to her Attack. At the end of her turn, roll one attack die. If a skull is rolled, place one Wound Marker on this card. Stormcat will not take passing swipes when using Thunder Step.
ability_2_desc: Stormcat adds one automatic skull when attacking.

name: Storm
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Once per round, choose up to three figures within 5 spaces, not under any overhangs, to be affected by Lightning Storm. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Figures affected by Lightning Storm do not receive height advantage. Robots roll 1 fewer defense die against Lightning Storm. Figures on water spaces roll 1 fewer defense die against Lightning Storm.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, before any turn, activate Gale Force Winds for this turn. While Gale Force Winds is active, enemy figures cannot fly within 5 spaces of Storm and count each space within 5 spaces of Storm as 2 move.

name: Spear of Summoning
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any figure you control on the battlefield, then roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–8, nothing happens. If you roll a 9–20, move the chosen figure to any space adjacent to this figure. If the summoned figure is engaged, the figure does not receive any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Su
ability_1_desc: Nyra the Kyrie Warrior never takes leaving engagement attacks if she is within 3 clear sights spaces of Su.
ability_2_desc: Su never makes leaving engagement attacks. All figures may move through Su.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Su's movement, ignore elevations. Su may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Su starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sunfire
ability_1_desc: If Sunfire is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to his attack. If Sunfire is attacked by an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to his defense.
ability_2_desc: When Sunfire attacks, he may attack a second time.
ability_3_desc: Sunfire is immune to all forms of fire and heat-based attacks.

name: Amber
ability_1_desc: When Amber attacks, she may attack two additional times.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Amber, choose up to four unengaged, friendly, small or medium figures adjacent to Amber. After you move Amber, place the chosen figure(s) adjacent to Amber.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Amber's movement, ignore elevations. Amber may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Amber starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Super Skrull
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. Super Skrull can attack up to two times each turn with Fireball.
ability_2_desc: Enemy Small or Medium figures adjacent to Super Skrull cannot move and cannot be moved.
ability_3_desc: When Super Skrull defends against an adjacent normal attack, each shield rolled counts for an additional block.

name: Snoopy
ability_1_desc: Only on doghouse
ability_2_desc: When flying over other figures Snoopy may defecate. Shake the 20d 1-5 the drop misses 6-10 the unit is blinded 11-15 the unit moves immediately to the nearest water to clean up 16+ the unit likes it and receives +1 attack
ability_3_desc: If there are cookies on the field, Snoopy immediately goes to them. And stays until they're gone.

name: Suki
ability_1_desc: When attacking, Suki may choose one of the following options. •She may subtract 1 from her Attack Value and may attack one additional time. •She may subtract 2 from her Attack Value and add 4 to her Range Value.
ability_2_desc: When Suki rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 12 or higher, you may ignore that attack.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Sub-Zero
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. Choose a non-adjacent figure within 4 spaces of Sub-Zero to attack and roll 4 attack dice. If the defending figure receives one or more wounds from that attack, you may move Sub-Zero up to 4 spaces as long as he ends his movement adjacent to the defending figure. After moving Sub-Zero, he may attack the same figure again by rolling 4 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, if you roll any excess shields, the attacking figure cannot move or attack for the rest of the turn. If the attacking figure is a Unique Hero, you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that Unique Hero's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Samurai #2
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 2. When Samurai #2 attacks with Gatling Gun Special Attack, he may attack four additional times. Samurai #2 may not use this special attack if he moved this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 8. Attack 4. If Order Marker 2 is placed on Samurai #2, he may use Bazooka Special Attack. Choose a non-adjacent figure to attack. A small figure cannot be the chosen figure. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Bazooka Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Samurai #2 may not use this special attack if he moved this turn.

name: Swaysil
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Swaysil that was not adjacent to her at the start of this turn. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure within 3 clear sight spaces, Swaysil rolls one additional die.

name: Sumiko
ability_1_desc: If Sumiko is unengaged, opponent's figures must be adjacent to Sumiko to target her with a normal or special attack.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Hero figure with a point value of 100 or more, Sumiko rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Sumiko can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Swamp Thing
ability_1_desc: If there are no figures adjacent to Swamp Thing, roll 1 additional defense die. If there is more than one figure adjacent to Swamp Thing, roll 1 additional attack die and 1 fewer defense die.
ability_2_desc: If Swamp Thing is adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece at the start of his turn then instead of moving and attacking, Swamp Thing may Plant Traverse. To Plant Traverse, move to any empty space adjacent to any Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece.
ability_3_desc: When Swamp Thing is on a swamp or swamp water space, add 1 to his attack and defense.

name: BABYDOLL
ability_1_desc: Instead of her normal move, or after attacking if she did not move, Babydoll may use Leaping Strike. Leaping Strike has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Leaping Strike, ignore elevations. Babydoll may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Babydoll may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Babydoll is engaged when she starts to leap, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, Babydoll counts skulls instead of shields as blocks. If Babydoll rolls at least one skull, the most wounds Babydoll may take for this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 1. When Babydoll attacks with Pistol Special Attack, she may attack two additional times. Figures adjacent to Babydoll may not roll defense dice when attacked with Pistol Special Attack.

name: Swaysil
ability_1_desc: After moving Swaysil, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to her that was not adjacent at the start of this turn. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure within 3 clear sight spaces, Swaysil rolls one additional die.

name: Surazal of the Inner Circle
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 4. All small or medium figures adjacent to Surazal are also affected by Fire Circle Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: All figures you control who follow Ozirael, except Surazal, move one additional space. If Surazal is destroyed, all figures you control who follow Ozirael move one less space.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an order marker on Surazal, after taking Surazal's turn, you may move and attack with up to two Common figures you control who follow Ozirael. Figures must be within 6 clear sight spaces of Surazal before moving.

name: Swiftsword Royal Guard
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if this Swiftsword Royal Guard rolls at least one shield, the most wounds this Swiftsword Royal Guard may take for this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If this Swiftsword Royal Guard rolls at least 1 skull with her Swiftsword Special Attack, this Swiftsword Royal Guard may attack one additional time with her Swiftsword Special Attack.

name: Superman
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a non-Kryptonian figure, all blanks rolled count as shields. If a figure targets Superman with an ability that requires rolling the 20-sided die, you may subtract 2 from the die roll. Superman never rolls for Molten Lava or Lava Field damage.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Superman may not use Heat Vision Special Attack on a Human figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Superman's movement, ignore elevations. Superman may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Superman starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Swift Eagle
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Swift Eagle. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher move all Order Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure) to other Army Cards in that opponent's army.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Concealment power on any Army Card.

name: STING
ability_1_desc: If there are any Orcs within 12 spaces of this figure, you may add 3 to your Initiative rolls. This figure also gains the following special power:
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack 2. Small and Medium figures cannot roll defense dice against Sting Special Attack.

name: Supergirl
ability_1_desc: If a friendly figure adjacent to Supergirl is targeted by a non-adjacent normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, the figure is attacked as normal. If you roll a 12 or higher, the attack targets Supergirl instead.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Supergirl may attack with her Heat Vision Special Attack. When attacking with this special attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Supergirl's movement, ignore elevations. Supergirl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Supergirl starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: TARKHYN
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose two figures adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by the Blazing Sword Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Templar figures adjacent to Tarkhyn add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.

name: Sykho Volesterus
ability_1_desc: Choose a figure within 6 clear sight spaces adjacent to a squad figure with the Collect Samples special power. You may roll two attack dice for each figure on the Army Card of the squad figure adjacent to the chosen figure, up to a maximum of 6 attack dice. After rolling attack dice remove a figure for each 2 attack dice rolled from the Army Card of the squad figure adjacent to the choosen figure.
ability_2_desc: If Sykho Volesterus inflicts at least one wound on a Unique Hero with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, inflict one additional wound to that same Unique Hero.

name: Tark
ability_1_desc: Opponents' figures must be within 4 spaces of Tark to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: At the beginning of each round choose any unique army card in play, figures on that card may not attack Tark, or be attacked by Tark for this round, this includes disengagement attacks. Concealment may not be used on a player who only has one army card remaining.
ability_3_desc: Tark is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: TASCULUSS
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to 2 small or medium figures adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Club Smash Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Submarine Deck Cannon
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. Instead of attacking, a medium or large unengaged figure who is on the glyph may use the 20mm Deck Cannon Special Attack. If the special attack inflicts a wound, they may attack again with the 20mm Deck Cannon Special Attack. The figure may continue attacking with the 20 mm Deck Cannon Special Attack until they do not inflict a wound.

name: Talan Sec Operatives
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the targeted figure will roll 1 less defense die.
ability_2_desc: If none of the Operatives move this turn, add 1 to their attack and defense.
ability_3_desc: After attacking, instead of immediately destroying an opponent, the Operatives may transfer consciousness. The affected figure receives 1 life and will act as a member of the Talan Sec Operatives beginning the next turn. Destroy 1 Operative per transferral. This ability does not affect Huge figures or Undead.

name: Tatomb
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker and taking a turn with Tatomb you may take a turn with 1 squad of Tomb Skeletons and/or 1 squad of Tomb Skeleton Arhcers. Figures activated with Tomb Commander must start their turn within 4 clear sight spaces of Tatomb.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack from a figure with a Range number of 4 or more that is not a Cleric or a Wizard, Tatomb adds 1 die.

name: Tarkus
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 1. Figures cannot roll defense dice when attacked by Piercing Quill Volley Special Attack. When Tarkus attacks with Piercing Quill Volley Special Attack, he may attack two additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: Small figures cannot make leaving engagement attacks against Tarkus.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Tarkus's movement, ignore elevation. Tarkus may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Tarkus starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Krootox
ability_1_desc: SPECIAL ATTACK: Range 8. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Unit only needs clear shot to the chosen figure. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Unit can be affected by its own Explosion attack.
ability_2_desc: You may only have one Krootox for every one Kroot Warrior unit selected.

name: Teracron
ability_1_desc: When Teracron attacks, he may attack up to 4 times. Reduce the number of times Teracron can attack by 1 for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Teracron, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: When Teracron rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: Tarkus
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 1. Figures cannot roll defense dice when attacked by Piercing Quill Volley Special Attack. When Tarkus attacks with Piercing Quill Volley Special Attack, he may attack two additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: Small figures cannot make leaving engagement attacks against Tarkus.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Tarkus's movement, ignore elevation. Tarkus may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Tarkus starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Skarnak
ability_1_desc: All Grut Archers you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Skarnak may add 2 range to their attack. Skarnak's Aeriel View does not affect Skarnak.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Skarnak's movement, ignore elevations. Skarnak may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins.

name: Spider-Man Symbiote Suit
ability_1_desc: If Spider-Man is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least on skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11-20, Spider-Man takes no damage and may immediately move using his Swing Line 4 Special Power.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Spider-Man may use his Swing Line 4. Swing Line 4 has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Spider-Man's Swing Line 4 movement, ignore elevations. Spider-Man may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Spider-Man may not Swing Line 4 more than 40 levels up or down in a single Swing Line 4. If Spider-Man is engaged when he starts to Swing Line 4, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4, Attack 3. Figures roll 2 less defense dice when defending against Spider-Man's Web Special Attack 2.

name: Tanuki Trickster
ability_1_desc: If this Tanuki Trickster is targeted for a normal attack from an adjacent opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, choose the attacking figure or a figure that is adjacent to the attacking figure. Switch this Tanuki Trickster with the chosen figure. If you do, the attacking figure cannot attack this turn. Figures moved by Mischievous Switch never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: This Tanuki Trickster may attack any and all figures adjacent to it. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on this Tanuki Trickster's Army Card, you may place the Saké Marker on this card. Remove up to 2 wound markers from this card. If the Saké Marker is on this card, this Tanuki Trickster may not use Mischievous Switch, and it subtracts 1 from its Attack value. At the end of the round, remove the Saké Marker from this card.

name: Tel the Underling Alchemist
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a wounded hero figure adjacent to Tel. Remove 1 wound marker from the chosen figure card.
ability_2_desc: In place of Tel's normal attack, choose one medium or small hero figure adjacent to Tel. Add 1 wound marker to the chosen figures card.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a hero figure adjacent to Tel, that you control. You may immediately take a turn with the chosen figure.
ability_4_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to Tel to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Techmarine
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds this Techmarine may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a wounded Soulborg, Eisenek, or Construct adjacent to this Techmarine and roll the 20-sided die. On an 11 or higher, remove one wound from that figure.
ability_3_desc: You may attack twice. You may use Grav Gun special attack and a normal attack or two normal attacks.
ability_4_desc:
Range 5 Attack Special
Grav Gun Special Attack is based on the target's size. Roll 2 dice against a small figure, 3 dice against a medium figure, 4 dice against a large figure, and 5 dice against a huge figure.

name: Skarnak
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Skarnak's movement, ignore elevations. Skarnak may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins.
ability_2_desc: All adjacent Grut Archers gain an additional 1 range to their attack.

name: Tempest-Forge Golem
ability_1_desc: When this Tempest-Forge Golem rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, this Tempest-Forge Golem always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving this Tempest-Forge Golem normally, you may choose an opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of this Tempest-Forge Golem. Place this Tempest-Forge Golem on any empty space adjacent to the chosen figure. For the duration of this Tempest-Forge Golem's turn, add 1 to its Attack value. At the end of its turn, roll 1 attack die. If a skull is rolled, place 1 wound marker on this Tempest-Forge Golem's Army Card. If this Tempest-Forge Golem is engaged when it starts Thunder Step, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Tele Tubbies General Error
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking you must roll the D20. On a roll of 1-10 the Tele-tubbie has to spend the rest of his turn looking stupid and cannot attack
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal attack a Tele-tubbie may turn on it's belly telly and play a movie. Roll the D20. On a roll of 0-12 nothing happens. On a roll of 18 or higher all non-friendly figures within 3 clear spaces of sight are forced to watch. Remove one order marker for each card affected. All affected characters who are not already brain-dead (i.e. zombies) also receive one wound from having to watch the movie.

name: Tess Pearlsoul
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Tess Pearlsoul's Army Card, before taking her turn, you may take a turn with one other Wayfarer you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Tess Pearlsoul always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose one friendly wounded Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Tess Pearlsoul and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, you may remove one wound marker from that Hero's Army Card.

name: Thanksgiving Turkey
ability_1_desc: When the Thanksgiving Turkey is destroyed, you may remove up to a total of 6 wound markers from any Army Cards, to a maximum of 3 wound markers removed per Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If every Army Card you control has a different class and personality than every other Army Card you control, you may use Cornucopian Camaraderie. Once per round, before revealing an Order Marker on an Army Card you control, you may move one unrevealed Order Marker from Thanksgiving Turkey to any other Army Card you control.

name: SWORD-CHUCKS
ability_1_desc: This figure may use Sword-chucks before rolling attack dice for a normal attack against an adjacent figure. This figure adds 2 additional dice when attacking with a normal attack, and may attack up to 4 times this turn. This figure may not attack non-adjacent figures when using Sword-chucks.

name: THAR
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Thar's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Thar's Army Card to activate Expansion for the duration of the round. While Expansion is active, Thar's size is Huge, add 2 to his move number, and add 1 to Thar's Attack and Defense values for every two wound markers on his Army Card.

name: Théoden
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Théoden, you may move and attack with up to 3 Human Knights you control. The chosen Knights must end their move engaged.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Théoden, you may move up to 6 Human Knights you control a number of spaces equal to their Move number. The chosen Knights must be within clear sight of Théoden before moving and must begin and remain unengaged throughout their movement.

name: Thaelenk Snowman
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. This Thaelenk Snowman may attack up to 3 times with this special attack. After each attack, if this Thaelenk Snowman is not on a snow space, place one wound marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Thaelenk Snowman, if it is on at least one snow or ice space, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Thaelenk Snowman's Army Card.

name: Tetsuo Tyrell
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with Tetsuo Tyrell, you may place a wound marker on this Army Card to add 2 to his Attack value and 1 to his Range value.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Tetsuo Tyrell, after taking his turn, you may choose any opponent's Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Tetsuo. Roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to your roll for each wound marker on this card. If you roll a 19 or higher, take temporary control of the chosen Hero and immediately take a turn with that Hero. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to its previous owner. All Order Markers that were on the figure's Army Card will stay on the Army Card.

name: Terribelle
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Terribelle, you may choose a figure within 4 spaces of Terribelle. That figure and all figures within 2 spaces of that figure are affected by Pixiedust of Terror. Roll the 20-sided die once for each affected character. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure must move its full movement in the most direct path away from Terribelle. Terribelle cannot be affected by Pixiedust of Terror.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for Pixiedust of Terror, add 1 to the die roll for each friendly figure within 4 spaces of Terribelle.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Terribelle's movement, ignore elevations. Terribelle may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Terribelle is engaged when she starts to fly, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: NSA Bodyguards
ability_1_desc: When an adjacent friendly small or medium figure is the target of an attack, an NSA Bodyguard may trade places with it. The NSA Agent then becomes the target of the attack. If this causes the NSA Bodyguard or the targetted friendly figure to leave an engagement, they take no leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal ranged attack, NSA Agents always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with NSA Agents, you may first take a turn with any Agent Hero you control.

name: The Crystalline Champion
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's squad figure within 4 spaces of the Crystalline Champion attacks with a normal attack, it must attack the Crystalline Champion, if possible.
ability_2_desc: If the Crystalline Champion receives 2 or fewer wounds, ignore any wounds the Crystalline Champion just received.
ability_3_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Any non-flying figure within 1 space of the Crystalline Champion is affected by the Seismic Slam Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.

name: The Balrog of Morgoth
ability_1_desc: All other figures without a Valiant Personality within 6 spaces of The Balrog subtract 1 from their Attack.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with the Balrog, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 14 levels above the Balrog's height or 14 levels below its base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the chosen figure on any same-level space adjacent to the Balrog. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Whip Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: The Balrog may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: SHADOW
ability_1_desc: When a small medium or large figure is standing on at least one Shadow Space, it rolls 1 additional defense die when defending.

name: The Circle Elder
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on The Circle Elder, roll the 20-side die. 1-12: You may move and attack with up to 4 Circle Wardens. 13-16: You may move and attack with up to 8 Circle Wardens. 17-20: You may move and attack with up to 12 Circle Wardens. The Circle Elder does not need line of sight to move and attack with a Circle Warden.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with The Circle Elder, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may EITHER: - Place 1 previously destroyed Circle Warden within 2 clear sight spaces of The Circle Elder - Remove 1 wound marker from The Circle Elder.

name: The Bane Wolf of Badru
ability_1_desc: When a figure you control uses Pounce Special Attack to attack a figure engaged with The Bane Wolf of Badru and does not destroy it, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-8, destroy the Pouncing figure. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the Pouncing figure on a same-level or lower space adjacent to the target of the Pounce. Destroy the Pouncing figure if no such spaces are available. If the target of the Pounce is a Unique hero, subtract 5 from your die roll.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, any figure attacked by The Bane Wolf of Badru this turn may roll no more than 2 dice for defense.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, The Bane Wolf of Badru may double its height.

name: The Caller
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, before placing order markers, you may place a Glyph of Calling on any space within ten spaces of The Caller. At the end of each round, remove every Glyph of Calling from the board.
ability_2_desc: Range 10, Attack Special. Choose a Glyph of Calling within 10 spaces of The Caller to target. All figures within 7 spaces of that Glyph of Calling are affected by this attack. Roll 8 minus X attack dice for each affected figure, where X is the distance of the figure from the chosen glyph. Roll attack dice separately for each affected figure. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. The Caller can be affected by his own special attack. You may not use this attack unless all your numbered OMs are revealed and on this card and The Caller has not yet moved or attacked this round.

name: The Destroyer
ability_1_desc: The Destroyer cannot move, attack, or use special abilities until a friendly Asgardian figure is first attacked. The Destroyer rolls defense die normally while inactive.
ability_2_desc: Attack 6. Range 6. Instead of attacking with The Destroyer, choose 6 spaces in a straight line from The Destroyer. Any figures on the chosen spaces may receive damage from Concussive Blast. Concussive Blast ignores height elevation and defensive auras.
ability_3_desc: The Destroyer rolls 2 extra defense dice when defending against normal attacks. If The Destroyer is attacked with a normal attack from a figure with Super Strength, he rolls defense dice normally.

name: The Chimera
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after the Chimera has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 18 or higher, immediately place the Chimera on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Wound Markers on the Chimera's card.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both the Chimera and the chosen figure are also affected by Sweeping Sword Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Chimera's movement, ignore elevations. The Chimera may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Chimera starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Devourer in the Deep
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with the Devourer in the Deep, you may choose up to two opponent's small or medium figures within 2 clear sight spaces whose bases are no more than 2 levels above the Devourer's height or 2 levels below the Devourer's base. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to the Devourer. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Tentacle Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: The Devourer in the Deep must attack all figures adjacent to it. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack dice for the Devourer in the Deep against a small or medium figure, if you roll a skull on every die, the defending figure recieves a wound for every skull, and cannot roll any defense dice.

name: Théoden
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving with Théoden, you may move with another Human Hero or Squad you control who follows Ullar. Instead of attacking with Théoden, you may attack with another Human Hero or Squad you control who follows Ullar.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Théoden with a Range of 1 add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: The Order of Maskull
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, after placing Order Markers, you may roll one combat die for each Occultist in the Order of Maskull you control that is adjacent to another such Occultist. If all dice show the same result, you must destroy a Zealous Occultist you control. Otherwise, place the dice on this card. When a Demon, Horror, or Occultist you control rolls for defense or for a normal attack, you may add one die from this card to that roll. Remove all dice from this card at the end of the round.
ability_2_desc: If you only control the Order of Maskull, you may move all unrevealed Order Markers on Army Cards you control to this card.

name: Cynthia
ability_1_desc: If Cynthia is adjacent to at least 1 figure, opponent's figures must be adjacent to Cynthia to attack her with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: If Cynthia was not engaged at the start of this turn, figures roll 2 less defense dice when defending against Cynthia's attack.
ability_3_desc: Cynthia can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: The Lady Drimmere
ability_1_desc: When The Lady Drimmere makes a normal attack on a figure that follows Utgar or Valkrill and is not Human, all skulls rolled count as an additional hit.
ability_2_desc: If a Squad figure you control begins its move adjacent to The Lady Drimmere, it may move 2 additional spaces. If it ends its move adjacent to her, it rolls an additional attack die when making a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: If The Lady Drimmere has been destroyed, place her on any Army Card you control. At the beginning of the next round, add 7 to your initiative roll. During that round, add 1 to the Move and Attack numbers on that Army Card. Remove her from the card at the end of the round.

name: Thing
ability_1_desc: When a Unique Hero that you control is destroyed, you may immediately move all unrevealed Order Markers on that figure's Army Card onto this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Thing always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: The Grim Reaper
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after The Grim Reaper has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, immediately place The Grim Reaper on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Wound Markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: If The Grim Reaper would cause enough wounds with an attack to destroy a Unique Human Hero, you must first roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 2 if that Hero is Tricky or Disciplined. If you roll a 1-2, that Hero may ignore all wounds.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for The Grim Reaper's movement, ignore elevations. It may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When The Grim Reaper starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Alpha Bravo
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may either take a turn with up to two Specialist Heroes you control instead of Alpha Bravo, or take a turn with one Specialist Hero you control before Alpha Bravo. A Specialist taking a turn with Specialist Team Leadership must be within 6 clear sight spaces of Alpha Bravo at the start of its turn, and adds 1 to its move number.
ability_2_desc: If Alpha Bravo is destroyed, before removing her you may move all unrevealed Order Markers from this card to the Army Card of a Unique Specialist or Agent Hero you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Alpha Bravo.

name: the QUESTION
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of a round, after order markers have been placed but before rolling initiative, the Question can attempt Deductive Reasoning. Choose an opponent and, one order marker at a time, attempt to guess it's hidden value. The Question only gets one guess per order marker, up to 4 guesses total. If the Question correctly guesses an order marker's value temporarily show that order marker. For each correct guess the Question adds one to both his Attack and his Defense for that round.
ability_2_desc: The Question can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: All figures adjacent to the Question subtract 1 from their defense, down to a minimum of 1.
ability_4_desc: When defending with the Question, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.

name: Thunderhoof
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Thunderhoof's Army Card, before taking a turn with Thunderhoof, you may take a turn with two Common Minotaur Heroes you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Thunderhoof rolls at least one shield, the most wounds he may take for this attack it one.

name: the QUESTION
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of a round, after order markers have been placed but before rolling initiative, the Question can attempt Deductive Reasoning. Choose an opponent and then attempt to guess the placement of all of their order markers. Afterwards, if the Question correctly guesses any order marker placement your opponent must show you those order marker(s), incorrect guesses remain hidden. For each correct guess the Question adds one to both his Attack and his Defense for the duration of that round.
ability_2_desc: The Question can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When defending with the Question, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_4_desc: The Question receives 1 automatic skull when he attacks an adjacent figure with his normal attack.

name: Thorin Oakenshield
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Thorin, if Thorin is engaged you may immediately attack with two other Dwarf Heroes you control within 6 clear sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Thorin attacks an adjacent Goblin, you may choose another Goblin that is also adjacent to Thorin. If the defending figure receives any wounds from Thorin's attack, the chosen Goblin receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: When Thorin receives enough wounds to be destroyed, before removing Thorin, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, ignore any wounds. Oakenshield may only be used once per game.

name: Thor
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When attacking a non-adjacent figure with Mjolnir Special Attack, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. When Thor attacks with his Lightning Strike Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He may not attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Thor's movement, ignore elevations. Thor may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Thor starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: THE SHADOW
ability_1_title: WHO KNOWS WHAT EVIL LURKS IN THE HEARTS OF MEN?
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, after all order markers have been placed, you may view one order marker from each army card you do not control.
ability_2_desc: When the Shadow attacks, he may attack one additional time. Figures attacked by the Shadow subtract 1 from their defense dice for each revealed order marker on their army card, plus an additional defense die if they are a Criminal or Crime Lord.
ability_3_desc: The Shadow can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Before an opponent takes a turn with any Army Card, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 6 to your die roll if that opponent is taking a turn with a Squad or Common Hero. If you roll a 14 or higher, the Shadow cannot be targeted for an attack or chosen for a special power by opponents' figures that do not have the Cloud Men's Minds special power during that turn.

name: Thutmer, Priest of Avoria
ability_1_title: Prayer for the Goddess of Healing
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a squad or hero that you control within 5 spaces of Thutmer, Priest of Avoria. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a squad and you roll a 15 or higher, bring back a destroyed squad member and put it adjacent to the selected figure. If the chosen figure is a hero and you roll 12 or higher, remove one wound from that figures army card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any small or medium figure within 4 spaces of Thutmer, Priest of Avoria. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a squad and you roll 10 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a hero and you roll 18 or higher, destroy the chosen figure.

name: Ticalla Beetle
ability_1_desc: After moving with Underground Movement, choose an adjacent opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 16 or higher, the chosen figure recieves one wound.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally with this Ticalla Beetle, you may immediately place it on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of this Ticalla Beetle and is no higher than 1 level above this Ticalla Beetle's height or 3 levels below this Ticalla Beetle's base. If this Ticalla Beetle is engaged when it starts its Underground Movement, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Master Splinter
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Master Splinter, you may either take a turn with up to 2 different Ninja Heroes you control or take a turn with a Ninja Squad you control.
ability_2_desc: Master Splinter is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up and down terrain, Master Splinter may add 4 to his height.

name: Ticalla Flytrap
ability_1_desc: This Ticalla Flytrap does not start on the battlefield. Instead, after placing Order Markers on the first round, you may place it on any empty space adjacent to a tree or bush.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves onto a space within three clear sight spaces of any Ticalla Flytrap that you control, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Vine Tangle.
ability_3_desc: While adjacent to a tree or bush, this Ticalla Flytrap has no visible hit zones.

name: Tiefling Rogues
ability_1_desc: If a Tiefling Rogue is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to that Tiefling Rogue's attack.
ability_2_desc: If a Tiefling Rogue you control is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and the Tiefling Rogue. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 17 or higher, ignore any wounds the Tiefling Rogue just received.

name: MICHELANGELO
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one opponent's figure within 3 clear spaces of Michelangelo and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, move that figure adjacent to Michelangelo and it must attack Michelangelo with one less attack die. Taunted figures are never attacked for leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Timber Custodian
ability_1_desc: After moving this Timber Custodian or after an enemy small or medium figure ends its move adjacent to this Timber Custodian, you may choose one small or medium enemy figure adjacent to this Timber Custodian and roll the d20. If you roll 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound and you may place the chosen figure within 2 clear sight spaces of this Timber Custodian. The swatted figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Timber Custodian, you may remove one wound marker from each Timber Custodian you control that did not move this turn.

name: Titania
ability_1_desc: Titania rolls one extra attack die against figures that do not have the Super Strength special power and rolls one less defense die against figures that have Super Strength.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium non-flying figure adjacent to Titania. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may throw the figure by placing it on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of Titania. After the figure is placed, roll the 20-sided die for throwing damage. If you roll an 11 or higher, the thrown figure receives 2 wounds. If the figure is thrown onto a level higher than the height of Titania or onto water, do not roll for throwing damage. The thrown figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ticalla Jungle Snakes
ability_1_desc: A Ticalla Jungle Snake that moved but did not attack normally may use Venomous Strike instead of attacking. Choose an adjacent figure and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. Venomous Strike does not affect Constructs, Soulborg, Undead, or destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When a Ticalla Jungle Snake rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Ticalla Jungle Snakes do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ticalla Jungle Snakes may add 2 to their height.

name: Bebop
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 2. Start the game with two Grenade Markers on this card. Remove a Grenade Marker to throw a grenade. Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Grenade Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: If Rocksteady is within 5 clear sight spaces of Bebop, Bebop may roll one additional dice for normal attacks and defense.

name: Tomb Champion
ability_1_desc: This Tomb Champion may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately and one less attack die for each attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack from a figure with a Range number of 4 or more that is not a Cleric or Wizard, a Tomb Champion adds 1 die.

name: DONATELLO
ability_1_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for a Ninja Army Card, you may add 3 to your die roll. At least one figure on the Army Card must be Donatello or within 4 clear sight spaces of Donatello before the roll.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving, Donatello may Tinker. Instead of attacking, Donatello may Tinker. To Tinker, choose an adjacent Robot or Destructible Object without any Order Markers on its card and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may remove 2 wounds from its card, add 2 wounds to its card, or take an immediate turn with it.
ability_3_desc: Donatello may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: Tower
ability_1_desc: When Tower attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Tower, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Tower always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: TORRAM
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Torram's Army Card, before taking a turn with Torram, you may take a turn with Ramtor if he is under your control.
ability_2_title: LEFT ARM MACHINE GUN SPECIAL ATTACK
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Torram attacks with Left Arm Machine Gun Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. Torram must target the same figure for all three attacks.

name: Tod Uphill
ability_1_desc: If Tod Uphill fails to wound a figure with a passing strike, then Tod Uphill may roll the die again for the passing strike.
ability_2_desc: When Tod Uphill attacks an opponent's figure that was not within clear sight of Tod Uphill at the beginning of his turn, add 4 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Tod Uphill can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Tod Uphill may double his height.

name: Tomb Skeleton Infantry
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Tomb Skeleton Infantry defends against an attack from an adjacent figure and does not receive wounds, you may move that figure and that Tomb Skeleton Infantry one space. Falling damage will apply for non-Flying figures. Figures moved by Fierce Parry never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Figures engaged with Tomb Skeleton Infantry cannot attack any other Undead Guards you control that do not have the Demanding Presence special power.

name: Trevor Burrow
ability_1_desc: When Trevor Burrow attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Trevor Burrow receives one or more wounds from a leaving engagement attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, ignore any wounds from that leaving engagement attack.

name: Troglodyte Bonecrusher
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Troglodyte Bonecrusher always adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Troglodyte Bonecrusher always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Trihorn Rider
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Trihorn Rider, you may choose any opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces that is engaged with any other figure you control. Roll 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Orc Archers adjacent to a Trihorn Rider receive an additional attack die and an additional defense die.

name: Torr-Korxalg
ability_1_desc: Range 4+Special. Attack 4. You may reveal the X Order Marker on this card to use Acid Cloud Special Attack. If 1 or 2 skulls are rolled, all figures within 2 clear sight spaces of the target are affected by Acid Cloud Special Attack. If 3 skulls are rolled, all figures within 1 clear sight space of the target are affected. Any figure whose base is above the target's height is not affected. All figures roll defense separately. Torr-Korxalg may be affected by Acid Cloud Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Torr-Korxalg the Warcaster makes a normal attack on a figure with only one Life remaining, you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card and roll two additional attack dice. If that attack destroys a figure, you may remove one wound marker from this card.

name: Trog & Gort
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with Trog & Gort, you may choose one 1-hex tree within 4 clear sight spaces of Trog & Gort. Place the chosen tree within 4 spaces of it's original position. Then roll the 20-sided die for every figure adjacent to the chosen tree. On a roll of 14 or higher, that figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurai.

name: Troll Slasher
ability_1_desc: When this Troll Slasher attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Troll Slasher's Army Card, before taking this Troll Slasher's turn, you may take a turn with one other Troll you control.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Troll Slasher, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Troll Slasher's Army Card.

name: Two-Face
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Two-Face, you may first take a turn with any Criminal card you control.
ability_2_desc: If an attack by Two-Face would destroy a figure, roll a combat die. If you roll a skull, the figure is destroyed as normal. If you do not roll a skull, ignore any wounds just caused by Two-Face.

name: TREEBARK
ability_1_desc: Range 3, Attack 3. Treebark does not need line of sight to attack with Blight Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving Treebark normally, you may choose an empty space that is within 10 spaces of Treebark and no more than 2 levels above or below its base. The chosen space must be grass, swamp, sand, water, or adjacent to a tree or bush. Place Treebark on the chosen space. When Treebark starts to Verdant Step, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When Treebark receives one or more wounds from an opposing figure's normal or special attack but is not destroyed, you may choose one small or medium Plant figure you control for every wound it just received. Place the chosen figure(s) on any empty space(s) adjacent to Treebark. Summoned figure(s) do not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ukushisa Firecats
ability_1_desc: When attacking with an Ukushisa Firecat, roll one additional die for each adjacent Ukushisa Firecat.
ability_2_desc: Ukushisa Firecats never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: TWILIGHT
ability_3_desc: Twilight May carry small and medium figures while flying. Ranged figures may fire while in his grasp. Carried figures do not have stealth dodge.
ability_4_desc: Shake 20d. 15+ And Twilight can swoop with an attack of 5. He cannot do this while transporting other units, and is subject to Leaving Engagement Attacks.

name: TUL-WEK-NA
ability_1_desc: Before moving, select a small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Tul-Wek-Na. You may place the figure within 2 spaces of the original position. Disregard elevation.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may choose a common squad figure within 4 clear sight spaces. If possible, attack with that figure instead of Tul-Wek-Na.
ability_3_desc: If a unique figure attacks Tul-Wek-Na from an adjacent space, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, remove any order markers on that figure's Army Card and take permanent control of the figure.

name: The Dark Owl
ability_1_desc: The Dark Owl does not take falling damage and may ignore all effects from terrain tiles he moves over. If The Dark Owl attacks an opponent's figure that he was not adjacent to when he began his move, he may roll an additional Combat Die.
ability_2_desc: After The Dark Owl inflicts one or more wounds on a small or medium Unique Hero with his normal attack, if that figure has only 1 Life remaining, you may destroy that Hero.
ability_3_desc: The Dark Owl is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Ulrick
ability_1_desc: At the start of the round, after you roll for initiative, you may destroy one friendly squad figure adjacent to Ulrick. If you do, all friendly squad figures add one to their Move number for the rest of the round. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: All friendly squad figures adjacent to Ulrick receive an additional attack die. If a friendly squad figure adjacent to Ulrick does not inflict any wounds when attacking with a normal attack, you must immediately destroy that squad figure.

name: UKOL
ability_1_desc: If Ukol is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, Ukol may Glacier Traverse instead of moving normally. To Glacier Traverse, move to any unoccupied space adjacent to that Glacier Mountain.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, you can attack a second time.
ability_3_desc: If Ukol is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, opponents' figures must be adjacent to Ukol to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_4_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Twin Paladins of Asordia
ability_1_desc: If one of the Twin Paladins of Asordia is engaged and the other not, then the Twin Paladin that is engaged can attack a second time.
ability_2_desc: When defending from an attack that you have the high ground, instead of adding 1 additional dice as normal, you may add 2 additional dices.
ability_3_desc: At the end of the round, when only the "X" order markers remains, reveal the "X" order marker on the Twin Paladins of Asordia Army Card. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens and a new round begins. If you roll 13-20, you can take a turn with the Twin Paladins of Asordia.

name: TROIA
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Troia add 1 to their defense dice. Photonic Field does not affect Troia.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2 or 3. Troia starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2 or 3 attack dice. Troia may keep making special attacks with 1, 2 or 3 attack dice until she has rolled all 6 attack dice. Troia may attack the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Troia's movement, ignore elevations. Troia may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Troia starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ugrathos, The Skeletal Demon
ability_1_desc: Destroy any adjacent skeletal squad figure. Remove one wound from this army card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Jandar; Ugrathos, The Skeletal Demon will receive 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 19-20, destroy any figure adjacent to Ugrathos, The Skeletal Demon.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Ugrathos' movement, ignore elevations. Ugrathos may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ugrathos starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Undead Cavalry Archers
ability_1_desc: After moving with Undead Cavalry Archers, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to each Archer that was not adjacent at the start of the turn. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. Both Archers cannot target the same figure.
ability_2_desc: Undead Cavalry Archers roll one additional die when attacking nonadjacent Common Squad figures with a Range value of 1.

name: Unhath
ability_1_desc: When Unhath attacks, she may attack two additional times.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: Unhath does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces.

name: Ulginesh
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Ulginesh, you may take a turn with up to 2 different Elf Wizards you control. Ulginesh cannot be one of the 2 Elf Wizards. Any Elf Wizard that is taking a turn instead of Ulginesh must be within 6 clear sight spaces of Ulginesh before moving.
ability_2_desc: When Ulginesh rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ulginesh's movement, ignore elevations. Ulginesh may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins.
