When Ulginesh starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Undead Immortals of Bogdan
ability_1_desc: Whenever an Undead Immortal is wounded, do not destroy that Immortal. When there are 8 wound markers on this Army Card, immediately destroy all Undead Immortals you control.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a figure breaks engagement with a Undead Immortal, after that figure ends its movement, that Immortal may immediately move up to 5 spaces.

name: Ultron
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Ultron rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Ultron can take for this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Ultron, you may choose an opponent's Unique Hero within 6 clear sight spaces of Ultron. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, take temporary control of that Hero and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, control of that Hero returns to the player who controlled it before the Encephalo Ray. All Order Markers that were on that Hero's card will stay on that card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ultron's movement, ignore elevations. Ultron may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ultron starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Uruk-Hai Piercers
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium figure, if an Uruk-hai Piercer rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure receives a wound for every skull, and cannot roll defense die.

name: Uruk-Hai Commander
ability_1_desc: All Soldiers you control who follow Ozirael move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Uruk-Hai Commander, you may take a turn with up to two of the following that you control: • 1 Uruk-Hai Infantry Squad • 1 Uruk-Hai Lancers Squad • 1 Uruk-Hai Crossbowmen Squad • 1 Uruk-Hai Berserker Hero. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn instead of Uruk-Hai Commander must be within clear sight of Uruk-Hai Commander before moving.

name: Union Jack
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack against an Undead or Lycanthrope figure, Union Jack always adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2 or 3. Union Jack starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2 or 3 attack dice. Union Jack may keep making special attacks with 1, 2 or 3 attack dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. Union Jack may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Uruk-hai Crossbowmen
ability_1_desc: If none of the Uruk-Hai Crossbowmen move this turn, add 1 die to their attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice against an adjacent figure, an Uruk-Hai Crossbowman adds 1 to his attack dice. An Uruk-hai Crossbowman can only use Bladed Bow Attack if he moved at least one space this turn.

name: Uruk-Hai Marauders
ability_1_desc: Any time an Uruk-hai Marauder destroys an opposing figure that Uruk-hai Marauder may move up to 3 spaces.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Uruk-hai Marauders, if at least two Urui-hai Marauders you control are engaged, you may immediately take a turn with one Unique Uruk Hero you control.

name: Qildryn
ability_1_desc: While Qildryn has no revealed Order Markers on her card she has no visible hitzones.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 16 or higher, remove 1 Order Maker from that figure's Army Card at random.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Qildryn's movement, ignore elevations. Qildryn may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Qildryn starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: URSA
ability_1_desc: Ursa rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against wounded figures.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Ursa may attack with Heat Vision Special Attack. When attacking with Heat Vision Special Attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ursa's movement, ignore elevations. Ursa may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ursa starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Uruk-hai Scouts
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose an Uruk-hai Champion you control. While that Champion is in play, Uruk-hai Scouts roll one additional attack die for each Wound Marker on the chosen Hero. There can be only one Uruk-hai Champion for all the Uruk-hai Scouts you control.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Uruk-hai Scouts, you may first take a turn with any Uruk-hai Champion you control.

name: Uruk-hai Warriors
ability_1_desc: When defending against an adjacent normal attack if an Uruk-hai Soldier rolls 3 or more shields, then the attacking figure receives one unblockable wound.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Uruk-hai Warriors, if at least two Uruk-hai Warriors you control are engaged, you may immediately take a turn with one Unique Uruk Hero you control.

name: Valdenar
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Valdenar, you may roll Jandar Valkyrie dice. Each Jandar symbol rolled counts for two additional skulls.
ability_2_desc: When defending with Valdenar, you may roll Jandar Valkyrie dice. Each Jandar symbol rolled counts for two additional shields.
ability_3_desc: When defending with Unique Heroes who follow Jandar adjacent to Valdendar, you may roll Jandar Valkyrie dice. Each Jandar symbol rolled counts for an additional shield.

name: Vaati
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. After attacking, roll the 20-Sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, remove any unrevealed order marker from the opponent's card.

name: Valentela
ability_1_desc: When defending with Valentela add 3 dice to her roll if the attacking figure's line of sight is partially blocked by a tree.
ability_2_desc: When Valentela attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Add 2 to Valentela's movement when she begins her turn on a grass hex.
ability_4_desc: In place of Valentela's normal attack any elf within 8 clear sight spaces of Valentela may take an attack action.

name: Vakrian Slingers
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 5. Three unengaged Vakrian Slingers within 3 clear line of sight spaces of each other may combine their attacks and roll their attack dice as one attack. All Vakrian Slingers participating in the Rain of Stone Special Attack must have clear line of sight to the one target. The defending figure compares height to the lowest Vakrian Slinger to determine any height advantage.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Vakrian Slingers may add 2 to their height.

name: Valkyrie
ability_1_desc: When Valkyrie attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When a friendly figure with a Warrior's Spirit Special Power is destroyed and placed on another unique Army Card, that figure's Spirit bonus is doubled.

name: USTAROF
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose two Unique Heroes who are both within 6 clear sight spaces of Ustarof. Remove all wound markers from both Heroes' Army Cards and then redistribute them evenly between both Army Cards, even if this would destroy that Hero. If there is an uneven number of wound markers, remove one of them before redistributing. Ustarof may not use Blood Balance on himself.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, you may choose one friendly Squad figure and one opponent's Squad figure who are both within 6 clear sight spaces of Ustarof. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, destroy both Squad figures.

name: Vantus the Tactician
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. When defending against Mordschlag Special Attack, the most defense dice that can be rolled is three.
ability_2_desc: After you reveal Order Marker 3 on Vantus the Tactician's card, roll the 20-sided dice. You may use the result in place of the number rolled for initiative next round. Roll initiative as normal.

name: Veguzza
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to Veguzza's attack and defense while on a Swamp space.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's figure that could target Veguzza would target another figure with a normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, it must target Veguzza, rolling 1 fewer attack die.

name: U.S. Agent
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Shield Throw Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Shield Throw Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When U.S. Agent attacks a figure with no unrevealed order markers on its army card, he rolls one additional attack die.

name: Velnesh Alphas
ability_1_desc: After moving normally, you may immediately place a Velnesh Alpha on any empty space within 2 spaces of its current placement. Velnesh Alphas will not take leaving engagement attacks while Shifting.
ability_2_desc: After a Velnesh Alpha rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure and is not destroyed, it may immediately move using its Shift special power.

name: Valsen Dreth
ability_1_desc: Valsen Dreth starts the game with 6 Curse markers. If Valsen Dreth wounds an enemy unique hero place a curse token on the wounded figures card. At the begining of every round the cursed figure must roll the 20 sided die. If 1-16 is rolled inflict 1 wound. If the cursed figure roll 17 or higher remove the Curse Marker from its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Valsen Dreth never receives more than 1 wound from an attack.
ability_3_desc: Valsen Dreth may only be controlled by the player that starts the game with his Army Card.

name: Valienn Swiftsword
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on this card, instead of taking a turn with Valienn Swiftsword, you may take a turn with up to 2 Shieldmaidens you control. Any Shieldmaiden taking a turn instead of Valienn Swiftsword must be within clear sight of Valienn Swiftsword before moving.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. When Valienn Swiftsword attacks with her Crippling Arrows Special Attack, she may attack 2 additional times. Defending figures subtract 1 from their defense dice for each skull rolled with Crippling Arrows Special Attack. Valienn Swiftsword may not use Crippling Arrows Special Attack while she is engaged.
ability_3_desc: When Valienn Swiftsword is destroyed, you may immediately destroy a Swiftsword Royal Guard you control, remove all markers and figures from this Army Card, and replace that Swiftsword Royal Guard with Valienn Swiftsword.

name: VENOMBANE
ability_1_desc: After attacking an enemy Unique Hero with Venombane's normal attack, roll one attack die for each wound inflicted. For each additional skull rolled, place one additional wound marker on the defending figure's card.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you must roll the d20 once for each adjacent figure. If you roll 17+, that figure receives one wound. Robots are not affected by Toxic Skin.

name: Velldores of Greenfount
ability_1_desc: Velldores may reroll one of his attack or defense rolls once per round. You must keep your second roll result.
ability_2_desc: Velldores may move at any time during his turn until he has used his entire move allotment.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with Velldores, you may attack one additional time.
ability_4_desc: If this card is the last Army Card you control, Velldores receives 1 additional attack die, 1 additional defense die, and moves an additional 2 spaces.

name: Vesten the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: After Vesten rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move Vesten up to 4 spaces. Vesten will never take leaving engagement attacks while using Tactical Maneuver.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Vesten's movement, ignore elevations. Vesten may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Vesten starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Viceron the Blood Knight
ability_1_desc: Each time Viceron the Blood Knight destroys a figure with a normal attack, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Viceron cannot use Sanguine Sword on destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Bloodstorm Ritual Special Attack affects all figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Viceron the Blood Knight. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. All affected figures roll defense dice separately. Bloodstorm Ritual Special Attack does not affect Viceron. After attacking with Bloodstorm Ritual Special Attack, place a wound marker on this Army Card.

name: VIGOR
ability_1_desc: When Vigor is targeted from an adjacent attacking figure, roll 20 sided die, 1-15 Vigor rolls normal defense, 16-20 Vigor may move up to 6 spaces away, for Vigor's movement ignore elevations. Vigor may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without being engaged, Vigor may leap over obstacles such as ruins
ability_2_desc: When Vigor rolls defense dice against a normal attack, from an adjacent figure, one shield blocks all damages.

name: Vishania
ability_1_desc: Vishania may attack with her normal attack up to 3 times each turn.
ability_2_desc: While Order Marker 1 is revealed on this card, Vishania adds 2 to her defense.
ability_3_desc: While Order Marker 2 is revealed on this card, Vishania adds 2 to her move.
ability_4_desc: While Order Marker 3 is revealed on this card, Vishania adds 2 to her attack.

name: Venom
ability_1_desc: If Venom is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-13, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 14-20, Venom takes no damage and may immediately move using his Swing Line 4 Special Power.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Venom may use his Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Venom may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Venom may not Swing Line more than 40 levels up or down in a single Swing Line. If Venom is engaged when he starts to Swing Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Venom's Web Special Attack.

name: Venom
ability_1_desc: If Venom is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-13, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 14-20, Venom takes no damage and may immediately move using his Swing Line 4 Special Power.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Venom may use his Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Venom may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Venom may not Swing Line more than 40 levels up or down in a single Swing Line. If Venom is engaged when he starts to Swing Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Venom's Web Special Attack.

name: Viper Agents
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's unique hero, a Viper Agent adds 1 attack die for each life the target hero has remaining to a maximum of 4 dice.
ability_2_desc: If a Viper Agent is adjacent to an opponent's unique hero that takes 1 or more wounds from an attack from another friendly figure, you may move that Viper Agent up to 4 spaces as long as that Viper Agent ends the move unengaged. A Viper Agent never takes leaving engagement attacks when using Covered Disengage.
ability_3_desc: A Viper Agent is never effected by any type of attack while on a shadow tile.

name: Vultar
ability_1_desc: If Vultar's normal attack inflicts a wound, you may immediately take a turn with the Carrion Warriors.
ability_2_desc: When Vultar attacks a hero with one or more wounds on its card, or attacks a squad with one or more eliminated figures on its card(s), add 2 attack dice.

name: Victrix Honor Guard
ability_1_title: And They Shall Know No Fear (Fearless Hero Bonding)
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Victrix Honor Guard, you may first take a turn with a Fearless Hero you control within 5 Clear Sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: When a Victrix Honor Guard rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: When a Victrix Honor Guard rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a figure who is adjacent, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_4_desc: When rolling attack dice against an adjacent figure, Victrix Honor Guard always add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Vydar Factory
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with the Vydar Factory, you may place any previously destroyed common Vydar Warforged or Soulborg Squad figure from your army on an empty space adjacent to the Vydar Factory or take one wound away from any Vydar Warforged or Soulborg hero adjacent to the Vydar Factory.

name: VILVAAS
ability_1_desc: Vilvaas begins the game with one Orange Aura Marker on his Army Card. While the Aura Marker is on this Army Card, Vilvaas cannot receive any wounds, his Move, Attack, and Defense values cannot be reduced, and no other Special Markers can be placed on his card. At any point, if Vilvaas would receive 2 or more wounds, remove the Aura Marker from this Army Card. At the end of the round, if the Aura Marker is not on this Army Card, place it back onto this card.
ability_2_desc: Range Special Attack 3. Choose up to three figures to attack who are within 3 clear sight spaces in a straight line from Vilvaas' base. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Volstagg
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Volstagg, you may move up to 2 other Asgardian heroes you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Volstagg, roll the 20-sided die. For each other wounded or destroyed hero in your army, add +1 to the roll, +2 if that hero is small. If you roll 16 or higher, you may attack again with Volstagg.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Volstagg always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Vision
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. Before attacking normally, Vision may attack with Disruption Special Attack. Figures cannot roll defense dice when attacked by Disruption Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If Vision is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, choose one of the following: - Roll defense dice; one shield will block all damage. or - Add 4 to Vision's defense.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Vision's movement, ignore elevations. Vision may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs and over obstacles such as ruins. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Vulture
ability_1_desc: Vulture may attack at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Vulture is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_2_desc: When Vulture rolls defense dice against an attacking figure that is not adjacent, add 1 defense die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Vulture's movement, ignore elevations. Vulture may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Vulture starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Vulture
ability_1_desc: Vulture may attack at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Vulture is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_2_desc: When Vulture rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Vulture's movement, ignore elevations. Vulture may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Vulture starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Vorgyrn
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Vorgyrn, you may take a turn with any one of the following that you control: • 1 Drow Hero, or • 1 Drow Squad, or • 1 Deepwyrm Drow Squad and 1 Drow Chainfighter. You may choose which to activate first. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn instead of Vorgyrn must be within clear sight of Vorgyrn before moving.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 2 + Special. When Vorgyrn attacks with Venom Strike Special Attack, add 1 to his attack dice for every additional Drow you control within 3 clear sight spaces of him, up to a maximum of +3 dice.
ability_3_desc: If Vorgyrn is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Volucris Suicidium
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with a Volucris Suicidium, if that Volucris Suicidium is destroyed, you may immediately take a turn with any other Volucris Suicidium you control. Suicide Swarm may only be used if you revealed an Order Marker on a card with this special power at the beginning of your turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. Figures roll 5 fewer defence dice against this special attack. After using this special attack, if you rolled a skull or a blank, the attacking Volucris Suicidium is destroyed.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Volucris Suicidium's movement, ignore elevations. A Volucris Suicidium may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Volucris Suicidium is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wailing Souls
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 0. If the chosen figure is a squad figure, destroy it and place 1 Soul Marker on Wailing Souls' army card. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, proceed as if you have rolled 2+X attack skulls, where "X" is the number of Soul Markers on Wailing Souls' army card. The target rolls defense dice normally. If the chosen Hero is destroyed, place 1 Soul Marker on Wailing Souls' army card.
ability_2_desc: For every Soul Marker on Wailing Souls' army card, add one automatic shield to your defense roll.

name: War Machine
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. When War Machine attacks with this special attack, he may attack three additional times.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. When War Machine attacks with this special attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for War Machine's movement, ignore elevations. War Machine may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When War Machine starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Vurgoyle
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first choose another Golem Hero you control and take a turn with it. If you do not, add 2 to this card's Move number.
ability_2_title: Fall of the Hammer Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If this Vurgoyle ended its move at least 1 space lower than it began this turn, it may use this special attack. This special attack affects all adjacent figures. Roll once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense separately.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Vurgoyle's movement, ignore elevations. This Vurgoyle may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When it starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: WEREBOAR
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Wereboar, if the defending figure was not adjacent to this Wereboar at the start of this turn, this Wereboar receives 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with this Wereboar, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with this Wereboar.

name: Wasp
ability_1_desc: Wasp will not take passing swipes when she starts to fly.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack 2. Wasp can attack with Wasp Sting twice each turn. Medium, Large, and Huge figures cannot roll more than one defense die against Wasp Sting.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, after defending against an enemy attack or after an enemy figure ends its move not adjacent to Wasp, move Wasp up to 3 spaces.

name: Warden 7
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent, Warden 7 always adds three automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Warden 7 may make two normal attacks and one special attack each turn.
ability_3_desc: Range Special. Attack 2. All figures adjacent to Warden 7 are affected by Force Wall Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each affected figure rolls defense dice seperately. You may place any small or medium figures that recieve a wound from Force Wall Special Attack on an empty space within three clear sights spaces of Warden 7. Affected figures do not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Warden 7
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent, Warden 7 always adds three automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Warden 7 may make two normal attacks and one special attack each turn.
ability_3_desc: Range Special. Attack 2. All figures adjacent to Warden 7 are affected by Force Wall Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each affected figure rolls defense dice seperately. You may place any small or medium figures that recieve a wound from Force Wall Special Attack on an empty space within three clear sights spaces of Warden 7. Affected figures do not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wild Hunt
ability_1_desc: If Wild Hunt fails to destroy a figure with a nonadjacent attack, Wild Hunt's Range Value is permanently reduced to 1 for the duration of the game.

name: Battle of Patay English Standard
ability_1_desc: Battle Of Patay English Standard does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, after placing Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 20 you must place the Battle Of Patay English Standard on an empty space. You cannot place him on a glyph. Immediately remove all characters you control from the battlefield. Sorry, you just lost the game!

name: Wasp
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by Wasp cannot roll defense dice.
ability_2_desc: If Wasp is adjacent to an opponent's figure, other heroes you control may add 1 to their attack when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: If Wasp is attacked by an adjacent opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-9, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 10 or higher, Wasp takes no damage and may immediately move up to 2 spaces.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Wasp's movement, ignore elevations. Wasp may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Wasp starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wandering Wizard Bragi
ability_2_desc: Wandering Wizard does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, if the Wizard has not been placed on the battlefield yet this game, you may remove a Mana Marker from this card. If you do, you may place the Wizard on any empty space adjacent to a friendly figure.
ability_3_desc: If the Wizard, or any figure you control adjacent the Wizard, is adjacent to an obstacle or destructible object, that figure may use Secret Door instead of moving normally. Remove a Mana Marker from this card. If you do, place the figure on any unoccupied space adjacent to an obstacle or destructible object within 4 spaces of that figure. Figures moved by this special power never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_4_desc: Instead of attacking with the Wizard, you may choose an obstacle or destructible object within 4 spaces of the Wizard. Remove up to 4 Mana Markers from this card. For each Mana Marker removed, you may choose a figure adjacent to the chosen obstacle or destructible object. All chosen figures receive 1 wound.

name: Water Archon
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Water Archon's Army Card, you may first take a turn with any two water elementals that you control.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose an opponent's small or medium figure that is within 5 clear sight space on a water space. If this Water Archon destroys the selected figures with Whirlpool Special attack, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Water Elemental.
ability_3_desc: If this Water Archon ends its normal movement on a water space, you may immediately place it on any empty, same-level water space within 5 spaces. If this Water Archon is engaged when it starts its Water Tunnel, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wildmen Of Dunland
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, choose a Wildman you control and destroy it. If you roll a 2-6, add 1 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 7-11, add 2 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 12-15, add 3 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 16-19, add 4 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 20, add 8 to the attack value of this card.

name: Weeping Angel
ability_1_desc: Immediately after an opponent reveals a numbered Order Marker, you may choose a Weeping Angel you control that is not adjacent to any other figure and roll the 20-sided die. You may move the chosen Angel up to X spaces, where X is the number rolled less 13. When moving with Don't Blink, a Weeping Angel may ignore changes in elevation.
ability_2_desc: If this Weeping Angel is within clear sight of another figure, it may not move normally. A Weeping Angel may never leave an engagement.
ability_3_title: All the Days You Would Have Lived
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose a figure engaged with this Weeping Angel and roll the 20-sided die. Add 4 to your roll if the figure does not have an Order Marker on its Army Card. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen figure.

name: TYCRIN
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. When Tycrin attacks with Fire Storm Special Attack, he may attack one additional time for every additional Elf Wizard you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Tycrin, up to a maximum of 3 additional attacks.

name: Wharfang Hunter
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may move up to 2 other Hunter Heroes you control up to 5 spaces each. If you do not, you may move this Wharfang Hunter 2 additional spaces.
ability_2_desc: If a Wharfang Hunter is adjacent to a tree or bush, it has no visible hit zones.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 2+Special. When using this special attack, roll 2 additional attack dice for up to 2 other unengaged Wharfang Hunters you control that are in range of the target, and are not adjacent to any Wharfang Hunter. If this Wharfang Hunter is engaged, it may not use Telepathic Triangulation Special Attack.

name: Wrecker
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, Wrecker can subtract 2 from his Attack and add 4 to his Range.
ability_2_desc: When Wrecker attacks a Destructible Object, each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Wrecker, if Wrecker destroyed a figure or Destructible Object, take a turn with another figure with the Wrecking Crew power you control.

name: Wind Eye
ability_1_desc: While moving, Wind Eye may add 2 to her move number. If she does, she cannot attack this turn. If at least one Hero your opponent controls is within Wind Eye's sight prior to moving, she may add 2 more to her move number when using Expert Tracking.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a small or medium figure with a Defense value of 4 or less, if Wind Eye was not adjacent to that figure at the start of the turn, that figure cannot roll defense dice.

name: WINONA
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small, medium, or large figure moves onto a space within 2 clear sight spaces of Winona, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Herd.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Winona, you may place her on any empty space adjacent to a figure you control who follows Einar and who is within 6 clear sight spaces of Winona at the end of her turn. If Winona is engaged when she uses Heel, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Winona may double her height.

name: Wrackspawn
ability_1_desc: Each time Wrackspawn destroys an enemy unique hero, you may remove up to two wound markers from this army card.
ability_2_desc: When you attack with Wrackspawn, you may add 1 more attack dice for each wound that he has on his army card.
ability_3_desc: If at least 2 enemy squad figures are adjacent to Wrackspawn, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher, you may attack up to three times. You must only attack squad figures with this ability, you may not attack enemy unique figures with this ability.

name: Xiphydri Commander
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card and before taking a turn with this Xiphydri Commander, you may take a turn with any or all Xiphydri Common Heroes you control adjacent to this Xiphydri Commander.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Xiphydri Commander's movement, ignore elevations. A Xiphydri Commander may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Xiphydri Commander starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: XEN'KAR
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Xen'kar inflicts at least 1 wound with Hellstinger Vemon Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die for Venom Damage. If you roll 1–9, the defending figure receives no additional wounds for Venom Damage. If you roll 10–19, add 1 additional Wound Marker to the defending figures's Army Card, and roll again for Venom Damage. If you roll a 20, destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: After attacking if Xen'kar inflicts at least one wound, you may take a turn with a Drow Fighter you control.

name: Yagyu Kenshin
ability_1_desc: When attacking, add 1 attack die for each friendly Ashigaru that is adjacent to the defending figure, to a maximum of +2. If there is at least one friendly Ashigaru adjacent to the defending figure, Yagyu Kenshin may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Ashigaru adjacent to Yagyu Kenshin add 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Wonder Woman
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a figure within 2 clear sight spaces and roll the 20 sided die. If the figure is a Hero and you roll a 17 or higher, remove one unrevealed Order Marker from that figure's army card. If the figure is a squad figure and you roll a 12 or higher, the opponent controlling that figure must reveal their X Order Marker.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Wonder Woman's movement, ignore elevations. Wonder Woman may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Wonder Woman starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Xorthern, Demon of Saurien
ability_1_desc: Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher remove all wounds from this army card.
ability_2_desc: When Xorthern, Demon of Saurien is destroyed, roll the 20-side dice. If you roll 12 or higher every time your opponent roll for initiative, subtract 6 to what ever your opponent rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Xorthern, Demon of Saurien's movement, ignore elevations. Xorthern, Demon of Saurien may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Xorthern, Demon of Saurien starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: X-Series Cryo Centurion
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, before taking this Cryo Centurion's turn, you may take a turn with one other Mariedian Cyborg you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 fewer defence die when attacked by Cryo Blaster Special Attack or, if they have the Lava Resistant Special Power, they instead roll 2 fewer defence dice when attacked by this special attack.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving. Add 1 to this Cryo Centurion's defence while on an ice or snow space.

name: Ymir
ability_1_desc: When Ymir attacks, you may choose up to two other figures that are adjacent to Ymir. If the defending figure receives any wounds from Ymir's attack, the chosen figures receive 1 wound.

name: Yasashii
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if an opponent figure receives at least 1 wound, Yasashii may attack again with 1 additional die added to his attack. If the opponent figure is destroyed, immediately move Yasashii up to 4 spaces. If you fail to destroy the figure, add 2 wound markers to this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Any friendly Ninja figures that start their turn within 4 clear sight spaces may add 1 to their move number. This power does not affect Yasashii.
ability_3_desc: Yasashii can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Viserion
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Viserion attacks with his Ice Shard Breath Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Viserion's movement, ignore elevations. Viserion may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Viserion starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Yillia Sacred Vestals
ability_1_desc: When any Yilla Sacred Vestal you control, or any figure you control that is adjacent to any Yilla Sacred Vestal you control, is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, all Yilla Sacred Vestals you control, and all figures you control that are adjacent to those Yilla Sacred Vestals, no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: When a Yilla Vestal rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: YASHBUCKLER FOREMAN
ability_1_desc: Whenever attacking an adjacent figure, this Yashbuckler Foreman rolls 2 additional dice.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Pirates adjacent to this Yashbuckler Foreman add 1 to their Defense value.
ability_3_desc: After taking this Yashbuckler Foreman's turn, if this Foreman did not attack this turn, you may move either two Human Pirate Squad figures or one Human Pirate Hero you control. Figures moved by Foreman's Command must begin and remain unengaged throughout their move. Figures activated since you last revealed a numbered order marker can never be moved by Foreman's Command.

name: Zettian Brawlers
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if one of your Zettian Brawlers attacks the same figure that another Zettian Brawler has already attacked, add one additional attack die to that Zettian Brawler's attack for that turn.

name: Yamabushi Kenza
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered Order Marker on this card and before taking a turn with Yamabushi Kenza, you may take a turn with one Medium Tricky Unique Hero you control. If you do, you may not take any additional turns with any other figures you control. Figures taking a turn with Shared Mischief must start their turn within 6 clear sight spaces of Yamabushi Kenza.
ability_2_desc: Before moving normally, if Yamabushi Kenza has not yet left his start zone, has not received any wounds, and is unengaged, you may choose a single space Evergreen Tree, Rock Outcrop, or Glacier Rock. Remove the chosen object from the board and place this figure on the space the object previously occupied.
ability_3_desc: At the end of each round, you may remove 1 wound marker from this card.

name: Yokai
ability_1_desc: When Yokai attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Yokai, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Yokai's height or 3 levels below Yokai's base, Yokai may add 1 to his range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: If Yokai is targeted for a normal or special attack from an opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, choose a small or medium figure that is within 4 spaces of Yokai. Switch Yokai with the chosen figure. If you do, the attacking figure must attack the chosen figure, if possible, and cannot attack any other figure this turn. Figures moved by Tanuki Façade never take any leaving engagement attacks. You can only roll for Tanuki Façade once per turn.

name: ZADIM
ability_1_desc: When Zadim attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: All Captains you control who follow Einar, except Zadim, move one additional space.
ability_3_desc: Zadim and all small and medium figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Zadim who follow Einar and have a Move value of 6 or higher roll one additional die when defending against a non-adjacent attack.

name: Yuko Tanana
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 1 + Special. Select a figure to attack, if the chosen figure is in a snow or ice space roll two dices instead of one. If the selected figure is a unique hero, you may attack a second time.
ability_2_desc: If Yuko Tanana is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, opponents' figures must be adjacent to Yuko Tanana to attack her with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Add 1 to Yuko's attack and defense while on a snow space.

name: Zeta-5
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Zeta-5, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Zeta-5 may perform a Jet-Assisted Leap. Jet-Assisted Leap has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Zeta-5's Jet-Assisted Leap ignore elevations. Zeta-5 may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Zeta-5 may not leap more than 30 levels up or down in a single leap. If Zeta-5 is engaged when he begins his Jet-Assisted Leap, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Zoe Thames
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game select one animal companion figure to be Zoe Thames' companion. Place Zoe Thames' companion marker on that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After revealing on order marker on Zoe Thames' Army Card, you may first take a turn with her animal companion.
ability_3_desc: Any Animal Companion adjacent to Zoe Thames may roll an additional attack and defense die.

name: Zettian Hunter
ability_1_desc: Instead of its normal move, Zettian Hunter may Hydraulic Leap. Hydraulic Leap has a move 5. When counting spaces for Zettian Hunter's leaping movement, ignore elevations. Zettian Hunter may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Zettian Hunter may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. If Zettian Hunter is engaged when he starts to leap, he does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If Zettian Hunter used Hydraulic Leap this turn, and moved adjacent to an enemy figure it gets +1 attack.

name: Zhentarim Soldiers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Zhentarim Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Zhent hero with a militaristic personality.
ability_2_desc: When a Zhentarim Soldier destoys an opponent's figure with a normal attack, he may immediately move 3 spaces. A Zhentarim Soldier takes any disengagement attacks incurred while moving with Zhentarim Tactics.

name: ZELAFER
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Zelafer, you may reveal an 'X' Order Marker that is on Zelafer's Army Card and choose a figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Zelafer. Move the 'X' Marker to that figure's Army Card. If you moved the 'X' Marker to a figure you control, you may also move another unrevealed Order Marker from this card to the chosen figure's card.
ability_2_desc: Zelafer adds 2 to his Range and 1 to his Attack when attacking a figure with a revealed 'X' Order Marker on their Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Zelafer's movement, ignore elevations. Zelafer can pass over water, pass over figures, and fly over obstacles. When Zelafer starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Zissren
ability_1_desc: Each time Zissren attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement and inflicts at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: If Zissren attacks an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to his attack.

name: Zhentarim Officer
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice, this Zhentarim Officer always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: All squad figures you control with a Militaristic personality which are adjacent to at least one Zhentarim Officer receive an additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: When a Zhentarim Officer destoys an opponent's figure with a normal attack, he may immediately move 3 spaces. A Zhentarim Officer takes any disengagement attacks incurred while moving with Zhentarim Tactics.

name: Zettian Infantry
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Zettian Infantry, you may take a turn with any Soulborg Hero you control who follows Utgar.
ability_2_desc: If a friendly Soulborg Hero who follows Utgar receives one or more wounds from a special power that is not an attack, you may destroy a guard in the Zettian Infantry you control that is adjacent to that Hero to ignore any wounds that Hero just received.

name: Zoom
ability_1_desc: Zoom may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Zoom does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. All friendly figures who start their turn adjacent to Zoom may move 2 additional spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Zoom attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement.

name: Zylta Kert
ability_1_desc: Zylta Kert may attack one or all opponents adjacent to her. If you choose to attack only one target, then you can attack the same figure again.
ability_2_desc: Zylta Kert may add 2 to her movement but she will now defend with only 3 dices, until the end of the round.

name: ZX-Series Replicator
ability_1_desc: After any Corsair you control is destroyed, you may place that Corsair on this Army Card. For the duration of the game, this ZX-Series Replicator gains the first special power on that Corsair's Army Card. All text that refers to that figure refers to this ZX-Series Replicator instead. You may not have more than one Corsair on this Army Card.

name: Zombie Hulk
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker and before taking a turn with this Zombie Hulk, if this Zombie Hulk is not engaged, you may first take a turn with another Undead Savage Hero or Squad that you control.
ability_2_desc: Figures attacked by any Undead subtract one from their defense dice for every Zombie Hulk they are engaged to.
ability_3_desc: If an Undead Savage that you control destroys an opponent's large or huge figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Zombie Hulks, and remove all markers other than order markers on that card. Undead are not affected by Zombie Rises Again.

name: ZOOM
ability_1_desc: Zoom may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Zoom does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. All friendly figures who start their turn adjacent to Zoom may move 2 additional spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Zoom attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point, before, during or after his move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: When Zoom rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage. Zoom rolls one additional defense die for each revealed order marker on this card, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice for Speed Dodge.

name: YT
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. Start the game with three green Liquid Knuckles Markers on this card. If YT causes a wound with Liquid Knuckles Special Attack, remove a Knuckle marker from this card and remove all order markers from the effected figure's card.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a large or huge figure leaves adjacency with YT, you may choose to use Poon. If you use Poon, you may place YT adjacent to the chosen figure.

name: Major J19
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Major J19, you may move Major J19 up to 3 spaces. Major J19 can attack up to 3 times with Rotary Cannon Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement. Major J19 cannot attack the same figure more than once on a single turn.

name: Adrasteia
ability_1_desc: When defending with Adrasteia, add 1 Defense die for each adjacent Human soldier, with a range of 1, you control that follows Einar up to a maximum of +3 dice for the Disciplined Phalanx power.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Adrasteia, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Adrasteia at the start of this turn, Adrasteia receives 1 additional attack die.

name: Vashj
ability_1_desc: While Vashj is on a water space, add 2 to her Defense. If Vashj starts her turn on a water space, add 1 to her movement for that turn. Vashj does not have to stop her movement when entering a water space.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose up to 3 different figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Vashj. Roll 3 attack dice for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice seperately.

name: Fathe
ability_1_desc: While Fathe is on a water space, add 1 to her Attack and Defense.
ability_2_desc: While Fahe is on a water space, add 2 to her Defense. If Fathe starts her turn on a water space, add 1 to her movement for that turn. Fathe does not have to stop her movement when entering a water space.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Fathe, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Fathe's height or 3 levels below Fathe's base, Fathe may add 1 to her Range when attacking that figure.

name: Uncle Sam
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Uncle Sam, you may roll 12 combat dice. Move up to X Soldier figures you control who follow Jandar up to 5 spaces each. X equals the number of blanks rolled. Any Soldier figures moved with I Want You take any leaving engagement attacks and must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Uncle Sam prior to moving.
ability_2_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for a Soldier Army Card that follows Jandar, you may add 1 to your die roll.

name: Orbital Drop Shock Troopers
ability_1_desc: The Orbital Drop Shock Troopers do not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher you may place all Orbital Drop Shock Troopers on any empty spaces. You cannot place them adjacent to each other or other figures, or on glyphs.
ability_2_desc: An ODST rolls an additonal die when attacking or defending against Unique figures.

name: Footmen of Lordaeron
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Footmen of Lordaeron, you may take a turn with any paladin you control.
ability_2_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on the Footmen of Lordaeron's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on the Footmen of Lordaeron's Army Card to ativate Defend for the duration of the round. While Defend is active, add 2 to the Footmen of Lordaeron's Defense Value when attacked with a nonadjacent attack and subtract 2 from the Footmen of Lordaeron's Move value.

name: Gerick
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3+Special If Gerick is attacking an Undead figure, roll 2 additional dice for Searing Light Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker and taking a turn with Gerick, you may take a turn with one other figure you control with the Party of the Bearer special power.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Gerick always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Swordsmen
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on the Swordsmen's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on the Swordsmen's Army Card to activate Defend for the duration of the round. While Defend is active, add 2 to the Swordsmen's Defense Value when attacked with a nonadjacent attack and subtract 2 from the Swordsmen's Move value.
ability_2_desc: Swordsmen never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Murgul Reavers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Murgul Reavers, you can take a turn with any demon hero you control.
ability_2_desc: While a Murgul Reaver is on a water space, add 2 to his Defense. If a Murgul Reaver starts his turn on a water space, add 1 to his movement for that turn. A Murgul Reaver does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with a Murgul Reaver, he recieves 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.

name: Siege Engine
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Destructible Object with a normal attack, this Siege Engine always adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Barrage Special Attack. This Siege Engine only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. This Siege Engine may only choose figures with the Flying special power for Barrage Special Attack.

name: Sir Elam
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Sir Elam, you may choose a wounded friendly Hero figure adjacent to Sir Elam and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 wound marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Sir Elam ends his movement unengaged, you may choose an engaged small or medium friendly figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Sir Elam whose base is no more than 2 levels higher or lower than the base of Sir Elam. You may switch Sir Elam with the chosen figure. Figures moved by Loyalty Strike never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Sir Elam rolls one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with him.

name: Ysir the Elder
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Ice Shards Barrage Special Attack. Ysir the Elder only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Ysir the Elder cannot be affected by his own Ice Shards Barrage Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Ysir the Elder's movement, ignore elevations. Ysir the Elder may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ysir the Elder starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Jackals
ability_1_desc: If a Jackal you control is attacked with a normal attack fron an adjacent figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-13 roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 14 or higher, that Jackal takes no damage and instead may move 1 space. A Jackal moved by Tumble never takes any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 white plasma shield markers on this Army Card. If a Jackal you control is attacked with a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally, you may remove one white Plasma Shield Marker from this card and ignore that attack. A Jackal may not use both Plasma Shield and Tumble on the same turn.

name: 11th Albion Mechmarine Regiment
ability_1_desc: While a Clank in the 11th Albion Mechmarine Regiment is on a water space, add 2 to its Defense. If that Clank starts its movement on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. That Clank does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.
ability_2_desc: Range 6, Attack 6. Three unengaged Clanks in the 11th Albion Mechmarine Regiment may combine their attacks and roll their attack dice as one. All three Clanks must have a clear line of sight on the target. The defending figure compares height to the highest Clank to determine height advantage for defense.
ability_3_desc: Figures with the Lava Resistant ability roll 1 fewer defense die against any attack from a Clank in the 11th Albion Mechmarine Regiment.

name: MOKRA
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Mokra, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Mokra's height or 3 levels below Mokra's base, Mokra may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: When Mokra attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to Mokra. If the chosen figure is a squad figure destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher place the chosen figure on this card. The chosen figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks. At the end of the round roll on unblockable attack die. If a skull is rolled the figure takes a wound. If a blank is rolled place the figure on a space adjacent to Mokra. Mokra may only have a maximum of 3 figures on his card due to Devour.

name: UNSC Marines
ability_1_desc: If at least two UNSC Marines that you control start their turns within 3 clear sight spaces of a UNSC Hero, then all UNSC Marines you control become inspired. Inspired UNSC Marines add one to their Move number and add 1 extra attack die for the rest of the round.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Lob 12. Attack 2. At the start of the round, place 1 white Grenade marker on a marines Army Card for each Marine squad in your Army. Remove a grenade marker to throw grenades. After moving one at a time do the following with each of the Marines that just moved: Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Grenade Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Knights of Lordaeron
ability_1_desc: Knights of Lordaeron recieve 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from them at the start of their turn.
ability_2_desc: When Knights of Lordaeron are attacked by a nonadjacent figure and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 14 or higher ignore all wounds.

name: Veth'talia
ability_1_desc: Veth'talia may use this power at any point during her turn. Veth'talia has no visible Hit Zones until the end of the current round or until she attacks or uses a special power, whichever comes first. Veth'talia will never take any leaving engagement attacks while invisible.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose a figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Veth'Thalia. Roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 14 or higher, the chosen figure subtracts 2 from its Attack and Defense Values to a minimum of 1 and has a height of 3 for the remainder of the round.

name: Adalinda the Elder
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all blanks and excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Adalinda the Elder's movement, ignore elevations. Adalinda the Elder may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Adalinda the Elder starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Daisy
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Daisy's movement, ignore elevations. Daisy may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Daisy starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Daisy, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Daisy. After you move Daisy place the chosen figure adjacent to Daisy.

name: Plasma Pistol Grunts
ability_1_desc: If none of the Plasma Pistol Grunts move this turn, add 1 die to their attack.
ability_2_desc: If a Plasma Pistol Grunt you control attacks a figure with the Shielding Special Power, Mark V Shielding Special Power, or the Shield Armor 16 Special Power add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: If an Elite or Warrior figure that you control is destroyed within 4 clear sight spaces of a Plasma Pistol Grunt you control, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher nothing happens. If you roll a 1-12 the enemy player that destroyed the figure may move three Plasma Pistol Grunts of their choice that were within 4 spaces of the destroyed figure up to 4 spaces each.

name: K'DUR
ability_1_desc: All brutes you control move one additional Space.
ability_2_desc: Each time K'dur destroys an opponent's non-adjacent Unique Hero, you make take another turn with K'dur.

name: Arbiter
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 6. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Arbiter, choose an opponents figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Arbiter and roll 6 attack dice. If Arbiter's Energy Sword Special Attack destroy's the figure place the Arbiter on the space that figure occupied. If the Arbiter's Energy Sword Special Attack does not destroy the figure place the Arbiter adjacent to the targeted figure. Arbiter may not use his Energy Sword Special Attack when he is engaged. The Arbiter can not attack a figure with Energy Sword Special Attack if the targeted figure's base is more than 10 levels higher than the Arbiter's base.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Arbiter always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Ulfgar Greataxe
ability_1_desc: When Ulfgar Greataxe wounds a figure with his normal attack the targeted figure's attack is reduced by 1 for the remainder of the round. Ulfgar Greataxe may only use the Disarm Special Power once per round.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ulfgar Greataxe may double his height.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Ulfgar Greataxe always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Marshal
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Marshal, you may place a wound marker on Marshal and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Marshal you may select up to 3 Warforged figures you control within clear sight of Marshal. Move the selected figures up to 5 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Marshal always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Minor Elites
ability_1_desc: All grunts you control move one additional Space.
ability_2_desc: Minor Elites may use Active Camoflauge at any point during their turn. Roll the 20-sided die, if you roll a 16 or higher all Minor Elites you control have no visible Hit Zones until the end of the current round or until they attack with a normal or special attack, whichever comes first. This figure will never take any leaving engagement attacks while cloaked.

name: HIPPOGRIFF
ability_1_desc: Before moving this Hippogriff, choose an unengaged friendly Small or Medium figure adjacent to him. After you move this Hippogriff, place the chosen figure adjacent to this Hippogriff.
ability_2_desc: While this Hippogriff is flying, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure that he passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to this Hippogriff at the end of its move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Talon Grab, it will not take any leaving-engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Talon Grab.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Hippogriff's movement, ignore elevations. A Hippogriff may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Hippogriff starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Space Yetis
ability_1_desc: Instead of a normal move, any or all Space Yetis may use their Jump Jets. Jump Jets has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Jump Jets movement, ignore elevations. Space Yetis may jet over water without stopping, jet over figures without becoming engaged, and jet over obstacles such as ruins. Space Yetis may not Jump Jet more than 15 levels up or down in a single Jump Jet. If the Space Yetis are engaged when they start to Jump Jet, they will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Space Yetis always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: SNAP DRAGON
ability_1_desc: If a Snap Dragon is on a water space and is attacked, roll the 20-sided die to submerge. If you roll a 1-12 roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 13 or higher, that Snap Dragon takes no damage.
ability_2_desc: While a Snap Dragon is on a water space, add 2 to his Defense. If a Snap Dragon starts his turn on a water space, add 1 to his movement for that turn. A Snap Dragon does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving and attacking normally you may choose one small or medium figure adjacent to a Snap Dragon. Roll the 20-sided die, adding 2 to the roll if the Snap Dragon is on a water space. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure recieves one wound. You may continue rolling for Death Roll until you do not roll 14 or higher or the chosen figure is destroyed.

name: Marshal
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Marshal, you may place a wound marker on Marshal and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Marshal you may select up to 3 Warforged figures you control within clear sight of Marshal. Move the selected figures up to 5 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Marshal always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Warforged Infiltrators
ability_1_desc: When a Warforged Infiltrator rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, if you roll at least one shield, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Warforged Infiltrators can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When a Warforged Infiltrator is attacking a figure that is more than four spaces away roll one additional attack die.

name: Kael'thas
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Kael'thas you may attempt to summon a Phoenix, if it is in your army and it has not yet been successfully summoned. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you must place a Phoenix within 6 clear sight spaces of Kael'thas. Any Phoenix that you cannot place on the battlefield is immediately destroyed and cannot be summoned again. When a Phoenix is summoned, you may immediately take a turn with it.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 5. Choose a figure to be attacked. Choose three figures adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Flame Strike Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Figures roll defense dice separately. Figures with the Lava Resistant Special Power are not affected by Flame Strike Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Kael'thas never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Feymire Crocodile
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving and attacking you may choose one small or medium figure adjacent to this Feymire Crocodile. Roll the 20-sided die, adding 2 to the roll if this Feymire Crocodile is on a water space. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure recieves one wound. You may continue rolling for Death Roll until you do not roll 14 or higher or the chosen figure is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: While a Feymire Crocodile is on a water space, add 2 to his Defense. If a Feymire Crocodile starts his turn on a water space, add 1 to his movement for that turn. A Feymire Crocodile does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.

name: Captain Artemis
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Captain Artemis is adjacent to at least 2 other friendly figures with the Phalanx special power, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If you control Astinos and he is destroyed, Immediately place 2 wounds on this card and for the duration of the game add 1 to Captain Artemis's attack dice and Captain Artemis attacks an additional time.

name: 2-1B
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose an adjacent friendly figure that is not a Droid or Vehicle who follows the Rebel Alliance. Remove up to two wound markers from the chosen figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: 2-1B may never attack an opponent's figure or make leaving engagement attacks.

name: 28TH UEF INFANTRY
ability_1_desc: A 28th UEF Infantry rolls an additional attack die when attacking a figure that is within 5 clear line of sight spaces. A 28th UEF Infantry rolls a second additional die when attacking a figure that is within 3 clear line of sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: When a 28th UEF Infantry is attacked with a normal attack by a figure that is not adjacent, if any part of that figure's hit zone is blocked by terrain, objects such as ruins, or figures other than the attacking or defending figure, that 28th UEF Infantry rolls an additional defense die.

name: Stelios
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's non-adjacent figure attacks, it must choose Stelios to attack if possible. When rolling defense dice against this attack, one shield rolled will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Stelios is adjacent to at least 2 other friendly figures with the Phalanx special power, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Dilios
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on any figure you control and before taking the turn, if Dilios has 1 or more wounds on his Army Card, you may remove Dilios from the battlefield and place up to 3 previously destroyed Einar squad figures you control on empty spaces adjacent to Einar figures you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Dilios is adjacent to at least 2 other friendly figures with the Phalanx special power, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Wand Sheath (Force Orb)
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Wizard, Cleric, or Artificer Figure.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose an opponent's figure to attack. Each opponent's figure adjacent to the chosen figure is also affected by Force Orb Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately.
ability_4_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Wand Sheath (force Orb)'s power.

name: 3-D MAN
ability_1_desc: 3-D Man does not start the game on the battlefield. He must be summoned onto the battlefield by Hal Chandler. At the end of the round, if 3-D Man is on the battlefield replace him with Hal Chandler.
ability_2_desc: If there is a enemy Skrull on the battlefield, 3-D Man may only attack it. 3-D Man may move an additional 3 spaces and roll 3 additional attack dice while there is a enemy Skrull on the battlefield.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with 3-D Man, choose either move, attack, or defense. Until the start of 3-D Man's next turn, increase the choosen stat by 6.

name: Agent of the Chimera
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill, Agent of the Chimera and common loyal guard figures receive 1 additional attack die.

name: Agent Thema
ability_1_desc: When defending against any attack from an enemy figure, instead of defending normally, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, Agent Thema takes as many wounds as skulls were rolled. If you roll an 11 or higher, Agent Thema takes no wounds.

name: King Leonidas
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 5. Choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of King Leonidas. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place King Leonidas on the space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, destroy King Leonidas.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if King Leonidas is adjacent to at least 2 other friendly figures with the Phalanx special power, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Agent Starz
ability_1_desc: When defending against a non-adjacent attack with any friendly non-Soulborg figure who follows Vydar within 6 clear sight spaces of Agent Starz, roll the Vydar Valkyrie dice. Each Vydar symbol counts as an additional shield. Special Agent Leadership also affects Agent Starz.
ability_2_desc: Range 7, Attack 3. If Agent Starz inflicts at least one wound with Blinding Starz Special Attack, the targeted figure may not move or attack for the remainder of that round.

name: Agent Carr
ability_1_desc: Agent Carr can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: If Agent Carr is attacking an adjacent figure, add 4 to his attack.
ability_3_desc: When Agent Carr rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice to the defense roll.

name: Agent Rigg
ability_1_desc: Agent Rigg can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: After moving normally, you may choose a figure that Agent Rigg moved through this turn and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the chosen figure takes one wound.

name: Agent Unter
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, after placing Order Markers but before rolling initiative, you may choose a figure within clear sight of Agent Unter. You may look at one random Order Marker on that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Army Card for that figure).

name: 78th Precinct Patrolmen
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Army Card of a Lawman Hero you control, if that Lawman is wounded or engaged, you may first take a turn with the 78th Precinct Patrolmen.
ability_2_desc: Any time a figure you control would receive one or more wounds, you may instead destroy an adjacent 78th Precinct Patrolman you control.

name: Agent Ross
ability_1_desc: When an opponent reveals an order marker on an Army Card that has the tricky personality, before that opponent takes a turn or uses any special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may take a turn with Agent Ross.
ability_2_desc: When defending against a figure with the precise personality, Agent Ross rolls 3 additional defense dice.

name: 8th Reich Spiders
ability_1_desc: If every Army Card you control has a militaristic personality or follows Utgar, each Spider in the 8th Reich receives 1 additional defense die.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving and attacking normally, you may move up to eight 8th Reich Spiders you control up to 4 spaces. Spiders moved with Eight Legged March must begin and remain unengaged throughout their move.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, 8th Reich Spiders may triple their height.

name: Agent Malichor
ability_1_desc: Agent Malichor rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when there are no friendly figures within 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Agent Malichor can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: If there is at least one revealed numbered Order Marker on this card, and there are no unrevealed Order Markers on this card, Agent Malichor has no visible hit zone.

name: Agent Irina
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, instead of taking a turn with Agent Irina, you may take a turn with two Dire Beasts within 4 clear sight spaces of Agent Irina.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Agent Irina. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, those chosen figure cannot any defense dice if attack by Agent Irina this turn.

name: Agent Zilar
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the round, if an opponent won initiative, before that opponent reveals an Order Marker you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card to immediately move one Agent you control up to 4 spaces. When moving with Stealth Initiative, an Agent does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, if Agent Zilar is unengaged, she may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Agent Zilar adds 1 to her defense when defending against an attack from a Unique figure.

name: Agent Ford
ability_1_desc: All Agents you control, except Agent Ford, move one additional space.
