ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Agent Ford, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with Agent Ford.
ability_3_desc: When Agent Ford attacks a non-adjacent figure, she may add 2 to her attack. If she does not, she may make one additional attack on a non-adjacent figure.

name: Abyssal Impaler
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with this Abyssal Impaler, you may first take a turn with any Demon squad which follows Valkrill.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with this Abyssal Impaler, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, place 1 wound marker on this Army Card. If you roll a 6-20, remove 2 wound markers from this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Demon squads which follow Valkrill receive 1 extra movement as long as an Abyssal Impaler is in play.

name: Agent Skahen
ability_1_desc: When Agent Skahen attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure, if Agent Skahen inflicts one or more wounds, you may move one Tricky figure you control who follows Vydar and is within 8 clear sight spaces of Agent Skahen up to 4 spaces. You cannot use Cover Fire to move Agent Skahen.
ability_3_desc: When Agent Skahen rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: ACILINO
ability_1_desc: If Acilino did not move this turn, he may attack two additional times.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Acilino's movement, ignore elevations. Acilino may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Acilino starts to fly, he will receive any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Acilino may end his movement on a space occupied by a small or medium figure. If he does, move that figure to an adjacent same level or lower space. The controlling player moves the figure. Falling damage will apply to non-flying figures.

name: Agent Walker
ability_1_desc: After making a normal attack on an opponent's figure, if at least 2 skulls are rolled, Agent Walker may move up to 3 spaces. She does not take any leaving engagement attacks from the figure she just attacked.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack Special. Target an engaged figure and roll 3 attack dice. Each skull rolled counts as two hits. Set aside any dice that did not show a skull. You may attack again with Dual Blade Special Attack, if possible, re-rolling the dice you set aside. On that attack, each skull counts as one hit.

name: Agent Toshi
ability_1_desc: Range 6, Attack: 5. This attack only affects Kings, Queens, Emperors, Empresses, Lords and Ladies. Any figure damaged by Royal Flush Special Attack must roll the 20-sided die. If a 19-20 is rolled, the figure is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: Range: 1, Attack: 4. Full House Special Attack may only be used once per game. All figures next to Agent Toshi are affected by Full House Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Roll defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: Range: 4, Attack 1, 2 or 3. Agent Toshi can make 2 attacks of 3 dice, 3 attacks of 2 dice or 4 attacks of 1 attack die.

name: Agent Moore
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, before taking a turn with Agent Moore, you may take a turn with one other Unique Agent Hero you control who follows Jandar.
ability_2_desc: After making a normal attack, if Agent Moore is unengaged, she may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Agent Moore, and all Agents you control who follow Jandar, roll 1 additional die when defending against a normal or special attack from an Agent, Specialist, or Ninja.

name: Agent Nolan
ability_1_desc: When Agent Nolan recieves one or more wounds, before placing wound markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, ignore all wounds.
ability_2_desc: Agent Nolan does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. Add 3 to Agent Nolan's defense while he is on a water space.
ability_3_desc: Range 10. Attack 2. When attacking with Agent Nolan's Laser Blast Special Attack, you may attack again every time you inflict one or more wounds.

name: Acolarh
ability_1_title: Leaf of the Home Tree Aura
ability_1_desc: When any Elf you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Acolarh recieves enough wounds to be destroyed, you may roll 12 Ullar Valkyrie dice before removing the figure. If you roll at least 3 Ullar symbols, ignore any wounds that figure just recieved. Acolarh's Leaf of the Home Tree Aura does not affect Acolarh.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures who follow Ullar and start their turn adjacent to Acolarh may move 2 additional spaces.
ability_3_desc: When Acolarh rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: 77TH INFANTRY MEDIC
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on the Army Card of a Unique Soldier Hero you control that follows Jandar, and after taking that Unique Soldier Hero's turn, you may move each 77th Infantry Medic figure you control up to 5 spaces. A Medic must be able to move adjacent to a Unique Soldier figure you control that follows Jandar in order to use Marching Orders.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a 77th Infantry Medic Army Card you control and instead of moving normally, you may remove up to 1 wound from each Unique Human Hero you control that is adjacent to at least one Medic you control.

name: AGONN
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Agonn rolls 2 additional defense dice and friendly common figures adjacent to Agonn roll an additional defense die. When selected as targets for a special power that involves the 20-sided die Agonn and friendly common figures adjacent to him may choose to reduce the number rolled on the 20-sided die by 2.
ability_2_desc: All Guards you control move on additional space.

name: Abe No Seimei
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Yokai Army Card you control and taking a turn with those figures, you may move that revealed Order Marker to any other card you control.
ability_2_desc: After placing Order Markers and before rolling for initiative, you may reveal an "X" Order Marker that is on any Army Card you control. If you do, you may look at a random unrevealed Order Marker on an opponent's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Before moving normally with any Yokai Hero that you control, you may first switch it with any other Yokai figure that you control. Figures moved by Shapeshift never take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: 97-R Assimilators
ability_1_desc: When defending against an adjacent attack, if a 97-R Assimilator is engaged with at least 1 opponent's figure, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a nonadjacent figure, a 97-R Assimilator rolls one additional die for every other Assimilator that attacked the same figure this turn, and the defending figure rolls one less defense die for every 2 Assimilators they are engaged to.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for 97-R Assimilators' movement, ignore elevations. Assimilators can pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Assimilators start to fly, they will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Agent Walker
ability_1_desc: After making a normal attack on an opponent's figure, if at least 2 skulls are rolled, Agent Walker may move up to 3 spaces. She does not take any leaving engagement attacks from the figure she just attacked.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack Special. Target an engaged figure and roll 3 attack dice. Each skull rolled counts as two hits. Set aside any dice that did not show a skull. You may attack again with Dual Blade Special Attack, if possible, re-rolling the dice you set aside. On that attack, each skull counts as one hit.
ability_3_desc: Agent Walker adds 1 to her defense against a non-adjacent attack, if line of sight on any part of her hit zone is obstructed by a figure, object, or terrain adjacent to her.

name: Agent Mistryl
ability_1_desc: Agent Mistryl can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Agent Mistryl. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Agent Mistryl this turn.
ability_3_desc: When Agent Mistryl rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: Abner Crow
ability_1_desc: Range 4, Attack 2. Abner Crow may attack up to three times with Make 'Em Dance Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: At the end of Abner Crow's turn, roll the 20-sided die once for each figure attacked by Abner Crow this turn. On a 14 or higher, move that figure up to two spaces away from Abner Crow. Figures moved this way do not take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a Unique Hero, Abner Crow rolls one additional attack die.

name: Aegis
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Aegis's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Aegis's Army Card to activate Aura of Power for the duration of the round. While Aura of Power is active, all figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Aegis add 1 to their attack and defense dice. Aegis's Aura of Power does not affect Aegis.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally with Aegis, you may immediately place it on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of Aegis and is no higher than 1 level above his height or 3 levels below his base. If Aegis is engaged when it starts its Underground Movement, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Abomination
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Abomination may use Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Super Leap movement, ignore elevations. Abomination may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Abomination may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Abomination is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Abomination rolls 3 fewer attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap.
ability_2_desc: Range 1, Attack 3. Any figure adjacent to Abomination is affected by this special attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately. Abomination cannot use this special attack and Super Leap in the same turn.

name: Agent Liu
ability_1_desc: Agent Liu rolls 1 additional defense die against a normal or special attack from a Tricky figure. A Tricky figure that is engaged with Agent Liu may not use any special power on its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Agent Liu is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 12 or higher, Agent Liu takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Agent Liu can Shadow Dodge only if she ends her move unengaged. She does not take leaving engagement attacks while moving with Shadow Dodge.
ability_3_desc: If Agent Liu attacks an adjacent figure with her normal attack and at least one skull is rolled, she may attack an adjacent figure again. She may continue attacking, reducing her attack value by 1 for each subsequent attack, until you fail to roll a skull.

name: Doctor Octopus
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 3 spaces of Doctor Octopus, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Doctor Octopus' height or 3 levels below Doctor Octopus' base, Doctor Octopus may add 2 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, choose an adjacent figure that is not Huge. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 11 or higher, you may throw the figure by placing it on any empty space within 4 spaces of Doctor Octopus. After the figure is placed, roll one unblockable attack die for throwing damage. If the figure is thrown onto a level higher than the height of Doctor Octopus or onto water, do not roll for throwing damage. The thrown figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Doctor Octopus may use his Arm Crawl. Arm Crawl has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Doctor Octopus' Arm Crawl movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Octopus may crawl over water without stopping, crawl over figures without becoming engaged, and crawl over obstacles such as ruins. Doctor Octopus may not Arm Crawl more than 10 levels up or down in a single Arm Crawl. If Doctor Octopus is engaged when he starts to Arm Crawl, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Agent Wei
ability_1_desc: Agent Wei may move through all figures and never takes any leaving engagement attacks. Agent Wei has no hit zone. If Agent Wei attacks or wounds a figure, or steps on a space with a Glyph or Treasure Glyph on it, Undercover will no longer apply for the rest of the game.
ability_2_desc: At the end of every round, if Agent Wei did not attack or wound any figures that round, you may move her up to 6 spaces. Agent Wei will take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Covert Movement.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Agent Wei, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with Agent Wei.

name: Agrith-Naar
ability_1_desc: Agrith-Naar may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: If Agrith-Naar did not destroy a figure during his turn, place a wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Agrith-Naar's movement, ignore elevations. Agrith-Naar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Agrith-Naar is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ahkrin
ability_1_desc: If Ahkrin is adjacent to at least one friendly Hero figure add 1 die to Ahkrin's attack, if at least one of those Heroes is a Dragon, add 1 additional die to Ahkrin's attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 1. When Ahkrin attacks with his Silver Shard Breath Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once. All skulls rolled count for one additional hit. Ahkrin can use Silver Shard Breath Special Attack only during one turn each round.

name: Amanda Waller
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose one unique Army Card you control. For the rest of the game, the chosen's card's class is Agent, regardless of what is listed on the card.
ability_2_desc: All Agents you control move one additional space. Agent Leadership does not affect Amanda Waller.

name: Amanda Waller
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any one unique Army Card you control. For the rest of the game the chosen card's class is Agent, regardless of what is listed on the card.
ability_2_desc: All Agents you control move one additional space. Amanda Waller's Agent Leadership does not affect Amanda Waller.

name: Alaric the Conqueror
ability_1_desc: Alaric the Conqueror receives 1 additional attack die for each adjacent Wild figure, to a maximum of +4 dice for the Fury of the Clans special power.
ability_2_desc: All Wild figures you control who start their turn adjacent to Alaric the Conqueror may move 1 additional space. Alaric's Wild Movement Enhancement does not affect Alaric.

name: Agrith-Naar
ability_1_desc: Agrith-Naar may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: At the end of Agrith-Naar's turn, if he did not destroy a Hero or Squad figure with his normal attack during that turn, you must place a wound marker on his Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Agrith-Naar's movement, ignore elevations. Agrith-Naar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Agrith-Naar starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Essence of the Scout
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: This figure can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Essence of the Scout's power.

name: Akhenaten
ability_1_desc: When rolling a normal attack against an enemy figure you may remove one of the die that rolled a skull from your roll and place it on this card to save it. After you roll a normal attack and before your opponent rolls defense, you may move any number of saved skulls off this card to add them to your attack. You may only save up to 2 skulls on this card at any time.
ability_2_desc: Guards that you control never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack from a figure with a Range number of 4 or more that is not a Cleric or a Wizard, a Tomb Skeleton adds 1 die.

name: Alastair MacCain
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may change Alastair MacCain's personality. If you choose to do, Alastair MacCain's personality is now either Right Wing or Left Wing, regardless of what is listed on the card.
ability_2_desc: Alastair MacCain may not be in an army with a unit receiving a C- or lower in spider_poison's Power Rankings. If a C- or lower unit becomes a unit you control, that unit is immediately destroyed. Any opponent's C- or lower units roll 3 fewer defense dice when attacked by Alastair MacCain.

name: Vanguard Treads
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: This figure may not be moved by a special power on any army card or glyph.
ability_3_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Vanguard Treads's power.

name: Ancient Swamp Lord
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Ancient Swamp Lord, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Ancient Swamp Lord rolls 2 less defense dice against Fire-based special attacks.
ability_3_desc: If Ancient Swamp Lord ends his movement on swamp water, you may move up to two more spaces, if the spaces are swamp water. Ancient Swamp Lord never takes any leaving engagement attacks if he begins his disengagement while on swamp water.

name: Alchemy Titan
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least 1 wound from Alchemy Titan, you may place a Alchemy Marker on that figure's Army Card. For the duration of the game, that figure's Species, Class, and Personality are changed to Nonmaterial.
ability_2_desc: If Oder Marker 3 is placed on this Army Card, then instead of taking a turn with Alchemy Titan, you may use Dematerialize. Destroy all Nonmaterial figures adjacent to Alchemy Titan and remove one wound marker from this Army Card for every figure destroyed.

name: ALDWOOD
ability_1_desc: Figures adjacent to Aldwood are considered to be adjacent to a Jungle Bush.
ability_2_desc:
Aldwood starts the game with 1 green Put Down Roots marker. After moving and before attacking, you may place the Put Down Roots marker on this Army Card. As long as the marker remains on this Card:

● Subtract 4 from Aldwood's attack and add 4 to his defense.
● All other friendly Plants within 3 spaces of Aldwood roll 1 additional attack and defense die.

If Aldwood moves, immediately take the Put Down Roots marker off this Army Card.

name: Alakaun Baenurden
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Alakaun Baenurden's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Alakaun Baenurden's Army Card to activate Darkness for the duration of the round. While Darkness is active, Alakaun Baenurden and all adjacent figures have no visible hit zones and may not be targeted by any power on any army card that requires clear sight.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. If a figure takes wounds from Orb of Acid Special Attack, roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 12 or greater, that figure takes an additional wound. After attacking with Orb of Acid Special Attack, Alakaun Baenurden may attack again with Orb of Acid Special Attack.

name: Alpha Drudge
ability_1_desc: When an Alpha Drudge attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If an Alpha Drudge ends its normal movement on a swamp water space, you may immediately place it on any empty swamp water space within 5 spaces. If an Alpha Drudge is engaged when it starts to tunnel, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When using the Marro Hive's Marro Rebirth special power, you may place a previously destroyed Alpha Drudge from your army on an empty space adjacent to the Marro Hive instead of placing a common Marro Squad figure.

name: Angel
ability_1_desc: Angel will not take passing swipes when he starts to fly.
ability_2_desc: While Angel is flying, choose a friendly Small or Medium figure he passed over. Place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to Angel at the end of his move. The chosen figure will not take passing swipes.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, after Angel or another friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces defends, move Angel up to 6 spaces.

name: Angel
ability_1_desc: If Angel is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to disappear. If you roll a 9 or higher, Angel takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Angel can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When counting spaces for Angel's movement, elevation changes up to 4 levels count as one space.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with Angel, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Amy Pond
ability_1_desc: If at least one order marker is on Amy Pond, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: If you control The Doctor and Amy Pond is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, you may immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11-20, Amy Pond takes no damage and The Doctor may move up to 5 spaces if his final position is closer to Amy Pond than at the beginning of his move. The Doctor does not take leaving engagement attacks while moving with "Doctor!"
ability_3_desc: You may add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Regeneration power on any Time Lord Army Card.

name: Alamar Ironhoof
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Alamar Ironhoof's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Alamar Ironhoof's Army Card to activate Berserker Rage for the duration of the round. While Berserker Rage is active, Alamar Ironhoof may roll 2 additional attack dice and may not be moved by any special power on a Army Card or Glyph. Also while Berserker Rage is active, if Amalar Ironhoof receives any wounds from a normal attack, then he receives one additional wound.

name: Androphagos
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Androphagos destroys a figure with this special attack, remove a wound marker from his army card.
ability_2_desc: When Androphagos attacks a non-adjacent figure with a normal attack, he may attack one additional time. This extra attack may not target the same figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Androphagos' movement, ignore elevations. Andophagos may fly over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles such as ruins. if Androphagos is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Alabaster Sentinels
ability_1_desc: If there are no revealed order markers on this card, add 2 to the Defense value of this card.
ability_2_desc: An Alabaster Sentinel can add 4 to its Move if it only moves in a straight line this turn.

name: Annihilation Drones
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. An Annihilation Drone that moved but did not attack normally may use Kamikaze Special Attack. If the targeted figure is a small or medium figure, it may not roll any defense dice. If the targeted figure is a large figure, it may not roll more than 2 defense dice. After attacking, destroy the Annihilation Drone
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Annihilation Drones always add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Amberhive Protectors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Amberhive Protectors, you may first take a turn with any Insect Hero you control. If you do not take a turn with any Insect Hero you control, you may move and attack with up to 6 Amberhive Protectors you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When attacking a figure within 4 spaces of an Insect Hero you control, an Amberhive Protector may use Sacrificial Sting Special Attack. If the defending figure receives any wounds from Sacrificial Sting Special Attack, destroy the attacking Amberhive Protector.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for an Amberhive Protector's movement, ignore elevations. An Amberhive Protector may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When an Amberhive Protector starts to fly, if she is engaged, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: ANG-MA-RA
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16-19, choose 3 adjacent figures to Ang-Ma-Ra and remove all order markers from the chosen figure's Army Card ( or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure). If you roll a 20, remove all unused order markers from Ang-Ma-Ra and destroy all adjacent enemy figures. Ang-Ma-Ra may not benefit from the affects of a roll of 20 if he does not have unused order markers on his Army card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure add 3 dice to Ang-Ma-Ra attack.

name: Akul
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3 + special. When attacking with this Special Attack, you may also choose up to two figures adjacent to the target figure to be affected. Roll attack dice separately for each affected figure. After attacking with this Special Attack, you may attack with it one additional time, rolling one fewer attack die.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, after Akul destroys a small or medium figure that is not a Soulborg with an adjacent normal attack, you may remove a wound marker from this card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defence dice against a normal attack from small or medium Squad figures, Akul receives 2 additional defence dice.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Akul's movement, ignore elevations. Akul may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Akul is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Darkseid
ability_1_desc: Range 7 Attack 5. Instead of his normal attack, Darkseid may use Omega Beams. Omega Beams may curve around figures and terrain. Choose a figure to attack. Roll attack dice. If Darkseid inflicts at least 1 wound, the defending figure is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Darkseid add 1 die to their defense rolls.

name: AIR ARCHON
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Air Archon's Army Card, you may first take a turn with any two air elementals that you control.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure without the FLYING or Stealth Fling special power within 4 clear sight spaces of this Air Archon. Roll the 20-sided die. If the choosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 11 or higher, destroy it. If the choosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 18 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero figure. If this Air Archon destroys the selected figures with Tornado, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Air Elemental.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Air Archon's movement, ignore elevations. A Air Archon may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Air Archon starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagem

name: Arabian Knights
ability_1_desc: Figures defending against an Arabian Knight roll one less defense die.
ability_2_desc: If an Arabian Knight fails to wound a figure it may attack that figure one additional time.

name: Arbiters of Justice
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with them, the Arbiters may make a second attack against an enemy figure that is adjacent to a friendly figure.

name: AMORE
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Amore and roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 7 or higher, or if the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 19 or higher, place the chosen figure on any Unique Hero Army Card. Figures moved by Arrow of Infatuation do not take any leaving engagement attacks. Arrow of Infatuation does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: For the entire game, when a Unique Hero would receive one or more wounds, if that Hero's Army Card has one or more figures on it due to Arrow of Infatuation, destroy those figures and ignore all wounds.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Amore's movement, ignore elevations. Amore may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Amore starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Anna Keller
ability_1_desc: Instead of her normal move, Anna Keller may use her Grapple Line. Grapple Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Grapple Line ignore elevations. Anna may grapple over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles such as ruins. Anna may not grapple more than 20 levels up or down in a single Grapple Line move. If Anna is engaged when she starts her Grapple Line move, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Anna Keller rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Angel
ability_1_desc: Angel rolls 2 additional defense dice when defending against non-adjacent figures or flying figures.
ability_2_desc: When Angel is flying, you may choose one friendly small or medium figure he passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty space adjacent to Angel at the end of his move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Aerial Rescue, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs may never be moved by Aerial Rescue.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Angel's movement, ignore elevations. Angel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Angel starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: QUAHON
ability_1_desc: Range 4+ Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also chose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Lightning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Lightning Breath Special Attack does not affect destructable objects.

name: Appa
ability_1_desc: Before moving Appa, choose up to three unengaged friendly Small or Medium figures adjacent to him. After you move Appa, place the chosen figures adjacent to Appa.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by the Tail Slam Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Ardynale
ability_1_desc: Range: 6 Attack: 1+Special When Ardynale attacks with Dancing Flames Special Attack, she may attack 2 additional times. Add 1 to Ardynale's attack dice for every additional Elf Wizard within 3 clear sight spaces of Ardynale, up to a maximum of +2 dice.

name: Ant-Man
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure ends its move on a space within 2 clear sight spaces of Ant-Man, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Ant-Man can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When Ant-Man leaves engagement with small or medium figures he may make a leaving engagement attack against them. He cannot make a leaving engagement attack against the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ant-Man may double his height.

name: Ant-Man
ability_1_desc: Any time an opponent's figure begins its movement within 4 clear sight spaces of Ant-Man, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, that figure may not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: Ant-Man can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When Ant-Man leaves an engagement with a small or medium figure, he may make a leaving engagement attack against them. He may not make a leaving engagement attack against the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ant-Man may add 2 to his height.

name: Aragorn
ability_1_desc: Opponent's figures roll one less attack die when attacking Aragorn or any friendly figure adjacent to Aragorn.
ability_2_desc: When Aragorn attacks, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Aragorn, you may take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.

name: Annihilus
ability_1_desc: Annihilus starts the game with the Cosmic Control Rod Marker on this card. While the Cosmic Control Rod Marker is on this card, Annihilus adds 2 to his move and attack values. Before moving, you may remove the Cosmic Control Rod Marker from this card to remove all wound markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Annihilus' movement, ignore elevations. Annihilus may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Annihilus starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Aquorion
ability_1_desc: When Aquorion begins his turn on a water space, he may move 3 additional spaces. Aquorion may move over water without stoping.
ability_2_desc: If Aquorion is on a water space when attacking, he may add one additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: When Aquorion is in a water space and he is being attack by a normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher ignore all wounds.

name: Army of the Dead
ability_1_desc: Army of the Dead is not affected by powers that affect living figures.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, all skulls rolled count as shields.

name: Aubrien Archers
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with the Aubrien Archers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with the Aubrien Archers.

name: Arianna
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Arianna, instead of taking that turn with Arianna, you may take a turn with up to six Ravens you control that are within 8 clear sight spaces of Arianna.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Arianna, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6-13, you may, if possible, place one of your destroyed Ravens on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Arianna. If you roll a 14-18, you may place up to 2 of your previously destroyed Ravens. If you roll a 19 or higher, you may place up to 3 of your previously destroyed Ravens.

name: Armless Tiger Man
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 4. Choose a non-adjacent figure whose base is not higher or lower than 4 levels from the base of Armless Tiger Man to attack. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place Armless Tiger Man on a space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, immediately place Armless Tiger Man on a space adjacent to that figure.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Robot or Destructible Object with his normal attack, Armless Tiger Man receives 1 additional attack die.

name: Asajj Ventress
ability_1_desc: When Asajj Ventress attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Opponents figures must be adjacent to Asajj Ventress to attack her with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, if Asajj Ventress destroys an enemy, she can move up to one space and then attack another enemy.
ability_4_desc: Asajj Ventress can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Anduril, Flame of the West
ability_1_desc: If Aragorn is the one wielding this sword, he adds 1 to his Attack and Defense while engaged, and his Class becomes King in addition to his current Class.
ability_2_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference to Andúril's power.

name: An Bláth Dúnmharú
ability_1_desc: An Bláth Dúnmharú does not start the game on the battlefield. At the beginning of any round, before placing Order Markers, if an opponent's figure was destroyed during the previous round, whether An Bláth Dúnmharú is on the board, has not yet been deployed or is destroyed, you may remove all Wound Markers from this card and place An Bláth Dúnmharú on any empty space within 2 spaces of an opponent's figure. All spaces adjacent to An Bláth Dúnmharú are considered swamp water spaces and whenever a special power on an Army Card refers to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, it refers to An Bláth Dúnmharú as well.
ability_2_desc: All opponents' small or medium figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to An Bláth Dúnmharú, and any opponents' figures within 2 clear sight spaces of An Bláth Dúnmharú that occupy a swamp water space or are adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle piece, may not move, except to engage An Bláth Dúnmharú. Figures affected by Undergrowth Tendrils cannot be moved by any special power on any other Army Card. Before attacking with An Bláth Dúnmharú, you may place any small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces of An Bláth Dúnmharú adjacent to her.
ability_3_desc: If An Bláth Dúnmharú is only adjacent to one opponent's small or medium Common figure, that figure may not roll defence dice against An Bláth Dúnmharú. If An Bláth Dúnmharú is only adjacent to one opponent's small or medium Unique figure, that figure rolls two fewer defence dice against An Bláth Dúnmharú.

name: AQUADOM
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Aquadom, you may first take a turn with any two water elementals that you control.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose an opponent's small or medium figure that is within 5 clear sight space on a water space. If Aquadom destroys the selected figures with Whirlpool Special attack, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Water Elemental.
ability_3_desc: If Aquadom ends it normal movement on a water space, you may immediately place it on any empty, same-level water space within 5 spaces. If Aquadom is engaged when it starts its Water Tunnel, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wand Sheath (Mage Hand)
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Wizard, Cleric, or Artificer Figure.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking with this figure, you may choose a Treasure Glyph on an unoccupied space within 4 spaces of this figure. You may move that Treasure Glyph onto any empty same-level space adjacent to this figure. Symbol-side-up Treasure Glyphs cannot be revealed, and power-side-up Treasure Glyphs must be placed power-side-up when moved by Mage Hand.
ability_4_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Wand Sheath (mage Hand)'s power.

name: Ashigaru Yari
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack Special. If 2, 3, or 4 Ashigaru Yari you control are adjacent to the same enemy figure, they may roll their attack dice as one combined attack of 4, 6, or 8. The defending figure compares height to the lowest Ashigaru Yari to determine any height advantage. Encircle Special Attack may only be used once per turn. If Encircle Special Attack is used, figures not involved in the attack but that moved this turn may still do a normal attack.

name: Arcane Flame Sprite
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, if you control at least one Archon, Wizard or Sorcerer, you may take a turn with up to three Arcane Flame Sprites you control.
ability_2_desc: When determining height advantage or adjacency, add 4 to the level of an Arcane Flame Sprite's base. This Sprite is never affected by terrain, and has no effect on a Glyph it is on. If a special power on an Army Card or Glyph causes this Sprite to lose its Flying ability, destroy this Arcane Flame Sprite.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Sprite's movement, ignore elevations. This Sprite may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins.

name: Asisay
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Asisay you must remove any Stance Markers on this Army Card and place either a Blue Stance Marker or a Red Stance Marker on this Army Card. Asisay and all Warriors and Protectors you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Asisay: Receive an additional defense die when defending against a figure that is not adjacent to them if a Blue Stance Marker is on this Army Card. or Receive an additional attack die when attacking a figure adjacent to them if a Red Stance Marker is on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When Asisay rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Auric Stormcleave
ability_1_desc: You may subtract 2 from Auric Stormcleave's Attack to add 3 to his Range. After making a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure, Auric Stormcleave may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Auric Stormcleave rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against a Terrifying figure.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Auric Stormcleave may double his height.

name: Aurora
ability_1_desc: If Aurora does not attack, she may move a second time.
ability_2_desc: Range 4 Attack Special Every figure within 4 hexes of Aurora must roll d20 >12 to avoid being blinded for the rest of the round. Effects of Blindness: 1/2 movement, 1/2 attack dice, 1/2 defense dice. Round Fractions Down.
ability_3_desc: When Aurora attacks with a regular attack, she may attack 4 more times.

name: Babauan Hunters
ability_1_desc: When adjacent to a Jungle Piece or an Evergreen Piece, the Babauan Hunters may add 1 more dice to their defense.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, the Babauan Hunters may double their height.

name: Ashi-Dhulu
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally with Ashi-Dhulu, you may immediately place him on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of Ashi-Dhulu and is no higher than 1 level above his height or 3 levels below his base. If Ashi-Dhulu is engaged when he starts his Stealth Underground Movement, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Before using Stealth Underground Movement, you may choose a small or medium Common figure on a space where Ashi-Dhulu could end his Stealth Underground Movement. Destroy the chosen figure and immediately place Ashi-Dhulu on that space using Stealth Underground Movement.

name: Aravi T'se
ability_1_desc: All Demon figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Aravi T'se roll 1 additional attack die when making a normal attack on an adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 5, Attack 3. If Aravi T'se inflicts at least 1 wound with Enervation Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die for Enervation Damage. If you roll a 1-9, the defending figure receives no additional wounds for Enervation Damage. If you roll a 10-19, add 1 additional wound marker to the defending figure's Army Card and roll again for Enervation Damage. If you a roll a 20, destroy the defending figure. Enervation Special Attack does not affect Animates or Destructible Objects.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Aravi T'se, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, while she remains on that space, Aravi T'se has no visible Hit Zone until the next time you reveal an order marker.

name: Awesome Android
ability_1_desc: If Awesome Android is the only figure you control, he cannot take turns.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose 4 spaces in a straight line from Awesome Android. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Gale Force Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. Gale Force Special Attack may cause Knockback.

name: Atom
ability_1_desc: If Atom is unengaged, instead of moving normally, you may choose a figure you control within 6 spaces of Atom and immediately place Atom on an empty space adjacent to the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. If Atom is attacking a figure that he was not engaged with at the start of his turn he may attack with his Atomic Uppercut Special Attack. If a skull is rolled it counts for two additional hits.
ability_3_desc: Atom can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Atom may triple his Height.

name: Asgard Mithrilaxe
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move Asgard again.
ability_2_desc: If Asgard starts his movement unengaged and moves his full movement of 5 spaces and becomes engaged roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher you may move all engaged small or medium figures engaged with Asgard 1 adjacent space on the same level or lower. Affected figures roll for disengage strike from other engaged figures but not Asgard. This power is activated before abilities such as Berserker Charge.
ability_3_desc: When moving up and down levels of terrain Asgard may double his height.

name: Aryxon
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, choose a Unique Wizard or Archmage Hero you control to be Aryxon's chosen Master. After taking a turn with its Master, you may take a turn with Aryxon.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking normally, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may use Dragon Magic on that figure. If you control the figure, remove one wound marker from its Army Card. If an opponent controls the figure, it takes one wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Aryxon's movement, ignore elevations. Aryxon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Aryxon starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Babauligos
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, instead of taking a turn with Babauligos you may take a turn with up to two differently named Demon Army Cards you control.
ability_2_desc: When Babauligos receives a wound from a normal attack from an adjacent figure, all skulls rolled by Babauligos count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Bagrak
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this Hammer Smash Special Attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures.
ability_2_desc: If Bagrak starts her turn adjacent to any figure you control with a "Fearless" personality, she may move 4 additional spaces.

name: Azzer
ability_1_desc: If Azzer inflicts one or more wounds to a Unique or Uncommon Hero, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, then the Hero must drop each Treasure Glyph that he is currently has on his Army Card on empty same level adjacent spaces. If there are no empty same level spaces or not enough spaces each Treasure Glyphs are destroyed.
ability_2_desc: Each time a figure is destroyed with the Stare of Stone special power place that figure on this Army Card. When attacking Azzer may roll additional attack dice equal to the number of figures on this Army Card.

name: Atlaga the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: All Kyrie you control, except Atlaga, move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Atlaga, you may choose any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Atlaga. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-15, nothing happens. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure is destroyed. Atlaga may attempt to use this power only once per game.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Atlaga's movement, ignore elevations. Atlaga may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Atlaga starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Badru Alpha
ability_1_desc: At the start of a round, before placing Order Markers, if this Badru Alpha is within 3 clear sight spaces of at least one opponent's figure, you may place up to 3 of your previously destroyed common Wolf figures on any previously empty spaces in your Starting Zone. You may only use this power once per game.
ability_2_desc: Other friendly Relentless figures do not take leaving engagement attacks from opponent's figures that are engaged with this Badru Alpha.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this Badru Alpha may double its height.

name: Avalanche
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for his normal attack, add 1 die to Avalanche's attack for each obstacle or destructible object on a space adjacent to the targeted figure. All hits rolled also count as hits rolled against any destructible objects adjacent to the targeted figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Choose the first figure on each of the 6 straight lines from Avalanche to attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. After resolving this attack, move each small and medium affected figure 1 space in a straight line away from Avalanche. Each figure that cannot be moved receives 1 wound. Figures moved by this attack will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Badru Alpha
ability_1_desc: At the start of a round, before you place Order Markers, if this Badru Alpha is within 3 clear sight spaces of at least one opponent's figure, you may place up to 3 of your previously destroyed common Wolf figures on any empty spaces in your Starting Zone. You may only use this power once per game.
ability_2_desc: Friendly Relentless figures do not take leaving engagement attacks from opponent's figures that are engaged with this Badru Alpha.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this Badru Alpha may double its Height.

name: BALIN
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Balin, if there is an opponent's figure within 12 clear sight spaces of Balin, you may move two other Dwarf Heroes you control up to 4 spaces each. Figures moved by Lookout must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Balin before moving.
ability_2_desc: If Balin has 3 or more wounds on his Army Card, add 2 to his defense dice.

name: Baron Von Spinnentier
ability_1_desc: All Arachnids you control add 1 to their Attack value when attacking a small or medium figure adjacent to Baron Von Spinnentier.
ability_2_desc: When Baron Von Spinnentier attacks, he may either attack the same figure again or attack 3 additional times but cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.

name: AUDROX
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose one small or medium opponent's figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Audrox and roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 8 from your roll if the chosen figure is a Unique Hero, Soulborg, or Undead figure. If you roll a 10 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty space adjacent to Audrox.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Audrox cannot move. Figures affected by Vine Wrap cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or Glyph. Soulborg and Undead figures are not affected by Vine Wrap.
ability_3_desc: Audrox rolls 2 fewer attack dice against Soulborgs and Undead figures. If Audrox destroys a figure that is not a Soulborg or Undead, remove one wound marker from this Army Card.

name: B.T. Wilson, P.I.
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may look at one order marker on an opponent's Army Card, if a figure on that card is within 4 clear sight spaces of B.T. Wilson.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Shotgun Blast Special Attack. B.T. Wilson only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. B.T. Wilson cannot be affected by his own Shotgun Blast Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure, if B.T. Wilson inflicts one or more wounds, you may move another Unique Human Hero you control within 6 clear sight spaces of B.T. Wilson up to 4 spaces.

name: Baruk Kurab
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When using Morning Star Special Attack, Baruk Kurab must attack each figure adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Baruk Kurab, you may first take a turn with one Medium Guard Hero that you control.

name: Balan Nor
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Army Card of a Unique Mariedian Hero you control that is adjacent to Balan Nor, you may immediately move Balan Nor up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: If a figure that is engaged with Balan Nor makes a leaving engagement attack on another figure you control and at least one skull is rolled, you may place one wound on this card to ignore all wounds from that leaving engagement attack.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Balan Nor, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with Balan Nor.

name: Bace Kleff
ability_1_desc: Range: Special Attack: 2. When Bace Kleff uses Swing Music Special Attack he may attack any or all creatures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately. After each Attack you must roll a d20. On a 1 the Didgeridoo breaks, you end your turn, and can not use Swing Music Special Attack again.
ability_2_desc: Bace Kleff always adds one automatic shield when rolling defense dice against any attack within 5 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Range: 5 Attack: 3. If Didgeridart Special Attack inflicts a wound and does not destroy the figure, you may roll the d20 for poison damage. 1-15 the defending figure receives no additional poison damage. 16-20 add one additional wound marker to the defending figures army card. You can not use Didgeridart Special Attack if you rolled a 1 during a Swing Music Special Attack.

name: Bala Cynwyd
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on an Army Card you control, you may immediately reveal the X Order Marker on this card. For the rest of the turn, Bala Cynwyd, and all figures you control within 4 spaces of her, add 1 to their attack, and may not have their attack reduced by any special power on an opponent's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. If the figure is Common, add 4 to your roll. If you roll a 17 or higher, you may move the figure up to 2 spaces. Figures moved by Confusion will take leaving engagement attacks and will take falling damage. Mindless, Overlord, and Psychic figures are not affected by Confusion.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, you may change your initiative roll to a 20.

name: Beast Boy (Ground)
ability_1_desc: Your army can only include Beast Boy (Ground) if it also includes Beast Boy. Beast Boy (Ground) never starts the game on the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Beast Boy, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Beast Boy. After you move Beast Boy, place the chosen figure adjacent to Beast Boy.

name: Azurite Warlord
ability_1_desc: When a friendly figure you control attacks an adjacent enemy figure, if the attack roll contains at least 1 skull, you may add 1 automatic skull to the attack roll.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you may move up to 2 spaces and attack again with any adjacent figures.

name: Beakface Rogue
ability_1_desc: If a Beakface Rogue is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 3 dice to that Beakface Rogue's attack.
ability_2_desc: When a Beakface Rogue rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice to the defending Rogue.
ability_3_desc: A Beakface Rogue never rolls for falling damage.

name: Begorn Thundershield
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each round, place one combat die on this card for every wound marker on this card. When a Common figure you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Begorn Thundershield rolls for defense or for a normal attack, you may remove one die from this card and add it to that roll. At the end of the round, remove all combat dice from this card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Begorn Thundershield rolls fewer than two shields, add one shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Beren Embersbane
ability_1_desc: When Beren Embersbane rolls defense dice against a special attack, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on adjacent figures. You may inflict no more than one wound on any figure that is adjacent to Beren Embersbane.
ability_2_desc: Beren Embersbane never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop in molten lava spaces.

name: BANNE
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's Squad figure moves adjacent to Banne and onto a space where that figure can end its movement, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, Banne may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Banne can use this power only if he ends his Slippery move not adjacent to any enemy figures. You may not roll for Slippery more than once during any turn.
ability_2_desc: Banne can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Banne rolls 2 additional attack dice when attacking a figure he moved through this turn.

name: Batgirl Cassandra Cain
ability_1_desc: If Batgirl takes no damage from a normal attack by an adjacent figure, the attacking figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Batgirl may attack with Batarang Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Batgirl may Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Batgirl may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. Batgirl may swing up to 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If Batgirl is engaged when she starts to swing, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ben "Nutty" Macgour
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered Order Marker on Ben "Nutty" Macgour, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker on this Army Card to activate Reckless Abandon for the duration of the round. While Reckless Abandon is active, add 2 to Ben's Move and Attack value and subtract 2 from his Range and Defense value.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Large or Huge figure with a Ferocious, Menacing, or Wild Personality, Ben "Nutty" Macgour rolls 2 additional dice.

name: Batman
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative but before anyone takes a turn, you may choose an opponent. That opponent must show you their Order Markers.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Batman may use Grapple Line. Grapple Line has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Batman's Grapple Line movement, ignore elevations. Batman may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. If Batman is engaged when he starts to Grapple Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Batman attacks with his Batarang Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.

name: Benjamin Martin
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Benjamin Martin. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: If all of your markers are on Soldier Army Cards, and at least one is on Benjamin Martin, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for every order marker on the Benjamin Martin Army Card, up to a maximum of +3 added to your initiative roll.
ability_3_desc: Benjamin Martin is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Batgirl
ability_1_desc: Figures attacking Batgirl never have height advantage.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Batgirl may attack with Batarang Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Batgirl may Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Batgirl may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. Batgirl may swing up to 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If Batgirl is engaged when she starts to swing, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Batman
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative but before anyone takes a turn, choose an opponent. That opponent must show you their Order Markers.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Batman may attack with Batarang Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Batman may Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Batman may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. Batman may swing up to 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If Batman is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Beetle
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 5. Beetle may only attack with his Electro-Bite Special Attack once per round.
ability_2_desc: When Beetle attacks with a normal attack, you may re-roll any 1 die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Beetle's movement, ignore elevations. Beetle may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Beetle starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bats of Morindan
ability_1_desc: If all of your remaining order markers are placed on Army Cards for Undead figures, you may move and attack with up to 9 Bats of Morindan you control.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Bats of Morindan, you may take a turn with any medium Devourer Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Bats of Morindan's movement, ignore elevations. Bats of Morindan may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Bat of Morindan starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bat Swarm
ability_1_desc: The Bat Swarm does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, after a figure you control with the Life Drain or Bloodborn Rising special power would receive enough wounds to be destroyed, you may ignore all wounds, place that figure on this card, and replace it with the Bat Swarm, which may immediately move up to 6 spaces.
ability_2_desc: At any time, you may reveal 3 Order Markers on this card to destroy the Bat Swarm and replace it with an Undead figure on this card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Bat Swarm's movement, ignore elevations. It may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If the Bat Swarm is engaged when it starts to fly, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Beggar
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's small or medium hero figure moves adjacent to a Beggar, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the opponent's figure drops a Treasure Glyph on an empty space next to both the opponent's figure and a Beggar or the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may only be targeted as they move into engagement with a Beggar.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure with the Valiant personality that is adjacent to this Beggar and another figure attacks with a normal or special attack, it cannot attack this Beggar.

name: Bifur
ability_1_desc: When Bifur attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to Bifur. If the defending figure receives any wounds from Bifur's attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: When Bifur attacks, if he does not roll at least one skull, he receives one wound.

name: Beorn
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, replace Beorn's Human form with his Bear form, and add 2 to his Move, Attack and Defense values for the rest of the round. At the end of the round, replace Beorn's Human form back on the board. When one of Beorn's forms is destroyed, the other form stays removed from play.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose up to 2 Orc or Goblin figures adjacent to Beorn. If the figures are squad figures, destroy them. If one of the chosen figures is a Hero figure roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that hero receives one wound.

name: Balor
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small, medium, or large figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Balor and whose base is no higher than 5 levels above or below Balor's base. Move the chosen figure to any empty space adjacent to Balor. The chosen figure does not roll for falling damage. After the figure is placed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. The chosen figure and any figures in a chain of adjacent figures containing the targeted figure are also affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Balor cannot be affected by his own Chain Lightning Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Balor's movement ignore elevations. Balor may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Balor is engaged when it starts to fly it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Beast
ability_1_desc: After Beast attacks an opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-8, Beast's turn is over. If you roll a 9 or higher, Beast may move using his Stealth Leap power. If Beast ends this leap move adjacent to a different opponent's figure, he may make a normal attack on that figure.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Beast may use Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Beast's leaping movement, ignore elevations. Beast may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Beast may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Beast is engaged when he starts to leap, he does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Betacron
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Soulborg Squad that follows Jandar, instead of moving normally with that Squad, you may move Betacron up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Betacron, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, when an opponent's Hero or Squad figure moves onto a space within 5 clear sight spaces of Betacron and ends its move, if Betacron is not engaged with another figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound.

name: Balrog of Morgoth
ability_1_desc: All figures within 3 spaces of the Balrog subtract 1 die from their attack. Dragons, Nazgûl and figures with the fearless personality are not affected by Aura of Terror.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, the Balrog always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When the Balrog attacks with his Whip of Flame Special Attack, he may attack 1 additional time. The Balrog may target and attack non-adjacent figures, even if he is engaged.
ability_4_desc: The Balrog never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Bezulub
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When attacking a small or medium figure, if you roll 1 skull or more, immediately place the opponent figure on an empty space adjacent to Bezulub.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Bezulub. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Soulborgs are not affected by Toxic Skin.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally, you may place Bezulub up to 6 clear sight spaces away. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Bezulub may double his height.

name: Bezulub
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When attacking a small or medium figure, if you roll 1 skull or more, immediately place the opponent figure on an empty space adjacent to Bezulub.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Bezulub. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Soulborgs are not affected by Toxic Skin.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally, you may place Bezulub up to 6 clear sight spaces away. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Bezulub may double his height.

name: Bjornganal
ability_1_desc: Bjornganal may add 3 to his Move number and 2 to his Attack number as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. Bjornganal must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Goring Charge.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Bjornganal, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the opponent's figure recieves a wound. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with Bjornganal.

name: Bishamon
ability_1_desc: When Bishamon attacks he may attack a second time
ability_2_desc: After moving, and before attacking. Choose any adjacent figure to attack, roll 20 sided dice, 1-18 roll attack dice normally, roll a 19 or 20, that chosen figure belongs to Bishamon. Remove all order markers on that card, and card is given to Bishamon's Army.
ability_3_desc: All Samurai you control, add 1 to their attack.

name: Blackfire
ability_1_desc: After moving, if Blackfire is not engaged she may attack twice during this turn.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Blackfire add one extra die to their attack, and one extra die to their defense.

name: Black Lightning
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered Order Marker on Black Lightning's Army Card, you may also reveal an X Order Marker that is on Black Lightning's Army Card to activate Electrostatic Field for the duration of the round. While Electrostatic Field is active, add 2 to Black Lightning's Defense value and subtract 5 from his Range value. When Black Lightning attacks while Electrostatic Field is active, he may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: Eye Tyrant
ability_1_desc: When this Eye Tyrant attacks, it may attack up to 4 times. Reduce the number of times this Eye Tyrant can attack by 1 for each wound marker on this Army Card. Range 6. Choose an opponent's figure and roll a 20-sided die. •1-7 Searing Ray. Attack 4. •8-11 Withering Ray. The target receives 1 unblockable wound. •12-16 Sleep Ray. Remove 1 order marker from the figure's Army Card. •17-20 Telekinesis Ray. Move the targeted figure up to 4 spaces. The figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: This Eye Tyrant and all adjacent figures are immune to special attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Eye Tyrant's movement, ignore up to 3 levels of elevation change per hex. This Eye Tyrant may float over water without stopping.

name: Bilide4
ability_1_desc: Bilide4 starts each game with up to 9 swamp water tiles on its Army Card. When Bilide4 attacks a figure with a normal or special attack, if that figure is on an empty land space, you may place a swamp water tile onto the space that figure occupies, if possible.
ability_2_desc: Range 6 Attack 3. Choose up to five figures to attack. Each targeted figure must be within 4 clear sight spaces of another targeted figure, and all figures must be within 6 clear sight spaces of Bilide4. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Swamp Salvo Special Attack may not be used if you revealed Order Marker 1 on Bilide4 this turn.

name: Blade Brothers
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Blade Brother attacks an opponent's undead figure, add one attack die to his roll.
ability_2_desc: If one Blade Brother has been destroyed, add 2 to the remaining Brother's attack and defence dice.
ability_3_desc: When a Blade Brother attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: Yax Björn
ability_1_desc: When Yxa Björn defends, he recieves one extra defense die for each Wound Marker he has.
ability_2_desc: When Yxa Björn attacks, he may attack one additional time. If Yxa Björn attacks the same figure, he rolls two less attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Any space that Yxa Bjorn is on that is not a molten lava space is considered a normal grass space.

name: Beyonder
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, and instead of taking a turn with Beyonder, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-9, your turn immediately ends. If you roll 10-17, choose one Unique Hero within 10 clear sight spaces. If you roll 18 or higher, choose up to two Unique Heroes within 10 clear sight spaces. Take temporary control of each figure and immediately take a turn with each chosen figure. At the end of each turn, control of each chosen figure returns to the player who controlled the figure before Mere Pawns was used.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose one figure within clear sight of Beyonder. You may either place the chosen figure on any empty space adjacent to Beyonder or choose another figure within clear sight of Beyonder and switch the chosen figures. Figures moved by Supreme Summoning will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Any figure within clear sight of Beyonder that would be automatically destroyed instead receives four wounds.

name: BILL CIPHER
ability_1_desc: Bill Cipher does not start the game on the battlefield. If Bill Cipher is in your army, after rolling initiative, choose an opponent's Army Card. You may look at all Order Markers on that card. After revealing an Order Marker on Bill Cipher, you may take a turn with any card Bill Cipher's figure is on.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, if Bill Cipher is on this card, choose an opponent's Unique Hero on the battlefield and roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 11 or higher, remove all Order Markers from that card, place Bill Cipher's figure on that Hero's card and take control of that figure. Return Bill Cipher to this card if the chosen Hero is destroyed.
ability_3_desc: If Bill Cipher is on a different Hero's card at the end of the round, return Bill Cipher to this card and return control of that Hero to the previous owner. That player adds 8 to their initiative roll in the next round, and that Hero cannot be chosen for Possession again this game.

name: Blackguard Reavers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Blackguard Reavers, you may take a turn with any human hero who follows Utgar.
ability_2_desc: Squad figures defending against a normal attack from a Blackguard Reaver subtract 1 defense die for each Blackguard Reaver within 2 hexes of the targeted figure, including the attacking Reaver.
ability_3_desc: Blackguard Reavers roll 1 additional attack die against all figures who follow Jandar.

name: Bloodspike Behemoth
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Choose one other adjacent figure that is also affected by Tailsweep Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for each affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: If this Bloodspike Behemoth moved but did not attack on this turn, you may remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card.

name: Black Widow
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Black Widow attacks with her Widow's Bite Special Attack, she may attack up to 2 additional times. She may not attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: When Black Widow rolls defense dice against an attacking figure that is not adjacent, 1 shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Black Widow may use her Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Black Widow's Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Black Widow may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Black Widow may not Swing Line more than 40 levels up or down in a single Swing Line. If Black Widow is engaged when she starts to Swing Line, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Black Knight
ability_1_desc: Any time the Black Knight destroys a figure with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-13, nothing happens. If you roll a 14 or higher, choose an opponent. That opponent takes temporary control of the Black Knight and may immediately take a turn with him, but will not be able to view any unrevealed Order Markers on this card. At the end of that turn, control of the Black Knight returns to you. All Order Markers on this card will stay on this card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for the Black Knight's movement, ignore elevations. The Black Knight may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Black Knight starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Blood Demons
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first take a turn with a Unique Hunter Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Blood Demon destroys an opponent's figure with a normal attack, it may move up to 4 spaces and make an additional attack, if possible. Each Blood Demon may use Hunter's Glory only once per turn.
