ability_3_desc: If you control the Red Blood Demon, add 1 to the Attack number of this Army Card. If you control the Grey Blood Demon, add 1 to its Defense number. If you control the Black Blood Demon, add 3 to its Move number.

name: Blue Slaad Hunters
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, all Blue Slaad Hunters may not attack this turn. If you roll a 6-10, all Blue Slaad Hunters may attack once this turn. If you roll a 11-15, all Blue Slaad Hunters may attack twice this turn. If you roll a 16-20, all Blue Slaad Hunters may attack thrice this turn. A Blue Slaad Hunter may not attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: If a Blue Slaad Hunter rolls defense dice against a normal attack and does not receive a wound, you may immediately place it on an unoccupied space adjacent to the attacking figure. Figures moved by Chaos Flux do not take disengagement attacks.

name: Bone Captain
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving and attacking you may instead place one of your own previously destroyed common undeads on any available space adjacent to Bone Captain. You may then immediately take a turn with the newly placed figure.
ability_2_desc: All common undeads that you control move one additional space.

name: Blue Beetle (Jaime Reyes)
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Blue Beetle, you may remove any Scarab Markers on this Army Card and place any combination of Red, Blue, and/or Grey Scarab Markers on this Army Card. A maximum of 6 Scarab Markers can be placed on this card. Blue Beetle rolls one additional attack die for each Red Scarab Marker on this card, one additional defense die for each Blue Scarab Marker on this card, and adds 2 to his range for each Grey Scarab Marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: When Blue Beetle attacks, if there are no more than 4 Scarab Markers on this Army Card, he may attack one additional time.

name: Arya Stark
ability_1_desc: When Arya Stark attacks, she may attack one additional time
ability_2_desc: If Arya Stark is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to vanish. If you roll a 1-8, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 9 or higher, Arya Stark takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Arya Stark can vanish only if she ends her vanishing move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_3_desc: Arya Stark can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Bone Captain
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving and attacking with Bone Captain, if possible, you may place one previously destroyed Common Undead figure you control on any empty space adjacent to Bone Captain. You may immediately take a turn with the newly placed figure. Death Knights are not affected by Dawn Of The Dead.
ability_2_desc: All common undead figures that you control move one additional space.

name: Bleakewoode Treant
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 5 Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both the chosen figure and this Bleakewoode Treant are also affected by Wood Hammer Special Attack. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. After attacking with Wood Hammer Special Attack, place one wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Figures attacked by this Bleakewoode Treant subtract 1 from their Defense for every Tree, Brush, and friendly Treant adjacent to that figure, up to a maximum of -3 dice.
ability_3_desc: This Bleakewoode Treant rolls one additional die for Lava Field damage and subtracts 20 from its roll when rolling for Molten Lava damage.

name: Blackspawn Slayers
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Blackspawn Slayers and before taking a turn with them, you may first take a turn with Othkurik if he is drafted in your army.
ability_2_desc: After an opponent's adjacent figure performs a normal attack on a Blackspawn Slayer, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-18, nothing happens. If you roll 19-20, the attacking figure receives one wound. Figures must roll for Acidic Scales even if Blackspawn Slayer is destroyed in the attack.
ability_3_desc: A Blackspawn Slayer adds 6 to his Acidic Scales roll when Othkurik is within 3 clear sight spaces.

name: The Blazing Champion
ability_1_desc: When any friendly small or medium figure receives one or more wounds from a normal attack by an attacking figure within 4 clear sight spaces of the Blazing Champion, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the attacking figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When the Blazing Champion receives one or more wounds from a leaving engagement attack from an opponent's small or medium figure, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 10-16, ignore any wounds from that leaving engagement attack. If you roll 17-20, ignore any wounds from that leaving engagement attack and the attacking figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: The Blazing Champion never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he does not have to stop in molten lava spaces. The Blazing Champion rolls 2 fewer defense die while he is on a water space.

name: Black Widow
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. After attacking normally, Black Widow may attack with Widow's Bite Special Attack. Figures roll 2 fewer dice when defending against Widow's Bite Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Black Widow rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Black Widow may Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. She may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and swing over obstacles. She may swing 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If she is engaged when she starts to swing, she will not take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Blue Beetle (Jaime Reyes)
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Blue Beetle you may reveal an X Order Marker on this Army Card to take another turn with Blue Beetle. While an X Order Marker is revealed on Blue Beetle's card, you must add 2 to his Attack value and subtract 2 from his Defense value.
ability_2_desc: Blue Beetle needs clear sight instead of line of sight when attacking non-adjacent figures.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Blue Beetle's movement, ignore elevations. Blue Beetle may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. If Blue Beetle is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Boulderfist Warrior
ability_1_desc: If this Boulderfist Warrior destroys an adjacent figure, you may inflict one wound on any squad figures adjacent to both this Boulderfist Warrior and the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: This Boulderfist Warrior cannot roll additional defense dice for bonuses from terrain features.

name: BOMBUR
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game choose a Unique Hero you control. If the chosen hero receives 1 or more wounds from an attacking figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Bombur, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, if possible move Bombur adjacent to the attacking figure and inflict one wound to the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: Bombur may not be moved by any opponent's special power on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: BOHNEIR
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher you can attack a second time the same figure.
ability_2_desc: Bohneir may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: Bokoblins
ability_1_desc: If while a Bokoblin is engaged, it is attacked, before rolling defense dice, roll the 20-Sided Die. If you roll an 11 or higher, add 2 dice to its roll that turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Three Bokoblins on the same level may combine their attacks and roll their attack dice as one attack. All Bokoblins must be engaged to the targeted figure.

name: Bounder Archers
ability_1_desc: Bounder Archers roll one additional attack die when making a normal attack against an adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: A Bounder Archer adds 1 to his Defense if he is adjacent to one or more Hobbit Heroes you control.

name: Bol
ability_1_desc: If a Unique Hero you control is destroyed, and there are unrevealed Order Markers on that Hero's card, you may move the unrevealed Order Markers on that card to Bol's card.
ability_2_desc: When Bol attacks large or huge figures, add 2 attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Bol is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Bol may add 2 to his height.

name: Blue Slaad Ravager
ability_1_desc: This Blue Slaad Ravager starts the game with 3 blue Chaos Phage markers on its Army Card. If this Blue Slaad Ravager inflicts a wound on a Hero but does not destroy it, place a Chaos Phage marker on the Hero's Army Card. For the remainder of the game, before rolling for initiative, roll the 20-sided die once for each opponent's Card with a Chaos Phage marker on it. If you roll a 17 or higher, immediately destroy the infected Hero and place a previously-destroyed common Slaad squad figure you control on any space occupied by the destroyed figure.
ability_2_desc: If a Blue Slaad Ravager rolls defense dice against a normal attack and does not receive a wound, it may immediately teleport to any unoccupied space adjacent to the attacking figure. Figures moved by Chaos Flux do not take disengagement attacks.

name: BODAK
ability_1_desc: If this Bodak is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, opponents' figures must be adjacent to this Bodak to attack it with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Blue Falcon
ability_1_desc: You may choose for Blue Falcon to not start the game on the battlefield. If you do, you may also choose for a Sidekick figure you control to not start the game on the battlefield. At the end of any round, if Blue Falcon has not been placed on the battlefield, you may place him on any empty space. After placing Blue Falcon, if the chosen Sidekick has not been placed on the battlefield, you may place that figure on any empty space adjacent to Blue Falcon. You can not place Blue Falcon or the chosen Sidekick adjacent to opponents' figures.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Blue Falcon may use Falcon Cable. Falcon Cable has a move of 3. Blue Falcon has Flying while moving with Falcon Cable. After moving with Falcon Cable, when Blue Falcon attacks an adjacent figure with a normal attack, add 1 die to Blue Falcon's attack.

name: BOL
ability_1_desc: If a Unique Hero you control is destroyed, you may move all unrevealed Order Markers on that Hero's Army Card to Bol's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Bol is attacking a large or huge figure, add 2 dice to Bol's attack.
ability_3_desc: Bol is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Bol may add 2 to his height.

name: Booster Gold
ability_1_desc: Figures attacking Booster Gold never have height advantage. When Booster Gold is attacking with height advantage, he rolls an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When Booster Gold attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Booster Gold's movement, ignore elevations. Booster Gold may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Booster Gold starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Boris Brightbeard
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a wounded Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Boris Brightbeard. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, then remove two Wound Markers from the chosen Hero's Army Card and one Wound Marker from two wounded Heroes adjacent to the chosen Hero. Boris Brightbeard cannot target himself for Healing Rain.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent opponent's figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill, Boris Brightbeard recieves 1 additional attack die.

name: Booster Gold
ability_1_desc: If Booster Gold wounds a Unique Hero figure with an attack value on its card that is more than the attack value on Booster Gold's card, he may take one additional turn.
ability_2_desc: When Booster Gold rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Booster Gold's movement, ignore elevations. Booster Gold may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Booster Gold starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: BOK-BUR-NA
ability_1_desc: Small and Medium figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Bok-Bur-Na reduce their Defense Value by 1 when attacked by a Captain or Pirate you control.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Bok-Bur-Na, you may attack an adjacent figure one additional time. Bok-Bur-Na's Attack Value is increased by 2 for the second attack.
ability_3_desc: When Bok-Bur-Na destroys an adjacent figure with a normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, remove one Wound Marker from Bok-Bur-Na. Bok-Bur-Na cannot use Utgar's Cutlass on destructible objects.

name: Bonnie and Clyde
ability_1_desc: Attack: 2 Range: 1 Any figure damaged by Toe Chop Special Attack permanently subtracts 1 from its movement. That figure's movement may not go below 1.
ability_2_desc: Bonnie and Clyde can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Bonnie and Clyde subtract 2 attack dice when attacking Large and Huge figures with a normal attack.
ability_4_desc: After moving but before attacking Bonnie and Clyde may do 1 of the following: Holy Light Special Attack only affects undead, does 5 attack at 4 range and affects all figures adjacent to target. Righteous Aura adds 3 to their defense until beginning of their next turn.

name: Bolvag Lat
ability_1_desc: When a friendly Orc with a Range of 1 makes a normal attack, if it is within 3 clear sight spaces of Bolvag Lat, it may re-roll 1 attack die once.
ability_2_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may destroy an adjacent Orc Squad figure you control. Remove up to 2 wound markers from this card, or from the Army Card of an Orc Hero within 2 clear sight spaces of Bolvag Lat.
ability_3_desc: If an attack causes enough wounds to destroy Bolvag Lat, or if he is destroyed by a special power on an opponent's Army Card, place him on the attacking figure's Army Card. While Bolvag Lat is on that Army Card, all figures on that card subtract 1 from their Attack, Defense, and Move numbers.

name: Blue Wyrmling
ability_1_desc: Range 4+Special. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figure within 3 clear sights spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Fledgling Lightning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for both affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Fledgling Lightning Breath Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Blue Wyrmling, you can take a turn with any wyrmling you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Blue Wyrmling's movement, ignore elevations. Blue Wyrmling may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Blue Wyrmling starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bornak
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to Bornak are affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Any opponent's small, medium or large wounded figure adjacent to Bornak may not move. Figures affected by Bonecrushing Grip may not be moved by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.
ability_3_desc: Bornak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Blodig Gnepdin
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Red Blood Markers on this card. At the end of each round, remove a Blood Marker from this card. If there are no Blood Markers on this card, destroy Blodig Gnepdin. After destroying an adjacent figure that is not a Soulborg, you may place one Blood Marker on this card. There may never be more than 3 Blood Markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: Opponent's figures may not target Blodig Gnepdin for non-adjacent attacks or special powers that require clear sight. Whenever an opponent's figure moves adjacent to Blodig Gnepdin, you may roll the D20. On a roll of 9+, that figure's turn immediately ends and you may roll a single combat die; if you roll: • A skull, you may place the opponent's figure and Blodig Gnepdin on any empty spaces within 2 spaces of their initial placement; • A shield, you may remove an Order Marker at random from that figure's Army Card. Figures moved by Faery Tricks never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: If Blodig Gnepdin is only adjacent to one opponent's small or medium Common figure, that figure may not roll defence dice against Blodig Gnepdin. If Blodig Gnepdin is only adjacent to one opponent's small or medium Unique figure, that figure rolls two fewer defence dice against Blodig Gnepdin.

name: Bob Oom
ability_1_desc: Bob Oom starts the game with one Boomstick Marker on this card. After rolling attack dice, if Bob Oom rolled at least 5 skulls, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-7, the defending figure rolls defense dice normally. If you roll an 8 or higher, remove the Boomstick Marker from this card. The defending figure receives a wound for every skull and cannot roll any defense dice, and all figures within 2 spaces of the defending figure whose bases are no more than 8 levels above the defending figure's height or 8 levels below the defending figure's base receive 2 wounds. If the Boomstick Marker is not on this card, Bob Oom rolls 2 fewer attack dice and cannot use Boomstick.
ability_2_desc: When Bob Oom receives one or more wounds from a special power or special attack, he receives one fewer wounds.

name: BRAXAS OBAMA
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may place any figure you control into an unoccupied space in your starting zone. If the bailed-out figure is engaged, the figure does not receive any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Braxas Obama may not attack any figure with a Left Wing personality.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack dice against any Human figure with radio or TV access, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Brother Hecatate
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one revealed order marker on this Army Card, all figures you control with a devout personality roll an additional attack die when making a normal attack. Horn of Babylon does not affect Brother Hecatate.
ability_2_desc: When a figure you control attacks an adjacent figure with a normal attack and the defending figure is adjacent to Brother Hecatate, you may reroll one attack die.

name: Brain Eater
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to Brainiac. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a squad figure, and you roll a 5 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 20 or higher destroy the chosen Hero. Each time Brainiac destroys a figure in this way place one brain marker on this army card. When rolling the 20-sided die, Braniac may add 1 to his die roll for each brain marker on this card.
ability_2_title: Look At The Big Brain On Brad!
ability_2_desc: If any Zombies controlled by your opponent have line of sight to Brain Eater at the beginning of their move, they may move an additional 2 spaces this turn.

name: Buster Grut
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. After attacking with Divider Special Attack, you may roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, you may attack again with Divider Special Attack. You may continue to attack with Divider Special Attack until you do not roll a 9 or higher.
ability_2_desc: This Buster Grut is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: BULLYWUGS
ability_1_desc: When the Bullywugs are on a swamp water space, add 2 to their attack and defense.
ability_2_desc: If a Bullywug ends its normal movement on a swamp water space, you may immediately place it on any empty same-level swamp water space within 5 spaces. If a Bullywug is engaged when it starts to tunnel, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bumblebee
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack Special. When attacking with the Plasma Cannon Special Attack, roll the number of attack dice equal to 7 minus the distance to the opponent. The defending figure rolls defense dice normally.
ability_2_desc: When Bumblebee rolls defense dice against an attacking figure that is not adjacent, roll 3 additional defense dice.

name: Brave Arrow
ability_1_desc: While moving, this Brave Arrow may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: All friendly scouts adjacent to this Brave Arrow recieve an additional attack die when attacking a figure adjacent to them.
ability_3_desc: If this Brave Arrow is targetted and recieves one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and this Brave Arrow. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 10 or higher, ignore any wounds this Brave Arrow just recieved.

name: 20th Maine Volunteers
ability_1_desc: If there is only one unrevealed Order Marker on any 20th Maine Volunteer Army Card you control, all 20th Maine Volunteers you control add 2 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: A 20th Maine Volunteer with a height advantage on an adjacent opponent's figure rolls an additional attack die when attacking that figure.

name: Arktos
ability_1_desc: All friendly Hunters adjacent to Arktos receive an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When Arktos is destroyed, place this figure on any Unique Army Card with a Range number of 4 or more. Arktos's Spirit adds 2 to the Range number of that card.

name: B-11 Resistance Corps
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to the B-11 Resistance Corps' Attack and Defense values for each previously destroyed B-11 Resistance Corps fighter on this Army Card. A B-11 Resistance Corps fighter may not attack other friendly B-11 Resistance Corps fighters.

name: 12th Caucasus Rifles
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 1. Before attacking normally, one 12th Caucasus Rifle Soldier may choose a figure to attack with Gas Grenade Special Attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Gas Grenade Special Attack. Roll one attack die once for all affected figures. If you roll a skull, all figures affected by Gas Grenade Special Attack subtract 1 from their defense dice for the entire turn. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Gas Grenade Special Attack never affects destructible objects or 12th Caucasus Rifles.

name: Azurite Warlord
ability_1_desc: When Azurite Warlord attacks, you may add 3 to his Attack number. If you do, at the end of Azurite Warlord's turn place 1 wound marker on Azurite Warlord's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Azurite Warlord does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.

name: Brimstone
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Brimstone, you must place a Growing Heat Marker on this card, up to a maximum of 4 Growing Heat Markers.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack Special. Heat Blast Special Attack affects all figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Brimstone. Roll one attack die for each Growing Heat Marker on this Army Card. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Heat Blast Special Attack does not affect Brimstone or figures with the Lava Resistant special power. After attacking with Heat Blast Special Attack, remove all Growing Heat Markers from this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Brimstone's movement, ignore elevations. Brimstone may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Brimstone starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: 8th Infantry Pathfinder
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on the Army Card of a Unique Soldier Hero you control that follows Jandar, and after taking that Unique Soldier Hero's turn, you may move each 8th Infantry Pathfinder figure you control up to 5 spaces. A Pathfinder must be able to move adjacent to a Unique Soldier figure you control that follows Jandar in order to use Marching Orders.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on an 8th Infantry Pathfinder, instead of taking a turn with a Pathfinder, you may choose up to three Pathfinders you control. One at a time, take a turn with each Pathfinder. During these turns, the chosen Pathfinders may not move.

name: Wonder Woman
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Wonder Woman was not engaged prior to moving, you may choose an opponent's non-adjacent small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 10 levels above Wonder Woman's height or 10 levels below Wonder Woman's base. Place the chosen figure on an empty space adjacent to Wonder Woman. The chosen figure does not receive any leaving engagement attacks. The chosen figure cannot use any Special Powers on its Army Card until it is no longer engaged with Wonder Woman or another opponent's figure moves into engagement with Wonder Woman.
ability_2_desc: If Wonder Woman rolls a skull against a figure leaving an engagement with her, that figure may not leave the engagement with Wonder Woman this turn.
ability_3_desc: When Wonder Woman rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Brute Gruts
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Common figure, Brute Gruts receive 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, after attacking with the Brute Gruts, you may place a Berserker Marker on this card to attack one additional time with the Brute Gruts. Subtract 1 from the Brute Gruts' Defense value for each Berserker Marker on this card. A maximum of 3 Berserker Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_3_desc: Brute Gruts are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Count Raymond
ability_1_desc: All figures you control with a devout personality move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: When Count Raymond, or any friendly human figure who follows Einar within 5 clear sight spaces of Count Raymond, receives one or more wounds from a leaving engagement attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, ignore any wounds from that leaving engagement attack.

name: BAHADUR
ability_1_desc: Small Squad figures attacked by Bahadur subtract 2 from their defense dice. Medium Squad figures attacked by Bahadur subtract 1 from their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When Bahadur is destroyed, place this figure on any Unique Army Card with a Range of 1. Bahadur's Spirit adds 1 to the normal Attack number on that card.

name: Capt. John Varan
ability_1_desc: When a Human you control who follows Jandar and is adjacent to Capt. John Varan receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you may instead place all of those wound markers on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Instead of moving and attacking normally, Capt. John Varan may use Battle Valor Special Attack. When using Battle Valor Special Attack, Capt. John Varan may move up to 3 spaces before attacking. When moving and attacking with Battle Valor Special Attack, Capt. John Varan may move and attack one additional time for each wound marker on this Army Card.

name: Dreadgul Raiders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Dreadgul Raiders, you may first take a turn with any wild Human or Giant Hero you control. If you do not take a turn with any Human or Giant Hero you control, add 1 to the Attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move the same Dreadgul Raiders again.

name: Breach
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure adjacent to Breach. You may also choose another figure adjacent to Breach to be affected by Scimitar Sweep Special Attack. All figures adjacent to Breach between the chosen figures in a counterclockwise direction are also affected by Scimitar Sweep Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Breach always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Breach can move through all small and medium figures.

name: Bynreen
ability_1_desc: Bynreen does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place the Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher you may place Bynreen on any empty space. You cannot place Bynreen adjacent to other figures or on glyphs.
ability_2_desc: If Bynreen has been successfully placed on the battlefield, start with 3 stone markers on Bynreen's army card. All opponent's figures may not move if they enter or occupy a space within 2 clear sight spaces of Bynreen for every stone marker on this card. Remove one stone marker for each wound Bynreen receives. If there are no more stone markers on this card, you may not use the power of the Dire Stone. Figures affected by the power of the Dire Stone cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or glyph.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Bynreen's movement, ignore elevations. Bynreen may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Bynreen starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bynreen
ability_1_desc: Bynreen does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place the Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher you may place Bynreen on any empty space. You cannot place Bynreen adjacent to other figures or on glyphs.
ability_2_desc: If Bynreen has been successfully placed on the battlefield, All opponent's figures may not move if they enter or occupy a space within X clear sight spaces of Bynreen. Use the results of the roll for Bynreen's Descent. If you rolled a 13 -17, then X is 4 spaces. If you rolled an 18 or 19, then X is 6 spaces. If you rolled a 20 or higher, then X is 8 spaces. Figures affected by the power of the Dire Stone cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or glyph.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Bynreen's movement, ignore elevations. Bynreen may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Bynreen starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Amberhive Protectors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Amberhive Protectors, you may first take a turn with any Insect Hero you control. If you do not take a turn with any Insect Hero you control, you may move and attack with up to 6 Amberhive Protectors you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When attacking a figure within 4 spaces of an Insect Hero you control, an Amberhive Protector may use Sacrificial Sting Special Attack. If the defending figure receives any wounds from Sacrificial Sting Special Special Attack, destroy the attacking Amberhive Protector.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for an Amberhive Protector's movement, ignore elevations. An Amberhive Protector may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When an Amberhive Protector starts to fly, if she is engaged, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Arthur of Sherwood
ability_1_desc: Once while moving normally, Arthur of Sherwood may choose a small or medium figure that he was not engaged to at the start of this turn. When Arthur leaves engagement with that figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. Arthur cannot attack the chosen figure on this turn.
ability_2_desc: At any point while moving normally, Arthur of Sherwood may attempt to pick up or activate a Treasure Glyph, as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement. When you roll the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap with Arthur of Sherwood, if you set off the trap, Arthur ends his movement immediately and may not attempt to pick up or activate that Treasure Glyph again this turn.
ability_3_desc: Arthur of Sherwood is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Cathar Spearmen
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of a Cathar Spearman, and its base is no more than 3 levels above that Cathar Spearman's height or 3 levels below that Cathar Spearman's base, that Cathar Spearman may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to a previously unengaged Cathar Spearman, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, a Cathar Spearman receives an additional attack die.

name: Doomsday
ability_1_desc: Doomsday receives one extra defense die for each Wound Marker he has.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card you may, instead of moving and attacking, remove 1 Wound Marker from this card. When Doomsday is destroyed, begin your next turn with a total of 6 Wound Markers on this card. Order Markers may still be placed and revealed on this card. If the last Wound Marker is removed from Doomsday's Army Card while he is destroyed, immediately place Doomsday on a space adjacent to any figure you control.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Doomsday may Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Doomsday's Super Leap movement, ignore elevations. Doomsday may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Doomsday may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Doomsday is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Doomsday rolls 3 less attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap.

name: Akumaken
ability_1_desc: For every opponent's figure Akumaken destroys, place a Soul Marker on this card. Before attacking with Akumaken, you may remove any number of Soul Markers from this card. For each marker removed, add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled. A maximum of 2 Soul Markers can be placed on this card. Akumaken cannot use Demonblade on destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When a Squad figure adjacent to Akumaken attacks using a normal attack, it subtracts 1 from its attack dice. Figures with the fearless personality are not affected by Mask of Terror.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurai.

name: Crypt Guardian
ability_1_desc: When you choose an opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die for a special power on any Undead Army Card, you may add 2 to the die roll if the chosen figure is engaged with this Crypt Guardian.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on this Crypt Guardian, after taking this Crypt Guardian's turn, you may take a turn with one other Guard Hero or Queen Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, this Crypt Guardian always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Ataraxis the Starlich
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose a small or medium figure you control within 5 spaces of Ataraxis. Switch Ataraxis and the chosen figure. If the chosen figure is not Undead, it receives 1 wound. Figures moved by Necrotizing Wormhole never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Opponents' figures within 5 spaces of Ataraxis roll 1 less defense die against terrifying figures.
ability_3_desc: When Ataraxis is destroyed, you may remove all wound markers from this card and place Ataraxis on the card of any Unique Hero within 5 spaces of Ataraxis. For the entire game, if a Unique Hero with your Ataraxis on its card is destroyed by a normal or special attack or a leaving engagement attack, immediately place Ataraxis on a space the destroyed figure occupied, if possible.

name: Brontos
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Brontos, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Brontos. Brontos does not take leaving engagement attacks from the chosen figure. After you move Brontos, place the chosen figure adjacent to Brontos on an unoccupied land space, if possible. A figure moved by Abduct never takes any leaving engagement attacks. If Brontos attacks this turn, he must attack the Abducted figure.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with Brontos, each skull rolled counts as one additional hit. All excess shields rolled by the defending figure count as unblockable hits inflicted by the defending figure on Brontos.

name: Bloodburst Thrall
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, you may take a turn with 1 Thrall you control. If you roll a 6-15, you may take a turn with up to 2 Thralls you control. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take a turn with up to 3 Thralls you control.
ability_2_desc: When a Bloodburst Thrall attacks, you may add 1 to its Attack number. If you do, and the defending figure is destroyed, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or lower, destroy that Bloodburst Thrall.
ability_3_desc: When a Bloodburst Thrall you control receives one or more wounds from a normal attack by an opponent's figure, you may choose an opponent's figure adjacent to that Bloodburst Thrall and roll the 20-sided die before removing that figure. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.

name: Brienne of Tarth
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Brienne of Tarth rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Brienne may take for this attack is one.

name: Eilan Sidhe
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Eilan Sidhe, all Eilan Sidhe you control adjacent to a tree or bush may use Through the Green. To use Through the Green, place the Eilan Sidhe on any unoccupied space adjacent to any tree or bush within 4 clear sight spaces of that Eilan Sidhe. If an Eilan Sidhe is engaged when it uses Through the Green, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: You may attack with any 2 Eilan Sidhe you control, even Eilan Sidhe that did not move this turn.
ability_3_desc: When an Eilan Sidhe rolls defense dice while adjacent to a tree or bush, one shield will block all damage.

name: Bramcephys
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When Bramcephys attacks with his Hack and Slash Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once this turn.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Bramcephys, after taking Bramcephys's turn, if there are 6 or more wound markers on this card you may take one additional turn with Bramcephys.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, if there are any excess shields, you may choose either the attacking figure or a figure adjacent to the attacking figure to receive one wound.

name: Cal the Smuggler
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each round, before placing Order Markers, if Cal the Smuggler has not been destroyed, you must roll the 20-sided die for Cal's Phase Teleport Device. If you roll a 1-4, remove Cal from the battlefield. If you roll a 5-10, nothing happens. If you roll an 11-20, you may place Cal on any empty space on the battlefield that is not adjacent to an enemy figure. If Cal is engaged when he uses Phase Teleport Device, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Cal the Smuggler is targeted for a normal attack from an opponent's non-adjacent figure within 7 clear sight spaces of him, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the opponent's figure receives 1 wound.

name: Kira Jax
ability_1_desc: At any point before, during, or after movement, you may choose one opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Kira Jax. All of the special powers on the chosen figure's army card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure) are negated until the end of Kira Jax's turn. Kira Jax can only use Exploit Weakness once per turn.

name: Darkprowl Thrall
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, you may take a turn with 1 Thrall you control. If you roll a 6-15, you may take a turn with up to 2 Thralls you control. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take a turn with up to 3 Thralls you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 5. Instead of attacking normally, a Darkprowl Thrall may attempt to pounce. To pounce, choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of the attacking Thrall. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place the attacking Thrall on the space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, destroy the attacking Thrall.
ability_3_desc: When an unengaged Darkprowl Thrall is attacked with a normal or special attack, add 4 defense dice to the defending Thrall.

name: Corvor the Tainted One
ability_1_desc: Figures attacking Corvor the Tainted One with a normal attack subtract 1 from their attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, you must roll the 20-sided die for all figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Corvor the Tainted One, one at a time. If you roll a 15 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Demons are not affected by Avatar of Corruption.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Corvor the Tainted One's movement, ignore elevations. Corvor may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Corvor starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Knights of Blackgaard
ability_1_desc: If no Knights of Blackgaard you control are engaged, you must subtract 3 from your initiative roll. If at least one Order Marker is on the Knights of Blackgaard, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for each engaged Knight of Blackgaard you control.
ability_2_desc: If every Army Card you control has a relentless personality, each Knight of Blackgaard receives 1 additional attack die.

name: Havech Eradicators
ability_1_desc: After attacking a non-adjacent figure with a Havech Eradicator you control, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-6, destroy that Havech Eradicator. If you roll a 7-17, that Havech Eradicator is safe. If you roll an 18-20, you may attack again with that Havech Eradicator.
ability_2_desc: Marro Hive cannot rebirth Havech Eradicators with its Marro Rebirth special power.

name: The Book of Mazarbul
ability_1_desc: A Dwarf or Wizard carrying this book may use it at the beginning of the round after Order Markers have been placed but before rolling for initiative. Reveal all Order Markers on your opponent's Army Cards for any figures who follow Valkrill. You may then move all unengaged Unique Heroes you control up to 4 spaces each.

name: Glyph of Xipta
ability_1_desc: Exchange Orders

name: Boreos
ability_1_desc: While Boreos is flying during its turn, you may choose one non-flying small or medium figure that it passed over this turn. At the end of Boreos's move, the player who controls the chosen figure must place that figure, if possible, on an empty space adjacent to Boreos. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Vortex Pull, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Vortex Pull.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves onto a space within 2 clear sight spaces of Boreos, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Swirling Vortex.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Boreos's movement, ignore elevations. Boreos may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Boreos is engaged when it starts to fly, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Glyph of Holdir
ability_1_desc: The figure on this Glyph adds 1 additional die to their attack.

name: Louis "Mad Dog" Malone
ability_1_desc: If Louis "Mad Dog" Malone is engaged, add 1 to his attack dice and 1 to his defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When Louis "Mad Dog" Malone attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time.

name: Glyph of Zawit
ability_1_desc: Teleport

name: Martial La Hire
ability_1_desc: When Martial La Hire wounds a figure with his normal attack, he must attack one additional time, if possible.

name: KOGGO
ability_1_desc: When attacking a figure that is not engaged, Koggo rolls 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: After Koggo rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move Koggo up to 3 spaces, and Koggo no longer has any visible Hit Zones for the duration of the attacking figure's turn while he remains unengaged. Koggo will never take any leaving engagement attacks while using Cower.

name: Major J15
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Major J15 may target and attack non-adjacent figures with his Guided Cannon Special Attack while engaged.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack against large or huge figures or destructible objects, Major J15 always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Glyph of Frosa
ability_1_desc: Glyph of Frosa grants the Freeze special power.

name: Glyph of Yngvild
ability_1_desc: Disengage

name: Kuthnak
ability_1_desc: Before moving normally with a Common Orc Squad you control, you may choose a figure in that Squad within 4 clear sight spaces of Kuthnak. For the rest of the turn, the chosen figure adds 3 to its Move and 1 to its Attack, and may attack any or all figures adjacent to it this turn with its normal attack. Roll each attack separately. After that turn, destroy the chosen figure.

name: Glyph of Holdir
ability_1_desc: Once during each turn, a Hero you control may add one extra attack die when attacking normally.

name: Deathcommander Mark 3
ability_1_desc: When revealing an order marker on Deathcommander Mark 3's card, after taking his turn, if Deathcommander Mark 3 is engaged, you may immediately take a turn with another Unique or Large Soulborg Hero or Squad you control that follows Utgar.
ability_2_desc: When a Soulborg figure that you control who follows Utgar attacks a figure engaged with Deathcommander Mark 3 with a normal attack, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll one attack die that did not show a skull. Marked for Destruction can only be used once for each attack. Marked for Destruction does not affect Deathcommander Mark 3.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Explosive Rounds Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. When Deathcommander Mark 3 attacks with his Explosive Rounds Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.

name: Morgoloth
ability_1_desc: When Morgoloth attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Friendly small figures who follow Utgar or Valkrill are never attacked when leaving an engagement with a figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Morgoloth.
ability_3_desc: All Demons you control, except Morgoloth, move one additional space.

name: Siiv
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Small and medium figures may not roll defense dice when attacked by Quick Stab Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Siiv is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Seleena
ability_1_desc: If Seleena is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to Seleena's attack. If that figure is a Hybrid, add 1 additional die to Seleena's attack.
ability_2_desc: When Seleena rolls defense dice against a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.

name: Manauvi
ability_1_desc: Manauvi may add 3 to his Move number as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. Manauvi must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Manauvi, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack again with Manauvi.
ability_3_desc: When Manauvi is destroyed, place this figure on a Unique Army Card with a Range of 1. Manauvi's Spirit adds 2 to the Move number of that card.

name: Nhah Scirh Cultists
ability_1_desc: A Nhah Scirh Cultist is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a Squad figure.
ability_2_desc: A Nhah Scirh Cultist rolls an additional attack die when attacking a Dragon.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, a Nhah Scirh Cultist always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Kalagrith
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. All figures Kalagrith passed over this turn with her Flying special power are affected by Scorched Earth Special Attack. Kalagrith does not need clear line of sight to any affected figure. Roll 4 attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately and no figures are considered to have height advantage. Figures under overhangs are not affected by Scorched Earth Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Kalagrith's movement, ignore elevations. Kalagrith may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Kalagrith starts to fly, if she is engaged, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: M-43 Resistance Fighters
ability_1_desc: An engaged M-43 Resistance Fighter may target and attack non-adjacent figures unless that M-43 Resistance Fighter is engaged with a hero figure.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the M-43 Resistance Fighters, for each M-43 Resistance Fighter you control that attacked an opponent's figure this turn, you may move any Mariedian figure you control that did not attack this turn up to 3 spaces. A Mariedian figure may only be moved by Guerrilla Tactics once per turn.

name: Skull Demon
ability_1_desc: Common figures attacking this Skull Demon with a normal attack subtract 1 from their attack dice.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to this Skull Demon with a range of 1 who follow Valkrill add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: Pel the Hill Giant
ability_1_desc: If Pel is engaged, he cannot move normally.
ability_2_desc: Pel cannot make leaving engagement attacks against small or medium figures.

name: Maekor
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Maekor and taking a turn with Maekor, if Maekor is engaged, you may immediately take a turn with one other Unique Lizardfolk Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If Maekor is adjacent to at least one other Mercenary you control, add 1 die to the Defense of Maekor and all Mercenaries you control adjacent to Maekor.
ability_3_desc: When Maekor attacks an adjacent figure that is not a destructible object, you may choose one Squad figure that is within 2 clear sight spaces of the defending figure. If the defending figure receives any wounds from Maekor's attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.

name: Omegacron
ability_1_desc: When Omegacron attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving with Omegacron, you may move up to 3 other Soulborg figures you control who follow Jandar up to 5 spaces each.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking with Omegacron this turn, you may choose up to 3 unengaged Soulborg Squad figures you control who follow Jandar. Take a single turn with the chosen figures, during which the chosen figures may only attack. Omegacron must also have line of sight to any figure attacked using Directed Fire.

name: MOK
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with a Dwarf Squad figure you control that is unengaged and adjacent to Mok, you may remove that figure from the battlefield and place it on this card. There can be a maximum of two Dwarf figures on this card.
ability_2_desc: If there is at least one Dwarf figure on Mok's card when Mok receives one or more wounds from an attack by a non-adjacent figure, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove one Dwarf figure from Mok's card and ignore any wounds.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Mok may attack with Gunner Special Attack once for each Dwarf figure on this card. While engaged, Mok may target and attack non-adjacent figures with Gunner Special Attack. Mok cannot attack the same figure twice with Gunner Special Attack.

name: Suskra
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Suskra, you may place a wound marker on Suskra and take another turn with him. You may use this power only once during a round.
ability_2_desc: If Suskra inflicts one or more wounds on a Unique Hero with a normal attack, you must place 1 additional wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card.

name: Marutuk
ability_1_desc: Marutuk rolls 2 additional dice when attacking a large or huge figure. If an opponent's large or huge figure is within 6 spaces of Marutuk, she may not attack a small or medium figure with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack. Marutuk may not move normally out of engagement with an opponent's large or huge figure.
ability_2_desc: At any point while moving normally, if Marutuk is on a space where she may end her movement, Marutuk may choose an adjacent small or medium figure and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. Marutuk may only use this power once per turn. If she does, she cannot attack a small or medium figure this turn.
ability_3_desc: Marutuk can move through all small and medium figures.

name: Racheim
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power roll 2 less defense dice when attacked by Racheim's Frost Breath Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Racheim attacks with a normal attack, he may attack two additional times.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Racheim's movement, ignore elevations. Racheim may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Racheim starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Re-Tak-Shi
ability_1_desc: All land or water spaces within 1 space of Re-Tak-Shi that are no more than 5 levels above or below Re-Tak-Shi's base are considered swamp water spaces.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12-16, you may place Re-Tak-Shi on any empty water space or swamp space within 10 spaces. If you roll a 17 or higher, you may place her on any empty space within 10 spaces. If Re-Tak-Shi is engaged when she uses Emerge from Swamp, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Preyblood Thrall
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, you may take a turn with 1 Thrall you control. If you roll a 6-15, you may take a turn with up to 2 Thralls you control. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take a turn with up to 3 Thralls you control.
ability_2_desc: Before moving a Preyblood Thrall, you may choose an opponent's figure. Add 1 to the Preyblood Thrall's Move and Attack values for each wound marker on the chosen figure's Army Card to a maximum of +3 for each. To use Blood Hunger, the Preyblood Thrall must end its move adjacent to the chosen figure and must attack that figure if possible. If the Preyblood Thrall does not inflict at least one wound on the chosen figure, destroy the Preyblood Thrall.

name: Ranjit Singh
ability_1_desc: Before rolling for initiative, you may reveal the 'X' Order Marker on this Army Card. If you do, while your other three Order Markers are on Army Cards you control that follow three different Valkyrie Generals, every Unique figure you control with an Order Marker on its card adds 1 to its Move and Attack.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, after moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Ranjit Singh and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card (or Cards if your opponent has more than one Common card for that figure).

name: Ranjit Singh
ability_1_desc: Before rolling for initiative, you may reveal the 'X' Order Marker on this Army Card. If you do, while your other three Order Markers are on Army Cards you control that follow three different Valkyrie Generals, every Unique figure you control with an Order Marker on its card adds 1 to its Move and Attack.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, after moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Ranjit Singh and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card (or Cards if your opponent has more than one Common card for that figure).

name: Glyph of Yngvild (Disengage)
ability_1_desc: Figures you control are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Myrddin
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Call Lightning Special Attack. Myrddin only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Myrddin can be affected by his own Call Lightning Special Attack. Figures under overhangs cannot be targeted with Call Lightning Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After rolling the 20-sided die for the Army Card of a Small, Medium, or Large Unique Hero you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Myrddin, you may place 1 or 2 wound markers on Myrddin's Army Card. Add 1 to your 20-sided die roll for each wound marker you placed, even if this was enough wounds to destroy Myrddin.

name: The Varja
ability_1_desc: The Varja can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: At any point while moving, when the Varja leaves a space occupied by another figure, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, remove all Order Markers from that figure's Army Card (or cards if that player has more than one Common card for that figure). Figures may not be affected by Living Storm more than once per turn.

name: Glyph of Zawit (Teleport)
ability_1_desc: At the end of the round, you may place the figure on this glyph on any empty space(s) on the battlefield not adjacent to any other figures. If the teleported figure is engaged, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Skeletons of Annellintia
ability_1_desc: When a Skeleton of Annellintia you control is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, place that Skeleton of Annellintia on the Army Card of any Unique Lord, Lady, Duke, or Duchess you control.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, before taking a turn with the Skeletons of Annellintia, you may remove one previously destroyed Skeleton of Annellintia from the Army Card of one Unique Hero you control and place it on any empty space adjacent to that Hero.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with the Skeletons of Annellintia, you may move two unengaged Skeletons of Annellintia you control who did not move or attack this turn up to 4 spaces each.

name: Cable
ability_1_desc: Cable needs clear sight instead of line of sight when attacking non-adjacent figures.
ability_2_desc: If Cable rolls at least 3 skulls when attacking, he may attack again. Cable may continue attacking until he rolls fewer than 3 skulls.
ability_3_desc: If a friendly figure adjacent to Cable is targeted by a non-adjacent normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, the figure is attacked as normal. If you roll 12 or higher, the attack targets Cable instead.

name: Caelia
ability_1_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, Caelia may choose a squad figure adjacent to the defending figure. If defending figure receives any wounds from Caelia, then the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: Archers you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Caelia gain her Perforating Shot ability when attacking a non-adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: When adjacent to a dragon you control, Caelia roll one additional attack and defense die.

name: Vulcanmech Incendiborgs
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Redundant Systems markers on this card. After a Vulcanmech Incendiborg receives one or more wounds, you may remove 1 Redundant Systems marker from this Army Card to ignore all wounds.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. A Vulcanmech Incendiborg that does not attack normally may use Flamethrower Special Attack. Choose 2 spaces in a straight line from the attacking Vulcanmech Incendiborg. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Flamethrower Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Captain America attacks with his Shield Throw Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Captain America add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Captain America attacks with his Shield Throw Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Captain America add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Capt. Faraday Jones
ability_1_desc: After attacking a figure engaged with a Soldier you control, Capt. Faraday Jones may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Capt. Jones attacks a figure with a Defense number of 5 or higher on its Army Card, that figure rolls 1 fewer defense die. If that figure is a Soulborg, Cyborg, or Robot, it rolls 2 fewer defense dice instead.

name: Captain Boomerang
ability_1_desc: Captain Boomerang does not need clear line of sight when attacking.
ability_2_desc: When Captain Boomerang attacks with a normal attack, he may attack one additional time. He must attack the same figure.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When Captain Boomerang attacks with his Razorangs Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He may not attack the same figure more than once.

name: Captain Barthos
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Captain Barthos, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, you may move 2 medium Elves you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure targets a non-adjacent elf figure with a normal attack who is adjacent to Captain Barthos, it must target Captain Barthos if that opponent's figure may target Captain Barthos.

name: Captain Horvath
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against a non-adjacent figure within range, count the number of spaces between Captain Horvath and the targeted figure. Add that many dice to your attack roll.
ability_2_desc: If Captain Horvath inflicts at least one wound on an opponent's figure when using Quad Laser Targeting, Captain Horvath may attack one additional time.

name: Captain Jack Harkness
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Captain Jack Harkness, you may move up to 3 Agents you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Captain Jack Harkness is never effected by special powers involving a 20-sided die roll that can destroy a figure.
ability_3_desc: When Captain Jack Harkness would receive enough wounds to be destroyed, before removing him, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore all wounds.

name: Caelestis Akrazan
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Caelestis Akrazan may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Caelestis Akrazan, you may take a turn with up to two Warforged squads you control.
ability_3_desc: When this figure receive enough wounds to be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-8, nothing happens. If you roll 9-14, place 4 wounds on any enemy figure adjacent to Caelestis Akrazan. If you roll 15-19, place 6 wounds on any enemy figure adjacent to Caelestis Akrazan. If you roll 20, place 8 wounds on any enemy figure adjacent to Caelestis Akrazan.

name: Brax
ability_1_desc: When Brax attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Brax, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Brax's height or 3 levels below Brax's base, Brax may add 1 to its range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Brax's movement, ignore elevations. Brax may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Brax starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wildwood Sentinel
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, this Wildwood Sentinel may move one space. That space may be up to 4 levels higher.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Wildwood Sentinel, you may take a turn with a small Wildwood Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, if you have not placed this Wildwood Sentinel or used a Verdant Growth power this round, you may destroy this Wildwood Sentinel and replace it with one of your previously destroyed large Wildwood Heroes. Remove all wound markers from that Hero's Army Card, then place wound markers on it equal to the number of wound markers on this card.

name: Captain Marvel (Mar-Vell)
ability_1_desc: Once per round, as long as there is an unrevealed order marker on his Army Card that is not 'X', Mar-Vell can attempt to pre-empt another figure's turn. Remove the marker and roll a 20-sided die: 1-8 No action. 9-20 Mar-Vell takes a turn, then resume normal turn order.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 4 When Mar-Vell uses Photon Blasts, he may attack a second time.

name: Cadaver Collector
ability_1_desc: This Cadaver Collector starts the game with 3 impale markers on its Army Card. If this Cadaver Collector inflicts a wound on an adjacent small or medium unique hero, you may place an impale marker on that card. A figure with an impale marker on its card cannot move during its movement phase and subtracts two from its defense dice. If a figure with an impale marker is destroyed or is no longer adjacent to this Cadaver Collector, return the impale marker to this Cadaver Collector's card.
ability_2_desc: If a small or medium figure that is not an undead or construct is destroyed by a figure that is not undead in a space adjacent to this Cadaver Collector, you may place the figure on this Cadaver Collector's card. In stead of attacking, any figure you control that is adjacent to this Cadaver Collector may remove a figure from this Cadaver Collector's card, place it on any adjacent empty space, and immediately destroy it.

name: Varkaanan Quickblades
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Varkaanan Quickblades' card, before taking that turn with the Quickblades, you may choose one other Unique Wolf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Varkaanan Quickblades on this card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, any or all unengaged Varkaanan Quickblades may Vault. Choose an opponent's figure within 2 clear sight spaces and place that Quickblade on any unoccupied space adjacent to the chosen figure. A Quickblade may not vault more than 7 levels up or down in a single vault.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. A Varkaanan Quickblade that did not attack normally may use Lightning Slash Special Attack. Defending figures that were not adjacent to this Varkaanan Quickblade at the start of its turn subtract 1 from their defense dice for each skull rolled with Lightning Slash Special Attack.

name: Calamity Sue
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Calamity you may move one lawman you control up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to Calamity, you may roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with Calamity. Calamity can only use Derringer surprise once per round
ability_3_desc: When Calamity is targeted for an attack you may choose one lawman you control with clear sight on both Calamity and the attacker. That lawman may, when possible, attack the figure targeting Calamity first. When Calamity is targeted by more than one figure simultaneous, the lawman may only attack one of these figures. Damsel In Distress is activated and resolved before the targeting figure(s) may attack Calamity.

name: Captain Rogers
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Captain Rogers attacks with his Quick Fire Special Attack, he may attack 1 additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Captain Rogers add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Captain Jack Sparrow
ability_1_desc: If Captain Jack starts to move and isn't engaged, he may add 2 to his Move as long as he ends his move on a Glyph.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 6. At the beginning of the game, choose a Unique Hero. Captain Jack may only use this power on the chosen figure and only once per game.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent begins a turn with any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Captain Jack, you may immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15-19, the turn ends. If you roll a 20, take temporary control of that figure, its Army Card, and that turn.

name: Captain Reginald
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Captain Reginald, after attacking with Captain Reginald, you may move and attack with up to 4 Soldiers you control who follow Einar within 6 clear sight spaces of Captain Reginald. Figures moved by On My Command must begin their move unengaged and end their move engaged.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Soldiers adjacent to Captain Reginald add 1 to their Defense value when defending against normal adjacent attacks.

name: Captain Cold
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures who start their turn within 4 clear sight spaces of Captain Cold may move 2 additional spaces.
ability_2_desc: Captain Cold starts the game with two Slippery Ice Glyphs on his card. When taking a turn with Captain Cold, before moving, you may place each Slippery Ice Glyph on an empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of Captain Cold. The spaces occupied by the Slippery Ice Glyphs, and all same-level or lower spaces within 1 space of a Slippery Ice Glyph, are considered Slippery Ice spaces. At the start of each round, after placing Order Markers and before rolling initiative, place all Slippery Ice Glyphs back on this card.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Castamir Of Umbar
ability_1_desc: All Corsairs you control move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: Castamir does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.
ability_3_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Frenzy power on any Corsair Army Card.

name: Captain Torch
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to that figure are also affected by Explosion. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an adjacent normal attack, each excess shield counts as an unblockable hit on the attacking figure.

name: Casey Jones
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may subtract 3 from Casey Jones' Move and add 3 to his Range.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking an adjacent figure with Casey Jones, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, he may attack normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, he must attack each figure adjacent to him, if possible. Roll each attack separately.

name: Deathcommander Mark 3
ability_1_desc: When revealing an order marker on Dcdr Mark 3's card, after taking his turn, if Dcdr Mark 3 is engaged, you may immediately take a turn with another Unique or Large Soulborg Hero or Squad you control that follows Utgar.
ability_2_desc: When a Soulborg figure you control that follows Utgar attacks a figure engaged with Dcdr Mark 3 with a normal attack, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll one attack die that did not show a skull. Marked for Destruction can be used only once for each attack. Marked for Destruction does not affect Dcdr Mark 3.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Explosive Rounds Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. When Dcdr Mark 3 attacks with his Explosive Rounds Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.

name: CASCA
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Casca and the chosen figure are also affected by Wide Swing Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Range Special Attack 5. Choose 2 spaces in a straight line from Casca that are on the same level as him. All figures on those spaces are affected by Overhead Swing Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Calibrax the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When Calibrax attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Each time Calibrax destroys an adjacent figure which is not a destructible object, you may choose a wounded Hero figure you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Calibrax. Remove one wound marker from the chosen Hero's Army Card. Calibrax cannot remove wound markers from his own card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Calibrax's movement, ignore elevations. Calibrax may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Calibrax starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Captain Marvel
ability_1_desc: When Captain Marvel rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Captain Marvel, you may choose another figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Captain Marvel and move up to 5 spaces with that figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Captain Marvel's movement, ignore elevations. Captain Marvel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Captain Marvel starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hawkgirl
ability_1_desc: When Hawkgirl starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Captain Sheldon
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with Captain Sheldon, you may either remove one wound marker or one special marker such as Negation from Captain Sheldon's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Captain Sheldon ends his movement unengaged, you may choose an engaged small or medium friendly squad figure within 3 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 2 levels higher or lower than the base of Captain Sheldon. Switch Captain Sheldon with the chosen squad figure. Figures moved by Barge into Battle never take any engagement attacks.

name: Captain M37
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may subtract 1 from the Attack number on this card. If you do, after making a normal attack Captain M37 may make two additional normal attacks. When using Short-Range Autoload, Captain M37 may only target figures within 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc:
Range 7 Attack 3
Before attacking, choose a figure within 7 spaces. All special powers on that figure's Army Card are negated until the end of the turn. You must then target that figure for Homing Missile Special Attack, if possible. If a Guard or Scout figure you control is within 3 clear sight spaces of a figure, Captain M37 does not need line of sight to target that figure with Homing Missile Special Attack.

name: Wastewalker Gage
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Wastewalker Gage may use his Grapple Rifle. Grapple Rifle has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Grapple Rifle, ignore elevations. Gage may grapple over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles such as ruins. Gage may not grapple more than 45 levels up or down in a single Grapple Rifle move. If Gage is engaged when he starts his Grapple Rifle move, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. If Gage used Grapple Rifle this turn, he may not attack a non-adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You must choose a figure adjacent to both Gage and the chosen figure to also be affected by Chainsaw Sweep Special Attack, if possible. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. If you do not roll any skulls with Chainsaw Sweep Special Attack, Gage receives a wound.

name: Cyborg
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. When Cyborg attacks with his Sonic Blaster Special Attack, all skulls rolled count for 1 additional hit.
ability_2_desc: If Cyborg takes 1 or more wounds from an attack but is not destroyed, you may remove one or more Order Markers from this card. Remove 1 Wound Marker for each Order Marker you remove.

name: Varkaanan Quickblades
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Varkaanan Quickblades' card, before taking that turn with the Quickblades, you may choose one other Unique Wolf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Varkaanan Quickblades on this card.
