ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, any or all unengaged Varkaanan Quickblades may Vault. Choose an opponent's figure within 2 clear sight spaces and place that Quickblade on any unoccupied space adjacent to the chosen figure. A Quickblade may not vault more than 7 levels up or down in a single vault.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. A Varkaanan Quickblade that did not attack normally may use Lightning Slash Special Attack. Defending figures that were not adjacent to this Varkaanan Quickblade at the start of its turn subtract 1 from their defense dice for each skull rolled with Lightning Slash Special Attack.

name: Carnage
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, Carnage can Swing up to 4 spaces and up to 40 levels up or down. While Swinging, ignore elevations, terrain effects, figures, and obstacles. Carnage will not take passing swipes while Swinging.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, if the defender was not destroyed, place a red Hunger Marker on this card, up to a maximum of three. Add 1 to Carnage's Attack and subtract 1 from his Defense for each Hunger Marker on this card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Carnage, if he destroyed a figure, remove one Hunger Marker from this card. If you do, remove one Wound Marker from this card and take another turn with Carnage.

name: Superman
ability_1_desc: If any figure adjacent to Superman is targeted for an attack, you may remove an unrevealed order marker from this card. Superman then rolls his defense dice against the attack. Superman receives any wounds caused by the attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. Superman may not use his Heat Vision Special Attack against a Human figure.

name: Cavaliers of Weston
ability_1_title: Human Knight and Human Lord Bonding
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Cavaliers of Weston, you may first take a turn with any Human Knight or Human Lord you control.
ability_2_desc: A Cavalier of Weston receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from that Cavalier of Weston at the start of his turn.
ability_3_desc: Any friendly knights adjacent to a Cavalier of Weston gain Tactical Retreat 7. Figures that already have this ability gain Tactical Retreat 5.

name: Cirith Ungol Orcs
ability_1_desc: When defending Cirith Ungol Orcs, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.

name: Captain Atom
ability_1_desc: If Captain Atom would receive one or more wounds from a special attack or special power other than Energy Absorption 4, instead you must ignore all wounds Captain Atom would receive and place 1 Energy marker on this army card for each wound ignored. A maximum of 4 Energy Markers may be placed on this army card. Captain receives one wound for each Energy marker you are unable to place on this card.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4 +Special. Before attacking with this special attack, you may remove up to 2 Energy Markers from this card. Add 1 to Captain Atom's attack dice for each energy marker removed. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Kryptonian figures roll 2 fewer dice when defending against this special attack. Captain Atom cannot be affected by this special attack.
ability_3_desc: If Captain Atom receives one or more wounds, immediately roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 2 from your die roll for each Energy Marker on this card and 1 from your die roll for each wound Captain Atom just received. If you roll a 1 or lower, each figure within 4+X spaces of Captain Atom receives 2+X wounds and then Captain Atom is destroyed. X equals the number of Energy Markers on this card.

name: Green Arrow
ability_1_desc: Before rolling attack dice for a normal, non-adjacent attack, you roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1, you may not attack this turn. If you roll 2-10, attack normally. If you roll 11-19, the targeted figure rolls 2 fewer attack dice. If you roll 20, the targeted figure cannot roll any defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Exploding Arrow Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. Green Arrow is not affected by his Exploding Arrow Special Attack.

name: Green Lantern
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. Green Lantern may mimic any Special Attack listed on an opponent's army card. Choose any army card controlled by an opponent and follow a single special attack as if it were on this card.
ability_2_desc: Green Lantern rolls 1 less die when attacking any figure with the color yellow on it.
ability_3_desc: When Green Lantern, or any figure adjacent to Green Lantern, rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Cestus
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3 + Special. Cestus may use this special attack 2 times in the same turn. Cestus may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack. If Cestus attacks the same figure with each attack, add 1 to Cestus' attack dice for his second attack.

name: Raven
ability_1_desc: Before moving, choose any figure adjacent to Raven. Remove 1 wound marker from that figure's card and place it on this card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a figure adjacent to Raven. Roll 1 attack die, if a skull is rolled, place a wound marker on the chosen figure's card. Raven cannot use Soul-Self in the same turn she uses Psionic Empathy. If Raven attacks this turn, she must attack the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally, place Raven on any empty space within 5 spaces of Raven. If Raven is engaged when she teleports, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Beastboy
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Beast Boy, you may choose an animal form. Beast Boy is considered that form until the start of his next turn. • Hawk Form - Move 7. Range 1. Attack 2. Defense 3. When counting spaces for Beast Boy's Hawk Form movement, ignore elevations. Beast Boy may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Beast Boy starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks. • Rhino Form - Move 4. Range 1. Attack 4. Defense 4. If Beast Boy moves at least 3 spaces in his Rhino Form, you may add 2 dice to your attack. • Gorilla Form - Move 5. Range 1. Attack 4. Defense 3. When rolling defense dice, Beast Boy's Gorilla Form always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Wonder Woman
ability_1_desc: When Wonder Woman rolls defense dice against a non-adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Wonder Woman and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 16 or higher, you may look at all order markers on the chosen figure's card and remove 1 of them. If you roll successfully for Lasso of Truth, Wonder Woman may not attack the chosen figure this turn.
ability_3_desc: Wonder Woman does not start the game on the board. At the end of each round, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, place Wonder Woman on any empty space on the board.

name: Cirith Ungol Uruk-hai
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Cirith Ungol Uruk-hai, you may take a turn with any Captain you control from Mordor.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Cirith Ungol Uruk-hai, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Catwoman
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure within 2 clear line of sight spaces of Catwoman. Roll the 20-sided die. Subtract the chosen figure's Defense value from your die roll. If you roll a 9 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound and you may use this special power again. Catwoman may choose the same figure or a different figure each time she uses this special power.
ability_2_desc: When Catwoman is targeted for a normal attack from an adjacent opponent's figure, if that figure is adjacent to at least one other figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to your die roll for each figure, other than Catwoman, adjacent to the attacking figure. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure cannot attack Catwoman this turn, and must target and attack a different adjacent figure with a normal attack if possible.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Catwoman may double her Height and may ignore up to 1 level of elevation. Catwoman is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Clansmen of Lamedon
ability_1_desc: After attacking with a Clansman of Lamedon, if that Clansman is engaged with at least 2 opponent's figures, he may attack one additional time.

name: Chardris
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2 + Special. When Chardris attacks with Fire Strike Special Attack, add 1 to his attack dice for every additional Elf Wizard you control within 3 clear sight spaces of him, up to a maximum of +3 dice.
ability_2_desc: When Chardris rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Cecil L'Lively
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Firebomb special attack. Cecil Lively only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affacted figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Cecil Lively can be affected by his own Firebomb Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Range special. Attack 3. Choose 5 spaces in a straight line from Cecil. All figures who are in line of sight on those spaces are affected by Cecil's Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice seperately.

name: Chenoa the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. If Chenoa is unengaged, she may use Rapid Release Special Attack. When Chenoa attacks with her Rapid Release Special Attack, she may attack 2 additional times. She cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: Once during a round, after rolling the 20 sided die for any Army Card you control, you may reroll the 20-sided die.

name: Celtic
ability_1_desc: Before moving, choose any small or medium figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Celtic. Roll a D20. If you roll a 14-18, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Celtic this turn. If you roll a 19 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound and cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Celtic this turn.
ability_2_desc: Celtic can attack all adjacent figures.
ability_3_desc: Before rolling defense dice against a normal attack, roll a D20. If you roll a 12 or higher, Celtic is not affected by that attack.

name: City Guards
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered order marker on this Army Card, then you may also reveal the "X" order marker on this Army Card to take a turn with any small or medium Unique Hero who follows Aquilla, Einar, Jandar, Ullar, or Vydar.
ability_2_desc: City Guards adjacent to at another City Guard roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die.

name: Centaur Skirmisher
ability_1_desc: If this Centaur Skirmisher begins his turn unengaged, this Centaur Skirmisher may attack with his normal attack at any point during or after his move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement. While using Charge Through, this Centaur Skirmisher will not take any leaving engagement attacks
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, before taking a turn with this Centaur Skirmisher, you may first take a turn with one other Unique Centaur Hero you control.

name: Chief Aurog
ability_1_desc: All friendly barbaric figures adjacent to Chief Aurog will receive an additional attack die when attacking.
ability_2_desc: When Chief Aurog attacks a figure that is only at one of life, add 2 more attack dices to your roll.
ability_3_desc: When Chief Aurog receive enough wounds to be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 10 or higher, the figure that destroy you, will receive one wound.

name: Chillfire Destroyer
ability_1_desc: If a Chillfire Destroyer ends its normal movement on a snow or ice space, you may immediately place it on any empty same-level snow or ice space within 5 spaces. If a Chillfire Destroyer is engaged when it starts its Ice Tunnel, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When this Chillfire Destroyer is destroyed, roll a D20. If you roll a 1-9, nothing happens. If you roll a 10-14, each adjacent figure receives 1 wound. If you roll a 15-18, each adjacent figure receives 2 wounds. If you roll a 19-20, each adjacent figure receives 6 wounds.

name: Chain Golem
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Chain Golem, you may choose one opponent's small, medium, or large figure within 3 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 6 levels above Chain Golem's height and no more than 6 levels below Chain Golem's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to Chain Golem. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Chain Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Chain Golem always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Clayface
ability_1_desc: When Clayface is targeted for attack, roll the 20-sided dice. On a roll of 17 or higher the attacker must choose a different target.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. If an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least one wound from the Plasticity Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that Unique Hero's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense against an attack, Clayface always adds two additional shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Clayton Pierce
ability_1_desc: Before rolling for initiative, if Clayton Pierce is not the only Lawman you control, you may move Clayton and up to 3 other Lawmen you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, after revealing an Order Marker on Clayton Pierce and taking a turn with him, you may take a turn with up to 3 other Lawman Heroes you control. Heroes taking a turn with Shootout must be within 4 clear sight spaces of Clayton and may not move normally during that turn.

name: Combatatrons
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Combatatrons, you may first take a turn with any small or medium Soulborg Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When a Combatatron attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When a Combatatron rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: Comrade Braznyy
ability_1_desc: If Comrade Braznyy is attacked and wounded by a Squad figure, he cannot receive any additional wounds from Squad figures that turn.
ability_2_desc: If Comrade Braznyy wounds a Unique Hero with a normal attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die once for every Communist you control, except Comrade Braznyy, adjacent to that Hero. For every 14 or higher rolled, inflict an additional wound onto that Hero.

name: Cor Caroli
ability_1_desc: When targeting a figure for attack whose base is on a lower level than that of Cor Caroli, add 2 to Cor Caroli's range.
ability_2_desc: When Cor Caroli attacks and inflicts at least one wound, he may attack one additional time. Cor Caroli may attack the same figure twice.

name: Cold Wolf
ability_1_desc: If Cold Wolf is engaged, add 2 to his attack dice and 1 to his defense dice.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Scouts with a Range number of 4 or more within 4 clear sight spaces of Cold Wolf add 2 to their Range number.
ability_3_desc: If Cold Wolf is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Cold Wolf. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 12 or higher, ignore any wounds Cold Wolf just received.

name: CETUS
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, Cetus may use Fan. Place all small and medium figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Cetus adjacent to Cetus, or adjacent to a figure adjacent to Cetus if they cannot be placed adjacent to Cetus. Figures moved by Fan never take any leaving engagement attacks. Falling damage will apply to non-Flying figures. Each figure is placed by the controlling player. Fan may only be used once per round.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Cetus' movement, ignore elevations. Cetus may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Cetus starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Cpl. Chuck Leeds
ability_1_desc: When Cpl. Chuck Leeds attacks an opponent's figure, he may attack one additional time for each revealed order marker on that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure). Cpl. Chuck Leeds can only attack a figure from that Army Card.

name: Clayton Pierce
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Clayton Pierce, you may move each other Unique Lawman Hero you control with an Order Marker on its Army Card up to 5 spaces. Any Lawman moving with Sheriff's Posse must end its movement within 3 clear sight spaces of Clayton. If you use Sheriff's Posse, you cannot use Shootout this turn.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Unique Lawman Hero and taking that Lawman's turn, if that Lawman is within clear sight of Clayton Pierce you may start a Shootout. Take a turn with a number of other Unique Lawman Heroes you control, up to the number of the Order Marker you revealed. During these turns they can only attack. Any Lawman taking a turn with Shootout must be within clear sight of Clayton.

name: CHARAX-NA
ability_1_desc: Range Special Attack 4. Choose 8 spaces in a straight line from Charax-Na. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Charax-Na's movement, ignore elevations. Charax-Na may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Charax-Na starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Charax-Na never rolls for molten lava damage, or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Claudia Nessalith
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Claudia Nessalith. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Claudia Nessalith, you may remove 1 Wound Marker from Claudia Nessalith's Army Card if she is adjacent to a squad figure with the Collect Samples special power that has at least one figure on its Army Card. After removing the Wound Marker remove a figure from the squad figure's Army Card.

name: Colonel M3
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Colonel M3, you may first take a turn with any Soulborg Unique Hero that you control who follows Utgar.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected. Colonel M3 only needs line of sight to the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures, and all affected figures roll defense dice separately. If more than one wound is caused on a Unique Hero, remove all Order Markers from that Army Card. Soulborgs are not affected by Blister Agent Special Attack.

name: Constrictor
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Constrictor, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Constrictor's height or 3 levels below Constrictor's base, Constrictor may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc:
When attacking a small or medium figure with a normal attack, if Constrictor inflicts at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die.
- If you roll 1-10, nothing happens.
- If you roll 11-19, the defending figure receives one additional wound.
- If you roll a 20 or higher, the defending figure is destroyed.

name: Crawford Slade
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round after Crawford Slade has been destroyed, before you place Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, place Crawford Slade on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all wound markers on this card.

name: Cloak
ability_1_desc: Instead of a normal move, Cloak may use Darkforce Field. Choose any space within 8 spaces of Cloak. You may also choose up to two small or medium figures adjacent to Cloak. Place Cloak on the chosen space and place the chosen figures on same-level spaces adjacent to him. Roll the 20-sided die for any chosen figure moved in this way that is not a Robot, Dagger, or a friendly figure moved along with Dagger. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Figures moved with Darkforce Field never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Each time Cloak destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Cloak cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When Cloak rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage.

name: COUGAR
ability_1_desc: At the end of every round, you may move all unengaged Cougars you control up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. If no wounds are inflicted due to Slashing Claws Special Attack, this Cougar may use Slashing Claws Special Attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Cougar may add 2 to its height.

name: Clayface
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Clayface, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Clayface's height or 3 levels below Clayface's base, Clayface may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If Clayface is attacked by a non-adjacent opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to your roll if Clayface is adjacent to an opponent's figure. If you roll a 1-13, roll defense normally. If you roll a 14 or higher, Clayface takes no damage and you may choose a figure adjacent to Clayface to defend against the attack. Place any received wounds on the chosen figure's card.
ability_3_desc: Instead of rolling defense dice against a normal attack, you may place one wound marker on this card to block all damage.

name: Clerics of Weston
ability_1_desc: Clerics of Weston may not be drafted in an army containing undead or terrifying figures.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a normal turn with a Cleric of Weston you may attempt to regain control over an adjacent figure that was yours at the start of the game but have lost control over. Roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 17 or higher you regain control of the chosen figure and that figures army card. Remove any order markers on this card.
ability_3_desc: All friendly followers of Jandar roll 1 extra defense die for every cleric within 3 clear sight spaces.
ability_4_desc: A Cleric of Weston and all adjacent friendly figures are immune to special attacks and abilities from undead figures.

name: Corbin Nine
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Plasma Burst Special Attack. Corbin Nine only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. When attacking the chosen figure, add 1 skull to whatever is rolled. Corbin Nine can be affected by his own Plasma Burst Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Destructible objects and opponents' Soulborg figures subtract 2 from their defense dice when adjacent to Corbin Nine.

name: CPL. JAMES SWIFT
ability_1_desc: When rolling for The Drop special power on any Army Card you control, if a figure could be placed within 3 clear sight spaces of Cpl. James Swift, you may add 3 to your roll. If you roll a 13 or higher, at least one figure must be placed within 3 clear sight spaces of Cpl. Swift.
ability_2_desc: Cpl. James Swift is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Cpl. James Swift, and all friendly Soldiers adjacent to him, roll 1 additional defense die if they have any defense bonus from either height or terrain.

name: Conan
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Conan, you may move him up to 4 spaces. Conan can attack up to 3 times with this special attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_2_desc: If there is at least 1 Wound Marker on this card, the most wounds Conan can receive from an attack is one.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Conan's normal movement, elevation changes of up to 1 level count as one space. If Conan uses his normal move to move two or fewer spaces, one elevation change of up to 15 levels may count as one space. You may ignore Conan's height of 5 when climbing.

name: Crone Witch
ability_1_title: Call of the Undead Special Attack
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 1 + Special. Choose a figure to attack. Add 1 attack dice for every friendly undead figure that is adjacent to the selected figure.
ability_2_desc: All friendly undead figures adjacent to the Crone Witch, may add 1 more dice to their attack roll.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Creeping Vine
ability_1_desc: When attacking a small or medium figure, if this Creeping Vine inflicts at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Creeping Vine, you may move each Creeping Vine you control up to 2 spaces. This space may be up to 2 levels higher.
ability_3_desc: If a Creeping Vine is adjacent to an evergreen tree or jungle plant, opponents' figures must be adjacent to that Creeping Vine to attack it with a normal attack.

name: "Crummy" Kurt Riens
ability_1_desc: Before an opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of "Crummy" Kurt Riens rolls the 20-sided die for a special power on an Army Card or Glyph, you may reveal an "X" Order Marker that is on this card and subtract 5 from the die roll.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3 Whenever an opponent's figure attacks "Crummy" Kurt Riens with a normal attack and fails to inflict a wound, you may immediately attack that figure with Quickdraw Special Attack, if possible.

name: Corvus
ability_1_desc: For purposes of special powers on any Army Card you control, Corvus may be considered an Elf Wizard in addition to its normal species and class.
ability_2_title: Through the Eye of the Raven
ability_2_desc: When Corvus is within 3 clear sight spaces of an opponent's figure, a Wizard Hero you control with a Range of 4 or higher who follows Ullar may add 3 to its Range when targeting that figure for an attack. If Corvus has line of sight on that figure, that Wizard may target it for an attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Corvus' movement, ignore elevations. Corvus may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Corvus starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Crimson Flame Cultist
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with any Greater Demon and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may destroy one Crimson Flame Cultist you control and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-3, nothing happens. If you roll 4-14, remove 1 wound marker from that Greater Demon's Army Card. If you roll 15-19, remove up to 2 wound markers. If you roll 20, remove all wound markers. You may not use this power more than once per turn.

name: Cronus, the Skeletal Cyclops
ability_1_desc: When Cronus, the skeletal cyclops attacks, he may attack one extra time for each wound marker he has, up to 3 more times. Cronus can't attack different figures using this power.
ability_2_desc: When Cronus, or any friendly small or medium Valkrill figure adjacent to Cronus, rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: CRAG
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, Crag may choose a small or medium adjacent figure on a space Crag has enough movement to move onto. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. If the chosen figure is not destroyed, Crag's movement ends. If you choose to continue Crag's movement, he must begin by moving onto the space the destroyed figure occupied. Crag must be on a space where he can end movement each time he uses this power.
ability_2_desc: All Elementars you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Crag roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die. Elementar Inspiration does not affect Crag.

name: Archers Of Umbar
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if your second Archer Of Umbar attacks the same figure as the first Archer Of Umbar, add one attack die to the second Archer Of Umbar's attack.
ability_2_desc: Archers Of Umbar do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.

name: Crimson Dynamo
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4 and 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by this special attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Figures with the Electrically Charged special power are not affected by Electrical Blast Special Attack. After attacking with this special attack, Crimson Dynamo may attack 1 additional time, rolling 1 fewer attack die for the subsequent attack.
ability_2_title: Armor Piercing Rocket Launcher Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Only non-adjacent figures can be attacked with this special attack. For each skull rolled, the defending figure subtracts 1 die from its defense. After attacking with this special attack, Crimson Dynamo may attack two additional times.

name: Crone of Bleakwoode
ability_1_desc: If the Crone of Bleakwoode destroys a small or medium figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Shades of Bleakwoode. Undead are not affected by Necromancy.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Crone of Bleakwoode's movement, ignore elevations. The Crone of Bleakwoode may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Crone of Bleakwoode starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Crypt Reapers
ability_1_desc: After Crypt Reapers have finished their turn, any Crypt Reapers which destroyed a figure with a normal attack that turn may move and attack normally one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Crypt Reaper and the chosen figure are also affected by Sweeping Scythe Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: This figure rolls 1 additional defense die against normal attacks by non-adjacent figures.

name: Sudema
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Sudema. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 7 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 17 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero figure. If Sudema destroys a figure with Stare of Stone, Sudema may use Stare of Stone again.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Captain America rolls at least one shield, the most wounds he may take for this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: When an adjacent friendly figure is rolling defense dice, if that figure rolls at least one shield, the most wounds it may take for this attack is one.

name: Crypt Guardian
ability_1_desc: When you choose an opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die for a special power on any Undead Army Card, you may add 2 to the die roll if the chosen figure is engaged with this Crypt Guardian.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on this Crypt Guardian, after taking this Crypt Guardian's turn, you may take a turn with one other Guard Hero or Queen Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, this Crypt Guardian always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: The Thing
ability_1_desc: If there are 3 or more wound markers on this card, When Thing attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium non-flying figure adjacent to Thing. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may throw the figure by placing it on any empty space within 4 spaces of Thing. The figure must land within clear sight of Thing. After the figure is placed, roll the 20-sided die for throwing damage. If you roll an 11 or higher, the thrown figure receives 2 wounds. If the figure is thrown onto a level higher than the height of Thing or onto water, do not roll for throwing damage. The thrown figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Thing may Heroic Leap. Heroic Leap has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Thing's leaping movement, ignore elevations. Thing may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Thing may not leap more than 10 levels up or down in a single leap. If Thing is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Khosumet the Darklord
ability_1_desc: Each friendly figure with a Relentless personality within 4 clear sight spaces of Khosumet the Darklord recieves an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: You may add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Unleashed Fury power on any Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Khosumet the Darklord rolls at least one shield, the most wounds it may take for this attack is one.

name: Templar Calvary
ability_1_desc: Templar Calvary recieve 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from them at the start of their turn.
ability_2_desc: Templar Calvary can move through all small and medium squad figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement with those figures.
ability_3_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Utgar, Templar Calvary recieve 1 additional attack die.

name: Parmenio
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any unique Army Card you control. For this game the chosen card's personality is disciplined, regardless of what is listed on the card.
ability_2_desc: When a Sacred Band figure within 3 clear sight spaces receives one or more wounds, roll the 20-sided die before removing that figure. If you roll a 13 or higher, ignore any wounds.

name: Chalice of Fortitude
ability_1_desc: If this figure has 4 or more wounds on its Army Card, add 1 to the defense dice of this figure. Keep this card handy as a reference for the Chalice of Fortitude Treasure Glyph. Rules for Treasure Glyphs can be found in the Heroscape D&D Master Set: Battle for the Underdark. Or go to www.heroscapers.com.

name: Roman Archers
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 6. Three unengaged Roman Archers may combine their attacks and roll their attack dice as one attack. All Roman Archers in the Arrow Volley must have a clear line of sight on the one target. The Defending figure compares height to the highest Roman Archer to determine height advantage.

name: Aquaman
ability_1_desc: Aquaman does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When Aquaman is on a water space, add 3 to his move and 1 to his attack. At the end of each round, if Aquaman is on a water space, remove 1 wound marker from his Army Card. If he isn't on a water space, he receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any or all opponent's figures on a water space within 8 spaces of Aquaman and roll the 20-sided die separately for all affected figures. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.

name: Empress Kiova
ability_1_desc: When Empress Kiova attacks, she may attack two additional times.
ability_2_desc: When you roll defense dice for any Kyrie that you control who follows Einar and is within 5 clear sight spaces of Empress Kiova, you may re-roll all defense dice that did not show shields. Gift of the Empress Aura can be used only once for each defense roll. Empress Kiova's Gift of the Empress Aura does not affect Empress Kiova.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Empress Kiova's movement, ignore elevations. Empress Kiova may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Empress Kiova starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Deepwyrm Drow
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Deepwyrm Drow, you may first take a turn with any drow hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Each time a Deepwyrm Drow attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: If a Deepwyrm Drow is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that Deepwyrm Drow is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If he is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Crimson Manticore
ability_1_desc: When this Crimson Manticore attacks human figures, add 2 attack dice. If this Crimson Manticore begins a turn adjacent to any human figure or figures controlled by your opponent, it may not disengage from that figure or figures and must attack one of those figures during that turn. Each time this Crimson Manticore destroys a human figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If this Crimson Manticore would receive one or more wounds from an adjacent attacking figure, roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to your roll if this Crimson Manticore has height advantage. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore any damage that would be inflicted by the attack and the attacking figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Crimson Manticore's movement, ignore elevation. A Crimson Manticore may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Crimson Manticore starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Marro Drudge
ability_1_desc: When a Marro Drudge is on a water space, add 1 to its attack and defense.
ability_2_desc: If Marro Drudge ends its normal movement on a swamp water space, you may immediately place it on any empty same-level swamp water space within 5 spaces. If Marro Drudge is engaged when it starts to tunnel, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When a Marro Drudge attacks, it may attack one additional time. When making attacks with Dual Wield, subtract 1 from its attack dice.

name: Batman
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Batman, you may look at any Order Marker on any Army Card. You may look at that Order Marker at any time for the rest of the round.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, Batman may use his Bat Grapple. Bat Grapple has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Bat Grapple movement, ignore elevations. Batman may grapple over water without stopping, grapple over figures without becoming engaged, and grapple over obstacles such as ruins. Batman may not Bat Grapple more than 30 levels up or down in a single Bat Grapple. If Batman is engaged when he starts to Bat Grapple, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Major X17
ability_1_desc: All small, medium, or large opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major X17 may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, Major X17 adds 3 defense dice.

name: The Einar Imperium
ability_1_desc: When the Einar Imperium attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a the Einar Imperium's movement, ignore elevations. the Einar Imperium may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a the Einar Imperium starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When a the Einar Imperium rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice to the defense roll.

name: Jotun
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Wild Swing Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Jotun cannot be affected by his own Wild Swing Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium non-flying figure adjacent Jotun. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may throw the figure by placing it on any empty space within 4 spaces of Jotun. The figure must land within clear sight of Jotun. After the figure is placed, roll the 20-sided die for throwing damage. If you roll an 11 or higher, the thrown figure receives 2 wounds. If the figure is thrown onto a level higher than the height of Jotun or onto water, do not roll for throwing damage. The thrown figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Viscous Centipede
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by this Viscous Centipede subtract 1 from their defense dice. Destructible Objects are not affected by —.
ability_2_desc: After this Viscous Centipede moves, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, return 1 previously destroyed figure with the Surge special power that you control to the battlefield on an empty space adjacent to this Viscous Centipede.

name: Moon Knight
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative, place the 20-sided die on this card with the results side up. If you rolled a 1-3, Moon Knight loses Super Strength. If you rolled a 4-8, nothing happens. If you rolled a 9-14, Add 2 to Moon Knight's Will of Khonshu roll. If you rolled a 15-19, Add 1 to Moon Knight's Attack and Defense values, and add 5 to his Will of Khonshu roll. If you rolled a 20, Add 1 to Moon Knight's Move value and add 2 to his Attack and Defense values, and add 10 to his Will of Khonshu roll.
ability_2_desc: When Moon Knight or a figure adjacent to Moon Knight is destroyed, before removing that figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-4, place a wound marker on this card. If you roll a 19 or higher, remove all wound markers from that figure's Army Card and that figure isn't destroyed.

name: COMBI STICK
ability_1_desc: Range 10. Attack 6. After attacking place combi glyph at target's location. Attack cannot be reused until glyph is recovered by any Yautja.
ability_2_desc: The combi-stick can only be retrieved by a Yautja.
ability_3_desc: The combi-stick is cloaked until a Yautja picks it up. The combi-stick is technology known only to the Yautja.

name: Pelloth
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose a Drow figure you control that is within 5 clear sight spaces of Pelloth and roll 4 attack dice. One at a time for each skull rolled, you may inflict one wound on any figure that is within 2 clear sight spaces of the chosen Drow figure. You may inflict more than 1 wound on a single figure using Lolth's Wrath Special Attack. Figures affected by Lolth's Wrath Special Attack cannot roll any defense dice. After attacking with Lolth's Wrath Special Attack, destroy the chosen Drow figure.
ability_2_desc: If Pelloth is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Maginos
ability_1_desc: After rolling attack dice with Maginos and before dealing any damage, you may reroll that attack with one additional attack die for each skull rolled.
ability_2_desc: After Maginos rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 figures you control that have the Scramble special power up to 4 spaces each. Figures that scramble never get attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: Boneshard Drudges
ability_1_desc: If a Boneshard Drudge you control is destroyed, immediately replace its figure, if possible, with a Bone Caltrops. The glyph cannot be placed on any occupied space.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker from a Necromancer and before taking the turn, if a Bone Caltrops is within 4 clear sight spaces of the Necromancer, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, immediately replace the glyph, if possible, with one of your previously destroyed Boneshard Drudges. The figure cannot be placed on any occupied space.

name: Syvarris
ability_1_desc: When Syvarris attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If Syvarris is targetted and recieves one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Syvarris. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 12 or higher, ignore any wounds Syvarris just recieved.

name: Storm Shadow
ability_1_desc: When Storm Shadow rolls for defense dice against an attack, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with Storm Shadow, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Storm Shadow at the start of this turn, Storm Shadow receives 2 additional attack dice.
ability_4_desc: Storm Shadow can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: UNSC SPARTAN SOLDIER
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 blue overshield markers on this Army Card. Whenever this UNSC Spartan Soldier would receive any wounds, he first removes overshield markers instead of receiving wounds. When you reveal a numbered order marker from this UNSC Spartan Soldier and before taking the turn, if this UNSC Spartan Soldier is not within 8 clear sight spaces of any enemy figure, return all removed overshield markers to this Army Card.

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: Start the game with two Glyphs of Sticky Web symbol side up on this card. Instead of attacking, you may remove a Glyph of Sticky Web from this card and place it on a space power side up within 4 clear sight spaces of Spider-Man. A figure can be on the chosen space or the space can be empty. After any Glyphs of Sticky Web are removed from play, you may place them symbol side up on this card.
ability_2_desc: When defending, one shield rolled blocks all damage. If Spider-Man rolls at least one shield, he may immediately move up to 4 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Move 4. Lob 40. Ignore engagement and falling rules for Swing Line Special Move.

name: Daisis Prime
ability_1_desc: When this Daisis Prime attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack 3. After attacking normally this Daisis Prime may attack with Combat Tail Special Attack.

name: Dread Warrior
ability_1_desc: If this Dread Warrior is engaged, you cannot move this Dread Warrior.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each of your turns after this Dread Warrior has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, immediately place this Dread Warrior on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Wound Markers on this card.

name: Cyborg
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is placed on this card, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for each Army Card you control that has one or more Order Markers on it, up to a maximum of +4 for initiative.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4 + Special. When Cyborg attacks with his Sonic Cannon Special Attack he may add 1 attack die for each revealed Order Marker on this card. Cyborg may only use his Sonic Cannon Special Attack once during a round.

name: Kobold Zombie
ability_1_desc: You may move up to 12 Kobold Zombies you control each turn. However, you may only attack with 1 Kobold Zombie. You may attack with any Kobold Zombie you control, even if it did not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: If a Kobold Zombie that you control destroys an opponent's small Kobold, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Kobold Zombies. Undead are not affected by Zombies Rise Again.

name: CYBERMAN
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may take a turn with up to 3 Cybermen you control.
ability_2_desc: Instead of making a normal attack, choose an adjacent figure. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, and the Hero is small or medium, destroy it. If you roll an 18 or higher, and the Hero is large or huge, it receives one wound and you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker from its Army Card.

name: DAGNYR
ability_1_desc: For every opponent's figure Dagnyr destroys, place a purple Experience Marker on this card. When attacking with Dagnyr, roll one additional attack die for each Experience Marker on this card. A maximum of 3 Experience Markers can be placed on this card.

name: Anti-Monitor
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally with Anti-Monitor, choose any number of figures to move. Roll the 20-sided die for each. If you roll a 9 or higher, choose an empty space within 10 spaces of that figure and move that figure to that space. That figure doesn't take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack 5. Every figure and destructible within 2 clear sight spaces of Anti-Monitor is affected by Matter Absorption Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures and objects. Each figure and object rolls defense dice separately. If Matter Absorption destroys a figure or object, remove 3 wound markers from this Army Card.

name: Aspect of Tiamat
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3 Aspect of Tiamat may attack four additional times.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Aspect of Tiamat's movement, ignore elevations. Aspect of Tiamat may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Aspect of Tiamat starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Cybermen
ability_1_desc: Instead of a Cyberman's normal attack, choose an adjacent figure. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, and the Hero is small or medium, destroy it. If you roll an 18 or higher, and the Hero is large or huge, it receives one wound and you may remove one Order Marker from its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If a Cyberman that you control destroys an opponent's adjacent medium figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Cybermen. Newly placed Cybermen cannot attack this turn. Soulborgs, Cyborgs, and Robots may not be replaced by a Cyberman with this special power.

name: Warden of the Wood
ability_1_desc: All figures who follow Ullar that you control within 6 clear sight spaces of this Warden of the Wood have the Counter Strike special power. If a figure already has Counter Strike, add 2 to its defense dice. This Warden of the Wood's Briar Aura does not affect this Warden of the Wood and never adds more than 2 additional defense dice if you control more than one Warden of the Wood.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: CYBERMEN
ability_1_desc: Instead of a Cyberman's normal attack, choose an adjacent figure. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, and the Hero is small or medium, destroy it. If you roll an 18 or higher, and the Hero is large or huge, it receives one wound and you may remove one Order Marker from its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If a Cyberman that you control destroys an opponent's adjacent medium figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Cybermen. Newly placed Cybermen cannot attack this turn. Soulborgs, Cyborgs, and Robots may not be replaced by a Cyberman with this special power.

name: Danil
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Danil always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Danil, you may choose a wounded friendly Hero figure adjacent to Danil and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 Wound Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After rolling the 20-sided die for Lay on Hands, if Danil failed to remove a Wound Marker you may roll the 20-side one more time.

name: Daren
ability_1_desc: Daren receives 3 additional attack dice when attacking a figure that was at least 4 spaces away at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Daren rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Daren may take for this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: If Daren has 4 or more wounds on his Army Card, Daren may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Aspect of Carnage can be used only once for each attack roll.

name: Daisy "Skye" Johnson
ability_1_desc: Before rolling for initiative, if there is at least one unrevealed Order Marker on this card, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may choose an opponent's Army Card and view all unrevealed Order Markers on that card. If one of those markers is an X Order Marker, you may remove it and place it on any Agent's Army Card you control. Return the Order Marker to that opponent at the end of the round.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's adjacent figure with a normal attack, roll one additional attack die. When defending against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, roll one additional defense die.

name: The Mavericks
ability_1_desc: If only one Maverick moves and attacks this turn, he may add 2 to his move, add 2 to his range, and may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Mavericks always add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: After a Maverick inflicts a wound on an opponent's figure, that Maverick may move up to 5 spaces, ignoring elevations. A Maverick may Jet over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins.

name: DALIXA
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dices, blanks also counts as skulls.
ability_2_desc: At the end of each round, all figures adjacent to Dalixa must roll the 20-sided die. If the player roll 12 or higher, that figure will receive a wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Dalixa's movement, ignore elevations. Dalixa may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Dalixa starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Darkstalker Duergars
ability_1_desc: Darkstalker Duergars may not be moved by any opponent's special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: If a Darkstalker Duegars is on a shadow space, opponent's figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Darter Clan Dragoon
ability_1_desc: If a Darter Clan Dragoon does not move normally and attacks a figure who was at least two levels lower than the Darter Clan Dragoon at the start of the turn, add 2 to the Darter Clan Dragoon's Attack value.

name: Dragonblood Kobold
ability_1_desc: If an Order Marker was removed from this Army Card, then after attacking a figure or destructible object with this Dragonblood Kobold, all Kobolds you control able to attack that figure or destructible object may immediately do so.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 2. Choose 2 spaces in a straight line from this Dragonblood Kobold. All figures on those spaces are affected by this attack. Roll 2 attack dice once. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Dragonblood Kobold's movement, ignore elevations. A Dragonblood Kobold may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Dragonblood Kobold starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dark Phoenix (Jean Grey)
ability_1_desc: You may draft a Jean Grey figure with the Unstable personality. If you do, Dark Phoenix does not start the game on the battlefield. When your Unstable Jean Grey is destroyed, switch her with Dark Phoenix.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll 1 unblockable attack die against each figure within 2 spaces of Dark Phoenix, one at a time. If a figure receives a wound, you may place it on any empty space within 2 spaces of its original placement.
ability_3_desc: Anytime Dark Phoenix receives one or more wounds or is destroyed, you must immediately roll 1 unblockable attack die against each adjacent figure, one at a time.

name: Ozirael
ability_1_desc: After attacking or defending with a Dark Servant you control, you may re-roll all dice that did not show skulls or shields. Fanatical Resolve may only be used once for each roll.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Dark Servant's Army Card, before taking that Dark Servant's turn, you may first take a turn with any Cultist you control who follows Ozirael.
ability_3_desc: If you do not control at least one Unique Hero, all Dark Servants you control cannot use any other special powers on their Army Card.

name: Dark Side Acolyte
ability_1_desc: If this unit has not moved or used another special ability this turn, it may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: Unit starts with counters equal to the force rating. Counters are spent for the below abilities. Once counters are spent they are gone for the rest of the game. -Reroll: Reroll one failed dice roll. This includes initiative, attack, and defense. If reroll is taken, all dice must be rerolled. -Movement: Character can spend one force point to move 2 additional hexes. -Flight: May use a force point to fly per the flying rules for one turn.

name: Darkseid
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. After attacking normally, Darkseid may attack with his Omega Effect Special Attack. No clear line of sight is needed. When Darkseid attacks with his Omega Effect Special Attack, always add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Darkseid's movement, ignore elevations. Darkseid may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Darkseid starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: POWER GLYPH OF PROTECT
ability_1_desc: Immediately count all shields rolled twice. Use this special power only if this figure or a figure adjacent to this figure rolls defense, and only once each round.

name: DARILTH
ability_1_desc: Range 6 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose two other figures within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Lightning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Lightning Breath Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Darilth's movement, ignore elevations. Darilth may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Darilth starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Deadshot
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2 or 3. Deadshot starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2 or 3 attack dice. Deadshot may keep making special attacks with 1, 2 or 3 attack dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. Deadshot may target the same or different figures with each attack.

name: Darkwood Treant Guardian
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die for each enemy figure within 5 clear sight spaces of this Darkwood Treant Guardian that is adjacent to an evergreen tree or jungle piece. If you roll a 1-14, nothing happens. If you roll a 15 or higher, the figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: If this Darkwood Treant Guardian is on a grass space or adjacent to an evergreen tree or jungle piece, remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card at the end of the turn.

name: DEAN-MO-SHI
ability_1_desc: Attack 5. Range Special. All figures within 4 spaces of Dean-Mo-Shi are affected by this attack. Scream "Yaa!" as you roll the attack dice. Affected figures roll defense separately. At the end of his turn, place a negation marker and 3 wound markers on Dean-Mo-Shi.

name: Darter Clan Scouts
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Darter Clan Scouts, you may first take a turn with a Unique Anurian Hero or 2 Common Anurian Heroes that you control. If the Darter Clan Scouts first take a turn with 2 Common Anurian Heroes, those heroes may not share the same class.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with an Anurian figure you control, the defending figure rolls 1 fewer defense die for every two Darter Clan Scouts you control adjacent to the defending figure.

name: Dead Men of Dunharrow
ability_1_desc: You cannot take a turn with the Dead Men of Dunharrow unless all figures you control follow Xenothea, or if you control Aragorn while he has the Andúril Treasure Glyph.
ability_2_desc: You may move up to 8 Dead Men of Dunharrow that you control each turn. However, you may attack with only 4 Dead Men of Dunharrow. You may attack with any 4 Dead Men of Dunharrow, even Dead Men that you did not move this turn.
ability_3_desc: Dead Men of Dunharrow can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Parademon
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, Parademon may choose to self-destruct. Roll the 20-sided die to determine if any other figures are wounded. If you roll a 1-3, all adjacent figures are safe. If you roll a 4-15, each adjacent figure receive 2 wounds. If you roll a 16-19, each adjacent figure recieves 4 wounds. If you roll a 20, each adjacent figure recieves 8 wounds. After using this power, Parademon is always destroyed.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Parademon's movement, ignore elevations. Parademon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Parademon starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Deadeye Dan
ability_1_desc: Range 10. Attack 1. Choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure to attack. The chosen figure cannot roll defense dice when attacked by Deadeye Dan's Ullar Enhanced Rifle Special Attack. Deadeye Dan may not use this special attack if he moved this turn.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any non-adjacent figure within 10 clear sight spaces of Deadeye Dan. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or 20, the chosen figure is destroyed. If you roll a 1-18, you missed. Deadeye Dan may not use this special power if he moved this turn.

name: DEATHHOUND
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Warden Army Card you control, before moving with that Warden, you may choose up to 3 Deathhounds you control adjacent to that Warden. After moving with that Warden, place all chosen Deathhounds on empty spaces adjacent to that Warden, if possible.
ability_2_desc: Small and medium figures may never move out of an engagement with a Deathhound you control.

name: Deathwalker 8000
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. If Deathwalker 8000's Rapid Fire Special Attack inflicts a wound, it may attack again with its Rapid Fire Special Attack. Deathwalker 8000 may continue attacking with its Rapid Fire Special Attack until it does not inflict a wound.

name: Danny Phantom
ability_1_desc: Danny Phantom does not need clear line of sight to attack with his normal attack. After an Order Marker is revealed on any other Undead army card, you may immediately move Danny Phantom up to 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Danny Phantom, you may choose 3 spaces in a straight line from him. All figures on the chosen spaces and all figures within 1 space of any of the chosen spaces are affected by Ghostly Wail. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die once for each affected figure. Add 3 to your roll when rolling for a Symbiote, Undead, or destructible object. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives 2 wounds. Danny Phantom cannot be affected by his own Ghostly Wail. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_3_desc: Danny Phantom can move through all figures, obstacles, and terrain and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. If Danny Phantom is attacked with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher, Danny Phantom takes no damage from that attack.

name: Deadpool
ability_1_desc: Once per round, instead of moving Deadpool normally, you may choose any empty space within 10 spaces of Deadpool. Place Deadpool on the chosen space. When Deadpool starts to teleport, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Deadpool attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: If the 'X' Order Marker is on this card at the end of a round, you may remove one wound marker from this card.
ability_4_desc: When a friendly figure adjacent to Deadpool is targeted for an attack from a non-adjacent figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure must target Deadpool this turn.

name: Darla the Zombie Cheerleader
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the round, if you have won initiative, you may immediately move Darla the Zombie Cheerleader up to 4 spaces. When moving with this special power, Darla never takes leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_title: YOU CAN'T HIT THIS ZOMBIE'S HEAD!
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on an Undead Savage Army Card you control, you may choose one figure on that card that is within 6 clear sight spaces of Darla the Zombie Cheerleader. That figure may add 2 to its move that turn.
ability_3_title: WE'LL TAKE YOUR SOUL AND EAT YOUR DEAD! AND WE WON'T LEAVE UNTIL WE'VE FED!
ability_3_desc: After an Undead figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Darla the Zombie Cheerleader rolls the 20-sided die for a special power on its Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll.

name: DECAY
ability_1_desc: Decay begins the game with three Curse markers on his Army Card. After moving and before attacking, Decay may attempt a Curse. Choose a Unique Hero within 6 clear sight spaces of Decay and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, place a Curse marker on that Hero's Army Card. Whenever a Hero with a Curse Marker takes a turn, before doing anything else, that Hero automatically receives a wound. Undead figures are not affected by Curse.

name: Deathwalker 7000
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, Deathwalker 7000 may choose to self-destruct. Roll the 20-sided die to determine if any other figures are wounded. If you roll a 1-3, all adjacent figures are safe. If you roll a 4-15, each adjacent figure receive 2 wounds. If you roll a 16-19, each adjacent figure recieves 4 wounds. If you roll a 20, each adjacent figure recieves 8 wounds. After using this power, Deathwalker 7000 is always destroyed.
ability_2_desc: When Deathwalker 7000 rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: Deathwalker 6000
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent small or medium figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an opponent that is more than 4 spaces away, add 1 automatic shield to your defense roll. Deathwalker 6000 cannot be targeted by ranged special attacks.
ability_3_desc: When attacking Mariedian figures, subtract 3 dice from Deathwalker 6000's initial attack roll.

name: Deathcharger 6000
ability_1_desc: Instead of its normal move, Deathcharger 6000 may use Rocket Leap 25. Rocket Leap 25 has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Rocket Leap 25, ignore elevations. Deathcharger 6000 may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. It may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Deathcharger 6000 is engaged when he starts his Rocket Leap, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack, roll 1 additional attack die for every two spaces moved this turn, not including increases in elevation, to a maximum of +3 for Accelerated Strike.

name: Deathstalker Infiltrator
ability_1_desc: As long as this Deathstalker Infiltrator has no wound markers on its Army Card, its species is Wolf instead of what is listed on its card.
ability_2_desc: If this Deathstalker Infiltrator is attacking an opponent's figure that is not adjacent to any figures that are friendly to it, you may add 2 dice to this Deathstalker Infiltrator's attack.
ability_3_desc: If this Deathstalker Infiltrator is unengaged prior to moving, it can move through all figures and will not take any leaving engagement attacks during this move.

name: STICKY WEB
ability_1_desc: All figures moving on or over this Sticky Web Glyph must immediately end its move. Affected figures cannot move, attack, or use special powers.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn, any figure on or adjacent to this Sticky Web Glyph may try to remove it from play. If any do, the player that controls that figure rolls the 20-sided die. If he or she rolls a 16 or higher, remove this glyph from play.

name: STICKY WEB
ability_1_desc: All figures moving on or over this Sticky Web Glyph must immediately end its move. Affected figures cannot move, attack, or use special powers.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn, any figure on or adjacent to this Sticky Web Glyph may try to remove it from play. If any do, the player that controls that figure rolls the 20-sided die. If he or she rolls a 14 or higher, remove this glyph from play.

name: Deathwalker 11000
ability_1_desc: When Deathwalker 11000 receives one or more wounds, ignore one wound he just received.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any figure within 5 clear line of sight spaces of Deathwalker 11000. Roll the 20-sided die. Subtract the chosen figure's Defense value from your die roll. If you roll a 9 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound and you may use this special power again. Deathwalker 11000 may choose the same figure or a different figure each time he uses this special power.

name: Demolisher G2
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When Demolisher G2 attacks with its Crushing Claw Special Attack, it may attack 2 additional times. Crushing Claw Special Attack can only be used to attack small or medium figures.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a destructible object with a normal attack, Demolisher G2 always adds 1 skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Deathreaver C.O.M. Unit
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Deathreaver C.O.M. Unit, instead of taking that turn with this C.O.M. Unit, you may take a turn with another Deathreaver Hero or Squad you control. Any figure that is taking a turn instead of this C.O.M. Unit must be within 6 clear sight spaces of this C.O.M. Unit before moving and receives an additional attack die for that turn.
ability_2_desc: This C.O.M. Unit can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, This C.O.M. Unit may double its Height.

name: Deyed Zec
ability_1_desc: If Deyed Zec did not move this turn, when making a normal attack, each skull rolled counts as an additional hit.

name: Derthkell Guardian
ability_1_desc: When attacking, this Derthkell Guardian may either attack all opponent's figures adjacent to him or attack the same figure twice. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: This Derthkell Guardian rolls one additional die when defending against a normal attack from a figure with an Attack Value of 3 or less.

name: Demonblade
ability_1_desc: For every figure Demonblade destroys, place a Bloody Blade Marker on this card. When Demonblade attacks, he must attack one additional time for each Bloody Blade Marker on this card, if possible. Demonblade cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn. A maximum of 4 Bloody Blade Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Glyph of Shifting Cloak
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, you may subtract any dice from your roll to move this figure that many spaces. After moving, add one shield to whatever is rolled and this figure takes any damage as normal. When moving with Shifting Dodge, this figure may move through all figures and objects and is never attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: Deepwater Warrior
ability_1_desc: While a Deepwater Warrior is on a water space, if it rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: If a Deepwater Warrior starts its turn on a water space, add 2 to its movement for that turn. A Deepwater Warrior does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Deepwater Warrior card, and before taking a turn with that Deepwater Warrior, you may first take a turn with one other Elemental Hero you control that follows Aquilla or Jandar.

name: Derthkell Guards
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Derthkell Guards, you may first take a turn with any Undead Hero you control who follows Valkrill.
ability_2_desc: When attacking, if your Derthkell Guard attacks the same figure that an Undead figure you control attacked since you last revealed a numbered order marker, add one attack die to that Derthkell Guard's attack.

name: DERELICT
ability_1_desc: Range 4 Attack Special. The Attack value of Activation Special Attack is equal to the combined Attack value of all figures adjacent to Derelict. After rolling for Activation Special Attack, destroy Derelict.
ability_2_desc: After an opponent rolls skulls for a normal attack against a friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Derelict, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 18 or higher, then that opponent must re-roll all skulls for that attack. Magic Shield 18 does not affect Derelict.

name: Det. Addison Carr
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each round, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, you may look at one of your opponent's Order Markers.
ability_2_desc: Det. Addison Carr can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When making a normal attack on a figure engaged with a Lawman you control, Det. Carr rolls 2 additional dice.

name: Deepwyrm Driders
ability_1_desc: Each time a Deepwyrm Drider attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: If a Deepwyrm Drider is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that Deepwyrm Drider is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If it is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.
ability_3_desc: Deepwyrm Driders are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: DELANDRIA
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, when Delandria is chosen as the target of a normal or special attack, before attack dice are rolled she may move one space. This space may be up to 4 levels higher. If Delandria can no longer be targeted, the attacker may choose a new target if possible.
ability_2_desc: Delandria is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When revealing a numbered Order Marker on this Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker on this card to activate Haste. On the turn you activate Haste, Delandria may either move an additional 6 spaces, or attack one additional time with a normal attack.

name: Dexter Morgan
ability_1_desc: If any figures were wounded last turn, instead of taking this turn normally with Dexter Morgan, you may take a turn with any Lawman hero or Lawmen squad you control. If a figure was destroyed last turn, Dexter Morgan and Lawmen figures you control will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc:
* Dexter Morgan can move through all figures.
* Dexter Morgan can add 3 to his Attack value when attacking Utgar figures.
* Dexter Morgan can't attack if he is adjacent to more than one figure.

name: DEFLECTATRON
ability_1_desc: Figures with Orbital Deployment do not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of a round, before placing Order Markers, you may place one Deflectatron that has not entered the battlefield on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of a friendly figure. You cannot use more than one Orbital Deployment each round.
ability_2_desc: A Deflectatron never makes leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Figures adjacent to one or more Deflectatrons never have clear sight to any figures. When a figure adjacent to one or more of your Deflectatrons defends against an attack from a non-adjacent figure, change one die result to a shield if possible. Magnetic Deflector Shield is negated while adjacent to another figure with Magnetic Deflector Shield.
