name: Deepwater Spawn
ability_1_desc: At the start of the first round of the game, before any order markers have been placed, each Deepwater Spawn you control may place a water tile on any land space within 6 spaces of that Deepwater Spawn if the water tile fits normally onto that space.
ability_2_desc: When a Deepwater Spawn is on a water space, it has no visible Hit Zone and adds 2 to its Defense. A Deepwater Spawn does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.
ability_3_desc: For the entire game, when you reveal an Order Marker on this Army Card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15-18, you may place a previously destroyed Deepwater Spawn you control on any unoccupied water space. If you roll a 19-20, you may place up to two previously destroyed Deepwater Spawn you control on any unoccupied water spaces. You may reveal Order Markers on this Army Card even if all Deepwater Spawn you control are destroyed.

name: Disgraced Knights of Weston
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Disgraced Knights of Weston, you may first take a turn with any Human Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: Disgraced Knights of Weston are never attacked when leaving engagements.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a Knight, Disgraced Knights of Weston subtract one attack die.

name: Det. Joan Sullivan
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, place an Undercover marker on this Army Card. While the Undercover marker is on this card, Det. Joan Sullivan does not take leaving engagement attacks and has no visible hit zone. Before attacking with Det. Sullivan, you must remove the Undercover marker from this card.
ability_2_desc: At the beginning of the round, if an opponent won initiative, before that opponent reveals an Order Marker you may immediately move Det. Sullivan up to 4 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Det. Joan Sullivan may not attack a figure that follows Jandar. If a player controls Det. Sullivan and a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill, destroy Det. Sullivan.

name: Derpy Hooves
ability_1_desc: Before moving Derpy, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Derpy and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 5 or lower, the chosen figure receives one wound. If you roll a 6 or higher, after you move Derpy, place the chosen figure adjacent to Derpy. That figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Derpy Hooves or any figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Derpy Hooves rolls the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap, that figure must subtract 3 from the die roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Derpy's movement, ignore elevations. Derpy may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Derpy starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Deepwyrm Drow
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Deepwyrm Drow, you can take a turn with any drow hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Each time a Deepwyrm Drow attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: If a Deepwyrm Drow is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that Deepwyrm Drow is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If he is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Destroyer
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 10. You may only use Disintegration Beam Special Attack when revealing the X Order Marker on this card at the end of the round and taking a turn with the Destroyer using this round's initiative order. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to two other figures adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Destroyer you must roll the 20-sided die. Add the number of the order marker you just revealed to the roll (if it was the X Order Marker, add 4). If you roll 20 or higher, choose an opponent. That opponent takes temporary control of the Destroyer for the rest of this turn.

name: Dhazh
ability_1_desc: Each time Dhazh destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Dhazh cannot Life Drain Destructible Objects.
ability_2_desc: If Dhazh destroys a Unique Hero, instead of removing 1 wound marker for Life Drain, you may remove x-number of wound markers from this Army Card, where x- is the total number of wound markers placed on the destroyed figure's Army Card. This ability cannot be used on Soulborgs or Undead.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Dhazh's movement, ignore elevations. Dhazh may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Dhazh starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dhazh
ability_1_desc: Each time Dhazh destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Dhazh cannot Life Drain Destructible Objects.
ability_2_desc: If Dhazh destroys a Unique Hero, instead of removing 1 wound marker for Life Drain, you may remove x-number of wound markers from this Army Card, where x- is the total number of wound markers placed on the destroyed figure's Army Card. This ability cannot be used on Soulborgs or Undead.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Dhazh's movement, ignore elevations. Dhazh may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Dhazh starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: DIRRTY GRRL
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose one of your opponent's small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of this Dirrty Grrl. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy that figure and this Dirrty Grrl.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Dirrty Grrl's movement, ignore elevations. A Dirrty Grrl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Dirrty Grrl starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Devourer Worm
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, select an opponent's small or medium figure adjacent to this Devourer Worm. Remove that figure from play and place it on this Devourer Worm's Army Card. Each time this Devourer Worm takes a turn thereafter, that figure receives 1 unblockable wound. If this Devourer Worm receives a wound, it must immediately return the devoured figure to play by placing it on any unoccupied adjacent space. If no such space is available, the devoured figure is not returned to play. A Devourer Worm may only have 1 devoured figure on its Army Card at a time.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally with this Devourer Worm, you may immediately place it on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of this Devourer Worm and is no higher than 1 level above this Devourer Worm's height or 3 levels below this Devourer Worm's base. If this Devourer Worm is engaged when it starts its Underground Movement, it will take any disengagement attacks.

name: Douglas the Pugilist
ability_1_desc: This figure cannot receive any Attack or Defense bonuses aside from the bonuses listed on this card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill this figure receives 3 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: If Douglas the Pugilist has 4 or more wounds add 2 to his defense.

name: Dorim Seastone
ability_1_desc: If Dorim Seastone attacks an opponent's figure during his turn, the Move Value of all your Army Cards is increased by 1 until the next time you reveal an Order Marker.
ability_2_desc: After rolling attack dice, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll one die that did not roll a skull.

name: Dire Wolf of Badru
ability_1_desc: When a figure you control uses Pounce Special Attack to attack a figure engaged with any Dire Wolf of Badru you control and does not destroy it, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-8, destroy the Pouncing figure. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the Pouncing figure on a same-level or lower space adjacent to the target of the Pounce. Destroy the Pouncing figure if no such spaces are available. If the target of the Pounce is a Unique hero, subtract 5 from your die roll.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Dire Wolf of Badru may double its height.

name: Dragonslayer
ability_1_desc: When this Dragonslayer occupies a space adjacent to a dragon, add 2 to his attack and defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When this Dragonslayer rolls defense dice against a special attack from a dragon, if he rolls at least 1 shield, the most wounds he can sustain is 1.
ability_3_desc: When a Dragon attacks this Dragonslayer and rolls the 20-sided die, subtract 2 from the number rolled.

name: Doom Blade Cyclops
ability_1_desc: If there are 3 or more wound markers on this card, Doom Blade Cyclops rolls 1 additional attack die and can attack one additional time each turn. If there are 6 or more wound markers on this card, Doom Blade Cyclops rolls 2 additional attack dice and can attack up to two additional times each turn.
ability_2_desc: When Doom Blade Cyclops rolls defense dice, he always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Doom Blade Cyclops can move through all small and medium figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with small and medium figures. Doom Blade Cyclops never rolls for Falling or Major Falling damage. Place a wound on this card instead if a special power would 'destroy' Doom Blade Cyclops.

name: Draygar Razorscale
ability_1_desc: Whenever Draygar destroys a Goblin, he may attack again.
ability_2_desc: When Draygar is engaged with only one figure, he rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against that figure.
ability_3_desc: Draygar rolls one additional die against each figure leaving an engagement with him.

name: Doctor Doom
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Doctor Doom, you may choose any Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Doctor Doom. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take temporary control of that hero and immediately take a turn with the chosen Hero. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to the player who controlled it before the Mind Exchange. All Order Markers that were on the chosen Hero's card will stay on the card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Doom's movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Doom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Doctor Doom starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Dirty Bubble
ability_1_desc: While moving the Dirty Bubble you may attempt end your movement on a space occupied by a small or medium figure. Roll the 20-sided die, if you roll 1-12 the Dirty Bubble is destroyed. If you roll 13 or higher, place the figure from the chosen space on the Dirty Bubble's army card. That figure can no longer move or attack until the Dirty Bubble is destroyed. If the Dirty Bubble is destroyed, immediately place the captured figure on the space that the Dirty Bubble occupied. The Dirty Bubble cannot have more than one captured figure on his card at a time.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each of your turns after the Dirty Bubble has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, immediately place the Dirty Bubble on a space adjacent to any figure you control.

name: Castor
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack or defense dice against dragon figures, Castor always rolls one automatic skull or shield.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking a large or huge figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher, then the defending figure may not roll more than 1 defense die.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Castor's Army Card, before taking a turn with Castor, you may take a turn with any other Dragonslayer Hero you control.

name: Doctor Octopus
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Doctor Octopus, and its base is no more than 3 levels above his height or 3 levels below his base, Doctor Octopus may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: When Doctor Octopus attacks, he may attack three additional times.
ability_3_desc: If an adjacent figure attacks Doctor Octopus with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, no dice are rolled for this attack and that figure's turn ends.
ability_4_desc: Doctor Octopus may ignore all effects from terrain tiles he moves onto or occupies. At any point before, during, or after his movement, he may move one additional space. This space may be up to 30 levels higher or lower.

name: Doctor Doom
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Doctor Doom, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Doctor Doom and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take temporary control of that figure and that figure's Army Card and immediately take a turn with the chosen Army Card. Any figure taking a turn with Mind Exchange must be within clear sight of Doctor Doom before moving. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Army Card returns to the player who controlled the Army Card before the Mind Exchange. All Order Markers that were on the chosen army card will stay on the card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Doom's movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Doom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Doctor Doom starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dralor
ability_1_desc: If Dralor is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to Dralor's attack.
ability_2_desc: If Dralor begins his turn unengaged, then add 2 to his move number.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Dralor, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, while he remains on that space, Dralor has no visible Hit Zone until the next time you reveal an Order Marker.

name: Doombot
ability_1_desc: If you control Doctor Doom when he is destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die for this Doombot. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove all wound markers from Doctor Doom's Army Card, destroy this Doombot and place Doctor Doom on the space this Doombot occupied. Place all wound markers that were on this Doombot's card onto Doctor Doom's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Any time Doctor Doom chooses this Doombot with his Mind Exchange special power, add 1 to the die roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Doombot's movement, ignore elevations. This Doombot may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Doombot starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Doctor Light
ability_1_desc: When Doctor Light is targeted for a normal or special attack by a non-adjacent opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, Doctor Light no longer has any visible hit zone for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: Doctor Light starts each game with up to 2 shadow tiles on his Army Card. If Doctor Light ends his turn on an empty land space, you may place a shadow tile from his Army Card onto the space he occupies if the shadow tile fits normally onto that space.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Light's movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Light may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Doctor Light starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dr. Dieulafoy
ability_1_desc: An opponent's figure that is adjacent to Dr. Dieulafoy does not receive the normal defense bonus from being on a shadow space.
ability_2_desc: At any point before or during her move, if Dr. Dieulafoy is unengaged and could end her move on a Glyph that is symbol side up, you may look at the power side of that Glyph. You may use Lore of the Wellsprings once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap with Dr. Dieulafoy, you may add 4 to your die roll.

name: DOOMBOT
ability_1_desc: If you control Dr. Doom when he is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die for this Doombot. If you roll 6 or higher, remove all markers from Dr. Doom's Army Card, destroy this Doombot and place Dr. Doom on the space this Doombot occupied. Place all markers that were on this Doombot's card onto Dr. Doom's card.
ability_2_desc: Any time Dr. Doom chooses this Doombot with his Mind Exchange special power, add 3 to the die roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Doombot's move, ignore elevations. This Doombot may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. If this Doombot is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: DOOMSDAY
ability_1_desc: When Doomsday rolls defense dice, he receives one extra die for each wound marker he has, up to a maximum of 3 extra dice for Adaptive Defense.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, you may remove up to 2 wound markers from this card.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Doomsday may Super Leap with a move of 10. When counting spaces for Super Leap, ignore elevations. Doomsday may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged and leap over obstacles. He may leap 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If he is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Roll 3 fewer attack dice on any turn that he leaps.

name: Drider
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this army card, you may first take a turn with any Arachnid or Drow hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When this Drider is standing on a dungeon or shadow space, add one die to its attack and defense.

name: Dr. Gudruna Vogt
ability_1_desc: Immediately after revealing an Order Marker on an Army Card you control, you may reveal an 'X' Order Marker on this card and either: •View any unrevealed Order Marker belonging to an opponent; or •Look at the power side of any Glyph that is symbol side up.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, after any combat dice or the 20-sided die is rolled for Dr. Gudruna Vogt or any figure within clear sight of her you may immediately add or subtract a skull, shield, blank, Valkyrie General Symbol or 1 from that roll.
ability_3_desc: An opponent may never take temporary or permanent control of Dr. Gudruna Vogt.

name: Dori
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Dori, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–10, it may attack normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, instead of attacking normally, it must attack each figure adjacent to it, if possible. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: If Nori or Ori receives one or more wounds and is within 4 clear sight spaces of Dori, you may move Dori up to 6 spaces. Dori must be able to move adjacent to Nori or Ori in order to use Watchful Brother. If Dori ends his Watchful Brother movement adjacent to Nori or Ori, ignore any wound Nori or Ori would have received.

name: Dratini
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 1. When this Dratini attacks with Dragon Rage Special Attack, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When a Dratini rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Dratini, you may roll the 20-sided die for any Status Effect Marker on it. If you roll a 10 or higher, remove the Status Effect Marker.
ability_4_desc: This Dratini does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Doctor Strange
ability_1_desc: Before moving, choose up to 2 friendly Heroes within 4 spaces of Doctor Strange. Roll the 20-sided die once for each chosen Hero. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may remove up to 2 wound markers from that Hero's Army Card. Book of the Vishanti may affect Doctor Strange.
ability_2_desc: Doctor Strange does not require a clear line of sight when attacking.
ability_3_desc: Doctor Strange rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against Demons, Mystics, and Wizards.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Strange's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Drow Militia
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, you may select one squad of Deepworm Drow that you control and add them to the Drow Militia. The Drow Militia now has also has a Tricky personality in addition to a Wild personality.
ability_2_desc: Drow Militia are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Dreadgul Skirmishers
ability_1_desc: When attacking with the Dreadgul Skirmishers, if the defending figure was not adjacent at the start of this turn, the Skirmishers receive 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with the Dreadgul Skirmishers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with the Dreadgul Skirmishers.
ability_3_desc: Dreadgul Skirmishers are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Dxundark Prowler
ability_1_desc: If there is exactly one Order Marker on this army card, add 2 to this Dxundark Prowler's Move and when this Dxundark Prowler attacks, it may attack one additional time.

name: Doctor Strange
ability_1_desc: After placing Order Markers but before rolling for initiative, if there is an Order Marker on this card, you may choose up to three small or medium figures, in play and controlled by the same player, to rearrange. Rearrange the chosen figures by removing each figure from the space it currently occupies and placing it on a space previously occupied by one of the other chosen figures. If the chosen figures are engaged when being moved by Eye of Agamotto, they will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Doctor Strange rolls for defense against any attack, 1 shield blocks all wounds.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Strange's movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Strange may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Doctor Strange starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shadow's Gravebringers
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2+Special. Up to three unengaged Shadow's Gravebringers on the same level may combine their attacks and use this attack. All figures adjacent to the targetted figure are affected. All Shadow's Gravebringers in the Blackened Fires attack must have a clear line of sight on the originally targetted figure.
ability_2_desc: When attacked by a large or huge figure, a Shadow's Gravebringer on a shadow space may add 6 to its defense.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Shadow's Gravebringer's movement, ignore elevations. Shadow's Gravebringers may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Shadow's Gravebringer starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Drone Master
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, you may take a turn with any Marro Drone Squad you control before taking a turn with this Drone Master. During that turn with the Marro Drones, you may add 3 to your die roll when you roll for the Hive Swarm power. If you do add 3 to your die roll, after taking that turn with the Marro Drones, you can not take a turn with this Drone Master.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with this Drone Master, roll the 20-sided die. Add the number of skulls this Drone Master rolled in that attack to your die roll. If you roll an 17 or higher, you may attack again with this Drone Master.

name: Drax
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose an opponent's Unique Hero. Before moving, if Drax is not engaged with the chosen Hero he may use Obsessed Charge to add 3 to his Move, but must end this movement engaged with the chosen Hero and must attack with Blind Rage Special Attack this turn. While charging, Drax can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Before attacking, Drax must roll one leaving engagement attack against each figure he moved through while charging.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Drax rolls at least 3 skulls with his Blind Rage Special Attack, Drax may attack again with his Blind Rage Special Attack. Drax may continue attacking with his Blind Rage Special Attack until he rolls fewer than 3 skulls.

name: Darkstalker Duergars
ability_1_desc: Darkstalker Duergars cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: If a Darkstalker Duegars is on a shadow space, opponent's figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Éowyn
ability_1_desc: Éowyn rolls 2 additional dice when attacking a figure with the Terrifying Personality.
ability_2_desc: Éowyn rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against Large or Huge figures.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Éowyn rolls at least one shield, the most wounds she can take for this attack is one.

name: Drow Assassins
ability_1_desc: A Drow Assassin adds 1 attack die and 1 defense die when standing on a shadow space.
ability_2_desc: If a Drow Assassin is attacked with a normal attack, and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If the Drow Assassin is standing on a shadow space, add 3 to your roll. Add another 1 to your roll for any shadow spaces to which the Drow Assassin is adjacent. If you roll a 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, the Drow Assassin takes no damage and may move up to 3 spaces. Drow Assassins can only escape if they do not end their escape move adjacent to any enemy figures.

name: Easterling Commander
ability_1_desc: When attacking with any Soldiers you control adjacent to Easterling Commander, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Battle Cry can be used only once for each attack roll. Battle Cry does not affect Easterling Commander.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, Easterling Commander adds 1 to its defense dice.

name: Elite Snowtrooper
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if another unit in this squad attacks the same target, add one attack die to the 2nd unit's attack.

name: Easy Company
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Easy Company, you may first take a turn with any Soldier Hero you control. If you do not take a turn with any Soldier Hero you control, add 2 to Easy Company's move number.
ability_2_desc: When you roll for initiative, you must subtract 2 from the result.

name: El Hijo De Tres Manos
ability_1_desc: El Hijo de Tres Manos rolls one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with him.
ability_2_desc: When El Hijo De Tres Manos attacks, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Elite Stormtrooper
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if another unit in this squad attacks the same target, add one attack die to the 2nd unit's attack.

name: DT1173X
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with DT1173X, you may choose any other Corsair you control and place it on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of DT1173X. If the chosen figure is engaged, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of DT1173X. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty space within 10 clear sight spaces of DT1173X that is on the same level as the chosen figure. If the chosen figure is engaged, it does not take any leaving engagement attacks. Teleport Target 12 does not affect destructible objects.

name: Dread Locust Dragoon
ability_1_desc: When a Dread Locust Dragoon you control is targeted for a normal attack from an adjacent opponent's figure, that Dragoon may use Mortal Shed. For the rest of that turn, whenever an adjacent figure attacks that Dragoon with a normal attack, that figure rolls 1 fewer die and all excess shields rolled by that Dragoon count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. At the end of the turn, destroy all Dread Locust Dragoons that used Mortal Shed.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Dread Locust Dragoon's movement, ignore elevations. A Dread Locust Dragoon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Dread Locust Dragoon starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Grimlock
ability_1_desc: Before moving Grimlock, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Grimlock. After you move Grimlock, place the chosen figure adjacent to Grimlock.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack 3. Grimlock may target any or all figures adjacent to his tail. Roll Attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately.

name: Efrafan Soldiers
ability_1_desc: If you don't control a warlord or champion in play, Efrafan Soldiers move 2 fewer spaces and may not use Organized Assault.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Efrafan Soldiers, you may reroll any attack die, up to a number of times equal to the number of Efrafan Soldiers you control that have previously attacked the same figure during this turn.

name: Elder
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Elder, you may take a turn with another Yautja that you control. The Yautja that is taking a turn instead of Elder must be within clear sight of Elder.
ability_2_desc: Before rolling defense dice against a normal attack, roll a D20. If you roll an 8 or higher, Elder is not affected by that attack.

name: Easterling Warriors
ability_1_desc: You may attack with any 4 Easterling Warriors, even Warriors you did not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: When defending with an Easterling Warrior, add 1 defense die for each other adjacent Easterling Warrior up to a maximum of +2 dice for the Shield Wall power.
ability_3_desc: Easterling Warriors roll one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with them. Opponent's figures roll one additional die when an Easterling Warrior you control leaves engagement with them.

name: Elanna Starbreeze
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game select one animal companion figure to be Elanna Starbreeze's companion. Place Elanna Starbreeze's companion marker on that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After revealing on order marker on Elanna Starbreeze's Army Card, you may first take a turn with her animal companion.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with Elanna Starbreeze, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Drusilla
ability_1_desc: Each time Drusilla destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Drusilla cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: At the beginning of every round, after rolling for initiative, you may choose an opponent's Order Marker. That opponent must show that Order Marker to you. If it is a "1," that opponent must remove it, and cannot place it on any Army Card until the following round.
ability_3_desc: If Drusilla is destroyed, you must place her on an Army Card you control with the Life Drain special power, if possible. If you have more than one such card, you must choose the one with the highest point value. Reduce the Attack and Defense numbers on that card by 1.

name: Ebony Midnight
ability_1_desc: After a figure inflicts one or more wounds on Ebony Midnight with a normal or special attack, the player who controls that figure must immediately roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 13 or lower the attacking figure subtracts two from its defense dice for the rest of the round.
ability_2_desc: Ebony Midnight is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ebony Midnight may triple her height.

name: Drow Assassin
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on and taking a turn with a Common Drow Army Card, you may reveal the "X" Order Marker on this card to take a turn with a Drow Assassin you control that has not moved or attacked since the last numbered Order Marker has been revealed. During this turn, add 1 to the Attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, before or after moving a Drow Assassin normally, you may choose a friendly Drow figure within 4 spaces whose base is no more than 9 levels higher or lower than the base of that Drow Assassin. Switch that Drow Assassin with the chosen figure. Figures moved by Shadow Shift never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: If a Drow Assassin is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that Drow Assassin is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If it is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would have been inflicted by the attack.

name: Emerald Scorpion Snipers
ability_1_desc: If an unengaged Emerald Scorpion Sniper did not move this turn, he may add 5 to his Range and 2 to his Attack when attacking a figure in a straight line from that Sniper or any other unengaged Emerald Scorpion Sniper you control that did not move this turn.

name: Elite Onyx Vipers
ability_1_desc: Elite Onyx Vipers do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn the Elite Onyx Vipers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with the Elite Onyx Vipers.
ability_3_desc: When a Elite Onyx Viper rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 6 defense dice to the defense roll.

name: Electro
ability_1_desc: Robots and soulborgs roll 3 less defense dice when rolling defense against Electro.
ability_2_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Chain Electricity Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Chain Electricity Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: If Electro is on a water space he rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: ORC LEGIONNAIRE
ability_1_desc: All adjacent friendly Orc Soldiers roll an additional attack and defense die.

name: Emma Frost (Diamond)
ability_1_desc: Your army can only include Emma Frost (Diamond) if it also includes Emma Frost. Emma Frost (Diamond) never starts the game on the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Emma Frost (Diamond) rolls at least one shield, the most wounds she may take for this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.

name: Dynomutt
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Army Card of a Crime Fighter or Vigilante Unique Hero you control and taking a turn with that Hero, if Dynomutt is within 4 clear sight spaces of that Hero, you may take an immediate turn with Dynomutt, and you may not take any additional turns with other figures you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving with a Crime Fighter or Vigilante Unique Hero you control, if Dynomutt is within 4 clear sight spaces of that Hero, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-4, that Hero may not attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Dynomutt's movement, ignore elevations. Dynomutt may move over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and move over obstacles such as ruins. Dynomutt may not move more than 12 levels up or 12 levels down in a single move.

name: DOOMBOT
ability_1_desc: If you control Doctor Doom, and he is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 6 or higher, remove all but one wound marker from Doctor Doom's Army Card, destroy one Doombot you control, and place Doctor Doom on the space previously occupied by that destroyed Doombot. You may use this power once for all Decoy Doombots powers each time Doctor Doom is destroyed.

name: Etacron
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Etacron, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Etacron, Etacron may move up to an additional 3 spaces.

name: Equiceph Bonechargers
ability_1_desc: If an Equiceph Bonecharger begins the turn unengaged, add 2 to its attack dice.
ability_2_desc: This figure rolls 1 additional defense die against normal attacks from non-adjacent figures.

name: ORC CENTURION
ability_1_desc: After a friendly Orc within 3 clear sight spaces of this Orc Centurion attacks a figure, you may immediately move this Orc Centurion adjacent to that figure and attack it with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Orc Centurion is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Elsana
ability_1_desc: When determining height advantage against a non-adjacent figure, if Elsana is adjacent to at least one Evergreen Tree or Jungle Tree, her base is considered to be on the same level as the height of the tallest Evergreen Tree or Jungle Tree she is adjacent to.
ability_2_desc: Elsana starts each game with 1 Glyph of Proftaka on her Army Card. Instead of attacking with Elsana, you may choose a space with 8 spaces of Elsana. You may choose a space occupied by a figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, place the Glyph of Proftaka on the chosen space power-side-up. At the end of each round, you must place that Glyph of Proftaka back on this Army Card.

name: EMMET
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's LEGO figure targets any figure you control with a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that opponent's turn immediately ends and that opponent must sing "Everything Is Awesome!"
ability_2_desc: Emmet starts each game with 4 single space tiles of your choice on his card. When Emmet takes a turn, before or after movement you may place one or more tiles from Emmet's card on any empty land space(s) within 6 spaces of Emmet, if possible.

name: BROHG
ability_1_desc: At the start of each turn, add 1 to the move, attack, and defense number of Brohg and each friendly Hero adjacent to Brohg. If the turn is the turn of a friendly Hero adjacent to Brohg, or is Brohg, also remove 1 wound marker from that Hero's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: All opponent's figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Brohg roll one less attack die and one less defense die.

name: ELTRUT
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, you may choose one small or medium figure. Roll the 20 sided die. If the figure is a squad figure and you roll 12 or higher, destroy the chosen figure. If the figure is a hero and you roll a 20 or higher, destroy it. If you destroy a figure in this way remove two wound markers from Eltrut. If Eltrut is in at least one water space, add 4 to your roll.
ability_2_desc: After moving, if Eltrut is in a water tile, you may move him to any water tile within 10 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Before moving or transmuting Eltrut, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Eltrut. After you move Eltrut, place the chosen figure adjacent to Eltrut. Eltrut may only carry undead figures.

name: Eltris
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose one Unique large or huge Dragon Hero that you control to be Eltris' Companion. After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, instead of taking that turn with Eltris, you may take a turn with her Companion if it is adjacent to her. After taking a turn with her Companion through Dragon Rider, place Eltris an any empty space adjacent to it. If Eltris is engaged before being moved by Dragon Rider, she will not receive any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: While Eltris and her Companion are within 3 clear sight spaces of each other, they roll an additional die when attacking or defending. If Eltris' Companion begins its turn adjacent to her, it may move one additional space.

name: Elemental Sorceress
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3 + Special. Choose one effect below. • Earthen Grasp: Choose up to two figures on land spaces. • Hel's Embrace: If the figure is on a snow or ice tile or adjacent to a glacier and it receives at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. On a 16 or higher, remove 1 unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's army card. • Hot Lava Death: If the figure is on a lava field space or on or adjacent to a molten lava space, add 2 dice. Figures with the Lava Resistance special power are not affected by Hot Lava Death. • Stony Fist: If the figure is on a rock space or adjacent to a rock outcrop, add 1 die. • Watery Doom: If the figure is on or adjacent to a water space it rolls 1 less defense die. Figure's with the Water Mastery special power are not affected by Watery Doom.
ability_2_desc: This Elemental Sorceress may ignore all terrain effects and the special powers of elementals.

name: Equiceph Bonechargers
ability_1_desc: If an Equiceph Bonecharger begins the turn unengaged, add 2 to its attack dice.
ability_2_desc: This figure rolls 1 additional defense die against normal attacks from non-adjacent figures.

name: ÉOWYN
ability_1_desc: Éowyn rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against Heroes.
ability_2_desc: Any time Éowyn, or a friendly figure within 2 spaces of her, receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack you may place the Fallen Marker on this Army Card. After taking a turn with Éowyn, you may remove the Fallen Marker from this card to take another turn with her.

name: EMIRROON
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add the number of Elves you control adjacent to Emirroon to your die roll. If you roll 1-4, nothing happens. If you roll 5-11, you may place 1 Elf you control adjacent to Emirroon. If you roll 12-17, you may place 2 Elves you control adjacent to Emirroon. If you roll 18-20, you may place up to 3 Elves you control adjacent to Emirroon. If the summoned Elves are engaged, they will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Emirroon cannot summon an Elf that he is already adjacent to.
ability_2_desc: When Emirroon rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Epilzo the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Epilzo the Kyrie Warrior do not require a clear line of sight when targeting an opponent's figure for an attack or special power.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Epilzo's movement, ignore elevations. Epilzo may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Epilzo starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Empress Kiova
ability_1_desc: When Empress Kiova attacks, she may attack two additional times.
ability_2_desc: When you roll defense dice for any Kyrie that you control who follows Einar and is within 5 clear sight spaces of Empress Kiova, you may re-roll all defense dice that did not show shields. Gift of the Empress Aura can be used only once for each defense roll. Empress Kiova's Gift of the Empress Aura does not affect Empress Kiova.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Empress Kiova's movement, ignore elevations. Empress Kiova may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Empress Kiova starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: METHIS
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a friendly Hero adjacent to Methis and place any Treasure Glyphs from this card onto that Hero's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When you add Methis to your Army, choose up to 5 different Treasure Glyphs. You control those Glyphs but none start on the battlefield. Instead of taking a turn with Methis you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, place one of those Treasure Glyphs on this card.

name: Etacron
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Etacron, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Etacron's movement, ignore elevations. Etacron may fly over water with out stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Etacron starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Etacron, Etacron may move up to an additional 3 spaces.

name: Rastaf Skycaster
ability_1_desc: After moving Rastaf, move up to 4 opponent's unengaged figures up to 4 spaces each. Each figure moved this way must have had clear sight with Rastaf at any point during the move and must move towards Rastaf, ending its movement adjacent to him if possible. If any figure moved with Quad Pull is attacked for leaving an engagement, it may immediately end its movement.

name: Envy
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may draft another Envy figure in your army. Only one Envy may be on the battlefield at a time. At the start of each round, you may switch an Envy figure you control with another Envy figure you control. When you place a wound marker on an Envy figure you control, place a wound marker on all other Envy figures you control. When you remove a Philosopher's Stone marker from a Envy figure you control, remove a Philosopher's Stone marker from all other Envy figures you control.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Envy, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Envy's height or 3 levels below Envy's base, Envy may add 1 to its Range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: Start the game with 6 markers on this card. When Envy would receive one or more wounds, you may remove a marker to ignore all those wounds. If Envy would be destroyed by a power that does not inflict wounds, you may remove three markers and that figure is safe.

name: RAMMU
ability_1_desc: Rammu may attack adjacent figures an additional time.
ability_2_desc: After Rammu attacks an opponent's nonadjacent figure or immediately when an opponent's figure moves within 5 clear spaces of Rammu, you may end that figure's movement. If you do, then you must move that figure an additional 4 spaces towards Rammu, ending its movement adjacent to Rammu, if possible. If a figure moved with Tag Pull is attacked for leaving an engagement, it may immediately end its movement.

name: Envy
ability_1_desc: If Envy has not attacked anyone this round, it may not be targeted for any attacks, leaving engagement attacks, or special powers.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Envy, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Envy's height or 3 levels below Envy's base, Envy may add 1 to its Range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: Start the game with 6 markers on this card. When Envy would receive one or more wounds, you may remove a marker to ignore all those wounds. If Envy would be destroyed by a power that does not inflict wounds, you may remove three markers and that figure is safe.

name: Enchantress
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any unique figure adjacent to Enchantress. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 18 or higher, take control of the chosen figure and that figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card. If Enchantress is destroyed, you retain control of any previously Mind Shackled Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: After rolling the 20-sided die for an Army Card you control, you may reveal one or more X Order Markers on this card. Add or subtract 1 from your die roll for each X Order Marker you reveal.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, Enchantress always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Executioner 616
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Executioner 616, each skull rolled counts as one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose Executioner 616 or another Soulborg you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Executioner 616. Roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to your die roll if the chosen figure is medium, 7 to your die roll if the chosen figure is large, and 10 to your die roll if the chosen figure is huge. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. If you roll 13-19, all figures adjacent to the chosen figure receive one wound. If you roll a 20 or higher, all figures adjacent to the chosen figure receive 3 wounds. After using Remote Detonation, destroy the chosen figure.

name: Emma Frost
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Emma Frost, you may place the Diamond Marker on this card or remove it. While the Diamond Marker is on this card, add 2 to Emma Frost's Attack and Defense and she cannot use any other powers.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, choose a figure within 6 clear sight spaces and roll the e d20. If you roll 19 or higher, that opponent removes a non-numbered unrevealed Order Marker or the lowest numbered unrevealed Order Marker from that figure's card. Add 1 to your roll for each other Unique Telepath Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: Add 1 whenever you roll the d20 for a power of any other Telepath you control.
ability_4_desc: Range Special. Attack 5. Attack a figure within 5 spaces of any Telepath you control. No clear sight is needed.

name: EXECUTIONER 616
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Executioner 616, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, choose Executioner 616 or a Soulborg you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Executioner 616. Roll the 20 sided die, adding 3 to your roll if the chosen figure is medium, 7 to your roll if the chosen figure is large, and 10 to your roll if the chosen figure is huge. On a roll of 13-19, all figures adjacent to the chosen figure receive one wound. On a roll of 20 or higher, all figures adjacent to the chosen figure receive 3 wounds. After using Remote Detonation, destroy the chosen figure.

name: Taxl Bodil
ability_1_desc: Whenever an opponent's figure moves within 4 clear sight spaces of Taxl, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure's turn immediately ends.
ability_2_desc: After moving, choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Taxl. Remove one wound marker from that figure's Army Card and put it on this card.
ability_3_desc: Each time Taxl Bodil destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Taxl Bodil cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_4_desc: Range 5. Damage Special. Roll 3 attack dice 3 times. Affected figures roll defense dice each time.

name: ELVEN ROPE
ability_1_desc: This figure and all friendly Small and Medium figures within 1 space of this figure may triple their height when moving down levels of terrain, and every two levels moved down only count as one space.

name: Fahim
ability_1_desc: After moving, if Fahim is unengaged, you may choose an opponent's figure within 8 clear sight spaces of Fahim and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, you may choose an order marker on that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure) and force your opponent to reveal that order marker until the end of your turn.
ability_2_desc: Fahim may attack before moving instead of after moving.

name: Ezmara
ability_1_desc: After Ezmara defends against an enemy Character's normal attack, she may move up to X spaces. X equals the number of excess blocks in her defense roll.
ability_2_desc: Ezmara has Phantom Walk. After Ezmara moves, she may choose a figure she moved through during that move. Roll the D-20. On a 12+, the chosen figure receives 1 Wound.
ability_3_desc: When Ezmara defends against a ranged attack, add 2 to her Defense.

name: Felshot
ability_1_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, add 1 attack die for every Demon you control who follows Valkrill that is adjacent to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: After attacking an opponent's Unique Hero with this Felshot's normal attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound inflicted in that attack. For each additional skull rolled, place 1 additional wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card.

name: Fallen Champions
ability_1_desc: All friendly Undead Squad figures adjacent to a Fallen Champion receive an additional attack die and an additional defense die.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, you may place a previously destroyed Fallen Champion on a space adjacent to a Fallen Champion you control.
ability_3_desc: A Fallen Champion rolls one less defense die when defending against a Valiant figure. The Fallen Champions cannot be drafted into an army that contains one or more Valiant figures, and Valiant figures cannot be drafted into an army that contains the Fallen Champions.

name: FATE
ability_1_desc: When FATE is targeted by an opposing figure after all dice are rolled, you may force your opponent to reroll any one die of your choosing. Ignore the previous result and keep the new result. Use this power only once each time FATE is targeted by an opposing figure.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain FATE may triple its height.

name: FILI
ability_1_desc: When Fili attacks, he may attack one additional time. Fili cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: If you control Kili, add 1 to Fili's attack and defense. If Kili or Thorin is destroyed, Fili immediately receives a wound.

name: Exiles of the Sundered Sea
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 black Powder Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking, you may remove a Powder Marker from this card to add 4 to the Exiles of the Sundered Sea's Range Value for the reset of the turn. You may only use this Special Power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: If an Exile of the Sundered Sea you control is attacked by an opponent's figure that is not adjacent and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 13 or higher, that Exile takes no damage and may immediately move up to 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Exiles of the Sundered Sea are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Feylund Vanguard
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Feylund Vanguard is adjacent to any friendly Elf Hero, add 1 to the Defense value of that Hero and that Vanguard when defending against adjacent attacks. Figures cannot receive more than 1 extra Defense die from Frontline Defense.
ability_2_desc: Feylund Vanguard Soldiers roll an additional attack die when attacking figures engaged with at least one other Vanguard you control.

name: Ezmara
ability_1_desc: After Ezmara rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move Ezmara up to X spaces. X equals the number of excess shields rolled.
ability_2_desc: Ezmara can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. After moving with Ezmara, you may choose one figure she moved through during that move. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: When Ezmara rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 to her defense dice.

name: Fire Tribe Apaches
ability_1_desc: If Order Marker 1 is on Fire Tribe Apaches' Army Card, they add 1 to their Move and Attack value that turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure with a normal attack, a Fire Tribe Apache Tribesman rolls an additional die.

name: Falcon
ability_1_desc: If Falcon is adjacent to an opponent's figure, other heroes you control may add 1 to their attack when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on this card, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Falcon's movement, ignore elevations. Falcon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Falcon starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Exiles of the Sundered Sea
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 black Powder Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking, you may remove a Powder Marker from this card to add 4 to the Exiles of the Sundered Sea's Range Value for the rest of this turn. You may only use this special power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: If an Exile of the Sundered Sea is attacked by an opponent's figure that is not adjacent and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll 13 or higher, that Exile takes no damage and may immediately move up to 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Exiles of the Sundered Sea are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Lucy Volthrax
ability_1_desc: All Humans, Mariedians, and Kyrie within 3 clear sight spaces of First Mate Lucy roll 1 less die when attacking her with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Pirates who start their turn adjacent to First Mate Lucy move 1 additional space.

name: Father Maleck
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one unrevealed order marker on this Army Card, all Order of Dagon figures you control roll an additional defense die.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any Unique Hero Army Card you control. For this game the chosen card's class is Disciple and personality is Devout, regardless of what is listed on the card. Convert can not be used on Undead, Constructs, or Soulborg.

name: Feymire Crocodile
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to this Feymire Crocodile. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.
ability_2_desc: While a Feymire Crocodile is on a water space, add 2 to its Defense. If a Feymire Crocodile starts its turn on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. A Feymire Crocodile does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: FALCOR
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if one or more of the Talon Archers are within 6 spaces of an opponent's figure, and have a clear line of sight on that figure's hit zone, then if Falcor is within range he may attack that figure.
ability_2_desc: When Falcor attacks a figure whose base is higher than his, add 1 attack die.
ability_3_desc: If Falcor is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to Falcor's attack.

name: Eyrian Scout
ability_1_desc: When this Eyrian Scout is on a shadow space, or is adjacent to a rock outcrop, wall, ruin, tree, bush, or destructible object, it has no visible hit zones, and rolls 3 additional defense dice against a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: An Eyrian Scout is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose an opponent's figure that this Eyrian Scout was adjacent to at any point during its move, and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may move an unrevealed order marker from that figure's Army Card to the Army Card of another figure that opponent controls within clear sight of this Eyrian Scout.

name: Fire Tribe Scouts
ability_1_desc: If none of the Fire Tribe Scouts move this turn, add 3 to their Range value.
ability_2_desc: A Fire Tribe Scout rolls one additional defense die when standing on a Shadow Space or adjacent to a Jungle Brush or Tree.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Tribesmen who start their turn adjacent to a Fire Tribe Scout may move 1 additional space.

name: Fire
ability_1_desc: When Fire rolls defense dice, 1 shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Fire's movement, ignore elevations. Fire may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Fire starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Fire never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage.

name: Ferron
ability_1_desc: Range 4 Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. If Burning Sparks Special Attack inflicts one or more wounds on the chosen figure, then select two figures 1 or 2 spaces further away from Ferron than the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice against those figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Ferron's movement, ignore elevations. Ferron may fly over water spaces without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ferron starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagements attacks.

name: Flesh Golem
ability_1_desc: If there are fewer than 5 wound markers on this Flesh Golem's Army Card, then when this Flesh Golem defends against a normal attack, always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled. If there are 5 or more wound markers on this Flesh Golem's Army Card, then when this Flesh Golem defends against a special attack, always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: This Flesh Golem can never have special markers such as Negation placed on his card. This Flesh Golem's Move, Attack, and Defense values can never be reduced by special powers on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: Flash
ability_1_desc: Flash may move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Flash is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Flash does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Flash may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Flash attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement.

name: Fia Bonny the Void Siren
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 black Powder Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking, you may remove a Powder Marker from this card to add 4 to Fia Bonny the Void Siren's Range Value for the rest of the turn. You may only use this Special Power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: The first time each turn that Fia Bonny is targeted by a Squad figure with a normal or special attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, Fia Bonny cannot be targeted by that attack or any other attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: Fia Bonny is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: X.R.O.N.
ability_1_desc: If X.R.O.N. attacks a figure that is not adjacent to any other figures, the targeted figure rolls 2 less defense dice.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small, medium, or large figure moves adjacent to X.R.O.N., roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 12 - 19, that figure receives a wound. If you roll 20 or higher, destroy that figure. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with X.R.O.N.

name: Fire Titan
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose 8 spaces in a straight line from Fire Titan. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Fire Titan's Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice seperately.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Fire Titan. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure recieves 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant Special Power are not affected by Searing Intensity.
ability_3_desc: Fire Titan never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: FERIS
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Feris, you may place any Treasure Glyph on any Corsair Army Card you control on this Army Card, or place any Treasure Glyph on this Army Card on any Unique Corsair Army Card you control.
ability_2_desc: After Feris ends her normal movement, you may choose an adjacent Unique Hero with at least one Treasure Glyph on its Army Card. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you may take one Treasure Glyph from the chosen Hero's Army Card and place it on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When Feris receives 1 or more wounds from a normal or special attack but is not destroyed, you may choose any empty space that is on the same level and within 10 spaces of Feris. Place Feris on the chosen space. When Feris starts to Teleport, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagment attacks.

name: Fi, Fo, and Fum
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, at any point while moving, Fi, Fo, and Fum may each choose an adjacent enemy small or medium figure on the same level and on a space where they could end their movement. Move the chosen figure one space, then move Fi, Fo, or Fum onto the space that figure occupied. Enemy figures moved this way will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: The first time each turn Fi, Fo, or Fum would each receive a wound, ignore that wound.
ability_3_desc: After Fi, Fo, or Fum rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack, you must roll the 20-sided die once for all adjacent figures (before removing Fi, Fo, or Fum, if they were destroyed by the attack). If you roll 13 or higher, each adjacent figure receives one wound.

name: Frostclaw Paladins
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Frostclaw Paladins, you may take a turn with a Champion you control who follows Jandar.
ability_2_desc: Before moving a Frostclaw Paladin, you may add 3 to that figure's Move Value this turn. If you do, subtract 2 from that figure's Attack Value this turn.

name: Dr. Doom
ability_1_title: DOOM BLASTER ATTACK 5. Energy-Electric. Range 6+Special. Tech.
ability_1_desc: If a targeted figure receives 1 or more wounds from this attack, Stun the targeted figure. Additionally, if this figure takes 2 Strain, you may add Explosion 1 to this attack's range.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this figure, you may target a figure within 4 clear sight spaces and roll d20. If you roll an 11 or higher, the targeted figure must make a d12 Will check. If the Will check is failed, take temporary control of the targeted figure and immediately take a turn. Do not remove any Order Markers from the targeted figure's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Before attacking a target, you may choose a special ability on the target's Army Card and roll a d20. If your roll a 12 or higher, cancel the target's ability for the rest of this activation. If you roll a 20, the target also takes a wound.
ability_4_desc: After attacking, you may target a figure within range and displace the targeted figure anywhere within the Beam.

name: Galadhrim Archers
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Gamorrean Guard
ability_1_desc: If this unit has not moved or used a special ability before attacking, add one additional attack die vs. adjacent units.

name: Flottia the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for a figure you control that is within 4 clear sight spaces of Flottia, you may add 2 to your die roll. When rolling for a power that affects an entire squad, all affected figures must be within 4 clear sight spaces of Flottia.
ability_2_desc: When Flottia attacks figures who have the Flying power, add 2 attack dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Flottia's movement, ignore elevations. Flottia may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Flottia starts to fly, if she is engaged, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Frostsaber Prowler
ability_1_desc: When this Frostsabe Prowler attacks, it may attack up to 2 additional times. This Frostsabe Prowler cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: Before moving this Frostsaber Prowler, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium Elf figure adjacent to this Frostsaber Prowler. After you move this Frostsaber Prowler, place the chosen figure adjacent to this Frostsaber Prowler.

name: Fluttershy
ability_1_desc: All friendly Heroes who start their turn within 3 clear sight spaces of Fluttershy may add 2 to their Move number and 1 to their Attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving, choose a wounded Hero adjacent to Fluttershy. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove up to two wound markers from the chosen Hero's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Fluttershy's movement, ignore elevations. Fluttershy may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Fluttershy starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_4_desc: Nonfriendly Beasts and Dragons may not use special powers when adjacent to Fluttershy.

name: FPC Delta Team
ability_1_desc: When a Soldier in the FPC Delta Team defends against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure within 6 spaces, if any excess shields are rolled the attacking figure takes one unblockable wound. That Soldier must have line of sight on the attacking figure. Each FPC Delta Team Soldier may use Return Fire once per turn.
ability_2_desc: If a Soldier in the FPC Delta Team receives any wounds from an opponent's attack, place it on the attacking figure's Army Card. When any Solider you control makes a normal attack on a figure with an FPC Delta Team Soldier on its Army Card, it rolls 1 additional attack die for each one of those Soldiers on that card.

name: Firelord
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 5. After attacking normally, Firelord may attack with Cosmic Fire Line Special Attack. Choose 6 spaces in a straight line from Firelord. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Cosmic Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Firelord never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Firelord's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Frostfur Warband
ability_1_desc: If a Frostfur Warband warrior begins its turn unengaged, add 2 to its Move value this turn. If it begins its turn engaged, add 2 to its Attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to the Defense value of this card for each of your previously destroyed Frostfur Warband warriors, up to a maximum of +3 dice for the Spirits of the Fallen power.

name: Fintana Na'e Fakamoleki
ability_1_desc: Start the game with one Hooked Marker on this Army Card. When Fintana inflicts at least 1 wound on a small or medium adjacent figure with a normal or special attack, you may move the Hooked Marker from this Army Card to that figure's Army Card. That figure is now Hooked. Hooked figures may not move or be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph. Hooked figures can only target Fintana for attacks and subtract 1 from their defense. At any point during your turn you may move the Hooked Marker back to this Army Card. Immediately move the Hooked Marker back to this card if the Hooked figure is destroyed or if Fintana is no longer engaged with the figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. Fintana can only use Hook and Hack Special Attack if the Hook Marker is on this card. After attacking with Hook and Hack Special Attack, if it inflicted at least 1 wound, Fintana may attack again with 5 attack dice. If a figure is Hooked when Fintana attacks the second time, she must attack that figure.

name: Fyorlag Scorpions
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with a Fyorlag Scorpion, you may choose a figure adjacent to that Fyorlag Scorpion. Roll the 20-sided die, if you roll a 16 or higher, that figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Fyorlag Scorpions may double their height.

name: Fyorlag Skull-Back
ability_1_desc: An Opponent's figure with no unrevealed Order Markers on its Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common card for the figure) attacked by a Fyorlag Skull-back subtracts 2 from its defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Fyorlag Skull-Back may triple her Height and may ignore up to 2 levels of elevation.

name: FUBD'LUB
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Fubd'lub may attack any or all figures adjacent to it with Ravager's Fury Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures.
ability_2_desc: When Fubd'lub receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack by an opponent's figure and is not destroyed, you may place one Slaad Spawn that was not previously deployed on a same-level space adjacent to Fubd'lub.

name: Garnak
ability_1_desc: When an enemy figure engages Garnak, Garnak may immediately attack that figure.
ability_2_desc: Garnak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: GAMMACRON
ability_1_desc: All Omnicron Snipers and Repulsors gain one attack, defence and move.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. If Gammacrons Rapid Fire Special Attack inflicts a wound, he may attack again with his Rapid Fire Special Attack. Gammacron my continue attacking with his Rapid Fire Special Attack until he does no inflict a wound.

name: Gamora
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to Gamora. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 18 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.
ability_2_desc: When Gamora rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Gamora can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Frosticus Iciclus
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to Frosticus Iciclus' attack and defense while on a snow space.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Frosticus Iciclus may only use Slushball Special Attack when he is on a snow or ice space.
ability_3_desc: Range special. Attack 3. Choose a Glacier Mountain within 5 clear sight spaces of Frosticus Iciclus. Roll 3 attack dice once for all figures adjacent to that Glacier Mountain. Each affected figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_4_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: FUNIKO
ability_1_desc: Funiko can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Funiko does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: If Funiko is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, ou must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Funiko. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 9 or higher, ignore any wounds Funiko just received.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Funiko may only use Stealth Blade Special Attack if the defending figure was not adjacent to Funiko at the start of this turn. If Funiko inflicts a wound with Stealth Blade Special Attack, she may immediately move up to 4 spaces, as long as she ends this movement not adjacent to any enemy figures.

name: Fyorlag Spiders
ability_1_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Fyorlag Spiders may triple their height.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any one small or medium opponent's figure that is engaged with at least three Fyorlag Spiders that you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure).
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Fyorlag Spiders, you can take a turn with any predator you control.

name: FUNIKO
ability_1_desc: Funiko can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Funiko does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: If Funiko is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between Funiko and the attacker. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 9 or higher, ignore any wounds Funiko just received.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Funiko may only use Stealth Blade Special Attack if the defending figure was not adjacent to Funiko at the start of this turn. If Funiko inflicts a wound with Stealth Blade Special Attack, she may immediately move up to 4 spaces, as long as she ends this movement not adjacent to any enemy figures.

name: DWARF CAVER
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, a Dwarf Caver may Climb. Caver Climb has a move value of 1. When counting the space for Caver Climb ignore elevations. A Dwarf Caver may not Climb more than 10 levels above his height or 10 levels below his base. If a Dwarf Caver is engaged when he starts to Climb, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with a Dwarf Caver, you may choose up to 3 small or medium figures you control within 1 space of him whose base is 1-30 levels below that Dwarf Caver's base. Place the chosen figure(s) on any empty same-level space adjacent to that Dwarf Caver. If a chosen figure is engaged when it moves with Rope Pull, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Frost Giant of Morh
ability_1_desc: If this Frost Giant of Morh begins its turn unengaged, add 2 to its Move value this turn. If it begins its turn engaged, add 2 to its Attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with this Frost Giant of Morh, roll the 20-sided die. If this Frost Giant of Morh is on a snow or ice space, add 3 to your die roll. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with this Frost Giant of Morh. Battle Frenzy may be enhanced with Frenzy Enhancement and Berserker Charge Enhancement.
ability_3_desc: If this Frost Giant of Morh is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll 3 attack dice. One at a time for each skull rolled, you may inflict 1 wound on any figure that is adjacent to this Frost Giant of Morh. Figures affected by Dying Swipe cannot roll any defense dice and can receive more than 1 wound each. After using Dying Swipe, remove this Frost Giant of Morh from the battlefield.
