name: Fun-Sized Mobile Agony and Death Dispenser
ability_1_desc: If a figure moves at least 1 space, and begins or ends its move within 5 clear sight spaces of this FSMADD, after that figure ends its move, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-14, move that FSMADD up to 3 spaces. It must end its move as close as possible to the figure that moved.
ability_2_desc: Before moving this FSMADD, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to it. After you move this FSMADD, place the chosen figure adjacent to it.
ability_3_desc: Instead of its normal move, this FSMADD may Leap. Leap has a move of 4. When counting spaces for this FSMADD's Leap movement, ignore elevation. It may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. It may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap.

name: Gandalf
ability_1_desc: If the X Order Marker is on this card, you may reveal it at the end of the round and take a turn with Gandalf, or any hero you control with the fearless personality within 6 clear sight spaces of Gandalf, using this round's initiative order.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures within 6 spaces of Gandalf, including Gandalf, have the fearless personality in addition to their own personality.
ability_3_desc: When Gandalf attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time. If Gandalf began his turn unengaged, subtract 2 dice from the first attack. If Gandalf began his turn engaged, subtract 3 dice from the first attack.

name: ORC PAWN PICK
ability_1_desc: This Glyph remains on the figure that first picks it up. At the end of the game, add 5 Points to your score for every four Orc Pawn Picks on all Army Cards you control.
ability_2_desc: If an Orc Pawn is destroyed, one player rolls the 20-sided die. If he rolls a 17 or higher, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with this Glyph, Power Side up. Orc Pawn Pick cannot be placed on top of any other Glyph.

name: Gandalf the Gray
ability_1_desc: Range Special Attack 2. All opponent's figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Gandalf are affected by Flame of Anor Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: All Shadow Tiles within 8 clear sight spaces of Gandalf lose all effects and cannot be used for any special powers on any Army Card or Glyph.
ability_3_desc: After attacking with Gandalf, you may move up to 4 Small or Medium Unique Heroes you control up to 5 spaces. The chosen figures must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Gandalf prior to moving and must end their move unengaged. Figures moved will take leaving engagement attacks.

name: GAR-RU-NAL
ability_1_desc: All wounds inflicted by Gar-Ru-Nal are placed upside down on a figure's Army Card. These wounds cannot be healed by any means.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Gar-Ru-Nal. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Soulborgs, Constructs, and Wilsinu are not affected by this Marro Plague.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small, medium, or large figure, if Gar-Ru-Nal rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure receives a wound for every skull and cannot roll any defense dice.

name: Ghent Cre
ability_1_desc: Before moving Ghent Cre, you may destroy an adjacent Cultist that you control. If you do, add 4 to this card's attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Ghent Cre is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a Squad figure.

name: Ghirahim
ability_1_desc: When Ghirahim recieves one or more wounds, before removing the figure, roll the 20-Sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, ignore any wounds and immediately place it on any unoccupied space within 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Ghirahim is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Genecorp Soldiers
ability_1_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, if a Genecorp Soldier rolls at least 1 skull, he may attack the same figure again. A Genecorp Soldier may continue attacking in this manner until he does not roll at least 1 skull.
ability_2_desc: A Genecorp Soldier adds 2 dice to his attack against adjacent figures.

name: Gavin Sacrens
ability_1_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for an Elf Wizard Card, you may add 1 to your die roll.
ability_2_title: Stone of Eldritch Fire Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Attack 3. All figures who are not Elf Wizards within 2 clear sight spaces of Gavin Sacrens are affected by the Stone of Eldritch Fire Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Gavin Sacrens is not affected by his own Stone of Eldritch Fire Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Each time Gavin Sacrens uses his Stone of Eldritch Fire Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. On a 16 or higher, Elf Wizards are also affected by the attack.

name: Giants of Barrenspur
ability_1_desc: When attacking, a Giant of Barrenspur may attack one additional time for each previously destroyed Giant of Barrenspur on this Army Card.

name: Garthug the Brave
ability_1_desc: When attacking figures with a wild personality, add 2 dice to Garthug's attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, Garthug may move 2 additional spaces.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Start the game with a spear marker on this card. Remove the spear marker and place it on a space adjacent to the figure you are attacking to use Thrown Spear. After Garthug has thrown his spear he must retrieve it by moving over the space with the spear marker on it. After moving over this space pick up the spear marker and place it back on Garthug's card. Garthug suffers a -2 attack until he has retrieved his spear.

name: Galactus
ability_1_desc: Once per round, after revealing an Order Marker on this card and before taking a turn with Galactus, you may take a turn with one other Unique Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Galactus' movement, ignore elevations. Galactus may move over figures and obstacles such as ruins. Galactus ignores all terrain effects and is never considered engaged with another figure. Galactus never gets height advantage.
ability_3_desc: Range Special. Attack 2. If Galactus used his Servant Bonding special power at least once this game, he may use his Power Cosmic Special Attack. All figures, other than Heralds, within 9 spaces of Galactus are affected by Power Cosmic Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately and may only roll a maximum of 3 defense dice when defending against Galactus' Cosmic Power Special Attack.
ability_4_desc: An opponent may never take temporary or permanent control of Galactus.

name: Ghân-Buri-Ghân
ability_1_desc: Ghân-Buri-Ghân rolls two additional attack dice against Orcs.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium friendly figures from Rohan who start their turn adjacent to Ghân-Buri-Ghân may move 2 additional spaces.
ability_3_desc: After moving and instead of attacking with Ghân-Buri-Ghân, you may remove one wound marker from this card.

name: Gax Bolod'Ken
ability_1_desc: Gax Bolod'Ken is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Once per turn when Gax Bolod'Ken leaves an engagement one at a time he rolls one attack dice for each opponent's figure adjacent to him. If a skull is rolled inflict one wound on the selected figure.
ability_2_desc: When Gax Bolod'ken attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: Gent Taskblade
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Gent Taskblade's Army Card, before taking his turn, you may take a turn with one other Wayfarer you control.
ability_2_desc: Gent Taskblade may roll 2 additional attack dice when making a normal attack. Powerhouse Attack may only be used once per round.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, Gent Taskblade adds 2 to his defense dice.

name: Gen. Sherman Mayne
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered Order Marker on this card, instead of taking a turn normally with Gen. Sherman Mayne, you may take a turn with each of the following Army Cards that you control: 1 Soldier Hero that follows Jandar. Gen. Mayne may be that Hero. Either 1 different Soldier Hero that follows Jandar, or 1 Soldier Squad that follows Jandar. You choose which Army Card to activate first. Other than Gen. Mayne, a figure taking a turn with Jandar's Mission must be within 8 clear sight spaces of him at the start of its move.
ability_2_desc: If Gen. Mayne has been destroyed, and there are any unrevealed Order Markers on this card, all Soldiers you control add 1 to their Move.

name: Ghand the Man Eater
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Human figure, Ghand the Man Eater receives one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking normally, Ghand the Man Eater may add 4 to his Range value and attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mimring's movement, ignore elevations. Mimring may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mimring starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Glauben Vanguard
ability_1_desc: Figures engaged with a Glauben Vanguard cannot make leaving engagement attacks against figures other than Glauben Vanguards.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, a Glauben Vanguard adds 2 to his defense dice.

name: Deadpool
ability_1_desc: Attack 4. Range 1. Edge. Deadpool may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: Attack 4. Range 3. You may attack twice. -1 Attack, if adjacent to the targeted figure.
ability_3_desc: 2 Actions. Range -. Remove Deadpool from the board and place Deadpool on any legal space on the battlefield that is not adjacent to another figure. Deadpool may carry one medium or small figure.
ability_4_desc: After taking a turn with Deadpool and at the end of each round, remove 1 Wound Marker from this card. Deadpool may also re-roll Endurance and Will checks against diseases, poisons, or toxins.

name: Gilden Stormstone
ability_1_desc: Friendly small or medium figures who follow Aquilla are never attacked when leaving an engagement with a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Gilden Stormstone.
ability_2_desc: When any friendly small or medium figures who follow Aquilla roll defense dice while adjacent to Gilden Stormstone, you may roll Aquilla Valkyrie dice. Each Aquilla symbol rolled counts for an additional shield.

name: Ghostbusters
ability_1_desc: When defending against a normal or special attack from a Ghostbuster, an Undead figure rolls one fewer defense die for every skull rolled.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack Special. Choose any number of Ghostbusters you control who did not make a normal attack this turn and who have line of sight on the target. Roll 2 attack dice for each chosen figure. The defending figure chooses the lowest Ghostbuster when determining height advantage. After attacking, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen Ghostbuster. If you roll an X or less, where X is the number of skulls rolled with this special attack, destroy that Ghostbuster.

name: Gargoyles of Bogdan
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Gargoyles of Bogdan, you can take a turn with any undead hero you control.
ability_2_desc: The Gargoyles of Bogdan may start the game on any castle or road peice within 8 clear sight spaces of your starting zone. If they do not, then they cannot take a turn during the first round. Whenever a Gargoyles of Bogdan is on a castle or a road, or are adjacent to a wall, a battlement, or a ruin, add two dice to its defence roll.
ability_3_desc: If Sudema is within four clear sight spaces of a gargoyle, you may increase her range of Stare of Stone to eight and add two to the twenty-sided die roll.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for a Gargoyles of Bogdan's movement, ignore elevations. Gargoyles of Bogdan may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Gargoyles of Bogdan starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: General Zod
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with General Zod, you may choose any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces that is engaged with any other figure you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, General Zod may attack with Heat Vision Special Attack. When attacking with Heat Vision Special Attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Zod's movement, ignore elevations. Zod may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Zod starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dancing Crow
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure, if Dancing Crow inflicts 1 or more wounds, you may move a Scout figure you control that is within 8 clear sight spaces of Dancing Crow up to 4 spaces. Figures moved by Battle Dance do not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Dancing Crow attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for a Fearsome Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll.

name: Giants of Eberron
ability_1_desc: After destroying a small or medium figure with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, place the destroyed figure on this army card. For each figure on this card, subtract 1 from the move value of the Giants of Eberron. There can be a maximum of two figures on this card.
ability_2_desc: Attack 2. Range 4. Instead of attacking normally with a Giant of Eberron, if there is at least one figure on this card, you may use Deadlaunch Special Attack. For each skull rolled, inflict one unblockable wound on the targeted figure. After using Deadlaunch Special Attack, remove one figure from this army card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Giants of Eberron always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Giant Gruts
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Giant Gruts, you may first take a turn with any Orc Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: At any point while moving, the Giant Gruts may choose a small or medium figure that is adjacent and on a space where a Giant Grut may end his movement. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, the figure is safe and the Giant Grut's movement ends. If you roll 11-20, you may throw the chosen figure by placing it on any empty space within 2 spaces of the Giant Grut. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by the Swinging Mace never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved by Swinging Mace can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: GIGANTO
ability_1_desc: Giganto cannot move normally or be moved by any special power on another Army Card or Glyph. At the start of each round, before placing Order Markers, you may place him on any empty spaces within 10 spaces. If you do, roll one unblockable attack die against each figure adjacent to Giganto. If Giganto is engaged when he starts to tunnel, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 3 clear sight spaces of Giganto, and its base is no more than 5 levels above Giganto's height or 5 levels below his base, Giganto may add 2 to his Range when attacking that figure. While engaged, Giganto may target and attack non-adjacent figures.

name: Glack
ability_1_desc: Anytime a normal attack from hero figure would assign enough damage to destroy a small goblin squad figure you control within 5 clear sight spaces of Glack, the attacking figure may assign the excess damage to a small goblin squad figure adjacent to the target goblin. Any small goblin squad figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Glack who moves during an opponent's turn will take leaving engagement attacks regardless of any special power. All small goblin squad figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Glack roll 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, after placing order markers but before rolling for initiative, if there are no order markers on Glack, you may move him up to 5 spaces

name: Gnoll Raiders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Gnoll Raiders, you may first take a turn with any Gnoll Hero or Hyena Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Gnoll Raider attacks an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least 2 other Gnoll figures you control, add 1 die to that Gnoll Raider's attack.

name: Gnoll Brute
ability_1_desc: If this Gnoll Brute attacks an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least 2 other Gnoll figures you control, add 1 die to this Gnoll Brute's attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if this Gnoll Brute rolls at least one shield, the most wounds he may take for this attack is one.

name: Gorilla Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Gorilla Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Gorilla Silverback that you control.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with the Gorilla Warriors, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with the Gorilla Warriors.

name: Giant Frog
ability_1_desc: Before moving a Giant Frog, you may choose an unengaged adjacent small figure you control that is not a Mount. After you move this Giant Frog, place the chosen figure adjacent to it. Until either figure is moved, the chosen figure may add 2 to the height of its base.
ability_2_desc: Instead of its normal move, a Giant Frog may use Leapfrog. Leapfrog has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Leapfrog, ignore elevations. It may leap over figures without becoming engaged and leap over obstacles such as ruins. It may not leap more than 6 levels up or down in a single leap. If it is engaged when it starts to Leapfrog, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: If a Giant Frog starts its turn on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. A Giant Frog does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: Golgari Vanguard
ability_1_desc: When counting movement spaces for Golgari Vanguard, ignore elevations. Golgari Vanguard may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Golgari Vanguard starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Golgari Vanguard attacks an adjacent figure, if he began his turn at least 3 clear sight spaces away from the defending figure, he gets +2X for the attack.

name: Gorbag, Cutthroat
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, instead of taking a turn with Gorbag, you may take a turn with any Wraith you control. If you do, you must place a wound marker on Gorbag.
ability_2_title: Blade Of The Tower Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Gorbag may use this special attack 4 times in the same turn. Gorbag may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.

name: Graccus
ability_1_desc: When non-adjacent attacks are targeted at a figure adjacent to Graccus those attacks may be redirected to Graccus before attack dice are rolled.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Graccus, you may choose a wounded friendly Hero figure adjacent to Graccus and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 Wound Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Grave Guardian
ability_1_desc: This Grave Guardian may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, if a friendly Unique Hero is destroyed within 4 clear sight spaces of this Grave Guardian, then he may immediately take a turn.

name: Gnarl of Elder
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Gnarl of Elder, you may choose an opponent's figure within 5 spaces that is adjacent to any tree or bush. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. Gnarl of Elder does not need clear line of sight to attack with Tree Ally Strike.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. When Gnarl of Elder attacks with his Boulder Throw Special Attack, if he did not move this turn, he may attack one additional time. Palm Trees and Underbrush do not offer an additional defense die for figures attacked by Boulder Throw Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Gnarl of Elder rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against Undead figures.

name: GLAX
ability_1_desc: After Glax takes a turn, if there is a wound marker on this card, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 18 or higher, you must take another turn with Glax. If you roll a 1 to 3, choose an opponent. That opponent takes temporary control of Glax and must take a turn with it, but will not be able to view any unrevealed Order Markers on this card. At the end of that turn, control of Glax returns to you. All Order Markers and figures that were on this card will stay on this card.
ability_2_desc: After moving, if Glax is adjacent to a figure or destructible object, it must attack, if possible. After attacking, Glax must attack one additional time, if possible.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Glax's movement, ignore elevations. Glax may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Glax starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Gonfalon Knights
ability_1_desc: Any squad figure that follows Einar may add 1 to its attack value and 1 to its defense value if it is within 2 clear-sight spaces of a Gonfalon Knight. Guidon does not affect Gonfalon Knights.
ability_2_desc: A Gonfalon Knight may add 3 to his move value and 1 to his attack value if, at the end of movement he is adjacent to a Flagbearer controlled by an opponent and targets that Flagbearer with his attack.

name: GRAMORNYM
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Gramornym, instead of taking a turn with Gramornym, you may take a turn with any of the following that you control: • up to 2 Goblin or Hobgoblin Common Heroes or • 1 Goblin or Hobgoblin Squad. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn instead of Gramornym must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Gramornym before moving.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Goblins and Hobgoblins adjacent to Gramornym roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die.

name: G'NAXTHOR
ability_1_desc: When a figure within 4 spaces of G'Naxthor rolls a 20-sided die for a special power on its Army Card, roll a white combat die. If you roll a shield, add 2 to the result. If you roll a skull or a blank, subtract 1 from the result.
ability_2_desc: At any point during G'Naxthor's normal move, you may choose one adjacent opponent's small or medium figure. Place the chosen figure adjacent to G'Naxthor at the end of its move, and roll one unblockable attack die against that figure. The chosen figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moved by Grasp, and may not make a leaving engagement attack on G'Naxthor.
ability_3_desc: After moving, G'Naxthor must make a normal attack, if possible. After that attack, if it did not use Grasp this turn, it must make an additional attack, if possible.

name: Gondorian Soldiers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Gondorian Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Human Leader you control. After that turn, if that Human Leader is engaged you may move and attack with up to 4 Gondorian Soldiers you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice while on a Wall Walk, Road or Rock space, a Gondorian Soldier rolls one additional defense die.

name: GRAX
ability_1_desc: When making a normal attack on an opponent's figure without an Order Marker on its card, Grax rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Once per attack, Grax may re-roll one attack die for each wound marker on the target's Army Card. Destructible objects are not affected by Delight In Cruelty.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, when Grax defends against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, if any excess shields are rolled the attacker takes one unblockable wound.

name: GIANT PENNY
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Giant Penny always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Govuru Scorpion
ability_1_desc: When a Govuru Scorpion starts it's turn on a sand space, instead of moving normally, you may place it on any other empty sand space within 8 spaces of it's current location. If a Govuru Scorpion is engaged when it starts it's Sand Burrow, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any adjacent opponent's figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher remove an order marker from the chosen figure's army card (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure).
ability_3_desc: If a Govuru Scorpion is on a sand space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to that Govuru Scorpion to attack it with a normal attack.

name: Gráinne O'Hara
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on Gráinne O'Hara, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving normally and before attacking normally with Gráinne O'Hara, you may move Gráinne up to 6 spaces. Gráinne can attack with Quick Slash Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as Gráinne is on a space where she could end her movement. Opponents' figures roll one less defense die for each skull rolled with Quick Slash Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Gráinne O'Hara is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Great Nahuatl
ability_1_desc: if she is unengaged, Great Nahuatl and all units within 6 spaces of Great Nahuatl are considered Friendly towards one another.
ability_2_desc: If she is unengaged at the end of the Round, remove a Wound Marker from Grand Nahuatl and all units within 6 spaces of her.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Great Nahualt's movement, ignore elevations. Great Nahuatl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Great Nahuatl starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Glyph of Tridar
ability_1_desc: This figure must use this glyph before rolling dice for their next attack, defense, or leaving engagement attack. Roll 3 additional dice when making that attack, defense, or leaving engagement attack.

name: Greater Glass Elemental
ability_1_desc: The maximum number of wounds this Greater Glass Elemental can receive from a single attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Whenever this Greater Glass Elemental receives any wounds, all small or medium figures adjacent to it receive 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: If this Greater Glass Elemental has any wound markers on its Army Card, it adds 2 to its Attack value and subtracts 2 from its Defense value.

name: GLYPH OF IMMUNITY
ability_1_desc: This figure can never have special markers such as Negation placed on its card. This figure's Move, Attack, and Defense values can never be reduced by special powers on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: Greater Steel Elemental
ability_1_desc: If this Greater Steel Elemental is attacked by a nonadjacent figure, and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-14, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 15 or higher, this Greater Steel Elemental takes no damage, and you must choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces. That figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a friendly figure adjacent to this Greater Steel Elemental is targeted for an attack from a nonadjacent opponent, count the minimum number of spaces between the friendly figure and the attacking figure. If this Greater Steel Elemental occupies one of the spaces, that figure must instead attack this Greater Steel Elemental, if possible.

name: Glyph of Survivability
ability_1_desc: Whenever the Hero holding this glyph receives enough wounds to be destroyed, activate this glyph. The Hero holding this glyph will survive with one life remaining. This glyph can only activate when the Hero holding it has more than one life remaining, and it can only be reactivated once that Hero regains full life.

name: Grant Ward
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's adjacent figure with a normal attack, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. When defending against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may subtract any number of Grant Ward's attack dice from your roll, to a minimum of 1 attack die, and add that number to his Range number for this turn.
ability_3_desc: After you take a turn with Grant Ward, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 2 or less, choose an opponent. That opponent now controls Grant Ward. Remove any order markers on this Army Card, then give the card to that opponent. For the rest of the game, Grant Ward has the personality of Tricky and follows Utgar.

name: Griffin Executioners
ability_1_desc: When a Griffin Executioner attacks, he may attack one additional time if he is attacking a Unique Hero.
ability_2_desc: When a Griffin Executioner rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 3 defense dice to the defending Griffin Executioner.
ability_3_desc: Griffin Executioners can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Greenspawn Defenders
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Greenspawn Defenders and before taking a turn with them, you may first take a turn with Charos if he is drafted in your army.
ability_2_desc: Greenspawn Defenders gain 1 movement for each figure engaged with Charos at the start of Greenspawn Defenders' turn.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Glyph of Throwing Knife
ability_1_desc: Range 5 Attack 5. Roll 2 less attack dice against Large and Huge figures. If the defending figure is not destroyed by Throwing Knife Special Attack, destroy this glyph. If the defending figure is destroyed, place this glyph power-side up onto the space that figure previously occupied.

name: Green Lantern Guy Gardner
ability_1_desc: When Green Lantern attacks a figure with no unrevealed order markers on its card, he rolls one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Before moving this Green Lantern, choose up to 2 unengaged, small or medium friendly figures adjacent to this Green Lantern. After you move this Green Lantern, place the chosen figure(s) adjacent to this Green Lantern.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Green Lantern's movement, ignore elevations. Green Lantern may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Green Lantern starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Gargantuan Glacier (6-Hex)
ability_1_desc: If a Gargantuan Glacier is attacked and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you must roll 1 attack die, one at a time, for each figure adjacent to it. If you roll a skull, inflict one wound on that figure. Figures affected by Shards cannot roll any defense dice. After using Shards, remove this Gargantuan Glacier from the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, a Gargantuan Glacier adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Griffin Cannon Crew
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, choose an unengaged Griffin Cannon figure adjacent to three Griffin Cannon Crew. Move the Griffin Cannon Crew 3 spaces, place the chosen figure adjacent to the same three Griffin Cannon Crew.
ability_2_desc: Range 12. Attack 5. If three Griffin Cannon Crew are unengaged and adjacent to the same Griffin Cannon then instead of attacking normally choose a non-adjacent figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also by the Fire Cannon Special Attack. Griffin Cannon Crew only need a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. A clear sight shot is determined from the Griffin Cannon used. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Griffin Cannon Crew can be affected by its own Fire Cannon Special Attack.

name: Green Lantern
ability_1_desc: Any time another friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Green Lantern rolls defense dice, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, that figure rolls 3 additional dice.
ability_2_desc: Before moving this Green Lantern, choose up to 2 unengaged, small or medium friendly figures adjacent to this Green Lantern. After you move this Green Lantern, place the chosen figure(s) adjacent to this Green Lantern.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Green Lantern's movement, ignore elevations. Green Lantern may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Glacier (4-Hex)
ability_1_desc: If a Glacier is attacked and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you must roll 1 attack die, one at a time, for each figure adjacent to it. If you roll a skull, inflict one wound on that figure. Figures affected by Shards cannot roll any defense dice. After using Shards, remove this Glacier from the battlefield.

name: Grima Wormtongue
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative but before anyone takes a turn, if Grima Wormtongue is within 6 clear sight spaces of both a Unique Hero you control and an opponent's Unique Hero, that opponent must show you all Order Markers on that hero's Army Card, and that hero subtracts 1 from its Attack and Defense values for the rest of this round.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, if you control Grima Wormtongue you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 16 or higher, you must choose an opponent. That opponent now controls Grima Wormtongue. Give this Army Card to that opponent.

name: Morindan's Skull
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack or defense against an opposing figure on a higher level than the equiped figure add one combat die to the roll.
ability_2_desc: Any time you roll the 20 sided die for one of the equiped hero's special attacks or special abilities you may choose to add or subtract 1 before rolling. Use this ability only if the equiped hero is undead.

name: Glyph of Telepatus
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, this figure may choose another figure within 5 clear sight spaces. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, nothing happens. If you roll a 6 or higher, switch this figure with the chosen figure. Figures moved will not take any leaving engagement attacks. A figure must be the same size as the figure carrying this glyph in order to be moved by the Glyph of Telepatus.

name: Gríma Wormtongue
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, before rolling for initiative, you may place Gríma Wormtongue on a previously empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of an opponent's figure, if possible.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's Hero is within 3 clear sight spaces of Gríma Wormtongue, that opponent subtracts 8 from their initiative roll. Fearless figures are not affected by Web of Deceit.
ability_3_desc: An opponent may not target Gríma Wormtongue for a normal or special attack. Fearless figures are not affected by Hidden Traitor.

name: Gornak
ability_1_desc: Gornak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Orc Archers adjacent to Gornak add 1 to their Range and Attack values.

name: Green Goblin
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Lob 12. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this special attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: While the Green Goblin is flying, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure that he passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to him at the end of his move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Glider Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Glider Grab.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Green Goblin's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Green Goblin starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Grimm Giants
ability_1_desc: All Grimm Giants you control add 1 to their attack and defense for each other Giant of Ogre you control within 2 clear sight spaces (to a maximum of +3).
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, after a Grimm Giant destroys a figure or destructible object, place a black trophy marker on this Army Card. After a Grimm Giant rolls defense, you may remove a trophy marker to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.
ability_3_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for a Large of Huge figure add 1 to your roll. If all of your figures are Large or Huge, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.

name: GREED
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Greed's card, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker that is on Greed's card to activate Ultimate Shield for the round. While Ultimate Shield is active, subtract 1 from Greed's Move value, add 1 to Greed's Attack value, and whenever Greed rolls defense dice, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Greed's card, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker that is on Greed's card to activate Ling Yao for the round. While Ling Yao is active, add 1 to Greed's Move value, and when Greed attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Start the game with 4 markers on this card. When Greed would receive one or more wounds, you may remove a marker to ignore all those wounds. If Greed would be destroyed by a power that does not inflict wounds, you may remove three markers and that figure is safe.

name: Green Lantern Alan Scott
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a friendly small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Green Lantern and place the chosen figure on another space within 4 clear sight spaces of Green Lantern. If the chosen figure is engaged, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Green Lantern rolls 3 fewer dice when attacking or defending against Flora, Ent or Wildwood figures.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Green Lantern's move, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs and over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: GRIFFIN CANNON
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Griffin Cannon always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
Cosmic Cube
ability_2_desc: MAKLUAN TECHNOLOGY
ability_3_desc: Kryptonite

name: Gregor Clegane The "Mountain"
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Gregor Clegane the "Mountain" always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Bomb
ability_1_desc: Bomb is actually a mobile, remote controlled robot that is filled with twenty pounds of semtex plastic explosives. Only the Joker and Harley Quinn know the code keys to control it. It can be detonated remotely by either the Joker or Harley Quinn, or, once they've been taken out of the picture Bomb can possibly be exploded simply by destroying it.

name: Creatures of the Deep
ability_1_desc: The Creatures of the Deep represent various ocean dwelling life that will respond to those Atlanteans that can telepathically command them. While many other types of sea creatures exist, these are the mid size ones that can cause the most damage.

name: Luke Cage
ability_1_desc: Luke Cage possesses superhuman strength and stamina, and has extremely-dense skin and muscle tissue, which render him highly resistant to physical injury. His skin can resist high-caliber bullets, puncture wounds, corrosives, biological attacks, and extreme temperatures and pressures without sustaining damage.

name: Ms. Marvel
ability_1_desc: A limited precognitive "sixth sense" that initially triggered blackouts as the two personas of Carol Danvers and Ms. Marvel were distinct, both mentally and physically.
ability_2_desc: Ms. Marvel possesses superhuman strength.
ability_3_desc: Ms. Marvel has the ability of flight, imbued through a second exposure to the energies of a Kree Psyche-Magnetron.
ability_4_desc: Ms. Marvel possesses superhuman durability.

name: Red Skull
ability_1_desc: Dissatisfied with the standard drill instruction his subordinates used to train Schmidt, Hitler took over personally, and trained Schmidt as his right-hand man. Upon completion, Hitler gave Schmidt a unique uniform with a grotesque red skull mask, and he emerged as the Red Skull for the first time. His role was the embodiment of Nazi intimidation, while Hitler could remain the popular leader of Germany. To that end, the Red Skull was appointed head of Nazi terrorist activities with an additional large role in external espionage and sabotage. He succeeded, wreaking havoc throughout Europe in the early stages of World War II.

name: Hawkgirl
ability_1_desc: The metal, coupled with a synthetic pair of wings, allows Hawkgirl to fly. It also grants her enhanced strength and the ability to heal more quickly from injury.
ability_2_desc: In battle, she wields swords and maces forged from the mysterious alloy, which allow her to disrupt magic and deflect blasts of energy.
ability_3_desc: Shayera is an expert warrior and is incredibly deadly with her trusty mace.

name: Fin Fang Foom
ability_1_desc: Fin Fang Foom is a shape-shifting alien being who can mimic human form.
ability_2_desc: Fin Fang Foom possesses super strength.
ability_3_desc: Fin Fang Foom can fly via his wings at supersonic speeds.
ability_4_desc: Fin Fang Foom can spew combustible acid mist from his mouth.

name: Parademons
ability_1_desc: Parademons are capable of unaided flight via the standard-issue Apokaliptan armour that all Parademons wear.
ability_2_desc: Parademons possess superhuman strength and endurance, and have been shown to have a high threshold for pain. Bare-handed, they possess superhuman strength and often attack with their claws and teeth.
ability_3_desc: They have access to Apokaliptan weaponry, and all Parademons are fully versed in their use. Their standard weapon is a spear also equipped with an energy blaster. They have been trained to use a variety of melee and projectile weapons.
ability_4_desc: Their true strength is in their numbers, which reach into the thousands. When acting together, they can overwhelm even the toughest heroes. They tend to rely on sheer volume to overwhelm opponents, and are rarely encountered on their own.

name: Ocean Master
ability_1_desc: His unique Atlantean Trident allows him to control lightning and to fire magical lightning bolts.
ability_2_desc: His Atlantean Helmet allows him to control water (in the same way that Mera does) on a massive scale.
ability_3_desc: Ocean Master's enhanced physiology enables him to withstand heavy impacts that would kill any normal human being and gives him the ability to function and survive at the ocean floor. Even so he usually wears Atlantean armor. And, like all Atlanteans, he can function normally underwater and is able to withstand the high pressures and extreme temperatures of the deep.
ability_4_desc: Making a deal with the demon Neron he was given a trident that allowed him to become a sorcerer.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: Captain America has agility, strength, speed, endurance, and reaction time superior to any Olympic athlete who ever competed. The Super-Soldier formula that he has metabolized has enhanced all of his bodily functions to the peak of human efficiency. Notably, his body eliminates the excessive build-up of fatigue-producing poisons in his muscles, granting him phenomenal endurance.
ability_2_desc: Captain America's only weapon is his shield. It is made of a unique Vibranium-Adamantium alloy that has never been duplicated. The Shield was cast by American metallurgist Dr. Myron MacLain, who was contracted by the U.S. government to create an impenetrable substance to use for tanks during World War II. During his experiments, MacLain combined Vibranium with an Adamantium-steel alloy he was working with and created the disc-shaped shield. It is virtually indestructible: it is resistant to penetration, temperature extremes, and the entire electromagnetic spectrum of radiation. The only way it can be damaged in any way is by tampering with its molecular bonding.

name: Mister Freeze
ability_1_desc: A weapon able to create gusts of cold that approach absolute zero. The gun is also capable of creating a "cold field" and imprison their opponents in a cocoon of ice.
ability_2_desc: His protective cryogenic suit grants him superhuman strength and durability, making him a powerful villain.
ability_3_desc: Fries' body was transformed into a cold-blooded form that must always be kept at subzero temperatures. At normal room temperature he will die.

name: Elektra
ability_1_desc: Elektra Natchios studied martial arts as an adolescent. While in the US she met another student, Matthew Murdock, and they fell in love with each other. Murdock (who would later become Daredevil) revealed to her that he had superhuman senses that compensated for his blindness. A year later, Elektra and her father were held hostage by terrorists in a building on campus. Wearing a scarf as a mask, Murdock (with Elektra's help) defeated the terrorists. However, a policeman mistook Elektra's father for one of the terrorists and shot him dead. Emotionally shattered, Elektra decided she no longer believed in the law and wanted to withdraw from the world. She left America, and Murdock.

name: Atlantean Warriors
ability_1_desc: Because Atlanteans have to adapt to living at varying pressure levels, their bodies are physically much heartier than the average human being, granting them, Superhuman Durability, Stamina, and Strength.
ability_2_desc: In addition, Atlanteans have developed low-level telepathy which they use to broadcast and receive thoughts between one another. This is an Atlantean's primary means of communication. Some Atlanteans, such as Aquaman have higher degrees of telepathy and can use it to communicate with other forms of sea life. This however, is a rare instance, and not a trait common to most Atlanteans.
ability_3_desc: When Atlanteans travel on land they usually take a supply of water with them. Whether that's in the form of actual water tanks, or water condensers that pull water from the surrounding air is left up to you. Either way they have the ability to spray a limited supply of water which forms pools, allowing Atlanteans and other creatures of the deep to exist outside of water.

name: Teleportation Device - Makluan Technology
ability_1_desc: The Makluan are a reptilian alien race that come from a world named Maklu-4. They are a much older race than humans, at least countless billions older. Fin Fang Foom is a prominent Makluan. Makluan technology is more advanced than anything on Earth. The Makluans are able to use their technology to repeatedly conquer entire worlds, or destroy them. Makluans have starships, energy weapons, giant mech robots, and teleportation technology. They are also responsible for creating the Makluan Rings that Mandarin currently posses. It is of note that Mandarin has spent decades mastering Makluan technology.

name: Daredevil
ability_1_desc: Daredevil possesses the strength, speed, agility, and endurance, not to mention acrobatic and gymnastic skills, of an Olympic-level athlete. Through a combination of the tutelage of Stick and self-training, Daredevil is a master of a unique martial art form, which is a hybridized form of American boxing and the Japanese arts of ninjutsu, judo and aiki-jujutsu. Martial arts training has given him an immense degree of concentration and personal control over his body and energy, or Ki. Daredevil is also an accomplished criminal trial lawyer.
ability_2_desc: Abandoned by his mother, Matt Murdock was raised by his father, boxer "Battling Jack" Murdock, in Hell's Kitchen. Realizing that rules were needed to prevent people from behaving badly, young Matt decided to study law; however, when he saved a man from an oncoming truck, it spilled a radioactive cargo that rendered Matt blind while enhancing his remaining senses. Under the harsh tutelage of blind martial arts master Stick, Matt mastered his heightened senses and became a formidable fighter.
ability_3_desc: Although the character is blind, his remaining four senses function with superhuman accuracy and sensitivity, giving him abilities far beyond the limits of a sighted person; few know that the hero cannot see.

name: HYDRA Soldiers
ability_1_desc: Hydra is a world-wide subversive organization dedicated to global domination. At its height, Hydra was the most extensive, powerful, and dangerous such organization in history. Hydra is almost entirely composed of men, with some notable exceptions, such as former member Lara Brown, the daughter of a Supreme Hydra, and so-called Madame Hydra, who later became known as the Viper. Hydra agents wear green costumes with cowls concealing the entire head except for the mouth and chin. Their organization takes its name from the many-headed serpent-like monster known for its ability to grow two heads immediately to replace any head that was severed. Hydra prides itself on its ability to regroup and rebuild itself, allegedly mightier than before, after any major defeat. Indeed, the organization has now endured for four decades.

name: Batgirl
ability_1_desc: Batgirl is Barbara Gordon, a confident young woman just as committed to justice as her father, Gotham City's top cop Commissioner Gordon. But when her overprotective Dad forbids her from joining the force, her admiration of Batman leads her to rebel the way crime-fighting rebels do in Gotham City: by picking up the mantle of the Bat. A prodigy ahead of her time she has bailed out the Dark Knight on countless occasions. An exceptional fighter and detective, Batgirl is also unparalleled in her computer skills. With a Utility Belt filled with Batarangs and smoke bombs, she pursues justice regardless of whether others—including Batman—wish her to. She has fought toe-to-toe with some of Gotham's most unsavory characters. But Gotham's criminals are a ruthless and maniacal lot, and every moment she risks her neck means dancing closer to death. In the future Barbara Gordon will be brutally shot by the Joker, rendering her paralyzed from the waist down. Barbara will reinvent herself as Oracle, providing intelligence to the DCU heroes and leading the Birds of Prey. Years later, through experimental surgery, she will regain the use of her legs to become Batgirl once again to protect Gotham City.
ability_2_desc: An exceptional fighter and detective, Batgirl is also unparalleled in her computer skills. With a Utility Belt filled with Batarangs and smoke bombs, she pursues justice regardless of whether others—including Batman—wish her to. She has fought toe-to-toe with some of Gotham's most unsavory characters.
ability_3_desc: But Gotham's criminals are a ruthless and maniacal lot, and every moment she risks her neck means dancing closer to death. In the future Barbara Gordon will be brutally shot by the Joker, rendering her paralyzed from the waist down. Barbara will reinvent herself as Oracle, providing intelligence to the DCU heroes and leading the Birds of Prey. Years later, through experimental surgery, she will regain the use of her legs to become Batgirl once again to protect Gotham City.

name: Supergirl
ability_1_desc: Kara Zor-El was born on Krypton and grew up in the city of Argo in the years preceding the planet's destruction. Her father's brother is Jor-El, making her Superman's first cousin. As Krypton neared destruction, Zor-El copied his brother's experiment and launched Kara to safety in a rocket. Kara would land on Earth many years later when her cousin was already fully into his role as Superman. It is not known why Supergirl's rocket took so much longer to reach Earth, but it is theorized that she spent some time orbiting the yellow sun, accounting for the maturity of her powers once she awoke. Superman, whom she lashed out against for claiming to be a person she knew as her infant cousin, confronted her and was able to explain some of what was happening to her. Now trapped on a seemingly inferior world that fears her, Kara must learn to adapt and survive. Supergirl is a brash and headstrong teenager with powers that almost equal those of Superman, making her a force to be reckoned with. Her ideals certainly don't match up with her cousin's, making her adjustment to these new surroundings all the more difficult. In the end Supergirl is indeed a hero, although how she goes about it is clearly up to her.

name: Thugs
ability_1_desc: Various criminals utilize ex-cons and low life elements of urban society to form various sized groups known as Thugs. Thugs can be undisciplined gangs, or organized into well disciplined henchmen working for ruthless crime lords.

name: Moloids
ability_1_desc: About twenty thousand years ago, the Deviants were driven underground by the by their creators the Celestials during an event referred to as the Great Cataclysm. They settled into a new kingdom that became known as the Netherworld, and cut off from their supply of human slaves began biologically engineering a class of slave workers. Their first attempt created the Gortokians who eventually revolted and fled into the underground caverns. Their second attempt created two races that would be referred to as the Moloids and Tyrannoids respectively. The Gortokians later waged war against the Deviants and drove them away. Without masters to command them the Moloids wandered into what is now commonly referred to as Subterranea. Over the centuries the Moloids lost much of their intelligence and strength due to massive inbreeding and these creatures would become loyal to whomever they deemed to be most powerful. The Moloids are the physically weakest of the Subterraneans, and consequently they almost always act in great numbers. It has since been revealed that the Moloids were also created to act as "anti-bodies" to destroy the so-called Apocalypse Beast and they were programmed to insert them into a massive needle built into Monster Island should the creature ever return. If this was part of the Deviants original design for the Moloids or some other entity engineered this into their DNA remains unrevealed.

name: Sentinel
ability_1_desc: Sentinels are programmed to locate mutants and capture or kill them. Though several types of Sentinels have been introduced, the typical Sentinel is three stories tall, capable of flight, projects energy blasts, and can detect mutants.
ability_2_desc: Sentinels are technologically advanced, and have exhibited a wide variety of abilities. They are armed (primarily with energy weapons), capable of flight, and can detect mutants at long range. They possess vast physical strength, and their bodies are highly resistant to damage.
ability_3_desc: Sentinels are technologically advanced, and have exhibited a wide variety of abilities. They are armed (primarily with energy weapons), capable of flight, and can detect mutants at long range. They possess vast physical strength, and their bodies are highly resistant to damage.

name: Thor
ability_1_desc: Thor's principal weapon is the enchanted hammer Mjolnir, one of the most formidable weapons known to man or god. Among the hammer's various enchantments are its indestructibility and the ability to summon all the elements of storm (wind, rain, thunder, and lightning). His hammer can be thrown both as a means of flight, and as a weapon that always returns to its wielder's hand. Thor's superhuman strength is matched with an immunity to all human diseases, superhuman speed, agility, and simulated flight when he hurls his enchanted hammer Mjolnir.

name: Yellow Lantern Corps Soldiers
ability_1_desc: If you control an Unique Yellow Lantern, and after revealing an order marker on that Unique Yellow Lantern's card and taking a turn with that Unique Yellow Lantern, you may take a turn with the Yellow Lantern Corps Soldiers.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 Yellow Battery markers on this card for every squad of Yellow Lantern Corps Soldiers that you control.
ability_3_title: Power: Yellow Lantern Corps Protective Shielding
ability_3_desc: After rolling defense dice for any Yellow Lantern Corps Soldier each Yellow Battery marker that you remove from this card will add 1 automatic shield to the total.

name: Amon Sur
ability_1_desc: The son of Abin Sur, the dying Green Lantern that bestowed his power ring to Hal Jordan, Amon tried to pull away from his father's shadow by becoming a criminal. He blames the Green Lantern Corps for taking his father away from him and he hates them for it.
ability_2_desc: Due to living his life in his father's shadow, Amon grew up trying to separate himself from the shadow of his father. He became an intergalactic criminal with a deep hatred for the Green Lantern Corps. He became head of the Black Circle Crime Syndicate but a battle with Kyle Rayner culminated in Sur's decapitation. Amon returned, his head fully regrown due to his species' regenerative abilities. This time targeting Hal Jordan, attempting to reclaim Abin Sur's ring, Amon traveled to Earth where he had hired a group of bounty hunters to capture Hal Jordan. While the bounty hunters attacked Hal Jordan, Amon traveled to Edwards Air Force Base where they were keeping his father's ship. Taking the ship and the remains of a destroyed Manhunter, Amon went to the desert where Abin Sur was buried. Hal Jordan was there, having been captured by one of the bounty hunters, Hunger Dog. Amon drained the Jordan's power ring with the Manhunter skull, but could still not remove the ring from Hal's finger. Sur then forced Hal to bring him to the corpse of Abin Sur. When they arrived, Amon had all of his father's belongings back, except the ring, which he now believed would go to him once Hal was dead. Hal mocked Amon, stating that he was not fearless. He feared to kill him. Amon grew furious and pulled the trigger of his weapon. However, Hunger Dog blocked the attack and was revealed to be John Stewart in disguise. The two Green Lanterns ganged up on Amon who engaged in a fist fight with Jordan. In the middle of the fight, a small yellow ring arrived on the battlefield, in front of Amon, stating he could instill great fear and was welcomed to the Sinestro Corps. Amon took the ring and tried to use it against Hal and John. His attempt was interrupted, however, when the ring immediately transported him to Qward. Representing Sector 2814, Amon became a member of the Sinestro Corps, an Corps of beings with the goal to spread fear throughout the galaxy. When the Sinestro Corps kidnapped Kyle Rayner on Qward, Amon was one of the Sinestro Corps members who fought him, still angry over Kyle defeating him the first time they met. Amon was present during the Green Lantern Corps mission to rescue the Ion entity on Qward. Alongside, the new Parallax, Amon fought Hal Jordan. After the Green Lantern squad fled into the catacombs of Qward, Amon led a platoon of Sinestro Corps members to follow them, only to be ambushed by Hal Jordan, wielding many Qwardian power rings. When the Sinestro Corps invaded Earth, Amon was part of the strike force Sinestro led above Coast City. Hal Jordan, Kyle Rayner, and many other Green Lanterns fought them high above the city. Unknown to Amon, the Green Lanterns could now use Lethal Force and seeing this, he fled the battle in fear.

name: Darkseid
ability_1_desc:
Any figure temporarily controlled by another figure will act independently, any bonding the controlled figure might have with any other figure(s) is negated for the turn. If a squad figure is temporarily taken over only that one single figure, not the rest of the squad, is controlled.

Mindless figures and Machines cannot be mind controlled.

If a controlled figure is moved into a space, or takes an action, that would potentially cause that figure harm on that turn, it gets a chance to avoid taking the action. (This includes moving into Lava, jumping off of buildings, destroying an adjacent ITF that explodes, hitting a character with counter strike, etc.) To avoid completing the harmful move or action the player that originally owns the controlled figure rolls the 20-sided die. If a Hero figure rolls a 6 or higher it automatically breaks the control and the chosen figure returns to the player who controlled the figure before being controlled. A single squad figure, or a Dimwitted figure, needs to roll a 12 or higher to break the control.

name: Big Barda
ability_1_desc: She possesses immense superhuman strength that puts her into the same strength class as Superman and Wonder Woman.
ability_2_desc: She is also highly resistant to blunt force trauma, temperature and pressure extremes, and is partially bulletproof.
ability_3_desc: Her Apokoliptan physiology prevents her from aging and makes her immune to disease.
ability_4_desc: She is a master combatant, having been trained in all forms of Apokiliptian warfare. Her skill and strength is such that she has fought Wonder Woman to a draw.

name: Parallax
ability_1_desc: Parallax is an Entity. No figure is placed on the battlefield to represent him.
ability_2_desc: For Parallax to operate in the game he must have a host. After revealing an order marker on Parallax's card, and before taking a turn with Parallax, you may choose any Unique Hero on the battlefield. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher (8 or higher for a Dimwitted figure) Parallax is now in control of that hero. Ignore any Order Markers on the chosen hero's card and use the order markers on Parallax's card instead. Parallax uses all the stats on the controlled card, but any wound markers are placed on Parallax's card. If Parallax is destroyed, or jumps to a different host, control of that host figure returns to its owner. If Parallax is not in a host, and he's the last figure you control, the game immediately ends. Mindless figures cannot be a host for Parallax.
ability_3_desc: All figures adjacent to the Parallax's host subtract 2 from their defense, down to a minimum of 1.

name: Harley Quinn
ability_1_desc: Love makes us do crazy things. And for the bubbly and psychotic Harley Quinn, that includes dressing in costume, becoming a super-villain, carrying gag-themed weaponry, and murdering countless civilians—all just to put a smile on her puddin's face.
ability_2_desc: Before her descent into madness, Dr. Harleen Quinzel was a promising psychiatrist assigned to Arkham Asylum, Gotham's home for the criminally insane. But after meeting the Joker, the young doctor became obsessed with the crazed criminal's warped mind. Sensing opportunity, the Joker manipulated her, driving his therapist so mad that he was able to control her. Harleen fell in love with the villain, broke him out of Arkham and devoted her life to making him happy and spreading his bloody brand of mayhem.
ability_3_desc: Athletic, agile and dangerously unpredictable in a fight, Harley Quinn is a formidable opponent in her own right. She is willing to do anything in order to further the Clown Prince of Crime's goals—no matter the cost to anyone else or even herself. Her energetic, affable and animated personality is enough to make almost anyone drop their guard—a mistake that could easily cost them their life. Deranged and psychotic, Harley Quinn is the poster girl for chaos' terrifying allure.

name: Aquaman
ability_1_desc: Aquaman does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. If Aquaman starts his turn on a water space, add 3 to his movement for that turn.
ability_2_desc: At any point during Aquaman's move he may move 1 space that ignores elevations. Outside of his turn Aquaman may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_3_desc: If Aquaman is standing on a water space you may add 2 dice to his attack and 2 dice to his defense.
ability_4_desc: When defending against any attack with the word Fire, Flame, or Heat in it's title Aquaman may roll 3 extra defense dice.

name: Lockjaw
ability_1_desc: Lockjaw can teleport himself, and those in nearby proximity, to anywhere he desires. He is also able to teleport between dimensions across time, and through barriers that others might encounter problems with. Energy barriers that are seemingly impenetrable to others seem to pose no problem to him. Lockjaw can also track beings he knows, even across inter-dimensional space just by picking up on their odor.
ability_2_desc: Lockjaw seemingly has 'super-canine' strength in his jaw for a dog his age and size. His jaws are able to grab and hold up to 90 tons. At one time, he locked on to the Thing's arm and the Thing could not get him to let go. In addition, Lockjaw's teeth are similarly strengthened, whereas normal dogs can chew on bone and organic material, Lockjaw can do the same with metal and other types of inorganic materials. Apparently Lockjaws digestive system is capable of digesting pretty much anything, from normal food to metal and even parts of robots.

name: Frost Giant
ability_1_title: Ice Axe Sweeping Blow Special Attack
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected. A Frost Giant cannot be affected by his own Sweeping Blow.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Frost Giant, if it is on a snow or ice space, or adjacent to a glacier, remove one wound marker from it's card.
ability_3_desc: Double all wounds that a Frost Giant sustains from any Special Ability with the word Fire or Flame in its title. This also includes wounds from burning wreckage and lava fields.

name: BATMOBILE
ability_1_desc: Operators: Only Batman, Robin, or Batgirl can operate the Batmobile. Occupants: Only two figures may occupy the Batmobile at a time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When the Batmobile attacks with its normal attack it may attack 1 additional time.
ability_4_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. For each skull rolled when attacking with Missile Special Attack, the target subtracts one from its defense dice. The Batmobile can only attack non-adjacent targets with this special attack.

name: Incredible Hulk
ability_1_desc: Dr. Banner is a scientist who was working on a gamma bomb project when he noticed a teenager out on the test range. Although he rushed out into the test site and heroically pushed the boy into a protective trench to save him from the blast, Bruce was unfortunately exposed to extreme amounts of gamma radiation. This high exposure to gamma radiation changed Banner's cell structure. Now, when Bruce is angered, his DNA rapidly mutates him into a hulking green creature that calls itself the Hulk.
ability_2_desc: The Hulk possesses an incredible level of superhuman physical ability. His capacity for physical strength is potentially limitless due to the fact that the Hulk's strength increases proportionally with his level of great emotional stress, anger in particular.
ability_3_desc: The Hulk can use his superhumanly strong leg muscles to leap great distances. The Hulk has been known to cover hundreds of miles in a single bound and once leaped almost into orbit around the Earth.
ability_4_desc: The Hulk can also slam his hands together creating a shock wave, this shock wave can deafen people, send objects flying and extinguish fires. His thunderclap has been compared to hurricanes and sonic booms.

name: Ant-Man (Hank Pym)
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Ant-Man, if Giant-Man is currently on the battlefield replace the Giant-Man figure with the Ant-Man figure, choosing one of the two spaces vacated by Giant-Man. Any wounds on Giant-Man's card remain on his card. If Giant-Man is destroyed Ant-Man is destroyed as well.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice 1 shield will block all damage. If Ant-Man takes no damage from the attack, you may immediately move him 2 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Figures attacked by Ant-Man cannot roll defense dice.
ability_4_desc: After taking a turn with Ant-Man you may roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull all opponent's figures adjacent to Ant-Man receive 1 point of unblockable damage.

name: Batman
ability_1_title: Scientific Knowledge, Detective Skills, and Athletic Prowess
ability_1_desc: Batman has no inherent superhuman powers. To compensate for this he relies on 'his own scientific knowledge, detective skills, and athletic prowess.
ability_2_desc: In the stories Batman is regarded as one of the world's greatest detectives; if not the world's greatest crime solver. Superman describes Batman as 'the most dangerous man on Earth,' able to defeat a team of superpowered aliens by himself in order to rescue his imprisoned teammates. He has spent a significant portion of his life traveling the world and acquiring the skills needed to aid in his crusade against crime. His knowledge and expertise in almost every discipline known to man is nearly unparalleled by any other character in the DC universe. He is also a master of disguise, often gathering information under the identity of Matches Malone, a notorious gangster.
ability_3_desc: Additionally, the Batman has been repeatedly described as one of the greatest martial artists in the DC Universe, his skills in hand-to-hand combat are said to rival such notable martial artists as Lady Shiva, Bronze Tiger, and Richard Dragon.
ability_4_desc: His batsuit also aids in his combat against enemies, having the properties of both Kevlar and Nomex. It protects him from gunfire and other significant impacts.

name: Kilowog
ability_1_desc: As a Green Lantern, Kilowog possesses the same power ring and power battery used by all GLs. The Great Power Battery, located on Oa, is the repository for billions of years' worth of willpower in energy form. This energy has been harnessed and focused by the Guardians and is tapped by each GL's power battery. This in turns feeds it to their individual power rings. By applying willpower and concentration, the ring is literally able to accomplish anything of which the wielder can conceive, and is therefore as limited or limitless in abilities as the wielder. In Kilowog's case, he has shown an affinity for creating astoundingly complex machinery using the ring. In terms of combat, Kilowog tends to eschew the "giant boxing glove" fighting style of Hal Jordan and mainly uses his ring to fly and to absorb any enemy's attacks long enough for him to get close enough to batter them into unconsciousness.
ability_2_desc: In addition to his power ring, Kilowog possesses the natural super strength and durability of his species, as well as a powerful intellect that surpasses many of his fellow corpsmen. Under mind control, Kilowog even managed to combine all of these abilities to easily hold his own against Superman.

name: The Thing
ability_1_desc: One of Ben's remarkable qualities is his indomitable will, or extreme willpower. Whatever obstacles may come, he would try until he overcomes them or dies. In fact, during his fight with the Champion of the universe, despite suffering severe injuries, he kept coming back, making the Champion remark that while he could break every bone in Ben's body, he could never defeat him, as he could never break Ben's spirit, and forfeited the fight so that he wouldn't be forced to hurt Ben anymore.
ability_2_desc: The Thing's mutated physiology grants him tremendous superhuman strength and durability, the levels varying with his different forms. There have been periods where Ben could assume human form at will; however, these situations seldom last long. He also has enhanced stamina and lung capacity, and increased resistance to sensory and temperature extremes. His reflexes are above-average by human standards despite his immense mass, and he retains a reasonable level of agility and dexterity.
ability_3_desc: He is uniquely gifted in the art of hand-to-hand combat (a skill Ben honed long before he became the Thing), though his fighting style tends to be a rather loose brawling technique all his own.

name: Big Barda
ability_1_desc: Big Barda may force figures that are within 4 clear sight spaces of Big Barda when they start their turn to subtract 3 from their movement.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, instead of moving Big Barda normally, you may choose any empty space within 8 spaces of Big Barda. You may also choose a Tiny, Small, or Medium figure that is within 3 clear sight spaces of Big Barda. Place Big Barda on the chosen space and place the chosen figure on any empty space adjacent to her. Figures moved with Mega-Rod Teleport never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Big Barda attacks with her Mega-Rod Special Attack, she may attack 1 additional time.

name: Black Widow
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, each shield rolled counts for one additional block. If Black Widow takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move her 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Black Widow attacks with her normal attack she may attack 1 additional time.
ability_3_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. When Black Widow attacks with her Widow's Bite Special Attack she may attack 2 additional times.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Captain America add 1 extra die to their normal attack and defense.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, Captain America always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields (including his 1 automatic shield) count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_4_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Captain America attacks with his Shield Throw Special Attack he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure or ITF more than once. Captain America may target and attack non-adjacent figures or ITFs, even if he is engaged.

name: Black Canary
ability_1_desc: When defending with Black Canary, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_2_desc: Black Canary receives 1 automatic skull when she attacks with her normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Range Special. Attack 8. Choose a row of spaces in a straight line from Black Canary and roll 8 attack dice. The range of the attack equals the number of skulls rolled. All figures and ITFs in those spaces are affected. Subtract 1 skull for each space beyond the first. If the range carries the attack into a level 5 or higher wall the attack will end.

name: Batmobile
ability_1_desc: If there are any usage restrictions as to who can operate the vehicle it will be listed on the vehicle's card.
ability_2_desc: Order markers cannot be placed on a Machine card. They are placed on the card of any occupant instead.
ability_3_desc: If all possible operators are destroyed the vehicle is deactivated and becomes an ITF based on it's Length.
ability_4_desc: If the vehicle is destroyed immediately place wreckage in the spaces that it occupied and place all occupants in any adjacent space(s).

name: Catwoman
ability_1_desc: At any point during Catwoman's move she may move 1 space that ignores elevations. It costs her 3 points of movement to do this. Outside of her turn Catwoman may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Catwoman rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Catwoman may take from this attack is one. If Catwoman takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move her 2 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. Catwoman can only attack figures with her Whip Special Attack whose base is not higher or lower than 4 levels from her base, and are within 3 clear sight spaces of her. When Catwoman attacks with her Whip Special Attack she may attack 1 additional time.

name: Scarlet Witch
ability_1_desc: Born at the Wundagore base of the High Evolutionary, Wanda and her twin brother Pietro (Quicksilver) are the children of Erik Lehnsherr (Magneto). They both were eventually placed in the care of a Romani couple named Django and Marya Maximoff from whom they were separated as teens when their encampment was attacked. They were later recruited into Magneto's Brotherhood of Evil Mutants and, as the Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver, fought the X-Men on several occasions. At the time, none of the three were aware of the siblings' paternity.
ability_2_desc: They soon abandoned their terrorist activities and joined the Avengers. The remaining founding members had all gone on a leave of absence, leaving Captain America to lead an all-new lineup including Wanda, Pietro, and the archer known as Hawkeye. Although she became more adept in her power's use, Wanda did not realize that she was tapping into genuine magic. It was believed that the Scarlet Witch would have been an ordinary energy manipulator or perhaps simply able to cause bad luck if not due to Chthon's attempt to use her as a pawn.
ability_3_desc: Wanda fell in love with the synthezoid Vision, an artificial being who joined the Avengers rather than fight them. The Scarlet Witch eventually married her teammate, the android Vision, not realizing that they were being manipulated by Immortus, who sought to prevent Wanda from having a child (Wanda was actually a key figure, or nexus being, to her reality, and her children would have power to shake the foundations of the universe).
ability_4_desc: The Scarlet Witch seemingly gains powerful reality-altering abilities from "Chaos Magic"; however, this proves to be an uncontrolled aspect of her mutant power and creates a great mental strain on her. Regardless, as both a mutant and a sorceress, Wanda's reality-altering powers and devastating hex bolts make her a formidable opponent.

name: Crossbones
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: When Crossbones attacks an adjacent figure with his normal attack, subtract 1 die from their defense and add 1 automatic skull to Crossbones' attack roll.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 4. Choose a space to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. All figures or ITFs in or adjacent to the chosen space are also affected. Crossbones can be affected by his own attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures.

name: Green Lantern Corps Soldiers
