ability_1_desc: If you control an Unique Green Lantern, and after revealing an order marker on that Unique Green Lantern's card and taking a turn with that Unique Green Lantern, you may take a turn with the Green Lantern Corps Soldiers.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 Green Battery markers on this card for every squad of Green Lantern Corps Soldiers that you control.
ability_3_title: Power: Green Lantern Corps Protective Shielding
ability_3_desc: After rolling defense dice for any Green Lantern Corps Soldier each Green Battery marker that you remove from this card will add 1 automatic shield to the total.

name: The Shadow
ability_1_desc:
Any figure temporarily controlled by another figure will act independently, any bonding the controlled figure might have with any other figure(s) is negated for the turn. If a squad figure is temporarily taken over only that one single figure, not the rest of the squad, is controlled.

Mindless figures and Machines cannot be mind controlled.

If a controlled figure is moved into a space, or takes an action, that would potentially cause that figure harm on that turn, it gets a chance to avoid taking the action. (This includes moving into Lava, jumping off of buildings, destroying an adjacent ITF that explodes, hitting a character with counter strike, etc.) To avoid completing the harmful move or action the player that originally owns the controlled figure rolls the 20-sided die. If a Hero figure rolls a 6 or higher it automatically breaks the control and the chosen figure returns to the player who controlled the figure before being controlled. A single squad figure, or a Dimwitted figure, needs to roll a 12 or higher to break the control.

name: Doctor Strange
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 9 Mystic Power markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving Doctor Strange normally, remove a Mystic Power marker from this card and choose any empty space within 12 spaces of Doctor Strange. Place Doctor Strange on the chosen space. Doctor Strange never takes any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Astral Plane.
ability_3_desc: After rolling defense dice for Doctor Strange each Mystic Power marker that you remove from this card will add 2 automatic shields to the total.
ability_4_title: Magic: Eye of Agamatto Special Attack
ability_4_desc: Range 4. Attack 6. Once per turn, after Doctor Strange attacks with his Magic: Eye of Agamotto Special Attack, he may remove a Mystic Power marker and attack one additional time.

name: Cyborg
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 5. Choose a row of spaces in a straight line from Cyborg and roll 5 attack dice. The range of the attack equals the number of skulls rolled. All figures and ITFs in those spaces are affected. Subtract 1 skull for each space beyond the first. If the range carries the attack into a level 5 or higher wall the attack will end.
ability_2_desc: When Cyborg attacks with his normal attack he receives 1 extra attack die for each unrevealed order marker on the defending figure's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Cyborg, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher remove one wound marker from Cyborg's card.

name: Huntress
ability_1_desc: At any point during Huntress' move she may move 1 space that ignores elevations. Outside of her turn Huntress may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, each shield rolled counts for one additional block. If Huntress takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move her 1 space.
ability_3_desc: When Huntress attacks a figure with her normal attack, subtract 1 die from their defense and add 1 automatic skull to Huntress' attack roll.

name: Hawkgirl
ability_1_desc: When defending with Hawkgirl each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_2_desc: If Hawkgirl flies during her move, and after taking a turn with Hawkgirl, she may fly an additional 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Opponent's figures within 6 spaces of Hawkgirl must double the Power marker cost for all Special Abilities with the word Magic: in its title.
ability_4_title: Asset - Nth Metal Mace Magic Shielding
ability_4_desc: When defending against any Special Attack with the word Magic: in its title Hawkgirl may roll 3 extra defense dice.

name: Cosmic Cube
ability_1_desc: The Cosmic Cube is an item that controls matter and energy, answering to the will of the sentient beings that use them. They require practice to be used properly, but a skillful user can alter all reality to answer to its thought, granting anything they desire. Most Cosmic Cubes are cube-shaped matrices. However, similar objects with different shapes are known as Cosmic Containment Units. Sentient beings wanting to create a Cosmic Cube must generate a force field to open a rift to another dimension inhabited by the Beyonders, allowing the extra-dimensional energy to filter through the rift. When entering the Earth's dimension, the energies can be held in a matrix, and the force itself would shape the matrix into a perfect cube. It would also provide the Cube with its almost-unlimited power. A Cube would eventually develop its own intelligence, commonly influenced by the beings who had manipulated it. Mephisto has postulated that the Cubes are hosts to a semi-sentient will and that, even in Cube form, they can choose how they want to be used, and deny certain wishes. Mephisto also has proposed that a billion-sentient universally-linked will could overcome this problem, and that the Cubes could be as powerful as the Infinity Gems. Other types of Comsmic Cubes can be created by other meanings, but are extremely less powerful. The Cube Cosmic was classified by the Initiative as an Omega Class Weapon, with the Tactigon possibly at its level.
ability_2_desc: Most Cosmic Cubes are cube-shaped matrices. However, similar objects with different shapes are known as Cosmic Containment Units.
ability_3_desc: Sentient beings wanting to create a Cosmic Cube must generate a force field to open a rift to another dimension inhabited by the Beyonders, allowing the extra-dimensional energy to filter through the rift. When entering the Earth's dimension, the energies can be held in a matrix, and the force itself would shape the matrix into a perfect cube. It would also provide the Cube with its almost-unlimited power.
ability_4_desc: A Cube would eventually develop its own intelligence, commonly influenced by the beings who had manipulated it. Mephisto has postulated that the Cubes are hosts to a semi-sentient will and that, even in Cube form, they can choose how they want to be used, and deny certain wishes. Mephisto also has proposed that a billion-sentient universally-linked will could overcome this problem, and that the Cubes could be as powerful as the Infinity Gems.

name: Fin Fang Foom
ability_1_desc: When Fin Fang Foom attacks he may attack 1 additional time. He cannot attack the same figure or ITF more than once.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different tiny, small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Fin Fang Foom. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll an 8 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 16 or higher, give the chosen Hero 3 wounds.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Fin Fang Foom, remove 1 wound marker from Fin Fang Foom's card.
ability_4_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Fin Fang Foom.

name: Hawkeye
ability_1_desc: At any point during Hawkeye's move he may move 1 space that ignores elevations. Outside of his turn Hawkeye may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: If Hawkeye does not move during his turn, and he attacks a non-adjacent figure or ITF with his normal attack, all blanks count as skulls.
ability_3_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. Choose a space to target. Hawkeye must have clear line of sight to the chosen space. All figures or ITFs in or adjacent to the chosen space are also affected. Hawkeye can be affected by his own attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures.

name: Hydra Soldiers
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with the HYDRA Soldiers, you may take a turn with any Mastermind that you control.
ability_2_title: Cut Off A Limb, And Two More Shall Take Its Place!
ability_2_desc: Immediately after a HYDRA Soldier is destroyed roll the 20-sided die: • If you roll a 16 - 18 do not remove the destroyed HYDRA Soldier. • If you roll a 19 - 20 do not remove the destroyed HYDRA Soldier and, if possible, immediately place a previously destroyed HYDRA Soldier adjacent to that HYDRA Soldier. The newly placed HYDRA Soldier cannot be placed adjacent to any enemy figures.

name: Darkseid
ability_1_desc: Once per round, instead of moving Darkseid normally, you may choose any empty space that is within 10 spaces of Darkseid. Place Darkseid on the chosen space. When Darkseid starts to Teleport, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 8. Attack 5 (+2 auto). When Darkseid attacks with his Omega Beams Special Attack add 2 automatic skulls. Darkseid does not need clear line of sight to attack with Omega Beams Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Darkseid you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Darkseid. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher (12 or higher for a single squad or Dimwitted figure), take temporary control of, and immediately take a turn with that chosen figure. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen figure returns to its owner. Mindless figures cannot be Mind Controlled.
ability_4_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Darkseid.

name: Mole Machine
ability_1_desc: Operator: Only Mole Man can operate the Mole Machine.
ability_2_desc: After moving normally, and instead of attacking, you may place the Mole Machine on any empty space within 6 spaces. The Mole Machine cannot tunnel onto a Roof Top space, and it will not take any leaving engagement attacks when it tunnels.
ability_3_desc: When the Mole Machine attacks with it's normal attack it may attack 1 additional time.

name: MS. MARVEL
ability_1_desc: If Ms. Marvel does not attack this turn she may add 2 to her move number.
ability_2_desc: When Ms. Marvel attacks add 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on this card.
ability_3_desc: If Ms. Marvel is attacked roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher Ms. Marvel takes no damage from the attack.
ability_4_desc: Ms. Marvel is not affected by any Special Ability with the word Venom or Poison in its title.

name: Zabu
ability_1_desc: Zabu was born in the Savage Land. While still a cub, his mother and siblings were killed by human hunters. He wandered the Savage Land on his own, teaching himself how to survive as he grew to adulthood. Zabu encountered a young boy named Kevin Plunder as he was about to be attacked by a group of human Savage Land natives. Zabu saved Kevin, and the two became companions. Zabu protected the boy as he grew to adulthood, and eventually took on the name Ka-Zar, which means "son of the tiger." Zabu was brought to near-human intelligence due to exposure to radioactive mists.

name: Killer Croc
ability_1_desc: Killer Croc does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. If Killer Croc starts his turn on a water space, add 3 to his movement for that turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, Killer Croc always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Killer Croc, remove 1 wound marker from Killer Croc's card.
ability_4_desc: You can never place more than 2 order markers on Killer Croc's card, even if he is the last figure you control.

name: Lizard
ability_1_desc: Lizard does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.
ability_2_desc: At any point during Lizard's move he may move 1 space that ignores elevations. It costs him 3 points of movement to do this.
ability_3_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. Lizard can only attack figures with his Tail Whip Special Attack whose base is not higher or lower than 4 levels from his base, and are within 3 clear sight spaces of him. When Lizard attacks with his Tail Whip Special Attack he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_4_desc: After taking a turn with Lizard, remove 1 wound marker from Lizard's card.

name: Namor The Sub-Mariner
ability_1_desc: Namor does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. If Namor starts his turn on a water space, add 3 to his movement for that turn.
ability_2_desc: If Namor is standing on a water space you may add 2 dice to his attack and 2 dice to his defense.
ability_3_desc: When Namor destroys a figure or an ITF he must, if possible, immediately attack again. Namor must continue attacking until he does not destroy a figure or an ITF.
ability_4_desc: When Namor targets a female Human, you must subtract 2 from his attack.

name: Penguin
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with Penguin, you may take a turn with any Creature, Henchmen, or Robot that you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking you may roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull all figures adjacent to Penguin receive 1 point of unblockable damage.
ability_4_desc: When Penguin attacks with his normal attack he may attack 1 additional time.

name: Magneto
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, Magneto always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and instead of taking a turn with Magneto, you may place his Magnetic Energy Field on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Magneto and take a turn with it. Magneto's Magnetic Energy Field can remotely do everything that Magneto can do, and acts, for all game purposes, just like him. At the end of Magneto's turn return the Magnetic Energy Field to this card. A carried ITF must immediately be either dropped, or placed, centered on the Magnetic Energy Field's location at the end of the turn. Magneto can choose the exact placement of any multi-space object.
ability_3_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Magneto.

name: Terror Vines
ability_1_desc: The Terror Vines are giant vines actually made up from numerous plants, all under the mental control of Poison Ivy. Poison Ivy can control these plants with her mind and is able to manipulate and animate them, using them to move along the ground and entangle and attack her enemies. Poison Ivy has a special relationship with plants. She treats them as if they were her children and they respond to her will and command. Her expertise as a biochemist has allowed her to develop mutant plants and to create and bring to life plants that were long thought to be extinct. Since her death and rebirth, Ivy's command over plant life has increased to the point where she can literally grow giant animated plants from seedlings in a matter of seconds. She has incorporated living vines into her costume which she can utilize as powerful extra limbs when in combat. A recent impressive use of her power is to channel her consciousness into plant material even at great distances, growing and animating it into a formidable plant avatar under her control. She can hear and speak through the avatar as well as act physically through it. This power was demonstrated when she captured and interrogated Zatanna in her own home by growing a plant avatar from the cut roses inside the house, even though Ivy herself was elsewhere in the city.
ability_2_desc: Poison Ivy has a special relationship with plants. She treats them as if they were her children and they respond to her will and command. Her expertise as a biochemist has allowed her to develop mutant plants and to create and bring to life plants that were long thought to be extinct.
ability_3_desc: Since her death and rebirth, Ivy's command over plant life has increased to the point where she can literally grow giant animated plants from seedlings in a matter of seconds. She has incorporated living vines into her costume which she can utilize as powerful extra limbs when in combat.
ability_4_desc: A recent impressive use of her power is to channel her consciousness into plant material even at great distances, growing and animating it into a formidable plant avatar under her control. She can hear and speak through the avatar as well as act physically through it. This power was demonstrated when she captured and interrogated Zatanna in her own home by growing a plant avatar from the cut roses inside the house, even though Ivy herself was elsewhere in the city.

name: Triplicate Girl, Duo Damsel, Una
ability_1_desc: Luornu Durgo was born on Cargg, a planet with three suns, which grants its Carggite inhabitants the ability to split themselves into three identical bodies.
ability_2_desc: In all of her forms, Luornu has mastered a specialized Carggite form of martial arts called Trijitsu, which was developed by her people to take full advantage of three forms fighting simultaneously. Lournu can fight like a virtual army acting in concert, making her a truly formidable opponent.

name: Power Girl
ability_1_desc: If Power Girl does not attack this turn she may add 4 to her move number.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense Power Girl always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When attacking with Power Girl's Heat Vision Special Attack all blanks count as skulls.
ability_4_desc: Any attack that has the word Magic in its title, or is from a Kryptonian, negates Power Girl's No One Calls Me Fragile Special Ability.

name: MANTRIPOD
ability_1_desc: In order to draft a Mantripod into your army you must first draft Black Manta.
ability_2_desc: The main saucer of the Mantripod is always centered over a single space. When counting spaces for movement, count from this center space. During movement the Mantripod is considered a 1 space figure for all purposes. After moving, the Mantripod's legs must be placed on three opposing, empty, same level spaces, centered on the middle space. When a Mantripod is destroyed place wreckage in the three spaces it's legs occupied.
ability_3_desc: When attacking count range from the center space of the Mantripod. You may determine line of sight from any edge of the Mantripod's saucer.
ability_4_desc: Range 8. Attack 5. When the Mantripod attacks with it's Optic Ray Special Attack, all blanks count as skulls.

name: MERA
ability_1_desc: Mera does not have to stop her movement when entering a water space. If, at any point during Mera's movement, she enters a water space Mera temporarily gains the special ability Flying for the rest of her turn.
ability_2_desc: If Mera is standing on a water space you may add 2 dice to her attack and 2 dice to her defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice for Mera, as well as any figures that you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Mera, you may re-roll any dice that show a Skull once.
ability_4_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When using Magic: Aquakinesis Special Attack, if Mera is standing on a water space you may roll 6 attack dice instead of 4.

name: Punisher
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_2_desc: Punisher receives 1 automatic skull when he attacks an adjacent figure with his normal attack.
ability_3_desc: When attacking an non-adjacent figure with his normal attack, subtract one from the targeted figures defense dice for each skull rolled.
ability_4_desc: Range 10. Attack 4. When attacking with his Sniper Rifle Special Attack, if Punisher does not move during his turn all blanks count as skulls.

name: Venom
ability_1_desc: The character Venom, is a Symbiote, a sentient alien, with a gooey, almost liquid-like form that requires a host, usually human, to bond with for its survival, as with real world symbiotes, and to whom it endows enhanced powers. When the Venom Symbiote bonds with a human, that new dual-life form refers to itself as Venom.
ability_2_desc: When bonded, Eddie/Venom speaks using the first person plural (we), signifying that Brock and the Symbiote are two separate entities joined together - although, on occasion, Eddie referred to it as 'My other and I'. They fought Spider-Man many times, and came close to winning on several occasions.
ability_3_desc: Venom seeks vengeance each night, upon all of those that his twisted consciousness deems to be worthy of punishment... even to the point of death.

name: Lex Luthor
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Lex Luthor, you may take a turn with one common squad that you control whose point cost is 100 points or lower.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any Human, unique hero adjacent to Lex Luthor. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, take permanent control of the chosen figure. You now control that hero. Remove any Order Markers on the chosen hero's card. If Lex Luthor is destroyed, you retain control of any previously taken over heroes.
ability_3_desc: If Lex Luthor receives one or more wounds from an attack, instead of giving Lex Luthor those wounds you may destroy a figure from a common squad that you control whose point cost is 100 points or lower. The destroyed figure must be within 5 clear sight spaces of Lex Luthor.
ability_4_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Lex Luthor.

name: Mister Fantastic
ability_1_desc: After moving, and before attacking, choose an opponents' figure that is within 6 clear sight spaces of Mister Fantastic. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher all of that figure's special powers are negated until the end of Mister Fantastic's turn. In addition, if you roll a 20, inflict 1 wound to that figure.
ability_2_desc: Mister Fantastic ignores elevations when counting spaces for movement. Outside of his turn he may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When attacking with his Stretch Special Attack Mister Fantastic may target any figure or ITF within 6 spaces of him, regardless of it's vertical elevation. He does not need clear line of sight to his target and he may attack distant figures or ITFs even if he is engaged.
ability_4_desc: When rolling against figures leaving an engagement with him a figure may not leave engagement with Mister Fantastic if he rolls a skull.

name: Sentinel
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Sentinels card, and instead of taking a turn with this Sentinel, you may take a turn with any other Sentinel that you control.
ability_2_desc: After this Sentinel attacks a Mutant figure you may immediately move up to three other Sentinels that you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_3_desc: This Sentinel receives 2 extra attack dice when it attacks a Mutant figure.
ability_4_desc: When this Sentinel is destroyed immediately place wreckage in the two spaces that it occupied.

name: Mole Man
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Mole Man, you may first take a turn with one Subterranean Hero or Squad that you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving, and before attacking, choose an opponents' figure that is within 3 clear sight spaces of Mole Man. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher all of that figure's special powers are negated until the end of Mole Man's turn. In addition, if you roll a 20, inflict 1 wound to that figure.
ability_3_desc: After attacking normally you may place Mole Man on any empty space within 4 spaces. Mole Man cannot tunnel onto a Roof Top space.
ability_4_desc: If Mole Man is attacked roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher Mole Man takes no damage from the attack.

name: Red Skull
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and instead of taking a turn with Red Skull, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero that you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking you may either: • Roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull all figures adjacent to Red Skull receive 1 point of unblockable damage. • Or choose one figure up to 3 clear sight spaces away. Roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull that figure receives 1 point of unblockable damage.
ability_3_desc: When Red Skull attacks with his normal attack he may attack 1 additional time.

name: Rocket Raccoon
ability_1_desc: When moving Rocket Raccoon may ignore height restrictions.
ability_2_desc: If Rocket Raccoon is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher Rocket Raccoon takes no damage from the attack.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Rocket Raccoon attacks with his Two Big Guns Special Attack, he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_4_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. For each skull rolled when attacking with One Bigger Gun Special Attack, the targeted figure subtracts one from its defense dice.

name: Quicksilver
ability_1_desc: Quicksilver can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Quicksilver may ignore height restrictions when moving and does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: If Quicksilver does not attack this turn he may add 3 to his move number.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Quicksilver rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Quicksilver may take from this attack is one. If Quicksilver takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move him 3 spaces.
ability_4_desc: When Quicksilver attacks he may attack up to a total of 3 times. Each of these attacks may come at any point before, during, or after his move, as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement.

name: Winter Solider
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: All Androids and Robots adjacent to Winter Solider subtract 2 from their defense, down to a minimum of 1.
ability_3_desc: Range 10. Attack 4. When attacking with his Sniper Rifle Special Attack, if Winter Solider does not move during his turn all blanks count as skulls.

name: Thor
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, Thor always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When Thor attacks with his Mjolnir Special Attack he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure or ITF more than once. Thor may target and attack non-adjacent figures or ITFs, even if he is engaged.
ability_3_desc: Range 2. Attack 3. All figures and ITFs within 2 spaces of Thor are affected by Lightning Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once. Each skull rolled counts for one additional hit. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Thor may only use this Special Attack once per round.

name: Scarlet Witch
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Chaos Power markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Scarlet Witch rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Scarlet Witch may take from this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: Scarlet Witch can remove a Chaos Power marker from this card to cause any or all of the just rolled dice (attack, defense or 20-sided) of any figure that is in her clear line of sight to be re-rolled.
ability_4_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When Scarlet Witch attacks with her Magic: Hex Bolts Special Attack she may attack 1 additional time.

name: Warriors of Minas Tirith
ability_1_desc: After all Warriors of Minas Tirith have attacked once, choose a Warrior of Minas Tirith that attacked this turn and attack 1 additional time.
ability_2_desc: Warriors of Minas Tirith roll one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with them.

name: The Trench
ability_1_desc: The Trench do not have to stop their movement when entering a water space. If a Trench figure starts its turn on a water space, add 2 to its movement for that turn.
ability_2_desc: When The Trench attack a figure subtract 1 die from their opponent's defense. If the opponent's figure is standing in water subtract 2 dice from their defense.
ability_3_desc: After any figure is destroyed you may move one Trench figure, as long as the chosen figure ends its move in any space the destroyed figure occupied. When moving using Our Food a Trench figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks and may add 4 to it's Move number.

name: Thanos
ability_1_desc: After moving, and before attacking, choose an opponents' figure that is within 6 clear sight spaces of Thanos. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher all of that figure's special powers are negated until the end of Thanos' turn. In addition, if you roll a 19 or a 20, inflict 2 wounds to that figure.
ability_2_desc: Whenever an opposing Unique Hero is destroyed immediately remove one wound marker from Thanos' card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Thanos, remove 1 wound marker from Thanos' card.
ability_4_desc: While Thanos is in play all Special Abilities with the word Healing in the title on all cards are negated.

name: Haradrim Cavalry
ability_1_desc: After attacking with a Haradrim Cavalier, if he did not use his full movement this turn, he may move a number of spaces equal to his remaining move.
ability_2_desc: Haradrim Cavalry are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Guardian Spirit
ability_1_desc: Whenever an enemy figure's attack wounds or destroys one or more non-undead Ullar figures you control, this Guardian Spirit may move towards that enemy figure up to its full move. If this Guardian Spirit is already adjacent to the enemy figure, it may attack that figure instead of moving.
ability_2_desc: Guardian Spirit can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. In addition, Guardian Spirit rolls no dice for moving down levels and the first 3 levels it moves up each turn do not cost additional movement.

name: Haldor the Viking Champion
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, the most wounds Haldor can take for that attack is one.
ability_2_desc: When Haldor is destroyed, you may place this figure on any unique Army Card. After a figure rolls defense dice against a normal attack, you may remove this figure from its Army Card to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.

name: Gurney Halleck
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, Gurney Halleck may declare one non-Atreides faction or Valhalla general his mortal enemy. For the remainder of the game, Gurney Halleck receives an additional attack die against members of the chosen faction or followers of the chosen general.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an attack from height, Gurney Halleck rolls an additional defense die.
ability_3_desc: When attacking, Gurney Halleck may reroll any blanks.

name: Sinestro
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Yellow Battery markers on this card. Add one to Sinestro's Move, Range, Attack and Defense numbers for each Yellow Battery marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Anytime Sinestro, or any friendly figure or ITF within 4 clear sight spaces of Sinestro is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally you may remove one Yellow Battery marker from this card and ignore that attack.
ability_3_desc: All opponents' figures adjacent to Sinestro subtract 2 from their defense, down to a minimum of 1.

name: Hand Ninjas
ability_1_desc: If a Hand Ninja is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to that Hand Ninja's attack.
ability_2_desc: If a Hand Ninja is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack that Hand Ninja with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Hand Ninjas can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Grok Riders
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on a the Grok Riders Army Card, before taking that the Grok Riders's turn, you may take a turn with any small, medium, or large Marro Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of any Marro Warlord you control, Grok Riders add 2 to their attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Marro Hive cannot rebirth Grok Riders with its Marro Rebirth special power.

name: Venom
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally Venom may Tendril Swing. Tendril Swing has a move of 4 and ignores elevations. Venom will not take any leaving engagement attacks when he uses Tendril Swing. Outside of his turn Venom may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When determining height advantage to an opposing figure, Venom may use the height of any terrain, object, or ITF that he is adjacent to.
ability_3_desc: If Venom is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, Venom takes no damage and may immediately move using his Tendril Swing Special Power.
ability_4_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense dice against this attack.

name: Gulog, The Stone Giant
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Select an adjacent figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this Mace Smash Special Attack. Each figure rolls defense dices separately.
ability_2_desc: Gulog, The Stone Giant is not affected by range attacks and range powers. You most be adjacent to Gulog, The Stone Giant to attack him.
ability_3_desc: Gulog, The Stone Giant never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Lyssa Drak
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Yellow Battery markers on this card. Add one to Lyssa Drak's Move, Range, Attack and Defense numbers for each Yellow Battery marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Anytime Lyssa Drak, or any friendly figure or ITF within 4 clear sight spaces of Lyssa Drak is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally you may remove one Yellow Battery marker from this card and ignore that attack.
ability_3_desc: After Lyssa Drak attacks place all dice that rolled a skull on this card.
ability_4_desc: Before making an attack, if there are any dice on this card you must remove them and subtract the same number of dice from your attack. Automatically add a skull for each die that you remove from this card.

name: Gzemixilak
ability_1_desc: Each time Gzemixilak destroys a figure, you may remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card. Gzemixilak cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: All skulls rolled during Gzemixilak's attack count double, and all defenders roll one less defensive die.
ability_3_desc: Gzemixilak and any other figures within 2 spaces of Gzemixilak are immune to special attacks.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for this unit's movement, ignore up to 3 levels of elevation change per hex. This unit may fly over water without stopping.

name: Hanako
ability_1_desc: When Hanako attacks a unit with no order markers on it's card or a unit with no unrevealed order markers on it's card, that unit can not roll defense dice.
ability_2_desc: If Hanako is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die for Parry. If you roll 1-14, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 15 or higher, the attack is blocked and all skulls are ignored
ability_3_desc: Hanako does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces. When Hanako starts her movement if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wonder Woman
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher you may look at one unrevealed order marker on any figures card within 3 clear sight spaces of Wonder Woman.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack from a non-adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Wonder Woman rolls one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with her. If Wonder Woman rolls 2 skulls the figure may not move.
ability_4_desc: Remove 1 wound marker from Wonder Woman's card at the beginning of each round that Wonder Woman is still in play, before order markers are placed.

name: The Hashashin Order
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium Unique Hero, A Hashashin Order figure always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: A Hashashin Order figure adds 1 to their attack dice when attacking a figure adjacent to at least one other Hashashin Order figure you control.
ability_3_desc: Hashashin Order figures can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Zatanna
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 6 Mystic Power markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: After rolling defense dice for Zantanna each Mystic Power marker that you remove from this card will add 2 automatic shields to the total.
ability_3_title: Magic: Elemental Forces Special Attack (Air, Earth, Fire, Ice and Water)
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Once per turn, after Zatanna attacks with her Magic: Elemental Forces Special Attack, she may remove a Mystic Power marker and attack one additional time.
ability_4_desc: Instead of attacking, Zatanna can remove a Mystic Power marker from this card to heal any figure within 3 spaces of her. Roll a die, if you roll a Blank remove 1 wound marker, a Shield remove 2, and a Skull remove 3. Zatanna may heal herself.

name: Creatures of the Deep
ability_1_desc: If you control Aquaman, Mera or Ocean Master, and start the game in deep, ocean water, add a copy of this card into your army.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on Aquaman, Mera or Ocean Master's card, and after taking a turn with Aquaman, Mera or Ocean Master, you may take a turn with a squad of Creatures of the Deep.
ability_3_desc: • Creatures of the Deep must start the game on a water space. • Creatures of the Deep cannot enter a non water space. • Creatures of the Deep figures may never enter or be placed on a Shallow Water space.

name: Havech Guardians
ability_1_desc: If Havech Guardians moved 6 or more spaces this turn add 2 to their attack roll.
ability_2_desc: Havech Guardians add 1 die to their defense roll for each enemy figure engaged with them.
ability_3_desc: Marro Hive cannot rebirth havech Guardians with its Marro Rebirth special power.

name: Hawthorne Champion
ability_1_desc: Any friendly knight that begins its turn adjacent to Hawthorne Champion may add 2 to its move and subtract 1 from its attack this turn.

name: Hardat Leadwood
ability_1_desc: All figures that you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Hardat Leadwood, will add 1 to their defense dice. The Protective Aura don't affect Hardat Leadwood.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, you may choose a wounded hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Hardat Leadwood. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove one wound marker from the chosen hero's Army Card. Hardat Leadwood can use his Healing Spell on himself.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Hardat Leadwood may double his height.

name: Hawkman
ability_1_desc: When Hawkman attacks, he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Hawkman's movement, ignore elevations. Hawkman may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Hawkman starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Harley Quinn
ability_1_desc: When Harley Quinn rolls defense dice against a normal attack, 1 shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any Unique Army Card you control. Any time you roll the 20-sided die for the chosen card, you may add or subtract 1 from your roll.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Popgun Special Attack. Harley Quinn only needs a clear line of sight to the chosen figure. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately. Harley Quinn may be effected by her own Popgun Special Attack.

name: Hawkeye
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Hawkeye, you may move Hawkeye up to 5 spaces. Hawkeye can attack up to 3 times with Arrow Flurry Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as Hawkeye is on a space where he could end his movement. Hawkeye cannot attack the same figure more than once on a single turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Hellhound Ravagers
ability_1_desc: Small and Medium figures with a point value of 100 or less cannot roll Defense dice against Hellhound Ravagers. Vicious Slaughter only affects figures that are engaged with 2 or more Hellhound Ravagers you control.

name: Havok
ability_1_desc: When Havok attacks a figure that is not adjacent, you may add 3 dice to Havok's attack. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack 4. All figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Havok are affected by Omni-Wave Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: Havok never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Daphne Blake
ability_1_desc: Friendly Scooby-Doo figures you control are never attacked with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, Daphne Blake may attempt to set a trap. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, place a Trap marker on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Daphne Blake.

name: Haya
ability_1_desc: If Haya is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to Haya's attack.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an order marker on Haya, after attacking a non-adjacent opponent's figure, if Haya did not inflict any wounds with that attack, you may immediately take a turn with one Ninja Hero or Squad you control. You can not use Feint Attack to take a turn with Haya.
ability_3_desc: Haya can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Heavy Mauler
ability_1_desc: If this Heavy Mauler is attacking a small or medium figure, this Heavy Mauler adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Heavy Mauler, if this Heavy Mauler did not attack this turn, until the next time you reveal an order marker, all Orc squad figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of this Heavy Mauler add 1 to their attack dice.
ability_3_desc: The Heavy Mauler is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: The Trench
ability_1_desc: The Trench follow the wielder of the Dead King's Scepter. The Trench are drawn to the leader of Atlantis and Aquaman believes the scepter doesn't hold mystical control over the Trench, but instead the Trench believe the wielder of this scepter is their leader.
ability_2_desc: The Trench all have razor sharp teeth and claws, the strongest of their ilk being capable of puncturing Aquaman's skin.
ability_3_desc: Their metabolism requires them to consume twenty to thirty times their own weight in food to survive.
ability_4_desc: Trenchers excrete a powerful neurotoxin in thier saliva which can cause mild paralysis, immobalizing or slowing down their target prey. It's even semi-effective on a Super-Atlantean like Aquaman.

name: Haradrim Archers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Haradrim Archers, you may move 4 Easterling Spearmen you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, add 1 attack die for every Easterling or Haradrim figure you control that is adjacent to the defending figure.

name: Havech Incinerators
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first take a turn with a Unique Marro Hero you control with a Tricky personality.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 3 + Special. A Havech Incinerator that does not attack normally may use Flamejet Special Attack. Choose 3 spaces in a straight line from the attacking Havech Incinerator. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Flamejet Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. If a figure is attacked twice in one turn by Flamejet Special Attack, it takes one unblockable wound. Lava Resistant figures are not affected by Flamejet Special Attack.

name: Lyssa Drak
ability_1_desc: Lyssa Drak recorded the success or failure of Sinestro Corps recruits in the Book of Parallax, a tome chained to her with yellow energy from Sinestro himself, which holds the stories of the greatest Sinestro Corpsmen and tells stories of Despotellis, Karu-Sil, and Bedovian.
ability_2_desc: Drak presided over the initiation of prospective Sinestro soldiers. Once physical training was complete and judged by Arkillo, recruits would have their yellow power ring drained and enter a Fear Lodge to face their fears. Success opened the Lodge; failure meant death by thirst, starvation, suffocation, or suicide.
ability_3_desc: Lyssa Drak has the ability to sense the feelings of others, as hinted when she introduced herself to Amon Sur.
ability_4_desc: As a member of the Sinestro Corps, Lyssa possessed a yellow power ring which allowed its wielder to create constructs in the form of whatever objects its bearer can imagine. The power rings also provide flight, force fields and communication.

name: KYRPTONITE
ability_1_desc: All Kryptonian figures that move, or start their turn, within 4 spaces of this equipment glyph cannot use any special abilities on their army card during their turn, and must subtract 4 from their Move, Attack, and Defense (down to a minimum of 1).

name: Catman
ability_1_desc: While moving, Catman may add 2 to his Move value. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Catman attacks with his Catarang Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: After rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, if Catman received any wounds from the attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher the attacking figure receives 1 wound.

name: Hellcat
ability_1_desc: Hellcat may climb up to 10 levels as normal movement.
ability_2_desc: When Hellcat attacks, she may attack a second time.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against any attack with 'Magic', 'Mystic', 'Psychic', or 'Mental' in the title, 1 shield blocks all damage or effects.
ability_4_desc: Instead of a normal move, Hellcat may use Grappling Line to travel up to 4 hexes, ignoring elevations and ascending or descending up to 20 levels.

name: TERROR VINES
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with the Terror Vines, you may take a turn with Poison Ivy. If Poison Ivy does not move, attack, or use her Venom or Pheromone Control during her turn, you may place a previously destroyed Terror Vine on any unoccupied space adjacent to Poison Ivy.
ability_2_desc: All opponents figures adjacent to a Terror Vine subtract 1 from their defense for each Terror Vine they are adjacent to, down to a minimum of 1.
ability_3_desc: If you control Poison Ivy and she receives one or more wounds from an attack, instead of giving Poison Ivy those wounds you may destroy a Terror Vine that you control. The destroyed Terror Vine must be within 4 clear sight spaces of Poison Ivy.

name: Cosmic Cube
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 8 Energy markers on this card. A figure holding the Cosmic Cube may use any Special Attack or ability listed on this card.
ability_2_desc: Once during any turn, a figure holding the Cosmic Cube can remove an Energy marker from this card to cause any or all of the just rolled dice (attack, defense or 20-sided) of any figure anywhere to be re-rolled. Afterwards add 1 wound to the figure holding the Cosmic Cube. Scientist and Mastermind figures may roll the 20-sided die. If they roll an 11 or higher they do not add a wound.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 8. A figure holding the Cosmic Cube must remove an Energy marker from this card to attack with Energy: Energy Bolt Special Attack. After attacking add 1 wound to the figure holding the Cosmic Cube.

name: High Elf Archers
ability_1_desc: High Elf Archers are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Haradrim Warriors
ability_1_desc: When a Haradrim Warrior rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Mysterio
ability_1_desc: If Mysterio is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 12 or higher, Mysterio takes no damage and may immediately be placed on an empty space within 10 spaces of his original space. When placing Mysterio with his Disappearing Act, he may not be placed adjacent to any other figures.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures within 2 spaces of Mysterio do not have any visible hit zones. Mysterio's Illusionary Aura does not affect Mysterio.

name: High Elf Spearmen
ability_1_desc: A High Elf Spearman may add 1 defense die and 1 attack die for each adjacent High Elf Spearman you control up to a maximum of +2 attack/defense dice, for the Phalanx power.

name: Heirloom of Annellintia
ability_1_desc: This is a cursed artifact item card.

name: Loki
ability_1_desc: Loki's natural talent for causing mischief and his skill as a sorcerer allowed him to manipulate others and cause chaos throughout Asgard and beyond.
ability_2_desc: Loki learned black magic from the Sorcerer Eldred, adding to his already formidable powers as a sorcerer.
ability_3_desc: Loki's schemes eventually came to include Earth itself, and he often fought with Earth's superhuman heroes to take their planet, and often Asgard itself. He first battled Thor on Earth in modern times. Loki then manipulated the Hulk into wreaking havoc using an illusion of dynamite on train tracks, while in astral form in an attempt to lure Thor to Earth, which inadvertently led to the formation of the Avengers as several other heroes came to meet the Hulk. Thor was one of the founding members of this superhuman team, and often led them in battle against his brother.

name: Doctor Fate
ability_1_desc: While Doctor Fate is unengaged, all Special Powers on the Army Cards of all opponents' unique hero figures within 2 spaces of Doctor Fate are negated. If Doctor Fate is engaged to at least one unique hero, his Helmet of Nabu Special Power only affects opponents' unique hero figures engaged with Doctor Fate.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Fate's movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Fate may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Doctor Fate starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hellsting Scorpion
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Start the game with 3 brown Negation Markers on this card. If this Hellsting Scorpion inflicts at least 1 wound with Hellsting Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1–16, nothing happens. If you roll 17-19, place a Negation Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated for the entire game. If you roll the 20, destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's squad figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to any Hellsting Scorpion may not move. Figures affected by the Hellclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: High Dune Scorpions
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by a High Dune Scorpion subtract 1 from their defense dice for each skull rolled, up to a maximum of -2 dice.
ability_2_desc: A High Dune Scorpion with height advantage may not roll more than 2 defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, High Dune Scorpions may double their height.

name: Thunder
ability_1_desc: If Thunder is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 2 from your roll for each wound marker on this card. If you roll a 6 or Higher, each shield rolled on her defense dice counts for one additional block.
ability_2_desc: When Thunder attacks, add 1 to her attack dice if, during her movement this turn, she moved to a space that is exactly 2 spaces from the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: If Thunder has not moved this round, she may not be moved by any special power on an opponent's Army Card.

name: Miriam Heink
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. You must place a wound on either Miriam or Mistell's Army Card to use this attack. You may continue to use Windblazier Special Attack as long as you continue to place wounds on either Army Card. This attack may be used after using Glory of Darkness.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Miriam Heink, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Miriam Heink's height or 3 levels below Miriam Heink's base, Miriam Heink may add 1 to her Range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: After destroying a figure with a normal attack, Miriam may move up to 4 spaces.
ability_4_desc: When Miriam is adjacent to Mistell, add 1 to the defense of both figures.

name: Hill Goliaths of Goldcrest
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Hill Goliaths of Goldcrest, all skulls rolled count as one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, when a Hill Goliath of Goldcrest you control would take one or more wounds, ignore those wounds.

name: Morbius
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, Morbius may attempt Hypnosis. To do this, choose a figure adjacent to Morbius and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, the chosen figure is hypnotized for the remainder of this turn. Hypnotized figures cannot roll any defense dice. Morbius cannot hypnotize Destructible Objects.
ability_2_desc: For each wound Morbius inflicts on a hypnotized human or mutant figure, you may remove one wound marker from this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Morbius' movement, ignore elevations. Morbius may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Morbius starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: High Dune Scorpions
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-4 nothing happens. If you roll a 5-16, figures attacked by a High Dune Scorpion subtract 1 from their defense. If you roll a 17 or higher, figures attacked by a High Dune Scorpion subtract 2 from their defense.
ability_2_desc: A High Dune Scorpion with height advantage may not roll more than 2 defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, High Dune Scorpions may double their height.

name: Vision
ability_1_desc: The Solar Jewel on the Vision's forehead absorbs ambient solar energy to provide the needed power for him to function, and he is also capable of discharging this energy as optic beams; with this, he can fire beams of infrared and microwave radiation with temperatures ranging from 500 to 30,000 degrees Fahrenheit. In extreme cases he can discharge this same power through the Solar Jewel itself which amplifies its destructive effects considerably, albeit at the cost of losing most of his resources.
ability_2_desc: The Vision also possesses the ability to manipulate his density, which at its lowest allows flight and a ghostly, phasing intangibility, and at its heaviest provides superhuman strength, immovability, and a diamond-hard near invulnerability. The Vision is capable of reaching a density ten times greater than that of depleted uranium.
ability_3_desc: The Vision often uses his ability to alter his density against foes, by phasing an intangible hand through them and then partially re-materializing it—a process he describes as "physical disruption." This effect typically causes great pain and results in incapacitation.
ability_4_desc: Being an artificial life-form/android of sorts, the Vision possesses multiple superhuman senses—as well as superhuman stamina, reflexes, speed, agility, and strength (even without being at high density). The Vision was trained in unarmed combat by Captain America, and is an expert in the combat use of his superhuman powers. The Vision is an expert on his own construction and repair, and is a highly skilled tactician and strategist.

name: Herr Schreck
ability_1_desc: When moving with the Zombies of Morindan, you may move Herr Schreck instead of one of the Zombies of Morindan.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If Herr Schreck's Crippling Shot Special Attack inflicts a wound on a Unique Hero, place a Crippled Marker on the wounded Hero's Army Card. Figures move one less space for each Crippled Marker on their Army Card.
ability_3_desc: If Herr Schreck destroys an opponent's small or medium figure with his normal attack, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Zombies of Morindan. Undead are not affected by Zombies Rise Again.

name: High Elf Wardens
ability_1_desc: If a High Elf Warden attacks a figure that is not an Elf you may add 1 die to the attack roll.
ability_2_desc: If an enemy figure moves in to a space adjacent to a High Elf Warden roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher you may roll one unblockable attack. If a Warden is attacked from an adjacent figure you may roll one additional defense die.

name: Hoth Trooper
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if another unit in this squad attacks the same target, add one attack die to the 2nd unit's attack.

name: Helwen
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Helwen's Army Card, after taking a turn with Helwen, you may choose any Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Helwen. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, take temporary control of the chosen Hero and immediately take a turn with that Hero. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to its previous owner. All Order Markers that were on the figure's Army Card will stay on the Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Helwen's movement, ignore elevations. Helwen may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Helwen starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: High Dune Scorpions
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1 - 4 nothing happens. If you roll a 5 - 16, figures attacked by a High Dune Scorpion subtract 1 from their defense. If you roll a 17 or higher, figures attacked by a High Dune Scorpion subtract 2 from their defense.
ability_2_desc: A High Dune Scorpion with height advantage may not roll more than 2 defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, High Dune Scorpions may double their height.

name: Zabu
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Zabu he receives 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When Zabu attacks with his normal attack he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_3_desc: When Zabu is destroyed, place this figure on Ka-Zar's Card. Zabu's Spirit adds 1 to Ka-Zar's normal attack.
ability_4_desc: Zabu can only be added to your army if you draft Ka-Zar.

name: Hogung Cide
ability_1_desc: Hogung Cide rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against Heroes whose point value is greater than his.
ability_2_desc: If Hogung Cide fails to destroy a figure with his normal attack, he cannot attack any other figure until his original target has been destroyed. If a figure is somehow removed from play without being destroyed, Hogung may target other figures again.

name: Hercules
ability_1_desc: All small, medium, or large opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Hercules may not move. Figures affected by Master Grappler cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or glyph.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Hercules and the chosen figure are also affected by this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally, Hercules may Leap. Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for his Leap movement, ignore elevations. He may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Hercules may not leap more than 20 levels up or down in a single leap. If he is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Holy Ones of Tethru
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Holy Ones of Tethru, you may first take a turn with up to 2 Cleric or Paladin Heroes you control. The chosen Heroes cannot attack during their turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Holy One of Tethru, add half of the defending figure's Attack value to that Holy One's Attack, rounding up.

name: Terrax the Tamer
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Terrax the Tamer and roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher move the chosen figure to any empty space within 3 spaces of the figure's original occupied space. Figures moved by Geokinesis do not take leaving engagement attacks but are considered to have fallen down from a level that is one level greater than their height.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 5 + Special. If Terrax the Tamer is unengaged he may attack with his Uneven Terrain Special Attack. If the targeted figure is within one space of a higher or lower level space add one additional attack die to Terrax's Uneven Terrain Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Terrax the Tamer's movement, ignore elevations. Terrax may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Terrax starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hill Giants
ability_1_desc: After choosing an opponent's small or medium figure to attack and before rolling attack dice, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or lower, that opponent may immediately move that figure one space. The attacking Hill Giant may not roll for leaving engagement attacks against that figure. If that figure leaves engagement with the attacking Hill Giant, that Hill Giant cannot attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: If a figure rolls defense dice against an attack from a Hill Giant and receives no wounds, you must, if possible, choose a figure adjacent to the defending figure to receive a wound. You cannot choose the attacking Hill Giant.

name: Hybrid Alphas
ability_1_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, the defending figure rolls one less defense die.
ability_2_desc: After destroying an opponent's adjacent figure, place that figure on this Army Card.

name: Huang Shen
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die five times. Each time you roll a 16 or higher, Huang Shen may attack an additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Huang Shen's movement, ignore elevations. Huang Shen may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Huang Shen starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hoplitron
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with a Hoplitron, you may choose one small or medium figure adjacent to that Hoplitron. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, move the chosen figure up to 1 space. Figures moved by Shield Push never take any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Shield Push can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Hoplitron Army Card, before taking that Hoplitron's turn, you may take a turn with one other Soulborg Hero you control with a Range of 1.

name: Hisoka
ability_1_desc: Before moving, Hisoka may target one opponent within 4 spaces. Roll a 20-sided die. On a roll of 13 or higher, move the target 2 spaces closer to Hisoka. If the target moves adjacent to Hisoka, they receive one automatic wound.
ability_2_desc: When Hisoka is attacked, roll a 20-sided die. On a roll of 14 or higher, he takes no damage and may move up to 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: If Hisoka destroys an enemy figure, he may take an immediate extra turn. He can only activate this ability once per round.

name: ICE
ability_1_desc: While Ice is on a water or ice space, that space and all same-level water spaces adjacent to Ice are considered normal ice spaces. Figures do not have to stop their movement on normal ice spaces.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to Ice's attack and defense when on a snow or ice space. Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Hjordis Muirgen
ability_1_desc: All opponents' figures within 2 spaces of Hjordis Muirgen roll 1 less attack die and 1 less defense die. Hjordis Muirgen does not need clear line of sight for Aria of Despair.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When Hjordis Muirgen attacks with Singing Sword Special Attack and inflicts a wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17-20, inflict an additional wound, and roll again. You may continue inflicting wounds in this manner until you no longer roll a 17-20.
ability_3_desc: When Hjordis Muirgen would receive enough wounds to be destroyed, she first moves 4 spaces and then begins to sing her Circle Singing Death Song. Roll an attack die once for each opponent's figure within 4 spaces of her. If you roll a skull, that figure receives a wound. If you roll a blank, that figure begins to sing Hjordis Muirgen's Circle Singing Death Song, continuing the process until no more blanks are rolled. Then destroy Hjordis Muirgen. Figures do not need clear line of sight for Circle Singing Death Song.

name: Dr Doofenshmirtz
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's small figure moves into engagement with Dr Doofenshmirtz, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, the turn ends.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving, Dr Doofenshmirtz may attempt to activate his Tri-Area Doominator. Choose a space. All figures within 3 spaces of the chosen space are affected by the Tri-Area Doominator. Dr Doofenshmirtz must be an affected figure. Clear sight is not needed. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, deal 2 damage to all affected figures. Subtract 1 from your roll if an opponent's Hero is adjacent to Dr Doofenshmirtz. Subtract 2 if an opponent's Agent figure is adjacent to Dr Doofenshmirtz. Subtract 5 if both are adjacent to him. If you roll 12 or lower, your opponent chooses a different space and all figures within 3 spaces of the chosen space take 2 damage. Dr Doofenshmirtz may use his Doominator once per game.

name: Incredible Hulk
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to Incredible Hulk are affected by Stomp. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. If Hulk moved with Super Leap this turn, he must attack with Stomp.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to Hulk's Attack for each Wound Marker on this card, up to a maximum of five extra dice for Rage Smash.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally, Hulk may move up to 10 spaces. When counting spaces for this movement, ignore elevations, terrain effects, figures, and obstacles. Hulk may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. Hulk will take passing swipes before leaping.

name: Hound of Tindalos
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, you may place a Quarry marker on the Army Card of an opponent's Unique Hero. When the Hound of Tindalos attacks that Hero, it rolls 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Before moving the Hound of Tindalos normally, you may choose any empty space that is within 4 spaces of it. Place the Hound of Tindalos on the chosen space. When the Hound starts to move with this special power, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Immediately after the last turn in a round is completed, if there are no other Order Markers on this card, you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card and take a turn with the Hound of Tindalos.

name: IKESHIA
ability_1_desc: Range 10. Attack 1. When you roll for this Long Distance Shoot Special Attack, blanks also counts as skulls.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. No clear line of sight is needed to do this Precise Shoot Special Attack.

name: Imladris Archers
ability_1_desc: An Imladris Archer you control may move 1 additional space, but that figure must end its movement adjacent to a friendly squad figure of Imladris.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with an Imladris Archer, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Innaria
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against any figure within attack range, count the number of spaces between Innaria and the figure she is attacking. Roll that many extra attack dice.

name: Hal Jordan
ability_1_desc: Hal Jordan is the most well-known Green Lantern. He was the first earthman ever inducted into the Green Lantern Corps, and has been heralded as possibly the greatest Green Lantern of all time. Hal is also a founding member of the Justice League of America. He has also been known as Parallax and the Spectre.
ability_2_desc: Hal Jordan was born in Coast City to Martin Jordan and Jessica Jordan, the middle of three children with older brother Jack and a younger brother Jim. As a young child, he idolized his father, a test pilot who worked for Ferris Aircraft. At a very young age, he had to face his greatest fears when his father died in a plane crash right before his eyes. Despite his family's wishes, he followed in his father's footsteps and eventually joined the United States Air Force on his 18th birthday – turning up that very morning outside the Armed Forces Career Center before it had even opened.
ability_3_desc: Many years later, a dying alien named Abin Sur, member of the Green Lantern Corps, crash-landed his ship in the Californian desert. Having selected a replacement officer for his position, the power ring chose Hal Jordan for his ability to overcome great fear. The ring and its abilities were explained to him, and he inherited the mantle of Green Lantern. Acting as a galactic police officer, it was his job to serve and protect all life in Sector 2814. He would soon learn that there were another 3599 Green Lanterns across the universe, all monitored and empowered by mystical creatures called the Guardians. Hal received training from some of the best the Corps had to offer, including drill sergeant Kilowog, and his mentor Sinestro. During his training, Hal learned that Sinestro has been subjugating his home planet, Korugar, through fear, using his ring. After Hal reported these acts to the Guardians and fellow Corps members, he battled Sinestro, and emerged victorious. Along with the rest of the Corps, he then testified against Sinestro at his trial. Expelled from the Corps and banished by the Guardians to the Antimatter Universe as punishment, Sinestro became a sworn enemy to the Corps and gained a new Qward power ring, exacting the start of his revenge.
ability_4_desc: As Green Lantern, Hal Jordan patrolled the galaxy and took on many missions in space. He continued to spend his time at home working at Ferris Aircraft, where he romantically pursued his boss, the lovely Carol Ferris. He would entrust his secrets to a young Eskimo lad who worked as his mechanic, Tom Kalmaku.

name: Hulkbuster
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 7. Choose any adjacent enemy figure to attack roll 7 attack dice for Power Punch Attack, any excess skulls count as unblockable hits.
ability_2_desc: Range 8, Attack 5. when Hulkbuster uses Photonic Blast he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Hulkbuster's movement, ignore elevations. Hulkbuster may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Hulkbuster starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hourman
ability_1_desc: Hourman adds 2 to his Move, Attack and Defense values and may attack twice during his turn. At the start of each round, before placing Order Markers you must roll the 20-sided die. Add the number of this round to the roll. If you roll 20 or higher, all special powers on this card are negated for the rest of this game.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Hourman may Stealth Leap with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap, ignore elevations. Hourman may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and leap over obstacles. Hourman may leap 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Hourman is engaged when he starts to leap, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Imladris Warriors
ability_1_desc: An Imladris Warrior you control may move 1 additional space, but that figure must end its movement adjacent to a friendly squad figure of Imladris.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Imperial Navy Trooper
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Imperial Navy Trooper, before taking a turn with this Imperial Navy Trooper, you may move 3 Stormtroopers you control up to 5 spaces each.

name: Icarus
ability_1_desc: When attacking, Icarus may subtract 2 from his Attack value. If he does, he may attack again.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a figure breaks engagement with Icarus, after that figure ends its movement, Icarus may immediately move up to 5 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Icarus' movement, ignore elevations. Icarus may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Icarus starts to fly, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: I.J.D. Drones
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with the I.J.D. Drones, if at least one opponent's figure is within 6 clear sight spaces of at least one I.J.D. Drone you control, you may immediately take a turn with one Warden Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 6 clear sight spaces of at least one I.J.D. Drone you control, all Guard and Warden figures you control with a Range number of 4 or more may add 1 to their range when attacking that figure.

name: Super Mario
ability_1_desc: Range 3 Special. Attack 5. Choose a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Super Mario whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of Super Mario to attack. If Super Mario's Jumping Special Attack destroys the figure, immediately replace the figure with Super Mario. If Super Mario doesn't destroy the figure, he receives 1 wound and must be placed on an empty space adjacent to the figure. If Super Mario can't be placed, destroy him.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, Super Mario may Jump. Jump has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Jump, ignore elevations of up to 5. Super Mario may jump over water without stopping, jump over figures without becoming engaged, and jump over obstacles such as ruins. After destroying a figure with his Jumping Special Attack, Super Mario may use Jump 5.
ability_3_desc: The most wounds Super Mario may take from an attack or special power is one. If Super Mario is destroyed and has no wounds on his Army Card, before removing his figure from the battlefield, place a wound on his Army Card, move him to any adjacent empty space, and he isn't destroyed. If Super Mario has any wounds on his Army Card, subtract 2 from his height and he is a small figure.

name: Ice Elemental
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with this Ice Elemental, you may take a turn with another Dauntless hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. An Ice Elemental may use this special attack 2 times in the same turn. It may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.
ability_3_desc: While an Ice Elemental is on a water or ice space, that space and all same-level water spaces adjacent to that Ice Elemental are considered normal ice spaces. Figures do not have to stop their movement on normal ice spaces.

name: IERIO THESH
ability_1_desc: Ierio Thesh subtracts 1 from his Attack and Defense value for every Army Card you control that does not follow Ozirael.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Ierio Thesh, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, place a wound marker on this Army Card and take another turn with him.
ability_3_desc: Whenever Ierio Thesh destroys a Unique figure, remove one wound marker from his card.

name: Hybrid
ability_1_desc: At any point before, during, or after movement, you may choose one opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Hybrid. All of the special powers on the chosen figure's army card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure) are negated until the end of Hybrid's turn. Hybrid can only use Exploit Weakness once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Hybrid always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: The first time each turn Hybrid is targeted with a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher, Hybrid no longer has any visible hit zone for the rest of the targeting figure's turn.

name: Ice Titan
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Attack 2. Ice Titan may attack up to 3 times, targeting the same or different figures within clear sight. If a figure is destroyed with Ice Bolts Special Attack, Ice Titan may place ice tiles in the space occupied by the destroyed figure if an ice tile can fit normally into that space. All ice tiles placed in this way count as heavy ice. Begin the game with up to 10 ice tiles on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Ice Titan may ignore the effects of heavy ice and heavy snow.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Ice Titan, you may remove one wound marker if Ice Titan is on a snow or ice space.

name: Imperial Dragonguards
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Imperial Dragonguards and before taking a turn with them, you may first take a turn with Zelrig if he is drafted in your army.
ability_2_desc: When Zelrig is within 2 clear sight spaces of an Imperial Dragonguard, figures attacked by that Imperial Dragonguard roll 1 less defense die, and that Imperial Dragonguard may re-roll all defense dice that did not show shields. Imperial Dragonguards may only re-roll defense dice once per figure per attack.

name: Gon Freecss
ability_1_desc: When Gon attacks, you may roll a 20-sided die. On a roll of 15 or higher, add +2 to his attack value for that turn.
