ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal attack, you may use Jajanken (Rock). Gon rolls an additional die (for a total of 4) for his attack, but if he rolls only 1 attack symbol, he takes 1 damage. This attack is considered a ranged attack with 1 hex range.
ability_3_desc: If Gon's life is reduced to 2 or fewer, he gains an extra movement of 2 for the rest of the game, and his attack value increases by +1
ability_4_desc: Once per round, you may activate Hunter's Intuition, which lets Gon move an extra space and choose an opponent's figure within 5 spaces. Gon can ignore that figure's defense when attacking, as his instinctual hunting abilities allow him to target weak points.

name: Human Torch
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose 4 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces that are within line of sight of Human Torch are affected by Nova Flame Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Human Torch is not affected by his Nova Flame Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Human Torch never rolls for molten lava or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Human Torch's movement, ignore elevations. Human Torch may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Human Torch starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Intellect Devourer
ability_1_desc: When taking a turn with an Intellect Devourer you may choose not to move or not to attack. If you do, you may instead respectively move or attack with a Mind Flayer you control.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a Mind Flayer you control uses a special attack you may choose an Intellect Devourer you control. If you do, the choosen Intellect Devourer is considered the attacker for all purposes of the attack.

name: Vision
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Intangible Vision, if Massive Vision is currently on the battlefield you must swap out the two figures and use the information on this card. When placing wounds on Vision, all wound markers are placed on his Massive card. If one form of Vision is destroyed, both forms are destroyed.
ability_2_desc: While Vision is Intangible he can move through all figures, ITFs and obstacles, and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Figures attacked by Phasing Hand Special Attack cannot roll defense dice. Phasing Hand Special Attack cannot be used against ITFs.
ability_4_desc: After drafting Vision into your army you automatically receive this card at no additional cost.

name: Iceman
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Iceman attacks with Ice Balls Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Iceman may Ice Slide with a move of 4. When counting spaces for Ice Slide, ignore elevations. Iceman may slide over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and slide over obstacles. Iceman may not slide more than 25 levels up or down in a single slide. If Iceman is engaged when he starts to slide, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as one space when moving.

name: Thal Sinestro
ability_1_desc: Sinestro was born on the planet Korugar in space sector 1417. His dedication to preserving order originally manifested in his previous career, an anthropologist specializing in reconstructions of ruins of long-dead civilizations. One day while he was on one such site, a Green Lantern named Prohl Gosgotha crash-landed into the site, injured and apparently dying. He quickly gave his ring to Sinestro, just in time for Sinestro, who barely even understood what the ring could do, to defend himself from the Lantern's pursuer: a Weaponer of Qward; however, Sinestro had to destroy the ruins he had spent time restoring in order to crush the Qwardian. Afterward, Gosgotha turned out to still be alive and asked for his ring back to keep him alive long enough to get help. Sinestro, knowing this would mean not being a Green Lantern himself, instead allowed him to die and took over his post. The Guardians were unaware of his actions.
ability_2_desc: His desire for order did well by him in the Corps, and initially led him to be considered one of the greatest Green Lanterns. As the years passed, he became more and more fixated upon not simply protecting his sector, but on preserving order in the society of his home planet no matter the cost. Eventually, he concluded that the best way to accomplish this was to conquer Korugar and rule the planet as a dictator.
ability_3_desc: When Hal Jordan joined the Green Lantern Corps, Sinestro was assigned to be his instructor. Jordan was horrified at his new mentor's totalitarian methods, though Sinestro maintained that his iron-fisted rule was necessary to protect his people from alien forces. During his training, Jordan helped Sinestro repel an attempted invasion of Korugar by the alien warlords known as the Khunds. When Jordan called for help from the other Green Lanterns, Sinestro's dictatorship was exposed and he was forced to appear before the Guardians for punishment.
ability_4_desc: For using the power of the Green Lantern to instill fear rather than combat it, the Guardians banished Sinestro to the antimatter universe, a counterpart to the "real" universe made up of "negative matter". Sinestro ended up on the Antimatter world of Qward, that universe's counterpart of the Guardians' homeworld Oa, which was ruled by a race of warriors and scientists known as the Weaponers of Qward, who bore a fierce hatred of the Guardians and all Green Lanterns. By exiling Sinestro to a world ruled by evil beings who specifically hated him as a Green Lantern, the Guardians hoped to humble him. However, their attempt at punishment would be a major miscalculation. Sinestro believed himself to have been wronged by his former masters and now hated them just as much as the Weaponers did. Through their mutual hatred of the Guardians, Sinestro and the Weaponers became allies, with the Weaponers offering to help Sinestro gain revenge on the Guardians and the Corps.

name: Iron Fist
ability_1_desc: When Iron Fist attacks with his normal attack, each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Iron Fist may attack all adjacent figures. Roll attack dice separately for each figure.
ability_3_desc: Iron Fist is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: IKON
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Any figure adjacent to Ikon is affected by Poleaxe Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.
ability_2_desc: At any point before, during, or after movement, you may choose one opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Ikon. All of the special powers on the chosen figure's army card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure) are negated until the end of Ikon's turn. Ikon can only use Exploit Weakness once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ikon's movement, ignore elevations. Ikon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ikon starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Iron Circle Pupil
ability_1_desc: When this Iron Circle Pupil attacks a small or medium common figure, if the amount of skulls rolled for this Iron Circle Pupil is equal to the amount of shields rolled for the defending figure, this Iron Circle Pupil may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When an Iron Circle Pupil is adjacent to another Gith Monk, add 2 additional dice when rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent.

name: INSECTAR GUARD
ability_1_desc: Each time an opponent's adjacent figure targets another figure you control with an attack or special power, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, deal 1 damage to the opponent's figure and ignore the attack or special power.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Insectar Guard's movement, ignore elevations. Insectar Guard may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Insectar Guard starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Inquisitors of Morindan
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. An Inquisitor of Morindan that does not move or attack normally may use Anointed Flintlock Special Attack. Undead, Wolves, Outsiders, Demons, or Lycanthropes attacked by Anointed Flintlock Special Attack subtract 1 from their defense die.
ability_2_desc: When an Inquisitor of Morindan wounds an adjacent figure with Anointed Flintlock Special Attack, that Inquisitor of Morindan may move up to 2 spaces and attack 1 additional time with its normal attack.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with the Inquisitors of Morindan, you may move a Hunter Hero you control up to 2 spaces for each Inquisitor of Morindan that attacked during that turn.

name: Iron Man
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 5. Iron Man can attack up to two times each turn with Repulsor Blast.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an attack, Iron Man always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Iron Man
ability_1_desc: When Iron Man attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Iron Man's movement, ignore elevations. Iron Man may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Iron Man starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Invincible
ability_1_desc: Opponent's figures adjacent to Invincible cannot roll for leaving engagement attacks against any figure leaving engagement except Invincible.
ability_2_desc: If a figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Invincible receives 2 or more wounds from a single attack, you may immediately place Invincible on any empty space within 2 spaces of the wounded figure. When Invincible moves with Reactive Support, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Invincible's movement, ignore elevations. Invincible may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Invincible starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Isildur, Son Of Elendil
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Isildur, you may place a wound marker on Isildur and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure with the One Ring ability, Isildur rolls 2 additional attack dice.

name: Iron Fist
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Iron Fist, you may add 2 to either the Move value or Attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Iron Fist and the chosen figure are also affected by Iron Fist Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Iron Fist Special Attack may cause knockback.
ability_3_desc: Before moving, you may choose either Iron Fist or a wounded Hero figure adjacent to Iron Fist and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove one wound marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Ishehdulog Hopper
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, before taking a turn with the Swamp Patrol, you may move an ishehdulog hero you control up to 6 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Figures on swamp of swamp water spaces subtract 1 from their defense when attacked by non-adjacent Ishehdulite Patrols.

name: Iron Man
ability_1_desc: When Iron Man attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Iron Man's movement, ignore elevations. Iron Man may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Iron Man starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Iron Prowler
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess sheilds count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Iron Prowler's movement, ignore elevations. This Iron Prowler may fly over water spaces without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Iron Prowler starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagements attacks.

name: Jackalope
ability_1_desc: After a Jackalope rolls defense dice, that Jackalope has no hit zones until the next time an order marker is revealed.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Heirloom of Annellintia
ability_1_desc: While carrying the Heirloom of Annellintia, the bearer is protected against curses like Lycanthropy, Chilling Touch, Life Drain, Soul Devour, and Mind Shackle. If targeted by these powers, you must counter-roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 4 or higher, the figure is safe. If you roll a 1-3, place a black Affliction Marker on the figure's Army Card. While Afflicted, the figure cannot use Special Abilities or defend against attacks. Each time you take a turn, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, remove the Affliction Marker. Keep this card handy as a reference for the Heirloom of Annellintia's power.

name: Invisible Woman
ability_1_desc: Any time a friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Invisible Woman rolls defense dice, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, that figure rolls 3 additional dice.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a friendly small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Invisible Woman. Place the chosen figure on any space within 2 clear sight spaces of her. Figures moved by Force Field Transport never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Invisible Woman may ignore all effects from terrain tiles she moves onto or occupies. At any point before, during, or after her movement, she may move one additional space. That space may be up to 20 levels higher or lower.
ability_4_desc: Invisible Woman can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Jade Temple Guardians
ability_1_desc: If the Jade Temple Guardians trigger an engagement first, roll 1 additional attack die before attacking normally. If a skull is rolled for Heavenly Strike, it cannot be blocked.
ability_2_desc: If none of the Temple Guardians move this turn, add 1 die to their defense.

name: Iron Fist
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Iron Fist, you may add 2 to either the Move value or Attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Iron Fist and the chosen figure are also affected by Iron Fist Special Attack. Roll attack dice once. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Iron Fist Special Attack may cause Knockback.
ability_3_desc: Before moving, you may choose either Iron Fist or a wounded Hero figure adjacent to Iron Fist and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove one wound marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: HoSS Master Set: A New Hope
ability_1_desc: It is a period of custom creations. Rebel designers, striking from an inner sanctum, prepare for their first release to counteract the void created by the actions of an evil Toy Empire. Even now, the Rebels, heroically led by the guy who got blown up over Yavin, race against time to finish their plans, plans that will bring a new dimension of fun to the game nights of a galaxy not so far away ... May the 4th be with you... always....

name: James MacDirk
ability_1_desc: All Human Warriors you control roll one additional defense die when defending against normal adjacent attacks.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, if James MacDirk is engaged with at least 2 opponent's figures, he may attack one additional time.

name: Ishehdulog Patrol
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, before taking a turn with the Swamp Patrol, you may move an ishehdulog hero you control up to 6 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Figures on swamp of swamp water spaces subtract 1 from their defense when attacked by non-adjacent Ishehdulite Patrols.

name: Iroh
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with a normal attack with a Unique Hero adjacent to Iroh, you may reveal an X Order Marker on this card to add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking normally with Iroh you may instead roll 2 attack dice for all opponent's figures adjacent to Iroh. For each skull rolled you may place a wound marker on that figure. Roll for each figure separately.
ability_3_desc: If Iroh inflicts one or more wounds with his normal attack, you may roll an attack die for each wound received. The figure receives one additional wound for each skull rolled. Iroh rolls 3 fewer dice for his normal attack and may not inflict additional wounds when attacking a figure with the Lava Resistant Special Power.
ability_4_desc: When Iroh is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Iroh can take from this attack is one.

name: Iron Hide
ability_1_desc: When Iron Hide receives one or more wounds, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_2_desc: Range: 6. Attack 1, 2, 3. Iron Hide starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range an attack by rolling 1, 2, or 3 attack dice. Iron Hide may keep making special attacks with 1, 2, or 3 dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. Iron Hide may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Iron Hide add 1 die to their defense.
ability_4_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Iron Hide always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Iron Man Mark I
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Iron Man may attack with Flame Gun Special Attack. Choose 2 spaces in a straight line from Iron Man. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Flame Gun Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Iron Man's movement, ignore elevations. Iron Man may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Iron Man is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Iroth
ability_1_desc: When making a normal attack, Iroth may roll 1 additional attack die for each friendly Wizard adjacent to him, up to a maximum of +2 for Wizard's Apprentice.
ability_2_desc: If Iroth rolls at least one shield against a normal attack from an adjacent figure that caused any number of wounds, the attacker receives an equal number of unblockable wounds.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Iroth, you may take an additional turn with him. Add 2 to his Move and Attack during that turn. After that turn, place 2 wound markers on this card. You may only use Foolhardy Charge once per round.

name: Iron Man Extremis
ability_1_desc: When Iron Man attacks with a normal attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When Iron Man attacks with his Uni-Beam Special Attack, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Iron Man's movement, ignore elevations. Iron Man may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Iron Man starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ithilien Rangers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Ithilien Rangers, you may first take a turn with any Human Leader you control. If you do not take a turn with any Human Leader you control, Ithilien Rangers are not attacked when leaving engagements this turn.
ability_2_desc: An attacking Ithilien Ranger who began his turn unengaged rolls one additional attack die.

name: Iron Monger
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Iron Monger attacks with his Particle Beam Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Iron Monger attacks with a normal attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull. Any time an opponent's figure inflicts a wound on Iron Monger, that opponent may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from this card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Iron Monger's movement, ignore elevations. Iron Monger may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Iron Monger starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ithariel
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Ithariel, you may roll up to five additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Ithariel, you may attack up to three additional times. Ithariel cannot attack the same figure more than once in a turn. Ithariel cannot use Blue Sword of Power and Blue Sword of Speed on the same turn.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Ithariel, roll a 20-sided die. If Ithariel added 1/2/3/4/5 to his attack with Blue Sword of Power, add 1/3/6/10/15 to your roll. If Ithariel attacked 1/2/3 additional times with Blue Sword of Speed, add 3/9/18 to your roll. If you roll a 21 or higher, immediately destroy Ithariel.

name: Red Skull Johann Shmidt
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Red Skull's card, instead of taking that turn with Red Skull, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero you control within clear sight of Red Skull.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, after all order markers have been placed, if there is one of your Order Markers on a Ruler, a Conqueror, and a Mastermind Army Card, then all opponents' figures subtract 1 from their Defense Value for the rest of the round.
ability_3_desc: When Red Skull attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_4_desc: Red Skull has the species Robot in addition to what is listed on this card. If there are no wound markers on this Army Card, add 2 to Red Skull's defense.

name: Jamie Madrox
ability_1_desc: You can have no more than 8 Jamie Madrox figures in your army. If Jamie Madrox is attacked by a normal attack from an opponent's figure and is not destroyed, you may immediately place one of your previously destroyed Jamie Madrox figures adjacent to the defending Jamie Madrox.
ability_2_desc: When you reveal an Order Marker on this card, you may move and attack with up to 6 Jamie Madrox figures you control. All the Jamie Madrox figures must end their movement before the first one can attack.

name: Jakko Hack
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves onto a space within 2 clear sight spaces of Jakko Hack, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Scary Monster.
ability_2_desc: Jakko Hack never takes leaving engagement attacks from small or medium figures.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a figure that has a tricky personality, add 1 die to Jakko Hack's defense. When attacking a figure that does not have a tricky personality, add 1 die to Jakko Hack's attack.

name: Jango Fett
ability_1_desc: If attacking a Unique Hero, roll an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: If this unit has not moved or used another special ability this turn, it may attack twice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for movement, ignore elevations. Unit may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the unit starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Janet Wong
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurais.

name: Iskra
ability_1_desc: Each time Iskra destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Iskra cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Iskra, you may attempt to summon the Rechets of Bogdan if they are in your army and they have not yet been successfully summoned. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you must place all 3 Rechets of Bogdan on empty spaces within 6 clear sight spaces of Iskra. Any Rechets of Bogdan that you cannot place on the battlefield are immediately destroyed and cannot be summoned again. When the Rechets of Bogdan are summoned, you may immediately take a turn with them.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Iskra's movement, ignore elevations. Iskra may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Iskra starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Jack O'Lantern
ability_1_desc: When Jack O'Lantern, or any figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Jack O'Lantern, is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the targeted figure, and all figures adjacent to the targeted figure, no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Jack O'Lantern always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Jack O'Lantern's movement, ignore elevations. Jack O'Lantern may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Jack O'Lantern starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Jardinian Knights
ability_1_desc: Each time a Jardinian Knight attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: A Jardinian Knight that ends its movement adjacent to a Tree or Bush may, instead of attacking, roll a 20-sided die. On a roll of 11 or higher, you may place a previously destroyed Jardinian Knight on a same-level space adjacent to that Jardinian Knight.
ability_3_desc: A Jardinian Knight is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Johnathon Jinglepepper
ability_1_desc: When a Small or Medium Hero you control within 4 spaces of Johnathon Jinglepepper attacks with a normal attack, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll 1 attack die. Bardic Inspiration Aura does not affect Johnathon Jinglepepper.
ability_2_desc: After Johnathon Jinglepepper roll defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move Johnathon Jinglepepper up to 4 spaces.

name: Jesse Quick
ability_1_desc: Jesse Quick may move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Jesse Quick is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Jesse Quick does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Jesse Quick may ignore her height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Jesse Quick attacks, she may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after her move, as long as she is on a space where she could end her movement.

name: Irrych Greymire
ability_1_desc: When Irrych Greymire rolls defense dice against an attack from an opponent's figure and is not destroyed, you may choose a figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Irrych Greymire and place him on any unoccupied space adjacent to that figure. Irrych Greymire may not leap more than 7 levels up or down in a single leap.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with a figure you control adjacent to Irrych Greymire, you may destroy that figure and place it on this Army Card. At the end of the round, remove all destroyed figures from this card.
ability_3_desc: If there is a figure you control on this Army Card, when Squad figures with the same species as that figure who are within 3 clear sight spaces of Irrych Greymire roll attack dice for a normal attack, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Blood Fervor can only be used once per attack roll.

name: Jungle Boar
ability_1_desc: Before moving a Jungle Boar, choose an unengaged friendly Small figure adjacent to it. After you move that Jungle Boar, place the chosen figure adjacent to it.
ability_2_desc: A Jungle Boar may pass through Jungle Brush and Trees, and always counts hexes as 1 space when moving.

name: Jonah Hex
ability_1_desc: When Jonah Hex is targeted for a normal attack from an opponent's non-adjacent figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Jonah Hex, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the opponent's figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: If Jonah Hex is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to Jonah Hex's attack.

name: Lone Wolf
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, choose a figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Lone Wolf and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, deal 1 damage to the chosen figure. Lone Wolf cannot Mind Blast Constructs or Destructible Objects.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 12. Choose only Undead or figures that follow Valkril to attack.
ability_3_desc: All Human figures in your army count as Kai Lords and roll an additional attack die when attacking Dark Lords.
ability_4_desc: Lone Wolf can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement

name: Jarek Guy
ability_1_desc: If Jarek Guy is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-14, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Lob 20. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Plasma Grenade Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Jarek Guy can be affected by his own Plasma Grenade Special Attack.

name: Johann Graybeard
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Johann Graybeard's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Johann Graybeard's Army Card to add 1 to Johann Graybeard's Move, Attack, and Defense until your next turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Johann Graybeard. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Johann Graybeard this turn. You can only use Rushing Shield Stun if Johann Graybeard was not adjacent to the targeted figure at the start of this turn.

name: Johann Graybeard
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Johann Graybeard's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Johann Graybeard's Army Card to add 1 to Johann Graybeard's Move and Attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Johann Graybeard. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Johann this turn. You can only use Rushing Shield Stun if Johann Graybeard was not adjacent to the targeted figure at the start of this turn.

name: JE-DIN-SA
ability_1_desc: All friendly Marro figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Je-Din-Sa add 1 to their defensive dice. Je-Din-Sa's aura does not affect Je-Din-Sa.
ability_2_desc: If Je-Din-Sa or any non-huge friendly figure adjacent to Je-Din-Sa is targeted for an attack by a non-adjacent opponent, roll the 20-sided die. Add the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Je-Din-Sa to your die roll. If you roll a 17 or higher, Je-Din-Sa and all non-huge friendly figures adjacent to Je-Din-Sa no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_3_desc: If an opposing figure disengages from Je-Din-Sa or any friendly figure adjacent to Je-Din-Sa, and is not destroyed, then immediately after that figure completes its move, you may move up to 2 friendly marro figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Je-Din-Sa up to 4 spaces each. Je-Din-Sa may be moved using Marro Pursuit.

name: Jeremiah Smith
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 silver Judgement Markers on this card. Instead of attacking, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Jeremiah Smith. Roll the 20-sided die and add 2 if the chosen figure follows Utgar or Valkrill. If you roll an 8 or higher, place a Judgement Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. (If that player has more than one common card for that figure, all of those cards are affected by the Judgement Marker.)
ability_2_desc: All figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Jeremiah Smith roll an additional attack die when attacking a figure whose Army Card contains one or more Judgement Markers. Instead of one additional attack die, Jeremiah Smith rolls 2 additional attack dice against one of these figures.

name: Jedidiah Cobb
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-3, choose an opponent. That opponent will now control Jedidiah Cobb for the remainder of your turn, but will not be able to view any unrevealed Order Markers on this card. At the end of that turn, control of Jedidiah Cobb returns to you. All Order Markers and figures that were on this Army Card will stay on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Jedediah Cobb, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 4 to your die roll if he destroyed a small or medium figure this turn. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Jedidiah Cobb.
ability_3_desc: When Jedediah Cobb attacks a destructible object, it may not use any special powers that grant automatic shields.

name: Jorn Ironfist
ability_1_desc: When making a normal attack, if at least 1 skull was rolled, you may add 1 skull to whatever was rolled.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, after taking a turn with Jorn Ironfist, you may take an additional turn with him. During that turn, add 1 to his Move and Attack. After that turn, place one wound marker on this card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Jorn Ironfist always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Joker
ability_1_desc:
Before taking a turn with Joker, roll the 20-sided die.
• If you roll 1-8, take a turn as normal.
• If you roll 9-12, you may remove up to 2 Wound Markers from this card.
• If you roll 13-16, add 5 to Joker's range and add 2 to his attack.
• If you roll a 17 or higher, when Joker attacks this turn, all skulls rolled count for 1 additional hit.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose 1 small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Joker. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll an 8 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 20 or higher, destroy it.

name: Jungle Beast
ability_1_desc: If the Jungle Beast begins its movement or attack adjacent to a tree or bush, add 2 dice to the Jungle Beast's attack.
ability_2_desc: If the Jungle Beast inflicts at least 1 wound with its normal attack, roll one additional attack die. If you roll a skull, the defending figure receives one additional wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Jungle Beast's movement, ignore elevations. The Jungle Beast may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Jungle Beast starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: John Constantine
ability_1_desc: Once per round, before taking a turn with any other figure you control, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, you may move John Constantine up to 5 spaces. When moving with his Hellblazer Movement, Constantine never takes any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, when a figure within 5 spaces of John Constantine is defending against any attack, you may change the result of one rolled defense die. Constantine's Synchronicity Wave does not affect Constantine or any other Sorcerers.
ability_3_desc: John Constantine is not affected by any special power, other than special attacks, on an opponent's undead, demon, or lycanthrope figure's Army Card.

name: JURGEN
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4 + Special. Choose 5 spaces in a straight line from Jurgen. All figures and destructible objects are affected by Jurgen's Melta Gun Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures and objects. Add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. Affected figures and objects roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Negate all special powers of Demons and Telepaths within 2 spaces of Jurgen. Subtract 2 from the Attack and Defense values of Demons and Telepaths within 2 spaces of Jurgen. Special powers of Demons and Telepaths cannot target Jurgen or figures adjacent to Jurgen.

name: JORHDAWN
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 1+Special. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Rain of Flame Special Attack. Add 1 to Jorhdawn's attack dice for every additional Elf Wizard you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Jorhdawn, up to a maximum of +3 dice. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each affected figure rolls defense dice separately. Jorhdawn cannot be affected by her own Rain of Flame Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Jorhdawn rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Judge Dredd
ability_1_desc: When Judge Dredd attacks with his normal attack, he receives one extra attack die if there are any revealed Order Markers on the defending figure's card. Judge Dredd may add a second extra attack die if the number on the defending figure's revealed Order Marker matches the number on an Order Marker that was revealed on Judge Dredd's card this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack with Incendiary Shot Special Attack and roll 3 attack dice. If you roll 2 skulls, all figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this special attack. If you roll 3 skulls, all figures within 2 spaces of the chosen figure are also affected by this special attack. All affected figures roll defense dice separately.

name: REX
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to Rex and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, add one automatic wound to the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to the move value of this card for each Charging Marker on this card. Each turn, if you end on a different space from when you started, add one Charging Marker to Rex. A Maximum of 3 Charging Markers may be on this card.
ability_3_desc: If you have one or more Charging Markers on this card, before attacking you may remove up to 3 charging markers on this card to add the same number of dice to your attck this turn.

name: J'ONN J'ONNZ
ability_1_desc: Once per round, before revealing an Order Marker on an Army Card in your army, you may move it onto another Army Card in your army and reveal it on that Army Card instead.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if J'onn J'onzz rolls at least one shield, the most wounds he may take for this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for J'onn J'onnz' movement, ignore elevations. J'onn may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When J'onn J'onnz starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_4_desc: If J'onn J'onzz is placed on a lava field or molten lava space, he is immediately destroyed.

name: Jemma Simmons
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on an adjacent wounded Human Unique hero, before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is an Agent, add 2 to your roll. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 Wound Markers from that hero's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Simmons would inflict any wounds with a normal attack on an opponent's figure, you must instead lay that figure on its side. That figure may not move, attack, or make leaving engagement attacks. A figure is no longer affected by Night-Night Gun when an X Order Marker is revealed on its Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, instead of attacking with Simmons you may choose a hero within 3 clear sight spaces of her. If it is a Human, remove all wound markers from its Army Card. If it is not Human, it receives 3 unblockable wounds.

name: K'ARESH
ability_1_desc: K'Aresh may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: If K'Aresh inflicts at least one wound to an opponent's figure, you may remove one Wound Marker from an Undead Queen you control within 8 clear sight spaces.

name: LITTLEFOOT
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to two large or huge Predator or Beast Unique Heroes you control to be the Nurturers for all units you control with the Nurtured power. This Littlefoot rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when at least one of the chosen Nurturers is within 3 clear sight spaces. When revelaing an order marker on this Littlefoot, you may first move a Nurturer 4 spaces. Instead of attacking with this Littlefoot, you may attack with an adjacent Nuturer.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Any figure adjacent to this Littlefoot (except Nurturers or figures with the Nurtured power) is affected by the Stomp Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.

name: KALIBAK
ability_1_desc: When Kalibak attacks with a normal attack, any die result that is not a shield counts as a skull.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. After attacking normally, Kalibak may attack with Beta Club Special Attack. Figures roll one less defense die when defending against Beta Club Special Attack. Kalibak cannot attack Robots or destructible objects with Beta Club Special Attack.

name: PTERANO
ability_1_desc: While this Pterano is flying, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure that it passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to this Pterano at the end of its move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Talon Grab, it will not take any leaving-engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Talon Grab.
ability_2_desc: This Pterano rolls an additional attack die when attacking or defending against large or huge figures.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Pterano's movement, ignore elevations. A Pterano may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Pterano starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Kate Crawford
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. Kate may attack that figure up to three times with Fan the Hammer Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If Kate Crawford has 2 or more wound markers on her Army Card, add 1 to her defense dice.

name: Malibu Mayhem Joker
ability_1_desc: At the end of any round, if the "X" Marker is the last Marker on this card, roll the 20-sided die. -On a 1-4 Joker must immediately attack a friendly figure. -On a 5-14 the round ends normally. -On a 15 or higher, Joker may immediately take a turn.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, Joker may move without taking any leaving engagement attacks this turn. The Joker may roll a leaving engagement attack against each figure that he was engaged with prior to moving.
ability_3_desc: If Joker destroys a figure, all other figures from that figure's army subtract 1 attack die when attacking the Joker for the remainder of the game. This effect is not cumulative.
ability_4_desc: Joker may roll an additional 1 defense die for each Jungle tile that he is adjacent to when defending against a non-adjacent attack.

name: JUBOKKO
ability_1_desc: This Jubokko does not start the game on the battlefield. At the end of any round, if at least ten figures have been destroyed this game and this Jubokko has not been placed on the battlefield, you may, if possible, replace any single-spaced Evergreen Tree or Jungle Brush on the battlefield with this Jubokko. Whenever a special power on an Army Card refers to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, it refers to this Jubokko as well.
ability_2_desc: This Jubokko may not be targeted for non-adjacent attacks by opponents' figures who don't have the Perceptive personality unless at least one figure that player controls is within 2 clear sight spaces of it. Immediately before revealing an Order Marker on and taking a turn with any other Army Card you control, you may immediately attack with any one Jubokko you control.
ability_3_desc: Each time this Jubokko destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. This Jubokko cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_4_desc: Whenever this Jubokko is destroyed, you must place a Glyph of Jubokko Branch on the space it previously occupied.

name: THREE-HORN
ability_1_desc: Three-horn may add 3 to its Move number as long as it is unengaged prior to moving. Three-horn must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by a normal or special attack from Three-horn, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 6 or higher, you may Ram the figure. The player who controls the Rammed figure must place that figure, if possible, on an empty space within 2 spaces of its current location, within clear sight of Three-horn but not adjacent to it. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A Rammed figure never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Ramming can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: SPIKE
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to two large or huge Predator or Beast Unique Heroes you control to be the Nurturers for all units you control with the Nurtured power. This Spike rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when at least one of the chosen Nurturers is within 3 clear sight spaces. When revelaing an order marker on this Spike, you may first move a Nurturer 4 spaces. Instead of attacking with this Spike, you may attack with an adjacent Nuturer.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with this Spike, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack again with this Spike.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, this Spike always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Kelvin Jax
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. When Kelvin Jax attacks with Twin Lasers Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, before placing Order Markers, if another figure you control is engaged you may move up to 4 spaces with Kelvin Jax.

name: Kassandra
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, you may place a Glyph of Ophidian Egg Clutch on a previously empty space adjacent to Kassandra.
ability_2_desc: When Kassandra attacks with a normal attack, she may attack 1 additional time. If she attacks the same figure in a turn, she may add 1 additional attack die to the second attack.
ability_3_desc: Kassandra rolls 1 additional die against figures leaving an engagement with her.
ability_4_desc: Kassandra does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces.

name: BIRDCREST JR
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to two large or huge Predator or Beast Unique Heroes you control to be the Nurturers for all units you control with the Nurtured power. Birdcrest Jr rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when at least one of the chosen Nurturers is within 3 clear sight spaces. When revelaing an order marker on Birdcrest Jr, you may first move a Nurturer 4 spaces. Instead of attacking with Birdcrest Jr, you may attack with an adjacent Nuturer.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Birdcrest Jr and after Birdcrest Jr is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-9, you may move 1 PARASAUROLOPHUS that you control up to 4 spaces each. If you roll 10-15, you may move with up to 2 PARASAUROLOPHUS that you control up to 5 spaces each. If you roll 16-20, you may move with up to 3 PARASAUROLOPHUS that you control up to 6 spaces each.

name: Spitter
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose 1 other figure adjacent to the targetted figure to be affected by Acid Spray Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. If an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least one wound from the Crippling Acid Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that Unique Hero's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When Spitter is destroyed by a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 Spitter you control up to 4 spaces each, and all Spitter you control no longer have any visible Hit Zones for the duration of the attacking figure's turn while they remain unengaged. Spitter will never take any leaving engagement attacks while using Scurry.

name: Kage-Oni
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally with a small, medium, or large figure you control that occupies at least one shadow space within 3 clear sight spaces of Kage-Oni, you may place that figure onto an empty shadow space within 3 clear sight spaces of Kage-Oni. Figures moved by Sonata of Dancing Shades never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: Kage-Oni starts each game with up to 2 shadow tiles on his Army Card. If Kage-Oni ends his turn on an empty land space, you may place a shadow tile from his Army Card onto the space he occupies if the shadow space fits normally onto that space.

name: Kang
ability_1_desc: After revealing Order Marker 1 on Kang and taking a turn with him, you may take a turn with any Soldier or Warrior squad you control.
ability_2_desc: When Kang attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Kang add one extra die to their attack, and one extra die to their defense.
ability_4_desc: When Kang receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack by an opponent's figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, choose an empty space within 4 spaces of Kang. Place Kang on the chosen space to ignore any wounds he just received. If Kang is engaged when he uses Temporal Jump, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Raptor Youngling
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to two large or huge Predator or Beast Unique Heroes you control to be the Nurturers for all units you control with the Nurtured power. This Raptor Youngling rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when at least one of the chosen Nurturers is within 3 clear sight spaces. When revelaing an order marker on this Raptor Youngling, you may first move a Nurturer 4 spaces. Instead of attacking with this Raptor Youngling, you may attack with an adjacent Nuturer.
ability_2_desc: If this Raptor Youngling is attacked by an opponen't figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, a Nurturer must immediately move 6 spaces and, if possible, end its movement adjacent to either this Raptor Youngling or the attacking figure. If a Nurtruer ends engaged with the attacking figure, this Raptor Youngling takes no damage and a Nurture may immediatly attack the attacking figure with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with this Raptor Youngling, it recieves 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.

name: KAYLEITHA
ability_1_desc: Each time Kayleitha attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1–11, nothing happens. If you roll 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Kayleitha, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, while he remains on that space, Kayleitha has no visible Hit Zone until the next time you reveal an Order Marker.

name: Katryn Vade
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Dragonheart Blade Special Attack. Squad figures roll 1 less defense die against Dragonheart Blade Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Katryn Vade cannot be affected by her own Dragonheart Blade Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: You may treat Katryn Vade's size as Huge for any special powers.

name: KHA
ability_1_desc: When Kha attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Each time Kha attacks a small, medium or large Hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: Kha is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Kantono Daishi
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Kantono Daishi, after taking Kantono Daishi's turn, if Kantono Daishi is unengaged, you may take a turn with one of the following that you control: • 1 Ninja Squad or • up to 2 Ninja Heroes. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn with Dishonorable Leadership must be within clear sight of Kantono Daishi before moving.
ability_2_desc: Kantono Daishi can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurai.

name: Kelgar
ability_1_desc: When you roll attack dice for Kelgar, you may re-roll one attack die that did not show a skull one time.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Kelgar, you may choose a wounded friendly Hero figure adjacent to Kelgar and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 Wound Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Paladin figures adjacent to Kelgar add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.

name: Kincho
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one revealed Order Marker on this Army Card at the end of the round, then you may place Kincho on an empty space adjacent to any figure within 8 spaces.
ability_2_desc: After rolling defense dice for Kincho, you may move him 1 space for each shield rolled.
ability_3_desc: Kincho can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Khosumet the Darklord
ability_1_desc: Each friendly figure with a Relentless personality adjacent to Khosumet the Darklord recieves an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: You may add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Unleashed Fury power on any Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Khosumet the Darklord rolls at least one shield, the most wounds it may take for this attack is one.

name: Kili
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose a non-adjacent figure to attack. Kili may not use this special attack if he moved this turn.
ability_2_desc: If you control Fili, add 1 to Kili's attack and defense. If Fili or Thorin is destroyed, Kili immediately receives a wound.

name: Keres
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Keres, if the defending figure has 1 or more wounds on its Army Card, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Bloodseeker can be used only once for each attack roll.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Keres. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound and may roll no more than 1 die for Defense if attacked by Keres this turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Keres' movement, ignore elevations. Keres may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Keres starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Khaleidos
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a friendly Unique Hero within 5 spaces of Khaleidos. For each figure engaged with the chosen figure you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Khaleidos cannot target himself with Psionic Mindstorm
ability_2_desc: Anytime an adjacent figure attacks Khaleidos all skulls count as shields and all shields count as skulls.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Khaleidos's movement, ignore elevations. Khaleidos may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Khaleidos starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: King Kenelm
ability_1_desc: All friendly Loyal figures adjacent to King Kenelm add 1 to their Attack and Defense values.
ability_2_desc: King Kenelm rolls 2 additional attack dice when attacking figures who follow Utgar or Valkrill.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with King Kenelm, you may choose one small or medium Knight you control adjacent to King Kenelm and take a turn with that figure. During the chosen figure's turn, that figure rolls 2 additional attack dice. Mark of Kenelm can only be used once per round.

name: Kid Flash
ability_1_desc: Kid Flash may move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Kid Flash is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Kid Flash does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Kid Flash may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Kid Flash attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during or after his move as long as Kid Flash is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: When Kid Flash rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage. Kid Flash rolls one additional defense die for each revealed order marker on this card, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice for Speed Dodge.

name: KILKORAX
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose up to 2 different Small or Medium opponent's figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Kilkorax. Roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure, adding 9 to your roll if the figure is a Squad figure. If you roll 17 or higher, place the chosen figure onto a same-level space adjacent to Kilkorax. Figures moved by Witchcraft Telekinesis never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Kilkorax's movement, ignore elevations. Kilkorax may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Kilkorax starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: King Kelth Spirit
ability_1_desc: For each undead figure adjacent to King Kelth Spirit, he will roll 1 additional defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with King Kelth Spirit, you may take a turn with up to 2 Undead Common Squads you control. This squads must be at least within 8 clear spaces of King Kelth Spirit before beginning their movement.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for King Kelth Spirit's movement, ignore elevations. King Kelth Spirit may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When King Kelth Spirit starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: King Yeren
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered Order Marker on King Yeren's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker that is on King Yeren's Army Card. If you do, for the remainder of the round, opponents' figures within 4 clear sight spaces roll one fewer attack dice when attacking a figure you control other than King Yeren with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When King Yeren receives one or more wounds, add one Anger marker to this Army Card. After attacking with King Yeren, you may remove an Anger marker from this Army Card to attack again with King Yeren.

name: Knight Irene
ability_1_desc: Before moving Knight Irene, you may add 3 to her Move Value this turn. If you do, subtract 2 from her Attack Value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3 + Special. You may attack twice with Overwhelm Special Attack. If you attack the same figure a second time, you may roll an additional attack die for the second attack. You may not use Overwhelm Special Attack if you used the Run Special Power this turn.

name: Knights of the Vale
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Knights of The Vale, you may first take a turn with any Human Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: Once per attack, when making a normal attack on a figure that follows Utgar or Valkrill, a Knight of The Vale may re-roll 1 attack die.

name: Knight Irene
ability_1_desc: Before moving Knight Irene, you may add 3 to her Move Value this turn. If you do, subtract 2 from her Attack Value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3 + Special. When Knight Irene attacks with Overwhelm Special Attack, she may attack one additional time. If she attacks the same figure a second time, she rolls an additional die for the second attack. Knight Irene may not use Overwhelm Special Attack if she used the Run special power this turn.

name: Kee Heera
ability_1_desc: After attacking, for each skull rolled for the attack you may remove a wound from any or all figures adjacent to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: Kee Heera adds 2 to her Defense while on an ice or snow space.

name: Knights Of Gondor
ability_1_desc: A Templar Cavalry Knight receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from that Knight at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's small or medium Orc, Goblin or Uruk-hai figure, Knights Of Gondor receive 1 additional attack die.

name: Knights of Asordia
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Knights of Asordia, you may first take a turn with any Human Paladin you control.
ability_2_desc: All Paladin figures that begin their turn adjacent to any Knights of Asordia, may move 1 additional space.

name: Kordenian Archers
ability_1_desc: When a Kordenian Archer is adjacent to an Elf Unique Hero, they may add 1 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When the Kordenian Archers rolls defense dices agains a non-adjacent attack, they may add 1 additional dice for its defense.

name: Kita the Springrunner
ability_1_desc: Figures must be within 2 spaces of Kita the Springrunner to target her with a normal or special attack.
ability_2_desc: Kita the Springrunner can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Klaw
ability_1_desc: Figures and destructible objects attacked by Klaw subtract 2 from their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die once for each figure within 4 spaces of Klaw. If you roll a 17 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that figure's army card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure). An army card cannot be affected by Sonic Pulse more than once per turn.

name: Knossian Labryds
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Knossian Labryds, you may first take a turn with any Minotaur Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When a Knossian Labryd attacks but does not destroy a small, medium, or large figure that was at least 3 spaces away from that Knossian Labryd at the start of its turn, you may Toss the figure by placing it on any empty space adjacent to that Knossian Labryd. The space must be on the same level as or lower than that Knossian Labryd. A figure moved by Charging Toss never takes any disengagement attacks. Non-flying figures suffer any falling damage that may apply.

name: Knaves of the Silver Scimitar
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Captain you control to be the Knaves of the Silver Scimitar's Captain for this game. Knaves roll one additional defense die against attacks from non-adjacent figures when their chosen Captain is within 4 clear sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Knaves of the Silver Scimitar, you may first take a turn with their chosen Captain or a Pirate Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When a Knave of the Silver Scimitar attacks, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Knave at the start of this turn, that Knave rolls one additional attack die.
ability_4_desc: Knaves of the Silver Scimitar are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Jon Snow
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Jon Snow, you may place a Wound Marker on Jon Snow and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: If Jon Snow receives enough wounds to be destroyed, instead remove all Wound Markers from his Army Card and move him adjacent to Melisandre. Jon Snow never takes Leaving Engagement Attacks when moving with Red Magic

name: Koh
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Face Markers on this card. Instead of attacking, you may choose an adjacent Unique Hero without a Face Marker on its card. Roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 11 or higher, you may place a Face Marker on the chosen figure's card. Figures other than Koh with a Face Marker on their card may not use any powers which require clear line of sight and subtract 2 from their Move, Attack, and Defense Values to a minimum of 1.
ability_2_desc: If Koh attacks a figure that is not a Spirit, that figure's powers are negated for this attack. If Koh rolls defense dice from an attack from a figure that is not a Spirit, Koh adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Kolbjorn
ability_1_desc: After placing Order Markers each round, before rolling for initiative, if there is at least one Order Marker on Kolbjorn or another Tribesman Army Card you control, you may move Kolbjorn up to 3 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Kolbjorn attacks a large or huge figure with a normal attack, add 1 attack die.
ability_3_desc: Once per round, before revealing a numbered Order Marker, you may choose any Hunter Army Card that has at least one figure you control within 8 spaces of Kolbjorn. Move any amount of unrevealed Order Markers onto that card from another card in your army with at least one figure on the battlefield.

name: Kkyal the Enforcer
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Kkyal must target a Kraul figure to use Exoskeletal Blast Special Attack. Figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Exoskeletal Blast Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, place 2 Green Exoskeleton Markers on this Army Card. When Kkyal rolls defense dice, you may remove 1 Exoskeleton Marker to ignore any wounds inflicted by the attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Kkyal's movement, ignore elevations. Kkyal may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Kkyal starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: KON-TAR-NA
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Kon-Tar-Na moved less than 4 spaces, he may use Leaping Assault. Choose an opponent's figure within 3 clear sight spaces and place Kon-Tar-Na on any unoccupied space adjacent to the chosen figure. Kon-Tar-Na may not move more than 7 levels up or down using Leaping Assault. If Kon-Tar-Na is engaged when he starts his Leaping Assault, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, after attacking, if Kon-Tar-Na destroyed an opponent's figure, you may attack one additional time with Kon-Tar-Na. Before the additional attack you may use his Leaping Assault special power.

name: Kingpin
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any Unique Hero that is not a Crime Lord. As long as you control Kingpin, the chosen figure's class is Criminal, regardless of what is listed on the card.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, after all order markers have been placed, if at least one Order Marker is placed on Kingpin and: • All of your other Order Markers are placed on Thief Army Cards, then all Thieves you control add 2 to their Move Number for the rest of the round. • All of your other Order Markers are placed on Assassin Army Cards, then all Assassins you control add 1 extra attack die for the rest of the round. • All of your other Order Markers are placed on Criminal Army Cards, then all Criminals you control add 1 extra defense die for the rest of the round. • There is one of your Order Markers on a Thief, Assassin, and Criminal Army Card, then all Thieves, Assassins, and Criminals you control add one to their Move number and 1 extra attack die and defense die for the rest of the round.

name: Kren Yeven
ability_1_desc: If Kren Yeven is the first figure to attack this game, he rolls 2 additional dice when making his first attack.
ability_2_desc: Kren Yeven may add 3 to his Move number as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. Kren Yeven must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.

name: Kitty Pryde
ability_1_desc: When Kitty Pryde rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Kitty Pryde may use Phase Tunnel. Choose any space within 3 spaces of Kitty Pryde. You may also choose up to two small or medium figures adjacent to Kitty Pryde. Place Kitty Pryde on the chosen space and place the chosen figures on same-level spaces adjacent to her. Figures moved with Phase Tunnel never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Kitty Pryde. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_4_desc: Robots and Soulborgs roll 3 less defense dice when rolling defense against Kitty Pryde.

name: Knossian Chargers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Knossian Chargers, you may first take a turn with any Minotaur Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, a Knossian Charger may Bull Charge. Choose 5 spaces in a straight line from Knossian Charger, each successive space being of equal or lower elevation than the space before. As Knossian Charger moves to each space, he must displace any small or medium figure occupying that space by placing it on any adjacent space of equal or lower elevation than the hex the figure originally occupied. A Knossian Charger continues to move this way until he has moved all 5 spaces or until a figure cannot be displaced in this way. Non-flying figures suffer any falling damage that may apply. Neither Knossian Charger nor figures displaced by Bull Charge take any disengagement attacks during Bull Charge.

name: Kraglauth
ability_1_desc: All Orc figures you control may move an additional space when using their Orc Battle Rush special power.
ability_2_desc: Range 1, Attack 3. If Kragluath is unengaged, instead of moving and attacking normally with Kragluath, you may move Kragluath up to 8 spaces in a straight line. Kragluath may attack multiple times with Savage Charge Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as Kragluath is on a space where he could end his movement. Kragluath cannot attack the same figure more than once on a single turn. Kragluath never takes any leaving engagement attacks when using Savage Charge Special Attack.

name: Kyle Jax
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When attacking with Resistance Fire Support Special Attack, Kyle Jax may attack all figures that are engaged with a Fighter or Scout figure you control. A figure cannot be attacked more than once per turn with Resistance Fire Support Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, before placing Order Markers you may move a Fighter or Scout figure you control up to 5 spaces.

name: Knights of Golron
ability_1_desc: When taking a turn with Knights of Golron you may move and attack with any warrior or knight you control this turn as if the moved figure was a part of this squad. For each previously destroyed Knight of Golron you may move and attack with an additional warrior or knight you control as if they were apart of this squad.
ability_2_desc: Knights of Golron always roll 5 defense dice against all attacks regardless of glyphs, abilities, or height advantage.
ability_3_desc: At the start of the game, add 1 army card of Phantom Knights to your army and destroy them. This army card does not count toward any point, space, or figure limit that would keep you from having it in your army. When a Knight of Golron is destroyed, replace his figure with a previously destroyed Phantom Knight you control.

name: KRAKENLING
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, you may place a Krakenling on an empty space within 4 spaces. If a Krakenling is engaged when it starts to Warp Space, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After moving normally, a Krakenling may switch spaces with an adjacent single-space figure. Figures moved by Eldritch Switch never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When a Krakenling attacks, it may attack up to 3 times. Reduce the number of attacks by 1 for each Wound Marker it has.
ability_4_desc: A Krakenling does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: KRODHA
ability_1_desc: Range 5 Attack 3 Roll one additional die when attacking Squad figures with Spear Throw Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Krodha wounds a figure with a normal attack, if Krodha is adjacent to any Squad figures, you must choose one of them and that figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: If Krodha has 4 or more wound markers on her Army Card, she adds 1 to her Attack and Defense values and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Landarian Sky Guard
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Sky Guard, you may first take a turn with any Landarian Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: When a member of the Sky Guard attacks a figure that's base is 6 or more levels higher than theirs, add 2 dice to the attack.

name: Kraul Wing Soldier
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, place 1 Green Exoskeleton Marker on a Kraul Wing Soldier Army Card for every Kraul Wing Soldier in your Army. After a Kraul Wing Soldier rolls defense dice, you may remove 1 Exoskeleton Marker from its Army Card to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Kraul Wing Soldier's movement, ignore elevations. A Kraul Wing Soldier may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Kraul Wing Soldier starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Lavrador Explorers
ability_1_desc: An unengaged Lavrador Explorer may add 2 to his Move number as long as he ends his move adjacent to a friendly Explorer.
ability_2_desc: A Lavrador Explorer rolls one additional die when attacking a figure who destroyed a friendly figure last turn.

name: Kozak
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Kozak, you may choose one small or medium figure within 3 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 6 levels above Kozak's height or whose height is no more than 6 levels below Kozak's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to Kozak. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Web Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: You may add 3 to your die roll when you roll for the Entangling Web special power on any Army Card if the chosen opponent's figure is engaged with Kozak. Kozak counts as a Fyorlag Spider for the Entangling Web special power.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Kozak may triple her Height and may ignore up to 2 levels of elevation.

name: Krazl Nars
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may place that figure on an empty space within 2 spaces of its current location. A figure moved by Telekinetic Throw must be placed on the same level as or lower than its current location, and never takes leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Telekinetic Throw can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, when Krazl Nars attacks a non-adjacent figure, you may re-roll one attack die that did not show a skull. If Krazl Nars used Telekinetic Throw this turn, he cannot use Guided Spear Flight.

name: Kyssandra
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 white Viper Egg markers on this card. After moving Kyssandra and instead of attacking, you may remove one Viper Egg marker and place one of your previously destroyed Viper Squad figures on an empty space adjacent to Kyssandra.
ability_2_desc: When Kyssandra attacks with a normal attack, she may attack one additional time. If she attacks the same figure a second time in a turn, she may add one additional attack die to the second attack. Kyssandra rolls one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with her.
ability_3_desc: Kyssandra does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces.

name: Kunoichi Assassin
ability_1_desc: When Kunoichi Assassin attacks, she may attack one additional time.
