ability_2_desc: If Kunoichi Assassin or any Ninja within 4 spaces of Kunoichi Assassin is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to vanish. If you roll a 11 or higher, the defending figure takes no damage and you may immediately move Kunoichi Assassin and the defending figure up to 4 spaces. Figures can vanish only if it ends its vanishing move not adjacent to any enemy figures. Cannot be combined with Vanish or Disappering Ninja.
ability_3_desc: Kunoichi Assassin can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Leona
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Leona may only attack a figure with Piercing Thrust Special Attack that is adjacent on the same elevation. Figures roll 3 less defense dice when defending against Piercing Thrust Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If Leona is engaged with a single opponent's figure, when Leona rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Guardians of the Night
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Guardians of the Night, one Guardian of the Night may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If every figure of this squad begins her turn on a grass space, you may add 1 to their move or 2 to their attack.

name: Laelia Moonrose
ability_1_desc: Laelia Moonrose starts the game with 1 blue Defense Marker on her Army Card. After moving and before attacking, you may move the Defense Marker onto the Army Card of a Unique Hero within 6 clear sight spaces of Laelia. Any Unique Hero with a Defense Marker on their card adds 1 to their Defense value. At the end of every round, return the Defense Marker to Laelia's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Laelia Moonrose, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, remove 1 wound marker from every friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Laelia.

name: LENSONAR
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 1, 2, or 3. Lensonar starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2, or 3 attack dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. He may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: If Lensonar is engaged with only one opponent's figure, when Lensonar rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Leep Viper
ability_1_desc: A Leep Viper that moved all 8 spaces in a single Move may use Crash Lunge. When using Crash Lunge, a Leep Viper's attack will affect all figures adjacent to it. Roll once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. A Leep Viper must not move onto the same space twice when moving for Crash Lunge.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with a Leep Viper, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with a Leep Viper.
ability_3_desc: A Leep Viper does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Mummies of Nehedrek
ability_1_desc: When an enemy figure destroys a Mummy of Nehedrek on its turn, place it on that enemy figure's card. For each Mummy figure on the opponent's card, subtract 1 from the card's defense value, and its owner must roll d20 at the end of each turn taken by the cursed figure(s), subtracting 1 from his roll for each Mummy figure on the card. On a result of 1, he must destroy a figure from the cursed card.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to a Mummy of Nehedrek's Attack and Defense while on a Sand space.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with the Mummies of Nehedrek, you may first take a turn with any Undead Queen, Undead King, Undead Princess, or Undead Prince you control.

name: Lance the Legend
ability_1_desc: After attacking, a player may reveal an 'X' Order Marker that is on the Army Card of a figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Lance and roll the 20-sided die. If the player is an opponent, they subtract 5 from their roll. If the player rolls an 11 or higher, they may immediately take a turn with Lance. A player may not roll for Freelancer if they attacked Lance this turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure, Lance rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Lance can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Leroy Chatman
ability_1_desc: Leroy Chatman may add 2 to his Move number as long as he ends his movement on a Treasure Glyph. When you roll the d20 for a Treasure Glyph trap with Leroy Chatman, you may add 2 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: Leroy Chatman does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces and subtracts one from all elevation changes.

name: Leon S. Kennedy
ability_1_desc: Range 8 Attack Special Leon's Specialized Weapons Special Attack's attack value depends on the minimum number of spaces between Leon and the defending figure. If the figure's distance is: 1-3 Spaces: 5 Attack, 4-6 Spaces: 3 Attack and Leon may attack twice, 7-8 Spaces: 2 Attack and if Leon did not move this turn all skulls rolled count for one additional hit
ability_2_desc: When attacking a small or medium squad figure or a small or medium wounded hero with an adjacent attack, Leon may roll 2 additional attack dice.

name: Lion Longbowmen
ability_1_desc: If a Lion Longbowmen has a height advangetage over a figure within 7 clear sight spaces add one to his range. If a Lioin Longbowmen has a height advangetage of 10 spaces or more over a figure within 9 clear sight spaces add 2 to his range.

name: Lelouch vi Brittania
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on LeLouch you may take a turn with a Hero or Squad you control. You may not take any additional turns with any other figures this turn. You may choose whether to take a turn with LeLouch or with the chosen Hero or Squad first.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, place a number of Geass Markers on this card equal to the number of Unique Heroes in yours and your opponent's armies. Instead of attacking with LeLouch, you may place a Geass Marker on the card of a figure within 2 clear sight spaces of LeLouch and you may take an immediate turn with that figure. You may not place more than one Geass Marker on any card except this one. Soulborgs, Constructs, and figures with the Mindless personality are not affected by The Power of Absolute Obedience.

name: Lion Paladins
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Lion Paladins, you may first take a turn with a Paladin Hero that you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill, Lion Paladins receive 1 additional attack die.

name: Lion Knights
ability_1_desc: A Lion Knight receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from that Knight at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: If all your Order Markers are on Knight or Paladin Army Cards, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for every Order Marker on Lion Knights's Army Card, up to a maximum of +3 for Initiative Advantage.

name: Liberty Belle
ability_1_desc: If the X Order Marker is on this Army Card, you may reveal it at the end of the round in initiative order and take a turn with Liberty Belle, or any Adventurer or Crime Fighter hero you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Liberty Belle, using this round's initiative order.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Liberty Belle, you may take another turn with her. You may only use this power once during a round.

name: LLENADIL
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Llenadil you may first move any three single space tree pieces up to four spaces each. Trees may only move onto or through unoccupied grass, rock, or sand spaces.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. When attacking with Storm of Thorns Special Attack, Llenadil may add one additional attack die for each tree adjacent to the target figure.

name: London Volk
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with London Volk you may instead take a turn with one Non-Bonding Wolf squad or Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense from a non-adjacent London may add 2 additional defense dice to his roll.

name: Leonidas
ability_1_desc: If every Army Card you control has a Disciplined personality and every opposing player controls more figures than you control, then every figure you control with a range of 1 that started this turn within 5 clear sight spaces of Leonidas becomes inspired. Inspired figures add 1 to their move, attack, and defense. Leonidas is not affected by his own For Greater Glory.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Leonidas, he may attack one additional time for each wound marker on this card.

name: Larval Flayers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Larval Flayers, you may first take a turn with any Mind Flayer Hero you control. If the chosen Hero possesses the Enslave ability, it may use it on that turn.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Larval Flayers, any two you control may attempt Lesser Enslave 17. Choose any Squad figure within 4 clear sight spaces of the chosen Larval Flayer. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take temporary control of the chosen Squad figure and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Squad figure returns to its previous owner. All order markers that were on the figure's Army Card remain on the Army Card. Lesser Enslave does not affect Mind Flayers.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this unit may double its height. When counting spaces for this unit's movement, ignore up to 2 levels of elevation change per hex.

name: Lilja
ability_1_desc: When Lilja attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Lilja rolls 1 fewer defense die for each wound marker on this card to a maximum of 3 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: If Lilja is attacked with a normal attack and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you must roll 1 attack die, one at a time, for each figure adjacent to her. If you roll a skull, inflict one wound on that figure. Figures affected by Shards cannot roll any defense dice. After using Shards, remove Lilja from the battlefield.

name: Leutnaut Infizieren
ability_1_desc: Leutnaut Infizieren begins the game with three green Venom markers on his Army Card. Whenever Leutnaut Infizieren wounds a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, place a Venom marker on that figure's Army Card. After your opponent reveals a numbered Order Marker, place a wound on that figure's Army Card while they still have the Venom marker on their card. At the end of the round, return all Venom markers to this card.
ability_2_desc: Leutnaut Infizieren can move through all figures and is never considered to be engaged.

name: Lórien Elf Archers
ability_1_desc: When a Lórien Elf Archer is adjacent to at least one tree, add 1 to its attack and defense.

name: Lolth's Sting
ability_1_desc: Each time a Lolth's Sting attacks a small or medium Hero with a normal attack and inflicts at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-15 nothing happens. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: If a Lolth's Sting starts his or her turn unengaged and on a shadow space, add 2 dice to his or her attack this turn.

name: Lord Korvathu
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Lord Korvathu you may roll the 20 sided die. On a result of 1 destroy any one common wolf figure you control. On a roll of 16 or greater place one previously destroyed common wolf figure on an empty hex within 6 spaces. The figure cannot be placed adjacent to an opponent's figure.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Lord Korvathu, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Army Card.

name: Lobar Bao
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on this card, when Lobar Bao is within 3 clear sight spaces of an opponent's figure, a Mariedian figure you control with a Range of 4 or higher may add 2 to its Range when targeting that figure for a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When Lobar Bao rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: When Lobar Bao receives one or more wounds from a leaving engagement attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, ignore any wounds from that leaving engagement attack.

name: Lord Nevermore
ability_1_desc: When a Squad figure adjacent to Lord Nevermore attacks using a normal attack, it subtracts 1 from its attack dice. Figures with the fearless personality are not affected by Mask of Terror.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. When Lord Nevermore attacks with his Quick Release Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.

name: LORINIA
ability_1_desc: When Lorinia have 1 or more wounds on her Army Card, she receive 1 more attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When a friendly Elf figure begins their turn adjacent to Lorinia, they may move 1 additional space.

name: Lord Azon
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to your initiative roll for each Order Marker on a Demon or Undead Army Card you control.
ability_2_desc: An opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Lord Azon subtracts 1 from its Defense, and is not affected by any special power on any Glyph or any of your opponents' Army Cards, other than its own Army Card.
ability_3_desc: If a figure adjacent to Lord Azon that is not Devout or Undead is destroyed, you may remove one wound marker from this card.

name: Butterfly
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Butterfly's movement, ignore elevations. Butterfly may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Butterfly starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After moving but before attacking, Butterfly may roll for Sleep Powder. If Butterfly rolls an 11 or higher, all figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Butterfly cannot Attack or move the next turn.

name: Lórien Elf Warriors
ability_1_desc: A Lórien Elf Warrior may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: If a Lórien Elf Warrior is adjacent to a tree, opponents' figures must be adjacent to that Lórien Elf Warrior to attack it with a normal attack.

name: Lothlorien Elite Guards
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Lothlorien Elite Guards, you can take a turn with any Ranger Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Lothlorien Elite Guard is adjacent to a Tree, opponent's figures must be adjacent to that Lothlorien Elite Guard to attack it with a normal attack.

name: Letiche Shambler
ability_1_desc: This Letiche Shambler starts the game with 3 swamp water tiles on its Army Card. After moving, you may choose any other figure within 3 clear sight spaces of this Letiche Shambler. Place a swamp water tile from this Army Card on a space that figure occupies if the swamp water tile can fit normally on that space.
ability_2_desc: When this Letiche Shambler is on at least one swamp water space, add 1 to his attack and defense.
ability_3_desc: At the end of each round, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure within 3 spaces of this Letiche Shambler that is on at least one swamp water space. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Swamp Toxins does not affect the Marro Hive or figures with the Swamp Water Strength special power.

name: Loki
ability_1_desc: You use an additional '?' Order Marker, which is a bluff like the 'X'. After taking a turn with Loki, rearrange your unrevealed Order Markers.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, place Loki on an empty, same-level space within 10 spaces. Loki will not take passing swipes when Teleporting.
ability_3_desc: When Loki is wounded by an attack, you must roll the d20. If you roll 14+, choose a Small or Medium figure (other than the attacking figure) within 5 clear sight spaces of Loki and the attacking figure to receive those wounds instead.

name: Long Feng
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with Long Feng, you may choose one adjacent Unique Hero or up to three Common figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Long Feng. For each figure roll the 20 sided die, adding 5 to the roll if the figure is Common. On a roll of 13 or higher you may take temporary control of that figure and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of each turn, control of the chosen figure returns to the player who controlled the figure before Hypnosis 13 was used.
ability_2_desc: If Long Feng is on a land space add 1 to his Attack and Defense values. If Long Feng inflicts one or more wounds on a non-Flying figure on a land space, you may move that figure up to two spaces as long as it remains on a land space.
ability_3_desc: When Long Feng is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Long Feng can take from this attack is one.

name: Lurtz
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. After attacking normally, Lurtz may attack with his Foul Strike Special Attack. When Lurtz attacks with Foul Strike Special Attack, add one automatic skull to the roll for each other Orc or Uruk-hai figure you control adjacent to the defending figure, up to a maximum of 2 automatic skulls.

name: Lothlórien Warriors
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to a previously unengaged Lothlórien Warrior roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, before placing Order Markers, for each engaged Lothlórien Warrior you control you may move one unengaged Lothlórien Warrior you control up to 5 spaces. A Lothlórien Warrior cannot move more than once per round with Elvish March.

name: Lórien Elf Rangers
ability_1_desc: If a Lórien Elf Ranger is engaged, add 1 to his attack dice and 2 to his defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Lórien Elf Rangers, if at least two Lórien Elf Rangers you control are engaged, you may take a turn with one Elf Ranger Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: If a Lórien Elf Ranger you control receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and the Lórien Elf Ranger. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 19 or higher, ignore any wounds the Lórien Elf Ranger just received.

name: Lord Revadac
ability_1_desc: When Lord Revadac receives one or more wounds from an adjacent figure's normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the attacking figure receives one wound. Miasma of Pestilence does not affect Undead, Construct, or Soulborg figures.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Lord Revadac, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-2, choose an opponent, who then chooses a friendly Squad figure that Lord Revadac must attack this turn. If no such attack is possible, place one wound marker on this card and end Lord Revadac's turn.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Undead Squad figures adjacent to Lord Revadac roll an additional attack die when making a normal attack.

name: M.A.R.S.
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose up to two figures to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figures are also affected by Missile Barrage Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. M.A.R.S. can be affected by his own Missile Barrage Special Attack.

name: Lembas Bread
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, this figure may consume this Bread and remove 3 Wound Markers from its Army Card.

name: M.A.R.S.
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose up to two figures to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figures are also affected by Missile Barrage Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. M.A.R.S. can be affected by his own Missile Barrage Special Attack.

name: M.A.R.S.
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose up to two figures to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figures are also affected by Guided Missiles Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. M.A.R.S. can be affected by his own Guided Missiles Special Attack.

name: Loki
ability_1_desc: Loki starts the game with a second Loki figure on this card. If Loki is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-14, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 15 or higher, Loki takes no damage and if there is a Loki figure on this card you may immediately place it on any empty space within 5 spaces of the defending Loki figure.
ability_2_desc: When taking a turn with Loki, if there is more than one Loki figure on the battlefield, you may split your turn actions between the two Loki Figures. After moving one Loki figure, instead of attacking with that Loki figure, you may either attack or move 6 spaces with the other Loki figure. If neither Loki figure moved this turn, after attacking with one Loki figure you may attack one additional time with the other Loki figure.
ability_3_desc: After rolling defense dice against any attack, you may destroy the defending Loki figure to avoid all wounds. Any time a Loki figure is destroyed, place the figure on this card. If either Loki figure receives any wounds, place the wound markers on this card. When there are at least 7 wound markers on this card, all Loki figures are destroyed.

name: Luke Cage
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice for Luke Cage, any die result that is not a skull counts as a shield.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose one Small or Medium figure adjacent to Luke Cage. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher the figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: If a friendly figure adjacent to Luke Cage is targeted by a non-adjacent normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, the figure is attacked as normal. If you roll 12 or higher, the attack targets Luke Cage instead.

name: Lyle Parker
ability_1_desc: Lyle Parker is also considered to have the species "Wolf".
ability_2_desc: Lyle Parker starts the game with a black Infection marker on his card. When Lyle Parker destroys a unique hero do not remove the destroyed figure from the board. Place the black Infection marker on the figure's army card. You now control that army card and any figures on it. Remove any wound and order markers from that card. The figure is considered to have a life of 1 and its special powers are considered to be negated.

name: Macdirk Warriors
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Human Champion you control. While that Champion is in play, Macdirk Warriors roll one additional attack die for each wound marker on the chosen Hero. There can be only one Human Champion for all Macdirk Warriors you control. Macdirk Warriors cannot attack their chosen Human Champion.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Macdirk Warriors, you can take a turn with any human champion you control.

name: Lynx, The Skull Lord
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Select a figure to attack. If the chosen figure is destroy, then select another adjacent figure to attack. Continue with this special attack until you fail to destroy a figure.
ability_2_desc: Destroy any adjacent skeletal squad figure. Remove one wound from this army card.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 20, destroy any adjacent figure. Add 1 to whatever was rolled for each friendly skeleton squad adjacent to Lynx, The Skull Lord.

name: Lyapina Nikitovna
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. When rolling dices for this special attack, blanks count as skulls.
ability_2_desc: If Lyapina Nikitovna is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, instead of moving normally, you may move to any unoccupied space adjacent to that Glacier Mountain.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Mad Slasher
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Mad Slasher it may attack any or all figures adjacent to it. When attacking it receives 1 extra attack die for each opposing figure it is engaged with, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Slashing Frenzy. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: A Mad Slasher can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Mad Slasher may double it's height.

name: Mace Windu
ability_1_desc: As long as Mace Windu rolls at least two skulls, he may continue to attack. Mace Windu may not attack more than five times.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Mace Windu, choose 1 small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Mace Windu. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, move the chosen figure 4 spaces. You may not move the figure higher than it's starting height before using Force Push 9. The figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mad Slasher
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Mad Slasher it may attack any or all figures adjacent to it. When attacking it receives 1 extra attack die for each opposing figure it is engaged with, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Slashing Frenzy. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: A Mad Slasher can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Mad Slasher may double it's height.

name: FORCE POWERS - Light and Dark Side
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normaly, a figure with this special ability may Force Leap. Force Leap has the move listed on the card's symbol and ignores elevations. A figure will not take any falling damage, or take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Force Leap. Outside of their turn figures with Force Leap will never take any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: Figures with the Force symbol, Droids and Mindless figures are unaffected by Force Dominate. After taking a turn with a figure that has this special ability, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of this figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher (12 or higher for a single squad or Dimwitted figure), immediately take a turn with the chosen figure. The chosen figure cannot bond with any other figure. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen figure returns to its owner.
ability_3_desc: After moving a figure with Force - Remote Manipulation Special Attack, and instead of attacking normally, you may choose an Object or a single Common Squad figure within 3 clear sight spaces of this figure, and throw it. Throw Range: Throwing figure's original Life in spaces. Range and is calculated from the object or figure being thrown. In the case of multiple space objects range is calculated from any one space the object occupies that is within 3 clear sight spaces of the thrower. Throwing Objects: Throw Attack Dice: Normal Attack + the Class of the object, divided by 2 (round up fractions). Typical classes are 1 Small (one space), 2 Medium (2 to 3 spaces), 3 Large (4 to 5 spaces), 4 Huge (6+ spaces). Once thrown a Single Space Object is destroyed, remove it from play. When throwing a Multi-Space Object, target one figure or empty space within range and then place the rest of the object in any adjacent space (or spaces). Any figures in a space where an object is placed must first roll defense, and then vacate to any open space adjacent to where they were. In addition to being destroyed, Multi-Spaced Objects will create Class 1 Small sized wreckage in the spaces where the object was placed. Deflecting Thrown Objects: However, if a figure that has the Force - Remote Manipulation Special Attack is attacked with any size, thrown object, and that defending figure takes no damage from the attack, they can stop the object in mid-air (before any other affected figures roll defense dice) and deflect it at another figure or empty space. In this case range is calculated as if the figure that deflected the object threw it from their space. A thrown object can only be deflected once during a turn. Throwing Figures: (Common Squad Figures Only) When throwing a Common Squad Figure, place the thrown figure on any unoccupied space within range. Afterwards, roll 1 die unblockable damage against the thrown figure.

name: Lugnash Bonegnaw
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with Lugnash Bonegnaw, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6-10, figures defending against him roll 1 less defense die. If you roll an 11-15, they roll 2 less defense dice. If you roll a 16-20, they roll 3 less defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on Lugnash Bonegnaw's Army Card, before taking Lugnash Bonegnaw's turn, you may take a turn with one other Troll you control.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Lugnash Bonegnaw, remove 1 Wound Marker from Lugnash Bonegnaw's Army Card.

name: Lung Wang
ability_1_desc: Lung Wang does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. If Lung Wang's entire move consists of water spaces, including his starting space, he may move 3 additional spaces. The 3 additional spaces must also be on water spaces.
ability_2_desc: Range: 6, Attack 3/2. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Scald Special Attack. Lung Wang only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for the chosen figure and 2 attack dice once for all other affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Lung Wang cannot be affected by his own Scald Special Attack.

name: Lutdrid Stormforge
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, place 2 copper markers on this Army Card. After Lutdrid Stormforge rolls defense dices against a normal attack, you may remove 1 copper marker from this Army Card to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.
ability_2_desc:
All friendly Dwarf figures adjacent to Lutdrid Stormforge may choose one from this list:
• Add 1 to that unit movement. or
• Add 1 to that unit attack. or
• Add 1 to that unit defense.
Lutdrid Stormforge can't take advantage of this ability.

name: Maggie Jones
ability_1_desc: Range 2. Attack 2 + Special. After moving, Maggie Jones may attack up to four separate times. If Maggie inflicts at least two wounds on a single adjacent Unique Hero, you may target that figure for a second No Quarter Special Attack, adding an attack die for each wound marker on that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Maggie is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Magnatech Agents
ability_1_desc: When a MagnaTech Agent you control is destroyed by a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 MagnaTech Agents you control up to 4 spaces each, and all MagnaTech Agents you control roll an additional 2 defense dice for the duration of the attacking figure's turn. MagnaTech Agents will never take any leaving engagement attacks when using Counter Tactics.

name: MADYAKHOR
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When rolling attack dice for Venomous Quill Special Attack, if Mardyakhor rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure cannot roll any defense dice. Venomous Quill Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Madyakhor's movement, ignore elevations. Madyakhor may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Madyakhor starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Magis Trio
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any figure you control on the battlefield, then roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–8, nothing happens. If you roll a 9–20, move the chosen figure to any space adjacent to a member of the Magis Trio. If the summoned figure is engaged, the figure does not receive any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving a member of the Magis Trio normally, you may choose any empty space that is on the same level within 5 spaces of that of the Magis Trio. Place that of the Magis Trio on the chosen space. When that of the Magis Trio starts to Blink, if he or she is engaged he or she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Major X23
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Major X23 and the chosen figure are also affected by Sweeping Sword Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Major X23 always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Lord Welsley of Hawthorne
ability_1_desc: All friendly Knights and Mercenaries adjacent to Lord Welsley of Hawthorne add 2 to their attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Any Knights or Mercenaries you control adjacent to Lord Welsley of Hawthorne who fail to inflict one or more wounds on their turn must roll one die. If a skull is rolled that figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any unique Army Card you control. For this game the chosen card's class is knight regardless of what is listed on the card.

name: Luke Skywalker
ability_1_desc: Luke Skywalker may re-roll any dice that show blanks when defending or attacking. Force Intuition may only be used to re-roll dice once per attack or defense.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, Luke Skywalker may use his Daring Escape. Choose an adjacent, friendly, small or medium Hero and move both Luke and the chosen figure up to 3 spaces each. Both Luke and the chosen figure must end their movement unengaged and adjacent to each other. In addition, both Luke and the chosen figure may not end their move on a space that either figure occupied before moving. Figures moved by Daring Escape do not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Whenever Luke Skywalker or an adjacent, friendly, small or medium Hero is attacked by an opponent's non-adjacent figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, if it is possible for Luke to use Daring Escape, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-8, roll defense dice normally. If you roll 9 or higher, you must immediately move the defending figure using Daring Escape and neither Luke nor the chosen figure receive any damage.

name: Magma Elemental
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and moving this Magma Elemental, you may move up to 2 other small or medium Lava Resistant Elementals you control.
ability_2_desc: A Magma Elemental can never roll defense dice while it is on a water space.
ability_3_desc: A Magma Elemental never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_4_desc: At the end of each round, you may roll the 20-sided die once for each previously destroyed Magma Elemental you control. If you roll a 19 or higher, you may place a previously destroyed Magma Elemental on an empty molten lava space, if possible.

name: Lord Gaar
ability_1_desc: If Lord Gaar destroys an opponent's small or medium figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Zombies of Morindan. Undead are not affected by Zombie Spawn.

name: Mako
ability_1_desc: While Mako is on a water space, add 2 to his defense. If Mako starts his turn on a water space, add 1 to his movement for that turn. Mako does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.
ability_2_desc: While moving, Mako may add 2 to his Move value if he ends that move adjacent to an opponent's wounded hero.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Mako, you may choose a figure adjacent to Mako and roll the 20-sided die. Add 5 to your roll if Mako did not attack this turn. If you roll a 17 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.

name: MAGIK
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, Magik may use Stepping Discs. Choose any space within 10 spaces of Magik. You may also choose up to two small or medium figures adjacent to Magik. Place Magik on the chosen space and place the chosen figures on same-level spaces adjacent to her. Roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure controlled by an opponent. If you roll a 20 or higher, destroy that figure. Figures moved with Stepping Discs never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If Magik is attacking a Construct, Demon, Mystic, Undead, Wizard or Warforged, add 4 dice to Magik's attack.
ability_3_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.

name: Malleblade Archons
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose an opponent. Choose the Army Card they control with the highest Range, Attack, or Defense Value in that player's Army. All Malleblade Archons you control add to their Army Card stats depending on what value is the highest: Range: +2 Move Value, Attack: +1 Defense Value, Defense: +1 Attack Value. If there is not a single highest stat, you may choose which Value to increase. If all figures with that highest stat are destroyed, choose the next highest stat to use for Battle Adaptability.

name: MALLOK
ability_1_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for a Drow Army Card, you may add 2 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker and taking a turn with Mallok, if Mallok is not engaged, you may take a turn with a Drow hero or squad that you control.
ability_3_desc: Mallok is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Mallok may triple his height.

name: Major F19
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Major F19 does not need clear line of sight when attacking with Mag Rail Special Attack. If he has clear sight, the targeted figure rolls 1 less defense die.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an opponent's figure within 4 spaces of Major F19 and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8-13, your opponent removes one unrevealed Order Markers from that figure's Army Card; If you roll a 14-18, two unrevealed Order Markers are removed. If you roll a 19 or higher, all unrevealed Order Markers are removed. Each removed Order Marker must be placed by your opponent on a different card (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure) than it was removed from. Order Markers must be placed on cards with at least one figure on the battlefield.

name: MAN-BAT
ability_1_desc: Man-Bat may attack at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Man-Bat is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Man-Bat's movement, ignore elevations. Man-Bat may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Man-Bat starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Major Force
ability_1_desc: When Major Force receives any wounds from a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-12, place all received wound markers on this card as normal; If you roll a 13-17, you may move one received wound marker from this card to the card of any Hero figure adjacent to Major Force; If you roll an 18 or higher, you may either move one received wound marker from this card to the card of any Hero figure adjacent to Major Force or remove a wound marker from this card and destroy a squad figure adjacent to Major Force.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Major Force's movement, ignore elevations. Major Force may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Major Force starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Marguul Soldiers
ability_1_desc: All friendly Goblins and Hobgoblins adjacent to one or more Marguul Soldiers you control add 1 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: All Marguul Soldiers you control that are within 2 clear sight spaces of at least one Hero you control with a Militaristic personality receive an additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Marguul Soldiers may move through friendly figures that are engaged. A Marguul Soldier does not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving into or out of a space occupied by a friendly figure.

name: Major X88
ability_1_desc: Range 8, Attack 2. After moving and before attacking choose any small or medium figure within 8 clearsight spaces. The chosen figure may not roll any more than 2 defence dice. If Harpoon gun inflicts a wound move the chosen figure adjacent to Major X88. Major X88 may then attack normally.
ability_2_desc: All small, medium or large opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major X88 may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on any army card of glyph.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defence dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, Major X88 adds 3 dice.

name: Marneus Calgar
ability_1_desc: If at least one order marker is on Marneus Calgar, you may add 5 to your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: The most wounds Marneus Calgar can take from a normal attack is one.
ability_3_desc: When Marneus Calgar attacks, he may attack that figure one additional time.
ability_4_desc: If Marneus Calgar is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to its attack.

name: MAI
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. When Mai attacks with Stiletto Special Attack, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. When Mai attacks with Stiletto Special Attack, she may attack one additional time. Mai may not attack with Stiletto Special Attack if there are no Stiletto Markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 4 Stiletto Markers on this card. After attacking a Unique Hero with Stiletto Special Attack, you may place a Stiletto Marker on that card. After revealing an Order Marker on a figure other than Mai with a Stiletto Marker on its card, you must roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 1-8, the player who controls that figure may return a Stiletto Marker from that figure's card to Mai's card. On a roll of 9 or higher, that figure may not move or use any attack or special power on a non-adjacent figure for this turn.
ability_3_desc: Mai is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Maredian Turncoats
ability_1_desc: When a Maredian Turncoat is attacked by a normal attack from a Maredian figure that doesn't follow Utgar the attacking figure rolls one additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a wounded Soulborg hero figure adjacent to a Maredian Turncoat. Then roll the 20-sided die to add or remove wound markers from the chosen figure's card. If you roll a 1, add 2 markers. If you roll a 2-5, remove 1 marker. If you roll a 6-17, remove up to 2 markers. If you roll 18-20, remove all markers.

name: Marro Bloodhound
ability_1_desc: Whenever a unique marro figure you control is wounded you may immediatly take a turn with Marro Bloodhound.
ability_2_desc: While engaged with Marro Bloodhound opposing figures roll 2 less defense dice than normal.

name: Marro Augers
ability_1_desc: Marro Augers do not need clear line of sight to attack with their normal attack. When a Marro Auger attacks a figure that is not within clear line of sight and at least 1 skull is rolled, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-5, the defending figure takes no damage. If you roll a 6 or higher, the defending figure rolls defense dice normally.

name: Marrden Runners
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Marrden Runner, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Marrden Runner at the start of this turn, that Marrden Runner adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled. If the defending figure receives one or more wounds, destroy the attacking Marrden Runner.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Marrden Runners may double their Height.

name: Marro Remainder
ability_1_desc: Marro Remainders do not start the game on the battlefield. When rolling for the Cell Divide special power of a Marro Divider you control, if you a 1 or 2 you must immediately destroy that divider and replace it, if possible, with one of your Marro Remainders that is not on the battlefield.

name: Man-Thing
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Man-Thing. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. Fear Touch cannot affect Robots or figures with the fearless personality.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Man-Thing adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When Man-Thing is on a swamp, swamp water or water space, add 1 to his attack and defense. Man-Thing does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.

name: Mandla
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 black Curse markers on this Army Card. After moving and before attacking, if you have at least 1 Curse marker on this card, you may choose an opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces. Place a Curse marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. (If that player has more than one common card for that figure, all of those cards are affected by the Curse marker.)
ability_2_desc: For the entire game, after any player takes a turn with a unit other than Mandla that has one or more Curse markers on its Army Card, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-7, that player must place 1 wound on one of that Army Card's figures. If you roll 8-18, nothing happens. If you roll 19 or higher, remove 1 Curse marker from that Army Card.

name: Marbis Benthammer
ability_1_desc: If Marbis is unengaged and adjacent to a Mok you control, then instead of attacking with Marbis you may remove him from the battlefield and place him on Mok's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. If the defending figure is wounded by Gunner Mod Ricochet Special Attack, you must choose another figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the wounded figure, if possible. Roll 2 attack dice against the chosen figure. If Marbis is on the Army Card of Mok, you may use this Special Attack in place of one of Mok's Gunner Special Attacks. While engaged, Mok may target and attack nonadjacent figures with Gunner Mod Ricochet Special Attack.

name: Marr Gorgevine
ability_1_desc: A Marr Gorgevine adds 1 to its Attack and Defense values for every other Marr Gorgevine or Marro Hive you control within 4 clear-sight spaces, for a maximum of 4 additional Attack and Defense for Deadly Grove.
ability_2_desc: When a Marr Gorgevine destroys a figure, it may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of a Marr Gorgevine, and its base is no more than 3 levels above that Marr Gorgevine's height or 3 levels below its base, that Marr Gorgevine may add 1 to its Range when attacking that figure.

name: Marro Mutation
ability_1_desc: Marro Mutations do not start the game on the battlefield. When rolling for the Water Clone special power of a Marro Warrior you control, if you a 1 or 2 you must immediately destroy that Marro Warrior and replace it, if possible, with one of your Marro Mutations that is not on the battlefield..
ability_2_desc: When a Marro Mutation attacks, it may attack one additional time.

name: Marro Brute
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to this Marro Brute's attack and defense dice for every Marro you control within 4 clear sight spaces of this Marro Brute up to a maximum of +3 dice.
ability_2_desc: After moving this Marro Brute, roll the 20-sided die. If this Marro Brute is engaged, add 5 to your die roll. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move one Marro Savage you contol up to 5 spaces.

name: Malekith
ability_1_desc: If there is only one Malekith on the battlefield, during your turns all water, ice and snow spaces on the battlefield are considered normal ice. During all of your opponent's turns all ice and snow spaces are considered slippery ice. Malekith rolls one extra die when attacking a figure on an ice space.
ability_2_desc: When Malekith is targeted for a normal attack from an opponent's non-adjacent figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, Malekith no longer has any visible hit zone for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Malekith's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Marrden Sentry
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to a Marrden Sentry, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with a Marrden Sentry.
ability_2_desc: When a Marrden Sentry attacks, it may attack up to two additional times.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Marrden Sentry may double its Height.

name: Marrden Tracker
ability_1_desc: Any Marro or Nagrub figures you control may add 1 to their Move value. A figure must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure that is within 4 clear sight spaces of at least one Marrden Tracker you control in order to be affected by Spot Prey. This power does not affect Marrden Trackers.
ability_2_desc: While moving, a Marrden Tracker may add 2 to it's move number. If it does, it cannot attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Marrden Tracker may double its Height.

name: Marrden Broodwatcher
ability_1_desc: After moving, if an opponent figure within 4 clear sight spaces is not engaged with any figures, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16-19, you may move up to 3 common Marro or Wulsinu figures you control adjacent to the Marrden Broodwatcher. If you roll a 20 or higher, you may place 1 Marro Warlord or Hivelord you control adjacent to the targeted figure.
ability_2_desc: If a Marrden Broodwatcher is within 3 spaces of a Marro Hive you control, add 3 dice to its attack and defense.
ability_3_desc: Any Nagrub Guards adjacent to a Marrden Broodwatcher receive an additional defense die.

name: MAO
ability_1_desc: You may look at the Order Markers on the card of any figure within 6 spaces of Mao. If you have not looked at any Order Markers this round, before moving, you may choose one figure within 3 spaces of Mao. You may add 5 to your Manipulator roll against that figure. Soulborgs, Constructs, and figures with the Mindless personality are not affected by The Seal of Absolute Sound.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Mao, choose an adjacent figure. Roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 8 or higher, you may attack with that figure. After attacking with that figure, the player who controlled the figure before Manipulator was used may move that figure normally. Figures with the Mindless or Valiant personality are not affected by Manipulator.
ability_3_desc: If there are more than 6 figures within 2 spaces of Mao, subtract one from the attack and defense of this card and before taking a turn with Mao roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 1-5, you may not take a turn with Mao.

name: Marro Shifter
ability_1_desc: Whenever this Marro Shifter is destroyed by normal or special attack, you may choose a small or medium Marro Squad figure you control within 5 clear sight spaces of this Marro Shifter and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen Squad figure and replace that figure with this Marro Shifter. Remove all wound markers from this Marro Shifter.
ability_2_desc: This Marro Shifter can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. After moving, roll the 20-sided die for each figure this Marro Shifter moved through this turn. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure receives a wound. A figure cannot receive more than 1 wound from Phase Rush each turn.

name: Lolth's Venom
ability_1_desc: When Lolth's Venom attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurai or Lolth's Venom.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Lolth's Venom attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack Lolth's Venom.

name: Masha Shingai
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one revealed Order Marker on this Army Card, then all Squad figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Masha Shingai must subtract 1 from their attack. Samurai are not affected by Terror of the Honorless.
ability_2_desc: When Masha Shingai, or any Samurai that you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Masha Shingai, receives one or more wounds from a normal attack by an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, deal one wound to the attacking figure.

name: Massgrave Zombie
ability_1_desc: When the Massgrave Zombie attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When the Massgrave Zombie destroys a small or medium figure, you may remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with the Massgrave Zombie, you may place up to 3 wound markers on this Army card. You may not place enough wounds to destroy this figure. For each wound marker placed, you may place one of your previously-destroyed Undead Savage Squad figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to the Massgrave Zombie.

name: Master Ukeme Roberts
ability_1_desc: Master Ukeme Roberts may attack all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When three or more enemy figures are adjacent to Master Kohen Russell, 1 shields will block all wounds.

name: Marrden Dreadwings
ability_1_desc: Before moving a Marrden Dreadwing, you may choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure on a lower level than that Marrden Dreadwing. The chosen figure rolls 2 less defense dice when defending against that Marrden Dreadwing this turn. Figures that have the Flying or Stealth Flying special power are not affected by Dive Bomb.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Marrden Dreadwings, one at a time, you must roll the 20-sided die for each figure wounded by the Marrden Dreadwings that turn. Add 1 to your die roll for every wound that was inflicted on the wounded figure that turn by Marrden Dreadwings you control. If you roll an 18 or higher, that figure receives 2 wounds. Soulborgs are not affected by Venom Overdose.
ability_3_desc: Flying

name: Mauhúr, Patrol Leader
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Mauhúr, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Mauhúr at the start of this turn, Mauhúr receives 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Berserker Charge power on any Army Card.

name: Marro Smoker
ability_1_desc: All figures within 6 spaces of at least one Marro Smoker subtract 4 from their range. Marro Smoke Cloud can not reduce any figure's range to less than 1. Marro, Nagrubs, and Wulsinu are not affected by this Marro Smoke Cloud.
ability_2_desc: When any Marro Smoker you control is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, all Marro Smokers you control no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_3_desc: Marro Hive can rebirth a Marro Smoker with its Marro Rebirth special power instead of a common Marro Squad Figure and can activate a Marro Smoker with its Hive Mind special power instead of a common Marro Squad.

name: Master of the Hunt
ability_1_desc: After attacking an opponent's Unique Hero with this Master of the Hunt's normal attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound inflicted in that attack. For each additional skull rolled, place 1 additional wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Master of the Hunt, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, add 3 to this Master of the Hunt's Range value for the duration of his turn.

name: Foot Ninja
ability_1_desc: If a Foot Ninja figure attacks and wounds a figure it may immediately move up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Foot Ninjas can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Matilda
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Matilda, you may first take a turn with any Human Scientist you control.
ability_2_desc: If Matilda is adjacent to Brain Eater at the beginning of his turn, you may remove one wound marker from his army card prior to moving him.
ability_3_desc: If Brain Eater dies add 3 to Matilda's Attack, 2 to her Defense and 2 to her Move.

name: Master Disple
ability_1_desc: All Monks you control may move 1 additional space when using the Stealth Leap Special Power.
ability_2_desc: When attacking, Master Disple may either attack all opponent's figures adjacent to him or attack the same figure twice. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Master Disple may Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for leaping, ignore elevations. Disple may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Master Disple may not leap more than 2 levels up or down in a single leap. If Disple is engaged, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Maximus
ability_1_desc: Range 1, Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack, any figure adjacent to the chosen figure are affected by the Axe Swing Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Master Piandao
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game choose an adjacent friendly non-Bender Unique Hero with a range of 1 to be Master Piandao's Apprentice. For the rest of the game, Master Piandao's Apprentice adds one automatic skull when attacking an adjacent opponent's figure with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's adjacent figure with a normal attack, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. When defending against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Master Kohen Russell
ability_1_desc: Master Kohen Russell may attack all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 +Special. Attack 3. Choose an adjacent figure to attack. If the chosen figure receive enough wounds to be destroy, then choose another figure from 3 clear spaces of that figure, and attack it. You can continue doing this Special Attack until you don't destroy a figure. Place Master Kohen Russell adjacent to the last figure affected by this power.
ability_3_desc: When three or more enemy figures are adjacent to Master Kohen Russell, 1 shields will block all wounds.

name: Master Aldorn
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Master Aldorn, you may attempt to summon any previously destroyed Visages of Aldorn. Roll the 20-sided die once for each destroyed Visage. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may place that Visage within 3 spaces of Master Aldorn. After rolling for all destroyed Visages, if there is at least 1 Visage of Aldorn on the battlefield, you may immediately take a turn with the Visages of Aldorn.
ability_2_desc: All friendly terrifying squad figures with a range of 1 within 3 spaces of Master Aldorn roll an additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Master Aldorn can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_4_desc: Master Aldorn does not take falling damage and may ignore all effects from terrain tiles he moves onto or occupies.

name: Melian, The Elf Warrior
ability_1_desc: When Melian, The Elf Warrior attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Melian, The Elf Warrior rolls defense dices agains a non-adjacent attack, she may add 1 more dice to its defense.

name: RE-TROK-SA
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 2 Bleeder Spear Markers on this card. Whenever a figure, other than Re-Trok-Sa, with a Bleeder Spear marker on its Army Card begins to take a turn, that figure receives a wound. If that wound destroys the figure, place the spear marker on the space the previously destroyed figure occupied. If Re-Trok-Sa ends his move adjacent to a Bleeder Spear Marker, you may place that marker on this card. Figures cannot occupy the same space as a Bleeder Spear Marker.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. There must be at least one Bleeder Spear Marker on this card to use this special attack. If Re-Trok-Sa inflicts a wound on a Unique Hero with Spear Throw Special Attack, place a Bleeder Spear Marker on the wounded Hero's Army Card. If Re-Trok-Sa does not inflict a wound, or destroys the target figure, with Spear Throw Special Attack place the spear marker adjacent to the targeted figure.

name: Master Juan
ability_1_desc: When a small or medium figure is not destroyed by an attack from Master Juan, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may Knockback the figure by moving it 3 spaces away from Master Juan in a straight line. The figure must be on the same space level or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Knockback Kick never takes any leaving engagement attacks. Falling damage will apply. If that figure ends adjacent to or stops in front of another figure, roll 4 attack dice once against both figures. Each Figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Master Juan may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: Matlliost The Great
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice or defense dice, if you are rolling more dice than your opponent add 1 dice to your roll.
ability_2_desc: When Matlliost The Great becomes engaged with a single hero, no other figures may engage either figure. Both Figures no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of their engagement.
ability_3_desc: If Matlliost the Great has 3 or more wounds on his army card and all orders markers for a round are placed on his Army card, he may attack until he does not inflict a wound.

name: Mayma
ability_1_desc: After moving and before atttacking, you may place the Sun Marker on this Army Card. If the Moon Marker is on this card, remove it. All figures and special attacks with a Range number of 4 or more add 1 to their Range number.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may place the Moon Marker on this Army Card. If the Sun Marker is on this card, remove it. All figures and special attacks with a Range number of 4 or more subtract 1 from their Range number.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Mayma may triple his height.

name: Melmoth
ability_1_desc: Each time Melmoth destroys a figure, you may remove a Wound Marker from this Army Card. If the figure Melmoth destroys is large or huge, then remove an additional Wound Marker from this Army Card. Melmoth cannot remove a Wound Marker when he destroys a destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Melmoth, remove 1 Wound Marker from Melmoth's Army Card.

name: Matlliost the Great
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice or defense dice, if you are rolling more dice than your opponent add 1 dice to your roll.
ability_2_desc: When Matlliost The Great becomes engaged with a single hero, no other figures may engage either figure. Both Figures no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of their engagement.
ability_3_desc: If Matlliost the Great has 3 or more wounds on his army card and all orders markers for a round are placed on his Army card, he may attack until he does not inflict a wound.

name: Merfolk Blademaster
ability_1_desc: When defending with a Merfolk Blademaster, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_2_desc: Merfolk Blademasters do not have to stop their movement when entering a water space.

name: Mercury I
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Mercury I, you may roll Ullar Valkyrie dice. If you roll at least one Ullar symbol, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Laser Precision can be used only once for each attack roll.
ability_2_desc: When Mercury I attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When Mercury I rolls defense dice against a normal attack, you may roll Ullar Valkyrie dice. If the attacking figure is not adjacent to Mercury I, one Ullar Symbol will block all damage. If the attacking figure is adjacent to Mercury I, all Ullar Symbol's rolled count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Merchant
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 symbol-side up Treasure Glyphs on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After this Merchant rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a Unique Hero figure, you may place a Treasure Glyph on the attacking hero's Army Card to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Unique Hero figure you control that is adjacent to this Merchant, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph and if there is at least 1 symbol-side up Treasure Glyph on this Army Card, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, you may reveal a Treasure Glyph and place it on the Army Card for that Hero.

name: Repulsor Deltamagnus
ability_1_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, all Soulborgs you control who follow Jandar add 1 extra die to their attack if at least one Omnicron Repulsor is adjacent to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: When defending with Repulsor Deltamagnus, each shield rolled counts for one additional block and the attacking figure must immediately end its turn and remove an order marker from its Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one) for each excess shield rolled.
ability_3_desc: Friendly small and medium Soulborg figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Repulsor Deltamagnus ignore height when moving up and down elevations.

name: Mirage
ability_1_desc: When any living creature attacks Mirage, she receives a +3 on her defense. When they attack a friendly figure within 4 clear line of sight hexes of Mirage, they receive a +2 on their defense.

name: Alien
ability_1_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Alien may triple his height and count each 3 levels of terrain as 1 space.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, add 1 to Alien's defense. If you roll any excess shields, the attacking figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: When Alien receives one or more wounds from a normal attack, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Alien. If you roll a 14-18, that figure receives 1 wound. If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure receives 2 wounds. Xenomorphs are not affected by Acid Blood Splatter.

name: Megatron
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to Megatron, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may be targeted only as the move into engagement with Megatron.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Megatron's card, instead of taking that turn with Megatron, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Megatron.
ability_3_desc: Each time Megatron attacks a Hero figure and inflicts at least 1 wound but does not destroy the figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-14 nothing happens. If you roll 15 or higher, place enough wound markers on the defending figure's Army Card to leave the figure with only one life remaining.
ability_4_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Megatron always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Minion from Kor-Van-Dar
ability_1_desc: Each time the Minion from Kor-Van-Dar destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. The Minion from Kor-Van-Dar cannot Life Drain Destructible Objects.
ability_2_desc: If at least another friendly Ghoul figure is adjacent to Kanton, he may roll one additional defense dice.

name: Melkion
ability_1_desc: When any Templar you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Melkion receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you may roll 9 Einar Valkyrie dice before removing the figure. If you roll at least 3 Einar symbols, ignore any wounds that figure just received. Melkion's Sacred Phoenix does not affect Melkion.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Melkion attacks with Flaming Columun Special Attack, add 1 to Melkion's attack dice for every Fire Elemental you control engaged with the targetted figure, up to a maximum of +3 dice.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking with Melkion, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 9 or higher, you may, if possible, place one of your previously destroyed Fire Elementals on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Melkion.

name: MINOTAUR RAGER
ability_1_desc: This Minotaur Rager may add 3 to his Move number and 2 to his Attack number as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. This Minotaur Rager must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Goring Charge.
ability_2_desc: If this Minotaur Rager does not move, he may attack any or all figures adjacent to him.

name: The Heat
ability_1_desc: While moving, Heat figures may add 7 to their move number. Each Heat figure that does cannot attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: Heat figures roll an additional die when attacking or defending against common figures. Heat figures may pick up and use Treasure Glyphs like a Unique Hero, placing them on this Army Card. All Heat figures can use any Treasure Glyphs on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Heat figures never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Maz'gath Demon
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with this Maz'gath Demon, you may first take a turn with up to 2 engaged friendly Small Demons within 5 Spaces of this Maz'gath Demon.
ability_2_desc: When this Maz'gath Demon is destroyed, roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-6 nothing happens. If you roll an 7 or higher, remove all wound markers on this card then, if possible, place this Maz'gath Demon on any unoccupied space within an opponents start zone then place a "Maz'gath" Marker on this card. Cards with one or more "Maz'gath" Markers may not use the "Send Them Home" special power.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Maz'gath Demon's movement, ignore elevations. Maz'gath Demon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Maz'gath Demon starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mister Hyde
ability_1_desc: Before moving Mister Hyde, you may add 3 to his Move number this turn. If you do, subtract 2 from his Attack number this turn.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Mister Hyde, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack again with Mister Hyde.

name: MIMIC
ability_1_desc: This Mimic does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, whenever an opponent's figure springs a trap for a Treasure Glyph, you may instead place this Mimic on a space adjacent to that figure and immediately take a turn with that Mimic. Place that Treasure Glyph on this Army Card. When this Mimic is destroyed, place that Treasure Glyph on the space this Mimic previously occupied, if possible.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a figure breaks engagement with this Mimic, after that figure ends its movement, this Mimic may immediately move up to 5 spaces and attack that figure, if possible.

name: Omni-Man
ability_1_desc: When Omni-Man attacks, if the highest numbered revealed Order Marker on this card is higher than the highest numbered revealed Order Marker on the defending figure's card, add 1 die to Omni-Man's attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Omni-Man's movement, ignore elevations. Omni-Man may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Omni-Man starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Omni-Man may ignore any wounds taken from leaving engagement attacks if he moves with his Flying Special Power and ends that movement adjacent to at least one opponent figure that he was not engaged with at the start of his move.

name: Octavia Melody
ability_1_desc: When defending with Octavia, add 1 defense die for each other adjacent Entertainer you control, up to a maximum of +3.
ability_2_desc: Octavia may add 1 to her attack and defense for every revealed order marker on her Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After you take a turn with Octavia, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Octavia.

name: Merian the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Horrors from the Shadow Land

name: Molog Bloodaxe
ability_1_desc: If Molog Bloodaxe is attacking a unique hero, add 6 dice to Molog's attack roll.
ability_2_desc: If Molog Bloodaxe is attacking a large or huge common figure, add 6 dice to Molog's attack roll.
ability_3_desc: Molog Bloodaxe stats are never modified by glyphs or special powers. If Molog is attacked by an adjacent common squad figure subtract 4 dice from Molog's defense roll.

name: Minotaur Pit Fighter
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Before or after attacking normally, this Minotaur Pit Fighter may attack with Gore Special attack. When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by Gore Special Attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may place that figure on any empty space adjacent to this Minotaur Pit Fighter. A figure moved by Gore Special Attack never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Gore Special Attack can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Misaerx the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Each time this figure destroys a figure, you may remove a Wound Marker from this Army Card. This figure cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When Misaerx the Kyrie Warrior is destroyed, place this figure on the Army Card of a Unique Warrior Hero that follows Revna. That Hero now has Life Drain.

name: Mockingbird
ability_1_desc: When Mockingbird attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: After Mockingbird rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent opponent's figure, if she is still adjacent to the attacking figure, you may place Mockingbird on any other space adjacent to the attacking figure, if possible. Mockingbird does not take any leaving engagement attacks when using Defensive Vault.
ability_3_desc: If Mockingbird takes no damage from a normal attack by an adjacent figure, the attacking figure receives a wound.

name: Dark Shadows
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, instead of attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. On a 17 or higher, all figures within 6 spaces of the Dark Shadows take 3 wounds.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for movement of any of the Dark Shadows, ignore elevations. The Dark Shadows may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Dark Shadows start to fly, if they is engaged they will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wasp
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is placed on this card and you win initiative, before revealing any Order Markers, you may move up to 3 friendly figures 2 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. When attacking with Triple Sting Special Attack, Wasp may attack up to 2 additional times and may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack. Defending figures roll 1 less defense die for each additional time they are attacked this turn by Wasp's Triple Sting Special Attack and at least one skull is rolled, up to a maximum of 2 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Wasp's movement, ignore elevations. Wasp may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Wasp starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Minotaur Thug
ability_1_desc: If this Minotaur Thug inflicts one or more wounds to a Unique or Uncommon Hero, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, then the Hero must drop each Treasure Glyph that he is currently has on his Army Card on empty same level adjacent spaces. If there are no empty same level spaces or not enough spaces each Treasure Glyph then the Treasure Glyphs are destroyed.
ability_2_desc: When a Minotaur Thug rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 3 defense dice to the defending Minotaur Thug.

name: Molten Lava Snake
ability_1_desc: Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-8, destroy disfigure. If you roll 9 or higher, all figures adjacent to this Molten Lava Snake will receive 1 wound. Then remove this Molten Lava Snake from the game.
ability_2_desc: Molten Lava Snake never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and she does not have to stop in molten lava spaces.

name: Trigon
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Choose up to 3 figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Trigon to attack with Trigon's Demonic Energy Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. When taking a turn with any other figure(s) you control, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, one figure you control may attack with Trigon's Demonic Energy Special Attack instead of their own normal attack. All references to Trigon on this Special Attack would instead refer to the attacking figure for the duration of their turn.
ability_2_desc: Each time Trigon destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Trigon cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving Trigon normally, you may choose any empty space within 4 spaces of Trigon and place Trigon on the chosen space. When Trigon starts to teleport, if he is engaged, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Moani the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: If any small or medium figure you control is adjacent to Moani the Kyrie Warrior, opponents' figures must be adjacent to that figure to attack it with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Moani the Kyrie Warrior's movement, ignore elevations. Moani the Kyrie Warrior may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Moani the Kyrie Warrior starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Iceman
ability_1_desc: When Iceman wounds a Unique Hero figure with his normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that figure's card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Iceman's movement, ignore elevations.
