Iceman may Ice Slide over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged and over obstacles such as ruins. Iceman may not Ice Slide more than 40 levels up in a single slide. If Iceman is engaged when he starts to Ice Slide, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. While moving with Ice Slide, Iceman may add 2 to his Move value if those additional spaces do not include any height increases.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When Iceman is moving with his Ice Slide, instead of attacking normally, he can attack up to 3 times with Ice Shards Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as he is on a space where he can end his movement. Iceman cannot attack the same figure more than once in a single turn with Ice Shards Special Attack. When using Ice Shards Special Attack, Iceman is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Momo
ability_1_desc: When moving up levels of height to move onto a space with Momo, do not count spaces for the first two levels and you may ignore Momo's height of 2. Momo never takes falling damage and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure begins its turn adjacent to Momo, roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 13 or higher, the figure ends its turn and Momo must move 4 spaces. Momo may not use Distraction if he would end his movement adjacent to an opponent's figure.

name: Mongul
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally with Mongul, you may place him on any empty space within 8 spaces. If Mongul is engaged when he uses Limited Teleportation, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. After attacking normally, Mongul may attack with his Chest Cannon Special Attack. Mongul cannot attack using his Chest Cannon Special Attack on the same turn he uses Limited Teleportation.

name: Mordor Orc Warriors
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Mordor Orc Warriors, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with Mordor Orc Warriors.

name: Jean Grey
ability_1_desc: Before revealing an Order Marker and taking a turn with any figure you control, if there is at least one unrevealed Order Marker on this card, you may move one unrevealed Order Marker from any Army Card you control to any other Army Card you control. Jean Grey may only use Telepathic Link once per round.
ability_2_desc: When Jean Grey is attacking or defending, and isn't already affected by Phoenix Force, before rolling combat dice, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to your roll for each wound marker on this card. If you roll 19 or higher, all figures adjacent to Jean Grey immediately receive 1 wound and Jean Grey is affected by Phoenix Force for all remaining rounds until Jean Grey is destroyed. When affected by Phoenix Force add 3 to the Range, Attack and Defense values on this card and Jean Grey cannot use her Telekinetic Link Special Power.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Jean Grey's movement, ignore elevations. Jean Grey may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Jean Grey starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mordor Orc Spearmen
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium figure, if a Mordor Orc Spearman rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure cannot roll any defense dice.

name: Moria Goblin Archers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Moria Goblins, you may first take a turn with any Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Moria Goblins are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Morannon Orcs
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Morannon Orc you control, if the defending figure is engaged with at least 2 other Orcs you control, it subtracts 2 from its defense dice.
ability_2_desc: You may attack with any 4 Morannon Orcs, even Orcs you did not move this turn.
ability_3_desc: Morannon Orcs are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: MINDHORN
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Mindhorn. The opponent rolls a 20-sided die and then you roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to your roll if the figure is female. If your roll is higher, the opponent must reveal and remove an order marker from one of his or her Army Cards, if possible.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for defense, if Mindhorn rolls at least 1 shield, he may move 1 space and roll 1 additional defense die. If he rolls a shield, he may continue moving 1 space and rolling 1 additional die up to a maximum of 3 additional dice. If he ends his moves adjacent to the attacking figure, all excess shields rolled count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. After moving, if the attacking figure is non-adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Mindhorn may move through all figures, is never attacked for leaving an engagement, and is never chosen for an engagement strike.

name: Moon Knight
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. After attacking normally, Moon Knight may attack 2 times with Crescent Darts Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Moon Knight never rolls for falling damage.
ability_3_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.

name: Morgan Cipher
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Soulborg or Cyborg adjacent to Morgan Cipher is destroyed, you may place 1 silver Metal Marker on this card, up to a maximum of 3. After moving and before attacking, you may remove a Metal Marker from this card and remove 1 wound marker from this card or the card of any adjacent Soulborg or Cyborg.

name: Minotaur Trailblazers
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Instead of attacking normally three unengaged adjacent Minotaur Trailblazers may attack with Starfall Special Attack. Starfall Special Attack affects all figures with 6 spaces of the Minotaur Trailblazers. Minotaur Trailblazers do not need to have a clear line of sight to any of the affected figures. Starfall Special Attack does not affected Minotaur Trailblazers.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a wounded small, medium, or large Hero figure you control that is adjacent to a Minotaur Trailblazer, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 Wound Marker from that Hero's Army Card. You may only roll for Wild Growth once by Order Marker.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Minotaur Trailblazers always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled

name: Morgoloth
ability_1_desc: When Morgoloth attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Friendly small figures who follow Utgar or Valkrill are never attacked when leaving an engagement with a figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Morgoloth.
ability_3_desc: All Demons you control, except Morgoloth, move one additional space.

name: MORDOR TROLL
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 5. All figures adjacent to both this Mordor Troll and the defending figure are also affected by Sweeping Club Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: This Mordor Troll rolls one additional die when defending against a normal attack from figures with an Attack Value of 3 or less.

name: MURJ
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Murj, you may take one additional turn with Murj.

name: Morag
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Morag may use this special attack twice in the same turn. He cannot attack the same figure more than once. If the defending figure rolls a shield on every die, ignore any wounds that figure would have received from Shadow Burst Special Attack, if any. Then place two wounds on that figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Morag's movement, ignore elevation. Morag may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Morag starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Morsbana
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 brown Negation Markers on this card. At the end of the turn, if you have at least 1 Negation Marker on this card, you may choose any opponents unique figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Morsbana. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-15, nothing happens. If you roll a 16-19, place a Negation Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated for the entire game. If you roll a 20, destroy the chosen figure.

name: Moria Goblins
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Moria Goblin you control, if the defending figure is engaged with at least 2 other Moria Goblins you control, it subtracts 2 from its defense dice.
ability_2_desc: If a Moria Goblin is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack it with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: While moving up or down levels of terrain, Moria Goblins can double their height, and every two levels moved up or down only count as one space.

name: Chandra Nalaar
ability_1_desc: Choose a hero figure within 7 clear sight spaces of Chandra. Chandra inflicts 1 damage to the chosen hero.
ability_2_desc: Choose a squad figure within 3 clear sight spaces. Chandra inflicts 1 damage to the chosen squad figure and 1 damage to herself. She may continue using this power until there are no squad figures to choose or until she is dead.
ability_3_desc: When Chandra is destroyed or placed in reserve, she first inflicts 10 damage to all enemy figures adjacent to her.

name: Chandra Nalaar
ability_1_desc: Choose a figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Chandra. Chandra inflicts 1 damage to the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: When using a Temporary Glyph, Chandra may inflict 2 wounds to herself to use that Glyph an additional time.
ability_3_desc: If Chandra is destroyed or placed in reserve, immediately choose up to 6 figures within 6 spaces prior to her removal. Chandra inflicts 6 damage to each.

name: Chandra Nalaar
ability_1_desc: Choose a hero and a squad figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Chandra. Chandra inflicts 1 damage to each and subtracts 1 Defense from each.
ability_2_desc: After removing an order marker from any Army Card you control and instead of taking the turn, you may take a turn with Chandra.
ability_3_desc: After removing order marker "1" or "2", you may remove all other order markers from all cards you control to let Chandra attack two additional times this turn.

name: MORSBANE
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 brown Negation Markers on this card. At the end of the turn, if you have at least 1 Negation Marker on this card, you may choose any opponent's Unique figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Morsbane. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-15, nothing happens. If you roll a 16-19, place a Negation Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated for the entire game. If you roll a 20, destroy the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: When Morsbane rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Mothra
ability_1_desc: If Mothra attacks a figure that was further than 5 clear sight space from him at the start of his turn, roll one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When Mothra rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 3 defense dice to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mothra's movement, ignore elevations. Mothra may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mothra starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mountain Troll
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose another figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by the Blade Of Udon Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When defending with the Mountain Troll, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.

name: Morbius Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to your initiative roll for each order marker on any Terrifying Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Each time Morbius Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Morbius Esenwein cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with Morbius Esenwein, he receives 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Morbius Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations. Morbius Esenwein may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Morbius Esenwein starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nissa Revane
ability_1_desc: Place any Loyal figure from your reserve on any land space adjacent to Nissa.
ability_2_desc: At the end of turn, remove 2 wounds from this card for each Elf you control that is adjacent to Nissa.
ability_3_desc: All Elf figures you control are Loyal for the duration of the game. Remove all wounds from the cards of destroyed Elf figures you control. Place all destroyed Elf figures you control in reserve. * Use this power only once.

name: Chandra Nalaar
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Chandra, Chandra inflicts 4 wounds to any figure adjacent to her.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for initiative, Chandra may inflict 3 wounds to herself to force all players to reroll initiative. You add 3 to this roll.
ability_3_desc: When Chandra uses a Temporary Glyph, it's placed in reserve and isn't destroyed. Chandra may inflict 7 wounds to herself to immediately use and permanently remove from the game all Temporary Glyphs in your reserve.

name: Nissa Revane
ability_1_desc: If you add Nissa Revane to your army, you must also immediately add 1 to 4 Awoken Land figures to your army.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Nissa, take a turn with up to 4 different Awoken Land figures you control.
ability_3_desc: Place all figures in your reserve within 2 clear sight spaces of Nissa. For the duration of the game, all figures you control are copies of Awoken Land figures. * Use this power only once. * Nissa is not affected by her own power.

name: Ms. Marvel (Embiggened)
ability_1_desc: Your army can only include Ms. Marvel (Embiggened) if it also includes Ms. Marvel (Kamala Khan). Ms. Marvel (Embiggened) never starts the game on the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Ms. Marvel (Embiggened) may not move. Figures affected by Grappler cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Ms. Marvel (Embiggened), and its base is no more than 3 levels above her height or 3 levels below her base, she may add 1 to her Range when attacking that figure.

name: Mountain Giants
ability_1_desc: When a Mountain Giant rolls defense dice, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by an attack from a Mountain Giant, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may Knockback the figure by placing it on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of that Mountain Giant. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Knockback never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Knockback can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Space Marine Multi-Melta
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Space Marine Multi-Melta may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 1, 3, or 5 Instead of Moving and Attacking, you may instead use Multi-Melta Special Attack. If the target is within range 2, roll 5 dice, if the target is between range 3 and 4, roll 3 dice, if the target is at range 5, roll 1 die. After Defense is rolled, the target must reroll all shields once. Figures with Lava Resistance are unaffected by this attack.

name: Nathaniel Teager
ability_1_desc: If you do not win initiative remove all order markers from this army card.
ability_2_desc: Nathaniel Teager does not start the game on the board. After revealing an order marker on Nathaniel Teager you may declare an attack on any figure on the board. Place Nathaniel Teager adjacent to the targeted figure and roll the attack normally. Remove Nathaniel Teager from the board at the end of the round. You may continue using Invisibility until Nathaniel Teager is destroyed.

name: MYZERRIR
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose two additional figures adjacent to the first chosen figure. Roll attack dices separately for each figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Myzerrir's movement, ignore elevations. Myzerrir may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Myzerrir starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nadezhda Kurova
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Nadezhda Kurova, instead of taking a turn with Nadezha, you may take a turn with 1 large or huge Beast you control or up to 3 small or medium Beasts you control that are within 8 clear sight spaces of Nadezhda.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Nadezhda Kurova. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Nadezhda Kurova this turn.

name: The Lakers
ability_1_desc: Three unadjacent Lakers engaged with the same figure add 1 to their attack dice when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: Lakers do not have to stop their movement when entering a water space. Add 1 to a Laker's attack and defense dice while he is on a water space.
ability_3_desc: If only one Laker moves and attacks this turn, he may add 2 to his move, add 3 to his range, and add 3 to his attack dice.

name: Myconid Circle Wardens
ability_1_desc: Before Myconid Circle Warden rolls defense dice against an adjacent opposing figure's attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, that opposing figure's attack is neutralized and does no damage to any figures this turn. If you roll a 12 or lower, roll defense dice normally.
ability_2_desc: When a Myconid Circle Warden is attacking an opposing figure which is adjacent to at least one other Myconid Circle Warden, you may add 1 attack die to your attack.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack special. If an opposing figure is surrounded by and adjacent to 6 Circle Wardens, any or all of those Circle Wardens may combine their attack dice when attacking the surrounded figure.

name: Namrah
ability_1_desc: When a player rolls the 20-sided die for a special power for Namrah or friendly figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Illeria, then he may roll a second 20-sided die and choose which die roll to use.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a wounded small or medium Hero figure you control that is adjacent to Namrah, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 Wound Markers from that Hero's Army Card.

name: The Spurs
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, before placing Order Markers, you may choose one of the following for that round: Add 2 to the Spurs' move. Add 3 to the Spurs' range. Add 1 to the Spurs' attack. Add 1 to the Spurs' defense.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to a Spur, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives a wound. If you roll a 4 or lower, that Spur receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: When a Spur receives one or more wounds, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore any wounds.

name: The Celtics
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Lob 12. Attack 3. Three adjacent Celtics may choose to roll a single Big Three Special Attack instead of their normal attacks. No clear line of sight is needed. If three skulls are rolled, the defending figure may not roll defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with The Celtics, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, you may take another turn with The Celtics.
ability_3_desc: When a Celtic is on a green grass space, add 1 to his attack and defense.

name: Mûmak Of The Haradrim
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, this Mûmak may choose a small or medium figure that is adjacent, on the same level, and on a space where the Mûmak may end its movement. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-7, the figure is safe and the Mûmak's movement ends. If you roll 8-20, the chosen figure receives one wound. If the wound destroys the figure, move the Mûmak onto the space occupied, and you may continue moving. If the chosen figure is not destroyed, the Mûmak's movement ends.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. When this Mûmak inflicts as least 1 wound on a small, medium or large hero with Poison Arrow Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 2 additional wounds to the defending figure.

name: Marro Hive
ability_1_desc: You can never use more than one of the following special powers after taking a turn: Rebirth, Repair, or Regenerate.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Marro Hive, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you may place any previously destroyed common Marro squad figure from your army on any empty space adjacent to this Hive.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Marro Hive, you may choose a wounded friendly Marro figure adjacent to this Hive and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, remove 1 wound marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.
ability_4_desc: After taking a turn with this Marro Hive, remove 1 wound marker fom this Hive's Army Card.

name: Myrddin
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Call Lightning Special Attack. Myrddin only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Myrddin can be affected by his own Call Lightning Special Attack. Figures under overhangs cannot be targeted with Call Lightning Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After rolling the 20-sided die for the Army Card of a Small, Medium, or Large Unique Hero you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Myrddin, you may place 1 or 2 wound markers on Myrddin's Army Card. Add 1 to your 20-sided die roll for each wound marker you placed, even if this was enough wounds to destroy Myrddin.

name: Marro Trills
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any one small or medium opponent's figure that is engaged with at least three Marro Trills that you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Marro Trills' movement, ignore elevation. Marro Trills may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Marro Trill starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mind Infinity Gem
ability_1_desc: When this figure rolls the d20, you may add 1 to your roll.
ability_2_desc: If this figure has the Infinity Gauntlet, place this glyph on the Infinity Gauntlet's card and after taking a turn with this figure, choose a Unique Hero within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 18+, take temporary control of that Hero and take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, return control of that Hero to the player who controlled it before this roll.

name: Nemisis Evolution
ability_1_desc: Range 2. Attack 3. After attacking normally this Nemisis Evolution may attack with Combat Tail Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If this Nemisis Evolution is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and this Nemisis Evolution. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 12 or higher, ignore any wounds this Nemisis Evolution just received.

name: Marro Hive
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Marro Hive's Army Card, you may take a turn with any common Marro squad you control before taking a turn with this Hive. Any figure that is taking a turn must be within 17 clear sight spaces of this Marro Hive prior to its movement.
ability_2_desc: When this Marro Hive receives one or more wounds from an opposing figure's normal or special attack, but is not destroyed, you may choose one friendly common Marro squad figure for every wound this Hive just received. Place the chosen figure(s) on any empty space(s) within 2 clear sight spaces of the attacking figure. If summoned figure(s) are engaged, they will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nazgûl of Sauron
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card and taking a turn with a Nazgûl of Sauron, you may take a turn with one other Nazgûl of Sauron you control.
ability_2_desc: An opponent's figure adjacent to one or more Ringwraiths rolls one less attack die. Any time an adjacent figure wounds a Ringwraith with a normal attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Figures with the Fearless personality, Ringwraiths and Robots are not affected by Black Breath of the Nazgûl.

name: Navere
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round before Order Markers are placed, choose a Unique Arachnomancer Hero you control and choose a special power on that Hero's Army Card. That power will be on Navere's Army Card for the entire round or until the chosen Hero is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: When a Drow Hero you control destroys a Drow figure you control with a special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, nothing happens. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may place a previously destroyed Arachnid Common Hero or Arachnid Squad figure you control on the space previously occupied by the destroyed Drow figure.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. Choose a small or medium figure to attack with Dark Feast Special Attack. If Navere wounds the figure you may remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card.

name: N'DK AKIK
ability_1_desc: All Corsairs you control with no unrevealed order markers on their Army Cards add 1 to their Defense values.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 1. After attacking with Stun Blaster Special Attack, if the defending figure was not destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than 1 Common card for that figure). If you roll 19 or higher, remove all Order Markers.

name: Myji Coven
ability_1_desc: After destroying an opponent's figure with the Myji Coven, you may place that figure on this Army Card. After taking a turn with the Myji Coven, you may remove an opponent's figure from this Army Card to place a previously destroyed member of the Myji Coven on any empty grass space or space adjacent to an evergreen tree or jungle piece. Figures placed with Soul Harvest must be placed within 5 spaces of another member of the Myji Coven.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with the Myji Coven, you may roll the D20 once for each member of the Myji Coven you control. On a roll of 11+, you may move any or all Small or Medium opponents' figures without the Fearless personality adjacent to that member of the Myji Coven up to three spaces each. Figures moved by No More Than Crows receive any falling damage that may apply, may not enter molten lava spaces, may not end their move adjacent to any member of the Myji Coven and take leaving engagement attacks only from figures that are not members of the Myji Coven.

name: New World Privateers
ability_1_desc: A New World Privateer rolls 1 additional die when attacking or defending against an adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: New World Privateers roll one additional die when attacking figures who are standing on a Glyph or carrying a Treasure Glyph.
ability_3_desc: A New World Privateer does not have to stop when entering the first consecutive water space in his movement.

name: Morwyn Rhoderyk
ability_1_desc: Morwyn Rhoderyk does not start the game on the battlefield. At the end of any round, if Morwyn has not been deployed and one or more of your figures was destroyed during the round, you may place her on any unoccupied spaces on the battlefield. Morwyn may not be placed adjacent to other figures or on Glyphs.
ability_2_desc: This figure has the species Dragon in addition to the species listed on this card. After taking a turn with Morwyn Rhoderyk, if she did not use her Flame of Heroes Special Attack this turn, you may choose an adjacent figure for her dragon to strike and roll the D20. On a roll of 11-17, the chosen figure receives a wound. On a roll of 18+, it receives two wounds.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 1+ special. When attacking with this special attack, you may add the defence number on the defending figure's card to your attack, up to a maximum of +6. This special attack may only be used once per round and does not affect figures with the Lava Resistant special power.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Morwyn Rhoderyk's movement, ignore elevations. Morwyn Rhoderyk may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Morwyn Rhoderyk starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: NEPHDA
ability_1_desc: All land spaces within 1 space of Nephda that are no more than 2 levels above or below Nephda's base are considered water spaces. Nephda and friendly figures who move adjacent to Nephda do not have to stop their movement when entering a water space for the remainder of their turn.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Nephda, you may roll the d20 for each other friendly wounded hero within four clear sight spaces. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove a wound from that figure's army card. If that figure is on a water space, add 5 to your roll.

name: Nidariel
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. Instead of attacking normally, you may target and attack any figures adjacent to Nidariel. If you roll 2 skulls, roll 2 additional dice. Roll dice separately for each figure.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you may move Nidariel up to 4 spaces. Ignore any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nhah Scirh Elite
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Nhah Scirh Elite, you may first take a turn with one Icarian Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a Nhah Scirh Elite destroys a Common figure, you may choose another Common figure that is also adjacent to that Nhah Scirh Elite. That figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a Special Attack, a Nhah Scirh Elite always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Nelchom
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Nelchom. Roll the 20-sided die. If the figure is common, add 5 to your roll. If you roll an 18-19 the figure receives one wound. If you roll a 20, destroy the figure.
ability_2_desc: Common figures subtract 1 from their defense dice when attacked by Nelchom.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nelchom's movement, ignore elevations. Nelchom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nelchom starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: NE-GOK-SA
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's figure within 7 clear sight spaces of Ne-Gok-Sa receives 1 or more wounds from an attack from an adjacent figure and is not destroyed, roll 1 unblockable attack die against that figure. Ne-Gok-Sa may not use Support Fire if the Recalibration Marker is on this Army Card or if he is engaged.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 2. When attacking with Zettian Repeater Special Attack, Ne-Gok-Sa may attack one additional time. If he targets the same figure with the first and second attacks, add 1 die to the second attack. After using Zettian Repeater Special Attack, place the Recalibration Marker on this Army Card. Before you move Ne-Gok-Sa, you may remove the Recalibration Marker from this card.

name: Major X-16
ability_1_desc: 5 Range. 4 Attack. Major X-16 may attack one additional time. The defender rolls one less defence dice.
ability_2_desc: Major X-16 gains 2 extra defence dice when being attacked by an adjacent enemy figure.
ability_3_desc: All small, medium or large opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major X-16 may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.

name: Nephele
ability_1_desc: Nephele rolls 2 additional attack dice when attacking an adjacent figure, if that figure was at least 4 spaces away at the start of her turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an X or higher, where X is 10 more than the chosen figure's height, place it on this card. At the beginning of the next round, before placing Order Markers, remove all figures placed on this card with Planar Shift. You must place those figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Nephele, if possible. Any figure that cannot be placed is destroyed. Destructible objects are not affected by Planar Shift.

name: NORI
ability_1_desc: When Nori is attacking with a height advantage, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When Nori defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, two shields will block all damage.

name: Sabretooth
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Sabretooth, remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card and roll the 20-sided die. For each Wound Marker left on this Army Card, add 1 to your roll. If you roll a 16 or higher you must take another turn with Sabretooth.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, if there is at least one Wound Marker on this Army Card and Sabretooth is engaged with at least one other figure, Sabretooth may not move and must attack a figure he is engaged with.

name: Númenórean Archers
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 6. Three unengaged adjacent Númenórean Archers on the same level may combine their attacks and roll their attack dice as one attack. All Númenórean Archers in the arrow volley must have a clear line of sight on the one target.

name: Ninjas of the Northern Wind
ability_1_desc: If a Ninjas of the Northern Wind is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to disappear. If you roll a 1-11, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 12 or higher, the Ninjas of the Northern Wind takes no damage and instead may move up to 4 spaces. Ninjas of the Northern Wind can disappear only if they end their disappearing move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: Ninjas of the Northern Wind can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Ninjas of the Northern Wind, you can take a turn with any ninja hero you control.

name: Night Thrasher
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Night Thrasher, you may move Night Thrasher up to 7 spaces. Night Thrasher can attack up to 3 times with Skateboard Rush Special Attack at any point before, during or after this move as long as Night Thrasher is on a space where he could end his movement. Night Thrasher never takes any leaving engagement attacks when using his Skateboard Rush Special Attack. Night Thrasher cannot attack the same figure more than once on a single turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense against a normal attack, Night Thrasher always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.

name: Númenórean Soldiers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Númenórean Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Champion you control from Númenór.
ability_2_desc: When defending with a Númenórean Soldier, add 1 defense die for each adjacent Númenórean Soldier you control up to a maximum of +2 dice, for the Shield Wall power.

name: NIVEK
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 2 yellow Pheromone Markers on this card. After taking a turn with Nivek, if you have at least 1 Pheromone Marker on this card, you may choose any opponent's unique figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Nivek. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, place a Pheromone Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. That figure may not target Nivek with an attack on it's next activation. At the end of that figure's next activation, remove 1 Pheromone Marker from its Army Card and place it back on this card.

name: NIHNDRYL
ability_1_desc: When Nihndryl attacks, she may attack up to 3 times. Reduce the number of times Nihndryl can attack by 1 for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or more you can attack again. Roll the 20-sided die again until you fail to roll 12 or more.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nihndryl's movement, ignore elevations. Nihndryl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nihndryl starts to fly, if she is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nite Owl
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on any other Vigilante card you control and taking a turn with that Vigilante, you may take an immediate turn with Nite Owl. During this turn, Nite Owl can only attack figures engaged with that Vigilante and adds 1 additional attack die against an adjacent figure. After using this special power, you may not take a turn with any other figures.
ability_2_desc: When Nite Owl attacks a figure on a Shadow Tile or adjacent to a Jungle Piece, the defending figure does not receive any additional defense dice for the Shadow Tile or Jungle Piece.

name: Númenórean Spearmen
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. If 3 Númenórean Spearman you control are adjacent to the same enemy figure, they may roll their attack dice as one combined attack. The defending figure compares height to the lowest Númenórean Spearman to determine any height advantage. If Encircle Special Attack is used, the 4th figure that moved this turn cannot attack.

name: Nightcrawler
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving Nightcrawler normally, you may teleport using Bamf! Choose any space within 8 spaces of Nightcrawler. You may also choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Nightcrawler. Place Nightcrawler on the chosen space and place the chosen figure on any same-level space adjacent to him. Roll the 20-sided die for any opponent's figure Nightcrawler teleports with him. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure takes a wound. Figures moved by Bamf! never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If Nightcrawler is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, Nightcrawler takes no damage and must immediately move using his Bamf! special power.

name: Nick Fury
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose up to 3 other Agent figures in your Army. The chosen figures and Nick Fury are the Helicarrier Drop Team. The Drop Team does not start the game on the battlefield. Once per game, before initiative is rolled, you may place the Drop Team on any empty spaces on the battlefield. You cannot place them adjacent to each other or other figures.
ability_2_desc: After revealing a numbered Order Marker on this card and instead of taking a turn normally with Nick Fury, you may immediately choose one Common or Unique Hero you control to take a turn. Nick Fury may be that chosen hero. If the chosen hero is an Agent, you may also take a turn with an Agent Squad you control. You may choose which unit to activate first.
ability_3_desc: For each defense die Nick Fury receives from height advantage or terrain when defending against a non-adjacent attack, he receives one additional defense die.

name: NOVA
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Nova's movement, ignore elevations. Nova may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nova starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Onshu the Welkineye
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. You may attack one additianal time with Sonic Blast Special Attack.

name: Oakshadow
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Oakshadow, you may choose up to two trees or bushes within 3 clear sight spaces of Oakshadow. Roll the 20-sided die for each tree or bush. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may inflict 1 wound on a figure that is adjacent to that tree or bush.
ability_2_desc: When defending with Oakshadow against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.

name: Oak Warriors
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, an Oak Warrior always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: An Oak Warrior is considered to be a bush for the purposes of special powers referencing bushes.
ability_3_desc: If an Oak Warrior is placed on a road, dungeon, wall walk, lava, or molten lava space, destroy that Oak Warrior. While on a grass space, an Oak Warrior adds 1 to its Defense, and may not be moved by any special power on a Glyph or an opponent's Army Card.

name: Nhah Scirh Armor
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a Special Attack, this figure always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a Special Attack, this figure always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Ogre Barbarian
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, when this Ogre Barbarian makes a normal attack on an adjacent figure, you may count each skull rolled as one additional hit. After attacking an adjacent figure, this Ogre Barbarian may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Ogre Barbarian, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 2 to this Ogre Barbarian's Range value for the duration of its turn.
ability_3_desc: For each Order Marker on this card, reduce the Defense of this Ogre Barbarian by 1.

name: O'DIV A'WER
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Wish Markers on this Army Card. After you roll any type of die for any reason, you may remove a Wish Marker from this army card. If you do, re-roll all dice you just rolled.
ability_2_desc: At the end of each round; if there are no Wish Markers on this Army Card, you must choose an opponent. That opponent now controls O'Div A'Wer. Remove any Order Markers on this Army Card, place 3 Wish Markers on this Army Card, then give this Army Card to that opponent.

name: Oberst Superspinne
ability_1_desc: All Nazis you control who are within 4 clear sight spaces of Oberst Superspinne roll one additional die when attacking figures with a Point Value lower than theirs. Superior Race 1 does not affect Oberst.
ability_2_desc: When your opponent reveals an Order Marker on an Army Card they control, if Oberst Superspinne only has 1 Life remaining, you may immediately move him up to 8 spaces. Oberst will not take any leaving engagement attacks and must end his move unengaged. You may only use Literally Spineless once per game.

name: NON
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Non, if you do not control General Zod you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-8, you cannot take this turn with Non.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. After attacking normally, Non may attack with Heat Vision Special Attack. When attacking with Heat Vision Special Attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Non's movement, ignore elevations. Non may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Non starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nuckelavee
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose 3 spaces in a straight line from this Nuckelavee. All figures on those spaces are affected by Poison Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. If this Nuckelavee inflicts at least 1 wound on a figure with Poison Breath Special Attack, roll for Poison Damage. On a roll of 1-10, the figure receives no additional wounds from poison damage. On a roll of 11 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure's card and roll again for Poison Damage.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to this Nuckelavee. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Soulborgs are not affected by Toxic Skin.

name: Onyx
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may either: •Roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Onyx, or •Roll the 20-sided die once for any figure up to 3 clear sight spaces away. If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: If Onyx has only one unrevealed Order Marker on his Army Card, add 1 to his attack and defense.

name: Nomratu
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the round, if an opponent won initiative, before that opponent reveals an Order Marker you may move Nomratu up to 6 spaces. When moving with Tricky Advance, Nomratu never takes leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If a small or medium figure is engaged with Nomratu, before that figure rolls defense dice against any attack from an adjacent figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, that figure rolls 1 fewer defense die against that attack. You may only roll for Tail Whip once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When making a leaving engagement attack, if Nomratu does not roll a skull, Normatu may re-roll that attack die once.

name: Nordlung
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. After attacking a figure with Shockgun Special Attack, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each Soulborg who does not follow Jandar adjacent to the target figure. If you roll a 15 or higher, that Soulborg receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Nordlung attacks with his Hoarfrost Breath Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nordlung's movement, ignore elevations. Nordlung may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles. When Nordlung starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ocren
ability_1_desc: Whenever Ocren destroys a non-Undead figure with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you may replace that figure with one of your previously destroyed Common Undead figures, if possible. If you roll a 20, you may instead replace that figure with a Unique Undead figure, if possible. If Ocren destroys a friendly or Unique figure, add 1 to your roll.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Ocren's movement, ignore elevations. Ocren may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ocren starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ogre Clubbers
ability_1_desc: When attacking with an Ogre Clubber you control, if the defending figure is engaged to at least 2 other Ogre Clubbers you control, it subtracts 2 from its defense dice.
ability_2_desc: For every opponent's figure destroyed by an Ogre Clubber, place a Club Sandwich marker on this card. At the end of each Round, place a previously destroyed Ogre Clubber in its Start Zone for each marker on this card, and remove all Club Sandwich markers from this card.
ability_3_desc: At the end of each Round, each Ogre Clubber may attack any opponent's figure adjacent to it.

name: Melisandre
ability_1_desc: Once per Round, choose a figure within 5 spaces. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, that figure takes a number of Wounds equal to half its remaining Life (rounded down).
ability_2_desc: All small or medium figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Melisandre add 1 to their defense dice when rolling defense against an attack from a figure who follows Utgar. Melisandre's Protection from Evil Aura does not affect Melisandre.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a wounded small or medium Hero figure you control that is adjacent to Melisandre, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 wound markers from that Hero's Army Card.

name: Omnicron Barrier
ability_1_desc: As long as Omnicron Barrier is within an opponent's figure's range, that figure cannot attack any Omnicron figure's you control, other than an Omnicron Barrier.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for an Omnicron Barrier's movement, ignore elevation. An Omnicron Barrier may fly over water without stopping. An Omnicron Barrier may pass over figures without becoming engaged. An Omnicron Barrier may fly over obstacles such as ruins. When an Omnicron Barrier starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Gammacron
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attacking adjacent figure, add 1 defense die to Gammacron's roll.
ability_2_desc: When Gammacron is adjacent to a figure who follows Vydar, add 2 defense dice and 1 attack die to Gammacron's roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Gammacron's movement, ignore elevations. Gammacron may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Gammacron starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Omnicron Battery
ability_1_desc: Range 7, Lob 12, Attack 3. Instead of attacking normally, an unengaged Omnicron Battery may use Artillery Barrage Special Attack. The attacking Omnicron Battery does not need clear line of sight to attack with Artillery Barrage Special Attack if the targeted figure is within clear sight of a friendly Soulborg who follows Jandar. After attacking an opponent's figure with Artillery Barrage Special Attack, you may move one precise common figure you control up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: An Omnicron Battery may never roll for a leaving engagement attack against an opposing figure.

name: Opalescence
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Opalescence, you may place a wound marker on Opalescence and make another attack with her. You may use this power only once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap with Opalescence, you may add 2 to your die roll.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Opalescence may triple her height.

name: Operative Wilson
ability_1_desc: Operative Wilson rolls 2 extra attack dice when attacking characters who follow Vydar.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 1-16 nothing happens. If you roll a 17 or higher Operative Wilson immediately ends her turn without attacking.
ability_3_desc: When Operative Wilson rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: Oberex the Spirit King
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Oberex, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6-15, instead of taking a turn with Oberex, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero or Squad you control. If you roll a 16 or higher, instead of taking a turn with Oberex, you may choose any Unique Hero or Squad. Take temporary control of the chosen Hero or Squad and immediately take a turn with that Hero or Squad. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero or Squad returns to its previous owner. All order markers that were on the Hero or Squad's Army Card will stay on the Army Card. Any figure taking a turn instead of Oberex must be within 12 clear sight spaces of Oberex before moving.
ability_2_desc: When Oberex rolls defense dice against a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.

name: OPINICUS
ability_1_desc: When Opinicus attacks, he may attack one additional time. Opinicus cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Opinicus, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Opinicus. After you move Opinicus, place the chosen figure adjacent to Opinicus.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Opinicus's movement, ignore elevations. Opinicus may fly over water, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Opinicus starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Orgauth of Zhentil
ability_1_desc: When attacked by a small or medium figure from level or lower ground, Orgauth receives 1 additional defense die.
ability_2_desc: If at least one order marker is on Orgauth of Zhentil, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.

name: Soldiers of Gondor
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Soldiers of Gondor, you may first take a turn with any Captain you control.
ability_2_desc: When defending with a Soldier of Gondor add +1 defense die for each other adjacent Soldier of Gondor up to a maximum of +2 dice for the Shield Wall power.

name: Ork Boyz
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against an adjacent figure, an Ork Boyz figure adds 1 to his attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice against an adjacent small figure, add 1 to your attack dice. This effect stacks with WAAAGGGHH!!
ability_3_desc: Ork Boyz cannot leave engagements.

name: Orc Warg Rider
ability_1_desc: An Orc Warg Rider may attack at any point before, during, or after his move as long as the Orc Warg Rider is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_2_desc: When an Orc Warg Rider attacks he may attack one additional time, subtracting 2 attack dice for this second attack. The Orc Warg Rider may target the same figure, or a different figure.
ability_3_desc: An Orc Warg Rider is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Ordath
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may move 2 Dwarf squad figures that you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: While on a dungeon space when attacking or defending with Ordath, all skulls or shields count for one additional hit or block.
ability_3_desc: Ordath may not be moved by any opponent's special power on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Hero you control who is a Padawan or who has the Force Sensitive Symbol on its Army Card to be Obi-Wan Kenobi's Apprentice. After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Obi-Wan, you may take a turn with Obi-Wan's Apprentice. While Obi-Wan's Apprentice is adjacent to Obi-Wan, add 1 die to the defense of Obi-Wan's Apprentice.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent reveals an Order Marker on the Army Card of a Common Squad or a figure with the Week Minded Special Power and at least one figure from that Card is within 2 clear sight spaces of Obi-Wan Kenobi, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that player's turn immediately ends. Droids are not affected by Jedi Mind Trick 14.
ability_3_desc: When Obi-Wan Kenobi is destroyed, place this figure on the Army Card of Obi-Wan's Apprentice. If Obi-Wan's Apprentice would receive one or more wounds from an attack, you may instead remove Obi-Wan's figure from the Apprentice's Army Card and ignore all wounds that would be received from the attack.

name: ORDER OF THE LIGHT
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Turn Undead Special Attack can be used to attack only Undead figures.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of a member of the Order of Light add 1 to their defense dice when rolling defense against an attack from a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill. The Order of Light's Protection from Evil Aura does not affect members of the Order of Light.

name: Oni Night Haunter
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with this Oni Night Haunter, you may reveal an "X" order marker that is on this Oni Night Haunter's Army Card to activate Gaseous Form for the duration of the turn. While Gaseous Form is active, ignore elevations when counting spaces for this Oni Night Haunter's movement. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. While Gaseous Form is active, an Oni Night Haunter is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small, medium, or large figure adjacent to this Oni Night Haunter. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by this Oni Night Haunter this turn. Hypnotic Breath does not affect Soulborgs, Undead, Constructs, or destructible objects.

name: Hulnak
ability_1_desc: If Hulnak has at least 4 wound markers on his card, he may attack one additional time for each wound marker on his card.
ability_2_desc: If Hulnak becomes adjacent to a friendly Orc Squad figure during his movement, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-16, nothing happens. If you roll a 17-20, destroy the adjacent Orc and add 2 to Hulnak's Attack for the remainder of your turn. You may only use this power once per turn.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against non-adjacent attacking small or medium Squad figures, Hulnak receives 1 additional defense die.

name: Ogre Crusher
ability_1_desc: Before moving with an Ogre Crusher, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, every small or medium figure adjacent to this Ogre Crusher receives a wound and for the duration of the turn this Ogre Crusher will not receive any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure successfully defends against an attack against this Ogre Crusher, that opponent may immediately move this Ogre Crusher up to 3 spaces. Falling damage will apply. This Ogre Crusher will not take any leaving engagement attacks while moving with Stumble Swing.

name: PEREGAR
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Peregar, if he did not attack this turn, you may take a turn with up to 3 common Falcons you control within 12 clear sight spaces of Peregar.

name: Optimus Prime
ability_1_desc: All figures you control that have clear sight of Optimus Prime add 1 extra die to their attack. Inspiring Presence does not affect any figures who add attack dice for height advantage, glyphs, or a special power on any other figure's card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Optimus Prime may Transform and Drive. Transform and Drive has a move of 10. When Optimus Prime moves with Transform and Drive, choose up to 2 unengaged friendly small or medium figures adjacent to Optimus Prime. After moving with Transform and Drive, place the chosen figures adjacent to Optimus Prime. Optimus Prime rolls 2 less attack dice on any turn he chooses to Transform and Drive.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 5. Optimus Prime cannot attack using his Laser Cannon Special Attack on the same turn he uses Transform and Drive.

name: Penguin
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Penguin, you may take a turn with any Criminal hero or squad you control.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent controls a Criminal or Lawman figure, you may look at that opponent's Order Markers at any point during the game.

name: Ork Warboss
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against an adjacent figure, Ork Warboss adds 1 to his attack dice.
ability_2_desc: At any point while moving, you may choose a small figure that is adjacent and on the same level. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-13, the figure is safe. If you roll a 14-20, you may roll 2 attack dice. The target rolls defense dice normally. After combat, you may continue your movement without taking any leaving engagement attacks. You may attack normally when you end your movement. You may use this ability once per turn.

name: PHEMERAS
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to this Phemera are affected by Explode Special Attack. Roll defense dice separately for each affected figure. Immediately destroy this Phemera.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Phemera may add 2 to their height.

name: Phæstus Cannith
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, you may place a Glyph of Creation Forge on a previously empty same-level space adjacent to Phæstus Cannith.
ability_2_desc: Phæstus Cannith adds 1 to his Defense for every adjacent Warforged figure you control, to a maximum of +2 for this special power.

name: Orm the Viking Warrior
ability_1_desc: When rolling for the Berserker's Charge on any Army Card you control, you may add 3 to your roll. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may immediately move Orm up to 5 spaces. If Orm is engaged before moving with Berserker's Bellow, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack, if at least 1 skull was rolled, you may add 1 skull to whatever was rolled.
ability_3_desc: A figure engaged with Orm reduces its Defense number by 1 for each other Warrior you control that is also engaged with it, to a maximum of -3 for Warrior's Fury.

name: PELCROS
ability_1_desc: Whenever Pelcros destroys a figure with a normal attack, before removing that figure from the battlefield, you may immediately take a turn with that figure. Corpse Control does not affect Psychics.
ability_2_desc: Whenever an enemy rolls a skull for a leaving engagement attack against Pelcros, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, Pelcros does not receive a wound, and the attacking figure instead receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: Pelcros may move through all figures.

name: Otsuka Tagomi
ability_1_desc: Range 1 +Special. Attack 3. Choose an adjacent figure to attack. If the chosen figure receive enough wounds to be destroy, then choose another figure from 3 clear spaces of that figure, and attack it. You can continue doing this Special Attack until you don't destroy a figure. Place Otsuka Tagomi adjacent to the last figure affected by this power.
ability_2_desc: Otsuka Tagomi can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Panther
ability_1_desc: At the end of every round, you may move all unengaged Panthers you control up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Panthers do not have any visible hit zones for figures that are not within 3 clear sight spaces.
ability_3_desc: If a Panther starts its turn unengaged, add 2 to its Attack value.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Panther may add 2 to its height.

name: Phantom Knights
ability_1_desc: A Phantom Knight adds 3 additional defense dice when rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Phantom Knight's movement, ignore elevations. Phantom Knights may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Phantom Knight starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Perducci
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Perducci, instead of taking a turn with Perducci, you may take a turn with any other Lucky figure you control. Perducci rolls 2 extra defense dice when he is adjacent to a figure with a Lucky personality.
ability_2_desc: Whenever you roll the 20-sided die, you may add 1 to your roll for each Order Marker on Perducci.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking with Perducci, choose any figure within 8 clear sight spaces of Perducci and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 20, that figure receives 3 wounds. This power can only be used once per round.

name: Oron Goldenaxe
ability_1_desc: When Oron Goldenaxe receives any number of wounds from an attack, you may choose an equal number of Dwarf Squad figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces. Place the chosen figure(s) adjacent to Oron Goldenaxe on a previously empty space. If a figure is engaged before moving with To Me, My Kinsmen! it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's figure defends against a normal attack from Oron Goldenaxe, it reduces its Defense by 1 for each Dwarf Squad figure you control engaged with that figure.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Oron Goldenaxe always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Wind Riders
ability_1_desc: A Wind Rider never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_2_desc: If a Wind Rider starts its turn within 4 clear sight spaces of a friendly Air Elemental, when counting spaces for a Wind Rider's movement, ignore elevations. A Wind Rider may wind ride over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and wind ride over obstacles such as ruins. When a Wind Rider starts to move using Wind Riding, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: A Wind Rider can never roll defense dice while it is on a water space.

name: Phil Coulson
ability_1_desc: At the end of any turn, you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card, and either: Immediately take a turn with another Loyal or Disciplined Agent hero you control, or Choose up to three Agent figures you control. Move the chosen figures up to 4 spaces each. A figure moved by Coulson's Team will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If all Army Cards you control are Loyal and/or Disciplined Agents, add 3 to your initiative roll.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Agents adjacent to Phil Coulson add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.

name: PLEOCYEMATA
ability_1_desc: Before moving Pleocyemata, you may choose one small or medium opponent's figure adjacent to it. After you move Pleocyemata, place the chosen figure adjacent to Pleocyemata. If Pleocyemata ends its move on a water or swamp water space and Pleocyemata attacks the chosen figure this turn, the chosen figure rolls 2 fewer defense dice. Figures moved with Drag Into The Deep never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: While Pleocyemata is on a water space, add 2 to its Defense. If Pleocyemata starts its turn on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. Pleocyemata does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: Plasmoid
ability_1_desc: If Plasmoid successfully defends against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, you may inflict X wounds on one figure within X clear sight spaces of Plasmoid. X equals the number of skulls the attacking figure rolled.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Plasmoid's movement, ignore elevations. Plasmoid may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Plasmoid may not leap more than 12 levels up or 48 levels down in a single leap. Plasmoid does not roll for damage from a fall, major fall, or extreme fall and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Praetorian Guard
ability_1_desc: If all your order markers are placed on Guard Army Cards, all Praetorian Guards add 1 attack die and 1 defense die for the rest of the round
ability_2_desc: If a Warlord you control receives at least one wound, you may choose to ignore one wound and instead remove from the board one Praetorian Guard that is within 3 clear sight spaces of the Warlord. Dedicated Sacrifice can be used only one time per opponent's turn.

name: Pinkie Pie
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a non-stoic figure to attack. Any non-stoic figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Party Cannon Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Pinkie Pie can be affected by her own Party Cannon Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If Pinkie Pie is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll 13-20, Pinkie Pie takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Pinkie Pie never takes leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Before moving Pinkie, choose an unengaged figure adjacent to Pinkie. After you move Pinkie, place the chosen figure adjacent to Pinkie Pie.

name: Overlord Malicia
ability_1_desc: Overlord Malicia adds 2 to her Attack when attacking figures without the Lava Resistance special power.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 1 + Special. You must destroy an adjacent Small or Medium Common figure you control who follows Utgar or Valkrill to use Minion Toss Special Attack. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Minion Toss Special Attack. Add the destroyed figure's printed Attack value to Malicia's attack dice. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Malicia is not affected by her own Minion Toss Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Before moving, choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Malicia. Roll the 20-sided die. Add 11 to your roll if you control the chosen figure. If you roll a 13 or higher, it receives 1 wound and Malicia removes 1 wound from her Army Card.

name: Predator
ability_1_desc: When Predator is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent and is not on a water space, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, Predator no longer has any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting opponent's turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When Predator attacks with his Combi Stick Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. When Predator attacks with his Plasma Caster Special Attack, once per turn you may re-roll any dice that did not roll skulls.

name: PHOETA
ability_1_desc: After attacking an adjacent Squad figure, if Phoeta was engaged at the beginning of her turn, you may move her up to 4 spaces and attack again. Phoeta will not take any leaving engagement attacks and must end her move unengaged.
ability_2_desc: When Phoeta attacks a nonadjacent figure, before rolling attack dice, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 21 or higher, the defending figure cannot roll defense dice and every skull rolled counts for one additional hit. Add 2 to your roll for every wound on this card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Phoeta's movement, ignore elevations. Phoeta may pass over water, pass over figures, and fly over obstacles. When Phoeta starts to fly, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Poison Ivy
ability_1_desc: If Poison Ivy is adjacent to a tree or bush, opponent's figures must be adjacent to Poison Ivy to target her.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose up to 3 small or medium figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Poison Ivy that are adjacent to a tree or bush. Roll the 20-sided die for each figure. If you roll an 8 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. Place an Entangled Marker on that figure's base. Figures with an Entangled Marker may not move or be moved by any special power on any Army Card or glyph. At the end of the round, remove all Entangled Markers from all bases.
ability_3_desc: If Poison Ivy is attacked by an adjacent Human figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure may not attack her.

name: Polina Tripolidis
ability_1_desc: When you roll attack/defense dices and you don't roll at least 1 attack/defense dice, then roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 10 or higher, re roll all of your dices. You can only re roll once.
ability_2_desc: Any squad figure adjacent to Polina Tripolidis may add 1 dice when rolling defense dices.
ability_3_desc: If all of your figures are disciplined, then all of your figures may move 1 more space.

name: Power Girl
ability_1_desc: Power Girl may add 3 to her Move number as long as she is unengaged prior to moving. Power Girl must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. After attacking normally, Power Girl may attack with Heat Vision Special Attack. When attacking with Heat Vision Special Attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Power Girl's movement, ignore elevations. Power Girl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Power Girl starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Prince Ahmed
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, choose 2 Temporary Treasure Glyphs. Place the chosen Glyphs on the Army Card of any adjacent Hero(es) you control. Choose one Permanent Treasure Glyph and place it on this card. That Glyph may not be removed from it until Prince Ahmed is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: After all players have rolled for initiative, you may choose any player. That player must re-roll for initiative, and accept the new result. You may only use Diplomacy once per round.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Prince Ahmed, you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card and choose a Human Hero you control within 4 clear sight spaces. Take a turn with the chosen Hero.

name: Charmander
ability_1_desc: When this Charmander is targeted for an attack from a non-adjacent figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, this Charmander no longer has any visible Hit Zone for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. If this Charmander inflicts one or more wounds with Ember Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 19 or higher, place a Burn Status Marker on that figure. At the end of every round, players must roll the 20-sided die for each figure they control with a Burn Status Marker. If you roll a 1-10, that figure receives one wound. If you roll an 11-17, nothing happens. If you roll an 18 or greater, remove the Burn Status Marker from that figure.

name: Proclus, The Zombie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When moving with Proclus, The Zombie Warrior, it will move one additional space for each wound marker on this army card, up to three additional spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Proclus, The Zombie Warrior is engaged with multiple figures, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-7, attack normally. If you roll 8-16, you may attack up to two different figures. If you roll 17-20, you may attack up to three different figures.
ability_3_desc: When an adjacent small or medium figures, attacks Proclus, The Zombie Warrior, they will roll one less attack dice, unless they have a fearless personality.

name: Squirtle
ability_1_desc: Range 6, Attack 3. If this Squirtle is on a water space, you may roll 2 additional attack dice for Water Gun Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If this Squirtle does not move this turn, add 1 die to its defense until the start of its next turn.
ability_3_desc: Squirtle does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Pride
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with Pride, you may subtract up to 4 from Pride's Attack value. Pride may attack X additional times where X is the amount of attack dice subtracted.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Pride, you may destroy one adjacent Homunculus or Alchemist Unique Hero you control. Place the chosen figure on this card. Pride may use any special powers on the chosen figure's card and if the card refers to that figure, it instead refers to Pride.
ability_3_desc: Start the game with 9 markers on this card. When Pride would receive one or more wounds, you may remove a marker to ignore all those wounds. If Pride would be destroyed by a power that does not inflict wounds, you may remove three markers and that figure is safe.

name: Phial of Galadriel
ability_1_desc: All Shadow spaces within 8 clear sight spaces of this figure lose all effects and cannot be used for any special powers on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: Charmeleon
ability_1_desc: When this Charmeleon attacks an adjacent figure with a normal attack, add 1 die to this Charmeleon's Attack for each Wound Marker on its Army Card, up to a maximum of 3 dice for Rage.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves onto a space within 2 clear sight spaces of this Charmeleon, roll a 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Scary Face.

name: CHARMANDER
ability_1_desc: When this Charmander is targeted for an attack from a non-adjacent figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, this Charmander no longer has any visible Hit Zone for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. If this Charmander inflicts one or more wounds with Ember Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 19 or higher, place a Burn Status Marker on that figure. At the end of every round, players must roll the 20-sided die for each figure they control with a Burn Status Marker. If you roll a 1-10, that figure receives one wound. If you roll an 11-17, nothing happens. If you roll an 18 or greater, remove the Burn Status Marker from that figure.

name: Squirtle
ability_1_desc: Range 6, Attack 3. If this Squirtle is on a water space, you may roll 2 additional attack dice for Water Gun Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If this Squirtle does not move this turn, add 1 die to its defense until the start of its next turn.
ability_3_desc: Squirtle does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Palantír
ability_1_desc: While this figure carries this Palantír, both you and your opponents can look at each other's unrevealed Order Markers at the beginning of the round. A Wizard carrying this Palantír may choose not to activate this power.

name: Prophets of Doom
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose a figure within 5 clear sight spaces. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, then nothing happens. If you roll 12-17, reveal an unrevealed Order Marker. If you roll 18-20, remove an unrevealed Order Marker.
