ability_2_desc: When a Prophet of Doom is destroyed, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own small or medium previously destroyed Demons.

name: Professor X
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered Order Marker on this card, you may take a turn with up to 2 Unique Mutant Heroes you control. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: All figures you control always have clear sight to each other. They cannot attack each other using this special power.
ability_3_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.
ability_4_desc: Range 10. Attack 3. Figures cannot roll defense dice against Psi-Blast Special Attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Figures with the Mental Shielding special power, Robots, and destructible objects cannot be attacked with Psi-Blast Special Attack.

name: PREDATOR
ability_1_desc: Predator may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. While occupying a non-water space, this Predator cannot be targeted by opponents' non-adjacent figures for any attacks or any special powers that require clear sight.
ability_2_desc: When Predator attacks a figure on a Shadow Tile or adjacent to a Jungle Piece, the defending figure does not receive any additional defense dice for the Shadow Tile or Jungle Piece. If this Predator did not move this turn and attacks a non-adjacent figure, add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: After rolling initiative, you may reveal an "X" Order Marker on this card. If an "X" Order Marker is revealed on this card when you reveal your Order Marker 3, before taking your turn, each figure within 3 spaces of this Predator receives 2 automatic wounds and then this Predator is destroyed.

name: Pidgey
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with a Pidgey, you may choose one small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 5 levels above or below that Pidgey's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, move the chosen figure up to 4 spaces. The targeted figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks during its movement.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Pidgey's movement, ignore elevations. Pidgey may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Pidgey starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sandshrew
ability_1_desc: If this Sandshrew does not attack this turn, you may add 1 die to its defense until the start of its next turn.
ability_2_desc: When this Sandshrew or any friendly figure that is adjacent to this Sandshrew is targeted by a normal attack from an opponent's figure within 2 clear sight spaces of this Sandshrew, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the targeting figure cannot attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: If this Sandshrew begins its turn on a rock, sand, or grass space, instead of moving normally, you may place it on any empty rock, sand, or grass space that is within 5 spaces of this Sandshrew and is no more than 4 levels above or 3 levels below this Sandshrew's base. If this Sandshrew is engaged when it starts Tunneling, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Pyria
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose one or two straight lines from Pyria, each 3 spaces long. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Pyria's Twin Flamethrower Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.

name: Pyro Vipers
ability_1_desc: Pyro Vipers do not start the game on the battlefield. Whenever one of your large or huge Utgar heros receives 1 or more wounds, you may place 1 Pyro Viper adjacent to that hero for every wound that hero received.
ability_2_desc: Pyro Vipers never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Puppet Master
ability_1_desc: Puppet Master starts the game with one puppet marker. Instead of taking a turn with Puppet Master, you may either: * Place the puppet marker on any Unique Hero within clear line of sight. * Take a turn with any figure with a puppet marker on its Army Card. If Puppet Master moves, attacks, receives a wound or is destroyed, remove the puppet marker. Any figure with a puppet marker on its Army Card may not attack Puppet Master.
ability_2_desc: When any player takes a turn with a figure with a puppet marker on its Army Card, you may immediately take that turn with that figure instead of that player. If you do, remove the puppet marker.

name: Magnemite
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If this Magnemite inflicts one or more wounds with Thundershock Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 18 or greater, place one Paralysis Status Marker on that figure. Before moving a figure with a Paralysis Status Marker, that figure must roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 1-5, that figure cannot move or attack that turn. On a roll of 6-18, that figure's move value is reduced by 1 for the remainder of that turn. On a roll of 19-20, remove the Paralysis Status Marker.
ability_2_desc: If this Magnemite does not move this turn, you may add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled for its Thundershock Special Attack..
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Magnemite's movement, you may ignore the first level of elevation and add 2 to Magnemite's Height when moving up or down. Magnemite may ignore all terrain effects.

name: MAGNEMITE
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If this Magnemite inflicts one or more wounds with Thundershock Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 18 or greater, place one Paralysis Status Marker on that figure. Before moving a figure with a Paralysis Status Marker, that figure must roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 1-5, that figure cannot move or attack that turn. On a roll of 6-18, that figure's move value is reduced by 1 for the remainder of that turn. On a roll of 19-20, remove the Paralysis Status Marker.
ability_2_desc: If this Magnemite does not move this turn, you may add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled for its Thundershock Special Attack..
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Magnemite's movement, you may ignore the first level of elevation and add 2 to Magnemite's Height when moving up or down. Magnemite may ignore all terrain effects.

name: Scyther
ability_1_desc: You may add 3 dice to this Scyther's Attack and subtract 3 spaces from this Scyther's Move. This Scyther may not use Sword Dance if it used the Stealth Flying special power this turn.
ability_2_desc: Attack 1. Range 1. When this Scyther attacks with its Fury Cutter Special Attack, it may attack 3 additional times and each skull rolled counts for one additional hit. This Scyther may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Scyther's movement, ignore elevations. A Scyther may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Scyther starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: PUGILITRON
ability_1_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to a Pugilitron cannot move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Pugilitron card, and before taking a turn with that Pugilitron, you may first take a turn with one other soulborg hero you control with a range of one.

name: Question
ability_1_desc: Figures attacking Question with a non-adjacent normal attack may roll no more than 2 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Question attacks, you may distribute all inflicted wounds as you see fit among any figures adjacent to Question.

name: Professor X
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, take a turn with another Hero or Squad you control instead of Professor X. If you don't, after taking a turn with Professor X, reveal your 'X' Order Marker on the card of another Mutant card you control to take a turn with that card.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, choose a figure within 5 spaces and roll the d20. Add 1 to your roll for each other Unique Telepath Hero you control within 6 spaces of Professor X. If you roll 13+, remove all Order Markers from the chosen figure's card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Professor X, choose a Unique Hero within 4 spaces and roll the d20. Add 1 to your roll for each other Unique Telepath Hero you control within 6 spaces of Professor X. If you roll 15+, take temporary control of that hero and take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to the player who controlled it before Telepathic Control.
ability_4_desc: Opponents cannot take control of Professor X.

name: Puppet Master
ability_1_desc: Puppet Master starts the game with one puppet marker. Instead of taking a turn with Puppet Master, you may either: * Place the puppet marker on any Unique Hero within clear line of sight. * Take a turn with any figure with a puppet marker on its Army Card. If Puppet Master moves, attacks, receives a wound or is destroyed, remove the puppet marker. Any figure with a puppet marker on its Army Card may not attack Puppet Master.
ability_2_desc: When any player takes a turn with a figure with a puppet marker on its Army Card, you may immediately take that turn with that figure instead of that player. If you do, remove the puppet marker.

name: Potion of Sturla
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose one of your previously destroyed figures and place them adjacent to this figure. Remove all wound markers from that figure's Army Card.

name: Puma
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Puma, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Puma at the start of this turn, Puma receives 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: While moving, Puma may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Puma may Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Puma's leaping movement, ignore elevations. Puma may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Puma may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. If Puma is engaged when he starts to leap, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: "Black Pete" Morgan
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. "Black Pete" Morgan may only use Flintlock Pistol Special Attack once per round.
ability_2_desc: If "Black Pete" Morgan is engaged, add 2 to his defense.

name: Queen Ghuddedio
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Queen Ghuddedio you may take a turn with up to 3 friendly Common Insect Heroes within 6 clear sight spaces of Queen Ghuddedio. Tenacious Queen may not be used if Queen Ghuddedio has more than one wound.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Queen Ghuddedio's movement, ignore elevations. Queen Ghuddedio may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Queen Ghuddedio starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Pyro
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Firespray Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Firespray Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Pyro, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with Pyro.

name: Quetzus Runners
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Quetzus Runners you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, nothing happens. If you roll an 11-15, you may move up to 2 Runners you control that did not move this turn up to 7 spaces. If you roll a 16-19, you may move up to 4 Runners you control that did not move this turn up to 7 spaces. If you roll a 20, you may move up to 8 Runners you control that did not move this turn up to 7 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Quetzus Runners roll one additional die when attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to more figures you control than it is to opponent's figures.

name: Qilué Veladorn
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Qilué Veladorn before taking a turn with Qilué Veladorn, you may roll the 20-sided die for each undead squad figure in play. If you roll a 19 or higher, place a previously destroyed undead squad figure of the same unit on a same-level or lower space adjacent to that undead squad figure. An undead squad figure on a shadow space needs a 15 or higher to resurrect.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium figures you control who follow Utgar or Valkrill and are within 3 clear sight spaces of Qilué Veladorn add 1 to their normal attack dice when attacking a figure. Qilué Veladorn's Evil Attack Aura does not affect Qilué Veladorn.

name: QRUUK
ability_1_desc: When a friendly lizardfolk adjacent to Qruuk, receive enough wounds to be destroyed, ignore all wounds that figure will take. Qruuk will receive all of the wounds instead.
ability_2_desc: Move 3. Range 1. Attack 2. Instead of moving and attacking, you may use this Forward Strikes Special Attack. Move Qruuk 3 spaces. Qruuk will not take any leaving engagement if he is engage. All figures that Qruuk passes are affected by this Forward Strikes. Roll for each affected figure separately.

name: Bishop
ability_1_desc: After rolling defense dice for Bishop, place one Energy Marker on this Army Card for each successful block rolled. A maximum of 3 Energy Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: Range: 5 Attack: 3 + Special When attacking with Concussive Blast Special Attack, you may remove any number of Energy Markers from this card and add that same number of dice to this attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking you may remove any number of Energy Markers from this card and remove that same number of Wound Markers from this card.

name: Quicksilver
ability_1_desc: Quicksilver may move through all figures and pass through obstacles such as ruins. Quicksilver is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Quicksilver does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Quicksilver may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Quicksilver attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Quicksilver is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: When Quicksilver rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage. Quicksilver rolls one additional defense die for each revealed order marker on this card, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice for Speed Dodge.

name: Radioactive Man
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Radioactive Man. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives a wound.

name: Sabretooth
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Sabretooth, remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card and roll the 20-sided die. For each Wound Marker left on this Army Card, add 1 to your roll. If you roll a 16 or higher you must take another turn with Sabretooth.
ability_2_desc: If there is at least one wound marker on this army card, Sabretooth may not attempt to leave engagement with an opponent's figure and must attack a figure he is engaged with.

name: R-6 SEEKER
ability_1_desc: All R-6 Seekers you control add 1 to their Attack value for every General your opponent controls, up to a maximum of +6 dice.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on this R-6 Seeker, after taking this R-6 Seeker's turn, you may take a turn with two other R-6 Seekers you control.
ability_3_desc: Order Markers can never be removed from this Army Card by any special powers on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: Glossu Rabban
ability_1_desc: If Rabban is within 5 spaces of a Treasure Glyph, instead of attacking, Rabban may take control of that Treasure Glyph. Place one wound on Rabban's card before picking up the glyph. Rabban does not have to roll for traps or trap damage.
ability_2_desc: If Rabban attacks a wounded hero, he may attack an additional time.

name: Horned Devil
ability_1_desc: Range: 2 Attack: 5. If this Horned Devil inflicts at least two wounds with Spiked Chain Special Attack and the figure is not destroyed, you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker from the defending figure's Army Card. You may not target a figure whose base is more than 4 levels above this Horned Devil's Height or 4 levels below this Horned Devil's base.
ability_2_desc: When this Horned Devil is chosen for an attack from an adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to this roll if the attacking figure is Common. If you roll a 15 or higher, the attacking figure immediately ends its turn.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Horned Devil, remove one Wound Marker from this Horned Devil's Army Card.

name: Deathreaver R.A.D Unit
ability_1_desc: At the end of each round, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to at least one R.A.D. Unit you control. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Soulborgs are not affected by Radiation Burn.
ability_2_desc: A R.A.D. Unit is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a R.A.D. Unit may double its Height.

name: Gambit
ability_1_desc: Range: 4 Attack: 1, 2, or 3 Gambit starts with 3 attack dice. Choose a non-adjacent figure to attack by rolling 1, 2, or 3 attack dice. Gambit may continue to attack until he has rolled all 3 attack dice. Gambit may target the same or different figures with each attack. When attacking with Three Card Monte Special Attack, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When Gambit is chosen for a normal attack from an opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the attacking figure immediately ends its turn. Telepaths are not affected by Hypnotic Charm.

name: ORC SLAYER
ability_1_desc: If an Orc Slayer is attacking a Goblin, Orc, or Ogre, add 1 to that Orc Slayer's attack value.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, an Orc Slayer always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: If an Orc Slayer is attacked with a normal attack and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that Orc Slayer is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If he is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1-15 roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Razanni
ability_1_desc: When Razaani attacks a common figure, he receives on extra attack die for each Wound Marker he has.
ability_2_desc: After an opponent reveals an Order Marker, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 16 or higher, you may move Razaani adjacent to an opponent's figure. If Razaani is engaged before moving with Astral Stalker, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Abyssal Skull
ability_1_desc:
After moving and before attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add the number of Undead you control adjacent to this Abyssal Skull to your die roll.

• If you roll 1–4, nothing happens.

• If you roll 5–11, you may place 1 Undead you control adjacent to this Abyssal Skull.

• If you roll 12–17, you may place up to 2 Undead you control adjacent to this Abyssal Skull.

• If you roll 18–20, you may place up to 3 Undead you control adjacent to this Abyssal Skull.

If the summoned Undead are engaged, they will not take any leaving engagement attacks. This Abyssal Skull cannot summon an Undead that he is already adjacent to.

name: Ram Gargolye
ability_1_desc: When there a no unrevealed Order Markers on this Army Card, then you may 3 additional defense dice for this Ram Gargolye.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Ram Gargolye's movement, ignore elevations. Ram Gargolye may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ram Gargolye starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: RAT SWARM
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Rat Swarm, after taking a turn with Rat Swarm, for every wound marker on figures' Army Cards within 6 spaces of Rat Swarm you may take a turn with another Rat Swarm you control. A maximum of 6 other Rat Swarms may be activated by Flood Of Rats.
ability_2_desc: A Rat Swarm has no hit zone if no opponent's figure within 4 spaces has a clear line of sight on that Rat Swarm.

name: Ravager
ability_1_desc: At any point in the game, if Ravager is within 4 clear sight spaces of an opponent's figure, you may view the Order Markers on any or all of that opponent's Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: Ravager may attack any or all figures adjacent to her. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Ghost Rider
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Penance Markers on this card. After moving and instead of attacking, if you have at least 1 Penance Marker on this card, you may choose any opponent's Unique Hero adjacent to Ghost Rider. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, place a Penance Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated for the entire game.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Ghost Rider, and its base is no more than 4 levels above Ghost Rider's height or 4 levels below his base, he may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: Ghost Rider does not have to stop his movement when entering water or molten lava spaces, and never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ghost Rider may double his Height.

name: Raelin the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Opponent's figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Raelin the Kyrie Warrior roll one less defense die.
ability_2_desc: If Raelin inflicts at least one wound with a normal attack or leaving engagement attack, she inflicts one additional wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Raelin's movement, ignore elevations. Raelin my fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Raelin starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Radiant Black
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Radiant Black targets a figure you control, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the attacking figure cannot roll any attack dice. While Radiant Black is engaged to at least one figure, Gravity Disruption only affects engaged figures that attack Radiant Black.
ability_2_desc: If Radiant Black attacks an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to his attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Radiant Black's movement, ignore elevations. Radiant Black may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Radiant Black starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Necromancer Skull
ability_1_desc: Each time this Necromancer Skull destroys a figure, you may remove a Wound Marker from this Army Card. This Necromancer Skull cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Raise the Fallen or the Raise a Champion power on any Army Card.

name: Raimondi
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Raimondi, instead of taking a turn with Raimondi, you may take a turn with any other Lucky figure you control. Raimondi rolls 2 extra defense dice when he is adjacent to a figure with a Lucky personality.
ability_2_desc: Whenever you roll the 20-sided die, you may add 1 to your roll for each Order Marker on Raimondi.
ability_3_desc: Whenever Raimondi or any other Small or Medium figure you control adjacent to Raimondi receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore any wounds that figure just received.

name: R-Virus Shamblers
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-3, nothing happens. If you roll 4-6, add 1 to the move value of this card. If you roll 7-10, add 2 to the move value of this card. If you roll 11-15, add 3 to the move value of this card. If you roll 16-20, add 4 to the move value of this card.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure receives at least 1 wound from an R-Virus Shambler, you may place an Infection Marker on that figure's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: For the entire game, when a medium opponent's figure with an Infection Marker on its army card is destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed R-Virus Shamblers.
ability_4_desc: When attacking with an R-Virus Shambler, if the defending figure is engaged with at least 2 other Undead figures you control, it subtracts 2 from its defense dice.

name: RAAKCHOTT
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Raakchott, before taking Raakchott's turn, you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 red Consume Markers. When a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Raakchott is destroyed, place a Consume Marker on this Army Card. You cannot place more than one Consume Marker on this card each turn.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. All figures adjacent to Raakchott are affected by Soul Fury Special Attack. Roll one additional attack die for each Consume Marker on this card. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Do not place Consume Markers on this card this turn and remove one Consume Marker from this card for each figure Raakchott attacked this turn.

name: Rarity
ability_1_desc: All friendly Pony, Pegasus, Unicorn, and Fancy figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Rarity add 1 to their defense dice. Simply Stunning Aura affects Rarity.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Rarity, you may choose a Treasure Glyph on an unoccupied space within 4 spaces of Rarity. You may reveal that Treasure Glyph, then you may place it on Rarity's Army Card, move it onto any empty space adjacent to Rarity, or place it on the Army Card of any Unique Hero within 4 clear sight spaces of Rarity.
ability_3_desc: Rarity receives one extra attack and defense die for each wound marker she has.

name: Reavr Latak
ability_1_desc: All Corsairs you control, except Reavr Latak, move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Plasma Blaster Special Attack. Reavr Latak only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Reavr Latak cannot be affected by his own Plasma Blaster Special Attack.

name: Rahnik Protector
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, when Rahnik Protector moves into engagement with a figure that was not engaged at the start of the turn, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, then that figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: If Rahnik Protector is attacked by an adjacent opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-9, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 10 or higher, Rahnik Protector takes no damage and may immediately move up to 2 spaces. If Rahnik Protector is engaged when he starts to flutter, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Rahnik Protector's movement, ignore elevations. Rahnik Protector may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Rahnik Protector starts to fly, if he is engaged, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Rabbit of Caerbannog
ability_1_desc: If the Rabbit of Caerbannog is unengaged, it may not be attacked unless the attacking figure began its turn adjacent to it.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a figure moves adjacent to the Rabbit of Caerbannog, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8-18, that figure receives 1 wound. If you roll 19 or higher, the figure is destroyed. Figures may only be targeted as they move into engagement with the Rabbit. The Rabbit of Caerbannog never makes leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose an opponent's figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the Rabbit of Caerbannog whose base is no more than 3 levels higher or lower than its base. Place the Rabbit on any empty space adjacent to the chosen figure and roll 4 attack dice. When the Rabbit uses this special attack, it may use it 2 additional times. You may not attack the same figure more than once in the same turn with this special attack. When moving using this special attack, the Rabbit never takes any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Quetzalcoatl
ability_1_desc: While Quetzalcoatl can use his Flying special power, he is always considered to have height advantage on non-flying figures. At the beginning of any turn, any opponents' figures with the Flying special power within 3 spaces of Quetzalcoatl may not use their Flying special power for the remainder of the turn.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, instead of taking a turn with Quetzalcoatl, you may use God of the Winds. Place each single or double-spaced figure on the battlefield on any unoccupied space up to 2 spaces from its original placement. Moved figures never take any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower can receive any falling damage that may apply. After doing so, you may choose up to three figures moved by God of the Winds. Roll the D20 once for each chosen figure. On a roll of 14+, the chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: When the D20 is rolled for a special power on the card of a figure or glyph on Quetzalcoatl's card or within 6 spaces of Quetzalcoatl, you may add or subtract 2 from that roll if there is at least one revealed Order Marker on this card, and you may add or subtract an additional one for each additional revealed Order Marker on this card.
ability_4_desc: Quetzalcoatl can cast Spells as if he had the Magical Defence special power. When Quetzalcoatl casts an Attack Spell, he is considered to have the Magical Defence special power for the purposes of all special powers on defending figures' Army Cards.

name: Red Ants of Aunstrom
ability_1_desc: You may attack with any 4 Red Ants of Aunstrom you control, even Ants that did not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: Each Red Ant of Aunstrom that did not move this turn may add 1 die to its attack.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Red Ants of Aunstrom may triple their height.

name: REGORTAR
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Regortar always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When Regortar attacks, he receives one extra attack dice for each wound marker he has.

name: REBEL PILOT
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 2. Use this power once per game. One at a time, do the following with each squad figure: Choose a figure to attack; no clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to target are also affected. Roll 2 attack dice for all affected figures.

name: Red Skull
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Red Skull's card, instead of taking that turn with Red Skull, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero you control within clear sight of Red Skull.
ability_2_desc:
After moving and before attacking you may either:
• Roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Red Skull, or
• Roll the 20-sided die once for any one figure up to 3 clear sight spaces away.
If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure is destroyed.

name: Repenant
ability_1_desc: When this Repenant attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to this Repenant, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may only be targeted as they move into engagement with this Repenant.
ability_3_desc: This Repenant may never leave an engagement.

name: Quinjet Wing
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If a figure picks up this Quinjet Wing, if it was attached to a Quinjet place 2 wound markers on that Quinjet's card.

name: Rhino
ability_1_desc: Rhino can add 3 to his Move as long as he only moves in a straight line.
ability_2_desc: Rhino rolls two additional attack dice against figures that were at least 4 clear sight spaces away at the start of his turn.
ability_3_desc: Rhino adds one shield when defending against normal attacks.

name: Riders Of Rohan - Spears
ability_1_desc: A Rider Of Rohan receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from that Rider at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against adjacent attacking small or medium squad figures, Riders Of Rohan receive 1 additional defense die.

name: Rechets of Bogdan
ability_1_desc: Rechets of Bogdan do not start the game on the battlefield. they must be summoned onto the battlefield by Iskra Esenwein.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium figure, if a Rechets of Bogdan rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure cannot roll any defense dice and is immediately destroyed.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Rechets of Bogdan's movement, ignore elevations. Rechets of Bogdan may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Rechets of Bogdan starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ripper
ability_1_desc: When Ripper attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If Ripper wounds a figure, place an upside-down wound marker (or other token) on the figure's army card. Permanently reduce the figure's defense by 1. This effect is not cumulative. Squad figures are unaffected by Rend.
ability_3_desc: Ripper is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Redspawn Flamecasters
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Redspawn Flamecasters and before taking a turn with them, you may first take a turn with Moltenclaw if he is drafted in your army.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. A Redspawn Flamecaster may only use Flame Cast Special Attack when Moltenclaw is within 3 clear sight spaces.
ability_3_desc: Redspawn Flamecasters never roll for molten lava or lava field damage, and do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Retinues Of The Inner Circle
ability_1_desc: Whenever a special power on an Army Card you control increases the Move or Attack value of this Army Card, add 1 to the value increased.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for the Retinues Of The Inner Circle's movement, ignore elevations. Retinues can pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Retinue is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Renais Assassin
ability_1_desc: A Renais Assassin that is adjacent to 3 or more small or medium figures has no hit zone.
ability_2_desc: A Renais Assassin can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Before moving, you may choose a small or medium figure to Assassinate. That figure cannot roll defense dice if attacked by this Renais Assassin this turn while using Assassinate. Assassinate can only be used once per round, and after using Assassinate, this Renais Assassin cannot use any of his special powers for the duration of the round.

name: Riders of Rohan
ability_1_desc: While moving normally, each Rider of Rohan may choose a small or medium figure that he was not engaged to at the start of this turn. When that Rider of Rohan leaves engagement with that figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. That Rider of Rohan cannot attack the chosen figure on this turn.
ability_2_desc: Riders of Rohan are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Rev MacDirk
ability_1_desc: Before you take a turn with Rev MacDirk, you may choose an opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces. Your opponent must choose one unrevealed order marker on the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure), display it and return it to its original position.
ability_2_desc: When any Squad figure you control who follows Jandar adjacent to Rev MacDirk receives one or more wounds, you may place a wound marker on Rev MacDirk and ignore any wounds that figure just received.
ability_3_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Utgar, Rev MacDirk receives 1 additional attack die.

name: Rohan Archers
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-4, you cannot attack this turn. If you roll a 5-9, add 0 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 10 or higher, add 1 to the attack value of this card.

name: Geddy Lee
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Geddy Lee, roll the twenty-sided die. -If you roll 11 or less, take a turn with one other Precise Rock God you control. Add 2 to the Move, Range, Attack, and Defense of all Vydar Rock Gods who move this turn. -If you roll an 12 or higher, take a turn with two other Precise Rock Gods you control. Add 3 to the Move, Range, Attack, and Defense value of all Vydar Rock Gods who move this turn.

name: Reptile
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. When Reptile attacks with his Acid Spit Special Attack, if at least one skull is rolled, after the defending figure rolls defense dice you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 16 or higher, the defending figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: If Reptile does not wound a figure with his normal attack, he may attack that same figure one additional time with his Acid Spit Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Reptile can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. At the start of each round, Reptile has no visible Hit Zone until he attacks with a normal or special attack.

name: Red Hood
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If Red Hood is engaged or he moved using his Bat-Grapple 3 special power, he may use this special attack 2 times in the same turn. If Red Hood is unengaged and did not move using his Bat-Grapple 3 special power, he may use this special attack 4 times in the same turn. Red Hood may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Red Hood may Bat-Grapple. Bat-Grapple has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Bat-Grapple, ignore elevations. Red Hood may grapple over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles such as ruins. Red Hood may not grapple more than 30 levels up or down in a single grapple. If Red Hood is engaged when he starts his Bat-Grapple move, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Riot Controllers
ability_1_desc: When defending with a Riot Controller, add 1 defense die for each other adjacent Riot Controller.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, Each Riot Controller may choose a figure 5 spaces away with an order marker on it. Roll the 20 sided dice for each figure. If you get 14 or higher, randomly remove an unrevealed order marker from that card.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Riot Controllers, you may move 4 agents you control up to 5 spaces each.

name: Rohan Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Rohan Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Champion you control from Rohan.

name: Rohan Royal Guards
ability_1_desc: Any Rohan Champion you control adds 1 to his or her defense dice for every adjacent Rohan Royal Guard, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice.

name: Reif Goldfoot
ability_1_desc: In the first round of the game, all figures you control move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Unique Hero Army Card you control other than Reif Goldfoot and taking a turn with that Unique Hero, if that Unique Hero moved at least one space during its turn and was not destroyed you may place 1 multi-colored Egg marker on this Army Card. There may be a maximum of 3 Egg markers on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 2. You must remove 1 Egg marker from this Army Card to use Egg Toss Special Attack. After attacking with Egg Toss Special Attack, if you rolled at least one skull you may remove one unrevealed order marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure.)

name: RE-TROK-SA
ability_1_desc: Re-Trok-Sa starts each game with up to 2 Bleeder Spear Treasure Glyphs on his Army Card. Re-Trok-Sa is never affected by any special power on a Bleeder Spear Treasure Glyph.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. There must be at least one Bleeder Spear Treasure Glyph on this card to use this special attack. If Re-Trok-Sa inflicts a wound on a Unique Hero with Spear Throw Special Attack, immediately place a Bleeder Spear Treasure Glyph on the wounded Hero's Army Card. If Re-Trok-Sa does not inflict a wound or destroys the target figure with Spear Throw Special Attack, immediately place the Bleeder Spear Treasure Glyph power side up onto a space the target figure currently occupies or occupied.

name: Robin Jason Todd
ability_1_desc: Robin rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against wounded figures.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Robin may attack with Batarang Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Robin may Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Robin may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. Robin may swing up to 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If Robin is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Rohan Infantry
ability_1_desc: Heroes you control are never attacked when leaving an engagement with any figure engaged with a Rohan Infantry you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Rohan Infantryman has extreme height advantage on an opponent's figure, he may add 4 to his Range when attacking that figure. No more than 2 Rohan Infantry may use Lob Weapons per turn.

name: Robin
ability_1_desc: If Robin is adjacent to an opponent's figure, other heroes you control may add 1 to their attack when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Robin may use Grapple Line. Grapple Line has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Robin's Grapple Line movement, ignore elevations. Robin may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. If Robin is engaged when he starts to Grapple Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. When Robin attacks with his Batarang Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.

name: Reyaki Singedbeard
ability_1_desc: If Reyaki is unengaged and adjacent to a Mok you control, then instead of attacking with Reyaki you may remove him from the battlefield and place him on Mok's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Lob 16 Attack 2 Choose a nonadjacent figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Defending figures do not get Height Advantage against this attack. If Reyaki is on the Army Card of Mok, you may use this Special Attack in place of one of Mok's Gunner Special Attacks. If Mok did not move this turn, add 3 to the Range, 20 to the Lob, and 1 to the Attack of his Gunner Mod Mortar Special Attack. While engaged, Mok may target and attack nonadjacent figures with Gunner Mod Mortar Special Attack.

name: Roeden Saren
ability_1_desc: For each wound marker on this card, subtract 1 from Roeden Saren's Attack and add 1 to his Defense.
ability_2_desc: If Roeden Saren takes no wounds from a normal attack by an opponent's figure, you may place an Energy Marker on this card. A maximum of 2 Energy Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_3_desc: After attacking normally with Roeden Saren, you may remove an Energy Marker from this card and attack again.

name: Robin
ability_1_desc: When Robin rolls defense dice against a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Robin may attack with Batarang Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Robin may Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Robin may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. Robin may swing up to 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If Robin is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: RI
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Ri, if Nyra the Kyrie Warrior is within 3 clear sight spaces of Ri, you may remove one wound marker from Nyra the Kyrie Warrior's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Ri never makes leaving engagement attacks. All figures may move through Ri.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ri's movement, ignore elevations. Ri may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ri starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Revenant of Annellintia
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces. Place a grey Dread Marker on that figure's Army Card. Whenever an Undead figure you control targets an opponent with a Dread Marker, add 1 to your 20-sided die roll. Dread Markers cannot be placed on Soulborgs or other Undead.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an adjacent attack, instead of rolling defense dice you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, destroy both the attacker and the Revenant of Annellintia.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Revenant of Annellintia's movement, ignore elevations. A Revenant of Annellintia may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Revenant of Annellintia starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Rohan Spearmen
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. If 3 Rohan Spearmen you control are adjacent to the same enemy figure, they may roll their attack dice as one combined attack. The defending figure compares height to the lowest Rohan Spearman to determine any height advantage. If Encircle Special Attack is used, the 4th figure that moved this turn cannot attack.

name: Rohirrim Militia
ability_1_desc: After a Rohirrim Militia figure you control is destroyed by a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 Rohirrim Militia figures you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When defending with Rohirrim Militia, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.

name: Roger
ability_1_desc: When Roger or any friendly figure adjacent to Roger rolls defense dice against any attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, count any excess shields and remove an equal number of wound markers from this card.
ability_2_desc:
If Roger receives enough wounds to be destroyed, before removing Roger from the battlefield, you may roll the 20-sided die to determine if any adjacent figures are affected by Roger's Explosive Implant.
• If you roll a 1-6, nothing happens.
• If you roll a 7-15, each adjacent figure receives 1 wound.
• If you roll a 16-19 each adjacent figure receives 2 wounds.
• If you roll a 20, each adjacent figure receives 4 wounds.
After using this power, Roger is always destroyed.

name: Reality Infinity Gem
ability_1_desc: This figure may ignore terrain effects of all spaces it enters or occupies.
ability_2_desc: If this figure has the Infinity Gauntlet, place this glyph on the Infinity Gauntlet's card and enemy figures within 2 spaces are considered within clear sight and cannot receive additional dice from terrain effects when attacked by this figure.

name: Rocket Raccoon
ability_1_desc: If Rocket Raccoon is unengaged and adjacent to a friendly large or huge figure at the start of that figure's movement, you may place Rocket Raccoon adjacent to that figure at the end of its movement.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Rocket Raccoon add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Each figure adjacent to the chosen figure is also affected by BFG Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Rocket Raccoon may double his height.

name: Ronin Al-Ghoul
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: When Ronin Al-Ghoul destroys a non-undead figure, you may remove 1 wound marker from this army card. If you do, Ronin Al-Ghoul may not use Counterstrike until the beginning of his next turn.
ability_3_desc: Add 1 die to Ronin Al-Ghoul's attack and defense when he is attacking or defending against samurai.

name: Rujin
ability_1_desc: When Rujin attacks a figure on a swamp or swamp water space, roll 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, when Rujin destroys a figure with his normal attack, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Rujin rolls one additional defense die against normal attacks.

name: Rujin
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Rujin, remove 1 wound marker from Rujin's Army Card. If he is on a swamp water or swamp terrain space, remove 1 additional wound marker.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Rujin, if he started his turn on a shadow or swamp water space, and the defending figure was not adjacent to Rujin at the start of this turn, Rujin receives 3 additional attack dice.

name: Roobeye Tribe
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving this figure, you may move up to 6 Roobeye Tribes you control up to 7 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Figures subtract 1 from their defense dice for each adjacent Roobeye Tribe that is not attacking when defending against Tooth and Paw Special Attack, up to a maximum of 3 subtracted dice.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Roobeye Tribe may triple its height.

name: Drizzt Do'Urden
ability_1_desc: If, during the 1st round, 3 order markers are on Drizzt, then during any round you have the 1 order marker on his card, you may add 5 to your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Drizzt, you may attempt to summon Guenhwyvar if she is in your army and she has not yet been summoned. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, place Guenhwyvar on an empty space adjacent to Drizzt. When Guenhwyvar is summoned, you may immediately take a turn with her.
ability_3_desc:
Range 1, Attack 3
Instead of moving and attacking normally with Drizzt, you may move him up to 3 spaces. Drizzt can attack up to 2 times with Scimitar Dance Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move. Drizzt cannot attack the same figure more than once on a single turn and is never attacked when leaving an engagement during Scimitar Dance Special Attack.
ability_4_desc: If Drizzt has 3 wound markers on his card, add 1 to his Defense value. On an attack that would otherwise kill Drizzt, if Guenhwyvar's movement value allows her to move adjacent to Drizzt's attacker, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, Guenhwyvar may immediately attempt to move adjacent to Drizzt's attacker. If she survives the move, Drizzt will only have 3 wounds on his card.

name: Romoe & Bowser
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Romoe & Bowser, whose base is no more than 5 levels above Romoe & Bowser's height or below Romoe & Bowser's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: Romoe & Bowser roll 2 additional dice when attacking Large or Huge figures.
ability_3_desc: When Romoe & Bowser rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice to Romoe & Bowser.

name: Rule Falken
ability_1_desc: Rule does not receive wounds from normal attacks of 2 or fewer skulls.
ability_2_desc: All figures adjacent to Rule do not receive wounds from normal attacks of 1 skull.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 9. The Halberd of Strength Special Attack may only be used once per round.

name: Rogue
ability_1_desc: Start the game with a Drain Marker on this card. After moving and before attacking, choose an adjacent figure that is not a Robot or Soulborg. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. If the chosen figure is also a Unique Hero, place the Drain Marker on its card. If another card has Rogue's Drain Marker on it, its special powers are negated and Rogue may use that card's Move, Attack and Defense values as if they were on this card. At the end of each round, you must return the Drain Marker to this card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Rogue's movement, ignore elevations. Rogue may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Rogue starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Rorshack
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Rorshack's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Rorshack's Army Card to activate Rage for the duration of the round. While Rage is active, add 2 to Rorshack's Attack and Move values and subtract 2 from Rorshack's Defense value.
ability_2_desc: If Rorshack destroys an opponent's unique figure this round, any other unique figures attacked by Rorshack this round roll two less defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Rorshack always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Rolo Lamperouge
ability_1_desc: Start the game with a Geass Marker. After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may place or remove the Geass Marker on this card. While the Geass Marker is on this card, figures attacked by Rolo may not roll more than one defense die and Rolo may not be targeted for an attack or a special power. After taking a turn, if the Geass Marker is on Rolo's card, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll 1-10, place a Wound Marker on this card. Soulborgs, Constructs, and figures with the Mindless personality are not affected by The Ward of Absolute Suspension.
ability_2_desc: Rolo Lamperouge is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When Rolo rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Zana, Master of Coin
ability_1_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap, you may add 3 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: After you roll a 20-sided die for a special power of a friendly figure within 5 spaces of Zana, you may reroll once.

name: Runespiral Demon
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose another Runespiral Demon you control that is up to 4 spaces away from this Runespiral Demon in a straight line. All figures on the spaces between the two Runespiral Demons who are in line of sight of either demon are affected by Arcane Arc Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Runespiral Demon may add 2 to its height.

name: Sacred Captain
ability_1_desc: For every Army Card of Sacred Band in your army, you may change a Sacred Captain's Class to Warlord.
ability_2_desc: All Sacred Band adjacent to this Sacred Captain add 1 to their Defense value.
ability_3_desc: Whenever rolling the 20-sided die for a Warlord you control who follows Einar, you may add 1 to your roll for every Sacred Captain you control.

name: Rusec Amenhotep
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, destroy Rusec Amenhotep. If you roll a 2-6, add 1 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 7-11, add 2 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 12-15, add 3 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 16-19, add 4 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 20, add 8 to the attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Rusec Amenhotep, you may place a wound marker on Rusec and take another turn with him. You may use this power once during a round.

name: Ryno the Short
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Ryno the Short, instead of taking that turn with Ryno, you may take a turn with up to two Golems you control that are within 8 clear sight spaces of Ryno the Short.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Ryno the Short, you may choose a wounded friendly Construct Hero figure adjacent to Ryno the Short and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 Wound Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Wordel the Wicked
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, when this figure or a friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces attacks an adjacent figure, you may roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 20 or higher, the defending figure may not roll defense. You may add 1 to your die result for each destroyed figure in your opponent's army.
ability_2_desc: When defending against a figure who follows Jandar, Wordel the Wicked rolls 2 additional defense dice.

name: Rophru
ability_1_desc: Start the game with two Inspiration markers on this card. Instead of attacking with Rophru, you may place an Inspiration marker on the card of a friendly Unique Hero within 4 clear sight spaces of Rophru. Whenever a Unique Hero other than Rophru with an Inspiration marker on its card rolls attack or defense, you may remove the Inspiration marker from its card and place it back on her card. You may reroll one die from that roll. At the end of the round, return all Inspiration markers to this card.
ability_2_desc: When a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Rophru rolls attack or defense, you may remove an Inspiration marker from this card to reroll one die from that roll. Mindless figures are not affected by Cutting Words.
ability_3_desc: When Rophru rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Sabertooth
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to Sabertooth's Attack for every two Wound Markers on this card. When Sabertooth attacks, he may attack one additional time for every two Wound Markers on this card. Sabertooth cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Sabertooth, remove one Wound Marker from this card. At the end of the round, if you reveal your X Order Marker on a card you control with Healing Factor X, remove one Wound Marker from each card you control with Healing Factor X.

name: Honored Ancestor
ability_1_desc: When a unique samurai figure you control is destroyed, you may place a previously destroyed Honored Ancestor on the space they previously occupied.
ability_2_desc: After you reveal an order marker on a unique hero samurai army card, you may immediately take a turn with one Honored Ancestor you control.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a Normal Attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work on other Samurai.

name: Sahelia Kaa
ability_1_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for a Snake or Viper Army Card, you may add 1 to your roll.
ability_2_desc: When Sahelia Kaa makes a normal attack, she rolls 1 additional attack die for each Snake or Viper figure you control adjacent to the target, up to a maximum of +3 for Call of the Naga.
ability_3_desc: Sahelia Kaa never stops when entering a water space.

name: ROM
ability_1_desc: Rom needs clear sight instead of line of sight when attacking non-adjacent figures.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 5. Creatures and Constructs roll 2 fewer dice when defending against Neutralizer Special Attack. When Rom attacks with Neutralizer Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. Rom cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Rom's movement, ignore elevations. Rom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Rom starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Romitaen'c
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Romitaen'c attacks with his Tail Barb Flick Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once. After attacking with this special attack remove 1 Tail Barb marker from this card.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 Tail Barb markers on this Army Card. A maximum of 3 Tail Barb markers can be placed on this card. After destroying a small or medium figure with Romitaen'c's normal attack, place one Tail Barb marker on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Romitaen'c's movement, ignore elevations. Romitaen'c may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Romitaen'c starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: San Francisco Giants
ability_1_desc: When another figure you control targets a figure for an attack, if a San Fran Giant is adjacent to the targetted figure, you may have that Giant attack instead. You may only use Pinch Hitters once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When a San Fran Giant attacks, if all skulls are rolled, the defending figure may not roll defense and all giants may move 6 spaces.

name: Sapphire Devil
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Sapphire Devil, all skulls rolled count for two additional hits.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Sapphire Devil's movement, ignore elevations. A Sapphire Devil may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If this Sapphire Devil is engaged when it starts to fly, it will receive any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sam Gamgee
ability_1_desc: When Sam attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on another Hobbit Hero you control, after taking that Hobbit's turn, you may move Sam up to 5 spaces. He will take any leaving engagement attacks. You may only use this power if the chosen Hobbit did not attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: If you control Frodo Baggins, add one to Sam's Attack and Defense for every wound marker on Frodo's Army Card. Sam cannot attack Frodo Baggins.

name: Sahuagin Guard
ability_1_desc: When this Sahuagin Guard attacks a figure that does not have any unrevealed Order Markers on its Army Card, you may roll 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: After rolling defense dice for a Sahuagin Leader you control, you may destroy a Sahuagin Guard you control adjacent to that Sahuagin Leader to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.
ability_3_desc: While this Sahuagin Guard is on a water space, add 2 to its Defense. If this Sahuagin Guard starts its turn on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. This Sahuagin Guard does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: Sahuagin Baron
ability_1_desc: While Sahuagin Baron is on a water space, add 2 to his Defense. If Sahuagin Baron starts his turn on a water space, add 2 to his movement for that turn. Sahuagin Baron does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.
ability_2_desc: If Sahuagin Baron is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to another Sahuagin you control, he may attack that same figure up to two additional times.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Sahuagin Baron inflicts at least 1 wound with his Trident Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure. Trident Special Attack can only be used once per turn.

name: Samara the Kyrie Sentinel
ability_1_desc: At the end of an opponent's turn, if an opponent's figure is within 4 clear sight spaces of Samara the Kyrie Sentinel, you may move an unrevealed Order Marker from one Army Card you control to another Army Card you control.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your initiative roll for each opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Samara the Kyrie Sentinel.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Samara's movement, ignore elevations. She may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When she starts to fly, if Samara is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Runespiral
ability_1_desc: If a Runespiral is attacked by a non-adjacent figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to your die roll for each space between the attacking figure and the Runespiral. If you roll 1-10, roll Defense dice normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, the Runespiral takes no damage and you may move that Runespiral to an adjacent space no higher than 2 levels above its base.
ability_2_desc: If a Runespiral would recieve 1 or more wounds from an attack by an adjacent figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. Subtract the attacker's Defense value from your roll. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may choose an adjacent figure. That figure receives all wounds from the attack. You may choose the attacker.

name: Sand Golem
ability_1_desc: When defending against a normal attack, this Sand Golem adds 2 shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If this Sand Golem is on a sand space, it may use Sand Blast Special Attack. Small figures roll 1 fewer defense die against this special attack.
ability_3_desc: If, at the end of any turn, this Sand Golem is on on a water or swamp water space, destroy it.

name: Sandman
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Gas Gun Special Attack. Figures affected by Gas Gun Special Attack subtract 2 from their defense dice. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Robots, destructible objects and Sandman himself are never affected by Gas Gun Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of Sandman's normal move, he may move only one space. This space may be up to 20 levels higher or lower. When using the Wirepoon Grapple, all engagement rules still apply.

name: Sahuagin Raider
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Sahuagin Raider Army Card, before taking that Sahuagin Raider's turn, you may take a turn with any small, medium, or large Ferocious Hero you control that follows any general.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Sahuagin Raider, she recieves 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_3_desc: While Sahuagin Raider is on a water space, add 2 to her Defense. If Sahuagin Raider starts her turn on a water space, add 1 to her movement for that turn. Sahuagin Raider does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: Sardar
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Sardar. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Sardar, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may, if possible, place one of your previously destroyed small or medium Elementals on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Sardar.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Sardar's card, instead of taking that turn with Sardar, you may take a turn with any Hero you control within clear sight of Sardar.

name: Rocket Powered Chainsaw
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking this figure may use Rocket Powered Chainsaw. Choose 8 spaces in a straight line from this figure. Roll the 20-sided die for each figure on those spaces. If you roll an 10 or higher, the figure receives 2 wounds.

name: SCOUT TROOPER
ability_1_desc: This unit adds 4 defense dice when attacked at a range of 6 or more.

name: Saxon Fyrdmen
ability_1_desc: If a Saxon Fyrdman is destroyed, you may immediately place an adjacent Saxon Fyrdman into that figure's space. This action does not count as a normal movement. The re-positioned figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sasuke
ability_1_desc: When Sasuke inflicts one or more wounds on opponent's figure with a normal attack, he deals 1 additional wound.
ability_2_desc: Sasuke rolls 3 additional defense dice when defending against a Common figure.
ability_3_desc: Sasuke can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Savage Orcs of Nordin
ability_1_desc: When a Savage Orcs of Nordin attacks a Unique figure, add 1 to its attack value.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the first round of a game, after all order markers have been placed, you may move all Savage Orcs of Nordin you control up to 5 spaces each. They must end their Orc Battle Rush movement on an empty space.

name: Scorpion Soldiers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Scorpion Soldiers, you may first take a turn with a Clone Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: After destroying an opponent's adjacent figure, place that figure on this Army Card.

name: Scorpion Acolyte
ability_1_desc: All clone figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of this Scorpion Acolyte add 1 to their defense dice. This Scorpion Acolyte's Clone Defense Aura does not affect this Scorpion Acolyte.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, the defending figure rolls one less defense die.

name: SARYS
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice for Sarys, if Sarys is adjacent to at least one Skull figure that you control, add one automatic shield to the defense roll.
ability_2_desc: When Sarys receives one or more wounds from an opponent's attack or special attack but is not destroyed, you may move 3 Undead squad figures that you control 4 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When defending against a normal attack Necromancer figures you control may roll an additional defense die for each unrevealed Order Marker on this Army Card.

name: Sarob
ability_1_desc: Each time Sarob attacks a non-Soulborg figure with a normal attack or leaving engagement attack, and inflicts at least one wound, destroy that figure.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with one Exoskeleton Marker on this card. After Sarob receives one or more wounds, you may remove an Exoskeleton Marker from this card to ignore all wounds.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sarob's movement, ignore elevation. Sarob may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sarob starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Scorpion Sentinels
ability_1_desc: After attacking an opponent's Unique Hero with this Scorpion Sentinel's normal attack, roll 1 attack die for each wound inflicted in that attack. For each additional skull rolled, place 1 additional wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, a Scorpion Sentinel adds 1 to its defense dice.
ability_3_desc: After destroying an opponent's adjacent figure, place that figure on this Army Card.

name: Satanus
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving and attacking normally with Satanus, you may move Satanus up to 5 spaces. Each time Satanus enters a space, as long as he is on a space where he may end his movement, you may choose an adjacent figure that is not tiny. If the chosen figure has only one Life remaining, destroy it. Otherwise, roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 2 from the roll if the chosen figure has the Super Strength special power. If you roll 12 or higher, the chosen figure receives 2 wounds. Satanus cannot choose the same figure more than once and will take any leaving engagement attacks when using this special power.

name: Serpent Demon
ability_1_desc: When this Serpent Demon attacks, he may attack up to 6 times. Reduce the number of times this Serpent Demon can attack by 1 for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: The Serpent Demon does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Scarlet Witch
ability_1_desc: When Scarlet Witch attacks, you may re-roll any dice that do not show a skull. You can only re-roll once per attack.
ability_2_desc: If Scarlet Witch inflicts one or more wounds on a figure with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, remove all order markers on that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one card for that figure).
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: SCALRON
ability_1_desc: At any point before, during, or after moving with Scalron he may use Fling. Choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Scalron and place that figure 2 spaces away on the opposite end of Scalron, ignoring elevations up to 10 spaces above the chosen figure's base. Figures moved by Fling do not receive leaving engagement attacks. Falling damage will apply to non-Flying figures. Scalron may only use Fling once per turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a friendly Hero adjacent to Scalron and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, remove any special markers from that Hero's Army Card.

name: Scarlet Witch
ability_1_desc: When Scarlet Witch attacks, you may re-roll any dice that do not show a skull. You can only re-roll once per attack.
ability_2_desc: If Scarlet Witch inflicts one or more wounds on a figure with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, remove all order markers on that figure's Army Card (or cards if that opponent has more than one card for that figure.)
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Serethis
ability_1_desc: When Serethis or any figure you control that is adjacent to Serethis you control, is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, Serethis and all figures you control that are adjacent to Serethis, no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Serethis, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 3 to Serethis' Range value for the duration of his turn.

name: Scorpion Crossbowmen
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if a Scorpion Crossbowman you control attacks the same figure as another Scropion Crossbowman previously attacked this turn, add one attack die to that Scropion Crossbowman's attack.
ability_2_desc: After destroying an opponent's adjacent figure, place that figure on this Army Card.

name: Scarab Swarm
ability_1_desc: The Scarab Swarm does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, place it on the Army Card of an Undead Queen you control. If she is destroyed, you may immediately place the Scarab Swarm on the space she previously occupied. Move all unrevealed Order Markers from that card to this card.
ability_2_desc: When attacked by the Scarab Swarm, small and medium figures reduce their Defense number by X, where X is the remaining Life of this card. Soulborgs, Robots, and Constructs are not affected by Creeping Flesh-Eaters.
ability_3_desc: For each wound marker on this card, reduce its Attack by 1.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, the Scarab Swarm may triple its height.

name: Sentinel of Air
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Sentinel of Air's Army Card, before taking a turn with the Sentinel of Air, you may take a turn with up to 2 other Primordial Sentinels you control.
ability_2_desc: Sentinel of Air may attack any or all figures adjacent to it. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: When Sentinel of Air and any adjacent Primordial Sentinels that you control roll defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice to their roll.

name: Seishin Samurai
ability_1_desc: Seishin Samurai do not start the game on the battlefield normally. For the entire game, when a Human Samurai that you control is destroyed, you may immediately replace that figure, if possible, with any Seishin Samurai that you control not currently on the battlefield and then move that figure up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When taking a turn with Seishin Samurai, you may move and attack with all Seishin Samurai that you control.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: SCAMP
ability_1_desc: If a Scamp is attacked by a medium, large, or huge figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to flee. If you roll 1-6, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 7 or higher, the attacked Scamp takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. The attacked Scamp can flee only if he ends his fleeing move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: While moving if a Scamp passes by an opponent's figure a treasure glyph on its Army Card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the opponent's figure must drop a treasure glyph on an empty space next to both the Scamp and the opponent's figure. A Scamp may only Pickpocket once during his movement. A Scamp may not use Pickpocket on a Rogue figure.
ability_3_desc: A Scamp is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Sergeant M25
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2, or 3. M25 starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2, or 3 attack dice.
