M25 may keep making special attacks with 1, 2, or 3 attack dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. M25 may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure with a normal attack, M25 may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for M25's movement, ignore elevations. M25 may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When M25 starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shade
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking roll the 20 sided die, if you roll a 16 or higher destroy 1 adjacent figure. If Assassinate is successful Shade may not attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: Opponents' figures must have line of sight with Shade's entire hit zone to attack him from range.
ability_3_desc: Shade is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Shagrat
ability_1_desc: Shagrat rolls an additional attack die against any figures carrying a Treasure Glyph.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Orcs that are Medium 5 or larger adjacent to Shagrat roll an additional defense die.

name: Sgt. Al McCreech
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Sgt. Al McCreech, you may choose another Lawman hero you control. Take a turn with the chosen hero.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack on a figure that is engaged with a Lawman you control, Sgt. McCreech rolls 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_title: I'm Getting Too Old For This
ability_3_desc: For every revealed Order Marker on this card, reduce its Move by 1.

name: Shadow Stalker
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. A Shadow Stalker may attack 2 additional times with Shadow Strikes Special Attack if there is at least one other Shadow figure you control adjacent to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: When a Shadow Stalker is targeted for an attack, you may immediately move it up to 1 space, if possible.
ability_3_desc: A Shadow Stalker can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: SGT. ROCK
ability_1_desc: Any time Sgt. Rock would be destroyed by a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, Sgt. Rock takes no damage from that attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Hand Grenades Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Sgt. Drake Alexander
ability_1_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to Sgt. Drake Alexander to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Drake, you may choose one enemy Small or Medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces whose level is no more than 6 levels above or below Drake's level. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to Drake. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Grapple Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shadow Stalker
ability_1_desc: After a Shadow Stalker rolls defense dice and is not destroyed, you may immediately place it on any empty space within 2 spaces of its current placement.
ability_2_desc: When an unengaged Shadow Stalker is attacked with a normal or special attack, add 2 defense dice to the defending Shadow.
ability_3_desc: A Shadow Fungus can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Screeching Harpy
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with a Screeching Harpy, you may choose an opponent's figure within 3 clear sight spaces of that Screeching Harpy. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 11-19, remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure). If you roll 20 or higher, remove all Order Markers from that Army Card (or cards).
ability_2_desc: Opponents' figures with no unrevealed Order Markers on their Army Cards (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure) cannot roll defense dice when attacked by a Screeching Harpy.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Screeching Harpy's movement, ignore elevations. A Screeching Harpy may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Screeching Harpy is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sephir
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. All figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Sephir are affected. Sephir does not roll any attack dice. Each affected figure must roll defense dice. If that figure does not roll at least half of its base defense score, rounded up, it is Stunned this turn. Then Sephir may move up to 3 spaces and attack a figure with 4 attack dice. Stunned figures will not roll defense.
ability_2_desc: Friendly figures adjacent to Sephir add 1 to their defense against normal ranged attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sephir's movement, ignore elevations. Sephir may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sephir starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement.

name: SERRIS
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, Serris may move 12 spaces in a straight line. If Serris moves 5 or more spaces and a figure or destructible object stops Serris' movement with Sonic Dash, Serris must attack that figure, if possible. When attacking with Sonic Dash, Serris adds 3 to its Attack value.
ability_2_desc: Serris does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces. Serris has no hit zone while on a water space.
ability_3_desc: After attacking with Serris, it may move up to 5 spaces. Serris never receives leaving engagement attacks while using Rapid Strike.

name: SGT. ROSS GUNN
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, if Sgt. Ross Gunn is unengaged, you may remove F.R.E.D. from this card and place it adjacent to him if possible.
ability_2_desc: If Sgt. Ross Gunn did not attack this turn, you may take a turn with F.R.E.D. After taking a turn with F.R.E.D., if Sgt. Gunn has clear line of sight on it, you may destroy F.R.E.D.
ability_3_desc: Range 6+Special Attack 2. All figures adjacent to the target figure are also affected by the Mk. 19 Grenade Launcher Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Shadow Hound
ability_1_desc: Before moving a Shadow Hound, you may choose an opponent's non-adjacent figure. Add 1 to the Shadow Hound's Move and Attack values for each friendly Shadow figure adjacent to the chosen figure to a maximum of +2 for each. To use Shadow Hunting, the Shadow Hound must be able to end its move adjacent to the chosen figure and may not attack any other figure this turn.
ability_2_desc: A Shadow Hound can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Shidou Samurai
ability_1_desc: When a Shidou Samurai attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurai.

name: Sevestra Thune
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first take a turn with a Champion you control who follows Utgar or Valkrill.
ability_2_desc: When Sevestra Thune attacks a figure she is engaged with, it subtracts two from its defense dice. If that figure is destroyed by her attack, you may remove one wound marker from this Army Card. You may also move any Champions on the destroyed figure's Army Card to this card, if possible.
ability_3_desc: Sevestra Thune, and all figures you control who follow Utgar or Valkrill within 4 clear sight spaces of her, add 1 to their defense dice when attacked by a non-adjacent opponent.

name: Sgt. Drake Alexander
ability_1_desc: Opponent's figures must be adjacent to Sgt. Drake Alexander to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces whose level is no more than 11 levels above Drake's level or 6 levels below Drake's level. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to Drake. Figures moved by Grapple Grab do not take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Drake's move, ignore elevations. Drake may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shang Chi
ability_1_desc: Shang Chi may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 4. Choose a non-adjacent figure whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from Shang Chi's base. After attacking the chosen figure, if the figure is destroyed, immediately place Shang Chi on a space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, immediately place Shang Chi adjacent to that figure. If it is not possible to place Shang Chi after using Leaping Strike Special Attack, destroy Shang Chi.
ability_3_desc: Shang Chi is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Summon Skeletons
ability_1_desc: If at least 1 squad member from either side was killed in the previous round, this spell may be cast. Roll a d20 and place the number of skeletons adjacent to the spell caster. 1: Spell book destroyed. 2: This spell is destroyed. 2-10: Nothing happens. 11-13: 1 Skeleton. 14-16: 2 Skeletons. 17-19: 3 Skeletons. 20: 4 Skeletons.
ability_2_desc: Choose an enemy figure adjacent to the spell caster for this attack. Roll a d20 and apply the following: 1: Spell book is destroyed. 2: This spell is destroyed. 3-10: Nothing happens. 11-19: Attack chosen figure with 6 attack dice. 20: Attack chosen figure with 6 attack dice. If the target figure loses all life points, it becomes controlled by the spell caster. It has 1 life point but retains all special abilities. This spell does not affect soulborgs.
ability_3_desc: Roll a d20 and apply the following: 1: Spell book is destroyed. 2: This spell is destroyed. 3-10: Nothing happens. 11-19: Place the Wind of Death 2 hexes away from the spell caster. If it is adjacent to any figures, roll for attacks. The Wind of Death will begin to function as another character. 20: Place the Wind of Death up to 8 clear sight hexes away from the spell caster. If it is adjacent to any figures, roll for attacks. The Wind of Death will begin to function as another character.
ability_4_desc: Roll a d20 and apply the following: 1: Spell book is destroyed. 2: This spell is destroyed. 3-10: Nothing happens. 11-19: The spell caster becomes a cloud of vapor until the end of the round and may not be attacked. He may move 8 hexes per turn as if flying, but he may not make any attacks or cast spells. 20: The spell caster becomes a cloud of vapor until the end of the round and may not be attacked. He may move 8 hexes per turn as if flying. He may attack an enemy figure at the end of movement, but may not cast more spells.

name: SHAITHIS
ability_1_desc: At the end of each round in which Shaithis did not inflict a wound, add 1 wound marker to this card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Shaithis may Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Shaithis' leaping movement, ignore elevations. Shaithis may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Shaithis may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. If Shaithis is engaged when he starts to leap, he does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When Shaithis rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: She-Hulk
ability_1_desc: Instead of her normal move, She-Hulk may Leap. Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for her leaping movement, ignore elevations. She-Hulk may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. She-Hulk may not leap more than 20 levels up or down in a single leap. If she is engaged when she starts to leap, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to She-Hulk. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the figure receives one wound.

name: Shemagorah
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, choose an adjacent small or medium opponent and remove any order markers on that figure's Army Card. That figure cannot move or defend as long as Shemagorah remains adjacent. Every time an order marker is placed on the trapped opponent figure's Army Card, the figure receives 1 automatic wound.
ability_2_desc: If Shemagorah destroys a Unique Hero, remove all wound markers on her Army Card.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Viper Scouts and Protectors within 4 clear sight spaces of Shemagorah add 2 to their defense dice.

name: Shemagorah
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, choose an adjacent small or medium opponent and remove any order markers on that figure's Army Card. That figure cannot move or defend as long as Shemagorah remains adjacent. Every time an order marker is placed on the trapped opponent figure's Army Card, the figure receives 1 automatic wound.
ability_2_desc: If Shemagorah destroys a Unique Hero, remove all wound markers on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Viper Scouts and Protectors within 2 clear sight spaces of Shemagorah add 1 automatic shield to their defense dice.

name: Sigmacron
ability_1_desc: If Sigmacron was not engaged at the start of this turn, figures roll 2 less defense dice when defending against Sigmacron's attack.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Sigmacron, if the defending figure is the only figure adjacent to Sigmacron, each skull rolled counts as one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: As long as there are no figures adjacent to Sigmacron, Sigmacron has no visible Hit Zone.

name: Sheik
ability_1_desc: Before Sheik rolls dice against an attack, roll the 20-Sided die. Do the following for each result: -If you roll a 2 or a 1, remove one defense die from Sheik's roll. -If you roll a 3-8, add 1 defense die to Sheik's roll. -If you roll a 9-20, add 2 defense dice to Sheik's roll.
ability_2_desc: Sheik may only use this ability once per game. During Sheik's turn, Sheik may return to the start-zone. Sheik may go to any unoccupied space that is in what is considered a "Starting Zone" for that battlefield.

name: SIF
ability_1_desc: Before the game starts, you may choose another Unique Hero in your army. Sif and the chosen hero do not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place order markers, you may place Sif on any empty space and the chosen hero on any empty space or spaces adjacent to Sif. You cannot place Sif or the chosen hero adjacent to other figures, or on glyphs.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Sif attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack Sif.

name: She-Hulk
ability_1_desc: Instead of a normal move, She-Hulk may Leap. Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for She-Hulk's Leap movement, ignore elevations. She-Hulk may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. She-Hulk may not leap more than 20 levels up or down in a single leap. If She-Hulk is engaged when she starts to leap, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to She-Hulk. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.

name: Shocker
ability_1_desc: When Shocker attacks using his normal attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one additional figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by the Vibroshock Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, choose a destructible object within 4 clear sight spaces of Shocker and place 5 wound markers on that destructible object's card. When Shocker destroys a destructible object, all figures adjacent to that destructible object receive one wound.

name: Sir Agonn
ability_1_desc: All Knights you control who follow Einar move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Knights adjacent to Sir Agonn who follow Einar receive an additional attack die.

name: Silverback Troopers
ability_1_desc: Any or all Silverback Troopers may add 3 to their move number as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. A Silverback Trooper must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Silverback Charge.
ability_2_desc: When a Silverback Trooper is destroyed, place the figure on this card. All remaining Silverback Troopers add 1 to their attack and 1 to their defense for each figure placed on the card.

name: Sideswipe
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Sideswipe, you may move Sideswipe up to 4 spaces. Sideswipe can attack up to 3 times with Cybertanium Blades Special Attack at any point, before, during, or after this move as long as Sideswipe is on a space where he could end his movement. Sideswipe cannot attack the same figure more that once on a single turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving, you may choose one opponent's figure that Sideswipe passed this turn. Roll 1 attack die. If a skull is rolled, the figure receives 1 unblockable wound.
ability_3_desc: Sideswipe is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Signifiers of Sigyn
ability_1_desc: When a figure you control with a Range of 1 attacks normally, roll 1 additional die for every friendly Signifier of Sigyn adjacent to that figure.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with the Signifiers of Sigyn, you may take a turn with any Kyrie Warrior you control who follows Sigyn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Signifiers of Sigyn's movement, ignore elevations. Signifiers of Sigyn may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Signifier of Sigyn starts to fly, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sidhir the Bleakwoode Cultis
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may destroy one friendly undead figure adjacent to Sidhir. If you do, remove up to 2 Wound Markers from this card.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 2 + Special. When Sidhir uses Searing Souls Special Attack, add 1 attack die per currently destroyed undead figure in your army, to a maximum of +4 dice. If Searing Souls Special Attack destroys an opponent's small or medium figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed common small or medium undead figures. Constructs, soulborgs, and undead are not affected by Searing Souls Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Sidhir is never attacked when leaving an engagement

name: Rhaegal
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose 4 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces that are within line of sight of Rhaegal are affected by Burning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Rhaegal is not affected by Burning Breath Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Rhaegal never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Rhaegal's movement, ignore elevations. Rhaegal may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Rhaegal starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sir Giraudus
ability_1_desc: Sir Giraudus rolls one additional die against each figure leaving an engagement with him.
ability_2_desc: When Sir Giraudus rolls a skull on every die, then the defending figure cannot roll any defense dices.

name: SHIORI
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. If Shiori did not move normally, she may attack with Ninjutsu Mastery Special Attack up to three times. Before each attack, you must choose an opponent's figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Shiori and place Shiori on an empty space adjacent to that figure that is not more than 6 levels higher or lower than Shiori's base. When attacking with Ninjutsu Mastery Special Attack, Shiori rolls 2 attack dice, or 3 attack dice if Shiori has exactly one unrevealed Order Marker on her Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Shiori is attacked with a normal or special attack and receives 1 or more wounds, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may place Shiori on an empty space within 2 spaces of Shiori that is not more than 6 levels above or below Shiori's level. If you do, ignore all wounds just received.
ability_3_desc: Shiori can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Sir Lancelot
ability_1_desc: When Sir Lancelot attacks, he may attack another figure.
ability_2_desc: Sir Lancelot may add 2 to his move and attack values if he ends his movement engaged with an opponent's figure.

name: Sir Clay
ability_1_desc: Sir Clay can never have special markers such as Negation placed on his card. Sir Clay's Move, Attack, and Defense values can never be reduced by special powers on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: When Sir Clay wounds a figure, if Sir Clay is adjacent to any Squad figures, you must choose one of them and that figure receives 1 wound.

name: Sigrid Ironwill
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, before making a normal attack, choose a figure engaged with Sigrid Ironwill that is also adjacent to the target. After attacking, Sigrid may make an additional attack on the chosen figure, if possible.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, before moving, you may roll the 20-sided die. • If you roll 1-2, Sigrid Ironwill takes one wound. • If you roll 3-14, nothing happens. • If you roll 15 or higher, for the rest of the round, Sigrid and all friendly Dwarves within 5 clear sight spaces of her may roll an additional attack die when making a normal attack on an adjacent figure. • If you roll a 20, in addition to that attack bonus, you may remove all wound markers from this card.

name: Sir Chorin
ability_1_desc: Sir Chorin recieves 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from him at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: Sir Chorin can move through all small figures. If Sir Chorin moves into engagement with a small figure during his move, he does not take a leaving engagement attack from that figure if he leaves engagement with that figure during that move.

name: Simonus
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Simonus, instead of taking that turn with Simonus, you may take a turn with up to two Golems you control that are within 8 clear sight spaces of Simonus.
ability_2_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, Simonus may choose to detonate a medium or large golem you control within 4 clear sight spaces. Roll the 20-sided die to determine if any other figures are wounded. If you roll a 1–3, all adjacent figures are safe. If you roll a 4–15, each adjacent figure receives 1 wound. If you roll a 16–19 each adjacent figure receives 2 wounds. If you roll a 20, each adjacent figure receives 4 wounds. After using this power, the chosen golem is always destroyed.

name: Jonas Quinn
ability_1_desc: Jonas Quinn is considered a member of SG-1.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. If Zat Gun Special Attack inflicts at least 1 wound, you may remove 1 order marker from the defending figure's army card.

name: Sir Lucane
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When Sir Lucane attacks with this Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. Sir Lucane cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: If Sir Lucane attacks a large figure, add 1 attack dice. If Sir Lucane attacks a huge figure, add 2 attack dices.

name: Silber Zahn
ability_1_desc: If the two Silber Zahn are within 5 clear sight spaces of each other add 2 to their attack and defense.
ability_2_desc: If the Silber Zahn start adjacent to each other they may fly up to 7 spaces. Ignore all elevations and obstacles when flying. Silber Zahn will take any leaving engagement attacks when Tandem Flying.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. At any point during Tandem Flying you may choose to Fang Drop the wingless Silber Zahn on any of the 7 spaces. The Silber Zahn rolls attack dice once for all figures adjacent to the landing spot. All affected figures roll defense separately. The winged Silber Zahn cannot attack when using Fang Drop Special Attack, and should be placed using any left over movement after the attempted special attack.

name: Sinestro
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3 + Special When Sinestro attacks with his Fear Ring Special Attack, he may add a number of attack dice so that the total attack dice rolled equals the Defense Value on the targeted figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When Sinestro rolls defense dice against a normal attack, he may add a number of defense dice so that the total defense dice rolled equals the number of attack dice rolled by the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sinestro's movement, ignore elevations. Sinestro may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sinestro starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Silver Surfer
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Silver Surfer's movement, ignore elevations. Silver Surfer may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Silver Surfer starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 6. If an opponent's Unique Hero recieves at least one wound from the Cosmic Force Blast Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed order marker from that Unique Hero's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Silver Surfer, Silver Surfer may move up to 5 spaces. Silver Surfer cannot use Hyper Speed 5 if he attacked with his Cosmic Force Blast Special Attack during that turn.

name: SIR VLAD
ability_1_desc: All Knights and Death Knights you control move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Knights and Death Knights adjacent to Sir Vlad add one to their Attack and Defense value. Surge Aura may only be used on rounds in which you won initiative.

name: Scalpel
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Scalpel, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may attack again with Scalpel.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a friendly figure with Scalpel, instead of rolling attack dice, you may roll a 20-sided die. On a roll of 6 or higher, you may remove a wound marker from that figure's Card.
ability_3_desc: When defending with Scalpel, add 1 defense die for each adjacent friendly figure to a maximum of +2 dice for the They Got My Back! power.

name: Skeletal Cyclops
ability_1_desc: When this Skeletal Cyclops, or any friendly undead figure adjacent to this Skeletal Cyclops, rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits inflicted by this Skeletal Cyclops on the attacking figure.

name: Sir Humphrey
ability_1_desc:
After moving and before attacking, choose a wounded hero figure adjacent to Sir Humphrey. Then roll the 20-sided die to heal wound markers from the chosen figure's card:
• If you roll 1-12, remove 1 wound marker.
• If you roll 13-19, remove 2 wound markers.
• If you roll 20, remove all wound markers.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, place 5 black markers on this army card. Any friendly figure that is adjacent to Sir Humphrey may collect 1 black marker. Remove the black marker and heal 1 wound.

name: Skeletal Archers
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally with this Skeletal Archers, you may move up to 6 Skeletal Archer you control, up to 3 spaces each.

name: SILV'T
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Silv't. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty space within 10 clear sight spaces of Silv't that is on the same level as the chosen figure. If the chosen figure is engaged, the figure does not receive any leaving engagement attacks. Teleport Target 14 does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Silv't may attack any figure within 5 line of sight spaces with Chaos Bolt Special Attack, even if Silv't is engaged with a figure. After attacking with Chaos Bolt Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you must attack again with Chaos Bolt Special Attack. Silv't must continue attacking with its Chaos Bolt Special Attack until you do not roll a 14 or higher or there are no remaining targets (including friendly figures). Silv't cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn with Chaos Bolt Special Attack.

name: Skeletal Orc Warrior
ability_1_desc: If this Skeletal Orc Warrior inflict a wound or destroy a figure, you can attack again. You can attack another adjacent figure.

name: Skeletal Legion
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Skeletal Legion, you may first take a turn with any Skeleton, or Undead Unique Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: For each Uncommon Figure adjacent to a Skeletal Legion, add 1 defense dice.

name: Skeletal Marksmen
ability_1_desc: If a Skeletal Marksmen is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to that Marksman's attack.
ability_2_desc: If every Army Card you control has a relentless personality, each skeletal marksman may move an additional 3 spaces.

name: Skeletal Lancer
ability_1_desc: This Skeletal Lancer receives 2 additional dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 hexes away at the start of the turn.
ability_2_desc: If this Skeletal Lancer defends against a normal adjacent attack and does not receive any wounds, you may immediately move this Skeletal Lancer up to 4 spaces. This Skeletal Lancer will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Back Off.

name: Samantha Carter
ability_1_desc: Samantha Carter is considered a member of SG-1.
ability_2_desc: All members of SG1 that you control roll 1 additional attack die and 1 additional defense die against Soulborgs, robots, droids, Prymadons, cyborgs and androids.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. If Zat Gun Special Attack inflicts at least 1 wound, you may remove 1 order marker from the defending figure's army card.

name: Skeleton Archers
ability_1_desc: If a Skeleton Archer attacks an opponent's figure which is 5, 6, or 7 spaces away, add 1 to its attack dice. If a Skeleton Archer is engaged, it cannot attack.
ability_2_desc: This figure rolls 2 additional defense dice against normal attacks by non-adjacent figures.

name: Skinwalker
ability_1_desc: Skinwalker starts the game with three black Infection Markers on his army card. When Skinwalker destroys a Unique Hero do not remove the destroyed figure from the board. Place a black Infection Marker on the destroyed figure's army card. Take control of that figure. Remove any wound markers or order markers from that card. That figure's special abilities are negated for the remainder of the game.

name: Skinwalker
ability_1_desc: Skinwalker starts the game with three black Infection Markers on his army card. When Skinwalker destroys a Unique Hero do not remove the destroyed figure from the board. Place a black Infection Marker on the destroyed figure's army card. Take control of that figure. Remove any wound markers or order markers from that card. That figure's special abilities are negated for the remainder of the game.

name: Skeleton Giant
ability_1_desc: Friendly Undead figures that attack a figure engaged with this Skeleton Giant roll 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker and taking a turn with this Skeleton Giant, if this Skeleton Giant destroyed at least one opponent's figure this turn, you may immediately take a turn with one Mindless Undead Squad that you control.

name: Slaad Spawn
ability_1_desc: Slaad Spawns do not start the game on the battlefield. They are placed on the battlefield when Fubd'lub is wounded.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Slaad Spawn, you may take a turn with every Slaad Spawn you control.

name: Sizwe
ability_1_desc: If Sizwe is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to Sizwe's attack
ability_2_desc: All friendly Warriors adjacent to Sizwe receive an additional attack die when attacking an adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: After attacking an adjacent opponent's figure, if Sizwe inflicted one or more wounds, you may move up to two Squad figures you control with the fearsome personality up to 4 spaces each.

name: Skeletal Reaper of Death
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game select any small, medium or large enemy Unique Hero. When that figure is destroyed, you may take control of that figure. Remove all wounds and add to that selected figure the number of wounds that this Skeletal Reaper of Death have.
ability_2_desc: After moving roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher bring back to the game any previously destroyed squad Skeleton figure you control. This figure will begin adjacent to this Skeletal Reaper of Death. When you use this power, you can't attack with the Skeletal Reaper of Death.

name: Slanec Vipers
ability_1_desc: Slanec Vipers do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with the Slanec Vipers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with the Slanec Vipers.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Only one Slanec Viper may use Acid Spit Special Attack. The other Slanec Vipers may attack normally.

name: Skae Mach
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 1. Choose a small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces to attack. If you roll a skull, the figure receives 1 unblockable wound. If you roll a shield, add a wound marker to Skae Mach's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Skae Mach moves adjacent to a Dragon or Beast figure, instead of attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17-19, place a Negation Marker on the figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated for the entire game. If you roll a 20 or higher, take control of the figure and that figure's Army Card.

name: Cameron Mitchell
ability_1_desc: Cameron Mitchell is considered a member of SG-1.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Cameron Mitchell, you may instead take a turn with any 2 members of SG1 you control
ability_3_desc: When attacking or defending against an adjacent figure, Cameron Mitchell adds 1 additonal die.
ability_4_desc: When Cameron Mitchell recieves enough wounds to be destroyed, do not immediately remove him from the board. At the end of that round, Cameron Mitchell may attack 1 additional round. After attacking the additional time, remove Cameron Mitchell from the board regardless of the number of wound markers currently on this card.

name: Silver Shield
ability_1_desc:
TEMPORARY TREASURE GLYPH
After an opponent rolls shields for a defense against a normal attack made by one of your figures, you may activate this glyph and force that opponent to re-roll all shields rolled for that defense.

Keep this card handy as a reference to the Magic Shield's power.

name: S'KRAAX DRONE
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, your turn immediately ends. If you roll a 2-5, you may take a turn with 1 S'kraax Drone you control. If you roll a 6-11, you may take a turn with up to 2 S'kraax Drones you control. If you roll a 12-17, you may take a turn with up to 3 S'kraax Drones you control. If you roll an 18 or higher, you may take a turn with up to 4 S'kraax Drones you control.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a S'kraax Drone's movement, ignore elevations. A S'kraax Drone may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a S'kraax Drone is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Slaves of Sudema
ability_1_desc: Once during a turn, when you roll the 20-sided die for a special power on a Vydar Army Card you control, if you have chosen an opponent's figure with that special power, you may add 1 to your die roll for each Slave of Sudema adjacent to the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, if a Slave of Sudema does not roll any shields, add 1 automatic shield to whatever was rolled.

name: S'kraax Queen
ability_1_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for an Insect Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: An opponent's figure that is engaged to one or more other Insects you control may not attack S'kraax Queen.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for S'kraax Queen's movement, ignore elevations. S'kraax Queen may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When S'kraax Queen starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Slaughterstone Eviscerator
ability_1_desc: You may not place Order Markers on this card unless you control at least one Dwarf figure.
ability_2_desc: When the Slaughterstone Eviscerator attacks, it may attack up to 4 times. Reduce the number of times the Slaughterstone Eviscerator can attack by 1 for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: The Slaughterstone Eviscerator rolls 3 additional defense dice when defending against a special attack.

name: Slash
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 2. Each skull rolled counts as additional attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attack, you may roll a D20. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 wound marker from this card. Slash may not use this power if he is engaged.
ability_3_desc: Before rolling defense dice against a normal attack, roll a D20. If you roll an 8 or higher, Slash is not affected by that attack.

name: Skullbuster
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When Skullbuster attacks with his Machine Gun Special Attack, he may attack with this special attack 2 additional times. You may attack the same figure or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, Skullbuster may use his Cybernetic Legs. Cybernetic Legs has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Skullbuster's Cybernetic Legs movement, ignore elevations. Skullbuster may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Skullbuster may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. If Skullbuster is engaged when he starts to leap, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: SLISSERK
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any small or medium figure your opponent controls who within 4 clear sight spaces of Slisserk and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure may not roll defense dice until your opponent next reveals a numbered Order Marker. If you roll an 18 or higher, you may also remove an unrevealed Order Marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent controls more than one Common Army Card for that figure).

name: Skullwarden of the Third Circle
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative, if you did not roll the highest result, you may immediately move the Skullwarden up to 5 spaces, or you may move up to 3 Common Undead or Demon figures you control up to 3 spaces each. Figures moved by Unholy Horde Advance will take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If the Skullwarden is attacking a small or medium figure, add 2 dice to its attack.
ability_3_desc: After an Undead or Demon Squad you control attacks, if any figures in that Squad within 3 clear sight spaces of the Skullwarden made a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, those figures may attack again.

name: Sledge
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. If Sledge destroys the defending figure with Driving Assault Special Attack, he may immediately move into an adjacent space that was occupied by the destroyed figure. If Sledge is engaged when he uses Driving Assault Special Attack, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Sledge adds 1 to his defense dice for every adjacent enemy figure, to a maximum of +4 dice for Crowd Defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Sledge always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Soulaxe Demon
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Soulaxe Demon Army Card, before taking that Soulaxe Demon's turn, you may take a turn with one other Demon Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Figures attacked by a Soulaxe Demon subtract two from their defense dice. Destructible Objects are not affected by Soul Weapon.

name: Skrull Agent
ability_1_desc: Skrull Agents do not start the game on the battlefield. After revealing an Order Marker on this card, choose a small or medium figure adjacent to a Skrull figure you control. Roll the 20-sided die, adding 7 to the roll if the chosen figure is Common. If you roll 20 or higher, destroy the chosen figure and replace it with a Skrull Agent in your army that has not been placed on the battlefield. You may then take a turn with a Skrull Agent.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Skrulls adjacent to a Skrull Agent roll one additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: The first time each turn a Skrull Agent is targeted with a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, Skrull Agents no longer have any visible hit zones for the rest of the targeting figure's turn.

name: Slitherblade Tidehunter
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, any small or medium figure attacked by this Slitherblade Tidehunter this turn may roll no more than 1 die for defense.
ability_2_desc: While this Slitherblade Tidehunter is on a water space, add 2 to its Defense. If this Slitherblade Tidehunter starts its turn on a water space, add 1 to its movement for that turn. This Slitherblade Tidehunter does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: SLAVI'VAEN
ability_1_desc: After initiative is rolled, place a Bronze Time Counter on this Army Card. This Army Card can have up to 5 Bronze Time Counters on it at once.
ability_2_desc: Whenever you roll the 20 sided die, except for initiative, you may remove 3 Time Counters to change the result to a 1 or a 20.
ability_3_desc: Whenever a figure you control attacks normally or is attacked normally, you may remove a Time Counter to change the result of one of your combat dice once both players have rolled their combat dice.

name: Snow Crawler
ability_1_desc: Heavy Snow only counts as 1 space when moving. As long as this Snow Crawler is unengaged and on a Snow space, it has no Hit Zone.
ability_2_desc: Any opponent's Small or Medium figure adjacent to this Snow Crawler cannot Move normally.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Snow Crawler, if this Snow Crawler attacked an opponent's figure, you may move and attack with up to 3 other Arachnid Predators you control.

name: Soontir Van
ability_1_desc: All friendly Mariedians who start their turn adjacent to Soontir Van may move 2 additional spaces when moving normally.
ability_2_desc: If Soontir Van is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-14, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Smugglers of Butcher's Cove
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, any Smugglers of Butcher's Cove you control add 2 to their move number and can pass through all figures. If a Smuggler is engaged prior to moving, the figure will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When defending, roll 1 additional defense die for every adjacent Rogue or Pirate you control, up to a maximum of +2 dice. Other Smugglers of Butcher's Cove do not count towards the Motley Crew power.

name: Space Marine Lascannon
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Space Marine Lascannon may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Range 7 Attack 8 Instead of Moving and Attacking, you may instead use Lascannon Special Attack.

name: Skipping Stone
ability_1_desc: Attack 5 Range 4. At the beginning of the game, place two silver Tomahawk markers on Skipping Stone's card. After attacking with Tomahawk Throw Special Attack, remove a marker from this card and place it on a space adjacent to the attacked figure's space. That space may be moved over, but a move may not be ended on it. The marker may not be placed on a glyph. If there are no spaces adjacent to the figure, discard the marker. Skipping Stone may retrieve the marker by ending his move adjacent to it. If Skipping Stone is destroyed, remove all markers from the board.
ability_2_desc: Skipping Stone does not need to stop when moving on to a water tile. Figures attacking Skipping Stone do not get any type of height advantage while he is on a water tile.
ability_3_desc: If Skipping Stone is targeted and recieves one or more wounds, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Skipping Stone. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore any wounds recieved.

name: Snow Wolves Space Marines
ability_1_desc: This unit may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: Ignores water terrain effects and gas effects.

name: Slaver Wasp
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any unique figure adjacent to this Slaver Wasp. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 18 or higher, take control of the chosen figure and that figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card. If this Slaver Wasp is destroyed, you retain control of any Army Cards previously affected by Revenant.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Slaver Wasp's movement, ignore elevations. This Slaver Wasp may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When it starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: SOLENNEL
ability_1_desc: If there are no revealed order markers on this Army Card, Solennel has no hit zone. If there is only one revealed order marker on this card, add 2 to Solennel's Move and Attack value.
ability_2_desc: All Demons and Undead within 6 clear sight spaces of Solennel subtract 1 from their Attack value.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Solennel's movement, ignore elevations. Solennel may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Solennel starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: SO-BEK
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose up to three medium or small figures adjacent to SoBek. If the chosen figures are Squad figures, devour them. If the chosen figures are Heroes, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, devour the chosen heroes.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with SoBek, you may attempt to summon all figures closer to her. If you roll 1-4, nothing happens. If you roll 5-15 all figures will move 3 spaces toward SoBek. If you roll 16-20, all figures will move 5 spaces toward SoBek.
ability_3_desc: Each time SoBek destroys a figure by attacking, you may remove one wound marker from this army card. SoBek cannot Soul Drain destructible objects.

name: Space Marine Plasma Cannon
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Space Marine Plasma Cannon may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. Instead of Moving and Attacking, you may instead use Plasma Cannon Special Attack. Each skull rolled counts as an addition hit. If three skulls are rolled, Space Marine Plasma Cannon suffers one wound. Figures with Lava Resistance are unaffected by this attack.

name: Space Marine Sergeant Vydar
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Space Marine Sergeant may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: When Space Marine Sergeant would take 1 or more wounds from an attack, you may destroy a squad figure within 2 Clear Sight spaces to ignore those wounds.
ability_3_desc: If Space Marine Sergeant is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to its attack.

name: Space Marine Scouts
ability_1_desc: Space Marine Scouts may be deployed up to 3 Clear Sight spaces from their Starting Zone.
ability_2_desc: If a Space Marine Scout is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If they are on a grass space, add 3 to your die roll. If they are next to a jungle piece, add 3 to your die roll. If you roll 1-17, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 18 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Snow Wolves Space Marine Dreadnaught
ability_1_desc: This unit is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: SPECIAL ATTACK: Range 8. Attack 6. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Unit only needs clear shot at the chosen figure. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Unit can be affected by its own Explosion attack.

name: Space Marine Missile Launcher
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Space Marine Missile Launcher may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 5. Begin the game with 4 Munitions Markers on this Army Card. Instead of Moving and Attacking, you may remove one Munitions Marker to instead use Missile Launcher Special Attack. Choose a figure to attack. Any Figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Missile Launcher Special Attack. Space Marine Missile Launcher only needs Line of Sight to the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Spider-Slayer
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, Spider-Slayer always rolls at least 5 defense dice. Armor Coating supersedes all other powers.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Spider-Slayer, you may choose any figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Spider-Slayer. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.

name: Spellguardians of Ashra
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Spellguardians of Ashra, you may first take a turn with any small or medium Wizard or Archmage Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Spellguardian of Ashra is adjacent to at least one other figure you control who follows Ullar, add 1 die to the Defense of that Spellguardian of Ashra and all figures you control who follow Ullar that are adjacent to that Spellguardian of Ashra, to a maximum of +1 dice for the Ashran Defensive Formation.

name: STORMTROOPER
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if another unit in this squad attacks the same target, add one attack die to the 2nd unit's attack.

name: Stonebeasts of Arctorus
ability_1_desc: Only 1 Order Marker can be placed on this Army Card at the start of the round.

name: Slave of the Ilithid
ability_1_desc: If a Mind Flayer chooses this Slave of the Ilithid for Enslave, add 10 to its roll. If a Mind Flayer you control rolls for Enslave on a figure that is not Psychic, you may add 1 to your roll for each Slave of the Ilithid you control adjacent to that figure.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose an adjacent opponent's figure that is not Psychic and roll two 20-sided dice. For each result of 18 or higher, place a wound on that figure's Army Card. You may then remove wound markers from this card, if possible, up to the number of wounds placed with Psionic Tentacles.
ability_3_desc: If a friendly Mind Flayer Hero within 2 clear sight spaces receives one or more wounds, you may ignore wounds up to the number of lives remaining to this Slave of the Ilithid. Place an equal number of wound markers on this card instead.

name: Steel Auxilius
ability_1_desc: While an opponent's Unique Hero is adjacent to Steel Auxilius, all of that figure's special powers are negated.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving with Steel Auxilius, you may remove up to 1 wound marker from his Army Card.

name: Spirit Husks of Ahnend
ability_1_desc: Spirit Husks of Ahnend may pass through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: When a Spirit Husk of Ahnend is destroyed by a normal attack, you must immediately roll the 20-sided die for all figures within 3 clear sight spaces of that Spirit Husk, one at a time. If you roll a 20, destroy the figure. Dispersement 20 does not affect Undead figures.

name: STORMTROOPER OFFICER
ability_1_desc: If this unit has not moved or used another special ability this turn, it may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: All allied non-Unique Heros within 6 LOS hexes gain +1 attack dice. (does not stack)

name: Spirit Lord
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Spirit Lord, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you may, if possible, place one of your previously destroyed Shades of Bleakewoode on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Spirit Lord.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Spirit Lord, if Spirit Lord did not attack, you may move up to three Shades of Bleakewoode up to five spaces. No Shade of Bleakewoode may end its adjacent to an opponent's figure.

name: Starscream
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Starscream, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Starscream's movement, ignore elevations. Starscream may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Starscream starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: SSORIL
ability_1_desc: Opponents' figures adjacent to Ssoril roll 1 fewer attack dice when making a normal attack. Noxious Stench does not affect demons, undead, or constructs.
ability_2_desc: When Ssoril attacks, he may attack one additional time. If Ssoril attacks a different figure with the second attack, Ssoril's Attack is reduced by 1.

name: Spike
ability_1_desc: Each time Spike destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Spike cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: If Spike targets a Slayer for a normal attack, you must first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-3, Spike cannot attack this turn. If you roll a 17 or higher, add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: If Spike is within 4 clear sight spaces of a figure with the Heartbreaker special power, add 1 to his attack and defense.

name: Space Ghost
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Choose a figure and before attacking with this special attack choose one of the following effects: • Each opponent's figure adjacent to the chosen figure is also affected by this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately; or • add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled; or • if you inflict one or more wounds on the defending figure, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's army card; or • if you inflict one or more wounds on a small or medium figure, immediately place it on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of its current location, if possible. A figure moved by this special attack never takes any leaving engagement attacks and can receive any falling damage that may apply. After attacking with this special attack Space Ghost cannot use his Inviso Power special power until the next time you reveal an order marker.
ability_2_desc: Space Ghost is never attacked when leaving an engagement, has no visible Hit Zone, and adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled when defending against an attack.

name: Speed Demon
ability_1_desc: Speed Demon may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Speed Demon does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Speed Demon may ignore his height limit.
ability_2_desc: When Speed Demon attacks, he may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during or after his move as long as Speed Demon is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: When Speed Demon rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage. Speed Demon rolls one additional defense die for each revealed order marker on this card, up to a maximum of 2 additional defense dice for Speed Dodge.

name: Chaplain
ability_1_desc: This Chaplain begins the game with 4 Faith Markers.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds this Chaplain can take from this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: Remove one Faith marker at any time a figure you control within 4 Clear Sight space of this Chaplin rolls defense dice. They may reroll any number of them.
ability_4_desc: Remove one Faith marker. Instead of attacking, up to 4 Soldiers and/or Space Marines you control within 3 Clear Sight spaces may make a normal attack against non-adjacent figures.

name: Sunscale Scytheclaw
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking this Sunscale Scytheclaw may roll one attack die against one adjacent figure. The selected figure can roll defense dice against Quick Strike.
ability_2_desc: While moving, this Sunscale Syctheclaw may add 2 to its move number. If it does, it cannot attack this turn.

name: Daniel Jackson
ability_1_desc: Daniel Jackson is considered a member of SG-1.
ability_2_desc: If control of a member of SG1 that you control is taken by another player, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, control of that figure immediately returns to the original controlling player.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. If Zat Gun Special Attack inflicts at least 1 wound, you may remove 1 order marker from the defending figure's army card.
ability_4_desc: If Daniel Jackson is destroyed, you may place this figure on any SG1 members army card. Daniel Jackson adds 1 defense die and 1 attack die to that army card. While that figure is in play, you may add 3 to all initiative rolls.

name: Stump Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Stump Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Treant you control.
ability_2_desc: When moving, Stump Warriors may pass through any Evergreen or Jungle piece and may pass through any engaged Plant figure.
ability_3_desc: Stump Warriors adjacent to an Evergreen or Jungle piece are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Spider-Man Miles Morales
ability_1_desc: If Spider-Man is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, he takes no damage and may immediately move using Swing Line.
ability_2_desc: Adjacent figures attacked by Spider-Man roll 2 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Spider-Man may Swing Line with a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Spider-Man may swing over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. Spider-Man may swing up to 40 levels up or down in a single swing. If he is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Spectre
ability_1_desc: Once per round, when a Unique Hero you control in clear sight of Spectre is destroyed by an opponent's attack, you may move any unrevealed Order Markers from the destroyed figure's Army Card to this card. For the rest of the round, add X dice to Spectre's normal attack, where X equals the Life number of that destroyed figure, up to a maximum of +5.
ability_2_desc: If Spectre is attacked by an opponent's adjacent figure that does not have the Fearless personality and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, Spectre takes no damage, the opponent's turn immediately ends, and you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from the attacking figure's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Spectre can move through all figures and obstacles such as ruins, and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Spectre cannot be targeted by opponents' non-adjacent figures for any attacks or for any opponents' special powers that require clear sight.

name: Stalwart
ability_1_desc: Stalwart does not start the game on the battlefield. He must be placed by Stalwart the Forge's Eject Pilot ability. When taking a turn with Stalwart, if he has not yet been placed on the battlefield and Stalwart the Forge is in your army, you may instead take a turn with Stalwart the Forge.
ability_2_desc: When a non-adjacent friendly Athlete within 3 clear sight spaces of Stalwart receives one or more wounds, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, you may place that figure on an empty space adjacent to Stalwart to ignore all wounds. Stalwart's Pull to Safety cannot be used on Stalwart.

name: St. Pádraig
ability_1_desc: If there is a Dragon or Lizardfolk figure adjacent to St. Pádraig, when any player takes a turn with that figure's unit, that figure must disengage from St. Pádraig if possible and end its move un-engaged to St. Pádraig. The figure will take any leaving engagement attacks. Add 1 to St. Pádraig's Attack when he is targeting a Dragon or Lizardfolk figure.
ability_2_desc: If Mika Connour, James Murphy, or Johnny "Shotgun" Sullivan are adjacent to St. Pádraig, add 1 to their Attack & Defense values.
ability_3_desc: Add 2 to St. Pádraig's Defense when he is on a grass hex.

name: Storm Shadow
ability_1_desc: Storm Shadow does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher you may place Storm Shadow on any empty space adjacent to a tree, ruin or wall. You cannot place Storm Shadow adjacent to other figures or on glyphs.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4.
ability_3_desc: When Storm Shadow rolls for defense, one shield will block all damage.

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: If Spider-Man is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11-20, Spider-Man takes no damage and may immediately move using Swing Line.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Spider-Man may use Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Spider-Man may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. He may not swing more than 40 levels up or down in a single swing. If he is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Spider-Man may attack with Web Special Attack. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Web Special Attack.

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: If Spider-Man is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11-20, Spider-Man takes no damage and may immediately move using his Swing Line 4 Special Power.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Spider-Man may use his Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Spider-Man may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Spider-Man may not Swing Line more than 40 levels up or down in a single Swing Line. If Spider-Man is engaged when he starts to Swing Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Spider-Man's Web Special Attack.

name: Sterling Archer
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Archer may attack with his Enrampagement Special Attack four times. Archer may choose different figures to attack each time. If he chooses the same figure, roll 1 fewer attack die each time he chooses the same figure.
ability_2_desc: When Archer or a friendly figure adjacent to Archer rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with any figure, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or less, inflict 1 wound to any figure you control and Archer ends his turn.

name: Spymaster
ability_1_desc: Agent figures you control are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: When Spymaster attacks an adjacent figure, that figure rolls one less defense die.
ability_3_desc: If Spymaster is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to vanish. If you roll 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 13 or higher, Spymaster takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Spymaster can vanish only if he ends his vanishing move not adjacent to any opponent's figures.

name: Sundol
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking normally with Sundol, you may use Blaze of Glory. All figures within X spaces of Sundol are affected by Blaze of Glory, where X equals the number of wounds on this Army Card. Roll the 20-sided die once for each affected figure. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by Blaze of Glory. After using Blaze of Glory, destroy Sundol.
ability_2_desc: Sundol never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Steel
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 1 + Special. Choose a figure to attack. Add 1 to Steel's attack dice for each space between Steel and the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: If Steel is within 4 clear sight spaces of your Superman or any figure you control with the valiant personality, add 1 to Steel's attack and defense.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Steel's movement, ignore elevations. Steel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Steel starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Svipul
ability_1_desc: When a figure is placed on this Army Card for a Warrior Spirit power, those affects may be shared with friendly Unique figures adjacent to Svipul.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move Svipul again.

name: Sung Jin-Woo
ability_1_desc: Whenever Sung Jin-Woo destroys an enemy figure, roll a d20. On a roll of 15 or higher bring that character back to life as a shadow soldier. Shadow soldiers have the same stats, as their living counter part, with 1 life. Take turns with each clone before taking a turn with Sung Jin-Woo. (Roll 3 times to "arise" defeated enemy)
ability_2_desc: Once per round, instead of moving, Sung Jin-Woo can swap places with one of his shadow clones.
ability_3_desc: Sung Jin-Woo may pass by and leave engaged enemies without taking engagement swipes.

name: Storm
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Storm attacks with her Tempest Special Attack, she may attack 2 additional times. While engaged, Storm may target and attack non-adjacent figures with Tempest Special Attack. She may not attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves within 2 clear sight spaces of Storm, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Defensive Winds.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Storm's movement, ignore elevations. Storm may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Storm is engaged when she starts to fly, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: SYVARRIS
ability_1_desc: When a Syvarris attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When a Syvarris rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Spectre of Laur
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's figure that is not Undead moves adjacent to the Spectre of Laur, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure must continue its move to the nearest space where it can end its normal move and not be adjacent to the Spectre of Laur. It then ends its move and may not attack. If it cannot move to such a space, after its normal move it takes 1 wound and may not attack. Figures are only affected by Horror as they move into engagement with the Spectre of Laur. The Spectre of Laur rolls one additional die against a figure leaving an engagement with it when moving with Horror.
ability_2_desc: The Spectre of Laur rolls 3 additional defense dice when defending against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: The Spectre of Laur may move through all figures and obstacles, and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. It may not be moved by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.

name: KROOT WARRIORS
ability_1_desc: This unit is never attacked when leaving an engagement

name: KROOT SHAPER
ability_1_desc: Kroot Warriors & Kroot Hounds within LOS of the Shaper recieve +1 Defense dice

name: Soul Infinity Gem
ability_1_desc:
When this figure destroys a non-Undead enemy figure, place it on this card. That figure cannot be returned to the game except by this card.

If this figure has the Infinity Gauntlet, place this glyph on the Infinity Gauntlet's card and before attacking with this figure, place an enemy figure from this card onto that figure's card to add one skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If this figure has the Infinity Gauntlet, place this glyph on the Infinity Gauntlet's card and before attacking with this figure, place an enemy figure from this card onto that figure's card to add one skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Talon Archers
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if one or more of the Talon Archers are within 6 spaces of an opponent's figure, and have a clear line of sight on that figure's hit zone, then any or all of the Talon Archers that are within range may attack that figure.
ability_2_desc: When a Talon Archer is attacking with a height advantage, he rolls an additional attack die.

name: Shas' Ui Fire Warrior
ability_1_desc: If this unit has not moved or used another special ability this turn, it may attack twice.

name: Sylvan Animae
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Soulborg figure, Sylan Animae receive one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Sylavn Animae's movement, ignore elevations. A Sylvan Animae may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Sylvan Animae starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Superman
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Superman, for the rest of this round all other figures you control move one additional space and roll one additional defense die.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. After attacking normally, Superman may attack with Heat Vision Special Attack. When attacking with Heat Vision Special Attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Superman's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Superman is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: FIRE WARRIORS
ability_1_desc: If this unit has not moved or used another special ability this turn, it may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Fire Warriors you may first take a turn with a Shas'ui.

name: Talos
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to Talos. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, it is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: Talos's body automatically negates one point of damage any time it is attacked.
ability_3_desc: Ignores water terrain effects and gas effects.

name: Sylvania
ability_1_desc: After making a normal attack on an opponent's figure that is adjacent to a tree, bush, or a friendly figure who follows Ullar, Sylvania may attack that figure one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If Sylvania is adjacent to a tree or bush, she has no visible hit zones. Sylvania may move through all trees and bushes.
ability_3_desc: If Sylvania ends the round on a water, swamp water, swamp, or grass space, you may remove 1 wound marker from this card.

name: Suten Anu
ability_1_desc: When an adjacent figure targets Suten Anu for a normal attack, you may immediately roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 2 if the attacking figure is Tricky. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure may not attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's adjacent figure to Suten Anu attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack a figure with the Combat Challenge special power.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Suten Anu's movement, ignore elevations. Suten Anu may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Suten Anu starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: GUN DRONE
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for movement, ignore elevations. Unit may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the unit starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: This unit may attack twice.

name: Gollum, Lord of the Rings
ability_1_desc: Gollum cannot be destroyed as a result of taking wounds. At the end of any turn where Gollum received one or more wounds, the player who inflicted those wounds may move Gollum a number of spaces equal to the number of wounds inflicted. He will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Falling damage will apply.

name: The Sword of Reckoning
ability_1_desc: Ancient Artifact

name: Tank
ability_1_desc: Before moving Tank, choose an unengaged small or medium figure adjacent to Tank. After you move Tank, place the chosen figure adjacent to Tank.
ability_2_desc: Whenever an Order Marker is revealed, you may immediately move Tank up to one space. When counting spaces for Tank's movement, elevation changes up to 4 levels count as one space. Tank may activate his other powers when moving due to Slow But Steady.
ability_3_desc: Tank never takes falling damage and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Tezig
ability_1_desc: If Tezig has a height advantage on an opponent's figure, he may add 2 to his range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If Tezig attacks a figure adjacent to a friendly figure who follows Aquilla, roll one extra attack die.

name: Lockjaw (Sylux)
ability_1_desc: At any point during your move, you may choose to place a trip wire marker on a space occupied by Lockjaw. If there is already a trip wire marker on the board that you control, the new one must be placed so that it is within 3 spaces of the old one in a straight line. If an enemy figure moves through a space anywhere along that line, you may immediately roll two attack die against that figure. That figure rolls defense die normally.
ability_2_desc: At the end of your turn, you may revert to Sylux's normal form. Flip over this army card and replace the Lockjaw figure with the corresponding Sylux figure. All wounds on this card are transferred to Sylux.

name: THANOS
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Thanos has been destroyed, roll the d20. If you roll 19 or higher, place Thanos adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Wound Markers from this card.

name: Sveela
ability_1_desc: When defending against a special attack, Sveela adds 1 shield to whatever is rolled. When making a normal attack on a Wizard or Sorcerer, Sveela rolls an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, if a figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Sveela would take any wounds from an attack, you may choose another figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Sveela and ignore one of those wounds. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-9, Sveela receives that wound instead. If you roll a 10 or higher, the chosen figure receives the wound. Destructible objects are not affected by Arcane Exchange.
ability_3_desc: At the end of each round, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may remove up to two wound markers from this card, or from the Army Card of an adjacent figure.

name: Terandark
ability_1_desc: If Terandark's normal attack inflicts a wound, roll 3 attack dice, all skulls rolled count as unblockable hits on the wounded figure.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose an adjacent squad figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Terandark this turn.

name: Tar Elemental
ability_1_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to this Tar Elemental cannot move, and roll 1 fewer defense die. Figures affected by Sticky Tar cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3+Special. If this Tar Elemental is on a molten lava or lava field space, roll 1 additional attack die for Blazing Pitch Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: A Tar Elemental never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Tetraites
