ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an opponent's small or medium Squad figure adjacent to Tetraites and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: After Tetraites inflicts one or more wounds on a small or medium Unique Hero with his normal attack, if that figure has only 1 Life remaining, you may destroy that Hero.

name: Targon the Mountain King
ability_1_desc: When attacking a dragon Targon may add 2 dice to his attack.
ability_2_desc: When defending with Targon, add 1 shield to your roll.
ability_3_desc: If Targon is attacking a figure that is allied with General Utgar, you may subtract 1 shield from the affected figure's defense roll.

name: The Black Hand of Kyogi
ability_1_desc: When being attacked by the Black Hand of Kyogi, the defending figure rolls no defense dice against the attack.
ability_2_desc: When the Black Hand of Kyogi roll for defense, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: The Black Hand of Kyogi always roll one die for attack and defense. This roll is never modified in any way.

name: Templar Infantry
ability_1_desc: When a Templar Cavalry Knight is targeted with a normal or special attack and receives 1 or more wounds, you may destroy a Templar Infantry you control that is adjacent to that figure to ignore any wounds that Templar Cavalry Knight just received.
ability_2_desc: When a Templar Cavalry Knight you control receives a wound and is destroyed, you may place a previously destroyed Templar Infantry on either space that Templar Cavalry occupied, if possible.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Templar Infantry, you may move 3 unengaged Large Knights you control up to 6 spaces each.

name: Telpac the Devourer
ability_1_desc: You may first take a turn with Anubian Wolves before taking a turn with Telpac the Devourer.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack 2 or 3. When Telpac the Devourer attacks with his Shockwave Special Attack, all figures that are within 2 spaces are affected, disregarding line of sight. Roll 3 Attack dice once against all figures that are adjacent to Telpac The Devourer, with defending figures defending normally. Roll 2 attack dice once against all figures 2 spaces away, with each of the the defending figures defending 1 less defense die than normal.

name: The Jersey Devil
ability_1_desc: When the Jersey Devil rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjecent one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: The Jersey Devil can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: TALRUTH
ability_1_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figures within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Electric Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Electric Breath Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Talruth's movement, ignore elevations. Talruth may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Talruth starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Reanimated Terracotta Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before moving Terracotta Warriors, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, you may move up to 2 Terracotta Warriors you control. If you roll 13-16, you may move up to 4 Terracotta Warriors you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 7. If at least 3 Terracotta Warriors you control are adjacent to the same enemy figure they may roll their attacks as one combined attack.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. Samurai are not affected by Counterstrike.

name: THAMUZ
ability_1_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for a power on an Undead Army Card, if you roll 1-9, you may add 2 to your die roll. If you roll 10 or higher, you may add 1 to your die roll. Chill of the Grave does not affect Thamuz.
ability_2_desc: When Thamuz inflicts at least 1 wound on a figure with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the defending figure.

name: The Gatekeepers
ability_1_desc: Figures occupying the same space as one Gatekeeper may move onto any empty space adjacent to the other Gatekeeper.
ability_2_desc: When a Gatekeeper receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you may destroy one friendly figure adjacent to the other Gatekeeper to ignore all wounds inflicted to that Gatekeeper from that attack.

name: Tanuki Nomad
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each round, after placing Order Markers, you may choose an opposing character within 5 clear sight spaces of Tanuki Nomad that has an unrevealed Order Marker assigned to it's Character Card. Switch the chosen Character's Order Marker with one other unrevealed Order Marker on another Character's Card that the owner of that Character controls.
ability_2_desc: If Tanuki Nomad is attacked by an adjacent attacker and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to Stumble. If you roll a 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll 13-20, Tanuki Nomad takes no damage and is placed in an empty adjacent space. If a 20 is rolled, the attacker also receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: Tanuki Nomad is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Tehanu Stormscale
ability_1_desc: Range 2+Special. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to the target are also affected by Poison Breath Special Attack. Roll once for this attack. All affected figures roll defense separately. If this special attack causes any wounds on a hero, roll one unblockable attack die against that hero. Tehanu Stormscale, and destructible objects, are not affected by this special attack.
ability_2_desc: If Tehanu Stormscale would be destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, do not destroy her. Remove all wound markers from this card, then place 3 wound markers on this card. Until the next Order Marker is revealed, Tehanu Stormscale may not receive any additional wounds or be destroyed.

name: The Nine
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by one of The Nine subtract 2 from their defense dice. Destructible objects are not affected by Morgul Blades.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with The Nine, you may first take a turn with any small, medium, or large relentless Hero you control.

name: Thanos
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Thanos has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, immediately place Thanos on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Wound Markers on Thanos' card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Thanos' movement, ignore elevations. Thanos may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Thanos starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Thaelenk Snow Wyrm
ability_1_desc: Each time Thaelenk Snow Wyrm attacks a hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: If Thaelenk Snow Wyrm is on a snow tile and is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to Snow Burrow. If you roll 1-13 roll defense dice normally. If you roll 13 or higher, Thaelenk Snow Wyrm takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Thaelenk Snow Wyrm can only Snow Burrow if he ends his Snow Burrowing move on a snow tile, not adjacent to any enemy figures.

name: The Comedian
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose 3 spaces in a straight line from The Comedian. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by The Comedian's Flamethrower Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figure. Figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Shotgun Blast Special Attack. the Comedian only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. the Comedian cannot be affected by his own Shotgun Blast Special Attack.

name: STEP OF STARLIGHT
ability_1_desc: This figure may activate this glyph before rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, nothing happens, and roll defense normally. If you roll a 6 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by that attack and immediately place this figure onto an empty same-level space within 4 spaces of its current location.

name: The Kirin
ability_1_desc: If there is at least one revealed Order Marker on this Army Card, then all figures with no revealed Order Markers on their card within 6 clear sight spaces of the Kirin add 1 to their defense.
ability_2_desc: Range 2. Attack 4. Kirin's Judgment Special Attack affects all enemy figures within 2 clear sight spaces that have at least one revealed Order Marker on their card. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: The Kirin does not take falling damage and may ignore all effects of terrain tiles it moves onto or occupies.

name: The Prisoner
ability_1_desc: You may not include The Prisoner in your army if it contains any other figures with a negative point cost. You may not place any order markers on this card. Figures you control may not attack The Prisoner. The Prisoner is not affected by any special powers on any other army cards that you control.
ability_2_desc: At the end of any turn, if there are no figures you control adjacent to The Prisoner, choose an opponent. That opponent immediately gains control of The Prisoner. Place a brown negation marker on this card. For the rest of the game, all of The Prisoner's powers are negated.

name: Charlie Delta
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first take a turn with one Specialist Hero you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Charlie Delta.
ability_2_desc: When Charlie Delta makes a normal attack, he rolls 1 additional attack die if the target is engaged with a Specialist other than Charlie Delta.
ability_3_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure, if Charlie Delta inflicts one or more wounds, you may move one other Specialist figure you control who is within 6 clear sight spaces of Charlie Delta up to 4 spaces.

name: The Pumpkin King
ability_1_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for a Lycanthrope, Undead, or Horror Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an attack from an adjacent figure, all Common figures within 3 clear sight spaces of the Pumpkin King subtract 1 from their defense dice for every revealed or unrevealed Order Marker on this Army Card. Terrifying Presence does not affect Undead, Horrors, Constructs, or destructible objects.

name: The Night Stalker
ability_1_desc: After targeting an engaged figure that is not Mindless or Devout, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, you may not attack. If you roll 2-4, nothing happens. If you roll 5-10, the target rolls 1 fewer defense die. If you roll 11-16, the target rolls 2 fewer defense dice. If you roll 17-19, the target rolls 3 fewer defense dice. If you roll a 20, the target may not roll any defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After moving, if The Night Stalker can target a Unique figure, it may not target a Common figure.
ability_3_desc: The Night Stalker may move through all Common figures and never takes leaving engagement attacks from them. The Night Stalker rolls an additional defense die against any attack from a Common figure.

name: The Piper
ability_1_desc: Every friendly figure within 6 of this figure may move 1 additional hex. Line of sight is not required for this ability.
ability_2_desc: When an enemy figure becomes engaged with this figure or any friendly figure within 6 hexes, roll a d20. On a roll of 8 or higher for squads or 15 or higher for heroes, the enemy figure must move back one hex and suffer a disengagement attack regardless of special ability. Line of sight is not required for this ability.
ability_3_desc: When the piper dies, a squad member who is adjacent to him may become the new piper with all of his abilities and stats. Remove that squad member and place the piper where he was.

name: Thanos
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Thanos has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, immediately place Thanos on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all Wound Markers on Thanos' card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Thanos' movement, ignore elevations. Thanos may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Thanos starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Doctor
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 1. Defending figures may not use any special powers or roll defense dice against this special attack.
ability_2_desc: All opponent's Soulborg, Cyborg and Robot figures within 3 clear sight spaces of The Doctor roll 2 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: After attacking an opponent's figure, The Doctor, and any figures you control engaged with that figure, may immediately move up to 3 spaces. Figures moved by Run! never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_4_desc: After rolling for initiative, if The Doctor has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, immediately place The Doctor on a space adjacent to a figure you control and remove all Wound Markers from this card.

name: Paula Quelle
ability_1_desc: Paula Quelle does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before placing Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may place Paula Quelle in an opponent's start zone before taking a turn with Paula Quelle that round.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Unique Hero, Paula Quelle may add 1 to her attack for each Order Marker on the target's Army Card. While engaged, Paula Quelle may attack a non-adjacent Hero, unless she is engaged with a Hero.

name: Waltson Gang
ability_1_desc: The Waltson Gang is never attacked by Lawmen or figures that follow Jandar unless there is a gold Bounty Marker on this card. If any member of the Waltson Gang attacks, put a gold Bounty Marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: When a member of the Waltson Gang is attacked by a normal attack from a nonadjacent figure, roll the 20-sided die. If the attacking figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 7 or higher, destroy that figure. If the attacking figure is a Hero and you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound marker.

name: Echo Foxtrot
ability_1_desc: Echo Foxtrot, and all Team Leaders, Agents, and Specialists you control adjacent to her, add 1 automatic shield when defending against a special attack.
ability_2_desc: Echo Foxtrot is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose an opponent's figure that Echo Foxtrot was adjacent to at any point during her move, and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may move an unrevealed Order Marker from that figure's Army Card to the Army Card of another figure on the battlefield that opponent controls.

name: The Phantasm
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose one opponent's Unique Hero to be the Phantasm's Target. Before the Phantasm's Target takes a turn, you may immediately move the Phantasm up to 2 spaces. When the Phantasm attacks her Target, she rolls one additional attack die, plus another additional attack die if her Target is a Criminal or Crime Lord.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, you may place a Phantasm Marker on this Army Card. When you take a turn with the Phantasm, you must remove a Phantasm Marker from this Army Card if possible. If at least one Phantasm Marker is on this Army Card, the Phantasm has no visible Hit Zone. A maximum of 1 Phantasm Marker can be placed on this card.
ability_3_desc: The Phantasm can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Thesk Scout
ability_1_desc: A Thesk Scout rolls one additional die when attacking a figure with no Order Markers on its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If no Thesk Scouts moved this turn, then you may attack with up to 2 Thesk Scouts you control.
ability_3_desc: At the start of every round, after all Order Markers have been placed, you may move all Thesk Scouts you control up to 3 spaces each. They must end their Orc Battle Maneuver on an empty space. Figures moved by Orc Battle Maneuver will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Thesk Orc Archers
ability_1_desc: Thesk Orc Archers receive an additional attack die when attacking a figure with no Order Markers on its card.
ability_2_desc: At the start of every round, after all Order Markers have been placed, you may move all Thesk Orc Archers you control up to 3 spaces each. They must end their Orc Battle Maneuver on an empty space. Any Thesk Orc Archers that were engaged when they moved with Orc Battle Maneuver will receive leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Riddler
ability_1_desc: If you win initiative with at least one Order Marker on this card, and Riddler is not the only figure in your army, he cannot be attacked and he will not take any leaving engagement attacks for the rest of the round.
ability_2_desc: Immediately after revealing an Order Marker on this card, if you have an unrevealed "X" Order Marker on any Army Card you control, you may choose one opponent. The chosen opponent must choose one unrevealed Order Marker on any Army Card you control. Immediately reveal and remove your "X" Order Marker. If the opponent chose the "X" Order Marker, your turn immediately ends. If the opponent did not choose the "X" Order Marker, remove all Order Markers from one Army Card the chosen opponent controls.
ability_3_desc: Riddler, and all Criminals you control that are adjacent to Riddler, add 1 to their normal attack when attacking an adjacent figure that does not have any Order Markers on its Army Card.

name: Thing Tut
ability_1_desc: Range: 1 Attack: 4. If Thung Tut's Pharoah Ram Special Attack destroys a figure or destructible object, he may move up to 3 spaces and attack again with his Pharoah Ram Special Attack (provided he ends his movement adjacent to a legal target). Thing Tut may continue to move and attack in this manner until he fails to destroy a figure or object.
ability_2_desc: Thing Tut adds 2 to his attack when attacking destructible objects and ignores any automatic shields.

name: THORNBACK
ability_1_desc: Range 2. Attack 3. All figures within two clear sight spaces of Thornback are affected by the Tailwhip Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against any attack, Thornback always adds two automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Whiskey X-Ray
ability_1_desc: If this unit makes a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure that is on a shadow space or adjacent to a Jungle Piece, that figure does not receive the normal defense bonus.
ability_2_desc: If a Specialist Hero you control is adjacent to Whiskey X-Ray when it makes a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure, it has the special ability Infrared Goggles, and may either roll 1 additional attack die or add 1 to its range. Whiskey X-Ray must also have line of sight on the target.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. Before attacking with Automatic Weapon Special Attack, choose a figure within range that is adjacent to the target. If at least one skull is rolled, you may attack again with Automatic Weapon Special Attack, against either the same target or the chosen figure. You may attack up to 4 times with Automatic Weapon Special Attack.

name: Thorik the Barbarian
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Thorik, all figures you control within 2 spaces of Thorik gain 1 attack die and all figures you don't control within 2 spaces of Thorik lose 1 defense die until the start of your opponent's next turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 6. To pounce, choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of the Thorik. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place Thorik on the space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, place Thorik adjacent to the chosen figure and he receives one wound.

name: The Question
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of a round, after order markers have been placed but before rolling initiative, The Question can attempt Deductive Reasoning. Choose an opponent and then attempt to guess the placement of all of their order markers. Afterwards, if The Question correctly guesses any order marker placement your opponent must show you those order marker(s), incorrect guesses remain hidden. For each correct guess The Question adds one to both his Attack and his Defense for the duration of that round.
ability_2_desc: The Question can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When defending with The Question, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_4_desc: The Question receives 1 automatic skull when he attacks an adjacent figure with his normal attack.

name: Timmo Shadestep
ability_1_desc: If Timmo Shadestep starts his turn unengaged and on a shadow space, add 3 dice to his attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: When Timmo Shadestep rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: THING
ability_1_desc: If there are 5 or more wound markers on this card, when Thing attacks with a normal attack, use the white combat dice. Any result that is not a shield counts as a skull.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Thing and the chosen figure are also affected by Sunday Punch Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice for Thing, use the white combat dice. Any result that is not a skull counts as a shield.

name: Sierra Tango
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Instead of attacking normally, you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card and use Semtex Special Attack. Choose a target that Sierra Tango was adjacent to at any point during her move. All figures adjacent to the target are also affected by Semtex Special Attack, and roll defense separately. Destructible objects roll 3 fewer defense dice against Semtex Special Attack, and may not use any special powers that grant automatic shields. Sierra Tango may be affected by Semtex Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Sierra Tango adds 1 to her defense against a non-adjacent attack, if line of sight on any part of her hit zone is obstructed by a figure, object, or terrain adjacent to Sierra Tango.
ability_3_desc: Sierra Tango is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Ticalla Monkey Swarm
ability_1_desc: When this Ticalla Monkey Swarm attacks, it may attack up to 6 times. Reduce the number of times this Ticalla Monkey Swarm can attack by 1 for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If this Ticalla Monkey Swarm is adjacent to a tree or bush, add one to its Attack and Defense numbers.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this Ticalla Monkey Swarm may double its height.

name: Thurbard
ability_1_desc: All templars you control move one additional Space.
ability_2_desc: Thurbard begin the game mounted on his steed. While Thurbard is mounted on his steed add 3 to his Move and any other large templar within 6 clear sight spaces may roll additional attack and defense die.
ability_3_desc: After rolling defense dice, you may choose to dismount Thurbard from his steed to ignore any wounds inflicted by an attack. When Thurbard dismounts exchange his mounted figure from his foot figure. While on foot Thurbard may roll one additional attack and defense die.

name: Casey Jones
ability_1_desc: When the defending figure rolls no shields, Casey Jones may attack an additional time.

name: Thomas Hunter
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 5 different Ability Glyphs next to this card. Whenever Thomas Hunter successfully uses his Time Out Special Power, choose an Ability Glyph and place it on this Army Card, up to a maximum of 3 Ability Glyphs. Add 1 die to Thomas' attack and defense for each Ability Glyph on this card.
ability_2_desc: If there is at least one Treasure Glyph or Ability Glyph on this card, opponents' figures roll 1 fewer attack die when attacking Thomas with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: If Thomas receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you may remove an unrevealed Order marker from this card and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, ignore any wounds just received.

name: Tincan Kilroys
ability_1_desc: Start the game with the Infiltration Marker on this card. As long as the Infiltration Marker is on this card, the Tincan Kilroys do not have any visible hit zones. Remove the Infiltration Marker from this card if one of the Kilroys attacks or becomes engaged.
ability_2_desc: If the Infiltration Marker was on this card at the start of this turn, figures roll 2 less defense dice when defending against a Tincan Kilroy's attack this turn.

name: Ticalla Serpents
ability_1_desc: A Ticalla Serpent never stops when entering a water space.
ability_2_desc: If a Ticalla Serpent inflicts at least 1 wound on an opponent's figure with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die for Venom Damage. If you roll a 1-14, the defending figure receives no additional wounds for Venom Damage. If you roll a 15 or higher, add 1 additional wound marker to the defending figure's Army Card, and roll again for Venom Damage. Venom Strike does not affect Soulborgs or Constructs.

name: The Walker In The Woods
ability_1_desc: Range 6, Attack Special. For each tree or bush adjacent to the target, roll 3 attack dice. The defending figure gets no defense bonus for being adjacent to a Jungle Piece.
ability_2_desc: If The Walker In The Wood is adjacent to a tree or bush, it has no visible hit zones. It may move through all trees and bushes.
ability_3_desc: After rollling for initiative, if you did not roll the highest result, you may immediately move The Walker In The Wood up to 5 spaces, or you may move up to 3 Common Plant figures you control up to 3 spaces each.

name: Tirrus
ability_1_desc: After attacking normally with Tirrus, place a wound marker on her Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Tirrus destroys a Common figure with her normal attack, she may attack again.

name: Thorn Wolfbite
ability_1_desc: If there was a revealed numbered Order Marker on this card before the beginning of this turn, Thorn Wolfbite has the Species of Hybrid, and adds one skull to whatever is rolled when making a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Thorn Wolfbite you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Thorn Wolfbite, or with any Hybrid Hero you control within 4 clear sight spaces of him.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, if Thorn Wolfbite is a Hybrid and rolls at least one shield, the most wounds he may take for this attack is one.

name: Karai
ability_1_desc: Master Splinter can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: If Karai does not move, add 3 to his range and 1 automatic skull to her normal attack this turn.

name: Tillie Unathi
ability_1_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to Tillie Unathi to attack her with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Select 2 adjacent figures to attack. If you don't inflict a wound in your first attack, then add one more attack dice to your second attack. You must attack two different figures to use this special attack.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Tillie Unathi with a range of 1 add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: Mike November
ability_1_desc: Mike November rolls 2 additional attack dice when making a normal attack on an adjacent figure. When defending against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, he adds 1 to his defense.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Mike November attacks with a normal or special attack, it must a figure with the Combat Challenge special power.
ability_3_desc: When Mike November is targeted by a normal attack from an adjacent figure, before any dice are rolled, you may move Mike November up to 3 spaces. When using Defensive Maneuvering, Mike November must remain engaged with the attacking figure throughout his move.

name: Raphael
ability_1_desc: When Raphael attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn Raphael, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with Raphael.

name: April O'Neil
ability_1_desc: After you move a Mutant you control, you may move April O'Neil up to 2 spaces. The figure must be within 8 clear sight spaces of April O'Neil prior to her movement.
ability_2_desc: Add 6 to your initiative rolls if an opponent's figure is within 4 clear sight spaces of April.

name: THE THUNDER
ability_1_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 3. The first target of Thunderstrike Special Attack must be within a Range of 5. After attacking with Thunderstrike Special Attack, if the defending figure receives at least 1 wound, you may choose a figure that was adjacent to the defending figure and attack that chosen figure with Thunderstrike. You may continue attacking with Thunderstrike in this manner until you fail to inflict a wound.
ability_2_desc: You may remove one wound marker or one status marker from the Thunder at the end of each round.
ability_3_desc: If only one Thunder moves and attacks this turn, he may add 6 to his Move and Range.

name: Titan
ability_1_desc: Before moving, Titan may reduce his movement by 4 and add 2 to his attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: Titan can continue to move and attack for the remainder of the round in which his life-total is reduced to 0. If the game ends before the end of the round, Titan is not counted as a casualty. Titan cannot use any special powers during the remainder of the round. You may immediately remove one unused order marker from any of your army cards and place it on Titan.

name: Glyph of Iron
ability_1_desc: When a Miner is on the Glyph of Iron, anytime you roll defence dice, you may roll Steel Dice. Whenever a Steel Symbols count as Shields. Miners on this glyph may not attack, use special powers, cannot be attacked, and aren't affected by special powers.

name: TOY SOLDIER
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with a Toy Soldier, you may move one other Toy Soldier you control up to 4 spaces. A Toy Soldier rolls one additional attack and defense die for each friendly Toy Soldier adjacent to it, up to a maximum of 2 additional dice for this power.

name: Rocksteady
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2, or 3. Rocksteady starts each turn with 9 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2, or 3 attack dice. Rocksteady may keep making special attacks with 1, 2, or 3 attack dice until he has rolled all 9 attack dice. Rocksteady may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: If Bebop is within 5 clear sight spaces of Rocksteady, Rocksteady may roll one additional dice for normal attacks and defense.

name: Troglodyte Grunt
ability_1_desc: Small and medium figures subtract 1 from their defense dice for each Troglodyte Grunt adjacent to it. Troglodytes and Soulborgs are not affected by Horrid Stench.

name: TICALLA FLEA
ability_1_desc: Before moving a huge figure you control, you may choose an unengaged Ticalla Flea you control adjacent to that figure. After you move the chosen figure, place that Ticalla Flea adjacent to that figure.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with a Ticalla Flea, you may choose a huge Unique Hero figure adjacent to that Ticalla Flea. Place that Ticalla Flea on the chosen figure's army card. At the end of each round, for each Ticalla Flea you control on a Unique Hero's Army Card, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, that Unique Hero receives one wound. A maximum of 3 Ticalla Fleas can be placed on any Hero's card. A Ticalla Flea will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Infestation.
ability_3_desc: Instead of its normal move, a Ticalla Flea may use Jump 13. Jump 13 has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Jump 13, ignore elevations. A Ticalla Flea may jump over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and jump over obstacles such as ruins. A Ticalla Flea may not jump more than 13 levels up or down in a single jump. If a Ticalla Flea is engaged when it starts it's Jump 13, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Tommy the Bald
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Tommy the Bald, instead of moving and attacking with Tommy the Bald you may place one brown Stuffing Marker on this Army Card. When attacking and defending with Tommy the Bald, roll an additional die for each Stuffing Marker on this Army Card. A maximum of 3 Stuffing Markers can be placed on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Tommy the Bald's movement, ignore elevations. Tommy the Bald may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Tommy the Bald starts to fly, subtract 1 from the move number on this card for each Stuffing Marker on this Army Card, and if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Toraideshu
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Toraideshu attacks with Trident Fire Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: When a small figure adjacent to Toraideshu is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 11 or higher, you may remove a wound marker from this card.

name: Tormuddle
ability_1_desc: Select a hero. Tormuddle will follow that hero blindly for the entire game. When the hero is engaged, Tormuddle receives an extra turn to assist. If the hero falls, Tormuddle stays on the spot and mourns for three turns before rejoining the game and selecting another hero.
ability_2_desc: Tormuddle may bash any figure size 5+ in the knees with his shield. The chosen figure may not move the next turn and Tormuddle will not take a Leaving Engagement Attack from that figure.
ability_3_desc: Tormuddle was abandoned as a babe and raised by humans. He has issues with his probable Orc/Ogre parentage and suffers -1 A and D against them.

name: The Trumpeter of The Vale
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with The Trumpeter of The Vale, roll 12 Einar Valkyrie dice. You may move up to 4 squad figures you control who follow Einar up to X spaces. X equals the number of Einar symbols rolled. Any squad figures moved with Einar's Dispatch must be within 8 clear sight spaces of The Trumpeter of The Vale prior to moving.

name: Toyman
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Toyman, before taking Toyman's turn you may take a turn with a Robot Hero or Squad you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Robot Hero you control is attacked with a normal attack and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, before removing the destroyed Robot Hero from the battlefield you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, choose a figure adjacent to that Robot Hero and inflict one wound on the chosen figure.

name: Troglodyte Brutes
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Troglodyte Brutes, before taking a turn with the Troglodyte Brutes, you may take a turn with any small, medium, or large ferocious Hero you control that follows Utgar or Aquilla.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack with a Troglodyte Brute, add 1 attack die for each adjacent ferocious figure, up to a maximum of +3 dice for the Ferocious Attack power.

name: Troll Hunter
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. Black Bow Special Attack may only target an opponent's figure engaged with a friendly Troll.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Troll Hunter's Army Card, before taking this Troll Hunter's turn, you may take a turn with one other Troll you control.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Troll Hunter, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Troll Hunter's Army Card.

name: Toad
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium non-adjacent figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Toad whose base is no more than 3 levels above Toad's height or 3 levels below Toad's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, place the chosen figure adjacent to Toad. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Tongue Lash 12, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Toad may use Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Toad's leaping movement, ignore elevations. Toad may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Toad may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Toad is engaged when he starts to leap, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Troll Skullcleaver
ability_1_desc: If this Troll Skullcleaver destroys an opponent's figure, he may move 2 spaces and attack again.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Troll Skullcleaver's Army Card, before taking this Troll Skullcleaver's turn, you may take a turn with one other Troll you control.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Troll Skullcleaver, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Troll Skullcleaver's Army Card.

name: Treasure Drake Volthrax
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to this Treasure Drake's Attack value for each Glyph and Treasure Glyph within 4 spaces of it, up to a maximum of +3 dice. A Treasure Drake can never pick up any Treasure Glyphs.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Treasure Drake's movement, ignore elevations. This Treasure Drake can fly over water without stopping, fly over figures without becoming engaged, and pass over obstacles such as ruins. When this Treasure Drake starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Trigukih
ability_1_desc: Range 1 +Special. Attack 5. While on a water space, select a figure to attack. All adjacent figures are also affected by this Kraken Tentacles Special Attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll dices separately.
ability_2_desc: Trigukih does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.
ability_3_desc: While Trigukih is on a water space, add 1 to its Attack and Defense.

name: Twilight Eye Cultist
ability_1_desc: You may add 1 to your initiative roll for each Twilight Eye Cultist you control.

name: Majikobe, Flood Mage
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3 + Special. Choose 4 spaces in a straight line from Majikobe. All non-Tortle figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Majikobe's Deadly Torrent Special Attack. Add 1 to Majikobe's attack dice for every Tortle figure you control on a targeted space that is within line of sight, up to a maximum of +2 dice. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. Until the next time you reveal an Order Marker, Stormshell Warriors you control may not use their Flood Launch Special Attack.

name: Tsuri Oni
ability_1_title: Can't See the Trees for the Forest
ability_1_desc: A Tsuri Oni may not be targeted for a non-adjacent attack within 4 spaces of an Evergreen Tree or within 4 spaces of another Tsuri Oni that is within 4 spaces of an Evergreen Tree.
ability_2_desc: After a Tsuri Oni is attacked by an adjacent figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the attacking figure receives a wound. If a Tsuri Oni attacks an adjacent figure and inflicts a wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, the defending figure receives an additional wound.

name: Tyrian the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When Tyrian attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Tyrian's movement, ignore elevations. Tyrian may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Tyrian starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ulfrid Hornwrangler
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. If Grim Determination Special Attack does not destroy a figure, Ulfrid Hornwrangler receives a wound and must attack that figure again with his Grim Determination Special Attack, if possible.
ability_2_desc: When defending with Ulfrid Hornwrangler, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.

name: Trickster
ability_1_desc: When taking a turn with Trickster, all figures that he left engagement with at the start of his movement, and are no longer adjacent to Trickster at the end of his movement, take a leaving engagement attack.
ability_2_desc:
Range 1. Attack 3
Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Trickster's Itching Powder Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Trickster's movement, ignore elevations. Trickster may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Trickster is engaged when he starts to fly, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ulethor the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: All figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Ulethor with a Range of 1 add 2 dice to their normal attack. Glory Aura 2 does not affect Ulethor.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Ulethor's movement, ignore elevations. Ulethor may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ulethor starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Transition Elemental
ability_1_desc: If a Transition Elemental is on a snow or ice space or has 4 or more wounds, it can not use any other power on this card. While in Ice Form, a Transition Elemental rolls an additional defense die for each wound marker on its army card.
ability_2_desc: If a Transition Elemental is attacked by an opponent's figure and receives at least 1 wound, if possible, you may move the Elemental on an empty space within 2 spaces of its current location. When moving with Evaporate the Elemental will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: While a Transition Elemental is on a water space, add 3 to its range and it does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Ulik
ability_1_desc: When Ulik attacks he receives one extra attack die for each Wound Marker he has, up to a maximum of 3 extra attack dice for Rage Smash.
ability_2_desc: Ulik may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately. Ulik rolls 3 fewer attack dice when using Thrashing Assault.

name: Twilight Sparkle
ability_1_desc: Range 1+ Special. Attack 2+ Special. Add 1 to the Attack and Range values of Twilight Sparkle's Friendship Is Magic Special Attack for every friendly Pony, Pegasus, or Unicorn Hero within 5 clear sight spaces of Twilight Sparkle, up to a maximum of +5.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, you may place Twilight Sparkle on any empty space within 5 spaces of her current location. If Twilight Sparkle is engaged when she starts to Teleport, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Twilight Sparkle, you may take a turn with up to 2 different Pony, Pegasus, or Unicorn Heroes you control within 5 clear sight spaces of Twilight Sparkle.

name: Tusken Raiders
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Tusken Raiders, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may place one of your previously destroyed Tusken Raider figures on any empty sand space. You must place this Tusken Raider adjacent to at least one opponent's figure. After placing this Tusken Raider, choose an adjacent opponent's figure and roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: Before moving the Tusken Raiders, you must roll the 20-sided die. • If you roll a 1-4, your turn immediately ends. • If you roll a 5-10, you may move and attack with up to 3 Tusken Raiders that you control. • If you roll an 11-16, you may move and attack with up to 6 Tusken Raiders that you control. • If you roll a 17-20, you may move and attack with up to 9 Tusken Raiders that you control.

name: Trihorn Behemoth
ability_1_desc: This Trihorn Behemoth may add 3 to his Move number and roll 2 additional attack dice as long as he is unengaged prior to moving and attacks any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from him at the start of his turn. This Trihorn Behemoth must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Trihorn Charge.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by a normal from this Trihorn Behemoth, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, you may Knockback the figure by placing it on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of this Trihorn Behemoth. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Knockback never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Knockback can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Ultimate Wolverine
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, blanks count as shields, and add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Wolverine, remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Before moving, if there are at least three Wound Markers on this card and Wolverine is engaged with at least one other figure, Wolverine may not move and must attack a figure he is engaged with.

name: Twigling
ability_1_desc: A Twigling does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, it is placed with the Dryad Splinter special power. After placing this Twigling with Dryad Splinter, you may immediately move it up to 4 spaces. This Twigling may only be placed once with Dryad Splinter.
ability_2_desc: A Twigling may move through all large and huge figures, and never takes leaving engagement attacks from them.
ability_3_desc: At the beginning of a round, before placing Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die once for each Twigling you control that is on a water space. If you roll an 18 or higher, you may destroy that Twigling and immediately replace it with a previously destroyed Dryad in your army. Remove all wound markers from that Dryad's Army Card.

name: TY LEE
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 2 Chi Block Markers on this card. When Ty Lee inflicts a wound on a small or medium figure, place a Chi Block Marker on that card. Figures other than Ty Lee with a Chi Block Marker on their card may not move, attack, or use any special powers on any Army Card or Glyph. At the end of the round, return all Chi Block Markers to Ty Lee's card.
ability_2_desc: Ty Lee is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When Ty Lee rolls defense dice against an opponent's attack, one shield will block all damage. For each shield rolled you may immediately move Ty Lee one space up to 6 levels up or down. When Ty Lee moves using Acrobatic Manuever, she will not take any falling damage or leaving engagement attacks.

name: Time Infinity Gem
ability_1_desc:
After revealing an Order Marker on a card you control, instead of taking a turn with that card, reveal your 'X' Order Marker on this figure's card to take a turn with this figure instead.

If this figure has the Infinity Gauntlet, place this glyph on the Infinity Gauntlet's card and once per game, after taking a turn with this figure, take one additional turn with this figure.

name: Uruk-hai Archers
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Uruk-hai Archers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Uruk-hai Archers.

name: TWUNS
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if your second Twun attacks the same figure as the first Twun, add one attack die to the second Twun's attack.
ability_2_desc: Two adjacent Twuns on the same level add one to their Attack and Defense value.
ability_3_desc: You may attack with any 2 Twuns you control, even Twuns that did not move this turn.
ability_4_desc: After taking a turn with Twuns, destroy all Twuns you control who are not adjacent to at least one other Twun you control.

name: Uncle Sam
ability_1_desc: Each time a Unique Hero you control takes a leaving engagement attack during normal movement, add 2 to that hero's Move number and 1 to that hero's Attack number for the duration of that hero's turn.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to the Attack number of this Army Card for each species in your army other than Propoganda, to a maximum of 6 additional dice for Celebrate Diversity.

name: UNUKK
ability_1_desc: When Unukk attacks an opponent's figure, he receives 1 extra attack die for each revealed order marker on the defending figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Each time Unukk destroys a small or medium Squad figure with a normal attack, he may move up to 2 additional spaces and attack another figure belonging to the same Army Card as the previously destroyed figure. If Unukk moves using Frenzied Assault he must also attack.

name: Uruk-Hai Infantry
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Small or Medium Squad figure, an Uruk-Hai Infantry adds 1 to his Attack.
ability_2_desc: When defending with an Uruk-Hai Infantry, add 1 defense die for each other adjacent Uruk-Hai Infantry up to a maximum of +2 dice for the Shield Wall power.

name: UNCLE SAM
ability_1_desc: If every Army Card you control is for a Unique Hero, after taking a turn with Uncle Sam you may reveal an "X" order marker on any Army Card you control to immediately take a turn with that Hero.
ability_2_desc: If you use at least three different special attacks in a round, you may add 8 to your next initiative roll.
ability_3_desc: If a Unique Hero you control is destroyed, place one wound marker on this Army Card.

name: UB-LON-RA
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. Ub-Lon-Ra does not need clear line of sight to attack with Mind Scream Special Attack. Choose a figure to attack, if Ub-Lon-Ra inflicts more wounds than needed to destroy the chosen figure, one at a time for each excess wound inflicted, you may inflict 1 wound on any figure from the same Army Card as the chosen figure (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: Each time Ub-Lon-Ra destroys a figure with his normal attack, you may remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card for each order marker on the destroyed figure's Army Card (or cards).
ability_3_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, instead of taking a turn with Ub-Lon-Ra, you may take a turn with any Marro Squad or Hero you control. Any figure that is taking a turn must be within 12 clear sight spaces of Ub-Lon-Ra prior to its movement. Hive Command does not affect Overlords.

name: Token of Betrayal
ability_1_desc: Before an opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of this figure rolls the 20-sided die for a special power on an Army Card or Glyph, this figure may activate this glyph in order to subtract 5 from the die roll.

name: Uruk-Hai Berserkers
ability_1_desc: An Uruk-hai Berserker may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When an Uruk-hai Berserker receives one or more wounds, before removing the figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, ignore any wounds.

name: Uruk-hai Engineers
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. If 2 Uruk-hai Engineers you control are adjacent to the same Fortress Door, they may roll their attack dice as one combined attack. The Fortress door does not receive any automatic shields when rolling defense against Battering Ram Special Attack.

name: Unhallowed Titan
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, instead of taking a turn with this Unhallowed Titan, you may take a turn with up to 2 Unhallowed Titans you control. This Unhallowed Titan must be one of the 2 Unhallowed Titans. The Unhallowed Titans either cannot move or cannot attack during these turns.
ability_2_desc: When this Unhallowed Titan attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to this Unhallowed Titan. If the defending figure receives any wounds from this Unhallowed Titan's attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.

name: Gargoyle Statues
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 7. Instead of attacking with a superstrength Hero which is adjacent to either Gargoyle Statue, the Hero may perform the Flying Statue Special Attack. If the attacked figure is destroyed, place the statue on the space the figure occupied. If the attacked figure is not destroyed, remove the thrown Statue from the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: After moving a chosen large, huge, or superstrength Hero which was adjacent to either Gargoyle Statue, you may place the Statue next to the chosen Hero.

name: Uruk-Hai Brutes
ability_1_desc: For every opponent's figure a Uruk-hai Brute destroys, place a purple Experience Marker on this card. When attacking with a Uruk-hai Brute, roll one additional attack die for each Experience Marker on this card. A maximum of 3 Experience Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Uruk-hai Brute, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Undying Spirit
ability_1_desc: When this Undying Spirit is destroyed select any adjacent enemy figure. Place this figure on the selected figure Army Card. The selected figure will attack and defend with one less dice.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Undying Spirit's movement, ignore elevations. Undying Spirit may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Undying Spirit starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Uruk-Hai Berserker
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Small or Medium Squad figure, an Uruk-Hai Berserker adds 1 to his Attack.
ability_2_desc: When an Uruk-Hai Berserker wounds a figure with a normal attack, if that Berserker is adjacent to any Squad figures, you must choose one of them and that figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, an Uruk-Hai Berserker always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: URLOK
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When Urlock attacks with his Dwarven Guns Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once. Line sight for each attack is determined from one of the two shoulder dwarves.
ability_2_desc: If the base of an opponent's figure is no more than 5 levels about Urlock's height, or an opponent's height is no more than 3 levels below Urlock's base, Urlock may add 1 to his Range when attacking this figure.

name: Ultron
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Ultron rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Ultron can take for this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Ultron, you may choose an opponent's Unique Hero within 6 clear sight spaces. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, take temporary control of that Hero and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of the turn, control of that Hero returns to that opponent. All Order Markers that were on that Hero's card will stay on that card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ultron's movement, ignore elevations. Ultron may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ultron starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Uruk-hai Torchbearer
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, Uruk-hai Torchbearer may choose to use Fire Undoes Stone. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-4, all adjacent figures are safe. If you roll 5-16, each adjacent figure receives 2 wounds. If you roll 17-19, each adjacent figure receives 4 wounds. If you roll a 20, each adjacent figure receives 8 wounds. Fire Undoes Stone also affects destructible objects. After using this power, Uruk-hai Torchbearer is always destroyed.

name: Toxic Waste Barrel
ability_1_desc: When this Toxic Waste Barrel receives a wound or is destroyed, roll an unblockable attack die for each figure adjacent to this Toxic Waste Barrel, one at a time. If you roll a skull, the figure receives a wound. Figures with the Environmental Suit special power or the Chemical Burn special power are not affected by Chemical Burn.

name: Zombie Hulk
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker and before taking a turn with this Zombie Hulk, if this Zombie Hulk is not engaged, you may first take a turn with another Undead Savage hero or squad that you control.
ability_2_desc: If an undead savage that you control destroys an opponent's large or huge figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Zombie Hulks, and remove all markers other than order markers on that card. Undead are not affected by Zombie Rises Again.
ability_3_desc: Figures attacked by any undead subtract one from their defense dice for every Zombie Hulk they are engaged to.

name: URTTH
ability_1_desc: When Urtth attacks he may attack one additional time. When both attacks are against the same figure that figure rolls one less die when defending against the second attack.
ability_2_desc: When Urtth causes a wound then, for the remainder of the round, he may roll 3 extra dice when attacking while he must roll 3 less dice when defending against an attack from a non adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: When Urtth causes a wound then, for the remainder of the round, all friendly orc warriors may roll one additional die when they are adjacent to Urtth while attacking.
ability_4_desc: Urtth is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: URTTHAK
ability_1_desc: When Urtthak attacks he may attack one additional time. When both attacks are against the same figure that figure rolls one less defense die when defending against the second attack.
ability_2_desc: When Urtthak causes a wound then, for the remainder of the round: add 3 to the attack value of this card. and subtract 3 from the defense value of this card when defending against an attack from an non adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: When Urtthak causes a wound then, for the remainder of the round, all friendly orc warriors adjacent to Urtthak receive an additional attack die.
ability_4_desc: Urtthak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Valkyrie
ability_1_desc: When Valkyrie attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When a friendly figure with a Warrior's Spirit Special Power is destroyed and placed on another unique Army Card, that figure's Spirit bonus is doubled.

name: Vahan the Stalwart
ability_1_desc: If there are no Order Markers on this card, add 1 to Vahan's Defense.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Vahan, you may place a wound marker on this card and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_3_desc: If Vahan receives enough wounds from a normal or special attack to be destroyed, he is not removed until the beginning of the next round, after rolling for initiative. Remove all Order Markers from this card.

name: Uruk-Hai Lancers
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of a Uruk-Hai Lancer, and its base is no more than 3 levels above that Lancer's height or 3 levels below that Lancer's base, that Lancer may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to a previously unengaged Uruk-Hai Lancer, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: An Uruk-Hai Lancer adjacent to at least 2 other Uruk-Hai Lancers you control adds 1 to his Attack and 2 to his Braced Spear 16 special power roll.

name: Vampire Minion
ability_1_desc: When an Undead hero you control with the Life Drain special power causes any wounds with a normal attack on an opponent's figure, you may choose up to 3 Vampire Minions you control within 6 spaces of the attacking hero. Move the chosen figures up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Each time this Vampire Minion destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. This Vampire Minion cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: This Vampire Minion is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Venoc Warlord
ability_1_desc: All scouts you control can move an additional 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Frenzy power on any Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Venoc Warlord does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces

name: Victoria Jaton
ability_1_desc: When Victoria Jaton successfully blocks an attack from a squad figure, then figures of that squad may not attack Victoria Jaton for the rest of the turn.
ability_2_desc: When Victoria Jaton is engage with only one enemy figure and no friendly figures are engaged with the enemy figure, then roll 2 additional attack dice and defense dice.

name: THE TARDIS
ability_1_desc: The TARDIS does not start the game on the battlefield. At the beginning of the game, you must place the TARDIS, at least one Time Lord you control, and up to two small or medium Unique Heroes you control on this card.
ability_2_desc: At the beginning of every round, before placing Order Markers, if the TARDIS is on this card roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, place the TARDIS on any empty space. Place all figures on this card adjacent to the TARDIS. If you cannot place a figure, remove it from the game.
ability_3_desc: If the TARDIS is on the battlefield, and you do not control a Time Lord, remove the TARDIS from the game.

name: VARS'T
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Vars't inflicts more than one wound with Finger of Death Special Attack, destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Vars't. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Void Chill Aura does not affect Undead or destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: Vars't can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Vashon
ability_1_desc: Vashon can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Vashon rolls 4 additional defense dice when defending against an attack from a non-adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: When Vashon is destroyed, before removing him from the battlefield choose an opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces, if possible, and place him on that figure's Army Card. At the end of every round, a player who controls an Army Card with Vashon on it must give one wound to a figure on that card.

name: Venoc Stalker
ability_1_desc: When Venoc Stalker rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 8 dice to his defense.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Marro figure, Venoc Stalker rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Venoc Stalker does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Viking Skald
ability_1_desc: All warriors who follow Jandar and start their turn adjacent to a Viking Skald may add one to their move number for the rest of the turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move Viking Skald again.

name: Vazniss
ability_1_desc: After a Drow figure you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Vazniss rolls the 20-sided die for a special power on its Army Card, you may reroll the die. You must keep the second result. If the second result is lower than the first result, that figure immediately receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Vazniss, you may destroy any Drow figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Vazniss. If you do, remove all wound markers from this Army Card.

name: Verus
ability_1_desc: If Verus successfully defends against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking small or medium figure, you may immediately place the figure on any empty space within 1 space of its current location. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Shield Strike never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Shield Strike can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Vamp Swarm
ability_1_desc: Each time this Vamp Swarm, or an Undead small or medium Unique Hero you control adjacent to this Vamp Swarm, destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from their Army Card. Destructible Objects cannot be Lifeblood Drained.
ability_2_desc: This Vamp Swarm adds 5 additional defense dice when rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Vamp Swarm's movement, ignore elevations. This Vamp Swarm can pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Vamp Swarm starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: VATARIEN
ability_1_desc: When Vatarien rolls defense dice against an attacking figure that is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. In place of Vatarien's normal attack he may send forth his flock to attack his enemy however Vatarien losses his Swarming Flock ability until his next turn. Line of sight is not needed to use the Flock Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Vatarien's movement, ignore elevations. Vatarien may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins.

name: Veterans of Orleans
ability_1_desc: When a Veteran of Orleans attacks an adjacent figure, before rolling attack dice, you may choose 1 Squad figure that is also adjacent to that Veteran of Orleans. If the defending figure receives any wounds from that Veteran of Orleans's attack, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: A Veteran of Orleans may add 1 to its Move number for each other engaged Human you control who follows Jandar, up to a maximum of +3 for A Brother's Call.

name: Village Defenders
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with the Village Defenders, for each Village Defender you control that attacked an opponent's figure this turn, you may move any Civilian figure you control that did not attack this turn up to 3 spaces. A Civilian figure may only be moved by Guerrilla Tactics once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Village Defender you control, if the defending figure is engaged with at least 2 other Village Defenders you control, it subtracts 2 from its defense dice.

name: Vi'Gor Darkbreeze
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered order marker on Vi'gor Darkbreeze's Army Card, you may also reveal the "X" order marker in order to activate Shapeshift. While Shapeshift is active Vi'gor Darkbreeze may use the special powers listed on any animal companion Army Card. Vi'gor Darkbreeze may only use one Army Card's special powers per turn and the player must declare which animal companion Vi'gor Darkbreeze will shift to. Vi'gor Darkbreeze may Shapeshift animal companions that are not in the player's army. Shapeshift lasts for the duration of the round.

name: Velkhor
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Velkhor rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack, if two or more shields are rolled, subtract one from the number of shields rolled.
ability_2_desc: When Velkhor is destroyed, place this figure on any unique army card. Velkhor's spirit subtracts 2 from the defense value on that army card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Velkhor's movement, ignore elevations. Velkhor may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Velkhor starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: ULLAR ENHANCED RIFLE
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any non-adjacent figure within 10 clear sight spaces of this figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or 20, the chosen figure is destroyed. If you roll a 1–18, you missed. This figure may not use this Ullar Enhanced Rifle if it moved this turn.

name: Vlaakith
ability_1_desc: All friendly undeads adjacent to Vlaakith receive an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Range 6 Attack 4 Common figures roll 2 less defense dice when defending against Frost Blast Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, Vlaakith may destroy an undead squad figure within 4 clear sight spaces to remove one Wound Marker from her Army Card.

name: Viper
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any one unique Army Card you control. For the rest of the game the chosen card's class is Terrorist, regardless of what is listed on the card.
ability_2_desc: When Viper receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack, or a leaving engagement attack, she ignores any additional wounds.

name: Visages of Aldorn
ability_1_desc: If Master Aldorn is Destroyed, all Visages of Aldorn are immediately Destroyed.
ability_2_desc: Visages of Aldorn cannot make leaving engagement attacks, and enemy figures may move through them.
ability_3_desc: Visages of Aldorn can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_4_desc: Visages of Aldorn do not take falling damage and may ignore all effects from terrain tiles they move onto or occupy.

name: VENGEFUL SPIRIT
ability_1_desc: A Vengeful Spirit does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, when a figure you control that is not Undead or a Construct receives enough wounds from an opponent's attack to destroy it, you may place a Vengeful Spirit in your army within 2 clear sight spaces of the attacking figure, if possible. If a Vengeful Spirit is destroyed, it may not be returned to the battlefield by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an opponent's figure this Vengeful Spirit moved through this turn and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: A Vengeful Spirit may move through all figures and obstacles such as ruins, and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. It may not be moved by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.

name: VORAPEDE
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with this Vorapede, you may choose one small or medium Squad figure adjacent to this Vorapede and destroy it.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this Vorapede may double its Height and may ignore up to 1 level of elevation.

name: Vlaakith
ability_1_desc: All friendly Undead figures adjacent to Vlaakith receive an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Common figures roll 2 less defense dice when defending against Frost Blast Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose an undead squad figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Vlaakith and destroy it. If you destroy a figure with Dark Ritual, remove one wound marker from this Army Card.

name: Viktor Klaw
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Viktor Klaw may use Stealth Leap 25. Stealth Leap 25 has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap 25, ignore elevations. Viktor Klaw may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Viktor Klaw may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Viktor Klaw is engaged when he starts his Stealth Leap 25, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After attacking an opponent's figure with Viktor Klaw, you may attack one additional time. Before attacking again, you may use his Stealth Leap 25 special power.

name: Ultron
ability_1_desc: When Ultron, or a Hero with Ultron's figure on it's army card, is destroyed, you may choose a Robot Unique Hero you control. Place Ultron's figure on the chosen Hero's Army Card. While Ultron's figure is on another Robot Unique Hero's Army Card that you control: It gains Ultron's Age of Ultron and Oedipus Complex special powers; and Its has the Class: Conqueror and Personality: Genocidal instead of what is listed on its card.
ability_2_desc: Ultron adds to 1 his Attack Value and 1 to his 20-sided die rolls as long as at least one opponent controls Hank Pym and/or Janet Van Dyne. Ultron can not attack Hank Pym and/or Janet Van Dyne unless they are the only figure(s) remaining in an opponent's army.
ability_3_desc: When Ultron receives one or more wounds, ignore one wound he just received.
ability_4_desc: After taking a turn with Ultron, you may choose a figure within 3 line of sight spaces of Ultron. Roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to your die roll if the chosen figure is a Robot. If the chosen figure is a Squad or Common Hero figure and you roll a 8 or higher, destroy that figure. If the chosen figure is a Unique Hero figure and you roll a 15 or higher, place an Encephalo Marker on that Hero's army card. For the entire game, when a Hero with at least one Encephalo Marker on its Army Card begins to take a turn, you may remove an Encephalo Marker from that Hero's card to end that Hero's turn immediately.

name: Vivaan
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 or 4. Vivaan starts each turn with 8 attack dice. Choose any adjacent figure and attack by rolling 2 or 4 attack dice. Vivaan may keep making special attacks by rolling 2 or 4 attack dice until he has rolled all 8 attack dice. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: After revealing a numbered Order Marker on a Unique Asuri Hero that you control and taking a turn with that hero, you may reveal your X Order Marker on this Army Card to take a turn with Vivaan.

name: Venom
ability_1_desc: If Venom is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11-20, Venom takes no damage and may immediately move using Swing Line.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Venom may use Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Venom may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. He may not swing more than 40 levels up or down in a single swing. If he is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Venom may attack with Web Special Attack. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against Web Special Attack.

name: Vladimir Esewein
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any unique figure adjacent to Vladimir. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19, the figure receives one wound. If you roll a 20, take control of the chosen figure and that figure's Army Card. Remove any order markers from that unit's Army Card. If Vladimir is destroyed, the captured unit is destroyed as well.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, roll the 20-sided die for each figure adjacent to Vladimir. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure receives one wound from the Brimstone Stallion's fiery hooves.
ability_3_desc: Vladimir is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Voidwalker
ability_1_desc: This Voidwalker does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die for each Voidwalker Army Card. If you roll a 11 or higher you may place a Voidwalker figure on any empty water, swamp water, or shadow space. You cannot place it adjacent to other figures or on Glyphs.
ability_2_desc: If this Voidwalker is on a water, swamp water, or shadow space before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to this Voidwalker. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.

name: Ventudom
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Ventudom, you may first take a turn with any two air elementals that you control.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure without the Flying or Stealth Fling special power within 4 clear sight spaces of Ventudom. Roll the 20-sided die. If the choosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 11 or higher, destroy it. If the choosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 18 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero figure. If Ventudom destroys the selected figures with Tornado, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Air Elemental.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ventudom's movement, ignore elevations. Ventudom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ventudom starts to fly, if it is engaged, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Volodar Zylwynn
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Spacial. Attack 4. When Volodar Zylwynn attacks with Spotting the Enemy Special Attack, add 1 to Volodar's range for every additional Elf you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Volodar Zylwynn, up to a maximum of +3 in range.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dices against a non-adjacent attack, Volodar Zylwynn will add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Wafiyy Militants
ability_1_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure, a Wafiyy Militant rolls one additional die.
ability_2_desc: When a Wafiyy Militant is attacked with a normal attack and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack with that Militant before removing him from the battlefield.

name: Undead King
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-15, nothing happens. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure is destroyed.

name: Vlad III
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any small or medium figure adjacent to Vlad III. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the defending figure cannot roll defense dice if attacked by Vlad III this turn.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Vlad III, if Vlad destroyed at least one figure, you may move each enemy squad figure within 2 clear sight spaces up to 1 space, if possible.
