Any figures moved with Display of Cruelty must be able to end this move unengaged, and take any leaving engagement attacks that apply.

name: Wafiyy Rocketeer
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving with a Wafiyy Rocketeer, you may move one other Human Soldier you control who follows Ozirael.
ability_2_desc: Range 7 Attack 4. Choose a figure who is at least 4 spaces away to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by RPG Special Attack. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. A Wafiyy Rocketeer cannot use RPG Special Attack if he moved this turn.

name: War Machine
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. When War Machine attacks with his Minigun Special Attack, he may attack three additional times.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. When War Machine attacks with his Rocket Pod Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for War Machine's movement, ignore elevations. War Machine may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When War Machine starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Void
ability_1_desc: You only include Void in your army if an opponent gives you this Army Card and figure at the start of the game. Void never starts the game on the battlefield. If you control Void, you must place at least one numbered Order Marker on him. Any time Void attacks and does not inflict a wound, at the end of his turn replace his figure with your opponent's Sentry figure.
ability_2_desc: When Void attacks, he may attack 2 additional times. Figures attacked by Void cannot roll defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Void's movement, ignore elevations. Void may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs and fly over obstacles. When Void starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: TREBUCHET
ability_1_desc: Range 12. Lob 15. Attack 4. After revealing an order marker on an unengaged figure adjacent to a Trebuchet, and in stead of taking a turn with that figure or using any powers on that figure's card, you may use the trebuchet special attack. You must have at least three unengaged figures you control adjacent to the Trebuchet to use the trebuchet special attack. Choose a figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Trebuchet Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. You may not use the Trebuchet special attack if an opposing figure is adjacent to the Trebuchet.

name: Warforged Centurions
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Warforged Centurions, you may first move any 3 Warforged Soldiers, any 1 Warforged Hero, or any 1 Golem you control up to 3 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, a Warforged Centurion always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Vorelanj
ability_1_desc: Whenever a figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Vorelanj would be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, before removing that figure from the battlefield you must choose a non-Xoderian figure within 2 clear sight spaces of it, if possible. The chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: If Vorelanj is attacked with a normal attack and receives two or more wounds, you may ignore one of those wounds.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Vorelanj's movement, ignore elevations. Vorelanj may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Vorelanj starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Warforged Phalanx
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to this Warforged Phalanx to Tactical Shove. Move that figure 3 spaces in a straight line away from this Phalanx. Figures can only be moved onto same-level or lower spaces. Falling damage will apply for non-flying figures. Figures moved with Tactical Shove will not take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to a previously unengaged Warforged Phalanx, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound.

name: Wan Shi Tong
ability_1_title: He Who Knows Ten Thousand Things
ability_1_desc: You may look at all opponent's Order Markers at any point after initiative has been rolled. You may not reveal or move any Order Markers when using He Who Knows Ten Thousand Things. You may use He Who Knows Ten Thousand Things more than once per round.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Wan Shi Tong, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Wan Shi Tong's height or 3 levels below Wan Shi Tong's base, Wan Shi Tong may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: If Wan Shi Tong attacks a figure that is not a Spirit, that figure's powers are negated for this attack. If Wan Shi Tong rolls defense dice from an attack from a figure that is not a Spirit, Wan Shi Tong adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: VORGYRN
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Vorgyrn, you may take a turn with any one of the following that you control: • 2 Drow Heroes, or • 1 Common Drow Squad and 1 Common Drow Hero. You may choose which to activate first. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn instead of Vorgyrn must be within clear sight of Vorgyrn before moving.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 2 + Special. When Vorgyrn attacks with Venom Strike Special Attack, add 1 to its attack dice for every additional Drow you control within 3 clear sight spaces of it, up to a maximum of +3 dice.
ability_3_desc: If Vorgyrn is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack it with a normal attack.

name: Vulcanmech Incendiborgs
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Redundant Systems markers on this card. After a Vulcanmech Incendiborg receives one or more wounds, you may remove 1 Redundant Systems marker from this Army Card to ignore all wounds.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. A Vulcanmech Incendiborg that does not attack normally may use Flamethrower Special Attack. Choose 2 spaces in a straight line from the attacking Vulcanmech Incendiborg. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Flamethrower Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Vokita Agents
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Vokita Agents, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero that follows Vydar you control. The chosen hero must make its entire move within clear sight of at least one Vokita Agent.
ability_2_desc: When a Vokita Agent is attacked with a non-adjacent attack and at least one skull is rolled, roll the twenty-sided die. On a 1-9, roll defense dice normally. On a 10-17, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled. On a 18-20, inflict one wound on the attacking figure, and add one shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Start the game with three silver markers on this card. Remove one every time you use Boot Rockets to move. While using Boot Rockets, a Vokita Agent ignores elevations. A Vokita Agent may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Vokita Agent is engaged when it starts to fly, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Warlock of Valkrill
ability_1_desc: All friendly Warmongers and Demolishers adjacent to this Warlock of Valkrill roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Warlock of Valkrill's movement, ignore elevations. this Warlock of Valkrill may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Warlock of Valkrill starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: WARDUKE
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 spaces of Warduke. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, remove one order marker at random from the chosen figure's army card. Warduke is not subject to any invisibility or shadow tile related effect or special ability.
ability_2_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to Warduke to attack him with a normal attack. All excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a human figure, Warduke always adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. Warduke may attack any and all human figures adjacent to him.
ability_4_desc: An opponent can never take control of Warduke.

name: Warforged Guard Dog
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on an Army Card with the species Warforged that you control, and before taking that Hero or Squads turn, you may move each Warforged Guard Dog figure you control up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Warforged Guard Dog, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may only be targeted as they move into engagement with Warforged Guard Dog.
ability_3_desc: When Rolling Defense and a normal or special attack, a Warforged Guard Dog always add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled

name: War Horse of Troy
ability_1_desc: When a small or medium figure you control ends it move adjacent to this War Horse of Troy, if there are no other figures on this card, you may choose that figure to be the Rider. Place the Rider on this card. Instead of moving the Rider, you must either move this Horse or place the Rider adjacent to this Horse. If this Horse is destroyed, place the Rider on a space that Horse occupied and roll one combat die. If a skull is rolled the Rider recieves a wound.
ability_2_desc: The Rider is considered adjacent to and occupying both spaces one level above this War Horse of Troy. The Rider may be targeted for any special power or attack using this Horse's hit zone. When using the Rider's special powers or attacks, this Horse's target point must be used. If the Rider is destroyed, remove the figure from this card.
ability_3_desc: This War Horse of Troy and the Rider are never attacked when leaving engagements.

name: Warforged Special Forces
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, select one adjacent Unique Hero and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher that figure will receive one wound.
ability_2_desc: All Warforged figures adjacent to the Warforged Special Forces may add 1 to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When a Warforged Special Forces is destroyed, roll "X" dices. "X" will represent the number of previously destroyed friendly Warforged figures. For each skull rolled that figure will receive a wound.

name: Wartortle
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3 + Special. If this Wartortle is attacking a figure on a water space with its Waterfall Special Attack, roll 1 additional attack die. If this Wartortle rolls at least 3 skulls with its Waterfall Special Attack, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from the defending figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If this Wartortle does not attack this turn, the space it occupies and all spaces adjacent to it that are no more than 2 levels above or below this Wartortle's base are considered normal water spaces until the end of this Wartortle's next turn. Figures must end their movement when entering normal water spaces.
ability_3_desc: This Wartortle does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Werewolf Oz
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, do not place Werewolf Oz on the battlefield. Instead, when Oz is removed from the battlefield with the Full Moon special power, place Werewolf Oz on the space previously occupied by Oz.
ability_2_desc: Werewolf Oz is considered to be engaged with all adjacent small or medium figures. Werewolf Oz cannot leave an engagement, and must attack every turn, if possible.
ability_3_desc: At the end of the round, remove all wound markers from this card, and all Phase Markers and wound markers from the Army Card of Oz. Remove Werewolf Oz from the battlefield and place Oz on the space previously occupied by Werewolf Oz.

name: Amanda Waller
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose up to 6 Unique Heroes you control. None of the chosen heroes can share a Class, or cost more than 215 points each. Place a Task Force X Maker on each of the chosen figure's Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Hero figure you control, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, if there is a Task Force X Marker on that figure's Army Card, you must roll the 20-sided die. • If you roll a 1-3, choose an opponent. That opponent will now control that Hero for the remainder of your turn. At the end of that turn, control of that Hero returns to you. • If you roll a 4-8, take a turn with that figure as normal. • If you roll a 9-15, before taking that figure's turn, you may first take a turn with one other Hero you control with a Task Force X Marker on its Army Card. You can not take any additional turns with any figures except for the figure you revealed an order maker on. • If you roll a 16-20, before taking that figure's turn, you may first take a turn with two other Heros you control with Task Force X Markers on their Army Card. You can not take any additional turns with any figures except for the figure you revealed an order maker on.
ability_3_desc: Before any turn, you may immediately destroy any or all figures with Task Force X Markers on their Army Cards.

name: Wildwood Elder
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium opponent adjacent to Wildwood Elder. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero, add 2 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: If a friendly Wildwood Hero is destroyed, add 2 to Wildwood Elder's move number as long as the Wildwood Hero remains off the battlefield.
ability_3_desc: When defending, Wildwood Elder adds 1 automatic shield.

name: Whirlwind
ability_1_desc: Whirlwind may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure with Whirlwind, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Whirlwind at the start of this turn, Whirlwind receives 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Whirlwind is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Warforged Trackers
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game choose a Vydar Warforged hero you control, or a Vydar Soulborg hero you control, to be the Warforged Trackers pack leader. You can choose only one pack leader for all the Warforged Trackers you control. After taking a turn with the Warforged Trackers, you may take a turn with their chosen pack leader if it is still under your control.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Warforged Trackers may double their height.
ability_3_desc: All small, medium, or large opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to a Warforged Tracker may not move. If a figure is adjacent to 2 or more Warforged Trackers, then that figure cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: Wildfire Embers
ability_1_desc: You may move and attack with up to 6 Wildfire Embers you control each turn.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a moving normally with a Wildfire Ember, you may place it on any empty non-water space within 1 clear sight space of any other Wildfire Ember you control. Figures moved by Spreading Fires do not take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: A Wildfire Ember never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Werewolf Berserker
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. • If you roll a 1, add one wound to this Werewolf Berserker's Army Card and end its turn. • If you roll a 2–6, add 1 to the attack value of this card. • If you roll a 7–11, add 2 to the attack value of this card. • If you roll a 12–15, add 3 to the attack value of this card. • If you roll a 16–19, add 4 to the attack value of this card. • If you roll a 20, add 8 to the attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: This Werewolf Berserker starts the game with 3 green Lycanthropy Markers on its Army Card. If an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least 1 wound from this Werewolf Berserker, you may place a Lycanthropy Marker on that figure's Army Card. For the duration of the game, that figure loses its Species, Class, and Personality. Instead, it has the following characteristics: • Species: Hybrid • Class: Hunter • Personality: Tormented Lycanthropy never affects Constructs, Lycanthropes, Soulborgs, and destructible objects.

name: WOOKIE SOLDIER
ability_1_desc: If this character defeats an adjacent enemy, he may take an additional attack against another adjacent enemy.

name: Wildwood Saplings
ability_1_desc: If all of your remaining order markers are placed on Army Cards for Wildwood figures, add 2 to each Wildwood Sapling's move number.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with all Wildwood Saplings, roll the 20-sided die once for each unique Wildwood Hero within 4 clear sight spaces of any Wildwood Saplings you control. If you roll a 16 or higher, place a previously destroyed Wildwood Sapling on a same-level space adjacent to that Wildwood Hero.

name: WARGODS OF CROCIS
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Wargod Of Crocis, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Wargod at the start of this turn, then all skulls rolled for that Wargod's attack count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by an attack from a Wargod Of Crocis, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may Pushback the figure by moving that figure 2 spaces in a straight line away from that Wargod. The space must be on the same level or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Pushback never takes any leaving engagement attacks. Falling damage will apply for non-flying figures. A single figure may only be moved by Pushback once per turn.

name: Wolverine
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, you may remove up to 2 Wound Markers from this card.
ability_2_desc: While moving, Wolverine may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: After attacking, if there are any Wound Markers on this card, Wolverine may attack one additional time.

name: WAR PIG
ability_1_desc: War Pig does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, at the beginning of each round, roll the D20. On a roll of 10+, up to 2 War Pigs you control may be placed anywhere on the board, within 5 spaces of any other figure. War Pigs may not be placed adjacent to other figures or on Glyphs. Unless there is an order marker on this card, War Pig is invisible, and cannot be targeted for any attack or special power and may not take a turn.
ability_2_desc: Any Mounts or figures with living mounts within 2 spaces of a War Pig roll one fewer defence die.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. Start the game with 1 Incendiary Marker on this card for each War Pig you control. Before using this special attack, remove an Incendiary Marker from this card. All figures without the Lava Resistant special power adjacent to War Pig are affected by this special attack. Add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_4_desc: If War Pig ends up by any means on or within one space of a water space at the end of any turn, War Pig will - despite his ghostly nature - panic himself into some sort of bizarre and definitive cardiac event faster than you can say ouija board. War Pig is then destroyed.

name: The Witch-king
ability_1_desc: All figures within 2 clear sight spaces of the Witch-King subtract 1 from their defense.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to the Witch-King. If you roll an 18 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Nazgûl and Undead are not affected by Black Breath.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure adjacent to the Witch-King. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. If you roll 13-15, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. If you roll 16-19, the chosen figure receives 2 wounds. If you roll a 20, the chosen figure receives 4 wounds. Morgul Blade does not affect Undead.

name: The Witch-king - Twilight
ability_1_desc: All figures within 2 clear sight spaces of the Witch-King subtract 1 from their defense.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure adjacent to the Witch-King. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. If you roll 13-15, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. If you roll 16-19, the chosen figure receives 2 wounds. If you roll a 20, the chosen figure receives 4 wounds. Morgul Blade does not affect Undead.
ability_3_desc: The Witch-King can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Weston Archers
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Lob 15 Attack 3 Three unengaged adjacent Weston Archers on the same level may combine their attacks to use Arc Arrows Special Attack. Choose a nonadjacent figure to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Arc Arrows Special Attack. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When a Weston Archer is attacking with a height advantage, he rolls an additional attack die.

name: WILL-O'-WISP
ability_1_desc: When a Will-o'-wisp is on a swamp space, add 1 to his attack and defense.
ability_2_desc: After moving, choose any figure within 3 clear sight spaces of a Will-o'-wisp. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by a Will-o'-wisp this turn.
ability_3_desc: If any figure moves with in 5 clear sight spaces of and is not adjacent with a Will-o'-wisp. You may move that Will-o'-wisp 7 spaces.
ability_4_desc: Will-o'-wisp's movement, ignores elevations. Will-o'-wisp may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures, and fly over obstacles. When a Will-o'-wisp will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wizard
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves onto a space within 2 clear sight spaces of Wizard, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Anti-Gravity Discs.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Wizard's movement, ignore elevations. Wizard may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Wizard starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wong
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Mystic, Sorcerer or Wizard hero you control to be Wong's Sorcerer Supreme. After taking a turn with the Sorcerer Supreme, you may move Wong up to 5 spaces. If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to both Wong and his Sorcerer Supreme attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack Wong.
ability_2_desc: If Wong takes no damage from a normal attack by an adjacent figure, the attacking figure receives a wound.

name: The Witch-king On Fell Beast
ability_1_desc: All figures within 4 clear sight spaces of the Witch-king subtract 1 from their defense.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to the Witch-king. If the chosen figure is a squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen hero.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Witch-king's movement, ignore elevations. The Witch-king may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When the Witch-king starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wastewalker Gage
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Gage may use his Grapple Rifle. Grapple Rifle has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Grapple Rifle, ignore elevations. Gage may grapple over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles. Gage may not grapple more than 45 levels up or down in a single Grapple Rifle move. If Gage is engaged when he starts his Grapple Rifle move, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. If Gage used Grapple Rifle this turn, he may not attack a non-adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You must choose a figure adjacent to Gage and the chosen figure to also be affected by Chainsaw Sweep Special Attack, if possible. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. If you do not roll any skulls with Chainsaw Sweep Special Attack, Gage receives a wound.

name: Willow Rosenberg
ability_1_desc: When making a normal attack on a Demon or Undead figure that is not adjacent, Willow Rosenberg rolls 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Willow add 1 to their defense dice when rolling defense against an attack from a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill. If there is at least one unrevealed Order Marker on this card, Willow's Spell of Protection will also benefit Willow.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a wounded small or medium hero figure you control that is adjacent to Willow, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 wound markers from that hero's Army Card.

name: Wonder Woman
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, Wonder Woman rolls 2 additional defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Wonder Woman attacks with Tiara Special Attack, she may attack 2 additional times. She cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Wonder Woman's movement, ignore elevations. She may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Wonder Woman is engaged when she starts to fly, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Witch-King of Angmar
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Witch-king of Angmar and taking a turn with him, you may move up to 2 other Ringwraith or Orc figures you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When the Witch-king of Angmar attacks, he may attack one additional time. If he inflicts at least one wound with his second attack, he inflicts one additional wound.
ability_3_desc: An opponent's figure adjacent to one or more Ringwraiths rolls one less attack die. Any time an adjacent figure wounds a Ringwraith with a normal attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Figures with the Fearless personality, Ringwraiths and Robots are not affected by Black Breath of the Nazgûl.

name: Wood Elemental
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 2. Choose 2 spaces in a straight line from an attacking Wood Elemental. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Entangling Roots Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Large figures roll 1 fewer defense dice, medium figures roll 2 fewer defense dice, and small figures roll 3 fewer defense dice against Entangling Roots Special Attack. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When a friendly small, medium, or large figure adjacent to at least 1 Wood Elemental rolls defense dice against an attack from a figure who is not adjacent, that figure adds 1 to its defense dice.
ability_3_desc: A Wood Elemental can never roll defense dice while it is on a lava space.

name: Wise Oak
ability_1_desc: If you control Wise Oak in your army, you may add 1 to your move, range, attack, and defense for all treants and constructs that follow Ullar.
ability_2_desc: Wise Oak can move through all small or medium figures. Wise Oak can disengage from any small or medium figure and takes no leaving engagement damage. He does become engaged if the figure is large or huge. Wise Oak does take leaving engagement damage from large or huge figures.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Wise Oak, you may attempt to summon the Defenders of Oak if they are in your army and they have not yet been successfully summoned. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you must place all 3 Defenders of Oak on empty spaces within 8 clear sight spaces of Wise Oak. Any Defenders of Oak that you cannot place on the battlefield are immediately destroyed and cannot be summoned again. When the Defenders of Oak are summoned, you may immediately take a turn with them.

name: Major X9000
ability_1_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure, Major X9000 adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: All small, medium or large opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major X9000 may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: Wraith Invaders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Wraith Invaders, you may first take a turn with any Dire Wraith Hero you control. If you do not take a turn with any Dire Wraith Hero you control, add 4 to the Range value of this card.
ability_2_desc: The first time each turn Wraith Invaders are targeted with a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, Wraith Invaders no longer have any visible hit zones for the rest of the targeting figure's turn.

name: Wood Golem
ability_1_desc: If Wood Golem inflicts a wound when attacking Wood Golem may choose another target adjacent to it and attack again. Wood Golem may continue to attack until it does not inflict a wound. Wood Golem must choose a different target for each attack. Fury of the Forest may only be used once per round.
ability_2_desc: When Wood Golem is defending against a normal attack roll 2 additional defense dice.
ability_3_desc: Once per round after moving and before attacking roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher Wood Golem may use Root Entanglement to trap up to 2 opponent's figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Wood Golem. Those figures roll 1 fewer defense die and may not move for the remainder of the round.

name: Wrath
ability_1_desc: When Wrath attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's adjacent figure with a normal attack, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. When defending against an opponent's adjacent figure, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, when revealing an Order Marker on Wrath's card, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker that is on Wrath's card to activate Ultimate Eye for the remainder of the round. While Ultimate Eye is active, figures attacked by Wrath subtract two from their defense dice, and figures within clear sight of Wrath who attack Wrath with a normal attack subtract one from their attack dice.

name: Wulfling Hunters
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, if the Wulfling Hunters wounded an enemy figure then you may take an additional turn with the Wulfling Hunters or with a Large Hunter Hero that you control. All figures taking a turn with SCENT OF BLOOD must be unengaged at the start of their turn.
ability_2_desc: When an unengaged Wulfling Hunter is attacked with a normal or special attack add 3 defense dice to the defending Wulfling Hunter

name: X-Men
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with the X-Men, choose any Unique Mutant that's adjacent to at least one X-Men member you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, place a purple experience marker on the Army Card of the chosen figure. When rolling for attack or defense, a figure rolls one additional die for each experience marker on its card. A maximum of 3 experience markers can be placed with this power.
ability_2_desc: If a Human or Mutant that's adjacent to a member of the X-Men is attacked, you may change the targets of the attack to the X-Men member.

name: Wraith Witch
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, this Wraith Witch may summon a Deathwing. Choose up to 3 different figures within 5 clear sight spaces of this Wraith Witch and roll the 20-sided die once, adding 1 to the result for each friendly Dire Wraith figure adjacent to this Wraith Witch. - If you roll 1-4, this Wraith Witch and all figures adjacent to her receive a wound. - If you roll 5-13, nothing happens. - If you roll 14 or higher, each chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: The first time each turn this Wraith Witch is targeted with a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, this Wraith Witch no longer has any visible hit zone for the rest of the targeting figure's turn.

name: Xeph Warrior
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Xeph Warrior can't do the Spear Throw Special Attack if he is engaged.

name: Wonder Man
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Any figure adjacent to Wonder Man is affected by Pound Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Wonder Man, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, choose an opponent. That opponent now controls Wonder Man. Remove any order markers on this Army Card, then give the card to that opponent.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Wonder Man's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Wonder Man starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wyvern Whelp
ability_1_desc: While this Wyvern Whelp is flying, you may choose an opponent's small or medium figure that it passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to this Wyvern Whelp at the end of its move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Talon Grab, it will not take any disengagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Talon Grab.
ability_2_desc: All standard flying rules apply to Wyvern Whelp.

name: Xander Harris
ability_1_title: I Laugh in the Face of Danger...
ability_1_desc: If a figure is engaged with both Xander Harris and another figure you control, that opponent's figure reduces its Defense by 1.
ability_2_title: ...Then I Hide Until It Goes Away
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with a Slayer, Hybrid, or Witch Hero you control, you may immediately move Xander up to 4 spaces. When moving with this special power, Xander does not take leaving engagement attacks from figures that are engaged with other friendly figures.

name: USE OBJECT
ability_1_desc: A Hero with the Super Strength special power may pick up an adjacent destructible object before moving, except for the Breakable Wall Section and Fortress Door. Remove the object from the battlefield and place it on the Hero's card. A Hero can have one object at a time and cannot move with an object unless the Hero's Life is greater than the object's Life. Figures targeting the Hero may target the object instead. If a Hero is destroyed while picking up an object, the object is destroyed. If a Hero with an object attacks normally, it must use the object. A Hero may attack an adjacent figure with an object by making a normal attack, re-rolling up to X dice (X equals the object's Life). A Hero may attack a non-adjacent figure with an object by making a normal attack with a Range of X (X equals the Hero's Life minus the object's Life) and an Attack of Y (Y equals the object's Life). Objects are destroyed after being used.

name: XAEKIL
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. After attacking with Eyestalks Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, you may attack again with Eyestalks Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Xaekil may ignore all terrain effects.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Xaekil's movement, ignore elevations. Xaekil may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Xaekil starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Xo Shaku
ability_1_desc: If Xo Shaku is unengaged, she has no visible hit zones.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Hero figure with a point value of 100 or more, Xo Shaku rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Xo Shaku may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: XOUN
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Xoun does not need clear line of sight to attack with Psychic Blast Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Xoun or any figure you control adjacent to Xoun is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the attacking figure may not roll any attack dice this turn.

name: Xiphydri Drone
ability_1_desc: When taking a turn with a Xiphydri Drone, if you did not reveal an Order Marker on a Xiphydri Drone Army Card this turn, add 1 to the Drone's Move and Attack values.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Xiphydri Drone's movement, ignore elevations. Xiphydri Drone may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Xiphydri Drone starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Xenithrax the Vineweaver
ability_1_desc: Xenithrax starts the game with 3 Vines Glyphs on this card. Once per round, after moving and before attacking, choose an empty space within 4 spaces and place a Vines Glyph from this card onto that space.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 4 + Special. After attacking with Erupting Earth Special Attack, choose a figure that was adjacent to the defending figure at the start of that attack and attack that figure with Erupting Earth Special Attack, rolling one less attack die. You may continue attacking in this manner, rolling one less die than the previous attack, up to a total of 4 attacks. A figure cannot be attacked more than once per turn with Erupting Earth Special Attack.

name: Xenomorph Queen
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Xenomorph Queen and before taking a turn with her, you may first take a turn with any Xenomorph Drone you control.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with this Xenomorph Queen, you may add 2 to her Range Value and attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Any time a Xenomorph receives one or more wounds from a normal attack, you must immediately roll the 20-sided die once for each adjacent Small or Medium figure. If you roll 15 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Xenomorphs are not affected by Acid Blood.

name: Xvlthc
ability_1_desc: After defending against a normal or special attack, if Xvlthc did not roll any shields, place Xvlthc on any empty space within 2 spaces. Xvlthc will not take leaving engagement attacks when moving with Dimensional Escape.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Xvlthc or placing him with Dimensional Escape, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, you must choose another small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Xvlthc. After moving Xvlthc or placing him with Dimensional Escape, place the chosen figure within clear sight of Xvlthc on any empty space within 2 spaces. Figures moved with Accidental Tether will not take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Xela, Clockwork Dragon
ability_1_desc: Range 5 Attack 2 + Special Roll one additional attack die for every Order Marker on the defending figure's Army Card(s).
ability_2_desc: If Xela is attacked by a nonadjacent figure, and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-14, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 15 or higher, Xela takes no damage, and you must choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces. That figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Xela's movement, ignore elevations. Xela may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Xela starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Xavier Lawson
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may chose one figure adjacent to Xavier Lawson and roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Demon or Undead, add 3 to your roll. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by Sword of Flames.
ability_2_desc: When a squad figure that follows Utgar or Valkrill makes a normal attack on Xavier Lawson or a friendly figure adjacent to Xavier Lawson, it rolls one fewer attack die.

name: Xenithrax the Vineweaver
ability_1_desc: Xenithrax starts the game with three Xenithrax Vines Glyphs on this Army Card. Once per round, after moving and before attacking, Xenithrax may choose an empty space within 4 spaces of Xenithrax and place a Xenithrax Vines Glyph from this Army Card onto that space.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 4 - Special. The first target of Erupting Earth Special Attack must be within a range of 5. After attacking with Erupting Earth Special Attack, you may choose a figure that was adjacent to the defending figure at the beginning of that attack and attack that chosen figure with Erupting Earth Special Attack, rolling one fewer attack die. You may continue attacking with Erupting Earth Special Attack in this manner, rolling one fewer die than the previous, up to a total of four attacks. A figure cannot be attacked more than once in a turn with Erupting Earth Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Flying

name: Xiamara the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When an Ullar Kyrie you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Xiamara receives one or more wounds, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8-16, ignore all but one wound just received. If you roll a 17 or higher, ignore all wounds just received. Amulet of Paivatar does not affect Xiamara.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Xiamara's movement, ignore elevations. Xiamara may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Xiamara starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: XI Legion War Elephant
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with a Human Archer Squad figure you control that is unengaged and adjacent to this XI Legion War Elephant, you may remove that figure from the battlefield and place it on this card. There can be a maximum of three Archer figures on this card. After taking a turn with this XI Legion War Elephant, any Archers on this card may make a normal or special attack. All Archers on this card are considered to be on the same level as this War Elephant and adjacent to one another.
ability_2_desc: At any time before, during, or after moving, this XI Legion War Elephant may use Charging Stampede. Choose an adjacent small or medium figure and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Charging Stampede may only be used once per turn.

name: Xenomorph Drone
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card and taking a turn with a Xenomorph Drone, you may move 2 other Xenomorph Drones you control up to 6 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with a Xenomorph Drone, you may add 1 to its Range Value and attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Any time a Xenomorph receives one or more wounds from a normal attack, you must immediately roll the 20-sided die once for each adjacent Small or Medium figure. If you roll 15 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Xenomorphs are not affected by Acid Blood.

name: Yilla Predators
ability_1_desc: After attacking with a Yilla Predator, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack again with that Yilla Predator.
ability_2_desc: When a Yilla Predator receives one or more wounds, before removing the figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, ignore any wounds.

name: Yillia Fangs
ability_1_desc: If all your Order Markers are on Warrior Army Cards, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for every Order Marker on Yilla Fang's Army Card, up to a maximum of +3 for Initiative Advantage.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Yillia Fangs, if at least two Yillia Fangs you control are engaged, you may immediately take a turn with a Unique Wolf Hero you control.

name: Yggdrasil
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Yggdrasil does not attack when using Nature's Fury Special Attack. Instead, all Evergreen Trees and Jungle Trees within 5 clear sight spaces of Yggdrasil may attack with Nature's Fury Special Attack as if they were figures.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Yggdrasil always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Yersinia
ability_1_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Yersinia, one at a time. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Soulborgs, Constructs, and destructible objects are not affected by Miasma of Plague.
ability_2_desc: Yersinia rolls one additional attack die against a figure leaving an engagement with it. Soulborgs and Constructs are not affected by Infectious Engagement.

name: Yillia Vestals
ability_1_desc: When a Yilla Vestal rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: If a Yilla Vestal is attacking a small or medium figure, add 2 dice to a Yilla Vestal's attack.

name: Yollust The Unshakable
ability_1_desc: Yollust The Unshakable rolls 2 extra dice when attacking a figure with an Attack or Defense value of 6 or higher.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Yollust The Unshakable, you may place a wound marker on Yollust and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.

name: Yersinia
ability_1_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Yersinia, one at a time. If you roll a 17 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Soulborgs, Constructs, and destructible objects are not affected by this special power.
ability_2_desc: When Yersinia makes a leaving engagement attack, if a skull is rolled you may roll again. You may continue to roll for Infectious Engagement until you do not roll a skull.

name: XYTHE'NEM
ability_1_desc: Xythe'nem begins the game with one violet Power Swap Marker on his Army Card. After moving and before attacking, Xythe'nem may choose a unique figure within 5 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you may place the Power Swap marker on that figure's Army Card. Any figure with the Power Swap marker on their card must switch their Attack and Defense value. Psychics are not affected by Power Swap. At the end of the round, return the Power Swap marker to this card.
ability_2_desc:
Range 4 Attack 6
Roll one less attack die for each order marker on the defending figure's Army Card.

name: YOGGO
ability_1_desc: Before moving Yoggo, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Yoggo. After you move Yoggo, place the chosen figure adjacent to Yoggo.
ability_2_desc: When Yoggo attacks an opponent's figure, you must choose a small or medium figure adjacent to both Yoggo and the defending figure, if possible. If Yoggo inflicts more wounds than needed to destroy the defending figure, all excess wounds count as unblockable hits on the chosen figure.

name: Yellow Ooze
ability_1_desc: After a Yellow Ooze moves normally or with Flowing Ooze, you may choose any Yellow Ooze you control that has not moved this turn and was adjacent to this Yellow Ooze before it moved. Place the chosen Ooze adjacent to any Yellow Ooze you control that moved this turn. If possible, you must place it adjacent to two Yellow Oozes that moved this turn. A Yellow Ooze moved by Flowing Ooze will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Yellow Ooze, you may add one additional attack die for each other Yellow Ooze you control adjacent to the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: If a Yellow Ooze destroys an opponent's figure with a normal attack, you may immediately place one of your previously destroyed Yellow Ooze adjacent to any Yellow Ooze you control.

name: Yellowjacket
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure ends its move on a space within 2 clear sight spaces of Yellowjacket, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: When Yellowjacket wounds a figure with his normal attack, he must attack normally one additional time, if possible.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. If Yellowjacket wounds a figure with Stinger Special Attack, he inflicts one additional wound.

name: Yautja Predator
ability_1_desc: If this Yautja Predator is not on a water space and is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, he no longer has any visible hit zone for the duration of the targeting figure's turn and may immediately move up to 3 spaces. When moving with Adaptive Camouflage, this Yautja Predator is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. After attacking normally, this Yautja Predator may attack with his Plasmacaster Special Attack, using clear sight instead of line of sight. He cannot target a non-adjacent figure that is on a lava space.

name: Zetacron
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Zetacron, each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.

name: ZAAN
ability_1_desc: When Zaan attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Zaan rolls one additional die when attacking or defending against an opponent's most expensive figure (or figures if that opponent has more than one of that figure).
ability_3_desc: Zaan is never attacked when leaving an engagement and may move through all figures. Pursue Target may only be used if Zaan ends his movement adjacent to an opponent's figure.

name: YETCHE'TEM
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 2. Small and medium figures may not roll defense dice when attacked by Quick Stab Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After taking Yetche'tem's turn, you may choose any Squad figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Yetche'tem. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take temporary control of the chosen Squad and immediately take a turn with that Squad. At the end of that turn, return control of the chosen Squad to its previous owner. All order markers that were on the Squad's Army Card will stay on the Squad's Army Card.

name: Zerset Warriors
ability_1_desc: If a Zerset Warrior's entire movement is on sand spaces, he may move 2 additional spaces. Any extra move must also be on sand spaces.
ability_2_desc: Any Zerset Warrior adjacent to an obstacle such as a ruin cannot be targeted for a nonadjacent normal attack from an opponent's figure.

name: Xantriph
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Xantriph and before taking a turn with it, you may first take a turn with any other Beholder you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack special. Choose an opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die. ●1-8: Paralytic Ray. Attack 2. Each skull rolled counts as double. ●9-13: Disintegration Ray. You inflict 1 unblockable wound ●14-17: Explosion Ray: Attack 4. If the target is destroyed, it explodes and all adjacent figures must each roll 1 attack die. Each skull rolled inflicts 1 unblockable wound on the rolling figure. ●18-20: Greater Charm Ray. You may immediately move and attack normally with the target figure, then control returns to the opponent and 1 order marker is removed from the figure's card at random.
ability_3_desc: Xantriph and any other figures within 2 spaces of Xantriph are immune to special attacks.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for this unit's movement, ignore up to 3 levels of elevation change per hex. This unit may fly over water without stopping.

name: Wind of Death
ability_1_desc: The Wind of Death attacks each figure adjacent to it individually regardless of who controls it.
ability_2_desc: The Wind of Death must be given a numbered order marker each round, and must attack if a target is available. If there is no target to attack, a roll must still be made to see if the Wind Self-destructs.
ability_3_desc: The Wind of Death may not be directly attacked, but may be affected by peripheral attacks directed at other figures. However, when attacking, if the Wind of Death rolls no skulls, it is removed from the game.

name: ZA'ZU
ability_1_desc: Each time Za'Zu attacks a non-adjacent small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1–11, nothing happens. If you roll 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Za'Zu, remove 1 Wound Marker from Za'Zu's Army Card.

name: YULADOR
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, you may choose one Unique Hero you control who follows Jandar to be Yulador's Charge. Yulador cannot be his own Charge. For the duration of the game, subtract 1 from the chosen figure's Defense value. After Yulador's Charge is attacked by an opponent's figure, you may immediately move Yulador up to 5 spaces, as long as he ends his move adjacent to the attacking figure, and he must attack that figure normally. Add 2 to Yulador's Move and Attack if the attacking figure destroyed the Charge. Yulador can only move and attack with Jandar Bodyguard up to three times in a single turn.
ability_2_desc: Yulador may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Yirr of the Dark Order
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Select a figure to attack. All enemy figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this Dark Magic Special Attack. Roll defense dices separately.
ability_2_desc: Put 1 wound on Yirr of the Dark Order. Choose one of this: Add 1 more to your attack value. Add 1 more to your defense value. This effect will last until the end of this round. You can't use this powers two times in a round.

name: Zettian Guards
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if a 2nd Zettian Guards attacks the same figure as another, add one attack die to the 2nd Zettian Guards's attack.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Zettian Guards, you may first take a turn with any Soulborg Hero you control who follows Utgar. If you take a turn with a Soulborg Hero using Soulborg Strategic Bonding, you may not attack with the Zettian Guards this turn.

name: Yurganthaor
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Yurganthaor, you may take a turn with one of the following that you control: 1 Greater Demon, or 1 Demon Squad, or up to 3 Lesser Demons. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn instead of Yurganthaor must be within clear sight of Yurganthaor before moving.
ability_2_desc: Range 5+Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Black Lightning Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for both affected figures. If both figures are members of the same Squad, both figures roll 1 less defense dice. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Black Lightning Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.

name: ZAHT
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Zaht, if he is adjacent to a Common Drow figure you control, you may activate Drowskin 11. Remove Zaht from the battlefield. While Drowskin 11 is active, whenever a Common Drow figure you control is destroyed, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, place Zaht on the space that Drow previously occupied.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with a Common Drow figure you control, if Drowskin 11 is active you may activate Shadowburst. Every figure adjacent to the Drow receives a wound, then, destroy that Drow and replace it with Zaht, if possible.
ability_3_desc: All Drow you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Zaht roll one additional die when attacking or defending against a Squad figure.

name: Zettian Assassin
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you must choose a Unique Hero to be the Target for this Zettian Assassin. This Zettian Assassin cannot attack any figure except its chosen Target with its normal attack. If this Zettian Assassin's Target is destroyed, you must immediately destroy this Zettian Assassin.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, you may reveal an "X" order marker that is on this Zettian Assassin's Army Card and take a turn with this Zettian Assassin.
ability_3_desc: This Zettian Assassin is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Zettian Infantry
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Zettian Infantry, you may take a turn with any Soulborg Hero you control who follows Utgar.
ability_2_desc: If a friendly Soulborg Hero who follows Utgar receives one or more wounds from a special power that is not an attack, you may destroy a guard in the Zettian Infantry you control that is adjacent to that Hero to ignore any wounds that Hero just received.

name: Zettian Infantry
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Zettian Infantry, you may take a turn with any Soulborg Hero you control who follows Utgar.
ability_2_desc: If a friendly Soulborg Hero who follows Utgar receives one or more wounds from a special power that is not an attack, you may destroy an unwounded Zettian Infantry you control that is adjacent to that Hero to ignore any wounds that Hero just received.

name: Zomm Hopeslayer
ability_1_desc: If Zomm Hopeslayer begins his turn unengaged, add 2 to his move number and add 2 attack dice to his attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: When Zomm Hopeslayer rolls defense dice against an attacking figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Zettian Sniper
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack against a non-adjacent figure, if a Zetttian Sniper rolls at least one skull, add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with a Zettian Sniper, you may choose to self-detonate. Roll the 20-sided die, if you roll a 8 or higher, each figure adjacent to that Zettian Sniper receives 1 wound. After using this power, destroy that Zettian Sniper.

name: Zarunak
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Barbed Tail Whip Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defence dice separately. Zarunak cannot be affected by his own Barbed Tail Whip Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Squad figures roll 1 less defence die when attacked by Zarunak.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Zarunak's movement, ignore elevations. Zarunak may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Zarunak starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Zombie Hulk
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker and before taking a turn with this Zombie Hulk, if this Zombie Hulk is not engaged, you may first take a turn with an Undead Savage hero or squad that you control.
ability_2_desc: If an undead savage that you control destroys an opponent's large or huge figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Zombie Hulks. Undead are not affected by Zombie Hulk Rises Again.

name: Zettian Deathwalkers
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, each Zettian Deathwalker you control may target a small or medium figure within range. Roll the 20-sided die separately for each target. If you roll a 14 or higher, place a Smokescreen Marker on the targeted figure's Army Card. The move number of any figures affected by Phelacron Riot Control Canisters will be reduced by 2 on the next revealed order turn.
ability_2_desc: If a Zettian Deathwalker does not move this turn, it cannot be targeted by ranged attacks.

name: Zettian Marauder
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Zettian Marauder, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on the Zettian Marauder's Army Card to activate Flail Whirlwind for the duration of the round. While Flail Whirlwind is active, the Zettian Marauder must attack each figure adjacent to it, if possible. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: If a figure moves onto a space adjacent to the Zettian Marauder while Flail Whirlwind is active, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the figure recieves 1 wound.

name: Wei Wang
ability_1_desc: When Wei Wang attacks, if she inflicts a wound, she may attack one additional time. After rolling attack or defense dice against an adjacent opponent's figure, Wei Wang may reveal the X Marker and add an automatic Skull or automatic Shield, respectively, to what was rolled.
ability_2_desc: Choose a small or medium unique hero to be Wei Wang's Client. When Wei Wang's Client is targeted for a normal attack by an adjacent opponent's figure that is within 3 clear sight spaces of Wei Wang, you may roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 13 or higher, you may move Wei Wang adjacent to that opponent's figure and that opponent's figure receives one wound.

name: ZARITHA
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Zaritha, you may take a turn with any Demon Hero you control who follows Valkrill.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If a figure receives 1 or more wounds from Confusion Ray Special Attack, switch one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that figure's Army Card with another Army Card in that opponent's army.

name: Zombie Hulk
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker and before taking a turn with this Zombie Hulk, if this Zombie Hulk is not engaged, you may first take a turn with another Undead Savage Hero or Squad that you control.
ability_2_desc: Figures attacked by any Undead subtract one from their defense dice for every Zombie Hulk they are engaged to.
ability_3_desc: If an Undead Savage that you control destroys an opponent's large or huge figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Zombie Hulks, and remove all markers other than order markers on that card. Undead are not affected by Zombie Rises Again.

name: ZOMBIKAZES
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving and attacking normally, Zombikazes may use Exhume. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, place a previously destroyed Zombikaze on any empty grass, sand, water, snow or swamp space. You cannot place them adjacent to other figures or on glyphs.
ability_2_desc: When a Zombikaze is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, nothing happens. 2-10, roll 2 attack dice once for all adjacent figures. 11-18, roll 3 attack dice once for all figures within 2 clear sight spaces and no more than 8 levels up or down. 19-20, roll 3 attack dice once for all figures within 3 clear sight spaces and no more than 10 levels up or down. All affected figures roll defense separately.

name: ZOG
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving with a Dwarf figure you control that is adjacent to Zog, you may place it on this card. Zog may have a maximum of two Dwarf figures on this card.
ability_2_desc: When Zog receives wounds from a figure that is not adjacent, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove 1 Dwarf figure from this card and ignore all received wounds.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. In addition to attacking normally, Zog may attack with Gunner Special Attack once for each Dwarf figure on this card. Zog cannot attack the same figure twice with Gunner Special Attack.
ability_4_desc: If the base of an opponent's figure is no more than 5 levels above Zog's height, or an opponent's height is no more than 3 levels below Zog's base, Zog may add 1 to his Range when attacking that figure.

name: Zombies of Midtown
ability_1_desc: You may move up to 6 Zombies of Midtown that you control each turn. However, you may attack with only 3 Zombies of Midtown. You may attack with any 3 Zombies of Midtown, even Zombies of Midtown that you did not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Three Zombies of Midtown on the same level may combine their attacks and roll their attack dice as one attack. All Zombies of Midtown in the attack must be engaged to the targeted figure.
ability_3_desc: If a Zombie of Midtown that you control destroys an opponent's small or medium figure, replace that figure immediately with one of your own previously destroyed Zombies of Midtown, if possible. Newly placed Zombies cannot attack this turn. Undead are not affected by Zombies Rise Again.

name: Zzzax
ability_1_desc: Range 4+Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Chain Electricity Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. This special attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: If Zzzax is on a water space it rolls 2 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Zzzax's movement, ignore elevations. Zzzax may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over objects such as ruins. When Zzzax starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: ZZ'DTRI
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game choose one opponent's Unique Wizard Hero. Zz'dtri rolls an additional attack die when attacking that figure with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure with a normal attack, Zz'dtri rolls two fewer attack die and may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Vitriolic Sphere Special Attack. Zz'dtri only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Zz'dtri can be affected by his own Vitriolic Sphere Special Attack. After all figures have defended, one at a time roll the 20 sided die for all affected surviving figures. If you roll 12 or higher, the figure takes a wound.

name: Zirnelkis
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Web Spaces on this Army Card. After moving and before attacking, you may choose one land space within 3 clear sight spaces of Zirnelkis. If there is an opponent's figure on the chosen space, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher or there is not an opponent's figure on the space, place a Web Space on that space if it fits normally onto that space. Non-arachnid figures on a Web Space are trapped. Trapped figures cannot move off of the Web-Space (two-spaced figures may move as long as one space remains on the Web Space). The trapped figure can move off the Web Space only if a friendly figure occupies an adjacent space. Add 5 to your roll for Entangling Web if the chosen figure is on a Web Space.
ability_2_desc: When climbing up levels of terrain, count every 4 levels as one movement point. When climbing, you may triple Zirnelkis' height.

name: Prince Zuko
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose an opponent's Unique Hero to be Prince Zuko's Pursuit. Prince Zuko rolls one additional die when attacking his Pursuit with a normal attack. Before your opponent would take a turn with Prince Zuko's Pursuit, you must move Prince Zuko up to 3 spaces, if possible. Prince Zuko will take any leaving engagement attacks when moving and must not end his movement with more minimum spaces between him and his Pursuit than when he started this movement.
ability_2_desc: If Prince Zuko inflicts one or more wounds with his normal attack, you may roll an attack die for each wound received. The figure receives one additional wound for each skull rolled. Prince Zuko rolls 3 fewer dice for his normal attack and may not inflict additional wounds when attacking a figure with the Lava Resistant Special Power.
ability_3_desc: When Prince Zuko is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Prince Zuko can take from this attack is one.

name: Warrok the Elementalist
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Warrok, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, destroy Warrok. If you roll 2-19 nothing happens. If you roll a 20, place one of your previously destroyed Constructs on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Warrok.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on Warrok, instead of taking a turn with Warrok, you may take a turn with one Elemental you control that is within clear sight of Warrok.
ability_3_desc: When revealing an order marker on Warrok, after taking his turn, you may choose an opponent's Elemental figure within 8 clear sight spaces of Warrok. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, take temporary control of the chosen Elemental and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Elemental returns to its previous owner. All order markers that were on the figure's Army Card will stay on the card.
